text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Jesucristo aillu quillca , Davidmanda mirai , David Abrahanmanda mirai .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Abrahamba churi Isac aca , Isacpa churi Jacob aca , Jacobpa churiuna Judá aca paihua uquiunandi .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Judá churiuna Fares Zarandi aca , Tamarmanda llucshijguna , Farespa churi Esrom aca , Esromba churi Aram aca .

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Aramba churi Aminadab aca , Aminadabpa churi Naason aca , Naasomba churi Salmón aca .

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Salmomba churi Booz aca , Rahabmanda llucshij , Boozpa churi Obed aca , Rutmanda llucshij , Obedpa churi Isai aca .

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Isaihua churi rey apu David aca , rey apu Davidpa churi Salomón aca , Uriaspa huarmimanda llucshij .

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Salomomba churi Roboam aca , Roboamba churi Abías aca , Abíaspa churi Asa aca .

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Asajpa churi Josafat aca , Josafatpa churi Joram aca , Joramba churi Uzías aca .

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Uzíaspa churi Jotam aca , Jotamba churi Acaz aca , Acazpa churi Ezequías aca .

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Ezequíaspa churi Manases aca , Manasespa churi Amón aca , Amomba churi Josías aca .

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Josíaspa churiuna Jeconías aca paihua uquiunandi , Babilonia llactama apashca horas .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Babiloniama apashca huasha , Jeconíaspa churi Salatiel aca , Salatielba churi Zorobabel aca .

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Zorobabelba churiuna Abiud aca , Eliaquindi , Eliaquimba churi Azor aca .

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Azorba churi Sadoc aca , Sadocpa churi Aquim aca , Aquimba churi Eliud aca .

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Eliudpa churi Eleazar aca , Eleazarba churi Matan aca , Matamba churi Jacob aca .

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Jacobpa churi José aca , Josega María cari aca . Maríamanda Cristo nishca Jesús pagarimuca . Cristo Dios ajllashca nin .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Shinajpi , Abrahanmanda Davidgama chunga chuscu cuti mirashcauna tianauca . Davidmanda Babiloniama apanagama chunga chuscu miraiguna tiaca . Babiloniama apashcamanda Cristogama chunga chuscu miraiguna aca .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jesucristo pagarina casnami aca . Paihua mama María , Josehua pactachishca asha , manaraj llutarijllaira , huahuara tupaca icsai , Santo Espiritumanda .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Paihua cari José , ali shungu runa asha , huarmi ama manali rimashca achu nisha , pacalla pacalla paita saquinara iyaca .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Casna iyasha tiaushcai , shu Diosmanda ángel paita ricurimuca , pai puñusha nuspaushcai . Angel paita nica : José , Davidpa Churi , ama manzhaichu camba huarmi Mariara apingaj . Paihua icsai tupashca huahuaga Santo Espiritumandami .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Shu churira pagarichinga , paita shutichingui Jesús , paihua runaunara quishpichinga paiguna uchaunamanda .

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Cai tucui tucuca , Señorba rimashca shimiuna pactaringaj , profeta nishca Diosmanda rimaj rimashcasna .

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: Shu huanra huarmi huahuara taringami , shu churira pagarichingami . Paita Emanuel nishca shutichingui . Cai shuti nin : Dios ñucanchihuami .

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: José pai nuspashcamanda lliccharisha Señorba ángel rimashcasna rasha , paihua huarmira apica .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Shinasha , paihua mana llutaricachu ñaupa churi pagarina huashagama . Paita shutichica JESÚS .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Jesús Judea partii tiaj Belén llactai pagarimushca horas , Herodes rey apu tiashcai , indi llucshina partimanda huaquin yachajguna Jerusalenma shamunauca .

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: ¿ Maibira pagarishcai judioguna rey apu ? ninauca . Paihua estrellasta ricushcanchi indi llucshina partii . Paita adorangaj shamushcanchi .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Herodes rey apuga caita uyasha turbarica , tucui Jerusalen llactandi .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Herodes tucui sacerdote apuunara , runaunamanda yachaira yachachijgunaras cayasha , paigunara tapuca : ¿ Cristoga maibira pagarina acai ? nisha .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Paiguna ninauca : Judeamanda Belembi ; Diosmanda rimaj casnami quillcashca :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: Can Belén , Judea partii tiaj , Judá apuunamanda mana yali ichillachu angui . Canmanda shu pushaj runa llucshinga , ñuca aillu Israelda cuirangaj .

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Shinajpi Herodes chi yachajgunara pacalla pacalla cayasha , paigunamanda ali tapucami estrellas ricurishca tiempora .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Paigunara cachaca Belén llactama , Chima richi , nisha , huahuamanda sumajlla tapuichi . Paita tarishaga cuentahuaichi , ñuca shinallara shamusha huahuara adorangaj .

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Paiguna rey apura uyashca huasha rinaucami . Indi llucshina partii ricushca estrellas paiguna ñaupajpi rica pactai ringama , shinajpi huahua tiaushca huasi ahuai shayarica .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Estrellasta ricusha cushiyanauca ashcara .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Huasii icusha huahuara ricunauca paihua mama Mariandi . Tuama urmasha , huahuara adoranauca . Paiguna valijgunara pascasha , huahuara cunauca curiras , incienso nishca gusto asnaj ambiras , mirra nishca asnaj iraras .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Astaun , nuspashcaunai rimashca aca ama tigrangaj Herodesma , paiguna rinauca shu nambira .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Paiguna rishca huasha , shu Señormanda ángel ricurimuca Josema pai nuspashcaunai , paita nisha : Atari , huahuara paihua mamandi pushari , Egipto nishca llactama miticuiri . Chihui chapai ñuca canda rimanagama . Herodes huahuara mascangami huañuchingaj .

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Pai lliccharisha , tuta huahuara paihua mamandi pushasha , Egipto llactama rinauca .

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: Chihui tianauca Herodes huañunagama , Señor rimashcara pactachingaj , Diosmanda rimaj rimashcasna : Egiptomanda ñuca Churira cayacani .

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Shinajpi Herodes yachajguna paita umachinaupi ricusha , ashcara piñarisha , huahuaunara huañuchingaj cachaca , tucui ichilla cari huahuanara , ishqui huata tupumanda pishiunara , Belembi tiajgunara , chi rayai tiajgunaras , yachajguna rimashca tiempomanda yupasha .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Chi horasllai Jeremías nishca Diosmanda rimaj rimashca shimi pactarica , pai nishca :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: Rama nishca llactai shimi uyarica , Atun caparina , atun huacai , atun llaquirina , Raquel paihua churiunamanda huacasha . Cariyanara mana munacachu paiguna huañushcamanda .

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Shinashas , Herodes huañushca huasha , Señorba ángel cuti ricurimuca Josera pai nuspashcaunai , Egipto llactai .

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: Atari , nica , huahuara paihua mamandi pushari , Israel llactara ri . Huahuara huañuchingaj niuguna ña huañunaushcami .

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Shinajpi atarica , huahuara paihua mamandi pushaca . Israel llactama shamuca .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Josega , Arquelao nishca Judea partii rey apu tucushcara uyashaga , paihua yaya Herodes randimanda , chima rinara manzhacami . Astaun nuspashcaunai uyasha , pai Galilea partima rica .

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: Nazaret nishca llactama pactamuca chihui tiangaj , Diosmanda rimajguna rimashcara pactachingaj , casna nisha : Pai Nazaret runa nishca anga .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Chi punzhaunai Bautisaj Juan Judeai tiaj runa illashca partima rimaj shamuca .

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Arrepentirichi , nica , ahua pacha mandana mayanllayashcami .

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Caimi Isaías nishca Diosmanda rimaj rimaushca , nisha : Caparij shimi , runa illashca partii caparisha : Señor purina nambira alichichi , paihua ñambiunara dirichuichi .

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Juan camello nishca illmahua ahuashcara churarishca aca , cara chumbillinahua chumbillishca aca . Atun ijiunara sacha mishquiras micuj aca .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Paihuajma shamunauca Jerusalenmanda tucui Judeamanda , tucui Jordan rayai tiaj partiunamanda .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Juan paigunara bautisaca Jordan yacui , paiguna ucharashcaunara cuentajpi .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Ashca fariseo nishcauna saduceo nishcaunandi paihuajma shamujta ricusha , Juan paigunara nica : Machacuimanda miraiguna , ¿ pi cangunara yachachica shamuj piñarishcamanda miticungaj ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Arrepentirina tonora raichi .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Ama iyaichichu canguna quiquin shungüi ningaj : Abrahanga ñucanchi yaya , nisha . Cangunara nini , Dios cai quiquin rumiunamanda churiunara Abrahambajta sicachinara ushanmi .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Maspas , cunallara hachara churashcami yura sapii . Chimanda maican yura mana ali muyura aparijpi cuchushca anga , ninai shitashca anga .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Ñuca cierto pacha cangunara bautisauni yacui , arrepentirishcamanda . Astaun ñuca huashai shamuj cangunara Santo Espiritui ninais bautisangami . Ñucaga mana valijchu ani paihua zapatosllas apangaj . Pai ñucamanda yali ushajmi .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Paihua maquii huairachinara chariun , llushtina pambara pichangami , trigo muyura apingami huacachina huasii , carara rupachingami mana tucurij ninai .

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Shinajpi Galilea partimanda Jesús Jordanma shamuca Juanbajma , pai bautisai tucungaj .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Juanga mana munacachu . Canmi ñucara bautisana angui , nica . ¿ Astaun canzhu ñucajma shamungui ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Jesús paita cutipaca : Saquilla , ministirinmi ñucanchi tucui aliranara pactachingaj . Shinajpi Juan lugarda cuca .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Bautisashca huasha , Jesús yacumanda sicaca , shinajpi anua pacha pascarica . Diospa Espiritura palomasna irgumujta ricuca , paihua ahuai shamucami .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Shu shimi anua pachamanda uyarimuca nisha : Caimi ñuca llaquishca Churi , paihuajpi yapa cushi ani .

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Shinajpi Santo Espíritu Jesusta pushaca runa illashca partima , Supai Apu paita tentangaj .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Chuscu chunga punzhara , tutandi punzhandi sasishca huasha , mana micusha , Jesús yarcachica .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Supai paihuajma tentangaj shamusha , paita nica : Can Diospa Churi ashaga , cai rumiunara rimai : Tanda tucui , nisha .

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Quillcashcami tian : Mana tandallahua runa causangachu , astaun Dios tucui rimashca shimimandas .

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Shinajpi Supai Apu paita Dios ajllashca llactama pushaca , templo nishca Diospa huasi ahua pundai paita shayachica .

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Paita nica : Can Diospa Churi ashaga , allpama urmai ; casna quillcashcami tian : Paihua angelgunara cambajma cachangami . Shinallara , Canda apinaungami paiguna maquiunai , ama camba chaqui nijtaringaj rumii .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Jesús paita cutipaca : Shinallara quillcashcami tian : Señorda camba Diosta ama tentanguichu .

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Cutillara , Supai Apu paita shu yapa ahua urcuma pushaca , chimanda tucui mundu llactaunara ricuchica paiguna sumajndi .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Supai paita nica : Cai tucuira canda cushami can tuama urmasha ñucara adorajpi .

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita nica : Ri , Satanás , quillcashcami tian : Señorda camba Diosta adorana mangui , paulara sirvina mangui .

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Shinajpi Supai Apu paita saquica . Angelguna shamunauca , paita sirvinauca .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Jesús Juan chonda cularbi ishcashcara uyasha , Galileama tigraca .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Nazaret llactara saquisha , Capernaum nishca lamar patai tiaj llactama shamuca , chihui causauca . Capernaum llacta Zabulón Neftalí nishca partiunai tian .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jesús caima shamuca Isaías nishca Diosmanda rimaj rimashcara pactachingaj , casna nisha :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: Zabulón llactas , Neftalí llactas , lamar ñambii , Jordan huashai , gentil nishcauna Galilea partii ;

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Llandu tutai tiarij runauna atun velara ricunauca . Huañuna llandui tiarijgunara vela punzhayachicami .

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Chi horasmanda pacha , Jesús yachachingaj callarica . Rimai callarica : Arrepentirichi , nisha , ahua pacha mandana mayanllayashcami .

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Jesús , Galilea lamar rayai puriusha , ishquindi uquira ricuca , Pedro nishca Simón aca , paihua uqui Andresndi , licarinauca lamarbi . Aichahuara apijguna anauca .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Paigunara nica : Ñucara catihuaichi , cangunara runara licajgunara rasha .

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Paiguna licaunara dsas saquisha , paita catinauca .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Chimanda rijpi , shu ishquindi uquira ricuca , Jacobo Zebedeo churi paihua uqui Juandi . Paiguna yaya Zebedeohua canoai tianauca licaunara sirasha . Jesús paigunara cayaca : Shamichi , nisha .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Paiguna dsaslla canoara yayaras saquisha , paita catinauca .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Jesús tucui Galilea partiunama risha , paiguna tandarina huasiunai yachachisha , Dios mandana pacha ali shimira camachisha , tucui ungüigunaras tucui nanaigunaras alichisha purica .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Paihua shuti uyarica tucui Siria nishca partiunai . Paihuajma pushamunauca nanachijgunara , imahua ungusha tormendarishcaunaras , supai apishcaunaras , loco tucushcaunaras , suchu nishca mana purina ushajgunaras . Paigunara alichica .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Ashca runauna paita catimunauca , Galileamandas Decápolis nishca partimandas , Jerusalenmandas , Judeamandas , Jordan yacu chimbamandas .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Jesús chi ashca runaunara ricusha , urcuma sicaca ; pai tiarijpi pai yachachishca runauna paihuajma shamunauca .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Jesús rimasha paigunara yachachica nisha :

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Cushiunami almai pugri anchi nijguna . Paigunajmi ahua pacha mandana .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Cushiunami huacajguna , paiguna cushi tucunaungami .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Cushiunami mansouna , paiguna cai pachara cui tucunaungami .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Cushiunami alirangaj yarcachijguna upinaichijguna , sajsachisca anaunga .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Cushiunami llaquij shunguyujguna , paiguna llaquishca tucunaungami .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Cushiunami chuyaj shunguuna , paiguna Diosta ricunaungami .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Cushiunami macanaujpurara alichijguna , Diospa churiuna nishca anaunga .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Cushiunami aliranamanda tormendachishcauna , paigunajmi ahua pacha mandana .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: Cushiunami anguichi imahoras ñucamanda chijnishca tormendachishca asha , ima manaliras cangunamanda llullasha rimanaupi .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Cushiyaichi , cariyaichi , cangunara pagana atunmi ahua pachai . Shinallarami tormendachinauca cangunamanda ñaupa tiaj Diosmanda rimajgunara .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: Canguna cai pacha cachi cuenta anguichi . Cachiga paihua mishqui upa tucujpi , ¿ imahuara mishquiyachingairi ? Imajpas mana sirvin . Canzhama ichuna anga , runauna aitangaj .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: Caguna cai pacha vela cuenta anguichi . Shu urcu pundai tiaj llacta mana pacaihuajchu .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Shinallara shu velara mana sindichinaunzhu tasa ucui churangaj , astaun ahuai churangaj , huasii tiajgunara punzhay achingaj .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Shina sindichu canguna vela cuenta runauna ñaupajpi , paiguna can ali rashcaunara ricungaj , ricusha camba ahua pachai tiaj Yayara ahuayachingaj .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: Ama iyaichichu ñuca shamucani ley nishca camachishca shimira Diosmanda rimajguna rimashcaras chingachingaj . Mana chingachingajchu shamucani , astaun pactachingaj .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , ahua pachas cai pachas pasaringagama , ley shimimanda mana shu shimihuallas shu pundahuallas pasaringami tucui pactaringagama .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Shinajpi pi runas shu ichilla mandashcara mana casujpi , shinallara runaunara yachachijpis , ichillami nishca anga ahua pacha mandanai , astaun mandashcara raj runa shinara yachachishas atunmi nishca anga ahua pacha mandanai .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Cangunara nini , canguna alirashcauna mana y ali ajpiga yachaira yachachijguna , fariseoguna alirashcaunamanda , canguna ahua pacha mandanai mana icunguichichu .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: Uyashcanguichimi imasna nishca aca ñaupa tiempounai : Ama huañuchinguichu , pis huañuchijpi tarípashca anga .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Astaun cangunara nini pis paihua uquihua piñaríjpi tarípashca anga . Pis , Upa , nijpi paihua uquira , rucuuna tandarishcamanda causayachisca anga . Pis , Mana valij , paita nijpi , ucu pachai urmanalla tucunga .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: Shina ashas , can can Diosma cuyanara altar nishca sacrificio rana mesama apamusha , chihuis iyariungui imasna camba uqui canda causachiupi imamandas ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: Can cushca ofrendara chihui saqui altar ñaupajpi ; rí , camba uquihua ñaupara alichingaj , chihuasha shami camba ofrendara cungaj .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: Uctalla alichingui canda chijnijwa , chara paihua pariju ñambii tiaushaliara . Mana shina rajpiga , pai canda taripaj maquii cunga , taripajga canda guarda maquii , canga chonda cularbi ishcai tucungui .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Cierto pacha canda nini , chimanda mana llucshinguichu puchucai mediohuara pagangagama .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: Uyashcanguichi imasna rimashca aca : Ama shujhua tacar inguichu .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Astaun ñuca cangunara nini : Pi runas shu huarmira ricusha munajpi , ña paihua shungüi ucharashcami paihua .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Shinasha , camba ali ñahui canda uchai urmachisha nijpi , ñahuira llucchisha ichui . Astaun alimi camba aichamanda shu partira pirdingaj , camba entero aicha ucu pachai ama shitai tucungaj .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Camba ali maqui canda uchai urmachisha nijpi , pitisha ichui . Astaun alimi camba aichamanda shu partira pirdingaj , entero aicha ucu pachai ama shitai tucungaj .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: Shinallara rimashcami aca : Pi runas paihua huarmira ichusha nijpi , maqui llushpichina quillcara cuchu .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Astaun ñuca cangunara nini , pi runas paihua huarmira ichusha , mana shujhua tacarishca raigumanda ajpi , huarmira shujhua tacarichin , shinallara pihuas ichushca huarmira casarasha , shujhua tacarij tucun .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: Shinallara uyashcanguichimi imasna ñaupa horas rimashca aca : Diospa shutii rimashcara ama paquinguichu , astaun can Diospa shutü rimashca cushca shimiunara Señorma pactachina angui .

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: Astaun ñuca cangunara nini : Ama Diospa shutii rimasha shimira cunguichi , mana ahua pacha shutii , caimi Diospa tiarina ,

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: shinallara mana cai pacha shutiis , caimi Diospa aitarina , shinallara mana Jerusalen shutüs , caimi atun Rey Apu llacta .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Shinallara mana camba uma shutüs shimira cuichu , camba aechara mana yanaras mana yurajtas turcanara ushanguichu .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Canguna rimana casna achu : Ari , nisha ; Mana , nisha . Mas ajpiga , manalimanda shamun .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: Uyashcanguichimi imasna rimashca aca : Ñahui muyupura , ñahui muyupura ; shinallara quirupura quirupura .

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Ñucaga cangunara nini : Manali runa canda sajmajpi , ama arcaichichu . Astaun camba ñahui ali partira sajmajpi , shu partira richuchi sajmangaj .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Runa camba camisetara mañajpi apu ñaupajpi , shinallara camba camisara cui .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Pi runas paihua carga canda apangaj mandajpi shu samai tupura , ishqui samaira aparisha ri .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Maicans mañajpi cui . Maicans mafíachisha nijpi , ama mitsaichu .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: Uyashcanguichimi imasna ñaupa horas rimashca aca : Camba mayanpura causajta llaquingui , canda piñajta chijningui .

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Ñucaga cangunara nini : Cangunara piñajgunara llaquichi , maldiciajgunara bendiciaichi , cangunara chijnijgunara yanapaichi , cangunara huajlichijgunamanda tormendachijgunamandas mañaichi .

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Shina rasha canguna ahua pachai tiaj Yaya churiuna tucunguichimi . Paiga paihua indira aitachin manalhma ahuai aliuna ahuais . Shinallara tamiachin aliuna ahuai manaliuna ahuais .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Canguna liaquijgunallara llaquijpi , ¿ Ima paganarara charinguichiri ? ¿ Manzhu shinallara ranaun cullquira tandachijgunas ?

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Canguna uquiunallara salurajpi , ¿ ima alira raunguichiri ? ¿ Manzhu shinallara ranaun gentilguna ?

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Gusto ali sumaj aichi , imasna canguna ahua pachai tiaj Yaya ali gusto sumaj ashcasna .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Cuiraichi canguna ali rashcaunara ama runauna ñaupajpi rangaj , paiguna ricunauchu nisha . Casna rasha paganara mana charinguichichu camba ahua pachai tiaj Yayamanda .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Canguna limosna nishca cullquira cusha , ama cormetara tucachichu camba ñaupajpi , ishqui shimiyujguna rashca cuenta tandarina huasiunais ñambiunais , runauna paigunara alabangaj . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , paganara ña apinaushcami .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Canga limosna nishcara cusha , camba lluqui maqui ali maqui rashcara ama yachachu .

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: Camba limosna pacalla pacalla cushca achu . Camba Yaya , pacallai ricuj , canda pagangami tucui runauna ricushcai .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Can Diosta mañasha , ama ishqui shimiyujguna cuenta aichi . Paiguna shayarisha mañanara gustanaun tandarina huasiunais ñambi turcarishcais , runauna paigunara ricungaj . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , ña pagai tucunaushcami .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Canga Diosta mañasha nisha , camba ucui icungui , pungura ishcangui , camba pacallai tiaj Yayara mañangui . Camba pacallai ricuj Yaya tucui runa ricushcai canda pagangami .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: Canguna mañashaga , ama cali cali cuenta yanga rimasha mañanguichi gentilguna cuenta . Paiguna ashca cuti rimashcamanda uyashca anga iyanaun .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Paiguna rashcasna ama raichichu . Camba Yaya canguna ministishcara ña yachan , canguna manara mañajllaira .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Casna mañaichi : Ñucanchi ahua pachai tiaj Yaya , camba shuti sumacyachishca achu .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Shamuchu camba mandana pacha . Can munashca rashca achu , imasna ahua pachai , shinallara cai pachais .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Ñucanchi caran punzha micunara cuhuai cuna punzha .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Ñucanchi manali rashcaunara perdonahuai , imasna shinallara ñucanchira manalira rajgunara perdonaunchi .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Ama tentacionma pushahuaichu ñucanchira , astaun manalimanda quishpichihuai . Cambajmi mandana , ushanas , sumajpas , huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: Canguna runaunara paiguna manali rashcaunara perdonajpi , shinallarami camba ahua pachai tiaj Yaya cangunara perdonanga .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Astaun canguna runaunara paiguna manali rashcaunara mana perdonajpi , shinallarami canguna Yaya canguna rashca manaliunara mana perdonangachu .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Canguna sasisha , ama llaquirínguichichu , ishqui shimiyujgunasna . Paiguna ñahuiunara turcanaun , runaunara paiguna sasishcara ricuchingaj . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , paiguna ña pagai tucunaushcami .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Can sasishaga , aceitera talingui umai , ñahuiras maillangui ,

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: can sasishcara runaunara ama ricuchingaj , astaun camba pacallai tiaj Yayama ricuchingaj . Camba pacallai ricuj Yaya tucui runauna ricushcai canda pagangami .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: Cai pachai ama charij tucuichi , maibi susu huacarinas ismuchinaun , maibi shuhuajguna uctusha shuhuanaun .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: Astaun ahua pachaiga charij tucuichi , maibi susu huacarinas mana ismuchinaun , maibi shuhuajguna mana uctunaun , mana shuhuanaun .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Maibi canguna valijta charijpi , chillai camba shungu tiaun .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: Ñahui muyu aicha velami . Camba ñahui muyu ali ajpi , entero aicha punzhayachishcami anga .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Camba ñahui muyu manali ricuj ajpi camba aicha llandu tutaimi tian . Shinajpiga can ucui charíshca vela llandu tuta cuenta ajpi , llandu asha mas llandunmi .

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: Pi runas ishqui patronda sirvina mana ushan ; shujta chijninga , chishujta llaquingami ; shujta ahuayachingami chishujta pishiyachingami . Mana ushanguichichu Diostas cullquiras sirvina .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunara nini : Ama turbarichichu canguna causanamanda ¿ imara micuna angai ? ¿ imara upina angai ? nisha . Shinallara ama turbarichichu canguna aichamanda , ¿ imara churarina angai ? nisha . ¿ Manzhu causana micunamanda , aichas churanamandas yali valin ?

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Pishcuunara ricuichi , mana tarpunaun , mana pallanaun , mana huacachinaun huasiunai . Canguna ahua pachai tiaj Yaya paigunara caran . ¿ Manzhu canguna paigunamanda yali valinguichi ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: ¿ Cangunamanda maicanda ushan masna munaushas shu palmora yapangaj , mas ahua tucungaj ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: ¿ Churanamanda imarasha turbaringuichu ? Ricupaichi sacha sisaunara imasnara iñanaun , mana tarabanaun , mana cauchunaun ;

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: cangunara nini , Salomón tucui paihua sumajhua mana caigunasna churarijchu aca .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Shinallara allpamanda quihua , cuna punzha tian , cayandi punzha rupachishcami , Diosmi casna churachin . ¿ Manzhu pai mas alira ranga cangunajhua , ansalla quirij runauna ?

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: Ama turbarichichu , ¿ Imara micushun imara upishun , imara churachishun ? nisha .

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Gentilguna tucui caigunara mascanaun , astaun canguna ahua pachai tiaj Yaya yachan imasnara cai tucuira ministinguichimi .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Astaun , ñaupa punda Dios mandana pachara pai ali causanaras mascaichi , cai tucuira cangunajta yapashca anga .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Shinasha , ama turbarichichu cayandi punzhamanda . Cayandi punzha paihua quiquin turbarínara apamungami . Ña basta caran punzhai paihua turbarinallara .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: Ama taripaichichu mana taripashca tucungaj .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Ima taripanahua canguna taripanguichi , shina tupui taripai tucunguichimi . Ima tupuhua canguna tupunguichi , shina tupullaira canguna tupui tucunguichimi .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: ¿ Imarasha camba uqui ñahuii tiaj polvohuara ricungui , camba quiquin ñahuii tiaj cullura mana ricusha ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: ¿ Imarasha uquira ningui : Lugarda cuhuai camba ñahuimanda polvohuara ichungaj , camba quiquin ñahuii atun vigas tiaullaira ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: ¡ Ishqui shimiyuj ! Ñaupa camba quiquin ñahuimanda vigasta ichui , chi huasha alimi ricungui ichilla polvohuara llucchingaj camba uqui ñahuimanda .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: Sumaj ajta ama cuichi allcuunama , shinallara canguna perlas nishca chuya rumiunara cuchiunama ama shitaichichu , cuchiuna ama aitangaj , chihuasha cangunara chugrichingaj .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: Mañaichi , cui tucunguichimi . Mascaichi , taringuichimi . Cayaichi , pascai tucunguichimi .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Tucui mañaj apin , mascaj tarin , cayajta pascanaun .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: ¿ Maican runa cangunamanda paihua churi : Tandara cuhuai , nijpi , shu rumira paita cungai ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: ¿ Churi , aichahuara cuhuai , nijpi , shu machacuira cungai ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Cangunaga manaliuna ashallara , ali cuyashcaunara churiunama cuyanara yachanguichi , ¿ manzhu mas canguna ahua pachai tiaj Yaya aliunara cunga paita mañajgunama ?

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: Shinasha tucui imaras canguna munanguichi runauna cangunahua rangaj , shinallara raichi paigunahua . Caimi ley nishca shimi Diosmanda rimajguna shimimi .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: Quishqui pungura icuichi . Anzhu punguga atun ñambiga ucu pachama rin chingachingaj , ashcaunami chita icunaun . 14 Quishqui pungumi , ichilla ñambimi causanama pushan , ansallami tarinaun cai nambira .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: Llullasha rimajgunamanda huacachichi , cangunama borregouna cuenta churarishcauna shamunaun , churarishca ucui micuj pumaunami .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Paiguna rashcaunamanda paigunara ricsinguichimi . ¿ Uvillas muyura cashamandachu pallanaun ? ¿ Higo muyuras chini yuramandachu pallanaun ?

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Shinajpi tucui ali yura ali muyura cun , manali yuraga manalira cun .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Ali yura manali muyura cungaj mana ushanzhu , shinallara manali yura ali muyura cungaj mana ushanzhu .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Tucui yura mana ali muyura aparijpi , cuchusbca anga , ninai shitashca anga .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Shinajpi , paiguna aparishca muyumanda ricsinguichimi .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Mana tucui ñucara : Señor , señor , nij runa ahua pacha mandanai icungachu , astaun ñuca munaira rajlla .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Ashcauna chi punzhai ñucara ninaunga : Señor , señor , ¿ manzhu camba shutii yachachicanchi , camba shutii supaigunara ichucanchi , camba shutii ashca munanaita ranaunara rarcanchi ?

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Shinajpi ñuca paigunara rimasha : Imahoraspas cangunara mana ricsicanichu , anzhurichi ñucamanda , manalira rajguna .

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: Maicans cai ñuca shimira uyasha , shinallara rasha , casna sabiro runa cuentami tucun : Paihua huasira rumii sicachica .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Shinzhira tamiaca , yacuuna undamunauca , shinzhira huairaca , huasira huactanauca . Randi huasi mana urmacachu , shinzhi rumii sicachishcaraigu .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: Astaumbas maicans cai shimiunara uyasha mana pactachijpi , casna upa runa cuentami tucun : Paihua huasira tiyui sicachica .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Tamiaca , yacuuna undamunacua , shinzhira huairaca , huasira huactanauca . Huasiga urmaca , illajta tulashca aca .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Jesús cai shimiunara rimai pasajpi , runauna pai yachachishcamanda manzharinauca ;

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: mandaj cuenta yachachishcaraigu , mana yachaira yachachijguna cuenta .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Jesús urcumanda irgumujpi , ashca runauna paita catimunauca .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Shu ismushca aicha llagayuj runa shamusha , Jesuspa ñaupajpi tuama urmasha nica : Señor , can munasha ñucara alichingaj ushangui .

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Jesús maquira chutasha paita llangaca : Munanimi , nisha , alichishcangui . Chi ratollai , llaga chinganea .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita nica : Ricui , pitas ama cuentaichu , astaun ri , camba aichara sacerdotera ricuchingaj . Moisés rimashca sacrificiora cui , paiguna can alichishcara ricuchingaj .

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Jesús Capernaum llactai icujpi , shu soldaro capitán paihuajma shamuca , paita rugaca :

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: Señor , nica , ñucara sirvij runa caitui ichushca sirin ñuca huasii , suchu tucushca , ashcara tormendarisha .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Rishami , paita alichishami .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Capitanga cutipasha nica : Señor , ñuca mana valijchu ani can ñuca huasii icungaj . Rimailla , ñucara sirvij aliyangami .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Ñucas mandashca runa ani , shinallara soldarounara charini mandangaj . Shujta nini : Ri , paimi rin ; shujta : Shami , nini , paimi shamun . Ñucara sirvijta nini : Caita rai , pai chita ran .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Caita uyasha Jesús manzharica . Paita catijgunara nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , Israelbi casna quirinara mana tupashcanichu .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Cangunara nini , ashcauna shamunaunga indi llucshina partimanda , indi icuna partimandas , Abrahamhuas Isachuas Jacobhuas tiaringaj ahua pachai .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Astaun ahua pacha mandanai tiana runauna canzhai tiaj llandui shitai tucunaunga . Chihui atun huacai quiru mucunas .

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús capitanda rimaca : Ri , nisha , can quirishcasna rashca achu . Paita sirvij chi horasllaira aliyashca aca .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Paihua maquira llangaca , calentura paita saquica . Huarmi atarisha paigunara sirvica .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Tutayaupi paihuajma ashca supai apishcaunara pushamunauca . Rimashcallahua supaigunara ichuca , tucui ungushcaunaras alichica ,

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Diosmanda rimaj Isaías rimashca pactarichu , casna nisha : Paulara ñucanchi ungüigunaras apica , ñucanchi nanaigunaras apaca .

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Jesús paita muyujta runauna tandarishcara ricusha , chimbama pasangaj mandaca .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Shu yachaira yachachij runa paima shamusha nica : Yachachij , canda catimusha maita rijpis .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Chajauna paiguna uctuunara charínaun , pisheuunas paiguna tasindas charinaun ; astaun ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , maibis umara samachingaj mana charinichu .

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Shuj pai yachachishca runaunamanda paita nica : Señor , lugarda cuhuai ñaupa punda yayara pambangaj risha .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Catihuai . Huañushca samiunallara saqui paiguna quiquin huañushcaunara pambangaj .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Jesús canoai icujpi , pai yachachishca runauna catimunauca .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Lamarbi shinzhira huairaca . Tsajlas atarisha ñaca ñaca canoara pambachinauca , astaun Jesús puñuriaica .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Yachachishca runauna paihuajma shamusha paita llicchachinauca : Señor , nisha uctalla quishpichihuapai , huañuunchimi .

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Jesusga cutipaca : ¿ Imarasha manzhanguichi , ansalla quirij runauna ? Shinajpi atarisha , Jesús huairaras lamardas piñaca . Tucui casilla , chunlla tucuca .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Runauna manzharisha ninauca : ¿ Ima sami runa cai ? Huairas lamarbas paita uyanaun .

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Chimba partima , Gadara runauna llactama pactajpi , ishqui supai apishca runauna tupaj shamunauca . Pambana huasiunamanda llucshinauca , yapa milli anauca . Pis chi nambira pasanara mana ushacachu .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Caparisha ninauca Jesusta : ¿ Imara munangui ñucanchihua , Jesús , Diospa Churi ? ¿ Caima shamushcanguichu ñucanchira tormendachingaj tiempo manara pactamujllaira ?

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Carullai shu atun cuchi monton micusha tianauca .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Supaiguna paita ruganauca : Ñucanchira ichushaga , bigarda cuhuapai chi monton cuchiunai icungaj .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Richi , nica . Llucshinauca , cuchi montonma rinauca . Tucui cuchi monton peñasmanda saltasha urmanauca lamarbi , yacui chucasha huañunauca .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Cuchira carajgunaga miticusha rinauca . Llactama shamusha imas tucushcaunara cuentanauca , ima tucushcaras supaiguna apishcaunahua .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Tucui llacta runauna Jesusta tupangaj shamunauca . Paita ricusha , rugasha ninauca : Anzhuripai ñucanchi llactamanda .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Shinajpi , Jesús canoai icuca , chimbama pasaca , paihua quiquin llactama shamuca .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Paihuajma shu suchu runara pushamunauca , caitui huandusha . Jesús huanduj runauna quirishcara ricusha , suchuma nica : Cariyai , churi , can ucharashcaunara perdonashcangui .

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Shinajpi huaquin yachaira yachachijguna , shungu ucui ninauca : Irusta riman , Diosta camisha .

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Jesús paiguna iyashcara yachasha nica : ¿ Imarasha manalira iyaunguichiri canguna shungüi ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: ¿ Imara mas rimailla anga : Can ucharashcara perdonashcangui , mana ashaga , Atari , puri , nisha rimangaj ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Canguna yachanauchu ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ushaira charini cai pachai uchara perdonangaj nisha , Jesús suchura riman : Atari , camba caitura apasha ri camba huasima .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Shinajpi runa atarica , paihua huasima rica .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Runauna caita ricusha manzharinauca Diosta alabanauca , casna ushaira runaunama cushcamanda .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Jesús chimanda pasasha , Mateo nishca runara ricuca , gobierno cullquira tandachina huasii tiajta . Paita nica : Catihuai . Mateo atarisha paita catica .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Jesús mesai tiarijpi Mateo huasii , ashca cullquira tandachijguna , ashca uchayujgunas shamusha mesai tiarinauca Jesushua , pai yachachishca runaunandi .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Fariseoguna caita ricusha , yachachishca runaunama ninauca : ¿ Imarasha cangunara Yachachij cullquira tandachijgunahua uchayujgunahuas micun ?

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Jesús caita uyasha paigunara nica : Aliuna doctorda mana ministinaun , astaun ungushcauna ministinaunmi .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Richi , yachaichi imara nin cai shimi : Sacrificio nishcamanda yali shu ali llaquij shungura munani . Ali causajgunara cayangaj mana shamucanichu , astaun uchayujgunara , paiguna arrepentiringaj .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Shinajpi Juan yachachishca runauna Jesusbajma shamusha paita ninauca : ¿ Imaraigumanda ñucanchis fariseogunas sasisha causaunchi , astaun can yachachishca runauna mana sasinaun ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : ¿ Borara rajguna llaquirina ushanaunzhu cari paigunahua tiaushca horaspi ? Astaun punzhauna shamunaunga imahoras cari quichushca anga . Chi horaspi sasinaungami .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Manapis rucu churanara remendanzhu mushuj llachapa pitihua . Shina rashaga churanara mas lliquin .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Shinallara mushuj vinora rucu cara puruunai mana churanaunzhu . Shina rajpi , cara puru lliquirin , vino talirin , cara puru pirdirin . Astaun mushuj vino mushuj cara purui churajpi , shina rajpi ishquindi duranaun .

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Jesús casna rimauscallai , shu valij runa shumuca , paihua ñaupajpi tuama urmasha nica : Ñuca ushushi ñancartalla huañun . Shamupai , camba maquira paihua ahuai churajpi causaringami .

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Jesús atarisha paita catisha rica , pai yachachishca runaunandi .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Ñambii shu ungushca huarmi , yahuar ricurina mana saquirijpi chunga ishqui huatara , huashamanda shamuca . Jesuspa churana pundara llangaca .

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Huarmi paihua shungüi nica : Ñuca paihua churana pundahuallara llangasha aüyashami .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Jesusga voltiarisha , huarmira ricusha , nica : Cariyai , ushushi , can quirishca canda alichishcami . Chi ratomanda pacha huarmi aliyashca aca .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Jesús valij runa huasii icushaga , llautara tucajgunara huacajgunaras ricuca .

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Paigunara nica : Anzhurichi . Huahua mana huañushcachu , puñunllami . Paita burlasha asinauca .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Runaunara huasimanda llucchishca huasha , Jesús icuca , huahuara maquimanda apica , huahua atarica .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Cai rashca uyarica tucui chi partü .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Chimanda pasajpi , ishqui ñausa runa paita catimunauca . Caparisha ninauca : Llaquihuapi ñucanchira , Davidpa Churi .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Jesús huasima pactamujpi , ñausauna paihuajma shamunauca . Paigunara nica : ¿ Ñuca caita rangaj ushajta quiringuichichu ? Ari , Señor , quirinchimi , ninauca .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Shinapi Jesús paiguna ñahui muyura llangaca . Canguna quirishcasna rashca achu , nica .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Paiguna ñahui muyuuna pascarinauca . Jesús paigunara shinzhira rimasha nica : Ricuichi ama pihuas caita yachanauchu .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Randi , paiguna llucshisha , Jesusmanda cuentanauca tucui chi partii .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Paiguna rinaupi , runauna shu upa shimi runara apamunauca , supai apíshcami aca .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Supaira ichushca huasha , upa shimi runa rimaca . Runauna manzharínauca , nisha : Imahoraspas cai samira mana ricushcanchichu Israelbi .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Fariseogunaga : Supai apumanda supaigunara ichun , ninauca .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Jesús tucui atun tucui ichilla llactaunara purica , tandarina huasiunai yachachisha , Dios mandana pacha ali shimira rimasha , tucui ungüira tucui nanairas alichisha .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Jesús ashca taucarimushca runaunara ricusha llaquirica . Ichushca cuenta , chausishca cuenta anauca , cuiraj illaj borregounasna .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Cierto pacha pallana ashcami , astaun tarabajgunaga ansallami .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Pallana Señorda rugaichi pallajgunara cachangaj paihua pallanama .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara cayasha , ushaira paigunara cuca irus supaigunara ichungaj , tucui ungüira tucui nanairas alichingaj .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Pai chunga ishqui cachashca runauna shutiuna casnami : Ñaupa Pedro nishca Simón , paihua uqui Andrespas : Zebedeo churi Jacobo , paihua uqui Juambas ;

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Felipe , Bartolomé , Tomás , cullquira tandachij Mateo , Alfeo churi Jacobo , Tadeo nishca Lebeo .

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Cananista Simón , Judas Iscariote , Jesusta entregaj runa .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Cai chunga ishquira Jesús cachaca , paigunara yachachisha nica : Gentilguna ñambii ama ringuichichu . Samaría runauna llactai ama icunguichichu .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Astaun Israel aillumanda borregouna cuenta chingarishcaunamalla richi .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Rishaga yachachichi , casna nisha : Ahua pacha mandana mayanllayamushcami .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Ungushcaunara alichichi , ismushca aicha llagayujgunara pichaichi , supaigunara ichuichi . Yanga llaquishcamanda apishcanguichimi , yanga llaquishcamanda cuichi .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: Ama apaichichu curira , cullquira , ñutu cullquiras canguna chumbillina carai .

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: Boísaras , ishqui ucu churanaras , zapatostas , taunaras ama apaichichu . Tarabaj runa paihua micunara apingaj valin .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: Maican atun llactai , maican ichilla llactais canguna icusha , mascaichi shu chihui tiaj ali runara , paihuajpi pasiaichi llucshinagama .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Huasii icusha , saluraichi .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Ali huasi ajpi , canguna salurashca chihui shamunga . Astaun mana ali ajpi , canguna salurashca cangunajmallara tigramunga .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Pi runas mana cangunara chasquijpi , canguna shimiunara mana uyajpi , llucshichi chi huasimanda chi llactamandas , canguna chaquimanda polvora chausichi .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , taripana punzhai Sodoma Gomorra llactauna castigana yali ahuantaihuaj anga chi llacta castigai tucunamanda .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: Uyaichi . Cangunara borregounasna ajta pumauna chaupi shungüi cachauni . Machacui cuenta sabirouna aichi , astaun palomauna cuenta manso shunguyujguna aichi .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Runaunamanda cuiraichi . Cangunara rucuuna tandarinaunama entreganaunga , paiguna tandarina huasiunai cangunara livachinaunga .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Gobernadorguna ñaupajpi , rey apuuna ñaupajpi apashca anguichimi ñucaraigumanda , paigunas gentügunas ñuca shimira uyangaj .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Cangunara entregashca horas , ama turbarichichu , imara rimana anga nisha . Chi horasllaira imara rimanara cangunama cushca anga .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Mana cangunachu rimanguichi , astaun canguna Yaya Espíritu canguna shungu ucui rimanga .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: Uqui paihua uquira entregangami huañungaj , yaya churiras . Churiuna yayaunahua contra atarinaunga , paigunara huañuchinaunga .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Tucui runauna cangunara chijninaunga ñuca shutiraigumanda . Astaun , puchucaigama ahuantaj runa quishpichi tucungami .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Cangunara tormendachijpi cai llactai , shu llactama miticuichi . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , tucui Israelbi tiaj llac1 taunama rinara mana tucuchinguichichu Runa Churi manara shamujllaira .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: Shu yachachishca runa paita yachachijta mana yalinzhu , sirvij runas paihua patronda mana yalinzhu .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Yachachishca runama bastami paita yachachijsna tucujpi , shu sirvij runa paihua patronsna . Runauna huasiyuj dueñora Beelzebú nisha , ¿ manzhu mas shinallara ninaunga paihua huasii tiajgunaras ?

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Shinajllaira , ama manzhaichichu paigunara . Ima quillpashcaras ricuchishca anga , ima pacashcaras yachashca anga .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Ñuca cangunara llandui rimashcara punzhai rimaichi . Rinrii uyashcaras huasi pundamanda caparichi .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Ama manzhaichichu aichara huañuchijgunara , randi almara mana ushanaunzhu huañuchinara . Astaun manzhaichi almara aichandi ucu pachai chingachijta .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: ¿ Manzhu ishqui ichilla pisheura ishqui realhua catunaun ? Shinajllaira paigunamanda mana shujpas allpama urman , canguna Yaya mana yachajpi .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Canguna umamanda acchauna tucui yupashcami .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Shinajpi ama manzhaichichu . Canguna ashca pisheuunamanda yali valijguna anguichi .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Maican runa ñuca shutira rimajpi runauna ñaupajpi , ñuca shinallara paihua shutira rimasha ñuca ahua pachai tiaj Yaya ñaupajpi .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Maican runa ñucamanda : Paita mana ricsinichu nijpi runauna ñaupajpi , ñuca paimanda shinallara : Mana ricsinichu , nisha , ñuca ahua pachai tiaj Yaya ñaupajpi .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: Ama iyaichichu ñuca ganas causanara cai pachama apamungaj shamucani ; mana ganas causanarachu , astaun shu esparara apamungaj shamucani .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Ñuca shamucani piñanauna tiangaj churi paihua yayahua , ushushi paihua mamahua , cachun paihua cari mamahua .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Shu runahua piñanaujguna paihua quiquin huasimandauna anaunga .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: Maicans yayara mamara ñucamanda yalijta llaquijpi , mana ñucamanda valijchu an . Maicans churira ushushira ñucamanda yalijta llaquijpi , mana ñucamanda valijchu an .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Maicans paihua cruzta mana aparijpi ñucara mana catijpis , mana ñucamanda valijchu an .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Maicans causaira tarisha , chita pirdingami ; maicans paihua causaira pirdíshaga ñucamanda , causaira tupangami .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
