text2: Maicans cangunara chasquisha , ñucara chasquin ; maicans ñucara chasquisha , ñucara cachamujta chasquin .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Maicans shu Diosmanda rimajta chasquisha pai Diosmanda rimaj ashcaraigu , shu Diosmanda rimaj tupu paganara apinga ; maicans shu ali runara chasquisha pai ali runa ashcaraigu , shu ali runa tupu paganara apingami .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Maicans shu cai ichilla huahuaunama shu chiri yacu vasora cusha , pai ñuca yachachishca asha , cierto pacha paima paganara mana pirdingachu .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Jesús pai chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunara camachishca huasha , chi partimanda rica , paiguna llactaunai yachachingaj camachingajpas .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Juanga , chonda cularbi tiausha , Cristo rashcaunara uyasha , ishqui pai yachachishca runaunara paihuajma cachaca .

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: Shamunauca paita tapungaj : ¿ Can shamuna ajchu angui ? ¿ Shujtachu chapashun ? nisha .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipasha : Richi , nica Juanda cuentaichi canguna ricushcaunaras uyashcaunaras .

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Ñausauna ricunaun , anga changauna purinaun , ismushca aichayujguna pichashcami anaun , upa rinriuna uyanaun , huañushcauna causachishcami anaun , pugriunama evangelio shimira rimashcami .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Cushiyuj maican runa mana ñucahua piñarisha .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Paiguna riushcai , Jesús runaunama rimai callarica Juanmanda : ¿ Imara ricungaj llucshicanguichi , nisha , runa illashca partima ? ¿ Shu huaira cuyuchishca pindujta ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: ¿ Imara ricungaj llucshicanguichi ? ¿ Shu gusto churanahua churachishca runara ? Gusto churanahua churachishcauna rey apu huasiunai tianaun .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Astaun , ¿ Imara ricungaj llucshicanguichi ? ¿ Shu Diosmanda rimajta ? Ari , nini cangunara , shu Diosmanda rimajta yali .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Cai runamandami quillcashca tian : Riqui , nisha , ñuca rimajta camba ñaupajma cachani . Pai camba nambira puruntungami camba ñaupajpi .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Huarmi pagarichishcaunamanda , Bautisaj Juanmanda shu yali runa mana atarishcachu . Shinajllaira ahua pacha mandanai ima mas ichilla runas paimanda yalimi .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Bautisaj Juamba punzhamanda cuna horasgama , ahua pacha mandanara tormendachishcami , shinzhiunaga vencisha apinaun .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Tucui Diosmanda rimajgunas ley camachishca shimis Juan tiashca horasgama Diosmanda rimanauca .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Canguna chi shimira chasquisha nijpi , cangunara nini : Chimi shamuna aj Elias .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Uyana rinriyuj uyachu .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: ¿ Imahuara ricuchishairi cuna horas causaj miraigunara ? Pujllaj huahuauna cuentami , pulazaunai tiarisha , compañerounama caparinaun , nisha :

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: Llautara tucacanchi , astaun mana bailacanguichichu . Cangunama huacasha cantacanchi , cangunaga mana huacacanguichichu .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Juan shamuca , mana micuj , mana upij . Supaiyujmi , ninaun .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Ñucaga , Runa Churi nishca , micuj upij shamucani . Shinajpi ninaun : Caibi shu micuisiqui runa , vinora upisiqui , cullquira tandachijguna amigo , uchayujguna amigo . Shinajllaira , Yachana ali nishcami paihua churiunamanda .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Shinajpi Jesús chi llactaunara piñangaj callarica maibi ashca pai munanaita rashcauna rashca aca , paiguna mana arrepentirishcaraigu , casna nisha :

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: ¡ Upamanda , Corazín ! ¡ Upamanda Betsaida ! Cambajpi rashca munanaita rashcauna Tiro llactai Sidón llactais rashca ajpiga , ña unaira arrepentirinaunmaca , costalda churarisha , ushpais tiarisha .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunara nini : Taripana punzhai Tiro llacta Sidón llactas pishi castigai tucunaungami , randi canguna yali castigai tucunguichimi .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Cambas , Capernaum llacta , ahua pachagama ahuayachishca acangui , astaun huañushcauna tiashcagama irguchishca angui . Cambajpi munanaita rashcauna Sodoma llactai rashca ajpiga , cuna punzhagama duranmaca .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunara nini : Taripana punzhai Sodoma llacta pishi castigai tucungami , randi canga yali castigai tucunguimi .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Cai horas Jesús cutipasha nica : Yaya , ahua pachamanda cai pachamandas Señor , canda alabauni . Can tucui caigunara yachajgunamanda intindijgunamandas pacacangui , astaun huahuaunara ricuchicangui .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Ari , Yaya , casnami munacangui .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Tucuira ñuca Yaya ñucama entregahuacami . Pis mana ricsin Churira , Yayalla paita ricsinmi . Pis Yayara mana ricsin , Churilla paita ricsinmi , shinallara Churi ricuchisha nishca runa Yayara ricsingami .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Ñucama shamichi tucui canguna tarabashcauna aparishcaunas . Ñuca cangunara samachishami .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Ñuca huanduna caspira cuenta apaichi . Ñucamanda yachaichi , manso shunguyuj , ali shunguyuj ani . Alma samanara tupanguichimi .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Ñuca huanduna caspi cuenta aparinallami , ñuca carga pangallami .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Chi punzhaunai Jesús chagraunara pasauca , shu samana punzha . Pai yachachishca runauna yarcachisha papajta aisasha , micungaj callarinauca .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Fariseoguna caita ricusha ninauca : Riqui , can yachachishca runauna mana raihuajta ranaun samana punzhai .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Manzhu Quillcai ricushcanguichi David rashcara , shu cuti pai paihua tiajgunandi yarcachishca horaspi ;

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: imasna Diospa huasii icuca , ricuchina tandara micuca . Pai , paihua compañajgunandi mana micuna aca , sacerdoteunalla micuna ajpi ?

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Shinallara , ¿ manzhu ricushcanguichi ley camachishca shimii imasna templo huasii tiaj sacerdoteuna quiquin samana punzhai tarabanaun sacrificiora rangaj , shina rashas mana causaiyuj tucunaun ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Astaun , cangunara nini , shu templomanda yali valij caibimi tiaun .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Canguna cai shimira intindishaga , Sacrificio ranamanda shu llaquij shungura yali munanimi , nisha , shinajpi causai illajgunara mana causayachinguichima .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , samana punzhahua Señor mani .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Chimanda ri pasasha , paiguna tandarina huasima shamucami .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Chihui shu chaquirishca maquiyuj tiauca . Jesusta tapunauca , paita culpayachingaj : ¿ Raihuajchu , nisha , paita alichingaj samana punzhai ?

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Maican runa cangunamanda shu borregora charij , paihua borrego shu uctui urmajpi samana punzhai , ¿ manzhu maquira chutachinga llucchingaj ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Shinasha runaga ¿ imasna borregomanda yali valingairi ? Chiraigumanda raihuajmi alira rana samana punzhai .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Shinajpi chi runara nica : Maquira chutai . Maquira chutaca , aliyashca aca chishu maqui cuenta .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Fariseoguna llucshishaga , rimananauca Jesusta huañuchingaj .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Jesús caita yachasha , chi partimanda llucshica . Ashca runa paita catinauca . Tucui ungushcaunara alichica .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Runaunara rimaca : Ama rimanguichichu ñuca maibi ajtas ;

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Diosmanda rimaj Isaías rimashcara pactachingaj , pai casna nijpi :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: Caibimi ñucara sirvij , ñuca ajllashcami , ñuca llaquishcami ; paihuajpi ñuca alma cushiyan . Paihua ahuai ñuca Espiritura churashami , gentilgunama ali taripanara rimangaj .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Mana macanungachu , mana caparingachu . Pihaus ñambiunai paihua shimira mana uyangachu .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Shu taula taula rishca pindujta mana paquingachu , shu cushniu espelma pushcara mana huañuchingachu , pai ali taripana vencichingagama .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Paihua shutüs gentilguna chapanaungami .

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Shinajpi shu supai apishca runara Jesusma pushamunauca , ñausa , mana rimaj aca . Jesús paita alichica , shinajpi ñausa aj ricuca , upa shimi aj rimaca .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Tucui runauna manzharinauca , nisha : ¿ Manzhu cai runa chi Davidpa Churi angairi ?

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Fariseogunaga caita uyasha ninauca : Cai runa supaigunara supai apu Beelzebú shutii ichun .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Jesús paiguna iyaushcara ricsisha , paigunara nica : Tucui llacta paigunapuralla chaupirisha tularingami ; tucui llacta , tucui huasi paigunapuralla chaupirisha , mana shayangachu .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Satanás quiquin Satanasta canzhama ichusha , paulara chaupirishca tucun ; ¿ imarashara durangai paihua mandana ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Ñuca supaigunara canzhama ichujpi Beelzebumanda , ¿ pimanda canguna churiuna supaigunara ichunaun ? Shinajpi paiguna cangunara tarípajguna tucunaungami .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Astaumbas ñuca Diospa Espirituhua supaigunara ichujpi , cierto pacha Dios mandana pacha cangunajma pactamushcami .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: ¿ Ima rashara shu shinzhi runa huasii icungairi pai charishcara shuhuangaj , mana ñaupara dueñora huatasha ? Shina rashaga huasii tiajta shuhuanara ushangami .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: Maican runas mana ñuca partimanda ajpi , ñucahua contrami tucun . Maicans mana ñucahua pallaj talinmi .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunara nini : Tucui ucha tucui piñasha rimashca runaunara perdonashca anga , astaun Espiritura piñasha rimashca mana perdonashcachu anga .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Maicans Runa Churimanda manali shimira rimajpi , perdonashca anga . Astaun maicans Santo Espiritumanda manalira rimajpi , mana perdonashcachu anga , cuna tiempoi , huasha tiempois .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: Ali yura ali muyura cun , manali yuraga manali muyura . Muyura ricusha yurara ricsinaun .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: ¡ Machacuigunamanda mirajguna cuenta ! ¿ Ima rashara alira rimana ushanguichima manaliuna ashallara ? Shungu yalijta undashcamanda shimi riman .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Ali runaga , pai shungu ucui ali charishcamanda alira llucchin , manali runaga manali charishcamanda manalira llucchin .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Maspas cangunara nini , runauna paiguna yanga rimashca shimimanda taripashca anaunga taripana punzhai .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Can rimashca shimiunamandallara ali nishca tucungui , can rimashca shimiunamandallara causáyachishca tucungui .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Shinajpi huaquin yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi cutipasha ninauca : Yachachij , shu can rashca munanaita ricurinara ricusha ninchi .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Manali shujhua tacarisiqui miraiguna munanaita ricurinara mañanaun . Chita mana ricuchishca anga , astaun Diosmanda rimaj Jonasmanda ricurinara ricuchishca anga .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Imasnara Jonás atun aichahua icsai tiauca quinsa punzhara quinsa tutara , shinallarami ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , allpa ucui tiashami quinsa punzhara quinsa tutara .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Nínive nishca llactamanda runauna taripana punzhai atarinaunga cuna horas miraigunahua , paigunara causayachinaungami . Paiguna Jonás camachishcamanda arrepentirinauca . Shinajllaira Jonasmanda yali caibimi tiaun .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Sur nishca quinri partimanda shamuj reina huarmi apu cuna horas miraigunahua ataringami , paigunara causayachingami . Paiga mundu puchucai partimanda shamuca Salomón yachashca shimiunara uyangaj . Shinajllaira Salomonmanda yali caibimi tiaun .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: Imahoras irus supai shu runamanda llucshin , chaquishca partiunai purin , samasha nisha , astaun samanara mana tupanzhu .

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: Shinajpi nin : Ñuca llucshishca huasima tigrasha . Pactamujpi huasira chushajta pichashcara sumacyachishcara tupan .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Shinajpi rin , shu canzhis supaigunara paimanda yali manaliunara apisha apamun , icusha chihui causanaun . Chi runa huasha tucushca causana ñaupa causanamanda yali mana valij tucun . Shinallarami tucunga cuna horas manali miraigunahua .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Jesús runaunahua rirnaushcallai , paihua mama , paihua uquiuna canzhai shamunauca , paihua rimasha nisha .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Shu runa paita nica : Camba mama , camba uquiuna canzhai shayanaun , canhua rimasha ninaun .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Jesús casna rimaj runara cutipasha : ¿ Pitangai ñuca mama , pitangai ñuca uquiuna ? nica .

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Pai yachachishca runaunama maquira ricuchisha : Caimi ñuca mama , ñuca uquiuna , nica .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Tucui runa ñuca ahua pachai tiaj Yaya munaira rau , paimi ñuca uqui , ñuca pañi , ñuca mama , nica .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Chi punzha Jesús huasimanda llucshisha , lamar patai tiarica .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Ashca runauna tandarimunauca . Jesús canoai icusha tiarica . Tucui runauna pulayai tianauca .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Ashca shimiunara Jesús paigunara rimaca yachachingaj cuentanaunahua , casna nisha : Shu tarpuj runa tarpungaj llucshica .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Tarpujpiga , huaquin muyuuna ñambi rayai urmanauca , Pishcuuna shamusha micunauca .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Huaquin muyuunaga rumi pambai urmanauca , mana yapa aupa tiashcai . Uctalla iñamuca , aupa mana ashca tiajpi .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Indi llucshishaga rupachica . Augura mana charishcaraigu chaquirica .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Huaquin muyuuna cashai urmanauca . Casha itayasha , muyura huañuchica .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Astaumbas huaquin muyuuna ali allpai urmanauca , aparinauca , patsaegama , socta chungagama , quinsa chungagama , caran muyumanda mirarisha .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Uyaj rinriyuj uyachu .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús yachachishca runauna shamusha , paita ninauca : ¿ Imarasha yachachingaj cuentanaunahua rimaungui paigunahua ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Cangunama cushcami ahua pacha mandana pacashca shimiunara y achangaj , astaun chigunama mana cushcachu aca .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Charij runama cushca anga , mas charingaj . Randi mana charijmandaga pai charishcahuaras quichushca anga .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Chiraigumanda yachachingaj cuentanaunahua rimashcani , ricusha ama ricunauchu , uyasha ama uyanauchu , ama intindinauchu .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Shinarasha Diosmanda rimaj Isaías rimashca shimi paihuajpi pactarinmi : Rinrihua uyashas mana intindinguichichu , ñahuihua ricushas mana ricsinguichichu .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Cai llacta runauna shungu llashajyashcami . Rinriuna tun tucushca mana ali uyanaun . Ñahuiunara ishcanaushca ama ñahuiunahua ricungaj , ama rinrihua uyangaj , ama shunguhua intindingaj , paiguna ama ñucajma voltiarinauchu , ñuca paigunara alichingaj .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: Astaun cushiunami canguna ñahuiuna , ricunaunmi . Cushiunami canguna rinriuna , uyanaunmi .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , ashca Diosmanda rimajguna , ashca ali runaunas canguna ricushcara ricunara munanaucami , randi mana ricunaucachu ; canguna uyashcaras uyanara munanaucami , randi mana uyanaucachu .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: Uyaichi , nica Jesús , imara nin tarpuj runamanda yachachingaj cuentashca .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Shu runa ahua pacha mandana shimira uyasha , mana intindijpi , manali Supai shamun , paihua shungüi tarpushcara quíchun . Caimi ñambi rayai tarpushca .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Rumi pambaunai tarpushca caimi : shimira uyasha uctalla cushihua chasquica ;

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: paihuajpi augura mana charin , mana duranzhu ; tormendarina tormendachinas shamujpi Diospa shimimanda , shinajpi uctalla nijtasha urman .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Casha tiashcai tarpushca caimi : shimira uyan , astaun cai mundu munai , charij tucungaj umachishcas shimira huañuchinaun . Chiraigu muyura mana cun .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Astaunga , ali allpai tarpushca caimi : shimira uyasha intindin , aparin : patsaj , socta chunga , quinsa chunga , caran muyu aparin .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Cuti shu yachachingaj cuentanara rimaca . Ahua pacha mandana casna ricurijmi : Shu runa ali muyura paihua allpai tarpuca .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Astaun runauna puñurishcai , shu paita chijnij runa shamuca , trigo muyu tarpushcai manali quihua muyura tarpuca , chibuasha rica .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Trigo llucshisha , aparisha , shinallara manali quihuas ricurica .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Shinajpi dueñora sirvijguna shamusha ninauca : Señor , ¿ Manzhu ali muyuunara camba allpai tarpuchicangui ? ¿ Maimandara cai manali quihua iñashca ?

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Paigunara nica : Shu ñucara chijnij caita rashcami . Sirvijgunaga ninauca : ¿ Munanguichu ñucanchi aisai ringaj ?

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Dueñoga : Mana , nica , manali quihuara aisasha , paihua pariju trigora aisanguichima .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Ishquindira saquichi pariju iñangaj pallanagama . Pallana horas , pallajgunara nisha : Ñaupa punda manali quihuara pallaichi , huangüichi , rupachingaj . Randi trigora pallasha , ñuca huacachina huasii huacachichi .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Cuti shu yachachingaj cuentanara paigunara rimaca . Ahua pacha mandana shu mostaza nishca muyu cuenta ricurijmi . Shu runa muyura apisha , tarpuca paihua allpai .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Cierto pacha cai muyu tucui muyumanda yali ichilla muyumi , randi iñasha micuna muyu aparij yuraunamanda yali ) tucun , atun yura tucun . Shinasha pisheuuna shamunaun huasichingaj paihua pallcaunai .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Cuti shu yachachingaj cuentanara paigunara rimaca . Ahua pacha mandana tandara punguichina polvo cuenta ricurijmi , shu huarmi caita apisha , quinsa tasita tupu harina polvoi churaca , tucui punguiringagama .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Cai tucuira Jesús runaunara rimaca yachachingaj cuentanaunahua . Mana casna cuentasha , mana rimacachu ; 35 Diosmanda rimaj shimira pactachingaj , casna nisha : Shimira pascasha yachachingaj cuentanaunahua , mundu callarishca horasmanda pacashcaunara yachachisha .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Shinajpi runaunara cachashca huasha , Jesús huasii icuca . Yachachishca runauna shamusha paita ninauca : Manali quihua muyumanda cuentashcara intindichihuapai .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Ali muyura tarpuj , ñuca mani , Runa Churi nishca .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Allpaga cai pachami . Ali muyuuna ahua pacha mandana churiunami . Manali quihua muyuuna , manali Supai churiunami .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Chijnisha tarpujga Supai Apumi . Pallanaga cuna tiempouna tucurinami . Pallajgunaga angelgunami .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Shinasha , imasnara manali quihuara aisanaun ninai rupachingaj , shinallara tucungami cai tiempouna tucurinai .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Ñucaga , Runa Churi , ñuca angelgunara cachamushami ñuca mandana pachamanda tucui nijtachijgunara , manalira rajgunaras apingaj .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Paigunara atun nina uctui shitanaunga . Chihui atun huacai , quiru mucunas tianga .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Chi horaspi aliuna indi cuenta chiujlla ricurinaunga paiguna Yaya mandana pachai . Uyaj rinriyuj uyachu .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: Maspas , ahua pacha mandana shu allpai pacashca yapa valij curi cuenta ricurijmi . Shu runa tupan , tupasha cuti pacanlla . Caimanda cushiyasha , pai tucui charishcara catun , chi allpara randingaj .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: Shinallara ahua pacha mandana shu catuj runa cuenta ricurijmi , gusto sumaj chuya perla nishca valij rumiunara mascaj .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Shu yapa ali valijta tarisha , tucui pai charishcara catun , chi valij perla nishca rumira randingaj .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: Shinallara ahua pacha mandana shu lica cuenta ricurijmi . Licara lamarbi shitajpi , tucui tono aichahuara apin .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Lica ña undarishca ajpi , pulayama aisanaun . Runauna tiarisha , ali aichahuara ashangai churanaun , manaliunara canzhama shitanaunmi .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Shinallarami tucunga cai tiempouna tucurinai . Angelguna llucshinaunga manaliunara aiiunamanda chicanyachinaunga .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Manaliunara nina uctui shitanaunga . Chihuimi atun huacai , quiru mucunas .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Intindishcanguichichu tucui caigunara ? Cutipanauca : Ari , Señor , nisha .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Paigunara nica : Chiraigumanda tucui yachaira yachachij ahua pacha mandana shimii yachachishca asha , shu yaya cuenta ricurijmi , paihua charishcaunamanda rucuunaras mushujgunaras llucchin .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Jesús cai yachachingaj cuentanaunara rimai pasashca huasha , chi partimanda rica .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Paihua quiquin llactama pactamusha , runaunara yachachica paiguna tandarina huasii . Shinasha runauna manzharinauca , casna nisha : ¿ Maimandachu charin cai runa casna yachanara , cai munanaita ranaunandi ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu cai runa carpintero churi ? ¿ Manzhu paihua mama María , paihua uquiuna Jacobo , José , Simón , Judas ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu tucui paihua paniuna ñucanchihua tianaun ? ¿ Maimandachu charin tucui caigunara ?

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Paimanda turbarinauca . Astaun Jesús paigunara nica : Shu Diosmanda rimaj llaquishcami , astaun paihua quiquin allpais quiquin huasiis mana llaquishcachu . 58 Chi llactai mana ashca munanaita ranaunara rarcachu , runauna mana quirishcaraigu .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Chi punzhaunai , Herodes rey apu Jesuspa shutira rimashcara uyaca .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Paita sirvijgunara nica : Caimi Bautisaj Juan , huañushcaunamanda causarishcami . Caimanda cai ushanauna ricurínaun paihuajpi .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Herodes ñaupa horas Juanda apica , cadenahua huataca , chonda cularbi ishcasha , paihua uqui Felipe huarmi Herodías raigumanda ;

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Juan paita : Chi huarmira mana charínachu angui , nishcamanda .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Herodes paita huañuchisha nica , astaun runaunara manzhaca , runauna Juanda Diosmanda rimajmi iyashcaraigumanda .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Astaunga , Herodes pagarishca punzha pactarijpi , Herodíaspa ushushi runauna chaupi shungüi bailaca , Herodesta cushiy achica .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Chiraigu shimira cuca imara mañashcaras paita cungaj .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Ushushiga , paihua mama ñaupa rimashcasna , Bautisaj Juamba umara pulatoi cuhuai , nica .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Shinajpi rey apu llaquirica . Astaun shimira cushcamanda , mesai tiaj runaunamandas , umara cungaj mandaca .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Juamba cungara pitingaj mandaca chonda cularbi .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Paihua umara pulatoi apamunauca , ushushima cushca aca , ushushi mamama cuca .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Shinajpi pai yachachishca runauna shamunauca , ayara apasha pambanauca . Rinauca Jesusta cuentangaj .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Jesús caita uyasha , chi llactamanda rica , runa illashca partima . Runauna pai shamushcara uyasha , llactaunamanda chaquillahua paita catinauca .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Jesús ilucshisha , ashca runauna taucarimushcara ricuca ; ricusha , paigunamanda llaquirica . Paigunamanda ungushca ajgunara alichica .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Tutayaupi , pai yachachishca runauna paima shamunauca : Cai parti runa illajmi , nisha . Horas ña pasashcami . Runaunara dispiri , ichilla llactaunama ringaj , micunara randingaj .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Mana ministirinzhu paiguna ringaj . Cangunallara caraichi .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Paiguna cutipanauca : Caibi pichca tandallara ishqui aichahuallaras charinchi , nisha .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Jesús nica : Ñucajma apamichi .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Shinajpi runaunara quihuai tiaringaj mandaca . Pichca tandara ishqui aichahuaras apisha , ahuama ricusha , bendidiasha particami . Yachachishca runaunama tandara cuca , paigunaga runaunama caranauca .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Tucui sajsajta micunauca . Puchujgunara tandachinauca , chunga ishqui suru tasa tupura .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Micujguna pichca huaranga tupu cariuna anauca , huarmiunara huahuaunaras mana yupashca .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Chi huashalla , Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara canoai icuchica , paimanda ñaupa chimbama ringaj . Paiga saquirica tandarishcaunara dispiringaj .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Runauna dispirishca huasha , Jesús urcuma sicaca sapallai Diosta mañangaj . Tutayaushcai pai chihui sapalla tiauca .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Canoa chaupi lamarbi tiausha , tsajlaspi api tucuca , huaira ñahuipuramanda shamujpi .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Punzhayanara Jesús paigunajma shamuca , yacu ahuara purisha .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Yachachishca runaunaga Jesusta yacu ahuara puriushcara ricusha turbarinauca . ¡ Ayami ! ninauca . Manzhasha caparinauca .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Chi ratollai Jesús paigunara rimaca : ¡ Cariyaichi , nisha , ñuca maní ! ¡ Ama manzhaichichu !

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro paita : Señor , nica , can ashaga , mandangui ñuca cambajma shamungaj yacu ahuara purisha .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Jesús : Shami , nica . Pedro canoamanda irgusha , yacu ahuara purica Jesusbajma ringaj .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Astaumbas Pedro shinzhi huairara ricusha , manzhaca . Yacui pambaringaj callarica . Caparisha : Señor , quishpichihuapai , nica .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Chi ratollai Jesús maquira chutachisha paita apica , nisha : Ansalla quirij runa , ¿ Imarasha mana quiricangui ?

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Paiguna canoai icushcallahua , huaira saquirica .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Shinajpi canoai tiajguna Jesusma shamusha adoranauca , nisha : Cierto pacha can Diospa Churimi angui .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Yacura chimbashca huasha , Genesaret nishca llactama shamunauca .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Chihui tiaj runauna Jesusta ricsisha , shimira cachanauca tucui rayai tiaj partiunama , paihuajma tucui ungushcaunara pushamunauca .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Paita ruganauca paihua churana pundahuallara llangangaj . Tucui llangajguna aliyanauca .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Huaquin Jerusalenmanda shamuj yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi Jesusma shamunauca .

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: Paita ninauca : ¿ Imarasha can yachachishca runauna rucuuna yachachishcaunara mana casunaun ? Maquira mana maillanaun tandara micungaraushallara .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Jesús cutipasha paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha canguna Dios mandashcara mana casunguichi canguna yachachishcaunara rasha ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Dios mandasha nica : Yayaras mamaras llaquina mangui . Yayara mamara maldiciajpi , runa shu rai huañuchu .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Astaun canguna ninguichi : Maican runa yayara mamara rimasha : Ñuca canda yanapana cullquira Diosta cushcami , nisha ,

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: ña yayara mamara yanapanara mana ministirin . Shina rasha Dios mandashca shimira mana valichishcanguichi canguna yachachishcamanda .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Ishqui shimiyujguna , Diosmanda rimaj Isaías cangunamanda alirami rimaca , casna nisha :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Cai runauna shimi carahua ñucara ahuayachinaun , astaun paiguna shungu ñucamanda carui tiaun .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Yangamanda ñucara ahuayachinaun , ali yachanauna cuenta runauna mandashcaunara yachachisha .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Taucariai runaunara paihuajma cayausha , Jesús : Uyaichi , nica , intindichi .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Mana shimii icuj runara irusyachinzhu , astaun shimi ucumanda llucshij caimi irusyachin .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna shamusha , paita ninauca : ¿ Yachanguichu imasna fariseoguna pinarinauca cai shimira uyasha ?

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Jesusga cutipaca : Tucui yura , mana ñuca ahua pacha Yaya tarpushca ajpi , pilashcami anga .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Saquichilla ^ paigunara , nica , ñausauna asha ñausaunara pushanaun . Ñausa runaga shu ñausara pushasha , ishquindi uctui urmanaunga .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Pedro cutipasha paita nica : Yachachihuai ñucanchira cai yachachingaj cuentanara .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Jesús nica : ¿ Cangunas charajchu mana intindinguichi ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu intindinguichi imasna tucui imaras shimii icusha icsama pasan , chimanda ismana huasii ichushcami ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Astaun shimimanda llucshijga shungu ucumanda llucshin . Caiga runara irusyachin .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Shungumanda llucshinaun : manali iyaiguna , runara huañuchinauna , shujhua tacarinauna , uchalinauna , shuhuanauna , llulla shimiuna , Diosta camisha rimanauna .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Caigunami runara irusyachinaun . Astaun maquira mana maillasha micusha , caiga runara mana irusyachinzhu .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Jesús chi llactamanda llucshisha , Tiro Sidón partiunama rica .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Chihui shu Canaan huarmi , chi partimanda llucshij , caparisha Jesusta nica : Señor , Davidpa Churi , llaquihuapai . Ñuca ushushira supai ashcarami tormendachin .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Astaun Jesús paita mana imaras cutipacachu . Shinajpi pai yachachishca runauna llutarisha ruganauca : Cachai cai huarmira , ninauca , ñucanchi huashai yapa caparisha shamun .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Pai cutipasha nica : Israel aillumanda borregouna cuenta chingarishcaunamalla cachashcami ani .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Shinajpi huarmi Jesuspa ñaupajma shamusha , tuama urmasha , nica ; Señor , yanapahuapai ñucara .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Mana valinzhu churiuna tandara ichilla allcuunama shitangaj .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Huarmiga : Ari , Señor , nica , shinajllaira ichilla allcuuna mesamanda urmaj puchuunara micunaun .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipaca : Huarmi , nisha , shinzhirami quiriungui . Can munashcasna rashca tucuchu . Chi horasmanda ushushi aliyashca aca .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Chimanda pasasha , Jesús Galilea lamar rayama shamuca . Urcuma sicasha chihui tiarica .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Ashca runauna paihuajma shamunauca , paigunahua anga changaunara , ñausaunara , shimi upaunara , pullu maquiunara , ashca shu ungushcaunaras pushamunauca .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Shinasha , taucariai runauna manzharinauca , shimi upauna rimashcara , pullu maquiunara alichishcaxa , anga changauna purishcara , ñausauna ricushcaras ricusha . Israelba Diosta alabanauca .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara cayasha nica : Runaunamanda llaquirini . Ña quinsa punzha ñucahua tianaushca . Micuna illan . Paigunara mana micujta cachañara mana munanichu , ama yarcaihua huañunauchu ñambii .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna paita ninauca : ¿ Maimanda cai tupu tandaunara charishun casna runa illashca partii , cai tucui runaunara sajsajta carangaj ?

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Masna tandara charinguichi ? Canzhista , ninauca , ansalla aichahuaunandi .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Runaunara allpai tiaringaj mandaca .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Chi canzhis tandara aichahuaras apisha , Diosta agrasicami , tandara particami . Yachachishca runaunama cuca , paigunas runaunama caranauca .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Tucui sajsajta micunauca . Puchujgunara canzhis atun tasa undajta tandachinauca .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Micujguna chuscu huaranga cariuna anauca , huarmiras huahuaras mana yupashca anauca .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Shinajpi runaunara dispirishca huasha , Jesús canoai icusha , Magdala nishca partima shamuca .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Fariseoguna saduceogunandi shamunauca Jesusta tentangaj . Ricuchihuai , ninauca , shu ahua pachamanda munanaita ricurinara .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Jesusga cutipasha nica : Tutayaupi ninguichi : Cielo pucayaun , ali punzha tucungami .

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Tutamandaga : Tamiangami raun , ninguichi , puyu pucayajpi . ¡ Ishqui shimiyujguna ! Cieloi ricurishcara ricsinguichi , astaun cai tiempoi tucushcaunara mana ricsinguichichu .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Manali shujhua tacarisiqui miraiguna , munaita ricurinara ricuchihuai , ninaun ; shinajllaira ricurinara mana ricuchishcachu anga . Diosmanda rimaj Jonasmanda ricurinallara ricuchishca anga . Paigunara saquisha rica .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Lamar chimba partima pai yachachishca runauna pactai rishaga , tandara apamunara cungarinaushca aca .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cuiraichi , fariseoguna saduceoguna tandara rana punguichina polvomanda .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Yachachishca runaunaga paigunapura iyasha ninauca : Ñucanchi tandara mana apamushcamandami casna rimaun .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Jesús caita intindiusha , paigunara nica : Ansalla quirij runauna , ¿ imarasha canguna shungüi iyaunguichi , tandara mana charinchichu ? nisha .

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu intindinguichi ? ¿ Manzhu iyaringuichi pichca tandahuara , pichca huarangapura micushcara , imasna suru tasara puchujta tandachicanguichi ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu iyaringuichi chi canzhis tandahuara , chuscu huaranga runapura micushcara ? ¿ Shinajpi , masna atun tasara puchujta tandachicanguichi ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: ¿ Imarashara mana intindihuacanguichi ñuca rimashcara ? Mana tandamandachu aca ñuca cangunara rimashca : fariseoguna saduceoguna tandara rana punguichina polvomanda cuiraichi , nicani .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Shinajpi intindinauca , pai mana rimacachu micuna tandara rana polvomanda cuiranara , astaun fariseoguna saduceoguna yachachishca shimiunamanda cuiranara .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Jesús Filipo Cesárea nishca partima shamusha , pai yachachishca runaunara tapuca : Runauna ¿ pimi nisha ninaundai Runa Churira ?

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Paiguna cutipanauca : Huaquinguna Bautisaj Juanmi ninaun , shujgunaga Elíasmi , chishujguna Jeremíasmi , shu Diosmanda rimaj chari , ninaun .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cangunaga , ¿ pimi nishara iyanguichi ñucara ?

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Simón Pedro cutipasha : Can Cristomi angui , causaj Diospa Churi , nica .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita cutipasha nica : Cushimi angui can , Jonaspa churi Simón . Mana aichachu , mana yahuarchu caita canda ricuchishca , astaun ñuca ahua pachai tiaj Yaya , paimi canda ricuchica .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Ñucas canda nini : Can Pedro nishca angui . Cai peñas ahuai ñuca iglesiara sicachishami . Ucu pacha ushaiguna paita mana vencinaungachu .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Ahua pacha mandana llaveunara cuenta canda ctishami . Tucui imaras cai pachai can huatajpi , ahua pachais huatashca anga . Tucui imaras cai pachai can pascajpi , ahua pachais pascashca anga .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara mandaca : Pitas ama cuentaichichu ñuca Jesús Cristomi ani nishcara .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Chi horasmanda Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara cuentangaj callarica : Ministirinmi , nisha , ñuca Jerusalenma ringaj . Chihui rucuuna , sacerdote atun apuuna , yachaira yachachijgunas ñucara ashcara tormendachinaunga , ñucara huañuchinaunga ; quinsa punzhaiga causarisha .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro paita shujma pushasha , paita camachingaj callarica : Señor , nisha , canllarara llaquipai , ama canhua casna tucuchu .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Jesusga voltiarisha Pedrora nica : ¡ Ñuca ñaupajmanda anzhuri , Satanás ! Ñucara nijtachisha iyaungui , Diospajgunara mana ricusha , astaumbas runajgunallara ricungui .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Pihuas ñucallara catisha nisha , Mana imaschu ani , nichu , paihua cruzta aparisha , ñucara catimuchu .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Maicans paihua causaira quishpichisha nisha , causaira pirdingami . Maicambas paihua causaira pirdisha ñucaraigumanda , causaira taringami .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: ¿ Imajta valingai runara entero mundura ganashas , paihua almara pirdijpi ? ¿ Ima paganarara cungai shu runa paihua almamanda ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ñuca Yaya sumajhua paihua angelgunahua pariju shamushami . Chi horasllaira caran dueñora pagashami , caran dueño rashca tupura .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , huaquinguna caibi tiajguna huañunara mana gustanaungachu Runa Churira paihua mandana pachai shamujta ricunagama .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Socta punzha huasha , Jesús Pedrora , Santiagora , paihua uqui Juandas pushaca shu atun urcu pundama .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Chihui , paiguna ñaupajpi , Jesús shu tono ricurij tucuca . Paihua ñahui indisna chiujlla ricurica . Paihua churana rasu cuenta yurajlla tucuca .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Paigunajma ricurimunauca Moisés Elíaspas , Jesushua rimasha .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro Jesusta : Señor , nica , alirami ñucanchi caibi tiangaj . Can munajpi , caibi quinsa huasihuara rashun : cambajta shuj , Moisespajta shuj , Elíaspajtas shuj .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Pai rimaushcallai , shu chiujlla puyu paigunara quillpaca . Puyu ucumanda shu shimi uyarica : Caimi ñuca llaquishca Churi , paihuajpimi cushi ani , paita uyaichi , nisha .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Yachachishca runauna caita uyasha tuama urmanauca , ashcara manzharinauca .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús llutarimusha , paigunara llangaca , Atarichi , nisha , ama manzhaichichu .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Paiguna muyujta ricusha , pitas mana ricunaucachu , Jesusllara ricunauca .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Urcumanda irgumusha , Jesús paigunara mandaca : Pitas ama rimaichichu cai ricushcara ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , huañushcaunamanda causarishca huashagama , nisha .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna paita tapunauca : ¿ Imarasha ninaun yachaira yachachijguna , Elias ñaupa punda shamuna ministirin ? nisha .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Jesús cutipasha , paigunara nica : Cierto pacha Elias ñaupa punda shamungami tucuira alichingaj .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Astaun cangunara nini , ña shamucami Elias . Paitaga mana ricsinaucachu , astaumbas runauna paiguna munaira paihua ranaucami . Shinallarami paiguna ñucara , Runa Churi nishcara , tormendachihuanaunga .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna Jesús Bautisaj Juanmanda paigunama rimashca ajta intindinauca .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Runauna montonma pactamujpi , Jesuspajma shu runa shamusha , paihua ñaupajpi cungurica , paita nica :

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: Señor , llaquipai ñuca churihuara , ura paita apin , ashcara tormendarin . Ashca cuti ninai urman , ashca cuti yacuis .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Paita pushamucani can yachachishca runaunajma , randi paita alichinara mana ushanaucachu .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : ¡ Mana pacha , mana quirij istu shungumanda miraiguna ! ¿ Imahorasgamara cangunahua tiaushairi ? ¿ Imahorasgamara cangunara ahuantashairi ? Huahuara caima pushamichi .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Jesús supaira piñaca . Supaiga huahuamanda llucshica . Huahua chi horasmanda pacha aliyashca aca .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Yachachishca runauna Jesusma sapallai shamusha , paita ninauca : ¿ Imaraigu mana ushacanchi chi supaira ichungaj ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Canguna ansalla quirishcamandami , nica . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , canguna quirina tupu shu ichilla tarpuna muyu tupu ajpi , canguna cai urcura : Caimanda chima pasai , ninguima ; pasanmami aca . Imas cangunaj rai huajllami anga .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Cai samiuna Diosta mañajllai sasijllai llucshinaun .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Paiguna Galilea partii tiaushcai , Jesús paigunara nica : Runa Churi runauna maquii entregashcami anga .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Paita huañuchinaungami , astaumbas quinsa punzha huasha causarimungami . Paiguna llaquirinauca ashcara .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Paiguna Capernaum llactama pactamujpi , Pedrojma chi ishqui cullquira mañajguna shamunauca , paita ninauca : ¿ Cangunara Yachachij cai ishqui cullquira manzhu pagangái ?

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Paiga , Ari , nica . Huasii icujpi , Jesús ñaupa punda paita rimaca , nisha : ¿ Imasnara iyangui , Simón ? Cai pacha rey apuuna , ¿ pimandara impuesto nishca cullquira apinaun ? ¿ Churiunamandachu , carumanda shamujgunamandachu apinaun ?

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Pedroga paita : Carumandaunamandami , nisha cutipaca . Jesús paita : Shinajpi , churiuna mana paganachu , nica .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Shinajllaira , paigunara ama piñachingaj , ri lamarma . Ansílui . Ñaupa apirij aichahuara api , paihua shimira pascai , shimi ucui ishquimanda pagana cullquira tupanguimi . Cullquira api , cuiri , ñucamandas canmandas .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Chi horas , Jesús yachachishca runauna paihuajma shamunauca , ¿ Pitai mas atun , ahua pacha mandanai ? ninauca .

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Jesusga shu ichilla huahuara cayasha , Shami , nisha , paita paiguna chaupi shungüi shayachica .

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , nica , canguna mana turcarisha , huahuaunasna tucusha , ahua pacha mandanai mana icunguichichu .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Shinajpi , pi runas cai huahuasna mansoyasha , pai yali atunmi ahua pacha mandanai .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Pis shu casna huahuara ñuca shutü chasquisha , ñucarami chasquin .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Pis shu cai ñucajpi quirij ichilla huahuaunara uchai urmachijpi , astaun alimi anmaca shu atun cutana rumira paihua cungai huatasha , paita lamarbi pambachingaj .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: ¡ Ayailla mundu urmachishcaunamanda ! Urmachinauna shamungaj ministirin . Randi , ¡ ayailla urmachij runa !

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Chiraigumanda camba maqui , camba chaqui canda urmachijpi , piti , ichui canmanda . Yali valin causaibi pullu maqui , pullu chaqui icungaj , astaun mana valin ishqui maquiyuj , ishqui chaquiyuj huiñaigama sindij ninai shitai tucungaj .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Shinallara camba ñahui canda urmachijpi , llucchi , ichui canmanda , yali valin causaibi icungaj shu ñahuillahua , astaun mana valin ishqui ñahuihua ucu pacha ninai shitai tucungaj .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ricuichi ama pishü churaichichu shuj cai ichilla huahuaunamanda . Cangunara nini , paiguna ahua pachai tiaj ángelguna tucui horas ñuca ahua pachai tiaj Yaya ñahuira ricunaun .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Runa Churiga chingarishcara quishpichingaj shamuca .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: ¿ Imara iyanguichi ? Shu runa patsaj borregora charisha , shuj pirdirijpi , ¿ manzhu chishu iscun chunga iscunda saquisha , urcuma ringa chingarishcara mascangaj ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Borregora tarisha , cierto pacha cangunara nini , mas cushiyanga chi borregoraigumanda , chishu iscun chunga iscun mana chingarishcaunamanda yali .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Shinami , camba ahua pachai tiaj Yaya mana munanzhu shujllas cai ichilla huahuaunamanda pirdiringaj .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: Shinasha , camba uqui canhua ucharajpi , ri , paita rimangui sapalla ashcai . Pai canda uyajpiga , camba uquira ganashcanguimi .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Astaun pai canda mana uyajpiga , canhua pariju shujta ishquiras pushai , ishqui quinsa ricujguna shimimanda tucui rimashca shimi uyaringaj .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Pai cangunara mana uyasha nijpiga , iglesiara cuentai . Pai iglesiara mana uyajpiga , paita ña shu yanga mana valij runa cuenta iyashca achu .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , tucui imaras canguna cai pachai huatajpi , ahua pachais huatashca anga ; tucui imaras cai pachai pascajpis , ahua pachais pascashca anga .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Cutillara cangunara nini , cangunamanda ishquindi cai pachai shinallara iyajpi , pariju imaras Diosta mañangaj , ñuca ahua pachai tiaj Yaya chita rangami .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Maibís ishquipura asha , quinsapura ashas , ñuca shutii tandarimujpi , chihui tiasha ñuca paiguna chaupi shungüi .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Shinajpi Pedro llutarímusha nica : Señor , ¿ masna cuti ñuca uquira perdonashachu pai ñucahua ucharashcara ? ¿ Canzhis cutigama ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Mana ninichu canzhis cutigamalla , astaun canzhis chunga cuti canzhis cutigama .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Chiraigumanda , ahua pacha mandana shu rey apu cuenta tucun , paita dibishcaunara alichisha nica paita sirvijgunahua .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Dibira alichingaj callarijpi , shu runa shamuca chunga huaranga cullquira dibij .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Cai runaraga , pagangaj mana ushajpí , paihua patrón paita catungaj mandaca , huarmindi churiunandi charishcaunandi , pai dibishcara pagangaj .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Shinajpi chi sirvij runa , patromba ñaupajpi tuama urmasha , rugasha nica : Señor , chapahuapai ansallara , tucuira canda pagashami .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Chi sirvijpa patrón , paita llaquisha , paita cacharica , tucuira paita perdonacami .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Chi sirvij runa llucshishaga , shu paihua pariju sirvij runara tupaca , paita shu patsaj sucreshuara dibica . Paita shinzhira apica , cungara quihuichisha nisha raulla , Pagahuai , nica , dibishcara .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Shinajpi chi paihua pariju sirvij , paihua chaquii tuama urmasha , rugasha nica : Chapahuapai ansallara , tucuira canda pagashami .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Paiga mana munacachu , astaun runara chonda cularbi shitaca dibishcara pagangagama .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Chishu paihua pariju sirvijguna shina tucushcara ricusha , ashcara llaquirisha , patrombajma cuentaj rinauca tucui tucushcara cuentangaj .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Shinajpi patrón runara cayasha nica : Manali sirvij , tucui can dibishcara perdonacani , can ñucara rugashcaraigu .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu can shinallara canhua pariju sirvij runara llaquina macangui imasnara ñuca canda llaquicani ?

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Shinajpi patrón piñarisha , chi runara entregaca livachijgunama , tucui pai dibishcara pagangagama .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Shinallarami ranga ñuca ahua pachai tiaj Yaya cangunahua , canguna mana tucui shunguhua canguna uquiunara paiguna manali rashcaunara perdonajpi .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Jesús cai shimiunara tucuchishca huasha anzhuricami Galilea partimanda ; Judea partima rica , Jordan yacu chimbama .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Ashca runauna paita catimunauca , tucuira alichicami .
