text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Shinajpi fariseoguna paihuajma shamusha , paita tentanauca , nisha : ¿ Raihuajchu shu cari imaraigumandas paihua huarmira ichungaj ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : ¿ Manzhu ricushcanguichi imasna runaunara ñaupa punda Rau paigunara cariras huarmiras rashcami .

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Paigunara nisha : Shu cari paihua yayara mamaras saquingami , paihua huarmihua llutaringami , ishquindi shu aichalla tucunaungami ?

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Shinajpi ña mana ishquichu tucunaun astaun shu aichalla . Chimanda , Dios llutachishcara runa ama llushpichichu .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Paita ninauca : Shinasha , ¿ Imaraigu Moisés mandaca maqui llushpichina quillcara cungaj , huarmira ichungaj ?

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Jesús nica : Canguna shungu shinzhi ashcaraigu Moisés lugarda cuca canguna huarmiunara ichungaj , astaun callari horaspi mana shinachu aca .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Maspas cangunara nini , maican runa paihua huarmira ichusha , mana shujhua tacarishca raigumanda ajpi , shu huarmihua casarasha , shujhua tacarij runa tucun , shinallara ichushca huarmihua casaraj runa shujhua tacarij tucun .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Yachachishca runauna Jesusta ninauca : Shu cari paihua huarmihua shina ajpi , mana valinzhu casarangaj .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Mana tucui runa cai shimira chasquinara ushan , astaun cushcaunamalla .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Eunucos nishca mana casarana ushaj runauna tianaun , huaquinguna casnami pagarinaushca mama icsamanda pacha , shujguna casnami anaun runa rashcamanda , shujgunaga casnami tucunaun paiguna quiquin munaimandallara , ahua pacha mandanaraigumanda . Caita chasquinara ushaj runa chasquichu .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Shinajpi paihuajma pushamunauca ichilla huahuaunara , Jesús paihua maquira paiguna ahuai churangaj , Diosta manangajpas . Yachachishca runaunaga paigunara piñanauca . 14 Jesusga : Huahuaunara lugarda cuichi ñucama shamungaj , nica , ama arcaichichu paigunara . Casna huahuaunajmi ahua pacha mandana .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Paihua maquiunara huahuauna ahuai churashca huasha , ricami chi llactamanda .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Shinajpi shu runa Jesusma shamuca , paita nica : Ali Yachachij , ¿ Ima alirara rashairi huiñai causaira charingaj ?

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Jesús paita nica : ¿ Ima rasha ñucara ali nisha rimahuangui ? Pihuas mana alichu , Diosllami ali . Randi , causaima icusha nijpi , mandamientos nishca camachishca shimiunara huacachi .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Runaga paita : ¿ Maicangunaraga ? nica . Jesús cutipaca : Ama huañuchichu , ama shujhua tacarichu , ama shuhuaichu , ama llullaichu shujgunamanda .

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Yayaras mamaras llaquina mangui , camba rayai tiaj runara can quiquindasna llaquina mangui .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Malta runa paita nica : Cai tucuira rashcani huahuamanda pacha . ¿ Imara chara pishin ?

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Can cierto ali sumaj tucusha nijpi , ri , charishcara catui , tsuntsuunama cuyai , maspas valijgunara ahua pachai charinguimi . Shami , catihuai ñucara .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Maltaga cai shimira uyasha , llaquirisha rica , ashca charij asha .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , tormendosmi shu charij runa ahua pacha mandanai icungaj .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Cutillara cangunara nini : Shu camello nishca tormendariushas shu tupulli uctura pasangallami , randi shu charijga astaun yali tormendoshua Dios mandana pachama icungami .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Pai yachachishca runauna caita uyasha , ashcara manzharinauca , casna nisha : ¿ Pita quishpinara ushangairi ?

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Jesús paigunara ricusha nica : Runaunahua mana raihuajchu yachin , astaun Dioshua tucui raihuajllami .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Shinajpi Pedro paita nica : Ñucanchiga tucuira saquisha , canda catimushcanchi , ¿ imarara charishun ñucanchi ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini ; tucuira alichina punzhai , ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ñuca sumaj tiarinai tiarishca horas , canguna ñucara catimujguna shinallara chunga ishqui rey apu tiarinai tiarisha , Israel chunga ishqui aillura taripanguichimi .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Maicambas huasiunara , uquiunara , paniunara , yayara , mamara , huarmira , churiunara , allpaunara saquishca ajpi ñuca shutimanda , patsaj cuti mas apingami , maspas huiñai causaira charingami .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Randi , ashca ñaupa punda ajguna puchucaiguna tucunaungami , ashca puchucaiguna ñaupajgunami tucunaunga .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: Ahua pacha mandana shu runa cuentami . Tutamandara llucshica tarabajgunara apingaj , paihua uvillas chagrai tarabangaj .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Tarabajgunahua shimira cushca ajpi chunga sucresta pagangaj caran punzha , runaunara uvillas chagrama cachaca .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Las nueve tupui llucshisha , shujguna lugar ajgunara ricuca pulasai .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Paigunara nica : Richi cangunas ñuca uvillas chagrama , cangunara ali tupura pagashami . Runauna rinauca .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Cuti llucshica doce chaupi punzhai , shinallara las tres tupuis .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Cutillara las cinco tupui llucshica . Chara huaquinguna lugar ajgunara tupaca . Paigunara nica : ¿ Imaraigu caibi entero punzha lugar tiaunguichi ?

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Paita ninauca : Pihuas mana tarabachishcaraigu , nisha . Runa paigunara : Richi cangunas chagrama , nica . Ali tupura pagashca anguichimi .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Tutayaupi , las seis tucujpi , uvillas chagra dueño paihua mayordomora nica : Tarabajgunara cayai , paigunara shu punzha tarabashcara pagai , puchucai shamujgunahua callarijpi , ñaupa shamujgunagama .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Shinajpi las cinco tupui shamujguna pactamujpi , caran dueño paihua chunga sucresta apica .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Ñaupa shamujguna pactamujpi , mas cullquira apishunmi nisha iyanauca , astaun paigunas shinallara caran dueño chunga sucresta apinauca .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Chillara apishaga , dueñora piñanauca .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Ninauca : Cai puchucai horas shamujguna shu horasllara tarabanauca , shinajllaira ñucanchira pagashcasna pagashcangui . Ñucanchiga entero punzha rupaibi tarabashcanchi .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Dueñoga paigunamanda shujta cutipasha nica : Amigo , ñuca canda manalira mana raunichu , ¿ manzhu shimira cucani canda chunga sucresta pagangaj ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Canga can ganashcara apisha ri . Ñuca cai huasha shamujta canda cushcasna cusha nini .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu raihuaj ñuca munashcara ñucajhua ? ¿ Canga chijnihuanguichu ñuca shungu ali ashcaraigu ?

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Shinami , ñaupa ajguna puchucaiguna tucunaungami , puchucaiguna ñaupa ajgunami tucunaunga . Ashcami cayashcauna , randi ansallami ajliashcauna anga .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Jesús Jerusalenma sicasha , ñambii pai chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunara sapallama pushasha , paigunara nica :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: Ña Jerusalenma sicanchi . Ñucara , Runa Churi nishcara , entregahuanaunga sacerdote apuunama yachaira yachachijgunamas . Huañuchihuanaungami .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Ñucara gentilgunama entreganaungami burlangaj , azutingaj , chacatangaj . Astaumbas quinsa punzhai causarishami .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Shinajpi Zebedeo churiuna mama llutarimuca , churiunandi , Jesuspa ñaupajpi tuama urmasha paita imaras mañangaj .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Jesús paita : ¿ Imara ningui ? nisha tapuca . Paiga : Mandangui , nica , can mandana pachai cai ñuca ishqui churiuna canhua tiarinauchu , shuj ali partima shujga lluqui maqui partima ,

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipasha nica : Canguna mañashcara mana yachanguichichu . ¿ Ushanguichichu ñucara cushca vasora cuenta upingaj ? ¿ Ushanguichichu ñucara cushca bautisanahua cuenta bautisaringaj ? Paiguna : Ushanchimi , ninauca .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Cierto pacha , nica , canguna ñuca vasora cuenta upinguichimi , ñuca bautisanahua cuenta bautisaringuichimi , randi ñuca ali partima ñuca lluqui partima tiarinara mana ñuca cunachu , astaun ñuca Yaya cunga pai ajllashcaunama .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Chishu chungauna caita uyasha piñarinauca chi ishquiunahua .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara cayasha nica : Yachanguichi imasna llactauna gobernadorguna chi llactaunara mandanaun , atunguna shinallara mandanaun .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Cangunahua mana shina tucungachu , astaun maicans atun tucusha nisha cangunara sirvij tucunga .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Maicans cangunamanda ñaupa aj tucusha nisha , cangunara sirvij tucungami .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Imasna ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , mana shamucanichu sirvi tucungaj , astaumbas sirvingaj shamucani , shinallara ñuca causaira cungaj ashcaunara randingaj .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Paiguna Jericó llactamanda llucshijpi , ashca runauna catimunauca .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ishqui ñausa runauna , nambí rayai tiajguna , Jesús pasangaraushcara uyasha , caparisha ninauca : ¡ Señor , Davidpa Churi , llaquihuapai ñucanchira !

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Runaunaga paigunara piñanauca , chunlla tucungaj nisha . Astaun paiguna mas caparinauca : ¡ Señor , nisha , Davidpa Churi , llaquihuapai !

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Jesusga shayarisha , paigunara cayasha nica : ¿ Imara raí ninguichira cangunahua ?

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Paiguna : Señor , ñahuira pascahuapai , ninauca .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Shinajpi , Jesús llaquirisha , ñahuira llangaca ; chi ratollaira ricunauca , paita catimunauca .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Paiguna ña Jerusalenda mayanllayausha , Betfagé nishca ichilla llactama pactamunauca , Olivos nishca urcu rayai , Jesús shu ishqui pai yachachishca runaunara cachaca .

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: Paigunara nica : Richi chimbai tiaj ichilla llactama . Chihui shu burro huatashcara tupanguichimi , paihua huahuandi . Pascaichi burrora , ishquindira pushamichi .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Pihuas cangunara rimajpi , Señor ministinmi , ninguichi ; shina nijpi uctalla cachamungami .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Cai tucui tucuca Diosmanda rimaj rimashcara pactachingaj , pai casna nishca :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: Sion llactara rimaichi , Riqui , nisha , camba Rey Apu cambajma shamun , manso , burroi tiarisha , malta burro ahuai , shu cargara astaj burro huahuai .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Yachachishca runauna rinauca , Jesús mandashcasna ranauca .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Burrora paihua huahuandi pushamunauca , paiguna llachapaunara burro ahuai churanauca . Jesús chi ahuai tiarica .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ashca taucarimuj runauna paiguna llachapaunara mandanauca ñambii . Shujguna pangaunara yuraunamanda pitinauca , chigunaras ñambii mandanauca .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ñaupara rijguna huasha shamujgunas caparinauca : ¡ Alabashca angui , Davidpa Churi ! ¡ Bendiciashcami Señorba shutii shamujta ! ¡ Alabashca angui ahua pachais !

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Jesús Jerusalembi icujpi , entero llacta turbarica , Caiga , ¿ pitangai ? nisha .

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Runauna ninauca : Caimi Diosmanda rimaj Jesús , Galileai tiaj Nazaretmanda .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Jesús Diospa templo huasii icuca . Tucui temploi tiaj catujgunara randijgunaras canzhama ichuca , cullquira turcajguna mesaunara voltiachica , shinallara urpira catujguna tiarinara voltiachica .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Paigunara nica : Quillcashcami tian : Ñuca huasi Diosta mañana huasi nishcami anga . Astaun cangunaga shuhuajguna uctura rashcanguichi .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Paihuajma , templo huasima , ñausauna anga changaunas shamunaucami . Jesús paigunara alichica .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Astaumbas sacerdote apuuna yachaira yachachijgunas Jesús munanaita rashcaunara ricusha , huahuauna templo huasii caparishcara uyashas , ¡ Alabashca angui , Davidpa Churi ! nisha , piñarinauca .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Paiguna Jesusta ninauca : ¿ Uyanguichu paiguna nishcara ? Jesús paigunara : Ari , nica , ¿ manzhu imahoraspas ricushcanguichi : Huahuauna shimimanda , chuchujguna shimimandas alabanara alichishcangui ?

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Jesús paigunara saquisha , llactamanda llucshica , Betania llactama risha , chihui tiauca .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Cayandi tutamanda , Jesús llactama tigrasha yarcachica .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Shu higo yurara ñambi rayai ricusha , yurama shamuca . Randi mana imaras tupacachu yurai , pangayujlla aca . Jesús yurara nica : Imahoraspas ama aparichu muyura . Chi ratollai higo yura chaquirica .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Yachachishca runauna chita ricusha , manzharisha ninauca : ¿ Ima rashara uctalla chaquirica higo yura ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , canguna quirisha , mana manzhashas , mana higo yurahua rashcasnallara ranguichima , astaun cai urcura : Anzhuri , lamarbi urmairi , nijpi , shina tucunmami .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Imaras Diosta rugasha mañajpi , quirisha chasqumguichimi .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Jesús templo huasima shamujpiga , sacerdote apuuna rucuunandi paihuajma shamunauca pai yachachiushca ratollai . Paita ninauca : ¿ Pi mandajpira cai rashcaunara rangui ? ¿ Pita canda casna rangaj mandaca ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipasha nica : Ñuca shinallara shu tapunara charini . Canguna ñucara cutipajpi , ñucas shinallara cangunara cuentashami pi mandajpira cai ranaunara rauni .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Juamba bautisanaga , ¿ maimandara acai ? ¿ Ahua pachamandachu aca , runaunamandachu aca ? Shinajpi paigunapura rimananauca , casna nisha : Ñucanchi ahua pachamandami aca nijpiga , paimi ñinga : ¿ Imarasha mana quiricanguichi ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Ñucanchi , runaunamandami nijpiga runaunara manzhanchi , tucui runauna , Juan Diosmanda rimajmi ninaun .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jesusta cutipasha ninauca : Mana yachanchichu . Jesusga paigunara : Ñucas cangunara mana nishachu pi mandajpira ñuca cai rashcaunara rauni .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Shinajllaira , ¿ imasnara iyanguichi ? Shu runa ishqui churiyuj aca . Yaya paihua ñaupa punda churima shamusha , paita nica : Churi , cuna punzha ri ñuca uvillas chagrai tarabangaj .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Churiga : Mana munanichu , nica . Randi huasha arrepentirisha ricami .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Yaya chishu churima shamusha , paita shinallara rimaca . Churi cutipasha paita nica : Ariu , señor , riunimi . Randi , mana ricachu .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Cai ishqui churimanda , ¿ maicanda paihua yaya munashcara pactachica ? Cutipanauca , Ñaupa aj churi . Jesús paigunara nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cullquira tandachij runauna shujhua tacarij huarmiunas cangunamanda ñaupara rinaun Dios mandana pachama .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Cangunajma shamuca Juan , ali causanara yachachisha , paitaga mana quiricanguichi , astaumbas cullquira tandachij runauna shujhua tacarij huarmiunandi paita quirinaucami . Cangunaga caita ricusha , mana huasha arrepentiricanguichi paita quiringaj .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Shu yachachingaj cuentanara uyaichi . Shu runa tiauca , uvillas chagrara tarpuca . Quinzhaca . Uvillasta chahuanara allaca . Huasira sicachica . Shu tarabajgunara pagara mañasha , chagrara mañachica . Caru llactama rica .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Muyura pallana horas pactarijpi , sirvijgunara cachaca tarabajgunama , muyura apingaj .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Tarabajgunaga sirvijgunara apisha , shujta sajmanauca , shujtaga huañuchinauca , shujtaga rumihua shitanauca .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Cutillara sirvijgunara cachaca , ñaupa cachashcamanda yalira . Shinallara ranauca chigunaras .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Puchucaibi , paihua churira cachaca , Ñuca churira manzhanaunga chari , nisha .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Tarabajgunaga churira ricusha , paigunapura rimananauca : Caimi chagrara apiña churi . Acuichi , paita huañuchishunchi , paihua allpara apishunchi .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Paita apisha , chagra canzhama ichunauca , huañuchinauca .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Uvillas chagra dueño shamushaga , ¿ Imara rangai chi tarabajgunahua ?

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Paita ninauca : Manali rajgunara mana ansas llaquisha tucuchingami . Paihua uvillas chagrara shu tarabajgunama pagara mañasha mañachingami , pallana horaspi aparishcara cujgunama .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Jesús paigunara : ¿ Imahoraspas manzhu ricushcanguichi , nica , Quillcaunai : Sicachijguna mana munashca rumi ña istandi siqui rumi tucushcami . Caiga Señor rashcami , ñucanchi ñahuii manzhanaitami ricurin ?

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunara nini , Dios mandana pacha cangunamanda quichushca anga , randi cushcami anga pai aparishcara aparíj runaunama .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Maicans cai rumi ahuai urmasha , paquirishca anga ; maican ahuais cai rumi urmasha , cuta cuta urmangami .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna fariseogunandi Jesús yachachingaj cuentanaunara uyasha , ñucanchimanda uyachishami riman nisha intindinauca .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Randi , paita apishun nishallara , runaunara manzhanauca , paiguna Jesusta Diosmanda rimajmi , iyasha .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipasha , cuti yachachingaj cuentanahua rimaca , nisha :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: Ahua pacha mandana shu rey apu cuentami ricurin , paihua churira istasha boraca .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Paita sirvijgunara cachaca borama convirashcaunara cayangaj . Convirashcaunaga mana munanauca shamungaj .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Shu sirvijgunara cuti cachaca : Convirashcaunara rimaichi , micuna ña puruntushcami , nisha ; ñuca irayashca huagraunara , animalgunaras huañuchishcanchi , tucui ña alichishcami tucun , borama shamichi , nisha .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Paigunaga mana uyasha ri pasanauca , shuj paihua hacindama , shujga paihua tiendama .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Shujgunaga sirvijgunara apisha , piñasha huañuchinauca .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Rey apu uyashaga piñarica , paihua soldarounara cachaca , huañuchijgunara huañuchinauca , paiguna llactara rupachinauca .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Shinajpi sirvijgunara nica : Cierto pacha bora puruntushcami , astaun convirashcauna mana valijguna anaushca .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Richi ñambiuna llucshinaunama , tucui chihui tiajgunara cayaichi .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Sirvijguna ñambiunara rishaga , tucui tiajgunara tandachinauca , manaliunaras aliunaras . Bora huasi undajtami aca , ashca convirashcauna shamushcaraigu .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: Rey apu icucami convirashcaunara ricungaj . Chihui shu runara ricuca bora churanara mana churarishcara .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Paita nica : Amigo , ¿ imarasha caibi bora churana illaj icucangui ? Runaga mana ansas cutipaca .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Shinajpi rey apu sirvijgunara nica : Paita huataichi chaquiras maquiras . Canzhai llandu tutai shitaichi . Chihui llaqui huacana quiri mucunas tian .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Ashcaunami cayai tucunaushca , ansallami ajllashcauna .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Shinajpi fariseoguna rimanangaj rinauca , Jesusta ima shimiis apingaj , nisha .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Paiguna yachachishca runaunara Herodianos nishcaunandi Jesuspajma cachanauca , paita nisha : Yachachij , can cierto shimira llaquij ajta ricsinchi , can Diospa nambira cierto pacha yachachingui , pi runaras mana manzhangui , runauna ricurinaras mana ricungui .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Ñucanchira rimahuai , ¿ Imara ningui ? ¿ Raihuajchu manzhu raihuaj impuesto nishca gobierno cullquira César apuma pagangaj ?

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Jesusga paiguna manali iyaira yachasha nica : ¿ Imaraigu tentahuanguichi , ishqui shimiyujguna ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Shu impuesto pagana cullquira ricuchihuaichi . Paiguna shu denario nishca cullquira ricuchinauca .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara : ¿ Pihuajtai cai ñahui , cai quillcashca ? nica .

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Cesarbaj , ninauca . Jesusga paigunara : Cesarbajta Cesarma cuichi , Diospajta Diosma cuichi , nica .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Caita uyasha manzharinauca , paita saquisha rinaucami .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Chi punzha saduceo runauna Jesusma shamunauca . Paiguna causarina illanmi nijguna . Paita tapunauca :

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Yachachij , nisha , Moisés nica : Shu runa churi illaj huañujpi , paihua uqui huañuj runa huarmira casarachu , miraigunara sicachingaj uquijta .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Ñucanchijpi canzhis uquipura tianauca . Ñaupa punda ajga casaraca , chi huasha churi illaj huañuca . Paihua huarmira uquima saquica .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Shinallarami ishqui quinsa uquiuna , canzhis uqutgama , huarmira apinauca .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Puchucaibi huarmis huañuca .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Causarínaiga , ¿ chi canzhismanda maicanda apingai caí huarmira , tucui uquiuna paita charishcaraigu ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara cutipasha nica : Pandaunguichi , Quillcashcaunara Diospa ushanaras mana yachasha .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Causarinai mana casaranaungachu , shinallara mana casarachinaungachu , astaun Diospa ahua pachai tiaj angelguna cuenta tucunaungami .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Randi , huañushcauna causarinamanda , ¿ manzhu ricushcanguichi Quillcai Dios cangunama rimashcara , casna nisha :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: Ñuca Abrahamba Dios , Isacpa Dios , Jacobpa Dios ani ? Diosga mana huañushcauna Dioschu an , astaun causajgunajmi .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Runauna caita uyasha manzharinauca pai yachachishcamanda .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Shinajpi fariseoguna , Jesús saduceogunara vencishcara uyasha , pariju tandarinauca .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Paigunamanda shujga , ley shimira yachaj , paita tentasha tapuca :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: Yachachij , nica , ¿ ley shimii , maicanda tucuimanda yali atun mandashca shimi ?

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Camba Señor Diosta llaquina mangui , entero shunguhua , entero almahua , entero iyaihua .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Caimi ñaupa punda atun mandashca shimi .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Chimanda huashalla mandashca shimi ñaupaj cuentallarami : Camba rayai tiaj runara canda llaquishcasna llaquinami angui .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Cai ishqui mandashca shimiunamandami tucui camachishca shimiuna tucui Diosmanda rimajguna yachachishcaunas tucunaun .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Jesús fariseogunahua pariju tiausha , paigunara tapuca :

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: Cristomanda , ¿ imara iyanguichi ? nica . ¿ Pihua churirai ? Paiguna , Davidpa churimi , ninauca .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Imasnara David Espiritui rimasha paita : Señor , nisha rimanzhu , casna nisha :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Señor ñuca Señorda nica , ñuca ali maqui partii tiari , canda chijnijgunara camba chaqui ucui churanagama ?

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: David paita , Señor , nisha rimasha , ¿ imasnajpira paihua churi tucun ?

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Pihuas paita imaras cutipanara mana ushacachu . Chi punzhamanda pacha , pihuas paita imaras tapungaj mana iyaricachu .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Shinajpi Jesús runaunaras pai yachachishca runaunaras rimaca , casna nisha :

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: Yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi Moisés camachishcaunara yachachinaun .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Shinajpi tucui paiguna pactachingaj rimashcaunara pactachichi , shinallara raichi , astaumbas paiguna rashcaunara ama raichichu . Paigunaga rimanaun , astaun mana ranaunzhu .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Paigunaga llashaj tormendos cargaunara runauna huasha tullui huatanaun , randi paiguna ichilla rerollahuas mana munanaunzhu llangangaj .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Astaun paiguna tucui rashcaunara runauna ricungajlla ranaunmi . Paiguna quillca churana cajitaunara atunyachinaun , paiguna churana punda tsiraspa tucushcara anzhuyachinaun .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Micunaunai ali tiarinaunara munanaun , tandarina huasiunais ñaupa pundai tiarinaunara munanaun .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Shinallara pulasaunai salurai tucunaunara munanaun , runauna paigunara : Yachachij , yachachij , rimai tucunara munanaun .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Cangunaga ama munaichichu runauna cangunara , Yachachij , nii tucungaj . Shujllami cangunara Yachachij , pai Cristomi . Cangunaga uquipura anguichi .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Ama pihuas , Ñuca yaya , nisha rimachu cai pachai . Shujllami canguna Yaya , paiga ahua pachaimi tiaun .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Cangunaraga runauna ama , Yachachij , ninauchu . Shujllami cangunara Yachachij , paiga Cristomi .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Cangunamanda yali runa , paiga cangunara sirvij achu .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Maican runas paillarara ahuayachijpi , pishiyachishca anga . Maicambas paillarara pishiyachijpi ahuayachishca anga .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: Astaumbas , ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , yachaira yachachijguna , fariseoguna , ishqui shimiyujguna ! Ahua pacha mandanara runaunajta ishcanguichi . Cangunas mana icunguichi , shinallara mana lugardas cunguichi icushun nijgunara .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , yachaira yachachijguna , fariseoguna , ishqui shimiyujguna ! Huaccha huarmiuna huasiunara tucuchinguichi , runauna uyangajlla unaira mañanguichi . Caimanda mas shinzhi causayachishca tucunguichimi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , yachaira yachachijguna , fariseoguna , ishqui shimiyujguna ! Lamarda auparas puringuichimi shu runara cangunara catijta rangaj . Ña catijpi , paita huajlichinguichi cangunamanda ishqui cuti yali ucu pachama rijta ranguichi .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , ñausa pushajguna ! Shu runa templo huasi shutii shimira cujpi , yangami ran , ninguichi . Shu runaga templo huasii tiaj curimanda shimira cujpi , dibijmi tucun , ninguichi .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: ¡ Upauna , ñausauna ! ¿ Imara yali valin , curichu , curira valichij templo huasichu ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Shinallara : Pis altar shutii shimira cujpi , Yangami ran , ninguichi . Astaun pis altarbi tiaj sacrificio shutii shimira cujpi , dibijmi tucun , ninguichi .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: ¡ Upauna , ñausauna ! ¿ Imara yali valin , sacrificiochu , sacrificiora valichij altarchu ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Altar shutii shimira cujga , altarmandas tucui chihui ahuai tiajmandas shimira cunmi .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Templo huasi shutii shimira cujga , templo shutüs , templo huasü Causaujpa shutüs shimira cunmi .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Ahua pacha shutii shimira cujga , Diospa tiarina shutii tiarinai Tiarijpa shutüs shimira cunmi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , yachaira yachachijguna , fariseoguna , ishqui shimiyujguna ! Shu chunga partira cunguichi micunai churana pangaunamanda , astaun ley shimimanda atun ranaunara saquinguichimi : alirana , llaquina , quirina . Caigunara rana aca , chishujgunara mana saquisha .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: ¡ Ñausa pushajguna . Challunda shushunguichi , astaumbas camello nishcara nillpunguichi !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , yachaira yachachijguna , fariseoguna , ishqui shimiyujguna ! Vaso pulato huasha partira maillanguichi , astaumbas ucu shungüi shuhuanahua manali ranahuas undajtami anguichi .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: ¡ Ñausa fariseo runa ! Ñaupa punda vasomanda pulatomanda ucu partira pichairi , huasha partis shinallara pichairi , huasha partís shinallara pichashca achu .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , yachaira yachachijguna , fariseoguna , ishqui shimiyujguna ! Yurajlla pintashca pambana uctuuna cuenta anguichi . Cierto pacha canzhamanda sumajlla ricurinaun , astaun ucui huañushcauna tulluhua ima ismushcahuas undashcami anaun .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Shinallarami canguna , canzhamanda ricujpi , ali runaunasna ricuringuichi , astaun shungu ucui manalihua , manali iyaihuas undarishcami anguichi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: ¡ Ayailla cangunamanda , yachaira yachachijguna , fariseo guna , ishqui shimiyujguna ! Diosmanda rimajguna pambana huasiunara sicachinguichi , ali runaunara iyarichina rumiunaras sumacyachinguichi .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Shinallara ninguichi : Ñucanchiga ñucanchi yayauna causaushca tiempoi causaushca ashaga , mana rai macanchi paiguna rashcaunara , Diosmanda rimajguna yahuarda talisha . 3 ! Shina rimasha ricuchinguichi canguna quiquingunamanda , canguna chi Diosmanda rimajgunara huañuchijguna quiquin churiuna anguichimi .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: ¡ Cangunas canguna yayauna rashca tupura undachichi !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: ¡ Machacuiguna , pitalalamanda miraiguna ! ¿ Imara rashara ucu pachama rinamanda quishpinguichi ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Chiraigumanda ñuca cangunama Diosmanda rimajgunara , yachajgunara , yachaira yachachijgunara cachauni . Paigunamanda huaquingunara huañuchinguichimi , huaquingunara chacatanguichimi , shujgunara azutinguichimi canguna tandarina huasiunai , shu llactamanda shu llactagama cachanguichimi .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Casna ranguichimi canguna ahuai tucui ali runa yahuar urmangaj ali causaj Abel yahuarmanda Berequías churi Zacarías yahuargama , paita templo huasihua altarhua chaupi shungüi huañuchishcanguichimi .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cai tucui shamungami cai miraigunama .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ¡ Jerusalén , Jerusalén , Diosmanda rimajgunara huañuchij , canma cachashca runaunara rumihua shitaj ! ¡ Masna cuti canguna churiunara tandachisha nicani , imasna shu atallba paihua huahuaunara rigra panga ucui tandachin , randi mana munacangui !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Camba huasi ña chunlla saquishcami .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Cuna horasmanda ñucara mana ricuhuanguichichu canguna casna rimanagama : Bendiciashcami Señorba shutii shamujta , nisha .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Jesús templo huasímanda llucshisha riupi , pai yachachishca nmauna paihuajma shamunauca , templo huasiunara paita ricuchingaj .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : ¿ Cai tucuira ricunguichichu ? Cierto pacha cangunara nini , caibi mana shu rumis shuj ahuai saquiringachu , tucui tulashcami anga .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Jesús Olivos nishca urcui tiarisha , pai yachachishca runauna paihuajma shamunauca sapallai . Paita ninauca : Cuentahuai , nisha , ¿ imahoras caiguna tucunaungairi ? ¿ Imara ricuringairi can shamunai , cai tiempouna tucurinais ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Cuiraichi pihuas cangunara ama umachingaj .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Ashcauna ñuca shutii shamunaungami , Ñucami Cristo ani , nisha . Shina nisha rimasha , ashcaunara umachinaungami .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Guerraunara , guerra shimiunaras uyanguichimi . Pacta turbaringuichimara . Ministirinmi casna tucungaj . Shina ajllaira charajmi tucurina horas .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Shu llacta shu llactahua ataringa , shu rey apu shu rey apuhua . Llaqui ungüiguna , yarcaiguna , allpa cuyunauna huaquin partiunai tiangami .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Tucui caigunahua tormendarinauna callarinaungami .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Chi horas cangunara tormendachingaj entreganaungami , huañuchinaungami , tucui runauna cangunara chijninaungami , ñuca shutimanda .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Chi tiempounai ashcauna nijtasha urmanaungami , shujguna shujgunara entreganaungami , shujguna shujgunara chijninaungami .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Ashca llullasha rimajguna atarinaungami , ashcaunara urmachinaungami .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Manalirana mirarishcamanda , ashca runauna llaquij shungu chiriyangami .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Randi , puchucaigama ahuantaj runa quishpichi tucungami .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Cai Dios mandana pacha evangelio nishca ali shimi entero mundui camachishca anga , tucui llactaunama . Chihuasha tucurina horas pactamunga .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Chiraigumanda , imahoras Lugar Santo nishcai Dios chijnishcara ricunguichimi , Diosmanda rimaj Daniel quillcashcasna , ( ricuj runa intindichu ) ,

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: shinajpi chi horasllai , Judeai tiajguna urcuunama miticunauchu .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Huasi ahuai tiajga ama irguchu huasimanda imaras apingaj .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Chagrai tiajga ama tigrachu llachapara apingaj .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Ayailla , icsayujguna , chuchuchijgunas , chi punzhaunai !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Rugaichi canguna miticuna horas ama tamiai tucungaj , ama samana punzhais .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Chi horas atun tormendarina tiempo tiangami , callari horasmanda pacha mana casna tucushca aca , cuna horasgamas , huiñaigamas .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Chi punzhauna mana curuyashca ajpiga , pihuas mana quishpinmaca . Astaun ajllashcauna raigumanda chi punzhauna curuyashca anaunga .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: Shinajpi maicans canda : Ricuichi , caibimi Cristo ; ricuichi , chihuimi Cristo , ninaupi , ama quiringuichichu .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Llulla Cristo nishcauna , llullasha rimajgunas atarinaungami . Atun ricurinaunara , munanaita ranaunaras ranaungami . Ajllashcaunaras shinallara umachi tucunaungami usharijpiga .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Ña , ñaupa horasmanda cangunara rimashcani .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Shinajpi runauna cangunara : Ricuichi , pai runa illashca partii tiaun , nijpi , ama llucshichichu . Runauna : Ricuichi , pacalla ucuunaimi tiaun , nijpis , ama quirichichu .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Imasna rayo indi llucshinamanda llucshisha , indi icunagama ricurin , shinallarami tucunga Runa Churi shamunai .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Maibi huañushca aicha sirijpi , chihui illahuangauna tandarimunaungami .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Chi tormendarina punzhauna pasashcallai , indi llanduyangami , quillas mana punzhayachingachu . Estrellasguna ahuamanda urmanaungami . Ahua pachai tiau ushanauna cuyuchishca anaungami .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Chi horas , Runa Churi ricurina ahua pachai ricuringami . Tucui cai pacha ailluuna huacanaungami ; ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ahua pacha puyuunai shamujta shinzhi ushanahua atun sumajhuas ricunaungami .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Paihua angelgunara atun cormeta shinzhi uyaríshcahua cachamungami . Pai ajllashcaunara tandachingami chuscu huaira shamuna partimanda , ahua pacha caru pundamanda chishu caru pundagama .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Higo yuramanda yachachingaj cuentanara yachaichi : Imahoras paihua pallca ña llulluyaupi , pangaunas llucshinaupi , yachanguichi rupai tiempo ña mayanllayaunmi .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Shinallara cangunas imahoras cai tucui pactariupi ricusha , ña yachaichi pai mayanllaimi tiaun , pungu rayallai .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cuna horas miraiguna manara pasajllaira , cai tucui pactaringami .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ahua pachas cai pachas pasanaungami , astaun ñuca rimashca shimiuna mana pasanaungachu .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: Randi , chi punzharaga , chi horastaga , pi runas pi ahuamanda angelgunas mana yachanaunzhu , ñuca Yayallami yachan .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Astaun imasna tucuca Noé causaushca punzhaunai , shinallarami tucunga Runa Churi shamunai .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Imasna aca yacu izhu manara shamujllaira , runauna micunauca , upinauca , casaranauca , casarachinauca , Noé barcoi icuna punzhagama ,

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: imasna mana intindinauca yacu izhu shamunagama , tucuira apaca ; shinallarami anga Runa Churi shamunai .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Chi horasllaira ishqui runa chagrai tianaunga , shuj apashca anga , shujga saquishca anga .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ishqui huarmi cutanaunga cutana rumii , shuj apashca anga , shujga saquishca anga .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Ricusha chapaichi , mana yachanguichichu canguna Señor shamuna horasta .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Astaun caita yachaichi , shu huasi dueño shuhuaj runa shamuna horasta yachasha , chapanma chi runa ama icungaj huasii .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunas puruntuichi , Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , canguna mana iyaushca horaspi shamushallami .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: ¿ Pitangai ali llaquij iyaiyuj sirvijga , paihua patrón huasira cuirangaj churaca , chihui ajgunara ali horaspi carangaj ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Cushimi casna sirvij , patrón shamusha paita shina rauta tupanma .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , pai tucui charishcara cuirangaj paita cungami .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Randi , chi manali sirvij runa paihua shungüi : Ñuca patrón unaiyaunmi tigrangaj , nisha ,

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: paihua pariju sirvijgunara sajmangaj callarijpi , machajgunahua micungaj upingajpas callarijpi ,

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: chi sirvijpa patrón shamungami pai mana chapaushca punzhai , pai mana yachashca horaspi .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Paita shinzhira livachingami , ishqui shimiyujgunajma cachangami ; chihuimi llaqui huacana quiru mucunas tian .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Shinajpi ahua pacha mandana chunga huanra huarmiuna cuenta ricurijmi anga . Huarmiuna paiguna vela puruunara apisha , carira tupangaj llucshinauca .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Paigunamanda , pichca iyaiyujguna anauca , chishu pichcaga upauna .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Upauna paiguna vela purura yacu illajta apanauca .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Iyaiyujgunaga sindina yacura butii apanauca velahua pariju .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Cari unaiyajpi , tucui puñunaipi puñunauca .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Chaupi tutai shu shimi caparishca uyarica : ¡ Cari shamuun , nisha , llucshichi paita tupangaj !

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Shinajpi tucui chi huanra huarmiuna lliccharinauca , vela puruunara alichinauca .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Upaunaga iyaiyujgunara ninauca : Yacura cuhuai ñucanchi vela puruuna huañurinaunmi .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Iyaiyujgunaga cutipasha ninauca : Ñucanchi yacu mana durangachu ñucanchijtas cangunajtas . Richi catujgunara randingaj canguna quiquimbajta .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Paiguna randingaj riushcallai , cari shamuca . Puruntushcauna paihua pariju borai icunauca . Pungura ishcanauca .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Huasha chishuj huanra huarmiunas shamunauca , Señor , Señor , pungura pascapai , nisha .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Paiga cutipasha nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , Mana ansas ricsinichu cangunara .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Ricusha chapaichi , Runa Churi shamuna punzhara pai shamuna horastas mana yachanguichichu .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: Ahua pacha gobierno shu runa cuentami . Pai carama ringarausha , sirvijgunara cayausha , pai charishcaunara paiguna maquiunai saquica .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Shujma pichca talento nishca cullquira cuca , shujma ishquira , shujmas shujllara , caran dueño ushana tupura cusha . Chihuasha caru llactama rica .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Pichca talento cullquira apijga , chi cullquihua tarabasha shu pichca talento cullquira mas ganaca .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Shinallara ishquira apijga , ishquira mas ganaca .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Shujllara apijga , allpara allasha , paihua patromba cullquira pacaca allpa ucui .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: Unai tiempo huasha , chi sirvijguna patrón tigramuca , paigunahua cullquimanda alichingaj .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Pichca talentos cullquira apij runa shamusha , shu pichcara apamuca , casna nisha : Señor , pichca talentos cullquira cuhuacangui , pichcara mas ganashcani .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Patrón paita nica : Alimi , ali mana pishisha sirvij runa . Ansallahua alira rashcangui , ashcara cuirangaj canda churasha . Camba señorba cushii icui .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Ishqui talentos cullquira apij runa shamusha ; Señor , nica , ishqui talentos cullquira cuhuacangui , ishquira mas ganashcani .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Patrón paita nica : Alimi , ali mana pishisha sirvij runa . Ansallahua alira rashcangui , ashcara cuirangaj canda churasha . Icui camba señorba cushii .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Randi , shuj talento cullquillara apij runa shamushaga : Señor , nica , can shinzhi shungu runa ajta ricsicani , can mana tarpushcais pallaj , mana can ichashca muyumanda tandachij ;

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Chimanda manzhacani . Camba talento cullquira pacacani allpa ucui .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Paihua patrón cutipasha nica : Mana valij , quilla sirvij runa , ñuca mana tarpushcai pallashcara , ñuca mana ichashca muyumanda tandachishcaras yachacangui .

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: Chiraigumanda ñuca cullquira bancoi churana macangui , ñuca tigrajpi ñucajta apingaj pai ganashcandi .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Quichuichi paimanda chi talento cullquira , chungara charijma cuichi .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Charijga mas charingami , yalira charingaj ; mana charijmandaga pai charishcahuaras quichushca anga .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Mana valij sirvij runaraga , canzha llandu tutai shitaichi . Chihuimi llaqui huacana quiru mucunas tiangami .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Runa Churi paihua sumajhua shamushcai , tucui chuyaj angelgunahua pariju , paihua gusto sumaj rey apu tiarinai tiaringami .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Paihua ñaupajpi tucui llactauna tandarinaungami . Chicanyachingami shujgunara chishujgunamanda , imasna shu cuiraj runa borregounara chivounamanda chicanyachin .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Borregounara paihua ali maqui partima churanga , chivounáraga paihua lluqui partima .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Shinajpi Rey Apu ali maqui partima tiajgunama ñinga : Shamichi , ñuca Yaya bendiciashcauna , mundu callarinamanda cangunajta puruntushca mandana pachara apichi .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Yarcachihuaca , carahuacanguichi ; upinaichihuaca , upichihuacanguichi ; carumanda purij acani , apihuacanguichi .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Llatan acani , churachihuacanguichi . Ungushca acani , ñucajma shamucanguichi ricungaj . Chonda cularbi tiaucani , ñucajma shamucanguichi ricungaj .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Shinajpi ali runauna cutipasha ninaunga : Señor , ¿ imahorasta canda yarcachijta ricucanchi carangaj , upinaichijta upichingaj ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: ¿ Imahorasta canda carumanda shamujta ricucanchi canda apingaj ? ¿ Imahorasta canda llatanda ricucanchi churachingaj ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: ¿ Imahorasta canda ungushcara , chonda cularbi tiajtas ricucanchi , cambajma shamucanchi ricungaj ?

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Rey Apu cutipasha ñinga : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , imasnara casna rarcanguichi shu ñuca ichilla uquiunama , ñucarami rarcanguichi .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Shinajpi shinallara lluqui partima tiajgunamas ñinga : Anzhurichi ñucajmanda , maldiciashcauna , huiñaigama duraj ninama ; supai apujta paihua angelgunajta puruntushcama .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Ñuca yarcachicani , mana carahuacanguichi . Upinaichicani , mana upichihuacanguichi .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Carumanda shamuj acani , mana apihuacanguichi ; llatan acani , mana churachihuacanguichi ; ungushca acani , chonda cularbi tiaucani , ñucajma mana shamucanguichi ricungaj .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Shinajpi paiguna shinallara cutipasha ninaungami : Señor , ¿ imahorasta canda yarcachijta , upinaichijta , carumanda shamu jta , llatanda , ungushcara , chonda cularbi tiauta ricushcanchi , canda mana sirvicanchi ?

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Shinajpi cutipasha ñinga : Cierto pacha cangunara nini ; imasnara caita mana rarcanguichi shu cai ichillaunahua , ñucara mana rarcanguichi .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Caigunaga huiñaigama duraj tormendarinama rinaungami , randi aliuna huiñai causaima rinaungami .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Jesús cai tucuira rimai pasashca huasha , pai yachachishca runaunama nica :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: Yachanguichi imasna ishqui punzha pasashca huasha , Pascua nishca ista shamun . Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , entregai tucusha chacatangaj .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Shinajpi sacerdote apuuna yachaira yachachijguna , rucuunandi tandarinauca , sacerdote atun apu Caifas nishca huasi pungüi .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Pariju rimananauca Jesusta umachishcahua apingaj , paita huañuchingaj .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Ninauca : Mana rashun ista punzhaunai , runaunara ama nuspachingaj .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Jesús Betania llactai tiauca , llagayuj Simomba huasii .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Paihuajma shu huarmi shamuca , valij rumi puru ashca valij asnaj ambihua undachishcara apamuca . Cai ambira Jesuspa umai talica , pai mesai tiashcai .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Yachachishca runauna caita ricusha piñarinauca : ¿ Imarasha caita yanga baratun ? ninauca .

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Caita catuna usharica ashca cullquihua , cullquira tsuntsuunama cungaj .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Jesús caita intindisha , paigunara nica : ¿ Imaraigu cai huarmira tormendachiunguichi ? Shu ali ranara rashcami ñucahua .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Tsuntsuunara tucui horas cangunahua charinguichimi , ñucáraga mana tucui horasgama .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Huarmi cai mishqui asnaj ambira ñuca aichai talisha , ñucara pambangaj puruntusha rashcami .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , maibis cai evangelio ali shimi uyarichu entero mundui , shinallara cai huarmi rashcara cuentashca angami paita iyaringaj .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Shinajpi chunga ishquimanda shuj , Judas Iscariote nishca , sacerdote apuunajma rica .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: ¿ Masnara cuhuanguichi , nica , ñuca Jesusta cangunama entregangaj ? Paiguna quinsa chunga cullquira cushun , ninauca .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Chi horasmanda pacha Judas ima tonois mascauca paita entregangaj .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Puscu illaj tanda ista ñaupa punda punzhai , yachachishca runauna Jesusma shamunauca , paita nisha : ¿ Maibira puruntunara munangui Pascua nishca micunara micungaj ?

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Jesús nica : Jllactama richi shu runajma . Paita nichi : Yachachij nin , Ñuca punzha ña pactamunmi . Camba huasii Pascua nishca micunara micusha , ñuca yachachishca runaunahua .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Paiguna Jesús mandashcasna ranauca . Pascua istara puruntunauca .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Tutayaupi , chunga ishquihua pariju mesai tiarica .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Paiguna micuushca ratoi , Jesús nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cangunamanda shuj ñucara entregangami .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Ashcara llaquirisha , caran runa Jesusta rimangaj callarica : ¿ Ñucachu ani , Señor ? nisha .

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipasha nica : Ñucahua pariju maquira pulatoi satiu , paimi ñucara entreganga .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Cierto pacha ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , riunimi , ñucamanda quillcashcasna ; astaun , ¡ Ayailla Runa Churira entregaj runa ! Astaun alimi anmaca pai mana pagaringaj .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Shinajpi Judas , paita entregana runa , cutipasha nica : ¿ Ñucachu ani , Señor ? Jesús nica : Canda shina ninguiga .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Paiguna micuushcai , Jesús tandara apica , bendiciaca , paquica , pai yachachishca runaunama cuca : Apichi , micuichi , nisha , caimi ñuca aicha .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Vasoras apisha , agrasishca huasha , paigunara cuca : Upichi tucui canguna , nica .
