text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Caimi ñuca mushuj pactachina shimira alichina yahuar . Ashcaunamanda talishcami , uchaunara perdonangaj .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Cangunara nini , cuna horasmanda pacha , cai uvillas muyumanda mana cuti upishachu shamuna punzhagama imahoras mushujta upisha cangunahua ñuca Yaya mandana pachai .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Cantashca huasha , llucshisha , Olivos nishca urcuma rinauca .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Cuna tuta canguna tucui ñucamanda manzharinguichimi . Quillcashca tian , Cuirajta chugrichisha , borrego montonga chausirinaungami .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Ñuca causarishca huashaga , canguna ñaupara Galileama rishami .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Pedro cutipasha paita nica : Tucuiunaga canmanda manzharinaupis , ñuca imahoraspas mana manzharishachu .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Cierto pacha canda nini , cuna tuta gallo manara cantajllaira , can ñucamanda quinsa cuti , Paita mana ricsinichu , ninguimi .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Pedro paita nica : Canhua pariju huañuna ashas , canmanda mana nishachu , Mana ricsinichu . Shinallarami tucui yachachishca runauna ninauca .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunandi shu Getsemaní nishca sisa pambama pactamuca . Pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Tiarichi caibi , ñucaga chihuama risha , Diosta mañangaj .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Pedrora Zebedeo ishqui churiras pushasha , Jesús llaquiringaj ashcara tormendaringajpas callarica .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Ñuca alma ashcara llaquirin , huañuna tupura . Caillai saquirichi , ñucahua ripararos chapaichi .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Cuti chihuama risha , tuamalla urmasha , Diosta mañasha : Ñuca Yaya , nica , usharijpiga cai tormendarina vaso cuenta ñucamanda pasachu . Shinajllaira mana ñuca munashcasna , astaun can munashcasna .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Ña pai yachachishca runaunama shamusha , paigunara puñuriaita tupaca , Pedrora nica : ¿ Mana ushacangui ñucahua chapanara shu horas tupullas ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Chapaichi , mañaichi , tentaciombi ama icungaj . Espíritu munanmi , aichaga irquimi .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Cuti rica , cuti Diosta mañaca , Ñuca Yaya , nisha , cai vaso cuenta ñucamanda mana pasana usharijpi ñuca mana upisha , camba munai rashca achu .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Cuti shamuca , paiguna puñuriaita tarica , puñunaimanda huañuugunara tupaca .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Paigunara saquisha , cuti rica , ña quinsa cuti Diosta mañaca , ñaupasnallara rimasha .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Shinajpi pai yachachishca runaunajma shamusha , nica : Ña puñuichi , samaichi . Horas pactamushcami . Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca uchayujguna maquiunai entregai tucunimi .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Atarichi , acuichi , nica . Ricuichi ñucara entregaj runa ña mayanllayaunmi .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Jesús chara rimaullaira , Judas shamuca , chunga ishquimanda shuj , paihua pariju ashca runauna shamunauca esparaunahua , caspiunahua ; sacerdote apuunamanda , runauna rucuunamandas shamunauca .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Entregaj runa paigunara rimashca aca : Ñuca muchashca runa chimi . Paita apinguichi , nisha .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Chi ratollai Judas Jesusma shamusha , ¿ Alillachu angui , Yachachij ? nisha , paita muchaca .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Jesús paita : Amigo , nica , ¿ imara rangajta shamucangui ? Shinajpi , llutarimusha , runauna Jesusta apinauca .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Astaun , shu Jesushua tiau runa , paihua esparara apisha , shu sacerdote atun apura sirvijta chugríchica , paihua rinrira pitica .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita nica : Camba esparara cuti sati cara ucui . Tucui esparara apijguna esparahua huañunaungami .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu iyangui amallara ñuca Yayara ushani mañangaj , pai ashca huaranga angelgunara cachamunma ñucajta ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Shina rajpiga , ¿ imasnara Quillcashcauna pactarinaunma , casnami tucuna anga nisha ?

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Chi ratollai Jesús runaunara nica : ¿ Imarasha shu shuhuajma cuenta llucshimucanguichi esparahua caspihua ñucara apingaj ? Caran punzha cangunahua tiaricani templo huasii yachachisha , ñucara mana apihuacanguichi .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Astaun cai tucui tucun Diosmanda rimajguna Quillcashcauna pactaringaj . Shinajpi tucui pai yachachishca runauna Jesusta saquisha miticunauca .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Jesusta apijguna paita pushanauca Caifasbajma , pai sacerdote atun apu ajpi . Chihui yachaira yachachijguna rucuunandi tandarimushca aca .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Pedroga carullai paita catimuca sacerdote atun apu huasi pungugama . Soldarounahua tiarica ima paihua tucushcaras ricungaj .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Sacerdote apuuna rucuunandi tucui ajllashca apuunandi llulla shimiunara mascanauca Jesusta causayachingaj , paita huañuchingaj .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Mana tupanaucachu , ashca llullasha rimaj ricujguna shamunaullaira . Huashaga ishqui llullasha rimajguna shamunauca .

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: Paiguna ninauca : Cai runa nica : Diospa huasira tulanara ushanimi , quinsa punzhai cuti sicachingaj .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Sacerdote atun apu atarisha nica : ¿ Manzhu cutipangui imaras ? ¿ Imara ninaun canmanda caiguna ?

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Jesusga chunlla tiauca , mana cutipacachu . Shinajpi sacerdote atun apu paita nica : Causaj Diospa shutii rimahuai , ¿ Cristo nishca Diospa Churichu angui ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Canda casna ninguiga , maspas canda nini , huasha horas can Runa Churira Diospa ushana ali maqui partima tiarishcara , ahua pacha puyuunai shamunaras ricunguichúni .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Shinajpi sacerdote atun apu paihua churanara lliquisha nica : ¡ Diosmanda irusta rimashcangui ! Shu rimajgunara mana ministinchichu . Cunallara pai manali rimashcara uyashcanguichi .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: ¿ Imara ninguichi ? Cutipasha ninauca : Huañunami anga .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Shinajpi paihua ñahuii tiucanauca , paita sajmanauca , shujguna maqui palahua huactanauca .

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: Rimai , Cristo , ¿ pita sajmacai canda ? ninauca .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Pedroga canzhai tiauca huasi pungüi . Shu sirvij huarmi llutarisha : Can shinallara Galileamanda Jesushua tiaucangui , nica .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Astaun pai tucui runauna ñaupajpi nica : Can rimashcara mana yachanichu .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Paiga canzha punguma llucshisha , shu sirvij huarmi paita ricuca . Chihuajgunara nica : Cai runas shinallara Nazaretmanda Jesushua tiauca .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Cutillara pai Diospa shutii rimasha : Cai runara mana ricsinichu , nica .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Unáillahuai , chihui tiajguna llutarimusha , Pedrora ninauca : Cierto pacha chigunamandami angui , can rimana tono canda ricsichin .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro maldiciangaj Diospa shutii rimangajpas callarisha : Cai runara mana ricsinichu , nica . Chi ratollai gallo cantaca .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro Jesús paita rimashca shimiunara iyarica : Gallo manara cantajllaira , can quinsa cuti : Paita mana ricsinichu , ninguimi , nisha . Canzhama llucshisha llaquira huacaca .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Punzhayajpi tucui sacerdote apuuna , runauna rucuunandi pariju rimananauca Jesusta huañuchingaj .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Paita huatashcara pushanauca , Poncio Pilato nishca gobernadorba maquii entreganauca .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Shinajpi Judas , paita entregaj runa , Jesús causayachishcara ricusha , arrepentirisha , quinsa chunga cullquira cutichica sacerdote apuunama , rucuunamas .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Paigunara nica : Ucharashcanimi , ucha illaj yahuarda entregasha cangunama . Paigunaga : Cai , ¿ imajta valin ñucanchijta ? Canmi yachangui , ninauca .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Cullquira allpama shitasha templo huasii , llucshisha rica . Paulara cungai sipirisha huañuca .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna , cullquira apisha : Mana usharinzhu , ninauca , Diosma cushca cullqui cajombi churangaj , yahuarmanda pagashca ajpi .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Parijumanda rimanausha , shu allpara randinauca , mangara rajpa allpara , chihui carumanda shamujgunara huañujpi pambangaj .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Chi raigumanda cuna horasgama chi allpa , Yahuarmanda allpa , nishcami .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Shinarasha Diosmanda rimaj Jeremías rimashca shimi pactarica : Quinsa chunga cullquira apinauca , valichishca runa valij tupura , Israel churiuna valichishcasna , nisha .

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Cullquira cuca mangara raj runa allpamanda , imasna Señor ñucara mandashcasna .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Jesusga gobernadorba ñaupajpi shayaca . Pai Jesusta tapuca : ¿ Canzhu judioguna Rey Apu angui ? Jesús paita : Canda shina nínguiga , nica .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna rucuunandi paita culpachijpi , Jesús imaras mana cutipacachu .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Pilato paita , ¿ Manzhu uyangui imasnara canmanda contra rimanaun ? nica .

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Jesusga imaras mana cutipacachu . Chimanda gobernador paimanda ashcara manzharica .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Ista punzhai gobernadorba yachaibi shu ishcashca runara cacharina aca , runauna munashcara .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Chi horas shu ashca rimashca runa ishcarishcara charica , Barrabás nishcara .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Runauna tandaríjpi , Pilato paigunara nica : ¿ Maicanda munanguichichu ñuca cacharingaj , Barrasbasta , Cristo nishca Jesustachu cacharisha ?

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Pilato yachaca imasna Jesusta chijnishcamanda entregashca aca .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Pilatoga taripana tiarinai tiarishcai , paihua huarmi paita rimangaj cachamuca : Ama imaras ranguichu cai ali runahua , nisha . Cuna ashcara tormendarishcani paimanda ñuca puñusha nuspaushcaunai .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna rucuunandi runaunara iyachinauca Barrabasta mañangaj cacharingaj , Jesustaga huañuchingaj .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Gobernador paigunara cutipasha : ¿ Cai ishquimanda maicandara munanguichichu ñuca cacharingaj ? Paiguna : Barrabasta , ninauca .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato paigunara nica : ¿ Imara rashairi Cristo nishca Jesushua ? Tucui ninauca : ¡ Chacatashca achu !

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Gobernador paigunara nica : ¿ Imaraigu ? ¿ Ima manalira rashcachu ? Runaunaga maspas caparisha ninauca : ¡ Chacatashca achu !

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Pilato imara ranaras mana ushasha ricusha , astaun runauna mas mas nusparinaupi , yacura apisha , paihua maquira maillaca runauna ñaupajpi , nisha : Ñuca mana causayujchu ani cai ali runamanda .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Tucui runauna cutipasha ninauca : Paihua yahuar ñucanchi ahuai , ñucanchi churiuna ahuais achu .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Shinajpi Barrabasta cacharica . Jesústaga azutishca huasha , chacatangaj cuca .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Shinajpi gobernadorba soldarouna Jesusta cuartelma pushanauca , pai muyujta entero soldaro montonda tandachinauca .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Paita llatanasha , paihua ahuai shu puca llachapara churanauca .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Paihua umai shu casha llaitura churanauca , shu taunara paihua ali maquii . Paihua ñaupajpi cungurisha paita burlanauca , ¡ Ee , nisha , Judioguna Rey Apu !

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Paihua ñahuii tiucasha , caspira apisha , umai huajtanauca .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Burlashca huasha , llachapara quichunauca , paihua churanara churachinauca , paita chacatangaj pushanauca .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Llucshishaga , shu Cirenemanda runara tupanauca , Simón nishcara , paita cruzta apachinauca .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Golgota nishca pambama pactamunauca , caiga Uma Tullu Pambami , nin .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Chihui , ayaj vinora shu ayajhua masashcara paita ricuchinauca : caita camashca huashaga mana munacachu upinara .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Jesusta chacatashca huashaga , soldarouna paigunapura paihua churanara chaupichinauca , maicanda lichayuj anga nisha camanauca , paima cungaj , Diosmanda rimajpa shimi pactaringaj , casna nishca : Ñuca churanara paigunapura chaupichinauca , ñuca llachapamanda Uchayujta anga nisha camanauca .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Soldarouna chihui tiarisha paita ricunauca .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Paihua uma ahuai quillcashcara churanauca : Caimi Jesús , Judioguna Rey Apu , nisha .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Shinajpi , paihua pariju ishqui shuhuaj runaunara chacatanauca , shujta ali maquima , shujta lluquima .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Chi mayanda pasauguna Jesusta camisha rimanauca , paiguna umaunara cuyuchisha .

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: Ninauca : Canga , templo huasira tulaj , quinsa punzhai cuti sicachij , canllara quishpi . Can Diospa Churi ashaga , cruzmanda irgüi .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Shinallarami ninauca sacerdote apuuna , paita burlasha , yachaira yachachijgunahua pariju , fariseogunandi , rucuunandi , casna nisha :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: Shujgunaraga quishpichicami , paulara mana ushanzhu quishpinara . Israelba Rey Apu ashaga , cunallara cruzmanda irguchu , shina rajpi paihuajpi quirishun .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Pai Diospi quiricami . Dios paita cacharichu , munajpi . Ñuca Diospa Churimi ani , nica .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Shinallarami paihua pariju chacatashca shuhuaj runauna paita camisha rimanauca .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Chaupi punzhamanda pacha las tres tupugama tun llandu tucuca tucui partii .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Las tres mayambi , Jesús shinzhira caparisha nica : Eli , eli , ¿ lama sabactani ? Casnami nin : Ñuca Dios , ñuca Dios , ¿ imarashara ñucara saquihuashcangui ?

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Huaquin chihui ajguna caita uyasha ninauca : Elíastami cayaun .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Chi ratollai shu runa callpamusha , shu tsungarina putusta ayaj vinohua tsungachisha , paita cuca upingaj .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Shujgunaga ninauca : Saqui , ricushunchi Elias shamunga chari paita llushpichingaj .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Jesusga cuti shinzhi shimihua caparisha , paihua espiritura cuca .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Chi ratollai , templo huasii huayuriai llachapa ishqui partii lliquirica ahuamanda . Allpas cuyuca , peñasgunas partirinauca .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Pambashca uctuunas pascarinauca , ashca puñuriai quirijguna atarinauca .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Pambashca uctuunamanda llucshisha , Jesús causarishca huasha , santo llactama shamunauca , ashcaunahua ricurinauca .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Capitánga paihua pariju tiaj Jesusta ricujgunandi , allpa cuyushcara ricusha , ashcara manzharinauca , casna nisha : Cierto pacha cai Diospa Churimi aca .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Ashca huarmiuna chihui tianauca , carumandalla ricusha . Caiguna Jesusta catimunauca Galiieamanda pacha paita sirvisha .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Paigunahua tianauca María Magdalena , Jacobo José mama Mariandi , Zebedeo churiuna mamandi .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Tutayaupi shu José nishca charij runa , Arimatea llactamanda shamuj , shu Jesús yachachishca runa asha ,

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Pilatojma risha , Jesuspa aichara mañaca . Shinajpi Pilato shimira cachaca aichara paima cungaj .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: José Jesuspa aichara apisha , shu ali llachpahua pilluca ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Paihua quiquin mushuj pambana uctui churaca , peñas ucui allashca . Shu atun rumira muyuchisha uctu pungüi churaca , chihuasha rica .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Chihui tiauca María Magdalena , chishu Mariandi , pambashca uctu ñaupajpi tiarisha .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Cayandi punzha , Alichina nishca punzha huasha , sacerdote apuuna , fariseogunandi tandarinauca Pilato ñaupajpi .

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: Ninauca : Apu , iyariunchi imasnara cai umachij runa nica , pai chara causaushcallaira : Quinsa punzha huasha causarishami .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Mandai pambashca uctura huacachingaj quinsa punzhagama , pai yachachishca runauna tutai shamusha aichara shuhuanaunga chari . Chihuasha ninaunga runaunama : Huañushcaunamanda causarishcami . Shinajpi huasha pandashca ñaupa ajta yalinga .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Pilato paigunara nica : Caibi soldarounara charinguichi . Richi pambashcara ali ishcasha cuirangaj canguna yachashcasna .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Shinajpi rinauca , pambashcara ali ishcangaj , rumira sello nishcahua pigasha , soldarounara churanauca ricungaj .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Samana punzha pasashca huasha , semana ñaupa punzha ña punzhayaupi , María Magdalena , chishu Marías pambashcara ricungaj shamunauca .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Allpa cuyuca shinzhira . Shu Señorba ángel , ahuamanda irgumusha , rumira anzhuchica , chi ahuai tiarica .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Angelga rayu cuenta ricurij aca , paihua churana rasu cuenta yuraj aca .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Soldarouna angelda manzhashcamanda chucchunauca , huañushcaunasna tucunauca .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Randi ángel huarmiunara rimasha nica : Cangunaga ama manzhaichichu Ñuca yachani canguna chacatashca Jesusta mascangaj shamushcanguichimi .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Mana caibichu tiaun , nica , causarishcami , pai rimashcasna . Shamichi , ricuichi pai siriushcara .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Uctalla richi , pai yachachishca runaunara cuentaichi , Señor huañushcaunamanda causarimushcami , nisha . Cangunamanda ñaupara Galileama rin . Chihui paita ricunguichimi . Ñucaga cangunara ña rimashcani .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Shinajpi paiguna manzhaihua pambana uctumanda llucshisha , ashca cushihua callpasha rinauca pai yachachishca runaunara cuentangaj . Paiguna yachachishca runaunara rimangaj riushcallai ,

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Jesús paigunara tan tupasha , Cushiyaichi , nica . Paiguna llutarísha paihua chaquira ujllarisha , paita adoranauca .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Ama manzhaichichu . Richi , ñuca uquiunara cuentaichi , Galileama rinauchu . Chihui ricuhuanaungami .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Paiguna riushcallai , huaquinguna soldarounamanda llactama rinauca , sacerdote apuunara cuentangaj tucui ima tucushcaunaras .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Rucuunahua tandarisha rimananausha , ashca cullquira cunauca soldarounama ,

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: Rimaichi , ninauca , Pai yachachishca runauna shamunauca tuta , aichara shuhuasha apanauca ñucanchi puñuriaishcallai .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Gobernadorga caita uyajpi , ñucanchi paihua rimashun cangunara quishpichingaj .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Soldarouna cullquira apisha , paiguna yachachishcasna rimanauca . Cai shimiga uyarica Judiogunahua cuna punzhagama .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Chunga shuj yachachishca runaunaga Galileama rinauca Jesús rimashca urcuma .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Paita ricushaga adoranauca , astaun huaquinguna mana quirinaucachu .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Jesús mayanllayamusha , paigunara rimasha nica : Tucui ushanara ñucama cuhuashcami ahua pachai cai pachais ,

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Chiraigumanda richi , runaunara yachachichi tucui llactaunai , paigunara bautisaichi Yaya shutii , Churi shutii , Santo Espíritu shutiis .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Paigunara tucui ñuca cangunara mandashcaunara huacachingaj yachachichi . Ñucaga cangunahua pariju tiaushami tucui punzhaunai , mundu tucurinagama . Amen .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Diospa Churi Jesucristo rimashca evangelio nishca ali shimi callarin .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Imasnara Diosmanda rimaj Isaías quillcashcai tian : Camba ñaupajma ñuca rimajta cachauni , camba nambira camba ñaupajpi alichingaj .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Runa illashca partimanda caparij casna nin : Diospa nambira alichichi . Paihua nambira dirichuichi , nin .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Runa illashca partii , Juan yacui bautisauca . Shina nisha camachica : Arrepentirichi , bautisarichi , canguna uchamanda perdonai tucungaj .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Tucui Judea partí llactaunai causajguna , tucui Jerusalembi causajgunandi paihuajma shamunauca . Paiguna ucharashcaunara cuentajpi , Jordan yacui Juan paigunara bautisacami .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Juanga camello illmahua ahuashcara churarishca aca , cara chumbillinahua chumbiilishca aca . Atun ijira sacha mishquiras micuj aca .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Pai camachisha : Ñuca huashai , shu ñucamanda yali ushaj shamunmi , nica . Paihua zapatos huascara pascanallas mana pactanichu , nica .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ñucaga cierto pacha cangunara yacui bautisacani , nica . Pai randi Santo Espiritui bautisangami .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Jesús Galilea partii tiaj Nazaret llactamanda shamuca . Jordan yacui Juan paita bautisaca .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Chi ratollai , Jesús yacumanda sicasha , ahua pacha pascarishcara ricuca , Santo Espiritura urpisna paihua ahuai irgumujta ricuca .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ahua pachamanda shu shimi uyarica : Can ñuca llaquishca churimi angui . Canhua cushiyani , nica .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Shinajpi Santo Espíritu Jesusta runa illashca partima cachaca .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Chuscu chunga punzha runa illashca partii tiauca . Satanás nishca supai apu paita tentaca . Milli animalgunahua tiauca . Angelguna paita sirvinauca .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Juanda chonda cularbi ishcashca huasha , Jesús Galilea partima shamuca . Dios mandana pachamanda rimaj evangelio ali shimira camachica .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Horas pactamun , nica , Dios mandana pacha mayanllayamushcami . Arrepentirichi , evangelio ali shimira quirichi , nica .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Galilea lamar patara purijpi , Jesús Simonda ricuca paihua uqui Andresndi . Lamarbi licara shitanauca , aichahuara mascajguna asha .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Catihuaichi . Cangunara runaunara licajgunara cuenta rasha .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Chi horasllaira , licaunara saquisha paita catinauca .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Chimanda pasasha , Jesús ansa ñaupajma riushcai , Zebedeo churi Jacobora ricuca , paihua uqui Juandi . Canoai licara remendasha tianauca .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Chi ratollai Jesús paigunara cayaca . Paiguna Zebedeo yayara canoai saquisha tarabajgunandi , Jesusta catinauca .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Capernaum llactai icunauca . Samana punzha asha , Jesús tandarina huasii icusha yachachica .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Runauna pai yachachishcara uyasha manzharinauca . Ushaihua , mandaj cuenta yachachica , mana yachaira yachachijgunasna .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Paiguna tandarina huasii shu irus supai apishca runa caparisha tiauca .

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: ¿ Imarasha ñucanchira inquitangui , Nazaretmanda Jesús ? nica . ¿ Ñucanchira tucuchingajchu shamushcangui ? Can pi asnearas yachanimi . Diospa Santo Churimi angui .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Jesús paita piñaca : Upalla , nica , llucshi paimanda .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Irus supaiga , runara chucchuchisha , shinzhira caparisha , paimanda llucshica .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Tucui manzharinauca . Paigunapura tapunauca : ¿ Imarai ? nisha , ¿ Ima mushuj yachairairi caiga ? Ushanahua irus supaigunara cachan , llucshinaun .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Entero Galilea partiunai Jesús rashcara uctalla yacharica .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Chimanda huasha , tandarina huasimanda llucshisha , Simomba Andrespa huasima shamunauca , Jacobo Juandis compañanauca .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Simomba huarmi mama ungushca aca , calenturahua . Jesusta cuentanauca .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paihua mayanma shamusha , paihua maquimanda apisha , paita atarichica . Chi ratollai calentura chiriyaca ; huarmi paigunara sirvica .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Tutayajpi , indi icushca huasha , tucui ungushcaunara tucui supai apishcaunaras Jesusma pushamunauca .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Tucui llactai ajguna huasi pungumalla tandarimunauca .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Ima tono ungushcaunaras Jesús ashcara alichicami . Ashca supaigunara pajllama ichuca , rimangaj mana lugarda cuca , supaiguna paita ricsishcamanda .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Tuta ucura atarisha , chara llandu llandu ucura , Jesús llucshisha , pi runas illashca partima rica . Chihui Diosta mañaca .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Simón , paihua pariju tiajgunandi , Jesusta mascanauca .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Jesusta tupasha , paita ninauca : Tucui canda mascanaun .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Acuichi ñucanchi mayan partiunama , chihuis camachingaj . Chihuajmi shamucani .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Tucui Galilea partiunai paiguna tandarina huasiunai camachica , supaigunara ichuca .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Shu llagayuj runa Jesusma shamuca , paihua ñaupajpi cungurisha , rugasha nica : Can munasha , ñucara alichinara ushangui .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Jesús paimanda llaquirisha , maquira chutachisha , paita llangaca . Munanimi , nica , alichishcangui .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Casna rimashca huasha , ungüi chi ratollaira dsas llushpirica paimanda . Alichishca aca .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita dispirisha mandaca :

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Riqui , nisha , ama imaras ama pitas rimanguichu ; randi sacerdotema ringui , can aliyashcara ricuchingaj . Shinallara can aliyashcamanda Moisés camachishca cuyanara cuyangui , can ali tucushcara paigunara ricuchingaj .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Pai randi ña llucshishca huasha yapa rimangaj callarica . Chi rashcara pajlla pambai cuentaca . Shinajpi , Jesús llactai icunara mana ushacachu , randi pajllai tiauca , runa illashca partiunai . Tucui llactaunamanda paihuajma shamunauca .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Ansa punzha huasha Jesús Capernaumbi cuti icuca . Pai huasii tiaushca uyarica .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Chi horasllai ashca runa paihuajma tandarimunauca , huasi pungugama undajta shamunauca . Pai Diospa shimira camachica .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Shinajpi huaquinguna Jesusma shamunauca , shu suchu runara huandusha . Chuscupura tucusha apamunauca .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Ashca runa tiashcamanda . Jesusma pactanara mana ushasha , huasi ahuamanda uctunauca Jesús tiaushcai . Uctura rasha , suchu runara caitundi irguchinauca .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Jesús paiguna quirishcara ricusha , suchu runara nica : Churi , can ucharashcara perdonashcangui .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Huaquin yachaira yachachijguna chihui tianauca , paiguna shungüi piñasha iyarinauca :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: ¿ Imarasha casna riman ? nisha , Diosta camiunmi . ¿ Pita uchara perdonanara ushangairi ? Diosllami ushan .

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Jesús , paihua espiritui riparasha paiguna shungu ucui casna piñashcara , paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha casna piñanguichi canguna shungüi ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: ¿ Imara mas rimanalla anga , suchu runara : Camba uchara perdonashcangui , nisha , paita rimangaj : Atari , camba caitura apasha ri ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Shinajpi canguna yachangaj imasna ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ushanara charinimi cai pachai uchara perdonangaj , Jesús suchura rimaca :

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: Canda nini : Atari , caitura apai , camba huasima ri .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Chi ratollai atarica , paihua caitura apasha , paiguna ñaupajmanda llucshica . Caita ricusha , tucui manzharinauca . Diosta alabanauca : Mana imahoraspas casnara ricushcanchichu , nisha .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Cuti Jesús lamar patama rica . Tucui runauna paihuajma shamunauca . Paigunara yachachica .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Jesusga ri pasausha , Alfeo churi Levi nishcara ricuca . Levi gobierno cullquira tandachina huasÜ tiauca . Jesús paita : Catihuai , nica . Atarisha caticami .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Jesús Levi huasu tiausha , ashca cullquira tandachijguna ashca uchayujgunas mesai tiarinauca Jesushua pariju , pai yachachishca runaunandi . Ashca runauna paita catimunauca .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Jesús cullquira tandachijgunandi uchayujgunandi micuca . Yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi Jesús casna micuuta ricusha , pai yachachishca runaunara ninauca : ¿ Imarai ? ¿ Imarasha cullquira tandachijgunahua uchayujgunahua micunri ?

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Jesús caita uyasha , paigunara nica : Ali ajguna ambijta mana ministinaun , astaun ungushcauna . Alira rajgunara cayangaj mana shamucanichu astaun uchayujgunara .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Juan yachachishca runauna fariseoguna yachachishca runaunas sasinauca . Jesusma shamusha ninauca : ¿ Imarasha Juan yachachishca runauna fariseoguna yachachishca runaunas sasinaun , randi can yachachishca runauna mana sasinaun ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Borai , cari ñaupajpi tiajguna sasinaungachu ? Carindi pariju tiausha , sasinara mana ushanaungachu .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Huashaga , carira quichuna punzha pactamunga . Chi punzhaunaí sasinaungami .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Mana pihuas rucu churanara mushuj llachapahua remendanzhu . Shina rajpi mushuj llachapa rucura cuti lliquinga . Churana astaun lliquirishca tucunga .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Shinallara mana pihuas mushuj vinora churanzhu rucu cara bolsai . Shina rajpi cara lliquiringa , vino taliringa . Mushuj vino mushuj cara purui churana anga .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Jesús samana punzhai shu tarpushca chagrara pasauca . Pai yachachishca runauna pasajpiga , trigo papajta aisangaj callarinauca .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Shinajpi fariseoguna paita ninauca : Riqui , ¿ imarasha samana punzhai mana raihuajta ranaun ?

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Mana imahoras Quillcai ricucanguichu imara rarca David paita compañajgunandi paiguna ministiushcai , paiguna yarcachiushcai ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu ricucangui imasnara David Diospa huasii icusha , Abiatar nishca Diospa sacerdote apu ashcai , Diosma ricuchina tandara pai paihua compañajgunandi micunauca , cai tanda Diosta sirvijgunalla micuna ajta ?

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Shinallara Jesús paigunara nica : Samana punzha runajta rashca aca , randi runauna mana ranaushcachu aca samana punzhajta .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Casna ajpi , ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , samana punzhahua Señormi ani .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Cuti Jesús tandarina huasii icuca ; chihui shu chaquirishca maquiyuj runa tiauca .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Chihui tiajguna paita chapanauca , samana punzha ungushcara alichingachu nisha ricungaj , paita causayachingaj .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús chaquirishca maquiyuj runara : Atarisha , chaupi shungüi shayari , nica .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Samana punzhai alira manalira rana ? ¿ Imara ali anga , causachingaj , huañuchingaj ? Paigunaga chunllayanauca .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Jesús paihua shungüi piñarisha , muyujta ricuca . Paiguna shungu shinzhiyashcara llaquirisha , runara nica : Maquira chutachi . Paihua maquira chutachijpi alichishca aca .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Shinajpi , fariseoguna llucshisha herodianos nishcaunahua rimananauca Jesusta huañuchingaj .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Jesusga , pai yachachishca runaunandi , lamar patama anzhurica . Ashca runa Galileamanda Judeamandas catimunauca .

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Shinallara Jerusalenmanda , Idumeamanda , Jordan chimbamanda , Tiro partimandas , Sidón partimandas ashca runa Jesuspajma shamunauca , pai atun rashcaunara uyasha .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara rimaca shu canoa puruntushcara charinauchu , ashca runauna tiashcamanda , ama paita nitinauchu .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Ashca runaunara alichishcamanda , tucui ungüiyujguna paihuajma nitimunauca llangangaj .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Irus supaiguna paita ricusha , paihua ñaupajpi tuama urmanauca : Canmi Diospa Churi angui , nisha .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Jesús paigunara mandaca paita ama ricsichinauchu .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Huasha , Jesús urcuma sicaca . Pai munashca runaunara paihuajma cayaca . Shamunaucami .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Chunga ishquira ajllaca paihua pariju tiangaj , paigunara camachingaj cachangaj ,

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: ungüigunara alichina ushaira charingaj , supaigunara ichungajpas .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Simonda cayaca . Mushuj shutira Pedro nishcara churaca .

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Jacobo paihua uqui Juandi , Zebedeo churiunara , cayaca . Paigunara Boanerges nishcauna shutichica . Caimi Rayo Churiuna nishca .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Shujgunara : Andrés , Felipe , Bartolomé , Mateo , Tomás , Alfeo churi Jacobo , Tadeo , cananista Simón nishcaunaras cayaca .

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Shinallara Judas Iscariote nishcaras , Jesusta apuuna maquima entregajta , cayaca . Huasima shamunauca .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Ashca runauna cuti tandarimunauca ; paiguna shamushcamanda Jesús paihua tiajgunandi micungaj mana ushanaucachu .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Jesuspa aillu caita uyasha , paita apingaj shamunauca , loco tucushcami , nisha .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Jerusalenmanda shamuj yachaira yachachijguna ninauca : Beelzebú nishca supai apu paihua shungüi tian . Shinallara , supai apumanda supaigunara pajllama ichun , ninauca .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Jesús paigunara cayasha , yachachingaj cuentanaunahua rimaca : ¿ Imasna rasha Satanás nishca supai apu Satanasllara ichunara ushangachu ? nisha .

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Ima llactas chaupirisha , paigunapuralla macananausha , cai llacta mana durangachu .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Shinallara ima huasii tiaj aillu chaupirisha , paigunapuralla macananausha , cai aillu mana durangachu .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Satanaspas paulara macanausha chaupirisha , shayarinara mana ushangachu ; randi pai tucurina pactamushcami .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Pihuas shu shinzhi runa huasimanda pai charishcara shuhuanara mana ushangachu manara paita huatajllaira . Huatai pasasha shuhuanara ushangami huasimanda .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Cierto pacha nini : Runaunama tucui uchara perdonashca anga . Ima sami camisha rimashcaras perdonashca anga .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Randi , pihuas Santo Espiritura camisha , mana imahoras perdonashcachu anga , astaun huiñaigama causayuj anga .

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Jesús cai shimira rimaca , paiguna : Irus supaiyujmi , nishcamanda .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Huashaga Jesuspa uquiunandi mamandi shamunauca , canzhai chapausha . Paita cayangaj cachanauca .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Pai muyujta tiau runauna paita ninauca : Camba mama camba uquiuna canzhai aj , canda mascanaun .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : ¿ Pitai ñuca mama , ñuca uquiuna ?

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Muyujta tiaugunara ricusha nica : Caimi ñuca mama , ñuca uquiuna .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Maicans Diospa munaira rau , paimi ñuca uqui , ñuca pañi , ñuca mama , nica .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Cutillara Jesús lamar patai yachachingaj callarica . Paihuajma ashca runauna tandarimunauca . Chiraigumanda , canoai icusha lamarbi tiarica . Randi tucui runauna pulayai tianauca lamar rayai .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Yachachingaj cuentanaunahua ashcara yachachica . Jesús pai yachachiushcai nica :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: Uyaichi , nisha , shu tarpuj runa tarpungaj llucshica .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Pai tarpujpiga , huaquin muyuuna ñambi rayai urmanauca . Pishcuuna shamusha llambura micunauca .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Huaquin muyuunaga allpa illaj rumi pambai urmanauca . Allpa pishishcamanda uctalla iñanauca .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Indi llucshimujpi rupaca . Angu illashcamanda chaquirica .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Huaquin muyuunaga cashaunai urmanauca . Casha itayasha , muyuuna chingarisha , mana aparinaucachu .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Randi shu muyuuna ali allpai urmanauca . Ali ahuara iñasha aparica , caran muyu quinsa chunga , socta chunga , patsac muyura cusha .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús nica : Uyana rinriyuj uyachu .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Sapalla tucujpí , mayambi ajguna paihua chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunandi pai rimashca yachachina cuentanamanda tapunauca .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cangunaga , Dios mandana pacha pacashca shimira yachanguichimi . Randi canzhai ajgunara yachachina cuentanaunahua tucuira yachachina anga ;

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: ricusha ama ricsinauchu , uyasha ama intindinauchu , ama tigranauchu ucharashcara perdonai tucungaj .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Cai yachachina cuentanara manzhu intindinguichi ? ¿ Imasna rasha tucui yachachina cuentanaunara intindingachu raunguichi ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Tarpuj runaga ñuca shimira tarpun .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Ñambi rayai urmajguna caigunami : Shimira tarpushca huasha , uctalla supai apu uyashcara quichuj shamun paiguna shungumanda .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Shinallara rumi pambai tarpushcauna , shimira uyasha , uctalla cushihua Diospa shimira chasquinaun .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Randi , angu illajpi mana duranaun . Shimira apishcamanda llaqui tucusha , tormendachi tucusha , nijtasha urmanaun .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Caimi casha ucui urmajguna . Shimira uyanaun ,

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: randi cai pachai tormendosmanda , cullquira munashcamanda umachisha , imaunaras munasha , uyashca shimi huañun , mana aparin .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Ali allpai urmajguna shimira uyanaun , uyashcara chasquinaun , aparinaun , huaquinguna quinsa chungagama mirasha , huaquinguna socta chungagama , huaquinguna patsacgama .

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Shinallara Jesús paigunara rimaca : ¿ Tasa ucui velara churanachu ? ¿ Caitu ucui churanachu ? ¿ Manzhu ricunallai churanami ?

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Tucui pacashca pajllai tucungami ; tucui mana ricushca pajllai ricuringami .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Maicambas uyana rinrira charisha uyachu .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Shinallara paigunara nica : Ricuichi uyashcara . Canguna tupushca tupullara shujguna cangunara tupunaunga , yapasha .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Maican charijpi , paima cushca anga ; randi mana charijmanda pai ima charishcahuaras astaun quichushca anga .

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Shinallara Jesús nica : Casnami Dios mandana pacha : Imasna shu runa muyura allpai tarpun .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Runaga tuta puñun , punzha atarin . Muyuga llucshin , iñan . Imasna iñashcaras pai mana yachanzhu .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Allpa paulara apachin : ñaupa quihuara . huasha papajta , papajpi muyuhua undarin .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Ña muyu pucujpi , saulihua pitin , pallana horas pactamushcamanda .

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Shinallara Jesús nica : ¿ Dios mandana pacha imahua ricuchina angai ? ¿ Ima yachachingaj cuentanahua ricuchishun ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Dios mandana pacha shu mostaza muyu cuentami . Allpai tarpushcai tucui cai pachai tiaj muyumanda yali ichillami .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Tarpushca huasha , tucui yuraunamanda yali iñan ; atun pallcayuj tucun . Shinajpi , yura llandu ucui pisheuuna samanara ushanaunga .

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Casna yachachingaj cuentanaunahua Diospa shimira ashcara cuentaca , paiguna uyana tupura .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Yachachingaj cuentanaunahua mana rimasha , mana cuentacachu . Pai yachachishca runaunaraga chicambi tucuira pajlla pambai yachachica .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Chi punzhallaira tutayajpi , Jesús paigunara nica : Acuichi chimbama .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Runaunamanda dispirishca huasha , yachachishca runauna pai tiaushca canoallaira Jesusta pushanauca . Paihua pariju shu ichilla canoauna rinauca .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Shinzhi huaira atarisha , tsajlas shitashcamanda canoa pambariuca .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Jesusga canoa siquii aj saunai puñusha sirica . Paita llicchachinauca , Yachachij , nisha , ¿ ñucanchi huañungaraushcara manzhu ricunguiri ?

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Jesús shayarisha huairara piñaca , lamardas rimasha nica : Upalla , chunllayai . Huaira shinalla pasarica , tucui ali chunlla tucuca .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha manzhanguichi ? ¿ Imaraigu mana quiringuichi ?

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Ashca manzharishcahua paigunapura rimanauca : Caiga , ¿ pitairi ? nisha . Huairas lamarbas paita uyanaun .

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Lamar chimbama Gadarenos nishcauna partima Jesús pai yachachishca runaunandi shamunauca .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Paiga canoamanda llucshishca ratollai , aya huasiunamanda shu irus supai apishca runa paigunara tupangaj llucshimuca .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Cai supai apishca runa aya huasiunai causaca . Mana pihuas paita huatanara ushacachu , ima iru huascahuas .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Ashca cuti iru huascahua huatashca aca maquiras chaquiras . Maqui huatashcara dsas dsas aisaca ; chaqui huatashcara piti piti rarca . Mana pihuas paita vencinara ushacachu .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Tucui horas , tutandi punzhandi , aya huasiunais urcuunais caparisha puricachaj aca . Rumiunahua chugrichisha causaca .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Jesusta carumanda ricusha , paihuajma callpasha shamuca , paihua ñaupajpi cungurica .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: Shinzhira caparisha nica : Jesús , atun Diospa Churi , ¿ imarasha ñucara inquitangui ? Diosmanda , ama tormendachihuaichu .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Supai casna caparica , Jesús : Irus supai , cai runamanda llucshi , nisha rimashcamanda .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Jesús paita tapuca : ¿ Ima shutirangui ? nisha . Huaranga nishca ani , nica ñucanchi ashca supaipura ashcamanda .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Jesusta ashcara rugaca : Ama cai partimanda cachahuaichu , nisha .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Chi urcu mayanllai , shu atun cuchi monton micusha tianauca .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Tucui supaiguna Jesusta ruganauca : Cuchiunama cachahuai icungaj . nisha .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Jesús lugarda cuca . Irus supaiguna llucshisha , cuchiunai icunauca . Cuchi montonga peñasmanda lamarbi urmasha , chucasha huañunauca . Ishqui huaranga tupu anauca .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Cuchira cuirajguna miticunauca . Llactais , maita purishas , cuentanauca . Uyajguna casna tucushcara ricungaj llucshinauca .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Jesuspajma pactamusha , huaranga supaiguna tormendachishca runara ricunauca . Paita tiarishca , churarishca , ali iyaiyuj tiauta ricusha , manzharinauca .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Ricujguna shamujgunara cuentanauca imasna supaiyujta alichishca aca . Shinallara cuchiunahua tucushcara rimanauca .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Dueñouna Jesusta paiguna llactamanda llucshichu nisha rugangaj callarinauca .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Jesús canoai icuupi , pai alichishca runa paita rugaca : Lugarda cuhuai , nisha , canhua tiangaj .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Jesusga lugarda mana cucachu . Randi nica : Camba huasima ri , camba ailluma . Paigunara Dios atun rashcara cuentangui , imasna Dios canda llaquishcami .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Pai ricami , Decápolis nishca partii Jesús atun rashcaunara , paita alichishcaras rimangaj callarica . Tucui manzharinauca .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Jesús chimbamanda artillara canoai tigramuca . Ashca runa paita muyujta tandarimunauca . Paiga lamar patai tiauca .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Shu Jairo nishca runa , judioguna tandarina huasimanda apu , shamuca . Jesusta ricusha , paihua chaquii tuama urmaca .

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: Pai Jesusta ashcara rugaca : Ñuca ushushihua ali huañuira huañun , nica . Shamupai , camba maquira paihua ahuai churapangui paita ahchingaj , pai causangaj , nica .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Jesús apuhua rica . Ashca runauna catisha paita nitinauca .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Shu huarmi chunga ishqui huata paihua ungüihua ungüilla causaca .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Ambijgunamanda ashca tormendachishca aca ; pai tucui charishcara gastaca . Paiga mana aliyashcachu aca , astaun mas ungushca tucuca .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Cai huarmi Jesús rashcaunara uyasha , runa montombi pactamusha , huashamanda Jesuspa churanara llangaca .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Huarmiga nica : Ñuca paihua churanallais llangasha aliyashami .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Cungaimanda yahuar saquirica ; paihua aichai ali tucushcara riparaca .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús , ursa paihuajmanda ilucshishcara ricsisha , runaunama tigrarisha nica : ¿ Pita ñuca churanara llangacachu ?

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Pai yachachishca runauna paita ninauca : ¿ Manzhu ricungui imasna runauna nitimurinaun ? ¿ Imarasha ningui : Pita llangahuaca ?

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Paiga casna rajta ricsingaj muyujta ricuca .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Shinajpi cai huarmi pai alichishcara yachasha , manzhasha chucchusha shamuca , Jesuspa ñaupajpi tuama urmasha tucuira paita cuentaca .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Jesús nica : Ushushi , can quirishcamanda aliyashcangui . Ahila ringui , camba ungiiimanda llushpirishca tucungui .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Jesús chara rimaushcai huaquinguna apu huasimanda shamusha apuma ninauca : Camba ushushi ña huañushcami , ¿ imarasha Yachachijta yanga molestangui ?

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Jesús paiguna rimashcara mana casusha tandarina huasimanda apura nica : Ama manzhaichu . Quirilla .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Pitas mana lugarda cucachu paihua catingaj . Pedro , Jacobo paihua uqui Juandillara lugarda cuca catingaj .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Apu huasima pactamuca . Jesús chihui ajguna nusparishcara ricuca , huacashcara caparishcaras uyaca .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Jesús icusha paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha uyaringuichi , huacaunguichi ? Huahua mana huañushcachu , puñunllami .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Jesusta burlasha asinauca . Pai randi tucuira canzhama cachaca . Jesusga yayandi mamandi pai pushamushcaunandi huahua siriushcai icunauca .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Huahuara maquimanda apisha , Jesús nica : Talita cumi . Caita runa shimii nin : Ushushihua , atari nini .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Chi ratollai huahua atarisha puringaj callarica . Huahuaga chunga ishqui huatayuj aca . Chihui tiajguna ashcara manzharinauca .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Ama pimas cuentanguichichu , nica . Huahuara carangui , nisha rimaca .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
