text2: Chi partimanda llucshisha Jesús paihua quiquin llactama shamuca . Pai yachachishca runauna catimunauca .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Samana punzhai judioguna tandarina huasii yachachingaj callarica . Ashca uyajguna manzharisha ninauca : ¿ Paihua ushanara maimanda charingai ? ¿ Cai paima cushca yachai imarai ? ¿ Imarai caiguna paihua maquihua rashca sumaj atun rashcauna ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Paiga , ¿ manzhu carpintero runa ? ¿ Manzhu María churi ? ¿ Manzhu Jacobo , José , Judas , Simón nishcauna paihua uquiuna ? ¿ Manzhu paihua paniuna caibi ñucanchihua tianaun ? Paimanda piñarinauca .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Maican Diosmanda rimaj llaquishca anga , astaun paihua aillullai paihua huasillai mana ali ricushca anga .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Chi llactaiga mana ima sumaj ranaunara ushacachu . Huaquin ungushcaunallara maquira churasha alichicami .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Jesús paiguna mana quirishcara ricusha llaquirica . Mayan llactaunara pasiasha yachachica .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Chi huasha pai chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunara cayasha , ishqui ishquira caran partira cachaca . Irus supaigunara callpachina ushaira cuca .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Ñambijta ama imaras apanguichichu , nica . Taunallara apanguichi , nica . Bolsaras tandaras cullquiras ama apanguichichu .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Chaquii zapatosllara churaringuichi . Ishqui churanara ama apanguichichu .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Imahoras shu huasii icusha , chi llactamanda liucshingagama chi huasillai tiaunguichi .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Imahoras cangunara mana chasquinaupi , mana uyanaupi , chi llactamanda llucshiusha canguna chaquimanda polvora chausinguichi , paiguna mana chasquishcara ricuchingaj . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , taripana punzhai Sodoma Gomorra nishca runauna livachishca tupu chi llactai ajguna livachishcamanda pishi angami .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Paiguna llucshisha runaunara camachinauca : Arrepentirichi , huanaríchi , nisha .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Shinallara ashca supaigunara ichunauca ; ashca ungushcaunara aceitera uma ahuai talisha alichinauca .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Jesuspa shuti yapa uyarishcamanda , Herodes rey apu pai rashcaunara uyasha , nica : Caimi bautisaj Juan anga ; huañushcamanda causarisha cai sumaj ushanaunara raun .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Shujguna : Elíasmi ninauca . Shujguna randi : Paimi shu Diosmanda rimaj yachin , ñaupa rimajguna cuenta .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Caita uyasha , Herodes nica : Caimi uma pitisha huañuchishca Juan anga . Paiga huañushcaunamanda causarishcami .

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Ñaupaga Herodes cachasha Juanda apica . Paita huatasha chonda cularbi ishcaca , Herodías nishca rimashcamanda . Herodíasga paihua uqui Felipe huarmi aca , randi Herodes paita apica .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Juan Herodesta nica : Mana raihuajchu camba uqui huarmira charingaj .

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Herodías Juanda chijnica , paita huañuchinara munaca , randi mana ushacachu .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Herodesga Juanda manzhaca . Pai ali shungu , ali causaj ashcara ricsisha , paita huacachica . Herodes paita uyasha manzharica , munaihua paita uyaca .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Herodes pagarishca punzha pactarijpi , paimi istara rarca apuunandi capitangunandi , Galileamanda valij runaunandi .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Istai Herodíaspa ushushi icuca . Bailasha , Herodesta paihua mesai tiajgunandi cushiyachica . Shinajpi Herodes ushushira nica : Can munashcara mañahuai . Cushcangui .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Herodes Diospa shutii rimasha nica : Tucui can mañashcara cushcangui . Ñuca rey apu chariushca chaupi allpagama cushcangui . nica .

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Ushushi llucshisha paihua mamara tapuca : ¿ Imara mañashachu ? nisha . Paihua mama rimaca : Bautisaj Juamba umara mañangui , nica .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Uctalla ushushi rey apu ñaupajma icusha : Cunallara Bautisaj Juamba umara pitisha , pulatoi churasha cuhuai , nica . Shina nisha mañaca .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Rey apu caita uyasha yapa llaquirica . Randi pai Diospa shutii rimashcamanda , mesai tiajgunamandas , Mana nisha rimanara mana munacachu .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Chi ratollai rey apu soldarora Juamba umara pitisha apamungaj cachaca .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Cai soldaro chonda cularbi icusha , umara pitisha , pulatoi churasha apamuca . Umara ushushima cuca , pai randi mamama cuca .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Juan yachachishca runauna paita huañuchishcara uyasha shamunauca . Paihua aichara apasha , aya huasii pambanauca .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Jesús cachashca runauna paihuajma tandarisha tucuira cuentanauca . Paiguna tucui rashcaunara paiguna yachachishcaras cuentanauca .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Runa illashca partima shamichi ansa samangaj . Paiguna tiaushcai pasamujguna shamushcamanda micungajllas lugarda mana charinaucachu .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Canoai icusha runa illaj partima paigunalla rinauca .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Paiguna riushcara ashca runauna ricunauca , Jesustas ricsinauca . Chaquihua purijguna llactaunamanda chillai tandarimunauca . Jesusguna manara pactamushcaira chima shamunauca .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Jesús canoamanda llucshisha , ashca runaunara ricuca . Paigunamanda llaquirica , paiguna cuiraj illaj borregounasna asha . Paigunara ashcara yachachingaj callarica .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Ña tutayaupi , Jesús yachachishca runauna paima shamunauca : Cai llactaga huasi illaj nisha , tutayaunmi .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Runaunara dispiringui , ninauca mayan llactaunama rinauchu , tandara randinauchu . Caibi micunara mana charinaunzhu .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipasha nica : Cangunalla runaunara caranguichi . Paiguna randi : ¿ Ishqui patsaj cullqui tupu tandara randij rishun runaunara carangaj ? tapunauca .

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Jesús paigunara : ¿ Masna tandara charinguichi ? nica . Ricui richi . Yachajpi , pichca tandandi ishqui challuandi , charinchi , ninauca .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Paigunara verde quihua ahuai montombi montombi tiarichichi , nica .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Montombi tiarinauca ; shu montombi pichca chunga , shu montombi pichca chunga .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pichca tandandi ishqui challuandi maquii apisha , ahuama ricusha , bendiciaca . Tandara paquisha yachachishca runaunama cuca , tucuima carangaj . Ishquindi challuaras paquisha caranma cunauca .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Tucui amijta micunauca .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Tanda puchuunara chunga ishqui suru tasa tupura pallanaucami , challuamanda puchuunandi .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Micujguna pichca huaranga tupu cariuna aca .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Chi ratollaira Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara : Canoai icuichi , nica . Ñuca runaunara dispiringagama , ñucamanda ñaupa Betsaida llactama chimbaichi .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Runaunara dispirishca huasha Jesús urcuma rica Diosta mañangaj .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Chishi llanduyanara canoa chaupi lamarbi tiauca . Jesús sapalla yacu patai shayarica .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Huaira shujpurama apaupi , shinzhira cahuirianauca . Jesús paiguna sambayashcara ricuca . Punzhayanara Jesús yacu ahuara purisha paigunama shamuca , ñaupasha pasajsna .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Paiguna Jesusta yacu ahuara puriuta ricusha , Ayami , nisha caparinauca .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Tucui paita ricusha turbarinauca . Uctalla Jesús paigunara rimaca : Cushiyaichi , nisha , ñuca maní , ama manzhaichichu .

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Paigunajma canoai sicaca . Huaira saquirica . Ashca manzhaihua manzharinauca .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Tandara mirachishcara chara mana intindinauca , paiguna shungu shinzhiyashcaraigu .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Chimbai pasashca huasha , Genesaret partima shamunauca ; pulayama llutarinauca .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Paiguna canoamanda Ilucshijpi , chihui tiajguna Jesusta ricsinauca .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Entero llacta partiuna muyujta purisha , ungushcaunara apamui callarinauca huanduunai , Jesús maibi tiaushcaras uyasha .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Maitas pai puriushca , mai llactaunai , mai partiunais , ungushcaunara ñambiunai churanauca . Paihua churana pundahuallais llangangaj ruganauca . Casna rasha tucui llangajguna aliyanauca .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Fariseogunandi huaquin yachaira yachachijgunandi Jerusalenmanda shamujguna , Jesusma llutarimunauca .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Paigunaga Jesús yachachishca runaunara maquira mana maillasha tandara micuuta ricusha causayachinauca .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: Fariseoguna tucui judiogunandi rucuuna yachaira catisha , maquira mana ali maillasha mana micujguna aca .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Pulasamanda tigramusha mana maillasha mana micunaun . Ashca shu mandashca shimiunara charinauca huacachingaj . Shinallara paiguna yachaira tucui upina cuya , tucui quisa , tucui iru manga , tucui caitu , tucuira maillajguna aca .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Fariseoguna yachaira yachachijgunandi Jesusta tapunauca : ¿ Imarasha can yachachishca runauna rucuuna camachishcasna mana purinaun , randi maquira mana maillasha micunaun ? nisha .

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipaca : Ishqui shimiyujguna , alimi cangunamanda ñaupa horas rimaca Isaías , pai quillcashcasna : Cai runauna shimillahua llaquihuanaun ; astaumbas paiguna shungu ñucamanda carui tiaun .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Yangami ñucara ahuayachinaun ; runauna mandashcaunara Dios camachishcasna yachachisha .

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Dios camachishca shimira saquisha , runa rimashca shimiunara huacachinguichi : quisaunara maillasha , upina cuyaunara maillasha , shinallara imaras ranguichi .

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Jesús shinallara nicami : Cierto pacha Dios camachishca shimira mana valijta ranguichi , canguna yachaira huacachingaj .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Moisés rimacami : Camba yayara camba mamara llaquina mangui . Maicans paihua yayara mamara chijnisha rimasha , shu rai huañungami .

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: Randi canguna rimanguichi : Shu runa paihua yayara mamara rimasha , Tucui ñuca charishcara canda valirinaunara Diosma cushcami , nisha ,

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: yayara mamara yanapangaj ña lugarda mana cunguichichu .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Shina rasha Diospa shimira mana valijta ranguichi canguna yachaihua . Ashcaunara shina samira ranguichi .

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Jesús tucui tandarijgunara cayasha rimaca : Uyahuaichi , intindihuaichi , nisha .

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Pajllamanda runai icuj mana huajlichin , randi paiguna iyaimanda llucshij , caita runara cierto pacha huajlichin .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Maicambas uyana rinrira charisha uyachu .

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Jesús runaunamanda anzhurisha , huasii icusha , chihuimi pai yachachishca runauna pai yachachingaj cuentanamanda tapunauca .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Paigunara rimaca : ¿ Canguna shinallara mana intindinguichichu ? ¿ Manzhu ricsinguichi pajllamanda runai icuj mana huajlichinzhu ?

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Pajllamanda icuj mana shungüi icun , astaumbas icsai icusha ismana huasima pasan . Shina nisha tucui aichara ali micunalla rarca .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Astaumbas , nica , runamanda llucshij iyaiguna , caiguna runara huajlichin .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Runa shungu ucumandaga manali iyaiguna , shujhua tacarinauna , uchalinauna , runara huañuchinauna llucshinaun .

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: Shinallara llucshinaun : Shuhuanauna , cullquira yapa muñanauna , manali ranauna , umachina , irus iyai , chijnina , camina , mas tucuisiqui iyai , mana racional iyaiguna .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Shungu ucumanda cai tucui irusguna llucshinaun , runara huajlichinaun .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Chimanda atarisha , Tiro Sidón nishca llactaunama rica . Shu huasii icusha , pis caita ama yachanauchu munaca . Paulara pacanara mana ushacachu .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Shu huarmi , paihua ushushihua irus supaira charisha , Jesús pactamushcara uyasha , shamusha paihua chaquii tuama urmacami .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Griego huarmi aca , Sirofenecia partimanda . Paiga Jesusta rugasha nica : Ñuca ushushimanda supaira ichupai .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ñaupara sajsanauchu churiuna . Mana valinzhu churiuna tandara apisha ichilla allcuunama shitangaj .

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Huarmiga cutipasha nica : Ari , Señor , randi mesa ucui tiaj allcuhuauna churiuna micushcamanda urmaj puchuhuaunara micunaun .

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita rimaca : Caita rimashcamanda , canda : Ri , nini , camba ushushimanda supai ña llucshishcami .

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Huarmi paihua huasima pactajpi , ushushimanda supai llucshishcara tupaca . Ushushi caitui siriuca .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Jesús Tiro llactamanda tigramusha , Sidón llactara pasasha , Galilea lamarma pactamuca . Decápolis nishca partí chaupi shungura pasaca .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Shu upa rinriyuj upa shimiyuj runara paihuajma pushamunauca . Camba maquira paihua ahuai churapai , rugasha ninauca .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Paita runaunamanda chicanma pushasha , Jesús rerounara rinri uctui satica , tiucasha paihua callura llangaca .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Ahua pachama ricusha , Jesús llaquirica : Efata , nica . Caitaga runa shimii , Pascarichu , nin .

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Chi ratollaira paihua rinris paihua huatashca callus pascaricami , alimi rimaca .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Pitas ama cuentanguichichu nisha camachica . Paigunara caita mas mandajpi astaun mas uyachinauca .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Paiguna ashcara manzharinauca , casna nisha : Pai tucuira alirami rashca . Upa rinriuna uyanaun , upa shimiuna rimanaun .

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Chi punzhaunai ashca runauna tianauca . Micunara mana charinaucachu . Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara cayasha nica :

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: Cai tucui runaunamanda llaquirini , nica . Ña quinsa punzha ñucahua tiasha mana micunaun .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Yarcaira cachajpi paiguna huasiunama , ñambii desmayarinaungami . Huaquinguna carumanda shamunaushca .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Pai yachachishca runauna cutipanauca : ¿ Cai tucuira maimanda tandara carangaj ushashun casna illaj partii ?

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús tapuca : ¿ Masna tandara charinguichi ? Paiguna cutipasha : Canzhista , ninauca .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Chi tucui runaunara allpai tiaringaj rimaca . Chi canzhis tandara apisha , Diosta agrasishca huasha , paquisha , pai yachachishca runaunama cuca , runauna ñaupajpi churangaj . Shina rasha churanaucami runauna ñaupajpi .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Shinallara ansa yacu aichahuaunara charinauca . Bendiciashca huasha runauna ñaupajpi churangaj rimaca .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Sajsajta micunauca . Puchuunara pallanaucami canzhis tasa tupura .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Micujguna chuscu huaranga tupu anauca . Jesús paigunara dispirica .

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunandi canoai icusha , Dalmanuta partima shamunauca .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Fariseoguna paihuajma shamunauca . Jesushua rimananauca : Ahua pachamanda ricurinara ricuchihuai , nisha , paita tentangaj .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Jesús paihua shungüi llaquirisha nica : ¿ Imarasha ahua pachamanda ricurinara ricuchihuai , ninguichi ? Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Mana ima ricurinaras ahua pachamanda ricuchishca anga cai horas ajgunama .

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Paigunara saquisha cutillara canoai icusha chimba partima rica .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Tandara apañara cungarisha rinaushca aca . Shu tandahuallara paigunahua canoai charinauca .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Jesús paigunara rimaca : Iyaihua puringuichi fariseoguna tandara punguich ' na polvo samimanda , Herodespa tandara punguichina polvo samimanda .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Paigunapura rimananauca : Tandara mana apamushcaraigu casnami riman .

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: Jesusga paiguna rimaushcara intindisha nin : ¿ Imara rimaunguichi cangunapura , tandara mana charishcamanda ? ¿ Mana riparanguichi , mana intindinguichi ? ¿ Chara canguna shungura shinzhiyashcara charinguichi ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: ¿ Ñahuira charishallara mana ricunguichi ? ¿ Rinrira charíshaliara mana uyanguichi ? ¿ Manzhu iyaringuichi ?

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: Ñuca pichca tandara partiushca horas pichca huaranga runauna chaupii , ¿ puchuunara masna tasahuara undaita pallacanguichi ? Paiguna cutipanauca : Chunga ishquira .

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Chishu horas canzhis tandara chuscu huaranga runa chaupii particani . ¿ Masna atun tasara undajta puchuunara pallacanguichi ? Paiguna : Canzhista , cutipanauca .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha charajpas mana intindinguichichu ?

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: Jesús Betsaida llactama pactamuca . Paihuajma shu ñausa runara pushamunauca . Llangapai nisha ruganauca .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Shinajpi ñausa runara maquimanda apisha llacta huashama pushaca . Jesús ñausa runa ñahui muyui tiucasha maquira paihua ahuai churasha tapuca : ¿ Imaras ricunguichu ? nisha .

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Paiga ñahuira atarichisha ricuca : Runaunara ricunimi , nica , purij yuraunasna .

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Chi ratollaira Jesús cutillara maquira paihua ñahuii churajpi , runa ali ricuca . Alichishca aca . Tucuira carama pajlla pambai ricucami .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Jesús paita : Camba huasima ri , nisha cachaca . Llactai ama icunguichu , llactai ama pitas rimanguichu , nica .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunandi llucshisha , Cesárea de Filipo llacta muyujta ichilla llactaunama rica . Ñambii pai yachachishca runaunara tapuca : ¿ Pimi nishara iyanaun ñucara , runauna ? nica .

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Paiguna cutipanauca : Huaquinguna Bautisaj Juan , ninaun ; huaquinguna Elias ; shujguna shu Diosmanda rimaj , ninaun .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús tapuca : ¿ Cangunaga , pimi nishara iyahuanguichi ? Pedro paima cutipasha : Canmi Cristo angui , nica .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Jesús paigunama rimaca : Pitas caita ama uyachinguichi , nisha .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Jesús paigunara yachachingaj callarica : Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ashca tormendarina ministirinmi , nisha ; rucuuna , sacerdote apuuna , yachaira yachachijguna ñucara ichusha , huañuchihuanaunga ; quinsa punzha huashaga causarishami .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Jesús caita pajlla pambai rimaca . Shinajpi Pedro paita shu partima pushasha nanajta rimai callarica .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Jesús voltiarisha , pai yachachishca runaunara ricusha , Pedrora piñaca : Ñucamanda anzhuri , Satanás , nisha , Diospajgunara mana ricungui , astaumbas runajgunaüara ricungui .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Tucui runaunara pai yachachishca runaunandi cayasha , Jesús paigunara nica : Pihuas ñucallara catisha nisha , Mana imaschu ani nichu ; paihua cruzta aparisha ñucara catimuchu .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Maicans paihua causaira quishpichisha nisha , causaira pirdingami . Randi maicambas paihua causaira pirdisha ñucaraigumanda , evangelio ali shimimandas , paihua causaira quishpichingami .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: ¿ Imajta valingai runara entero mundura ganashas astaun paihua almara pirdijpi ?

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: ¿ Ima paganaras cungai shu runa paihua almamanda ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Maican runas ñucamandas ñuca shimimandas pingarijpi cai tacarisiqui ucharaisiqui horasgunai , ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , shinallara paimanda pingarishami ñuca shamuna horas ñuca Yaya sumajhua santo angelgunahua shamushcai .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Shinallara rimaca : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , huaquinguna caibi tiajguna manara huañujllaira Dios mandana pachara ushanahua shamushcara ricunaungami .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Socta punzha huasha , Jesús Pedrora Jacoboras Juandas paiguna sapallara ahua urcuma pushaca . Paiguna ñaupajpi Jesús shu tono ricurica .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Paihua churana sumaj chiujlla tucuca , rasu cuenta yurajmi ricurica . Mana maicans cai pachai tacsaj chi tupura yurajyachina ushanmachu aca .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Elias Moisesndi ricurimunauca , Jesushua cuentanausha .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro Jesusta rimasha : Yachachij , nica , alimi ñucanchi caibi saquirishun . Quinsa huasihuara rashunchi ; cambajta shuj , Moisespajta shuj , Eliaspajta shuj .

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Pai rimashcara mana yachaca . Manzharisha tianauca .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Shu puyu shamusha llanducami . Puyumanda shu shimi rimashca uyarica : Caimi ñuca llaquishca Churi , nisha , paita uyaichi .

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Chi ratollaira , runauna cuti ricusha , Jesús sapalla shayauca ; pihuas mana ricuricachu Jesushua .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Paiguna urcumanda irgumusha , Jesús rimaca : Pitas canguna ricushcara ama rimanguichichu ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , huañushcaunamanda causarinagama .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Paiguna cai shimira huacachinauca . Paigunapura rimananauca : ¿ Imara angairí , nisha , cai huañushcaunamanda causarinaga ?

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Jesusta tapunauca : ¿ Imarasha ninaun yachaira yachachijguna , Elias ñaupara shamuna ministirin ?

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Elias cierto pacha ñaupara shamungami

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Randi cangunara nini , Elias ña shamushcami . Runauna paiguna munaira imaras ranauca , paimanda quillcashcasna .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunama pactamusha , ashca runauna paiguna muyujta tandarishcara ricuca . Yachaira yachachijguna paigunahua rimananauca .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Chi ratoi tucui runauna Jesusta ricusha , manzharisha callpamusha , paita saluranauca .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Jesús tapuca : ¿ Imara rimanaunguichi chigunahua ?

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Runa montonmanda shuj rimaca : Yachachij , nisha , ñuca churira pushamucani . Paihuajpi shu upa shimi supaira charin .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Chi supai maibis paita apishcai chucchuchin . Quiru mucusha puscu talirin ; ricujpi huahua chaquirisha riunmi . Can yachachishca runaunara rimacani : Ichupai pajllama , nisha . Astaun paigunaga mana ushanaucachu .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Jesús cutipasha paigunara : ¡ Mana quirij miraiguna ! ¿ Imahorasgarna cangunahua tiana ani ? ¿ Imahorasgama cangunara ahuantana ani ? Ñucama huahuara pushamichi .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Shinajpiga pushamunaucami . Supaiga Jesusta ricusha huahuara chucchuchica , allpama urmachica . Puscu talirisha huahua allpai cahuirica .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Jesús yayara tapuca : ¿ Imahorasmanda pacha casna tucushcai ? Yaya nica : Casna tucushca ichilla huahua horasmanda pacha .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Ashca cuti ninais yacuis urmachin huahuara huañuchingaj . Imaras ushasha llaquihuapai , yanapahuapai ñucanchira .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Can quirinara ushasha , quirijgunaraga imaras usharin .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Chi ratollai huahuayuj yaya caparisha rimaca : Quirinimi , astaumbas ñuca mana quirishcara yanapahuapai .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Jesusga runauna nitirimushcara ricusha supaira piñacami , shina nisha : Upa shimi upa rinri supai , llucshi nini , huahuamanda ; cuti paihuajpi ama icungui .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Shinajpi supai caparisha . huahuara shinzhira chucchuchisha , paimanda llucshica . Huahuaga huañushcasna saquirica . Shinajpi huaquinguna , Huañushcami , ninauca .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Randi , Jesús huahuara maquimanda apisha dirichuyachicami . Shina rajpiga huahua ataricami .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Jesús huasi ucuma icusha , pai yachachishca runauna paita shujma cayasha tapunauca : ¿ Imamanda ñucanchi supaira ichunara mana ushacanchichu ? nisha .

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús nica : Cai samiuna sasinallahua , Diosta mañashcallahuas llucshinaun .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Chi partimanda llucshisha Galilea partira purinauca . Jesusga pihuas ama yachanauchu munaca .

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: Pai yachachishca runaunara camachicami : Ñuca Runa Churi nishca , runauna maquii entregashca asha ; ñucara huañuchihuanaungami . Huañushca huasha quinsa punzhai causarishami .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Paigunaga cai shimira mana intindinaucachu . Jesusta tapungaj manzhanaucami .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Capernaum llactama pactajpi , huasii tiausha , Jesús paigunara tapuca : ¿ Cangunapura ñambii imara rimanaucanguichi ?

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Paigunaga mana ansas cutipanaucachu , ñambii paigunapura pita ñaupa tucungai rimanaushcamanda .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús tiarisha paihua chunga ishqui runaunara cayasha paigunama rimaca : Maican runa ñaupa tucuna munajpi , tucuimanda huasha tucungami , tucuira sirvij tucungami .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Jesús shu ichilla huahuara apisha , paiguna chaupi shungüi churasha , paihua maquii marcasha , paigunara rimaca :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: Maican ñuca shutii shu casna ichilla huahuara chasquisha , ñucaras chasquin ; maican ñucara chasquisha , mana ñucallara chasquin , astaun ñucara cachamuj Diostas chasquin .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Juan rimaca : Yachachij , shu runara ricucanchi , camba shutii supaigunara callpachica . Paiga mana ñucanchihua catimun . Mana catimushcamanda paita : Ama casna raichu nisha rimacanchi .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ama paita mitsaichichu . Maican runas ñuca shutii munanaita rau mana dsas manalira rimahuanga ñucamanda .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Maicans mana ñucanchihua contra tiausha , ñucanchi partima tian .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Maicambas ñuca shutii cangunama shu yacu vasora cujpi , canguna Cristojguna ashcamanda , cierto pacha cangunara nini : Pai cushcara mana pirdingachu .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: Maicans cai ñucajpi quiriu ichilla huahuaunara manalii urmachijpi , astaun ali anma paihua cungai shu atun cutana rumira huatasha lamarbi paita shitanauchu .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Camba maqui canda uchai urmachijpi , piti . Ishqui maquihua ucu pachama , mana huañuihuaj ninama rinamanda astaun ali anma pullu maqui causanama icungaj .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Ucu pachai paiguna aichai miraj curu mana huañungachu , ninas mana imahoras huañuringachu .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Camba chaqui uchai urmachijpi , piti . Ishqui chaquihua ucu pachama , mana huañuihuaj ninama rinamanda astaun ali anma pullu chaqui causanama icungaj . Ucu pacha ninara mana huañuchihuajehu .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Ucu pachai paiguna aichai miraj curu mana huañungachu , ninas mana imahoras huañuringachu .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Camba ñahui canda uchai urmachijpi , llucchi . Ishqui ñahuihua ucu pachama rinamanda astaun ali anma chulla ñahuiyuj Dios mandana pachai icungaj .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Ucu pachai paiguna aichai miraj curu mana huañungachu , ninas mana imahoras huañuringachu .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: Tucuira ninahua pichashca anga ; shinallara tucui sacrificio nishcara cachihua pichashca anga .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Cachi alimi . Cachi upa tucujpiga , ¿ imahua mishquiyachinguichima ? Cachira cuenta canguna shungüi charichi . Parijumanda cushiyaichi .

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Chimanda risha , Jesús Judea partima , Jordan yacu chimba partima shamuca . Runauna cutillara tandarimujpi Jesús pai ñaupa rashcasna cuti paigunara camachica .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Jesusma llutarimusha fariseoguna , paita pandachisha nisha tapunauca : ¿ Shu runa paihua huarmira ichunallachu ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Jesús cutipasha rimaca : ¿ Moisés imara camachica cangunara ?

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Paiguna cutipanauca : Moisés lugarda cuca maqui llushpirina quillcara quillcasha huarmira cachangaj .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipasha nica : Canguna shungu shinzhi ashcaraigumanda Moisés cai camachishcara quillcacami .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Astaun cai pachara rashca horasmanda Dios runaunara cariras huarmiras iñachicami .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Chiraigumanda shu cari paihua yayara mamara saquisha , quiquin huarmihua llutaringami .

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: Ishquindi shu aichalla tucunaun ; shinajpi ña mana ishquichu astaun shujllami tucun .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Shinajpi Dios llutachishcáraga runa ama llushpichichu .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Huasii icushaga , pai yachachishca runauna cuti chi rimashcara tapunaucami .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Jesús nica : Maicans paihua huarmira ichusha , shujhua casarasha , paiga shujhua tacarij tucun .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Shinallara huarmis paihua carira ichusha , shujhua casarasha , shujhua tacarij tucun .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Huahuaunara Jesusma pushamunauca , paihua maquira paiguna ahuai churangaj . Pai yachachishca runaunaga pushamujgunara piñanauca .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesús caita ricusha piñarica . Lugarda cuichi , nica , huahuauna ñucama shamunauchu . Paigunara ama arcaichichu . Paigunajmi Dios mandana pacha .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini maicambas shu huahuasna Dios mandana pachara mana chasquijpiga mana icungachu .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Jesús huahuaunara paihua maquii marcasha , maquira paiguna ahuai churasha , bendiciacami .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Jesús llucshisha , pai nambira ringaj , shu runa callpasha shamuca . Jesuspa ñaupajpi cungurisha tapuca : Ali Yachachij , nisha , ¿ imara rashai huiñai causaira apingaj ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Jesús nica : ¿ Imamanda ali nisha rimahuanguichu ? Shujpas mana ali tian ; Dioslla alimi .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Dios camachishca shimiunara yachangui : Ama shujhua tacaringuichu . Ama huañuchinguichu . Shujgunamanda ama yanga llullanguichu . Ama umachinguichu . Camba yayara camba mamara llaquina mangui .

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Runa cutipasha nica : Yachachij , cai tucuira pactachishcanimi ñuca maltamanda pacha .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita ricusha llaquicami . Shujta pishinmi , nica . Ri , can tucui charishcara catuiri ; tsuntsu runaunama cuyai . Randi ahua pachai ashca charij tucungui . Shami , camba cruzta aparisha catihuai .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Cai shimira uyasha , chi runa llaquiricami . Llaquirisha tigracami . Paiga ashcara charij maca .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Shinajpi Jesús muyujta ricusha , pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Charijguna tormendoshua icunaunga Dios mandana pachai .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Pai yachachishca runauna cai shimira uyasha manzharinauca . Jesusga cutillara rimaca : Churiuna , maicanguna charishcaunara iyajpiga , tormendosmi icunaunga Dios mandana pachai .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Mas raihuajmi camello nishca tupuili uctura pasangaj , randi pishi raihuajmi shu charij runa Dios mandana pachai icungaj

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Paigunaga maspas manzharinauca . Paiguna shungüi ninauca : ¿ Pita quishpinara ushangairi ?

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara ricusha nica : Runaunajga mana ushaihuajchu , randi Dioshua imaras usharin . Dioshuaga tucui ushanallami .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro rimai callarica : Ñucanchiga tucuira saquisha canda catimushcanchi .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maicans ñucara llaquishcamanda , evangelio ali shimira llaquishcamanda , paihua huasira , uquíunara , paniunara , yayara , mamara , huarmira , churiunara , quiquin allpaunaras saquishca anga ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: paiga cierto pacha shu patsaj cuti yalijta cui tucungami , huasiunara , uquiunara , paniunara , yayaunara , mamaunara , churiunara , quiquin allpaunara cai horasgunai llaquiunandi ; maspas shamuj horasgunai huiñai causaira charingami .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Shinajpi ashcauna ñaupa ajguna puchucaiguna tucunaungami ; randi puchucaiguna ñaupa anaungami .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Jerusalenma riña nambira sicasha rinauca . Jesús paigunamanda ñaupa riucami . Paiguna llaquirinauca , manzharisha catimunauca . Shinajpi pai chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunara shu partima cayasha cutillara yachachingaj callarica paita ima samiuna tucungaraushcaras .

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: Jerusalenma sicaunchi , nica . Ñuca , Runa Churi nishcara , sacerdote apuuna maquu yachaira yachachijguna maquiis cunaungami . Huañuchichu nisha causayachinaungami . Gentiles nishca runaunama cunaungami .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Ñucara camisha asihuanaungami , livachihuanaungami , ñuca ñahuii tiucahuanangami . Shina rasha huañuchihuanaungami . Randi quinsa punzhai causarishami .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Shinajpi Jacobo Juandi , Zebedeo churiuna , Jesusma llutarimunauca . Yachachij , ninauca , ñucanchi mañashcara rapai .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Jesús cutipaca : ¿ Imara ranara munanguichiri ?

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Paiguna ninauca : Ñucanchima cuhuai , can sumaj tiashcai , shuj camba ali partima shujga lluqui partima tiaringaj .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Canguna mañashcara mana intindinguichichu . ¿ Ñuca upina vasora cuenta ushanguichichu upinara ? ¿ Ñuca bautisanahua cuenta ushanguichichu bautisaringaj ?

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Paiguna cutipanauca : Ushanchimi , nisha . Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Cierto pacha nini , ñuca upina vasora cuenta upinguichimi , ñuca bautisanahua cuenta bautisarishca anguichimi .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: Astaun canguna mañashcara , ñuca ali maquima ñuca lluqui maquimas tiarinaraga , caita mana ñuca cunachu . Randi pigunajta ña alichishcami , chigunama cushca anga .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Chi shu chunga ajguna uyashaga , Jacobohua Juanhuas piñari callarinauca .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Jesús paigunara cayasha nica : Canguna yachanguichi imasna gentilgunajpi apu ajguna ahuayanaun paiguna ñaupajpi , atunguna paigunara mandanaun .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Cangunapura mana shina angachu . Astaumbas maican cangunapurai atunyasha nisha , paiga cangunara sirvij tucungami .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Cangunapuramanda maican ñaupa tucusha nijpi tucuira sirvij anga .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , mana sirvishca tucungaj shamucanichu astaun sirvingaj . Ashcauna randimanda ñuca causaira cungaj shamucanimi .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Shinajpi Jérico llactama shamunauca . Huashaga Jesús llactamanda llucshimuca pai yachachishca runaunandi ashca taucarimujgunandi . Ñambi rayai shu ñausa runa , Bartimeo nishca , Timeo churi , tiauca . Cuyahuaichi nisha , rugasha tiauca .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Bartimeoga Nazaretmanda Jesús shamuuta uyasha , caparingaj callarica : Jesús , Davidpa Churi , llaquihuapai , nisha .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ashca runauna piñanauca : Upalla , ama caparichu , nisha . Pai randi mas shinzhira caparica , Davidpa Churi llaquihuapai , nisha .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús shayarisha cayangaj cachaca . Ñausa runara cayasha rimanauca : Cushiyangui , atari , Jesús canda : Shami , nin .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Paiga paihua churanara ichusha , atarisha , Jesusma shamuca .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Jesús cutipasha rimaca : ¿ Imara canhua rangaj munanguiri ? Ñausa runa nica : Yachachij , ñuca ricuj tucungaj munani .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Ri , can quirishca canda quishpichishcami . Chi ratollaira ricuj tucuca . Pai Jesusta catica ñambii .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Paiguna Jerusalén llactama mayanllayaushcai , Betfagé Betania llactauna mayambi pactamunauca , Olivos urcu rayai . Chihui Jesús pai yachachishca runaunamanda ishquira cachaca .

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: Paigunara nica : Richi , canguna ñaupai ricurij llactama . Chihui pactai rishaga , shu malta burra huatashcara tupanguichi , maican runa paihua ahuai mana montashcachu . Pascasha apamichi .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Maicambas rimajpiga : ¿ Imamanda shina raunguichi ? nisha , cutipanguichi : Señor ministin , nisha . Shina rashaga uctalla cuti cachamungami .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Paiguna risha , burruhuara pungu rayai huatashcara canzhai tupanauca ñambi ishqui tucushcai . Pascanaucami .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Huaquin chihui ajguna : ¿ Imara rangaj burruhuara pascaunguichiri ? ninauca .

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Paiguna cutipasha , Jesús rimashcasna cuentanauca . Apaichi , nisha , cutipanauca .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Burruhuara pushamusha , paiguna churanara burra ahuai churanauca ; Jesús tiarica burrui .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Shinallara ashca runauna paiguna churanara ñambii mandanauca . Shujguna yuramanda pangaunara pitisha ñambii mandanauca .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Ñaupa riujguna huashama shamujgunandi caparinauca : Alabashcangui , nisha , Diospa shutii shamuj bendiciashcami .

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ñucanchi shamuj yaya David rey apu tucuna horas bendiciashca achu . Ahua pachai alabashca angui .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Jesús Jerusalembi icuca , Templo huasii icuca . Muyujta ricusha tucuira ricuca . Ña chishi ajpi . Betania nishca llactama paihua chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunandi rica .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Cayandi punzha , Betaniamanda llucshishaga , Jesús yarcachicami .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Carumanda ricushaga , shu higo nishca upina muyu yurara ricusha , pangayuj aj , llutarisha imallas tiangami nisha mascaca . Pactasha ricujpiga , pangalla tiaca , mana pai muyu aparina horas ajpi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Jesusga , yurara rimasha : Imahoraspas maicambas canmanda muyura ama micuchu , nica . Pai yachachishca runauna casna rimashcara uyanauca .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Jerusalenma shamunauca . Jesús templo huasii icusha , chihui tiaj catujgunara randijgunara canzhama callpachingaj callarica . Cullquira turcajguna mesaunara shinallara tulacami . Urpira catujguna tiarinaunaras voltiachicami .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Maican ima cuyaras ima mangaras apasha , Diospa huasi ucura pasangaj lugarda mana cucachu .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Jesús yachachisha nica : ¿ Manzhu quillcashca tian : Ñuca huasi Diosta mañana huasi nishca anga tucui llactaunaj ? Randi canguna shu shuhuajguna uctura rashcanguichimi .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Yachaira yachachijguna sacerdote apuunandi Jesús rimashca shimiunara uyanauca . Imasna rashas paita huañuchingaj mascanauca . Paita manzhanauca , tucui runauna pai yachachishcaunara cushihua uyashcamanda .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Tutayaupi , Jesús llactamanda llucshica .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Tutamanda nambira pasasha , chi Jesús piñashca yurara anguunandi chaquirishcara ricunauca .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Pedro iyarisha rimaca : Yachachij , ricupai , nisha , can piñasha saquishca yura chaquirishcami .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Jesús cutipasha : Diosta quiri , nica :

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Ñucaga cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maican cai urcura rimasha , Caimanda ri , nisha , lamarbi urmai , paihua shungüi mana ansas manzhasha astaun quirisha , pai rimashcasna tucungami .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Chiraigumanda nini : Imara Diosta mañashas , can mañashcara cierto pacha apishcanguichimi nisha quirichi . Can mañashca pactamungami .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Shinallara imahoras Diosta mañausha , perdonanguichi , maicanhuas imaras charisha perdonangaj . Chasna rajpiga canguna ahua pachai tiaj Yaya canguna ucharashcaunara perdonangami .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Canguna mana perdonajpiga , canguna ahua pachai tiaj Yaya shinallara cangunara mana perdonangachu .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Jesús Jerusalenma tigramusha , Diospa templo huasii puriushcai , sacerdote apuuna yachaira yachachijgunandi rucuunandi paihuajma shamunauca .

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: Jesusma rimanauca : ¿ Ima ushaihua caigunara raungui ? nisha , ¿ Pi mandashcara casna raungui ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jesús cutipasha rimaca : Ñuca , shinallara , cangunara shu shimira tapunara munani . Canguna cutipahuaichi . Shina rajpi ñucas cangunara pimanda cai ñuca rashcaunara rauni cuentasha .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Rimahuai , nica , Juan bautisana ¿ ahua pachamandachu runamandachu aca ?

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Shinajpi paigunapura rimananauca : Ñucanchi ahua pachamandami nijpiga , pai ¿ imaraigumanda mana quiricanguichi ? ningami .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Randi ñucanchi : Runamandallami nishaga , runaunara manzhanchi , tucui runa Juan cierto pacha Diosmanda rimaj ajta quirishcamanda .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Shinajpi Jesusta cutipasha : Mana yachanchichu , ninauca .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Jesús yachachingaj cuentanaunahua rimai callarica . Casna nica : Shu runa uvillas chagrara tarpucami . Muyujta largasha arcaca . Allpara allasha , uvillas muyu tacana uctura rarca , huasira shayachica . Huaquin tarabaj runaunama pagara mañasha mañachisha , caru llactama rica .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Muyu horasgunai mañachij dueño shu paita sirvijta cachaca tarabajgunama , paigunamanda muyura apingaj .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Paigunaga sirvijta apisha , livachisha maquillahua cachanauca .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Cuti shu sirvijta cachaca . Shinallara rumihua shitasha , umai chugrichisha , camishas , paitas cachanauca .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Cuti shujta cachaca . Caitaga huañuchinauca . Huasha , shujgunara cachajpi , huaquingunara chugrichinauca , huaquingunara huañuchinauca .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Shinallara shu sapalla churira charica , pai llaquishcara . Paitas puchucaibi cachaca , nisha : Ñuca churira casunaunga chari .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Astaumbas chi tarabajguna paigunapura rimananauca : Caimi apij dueño tucunga , nisha . Shamichi , huañuchishunchi , allpa ñuchanchij tucungami .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Paita apisha huañuchinauca ; uvillas chagramanda canzhama ichunauca .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: Chagramanda dueño shamushaga , ¿ Imara rangai chi tarabajgunara ? Shamushaga chi tarabajgunara tucuchingami ; chagraraga shujgunama cungami .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: ¿ Cai quillcashcallaras manzhu ricushcanguichi : Huasira sicachijguna ichushca rumi ña huasi esquina rumi tucushcami .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Caita Señor rashcami . Caiga ñucanchi ricujpi munanaitami ?

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Paiguna Jesusta huañuchinara munanaucami . Cai yachachingaj cuentanara paigunamanda rimashcara intindinaucami . Taucarai runaunara manzhasha , paita saquisha rinaucami .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Huaquin fariseogunara herodianos nisbcaunandi Jesusma cachanauca , paita ima panda shimiis apingaj .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Chigunaga Jesusta rimanauca , Yachachij , nisha , canmi ciertora rimaj ajta ricsinchi . Ima sami ricurij runaras mana manzhajchu angui . Cierto pacha can Diospa nambira yachachingui . Rimahuai ; ¿ Cesar nishca atun apuma impuesto cullquira pagashunzhu , manzhu pagashun ? ¿ Cushunzhu , manzhu cushun ?

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Jesús paiguna manali shungura ricsisha , paigunara rimaca : ¿ Imamanda tentahuanguichi ? Chi cullquira apamichi ñuca ricungaj .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Shinajpi cullquira apamusha ricuchinauca . Jesusga nin : ¿ Pihuajtai cai ñahui , pihuajtai cai quillcashca ? Paigunaga , Cesarbaj , ninauca .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Cesarbajta Cesarma cuichi ; Diospajtaga Diosma cuichi . Cai shimira uyasha manzharinauca .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Shinajpi Jesusma shamunauca saduceo nishca runauna , huañushcaunamanda causarina illanmi nijguna . Paita rimasha tapunaucami :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Yachachij , nisha , Moisés ñucanchira quillcacami : Shu runa huañujpiga , paihua huarmi huahua illaj saquirijpiga , paihua uqui chi huarmira apichu huañu uqui miraira atarichingaj .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Canzhis uquipura anauca . Ñaupa uqui shu huarmira apica . Chiga huañuca huahuaunara mana saquisha .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Chi huasha shu quipa uqui cai huarmira apica . Chihuas shinallara huahua illaj huañuca . Chimanda shujpas shinallara cai huarmira apisha huahua illajllara huañuca .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Canzhis uquiuna chi huarmira apinauca . Maicanmandas huahua illaj saquirica . Puchucaibi huarmis shinallara huañuca .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Shina rajpiga causarinai , chi huarmi ¿ maicambajta quiquin huarmi tucungái ? Tucui canzhis uquipura paita apinauca .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipasha rimaca : ¿ Chimanda manzhu pandaunguichi , Diospa shimiras paihua ushanaras mana yachashcamanda ?

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Causarinai mana casaranaunga , shinallara mana casarachinaunga . Astaumbas , ahua pachai tiaj angelguna cuenta tucunaungami .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Huañushcauna causarinaga , ¿ manzhu ricushcanguichi Moisés quillcashcai imasnara Dios yura ucumanda Moisesta rimaca : Nuca Abrahamba Dios , Isacpa Dios , Jacobpa Dios ani , nisha ?

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Diosga mana huañushcauna Dioschu an , astaumbas causajguna Diosmi . Shinashaga , canguna ashcara pandaunguichi .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Yachaira yachachijgunamanda shuj paima llutarimusha , ñaupa rimashcara uyasha , Jesús shujgunara ali cutipashcara ricsisha , paita tapuca : ¿ Tucui camachishca shimiunamanda maicanda ñaupa angai ?

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Jesús rimaca : Ñaupa camachishca shimi casnami riman : Uyaichi , Isarael runauna . Ñucanchi Señor Dios shujlla Diosmi .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Camba quiquin Señor Diosta llaquina mangui tucui camba shunguhua , tucui camba almahua , tucui camba iyaihua , tucui camba ursahua . Caimi tucuimanda ñaupa punda mandashca shimi .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Chimanda huasha mandashca shimi ñaupa aj cuentallarami : Camba rayai tiaj runara canda llaquishcasna llaquina mangui . Cai mandashca shimiunamanda yali mana mas tian .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Shinajpi chi yachaira yachachij runa Jesusta nica : Yachachij , alirami rimashcangui . Shu sapalla Dios tian , shuj mana mas tianzhu .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Diosta llaquinami , tucui shunguhua tucui iyaihua tucui almahua tucui ursahua , shinallara camba rayai tiaj runara canda llaquishcasna llaquingaj , caita tucui aichara rupachinamanda sacrificio nishcamandas mas yalimi .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús chi runa ali iyaihua cutipashcara ricusha ,

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Jesús templo huasii yachachisha , shina nica : ¿ Imasnara yachaira yachachijguna rimanaun , Cristo Davidpa churími nisha ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
