text2: Davidllara Santo Espiritumanda rimasha , casna nica : Señor ñuca Señorma rimaca : Ñuca ali maquima tiari , nisha , ñuca canda chijnijgunara camba chaqui ucui churanagama .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Shinajpi Davidllara , Señor nisha , ¿ imasnajpira paihua churimi ningái ?

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Jesús paigunara yachachisha rimaca : Yachaira yachachijgunamanda iyanguichi . Paiguna suni churanahua purinara munanaun ; shinallara pulasaunai salurai tucunara munanaun .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Shinallara tandarina huasiunai ali tiarinaunara munanaun . Istaunai ñaupajma tiarinára munanaun .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Paiguna huaccha huarmi huasiunara tucuchinaun . Unaira mañasha , umachisha yangamanda Diosta mañanaun . Caiguna astaumbas yali causaiyuj tucunaunga .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Jesús Diosma cuyana cullquira tandachina mala ñaupajpi tiarica . Ricucami cullquira malai churajgunara . Yapa charijguna ashca cullquira churanauca .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Shu huaccha huarmi llaquinaita shamuca . Pai ishqui mediohuara churacami malai . Ishqui medio shu real tucun .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara cayasha paigunara rimaca : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cai llaquinaita huaccha huarmi tucuimanda yali churashcami .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Shujguna paiguna yalijta charishcamanda puchura churanauca . Randi cai huaccha huarmi pai charishca tupu llambura churaca , pai micuna randina cullquira .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Jesús Diospa huasimanda llucshimushcai , shu pai yachachishca runa rimaca : Ricupai , Yachachij , nica , cai atun rumiunaras , cai huasiunaras .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Jesús cutipasha paita rimaca : ¿ Ricunguichu cai atun huasiunara ? Mana ima rumis shu rumi ahuais saquiringachu . Tucui tulashca anga .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Paiga Olivos nishca urcui tiarisha , Diospa huasi ñahuipurai , Pedro Jacobo Juan Andresndi chicambi paita tapunauca :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: Rimahuapai , ninauca , ¿ imahoras tucui caiguna tucunaungai ? ¿ Ima sami ricuringa caiguna pactarinai ?

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Jesús cutipasha rimai callarica : Iyanguichi maicambas cangunara ama umachichu .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Ashca runauna ñuca shutü shamunaunga , Ñucami Cristo ani , nisha . Ashca runaunara umachinaunga .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Imahoraspas guerraunara uyashaga , guerra shimiras , ama nusparinguichi . Casna tucuna ministirinmi . Shinashas cai pacha chara mana tucuringachu .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Llactapura macananaungami ; rey apuunapura macananaunga . Ashca llactaunai allpa cuyunga . Ashca yarcai shamunga . Tormendarinauna tianaunga . Caigunahua llaquiuna callarina angami .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: Canguna cangunallara iyanguichi . Taripaj maquii entregai tucunguichimi . Tandarina huasiunai cangunara azutinaungami . Gobierno apuuna ñaupajma rey apu ñaupajmas cayai tucunguichimi ñucara llaquishcamanda , paigunara rimangaj .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Ñauparaga ministirinmi tucui llactaunama evangelio shimira rimashca achu .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Imahoraspas cangunara entregangaj pushanaupi , imara rímanara ama ñaupa iyanguichi , ama iyarishas . Chi ratoi canguna iyaibi cushca shimira chillara rimanguichi . Mana canguna munaimanda rimangaraunguichi , randi Santo Espiritumanda rimana shimira cangunara cushca anga .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Shu uqui paihua uquira huañuchingaj entregangami , shinallara yaya churiras . Shinallara churiuna yayaunahua atarinaungami , paigunara huañuchinaungami .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Ñuca shutira llaquishcamanda canguna tucuiunamanda chijnishca anguichimi . Randi maicans puchucaigama ahuantasha , paimi quishpichishca anga .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Imahoras Dios chijnishcara ricunguichi , Diosmanda rimaj Daniel rimashcasna , pai mana tiaihuaj tiaushcai shayarijta - ricuj runaga intindichu — chi horasllaira Judeai tiajguna urcuma miticunauchu .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Maicans huasi ahuai tiaushaga huasi ucuma ama icuchu imaras apangaj .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Maicans pajllama tiaushaga paihua churanara apangaj ama tigrachu .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: llaquinaita icsayujguna . llaquinaita llullu huahuayujguna chi punzhaunai .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Diosta mañaichi canguna miticuna ama tamia tiempoi tucuchu .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Chi punzhaunaiga atun tormendarina tiempo shamunga . Casna sami tormendos mana tiashcachu Dios cai pachara rasha callarishcamanda cuna horasgamas , maspas mana cuti tiangachu .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Dios cai punzhaunara mana pishiyachijpiga manapihuas quishpichishca anma . Astaumbas pai ajllashcaunara llaquishcamanda chi punzhaunara pishiyachicami .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Shinajpi maicans rimajpi : Riqui , nisha , Cristo caibimi , Cristo chihuimi , nisha , ama quiringuichi .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Llulla Cristouna atarinaungami llulla rimajgunandi . Paiguna atun ricurinaunaras munanaita rashcaunaras umachisha ricuchinaungami , ushaihuaj ajpi quiquin ajllashcaunaras umachingaj .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Astaun canguna ricunguichi . Ña fíaupallara tucuira cangunara rimashcani .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Shinashaga chi llaqui punzhaunai tormendarinauna pasashca huasha , indi yanayangami quillas llanduyangami .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Estrellasguna ahua pachamanda urmamunaunga . Ahua pachai tiaj ushanauna cuyuchishca anaunga .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Chi ratollaira , ñuca , Runa Churi nishcara , ricunaungami puyui shamujta shinzhi ushanahua ali sumajhuas .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Shinajpi ñuca angelgunara cachamushami . Ñuca ajllashcaunara tandachishami chuscu huaira shamuna partimanda , cai pacha pundamanda ahua pacha pundagamas .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Higo muyu yuramanda yachaichi . Paihua pallcauna llulluyaupi , pangauna ña llucshiupi , ña yachanguichi rupai tiempo pactamun .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Shinallara canguna cai tucui tucushcara ricusha , ña yachanguichimi pai mayanllaimi , ña pungüimi tiaun .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cai horas aj runauna mana pasanaungachu cai tucui rimashcauna pactarinagama .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ahua pachas cai pachas chingarinaungami ; randi ñuca rimashca shimi mana imahoras chingaringachu .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Chi punzhara chi horasta pihuas mana yachanzhu . Ahua pachai tiaj angelgunas , Diospa Churis mana yachanaunzhu . Randi Yaya Dioslla yachanmi .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Ricuichi , chapaichi , mañaichi . Cai horas pactamunara mana yachanguichi .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Imasna caru partima rij runasna , paihua huasira saquica sirvijguna maquii , caran runama paihua quiquin tarabanara rimasha , pungüi cuirajta rimaca chapachu nisha .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Shinajpi chapaichi . Huasiyuj dueño pactamuna horasta mana yachanguichi , chishi ashas , chaupi tuta , gallo cantanara , punzhayanaras ;

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: manashaga pai cungaimanda shamusha cangunara puñuriaita tupangami .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Cangunara rimashcaunara tucuimas rimauni . Chapaichi , nini .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Ishqui punzha huashaga , Pascua ista aca . Puscu illaj tandara micuna punzhauna pactamunauca . Sacerdote apuuna yachaira yachachijgunandi imasna rasha Jesusta umachisha apingaj , paita huañuchingajta rimananauca .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Paiguna ninauca : Ista punzhaiga ama apinauchu , runauna ama nusparinauchu .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Jesús Betania llactai tiaushcai , shu Simón nishca llagayuj runa huasii , mesai tiarijpiga shu huarmi ashca valij gusto asnaj ambira apamuca valij rumi purui . Huarmi punirá paquisha Jesuspa umai , ambira talicami .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Huaquin chihui tiajguna shungu ucui piñarinauca . Shina ninauca : ¿ Imarasha cai ali asnaj ambira yanga baratun ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Caiga catuna usharicami , quinsa patsac yali cullquihua , tsuntsuunama cungaj . Huarmira piñanauca .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Astaumbas Jesús rimaca : Saquichi , nisha , ¿ imamanda paita piñanguichi ? Alirami rashca ñucara .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Tsuntsuuna imahoraspas cangunahua tianaungami . Canguna munashcai paigunara yanapana ushanguichi . Ñucaraga mana tucui horas charihuanguichichu .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Caiga pai ushashca tupura rashca . Paiga ñuca aichara pambanai armachinara ñaupara rashcami .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maibis cai evangelio shimi rimarijpi , tucui cai pachai , cai huarmi rashcara cuentashca angami paita iyarichingaj .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Shinajpi Judas Iscariote nishca , Jesuspa chunga ishquiunamanda shuj , sacerdote apuunama ricami , Jesusta paiguna maquii entregangaj .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Apuunaga cushiyanaucami Judas rimashcara uyasha . Cullquira cushun ninauca . Imasna rasha Jesusta paiguna maquii entregangaj Judas iyarica .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Ñaupa punda puscu illaj tanda micuna punzhaunai , Pascua ista sacrificio rana horaspi , Jesús yachachishca runauna paita rimanauca : ¿ Maibi Pascua istara micunara muñanguichu alichingaj ? nisha .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Pai yachachishca runaunamanda ishquira cachaca . Paigunara nica : Richi llactama , chihui shu runara yacu quisara apauta tupanguichimi . Paita catichi .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Maibi icujpiga huasiyuj runara tapunguichi : Ñucanchira yachachij nin , ¿ maibira micuna ucu , ñuca yachachishca runaunandi Pascua istara micungaj ?

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Pai shu ahua patai atun micuna ucura ricuchinga ña alichishcara . Chihui ñucanchijta puruntuichi .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Pai yachachishca runauna llactama rinauca . Jesús rimashcasna tupanauca . Chihui Pascua ista micunara alichinauca .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Ña tutayaupi paihua chunga ishqui runaunandi shamuca .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Shinarasha mesai tiarishcai , paiguna micushca ratollai , Jesús nica : Cierto pacha cangunamanda shu ñucahua micuj ñucara entregangaraunmi .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Shinajpi jaiguna llaquiringaj callarinauca . Caran shuj rimasha : ¿ Ñuca chari ani ? shujpas , ¿ Ñuca chari ani ? ninauca .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Jesús cutipasha rimaca : Canguna chunga ishquimanda shuj ñucahua pacta pulatoi tan rajmi , paimi anga .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Cierto pacha ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , riunimi , ñucamanda quillcashcasna . Astaun ayailla chi runa Runa Churira entregaj . Paihuaga astaumbas mana pagaringaj ali manmaca .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Paiguna micuushcai Jesús tandara apica , bendiciasha paquicami . Paigunara rimasha : Apichi , nica , caimi ñuca aicha .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Vasora apisha , agrasishca huasha , paigunama cucami . Paiguna tucui vasomanda upinauca .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Paigunara nica : Caiga ñuca mushuj pactachina shimira valichina yahuar . Ashcaunamanda talishcami .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Uvillas muyu yacura mana cuti upishachu Dios mandana pachai mushujta upina punzhagama .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Paigunaga cantanara cantashca huasha , llucshisha Olivos nishca urcuma rinauca .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Jesús rimaca : Tucui canguna ñucamanda cuna tutai pingaringuichimi . Quillcashca tian : Borregora cuirajta chugrichishami ; borregouna callpasha chausirinaungami .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Causarishca huashaga ñuca cangunamanda ñaupa Galilea partima risha .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro cutipaca : Tucui pingarinaupis , ñucaga mana .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Cierto pacha canda nini , Can , cuna , cuna tutai , gallo manara ishqui cuti cantajllaira , ñucamanda quinsa cuti ninguimi : Paita mana ricsinichu .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Pedroga shinzhi rimasha nica : Canhua huañuna ministirijpi canmanda mana nishachu , Paita mana ricsinichu . Tucui chi shujgunas shinallara ninauca .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Getsemaní nishca sisa pambama shamunauca . Chihui Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara rimaca : Caibi tiarichi , nisha , ñucaga Diosta mañai risha .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Jesús paihua pariju pushaca Pedrora , Jacobora Juandas . Pai ashca llaquiringaj callarica , turbaringajpas .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Jesús paigunara rimaca : Ñuca alma huañunalla llaquirinmi . Shuyaichi caibi , chapaichi .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Ansa ñaupasha rica . Allpai urmasha , Diosta mañaca : Usharijpiga , cai horas pasachu ñucamanda , nisha .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Casnami nica : Abba , Yaya , canhua tucui raihuajllami . Cai tormendarina vasora cuenta anzhuchipai ñucamanda . Randi mana ñuca munashcasna , astaumbas can munashcasna rashca tucuchu .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Jesús tigramusha , paihua runauna puñuriaita tupaca . Pedrora rimasha : Simón , nica , ¿ puñunguichu ? ¿ Manzhu shu hora tupura chapanara ushashcangui ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Chapaichi , mañaichi ama tentaciombi icungaj . Cierto pacha alma munanmi , astaun aicha sambayashcami , nica .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Cutillara rica . Ñaupa cuentallara rimasha , Diosta mañaca .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Jesús tigramusha , cutillara paigunara puñuriaita tupaca , paiguna puñunaihua singusha . Imara cutipanara mana yachanaucachu .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Quinsa cuti tucunai shamuca . Paigunara rimaca : Puñuichi ña , samaichi . Chillami , horas ña pactarishca . Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , uchayujguna maquii entregashca mani .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Jesús nica : Atarichi , acuichi . Ñucara entregaj runa ña mayanllayamun .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Jesús chara rimaushcallai Judas shamuca . Pai Jesuspa chunga ishquimanda shuj aca . Judashua pariju ashca runauna shamunauca esparaunahua caspiunahua . Sacerdote apuuna yachaira yachachijguna rucuunas paigunara cachamunauca .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Jesusta entregaj runa paigunara rimaca : Maicanda ñuca muchajpi paimi anga . Paita apinguichi , ali cuirasha pushanguichi .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Judas pactamusha Jesusma llutarica . Yachachij , yachachij , nisha , paita muchaca .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Shinarasha paiguna Jesusta apinauca .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Chihui ajgunamanda shuj paihua esparara llucchisha , sacerdote atun apura sirvijta rinri carara pitica .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Jesús nica : ¿ Shuhuajta cuenta ñucara apingaj llucshimucanguichi esparaunahua caspiunahua ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Caran punzha cangunahua Diospa huasii yachachisha tiaucani . Mana apihuacanguichi . Shinajllaira casnami tucun Quillcashcauna pactaringaj .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Shinajpi tucui Jesús yachachishca runauna paita saquisha miticunauca .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Shu maltaga sabana llachapahua pillurisha catica . Soldarouna paita apinauca .

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: Paiga llachapara saquisha llatan miticuca .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Jesusta sacerdote atun apujma pushamunauca . Chihuiga tucui sacerdote apuuna rucuunandi yachaira yachachijgunandi tandarimunauca .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Pedroga canilla canilla catisha ricami , sacerdoteuna atun huasi pungugama . Apu guardaunandi ninai cunusha tiauca .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Sacerdote apuunaga tucui gobiernoi mandajgunandi shimiunara mascanauca Jesusta huañuchingaj . Astaumbas mana tupanaucachu .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Ashca runauna yanga llullasha paimanda rimanauca . Randi paiguna rimashca shimiuna mana chi tonollachu aca .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Shinajpi shujguna atarimusha Jesusta causayachisha yanga llullasha rimanauca .

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: Pai rimashcara uyashcanchimi ninauca : Cai maquihua rashca templo huasira tulashami , nisha ; randiga quinsa punzhai shujta mana maquihua rashcara sicachishami .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Shina ajllaira paiguna shimiuna mana chi tonollachu aca .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Shinajpi sacerdote atun apu paiguna chaupi shungüi atarisha Jesusta tapucami , nisha : ¿ Mana imaras cutipangui ? ¿ Imara nisha canda causayachisha rimanaun ?

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Jesusga chunlla saquirica , mana imaras cutipaca . Sacerdote atun apu cuti tapuca : Canga , ¿ Cristochu angui ? nisha , ¿ Bendiciashca Diospa Churichu angui ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Ñuca maní ; ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ushaj Diospa ali maquima tiarishcara ricunguichimi . Huashaga ahua pacha puyui shamujta ricunguichimi .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Shinajpi sacerdote atun apu paihua churanara lliquisha rimaca : ¿ Imara mas ministishun rimajgunara ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Pai irus rimashcara uyashcanguichi . ¿ Imara ninguichi ? Paiguna tucui : Huañuchinami , ninauca .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Huaquinguna paita tiucangaj callarinauca . Paihua ñahuira quillpasha sajmanauca , Rimai , nisha . Guardauna paita huactanauca maqui palahua .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Pedroga allpai , huasi chaupi shungüi tiaj patioi tiaushcai , shu sacerdoteuna atun apura sirvij huarmi shamuca .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Pedrora ninai cunusha tiauta ricusha , huarmi paita nica : Cambas Nazaretmanda Jesushua pariju tiaucangui .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Pedro cutipaca : Mana ricsinichu , nisha . Imara chari ningui mana yachanichu . Pai punguma llucshica , chi ratollaira gallo cantaca .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Chi sirvij huarmi Pedrora cuti ricusha , chihui tiajgunara rimai callarica : Cai runa chi montonmandami , nisha .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Cutillara Pedro : Mana ricsinichu nica . Chihuashaga chihui tiajguna Pedrora rimanauca : Cierto pacha canga chi montonmanda angui , nisha . Galilea runa angui . Can paigunasna rimaj angui .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro manali shimiunara rimangaj callarica , Diospa shutii rimasha : Canguna rimaushca runara mana ansas ricsinichu , nica .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Cutillara gallo cantaca . Pedroga Jesús rimashca shimiunara iyaricami : Manara gallo ishqui cuti cantajllaira , canga quinsa cuti , Mana paita ricsinichu nisha rimanguimi . Pedro caita iyarisha huacacami .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Tutamandara , sacerdote apuuna rucuunandi yachaira yachachijgunandi gobierno mandajgunandi cuentananauca . Chihuasha paiguna Jesusta huatasha paita pushasha , Pilatoma entreganauca .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Pilato Jesusta tapuca : ¿ Canzhu Judioguna Rey Apu angui ? nisha . Jesús cutipasha nica : Canda shina ningui .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna Jesusta ashcara causayachinauca .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Pilato cutillara tapuca : ¿ Mana imaras cutipangui ? nisha . Riqui imasnara ashcara causayachinaun canda .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Shina nijpis Jesús shu shimillas mana cutipacachu . Chiraigumanda Pilato manzharica .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Astaumbas ista punzhai shu causayuj runara cacharij aca , maicandas paiguna mañashcara .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Shu Barrabás nishca runa tiauca . Paiga compañajgunandi chonda cularbi ishcarishca aca shu macanaushcai shu runara huañuchishcamanda .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Runauna shamushaga mañai callarinauca caran huata rashcasna rashca achu , nisha .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato cutipasha nica : ¿ Munanguichi ñuca judioguna Rey Apura cacharingaj ?

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Pilato ricsicami sacerdote apuuna Jesusta chijnishcamanda entreganauca .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Astaumbas sacerdote apuuna tucui runaunara rimanauca Barrabasta cacharingaj .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato cutipasha cutillara nica : ¿ Imara ranara munanguichi judioguna Rey Apu nishcara ?

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Paiguna cutillara caparinauca : Chacatai , nisha .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Pilatoga rimaca : ¿ Ima manalira rashcachu ? Paigunaga maspas caparinauca : Chacatai , nisha .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Pilato runaunara cushiyachisha nisha Barrabasta cacharicami . Randi Jesusta azutishca huasha paiguna maquii entregacami chacatangaj .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Shinajpi soldarouna Jesusta taripana huasi patioma pushanauca . Tucui soldarounara cayanauca .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Puca llachapara churachinauca . Chihuasha shu cashahua ahuashca llaitura churachinauca .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Paita salurasha cuenta : Cushiyai , judioguna Rey Apu , asisha ninauca .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Umai caspihua chugrichinauca . Paita tiucanauca . Alabajsna rasha paihua ñaupajpi cungurinauca .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Paita asishca huasha churachishca puca llachapara llatananauca . Shinarasha quiquin churanara churachinauca . Paita chacatangaj llucchimunauca .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Shu Cirene llactamanda Simón shu partimanda shamusha pasauca . Paita Jesuspa cruzta apachinauca . Cai Simón Alejandro Rufo nishcauna yaya aca .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Gólgota nishca pambama Jesusta pushanauca . Runa shimii caita Uma Tullu Pamba , nin .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Paiguna mirra nishca ambihua masashca vinora Jesús upingaj ricuchinauca . Jesusga mana upicachu .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Jesusta chacatashca huasha , paihua churanara paigunapura chaupinauca , maicanda lichayuj asha apanauchu .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Ahualla punzha , las nueve tupui , Jesusta chacatanauca .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Paihua causa quillcai quillcashca tiaca : Judioguna Rey Apu .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Paihua pariju ishqui shuhuajgunara chacatanauca , shuj ali maquima , chishuj lluqui maquima .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Shina rasha ñaupa horas Quillcashca Shimi pactaricami . Cai quillcashca nica : Uchayujgunandi yupashca aca .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Pasajguna Jesusta camisha , umara cuyuchisha rimanauca : Aa , nisha , canmi Diospa huasira tulaj , quinsa punzhai shayachij ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: canllara quishpi , cruzmanda irgüi .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna yachaira yachachijgunandi shinallara asisha rimananauca : Shujgunara quishpichicami , nisha , randi pai quiquinllara mana ushanzhu quishpinara .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Cristo , Israel runauna Rey Apu cruzmanda irguchu , ñucanchi ricusha quiringaj , ninauca . Shinallara paihua pariju chacatashca runauna paita caminauca .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Ka doce horasmanda pacha chaupi punzhai tun llanduyamuca las tres tupugama .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Chaupi chishira las tres mayanda Jesús shinzhira caparica : Eloi , eloi , ¿ lama sabactani ? nisha . Caiga runa shimii nin : Ñuca Dios , ñuca Dios , ¿ imamanda ñucara saquihuashcangui ?

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Huaquin chihui ajguna uyasha , Ricupaichi , ninauca , Elíasta cayaun .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Shu runa callpasha rica , shu putusta ayaj vinohua tsungachisha , caspi pundai churasha , Jesús upingaj ricuchicami . Saquichi , nica , ricushunchi Elias shamunga chari paita irguchingaj .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Jesusga shinzhi shimihua caparisha pitirica .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Chi ratoi Diospa huasii huarcushca llachapa ahuamanda allpama pasajta lliquiricami .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Paihua rayai shayarij capitán , Jesús huañusha capariuta ricusha : Caiga cierto pacha Diospa churirni , nica .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Carumanda huaquin huarmiuna ricurianauca . Chigunahua tianauca María Magdalena , quipa Jacobohua Josehua mama María , Salomendi .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Chigunaga Jesús Galilea partii ashcai , paita catisha sirvinaucami . Shinallara paígunandi shujguna Jesushua Jerusalenma sicamujguna tianauca .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Tutayaupi , Puruntuna nishca punzha asha , samana punzha tucunai alichina horas aca .

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Arimatea llactamanda José , valij gobiernoi mandaj runa , paihuas Diospa gobierno pachara chapau , mana ansas manzhasha Pilatoma rica huañushca Jesús aichara mañangaj .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Pilato Jesús ña huañushcara mana quirícachu . Capitanda cayachi cachasha tapucami . ¿ Ña huañushcachu ? nisha .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Capitán rimashcara uyasha , huañushca Jesús aichara Josema cuca .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: José shu yuraj linzora randica . Jesusta cruzmanda irguchisha , linzohua pilluca , pambana uctui chingachica . Pambana uctu peñas ucui allashca aca . Shu rumira voltiachisha , uctu pungura ishcaca .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: María Magdalena , María Josehua mamandi , Jesusta chingachishcara ricunauca .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Samana punzha pasashca huasha , María Magdalena , Jacobo mama María , Salomendi gusto asnaj ambiunara randinauca Jesusta armachi ringaj .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Semana ñaupa punzhai , tutamanda indi llucshimushcai , Jesusta pambashcama shamunauca .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Paigunapura ninauca : ¿ Rumira uctu pungumanda pita voltiachisha cuhuangái ?

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Paiguna ricujpiga , rumi ña voltiachishca aca . Rumiga yapa atun maca .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Pambashca uctui icusha , shu malta ali maquima tiajta ricunauca . Paiga suni yuraj churanahua churarishca aca . Huarmiuna paita ricusha manzharinauca .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Chi malta rimacami : Ama manzhaichichu , nisha . Chaca

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Astaumbas richi , nica . Pai yachachishca runaunara Pedroras rimai richi . Jesusga cangunamanda ñaupa Galileama riun . Chihui paita ricunguichimi , pai rimashcasna .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Chi huarmiunaga miticusha rinauca pambashca uctumanda . Paiguna chucchurisha manzharinauca . Pitas mana imara rimanaucachu manzharishcamanda .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Jesús semana ñaupa punzha tutamandai causaricami . María Magdálenama ñaupa punda ricurica , paimanda canzhis supaira ichushca aca .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Pai rishaga , rimai ricami Jesushua purijgunara . Paiguna llaquirisha huacanauca .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Paigunaga Jesús causarishcaras , chi huarmi ricushcaras uyasha , mana quirinaucachu .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Chi huasha , ishquiunama Jesús shu tonoi ricurica paiguna shu partima puriushcai .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Paiguna tigrasha chishujgunara cuentanauca . Chishujgunas mana quirinaucachu .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Puchucaibi Jesús ricurimuca chi chunga shuj runaunama , paiguna mesai tiaushcai . Paiguna mana quirishcara , paiguna shungu shinzhiyashcaras rimacami , pai causarishcara ricujguna rimashcara mana quirishcamanda .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Richi entero mundura , evangelio ali shimira tucui runaunama camachichi .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Maicans quirisha bautisarishas quishpichishca anga , maicans mana quirishaga causayachishca anga .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Quirijgunahua munanaita ricurinauna pactarinaunga : Ñuca shutii supaigunara pajllama ichunaungami , shinallara mushuj shimiunara rimanaungami ;

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: machachuinara maquihua apinaunga , ima huañuna ambiras upijpis mana huajlichingachu ; ungushca runauna ahuai maquira churajpi aliyanaungami .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Jesús paigunara rimashca huasha ahua pachama apai tucuca . Diospa ali maqui partima tiaricami .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Paiguna llucshisha , Diospa shimira tucui partii camachinauca . Dios paigunara yanapacami , shimira cierto ajta ricuchica munanaita ricurinaunahua . Amen .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Ashca runauna ñucanchihua cierto tucushcaunara ali catimpuralla cuentangaj camanaushca ,

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: imasna ñucanchira yachachinauca callan horasmanda ñahuihua ricujguna , paiguna shimira camachijguna asha .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Ñucamas shinallara alimi yachica , ali tapushca huasha canda tucuira callarinamanda catimpuralla quillcangaj , yapa ali Teófilo ,

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: canda yachachishca shimiuna ciertomi ashcara can ali yachangaj .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Herodes Judea rey apu ashcai , shu Zacarías nishca sacerdote tiauca , Diospa huasii sirvij , Abías montonmanda . Paihua huarmi Aaromba ushushiunamanda aca , paihua shuti Elisabet .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Ishquindi ali causajguna anauca Diospa ñaupajpi , causa illaj , tucui Dios mandashca shimiunai camachishcaunais purinauca .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Churi illaj anauca , Elisabet huahuara mana ricuj " sha . Ishquindi ña rucu tucunauca .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Zacarías pai sacerdote ranaunara rausha Diospa ñaupajpi , paihua monton rana horas ashcai ,

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Sacerdote rana yachaira , incienso nishca mishqui asnaj ambira rupachica , Diospa huasii icusha .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Tucui taucarimuj runauna canzhai chapanauca , Diosta mañausha , inciensora rupachina horaspi .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Paihuajpi shu Señorbaj ángel ricurimuca , altar nishca incienso rupana mesa ali maquipurahua shayarisha .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Zacarías paita ricusha ashcara manzharica .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Angel paita nica : Zacarías ama manzhaichu . Can Diosta mañashcara uyashcami . Camba huarmi shu churira cambajta pagarichinga , paita Juan nishcara shutichingui .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Can cushi tucunguimi , cushiyanguimi . Ashca runauna pai pagarishcamanda cushiyanaungami .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Pai Diospa ñaupajpi atun tucungami . Vinoras urti upinaras mana upingachu . Santo Espirituhua undashca anga mama icsamanda pacha .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Ashca Israelba churiunara tigrachinga paiguna Señor Diosma .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Diospa ñaupajpi Eliaspa espirituhua paihua ushanahuas puringami , yayauna shunguunara churiunama tigrachingaj , mana uyajguna ali iyaiyujguna ranama , shu monton alichishca runaunara Señorbajta puruntungaj .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Zacarías angelda nica : ¿ Imasnara caita yachashachu ? Ñuca rucu ani , ñuca huarmis shinallara rucuyaunmi .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Angel cutipaca : Ñuca Gabriel ani , Diospa ñaupajpi shayaj . Cachamushca ani canhua rimangaj , cai ali shimira canda cuentangaj .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Ña upa shimiyuj tucungui , rimanara mana ushangui cai tucui pactarina punzhagama , can . ñuca shimira mana quirishcaraigu . Cai tucui paihua horaspi pactaringami .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Runaunaga Zacaríasta chapanauca , ¿ ima tucun , nisha , pai Diospa huasii unaiyajpi ?

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Pai llucshishaga , paigunara rimanara mana ushacachu . Shinajpi runauna pai ima nuspairas Diospa huasii ricushcami intindinauca . Paiga maquillahua ricuchisha rimaca , upa shimiyuj asha .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Pai sirvina punzhauna tucurijpi , huasima rica .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Chi punzhauna pasashca huasha , paihua huarmi Elisabet huahuara tupaca , pichca quilla tupura huasillai tiaca .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Casnami Señor ñucahua rashca , nica , ñuca pingarishcara cuna quichusha nica runauna ñaupajmanda .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Socta quillai , Dios Gabriel nishca angelda cachaca Galileai tiaj Nazaret nishca llactama .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Cachamushca aca shu huanra huarmima , shu José nishca carihua pactachishca . Pai Davidpa aillumanda aca . Huanra huarmi María nishca aca .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Angel paihuajpi icusha : Cushiyangui , nica , yapa llaquishca huarmi . Señor canhua tiaun . Huarmiunamanda yali bendiciashca angui .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Huarmiga angelda ricusha , pai rimashca shimiunamanda turbarica . ¿ Imarai cai salurashca ? nisha iyaca .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Shinajpi ángel huarmira nica : María ama manzhaichu , nisha , gracia nishca cushira tupashcangui Diospa ñaupajpi .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Cuna , camba icsai huahuara tupangui , churira pagarichingui . Paita shutichingui JESÚS .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Atun tucungami . Ahuai tiaj Diospa Churi nishca anga . Señor Dios paihua yaya Davidpa rey apu tiarinara paita cunga .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Jacobpa aillu ahuai rey apu tucunga huiñai huiñaigama , pai mandana imahorasgamas mana tucuringachu .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Shinajpi María angelda nica : ¿ Ima rashara shina tucungairi ? Carira mana charinichu .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Angel cutipasha nica : Santo Espíritu camba ahuai shamunga , Ahuai tiaj Diospa ushana paiwa llanduwa canda quillpangami . Chi raigumanda pagarij santo huahua Diospa Churi nishca anga .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Cunas camba aillu Elisabet shinallara churira tupashcami pai rucu ashcai , cuna socta quillara huahuara icsai charin , pai huahuara mana ricuj nishca ashallara .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Dioshua mana imas mana raihuajchu , astaun paihua tucui raihuajmi .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Shinajpi María nica : Caibi maní , Señorda sirvij huarmi . Can rimashcasna ñucahua rashca tucuchu . Angel paihua ñaupajmanda llucshisha rica .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Chi punzhaunai , María atarisha urcu partima uctalla rica , shu Judá partii tiaj llactama .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Zacaríaspa huasima icusha , Elisabetda saluraca .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Elisabetga , María salurashcara uyajpi , huahua saltaca paihua icsai . Elisabet Santo Espirituhua undashca aca .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Shinzhira rimasha nica : Bendiciashcangui can huarmiunamanda , bendiciashcami camba icsai tiaj huahuara .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: ¿ Imarasha ñucama cushca aca , ñuca Señorba mama ñucama shamungaj ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Ñuca rinri can salurashca shimira uyasha , huahua cushiyasha ñuca icsai saltaca .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Quirij huarmi cushimi . Señor paita rimashca shimi pactaringami paihua .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Shinajpi María nica : Ñuca alma Señorda ahuayachin .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Ñuca espíritu ñucara Quishpichij Diospi cushiyan .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Paita sirvij huarmi pogri ashcara ricushcami . Shinajpi cunamanda tucui miraiguna ñucara cushiyashcami ninaunga .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Tucuira ushaj Dios atun ranaunara ñucahua rashcami . Chicanyachishcami paihua shuti .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Pai llaquinaga tucui miraigunagama duranmi , tucui paita manzhajgunama .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Atun ranaunara rarca paihua rigrahua , shinzhi shunguyujgunara chausica paiguna shungüi iyarishcaraigumanda .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Ushajgunara quichucami paiguna apu tiarinamanda . Mansounara ahuayachica .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Yarcachiujgunara aliunahua undachica . Charijgunara illajta cachacami .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Dios paita sirvij Israelda yanapacami , pai llaquij shungura charisha .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Caimanda ñucanchi yayaunahua rimaca , Abrahamhuas paihua miraigunahuas huiñai huiñaigama rimaca .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: María paihua tiauca quinsa quilla tupura . Chihuasha paihua huasima tigraca .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Elisabet pagarichina horas pactarijpi , shu churira pagarichica .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Mayanpura causajguna ailluunas Dios paita ashcara bendiciashcara uyasha , paihua cushiyanauca .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Pusaj punzha huasha , huahuara circuncisión nishcara rangaj shamunauca . Paita shutichinauca Zacarías nisha , paihua yaya cuenta .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Astaun paihua mama cutipaca : Mana , nisha , paihua shuti Juanmi .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Paita ninauca : ¿ Imaraigu , nisha , casna shutiyuj illan camba aillui ?

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Shinajpi yayara maquihua ricuchisha tapunauca : ¿ Camba huahua ima shutira churasha ningui ?

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Zacarías shu quillcara mañasha : Paihua shuti Juanmi , nisha quillcaca . Tucui manzharinauca .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Chi ratollai paihua shimi pascarica , paihua huatashca callu llushpirica , pai Diosta alabasha rimaca .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Mayanpura causajguna manzharinauca . Cai tucuira cuentanaucami tucui Judea urcu partiunai .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Tucui uyajguna caigunara huacachinauca paiguna shungüi , ¿ Ima sami huahuara angai ? nisha . Diospa maqui paihua tiauca .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Paihua yaya Zacarías Santo Espirituhua undashca asha , Diosmanda rimaj cuenta rimaca , nisha :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Bendiciashcami Israelba Señor Dios . Paihua runaunara ricushcami , randishcami .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Shu ushaj Quishpichijta sicachishcami ñucanchijta . Paita sirvij Davidpa aillui ,

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: imasna rimaca paihua callarimanda aj ali rimajguna shimimanda .

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Ñucanchira chijnijgunamanda quishpichina , shinallara tucui ñucanchira chijnijguna maquimandas ;

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: ñucanchi yayaunahua alira rangaj , pai chuyaj pactachina shimira iyaringaj .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Ñucanchi yaya Abrahanma paihua shutii cushca shimira iyarisha , ñucanchimas cuna aca ,

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: imasna ñucanchi , chijnijgunamanda llushpichishca asha , mana manzhasha , paita sirvinchi maca ,

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: chuya shunguhua ali shunguhuas paita sirvingaj paihua ñaupajpi , tucui ñucanchi causana punzhaunagama .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Canga , ñuca huahua , Ahuai tiaj Diosmanda nishca angui , Señorbaj ñaupajpi purina angui paihua ñambiunara alichingaj ,

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: paihua runaunara quishpichina shimira yachachingaj , paiguna ucharashcaunara perdonai tucungaj ,

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: ñucanchi Dios shunguhua llaquishcamanda , mushuj punzha ahuamanda ñucanchira punzhayachin ,

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: llandu tutais huañuna llanduis causajgunara punzhayachingaj , ganaslla causana nambira ñucanchi chaquiunara pushangaj .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Huahua iñasha rica , paihua espiritui shinzhi tucuca . Runa illashca partiunai tiauca pai Israelma ricurina punzhagama .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Chi punzhaunai , Augusto César nishca atun apu shu mandashca shimira cuca tucui runauna shutiunara gobierno quillcai churachingaj .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Cai ñaupa shutira yupana Cirenio nishca Siria llactai gobernador ashcai rashca aca .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Tucui runa paihua quiquin llactama rica shutira quillcachingaj .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: José Galileamanda , Nazaret llactamanda sicaca , Belén nishca Davidpa llactama , pai Davidpa aülumanda miraj ajpi .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Shutira churachingaj rica , paihua pactachishca huarmi Mariandi . Maríaga icsayuj aca .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Paiguna chihui tiaushcai , huahua pagarina horas pactaríca .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: María paihua ñaupa punda churira pagarichica . Huahuara llachapai pülusha huagra micuna batiai sirichica . Hotel huasi undajta aca , mana lugar tiaca .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Chi quiquin partii , borrego cuirajguna tianauca , paiguna borregounara ricunauca , cuiranauca tutai .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Cungaimanda shu Señorba ángel ricurimuca paigunama , Señorba sumajta paiguna muyujta punzhajlla ricurica . Ashcara manzharinauca .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Angel paigunara nica : Ama manzhaichichu , yapa ashca cushiyachij shimiunara cangunama apamuni . Tucui runaunaj anga .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Cuna punzha Davidpa llactai cangunaj shu Quishpichij pagarishcami . Pai Cristo nishca Señormi .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Caita ricusha ricsinguichi . Llachapai pillushca huahuara tupanguichimi , huagra micuna batiai sirijta .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Cungaimanda angelhua pariju ashca angelguna ricurimunauca , Diosta alabasha ninauca :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: Dios sumacyachishca achu ahua pachai , cai pachais ganaslla , runaunaj ali munai achu .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Angelguna paigunajmanda ahuama risha , cuirajguna paigunapura ninauca : Acuichi Belenma , imasna ashcaras ricungaj , Señor ñucanchira ricuchishcara .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Shinasha uctalla shamunauca , Mariaras Joseras tupanaucami , huahuaras huagra micuna batiai sirijta .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Huahuara ricusha , angelguna huahuamanda cuentashcara paigunama rimanauca .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Tucui uyajgunaga cuirajguna cuentashcara uyasha manzharinauca .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Maríaga cai tucuira paihua shungüi iyarisha huacachica .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Borregora cuirajguna tigranauca , Diosta alabasha tucui paiguna uyashcamandas ricushcamandas , paigunara rimashcasna .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Pusaj punzha pactanjpi huahuara circuncisionda rangaj , paita Jesús shutichinauca , cai shutira angelmanda cushca ajpi huahua manara tupajllaira icsai .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Huarmi armana punzhauna pactarijpi Moisespa ley shimii nishcasna , huahuara pushamunauca Jerusalenma , Señorma ricuchisha cungaj .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Imasna Señorba ley shimii quillcashca tian : Tucui icsamanda ñaupa llucshij cari huahua Diospa ñaupajpi santo nishca chicanyachishca angami , nisha .

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Shinallara Señorba ley shimii quillcashcasna , sacrificiora rangaj rinauca , ishqui urpira cusha , mana ajpi ishqui paloma huahuara .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Shu Simeón nishca runa tiauca Jerusalembi , ali runa , Diosta llaquij , Israelba cariyanara chapau . Santo Espíritu paihua tiauca .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Santo Espíritu paita yachachica : Can manara huañujllaira Señor Ajllashca Ruñara ricungui , nisha .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Pai Santo Espíritu pushashca , templo nishca Diospa huasima shamuca . Huahua Jesuspa yayauna paita temploma pushamujpi , ley camachishca shimi nishcara paihua rangaj ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Simeón huahuara apica paihua rigrai , Diosta bendiciasha nica :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: Cuna Señor canda sirvijta cushi shunguhua dispiringui , camba shimii rimashcasna .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Ñuca ñahuihua camba quishpichinara ricushcani .

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: Caita tucui runauna ñaupajpi alichishcangui ;

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Velara Gentilgunara punzhayachingaj , camba Israel nishca runauna sumajtas .

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: José Jesuspa mamandi tucuira huahuamanda rimashcaunara uyasha manzharinauca .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Simeón paigunara bendiciaca , paihua mama Mariara nica : Cai huahua churashcami ashca Israelbi tiaj runauna urmangaj shinallara sicangajpas , shu ricurinas , maspas ashca runauna paimanda manali rimanaunga ,

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: ashca shunguunai iyashcauna ricurinauchu . Maspas shu espara camba almara pasajta tucsingami .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Shinallara chihui tiauca Ana , shu Diosmanda rimaj huarmi , Fanuelba ushushi , Aser aillumanda . Yapa ashca rucu aca . Pai huanra ashcamanda canzhis huata tupura paihua carihua causauca .

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: Chi huasha , pusaj chunga chuscu huata tupura huaccha huarmi aca . Templo nishca Diospa huasimanda mana llucshijchu aca , tutandi punzhandi Diosta sirvisha , sasisha , mañasha .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Cai huarmi chi ratollai shamusha Diosta agrasica , cai huahuamanda tucui Jerusalembi tiau quishpinara chapajgunama rimaca .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Tucui Señorba ley shimii quillcashcara pactachishca huasha , Galileama tigranauca , paiguna quiquin Nazaret llactama .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Huahua iñasha rica , shinzhi tucusha , yachairas apisha . Diospa gracia nishca aH shungu paihua tiaca .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Caran huata Jesuspa yayauna Jerusalenma pascua nishca istama rinauca .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Huahua chunga ishqui huatayuj tucujpi , pariju Jerusalenma sicanauca , istai paiguna yachaira rangaj .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Ista tucurishca huasha tigranauca , astaun huahua Jesús Jerusalembi saquirica , yayauna mana yachajllaira .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Huahua amigounahua shamunmi iyasha , yayauna shu punzha tupura purinauca . Paita mascanauca ailluunahua , ricsishcaunahuas .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Huahuara mana tarisha , Jerusalenma tigranauca paita mascangaj .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Quinsa punzha pasashca huasha , huahuara templo huasii tupanauca , Moisés mandashca shimira yachachijguna chaupi shungüi tiajta , paigunara uyashas tapushas .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Tucui paita uyajguna paihua iyairas pai cutipashcaras uyasha manzharinauca .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Huahuara ricusha , yayauna manzharinauca . Paihua mama nica : Churihua , ¿ Imarasha casnara rashcangui ñucanchihua ? Yayandi ñucandi llaquirisha canda mascashcanchi .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Shinajpi huahua Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Imaraigu mascahuacanguichi ? ¿ Manzhu yachacanguichi ñuca Yaya ranaunai tiana maní ?

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Paigunaga huahua rimashcara mana intindinaucachu .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Huahua paigunahua irguca Nazaretma . Paigunara uyaca . Paihua mama tucui caigunara huacachica paihua shungüi .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Jesús iñauca yachanais gracia nishca ali shungüis , Diospa ñaupajpi runauna ñaupajpis .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Tiberio César gobierno chunga pichca huatara tiaushcai , Poncio Pilato gobernador aca Judea partii , Herodes atun apu aca Galilea partii , paihua uqui Felipe atun apu aca Iturea Traconite partiunai , Lisanias atun apu aca Abilinia partii .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Shinallara Anasndi Caifasndi sacerdote atun apuuna anauca . Chi horaspi Diospa shimi Zacariaspa churi Juanma shamuca , runa illaj partii .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Juan tucui Jordan muyujta tiaj partiunama shamuca : Arrepentirichi nisha , bautisarichi canguna uchauna perdonai tucungaj ,

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: imasna quillcashcasna Diosmanda rimaj Isaías quillcashca quillcai : Runa illaj partii caparij runa : Señor purina nambira alichichi , nisha , paihua ñambiunara dirichuyachichi ,

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: tucui huaicu undachishca angami , tucui urcus tucui ichilla urcus urayangami ; istu ñambiuna dirichuyashca anaungami , manali ñambiuna pambayachishca anaungami .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Tucui runa Diospa quishpichinara ricungami .

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Juanga bautisangaj llucshijgunama nica : Machacuimanda mirajguna cuenta , ¿ pita cangunara yachachica shamuj piñarinamanda miticungaj ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Arrepentirina tupu ranaunara raichi ; ama callarichichu cangunapura rimangaj : Abrahanmi ñucanchi yaya , nisha ; cangunara nini , cai rumiunamanda , Dios churiunara atarichina ushañmi Abrahambajta .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Maspas , amallara yurauna sapii hachara ña churashcami . Tucui yura mana ali aparijpi cuchushca anga , ninai shitashca anga .

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Shinajpi runauna paita : ¿ Imara rashun ? ninauca .

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Cutipasha , Juan paigunara nica : Maican runa ishqui churanara charisha illajgunama cuyachu , micunara charij runa shinallara rachu .

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Paihuajma shamunauca bautisaringaj gobierno cullquira apijguna , paita nisha : Señor , ¿ imara rashun ñucanchi ?

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Juan paigunara : Ama yapajta mañaichichu mandashcara yalisha , nica .

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
