text2: Shinallara soldarouna paita tapunauca , nisha : Nucanchisga , ¿ imara rashun ? Juan nica : Imaras ama dsas quichuichi runaunamanda , ama llullasha rimaichichu , canguna ganashca cullquihua cushi tucuichi .

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Tucui runauna chapausha , paiguna shungu ucui tapunauca : Cai runaga Cristochu anga manzhu Cristo anga , nisha .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Juan cutipasha , tucui runaunara nica : Ñuca cierto pacha cangunara yacui bautisani , astaun shuj ñucamanda yali ushaj , yali valij shamum , mana valijchu ani paihua zapatos huascara pascangajllas . Paiga Santo Espirituis ninais bautisangami .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Paihua huairachina maquii tian , paihua cutana pambara pichangami , paihua trigo muyura tandachingami huacachina huasii , cararaga sindichingami huiñaigama mana huañuihuaj ninai .

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Cai camachishcaunahua ashca shu camachishcaunahuas Juan runaunara ali shimiunara yachachica .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Shinajpi Herodes nishca atun apu , Juan paita camachishcaraigu Herodes paihua uqui Felipe huarmira apishcamanda , shinallara pai tucui manali rashcaunamanda ,

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: tucui ñaupa manali rashcaunai yapachica , Juanda chonda cularbi ishcaca .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Imasna tucui runauna bautisarinauca , Jesuspas bautisashca aca ; Diosta mañajpi ahua pacha pascarica .

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: Santo Espíritu paihua ahuai irgumuca , aichayuj cuenta , urpisna . Ahua pachamanda shimi uyarica : Can ñuca llaquishca Churimi angui , nisha , cambajpi cushi ani .

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Jesús pai camachingaj callariushcai quinsa chunga huata tupura charij aca , paita José churimi iyanauca , paiga Eli churi .

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Pai Matatpa churi , Levi churi , Melqui churi , Jana churi , José churi ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: Matatíaspa churi , Amospa churi , Nahum churi , Esli churi , Nagai churi ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Maatpa churi , Matatíaspa churi , Semei churi , José churi , Judá churi ,

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Joana churi , Resa churi , Zorobabel churi , Salatiel churi , Neri churi ,

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Melqui churi , Adi churi , Cosam churi , Elmodam churi , Er churi ,

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Josué churi , Eliezer churi , Jorim churi , Matat churi ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Levi churi , Simeón churi , Judá churi , José churi , Jonan churi , Eliaquim churi ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Melea churi , Mainán churi , Matata churi , Natán churi ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: David churi , Isai churi , Obed churi , Boozpa churi , Salmón churi , Naason churi .

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Aminadab churi , Aram churi , Esrom churi , Farespa churi , Judá churi ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Jacob churi , Isacpa churi , Abraham churi , Taré churi , Nacor churi ,

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Serug churi , Ragau churi , Peleg churi , Heber churi , Sala churi ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: Cainan churi , Arfaxad churi , Sem churi , Noé churi , Lamec churi ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Matusalém churi , Enoc churi , Jared churi , Mahalaleeí churi , Cainán churi ,

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Enos churi , Set churi , Adán churi , Diospa churi .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Jesús , Santo Espirituhua undarishca asha , Jordanmanda tigraca . Espíritu pushashca aca runa illashca partima .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Chihui chuscu chunga punzha tupu tiaca . Supai apu paita tentaca . Imaras mana micucachu chi punzhaunai , chihuasha yarcachica .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Shinajpi supai apu paita nica : Can Diospa Churi ashaga , cai rumira rimai tanda tucuchu .

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Jesús paita cutipasha : Quillcashca tianmi , nica , Mana tandallahua runa causangachu , astaun tucui Dios rimashca shimiunahua .

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Supai apu paita shu atun urcuma pushaca , tucui mundui tiaj llactaunara dsaslla ricuchica .

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: Supai apu Jesusta nica : Caijtucui ushaira canda cusha , tucui cai llactauna sumajhua . Ñucama cushca ashca , ñuca munashcama cuni .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Can tuama urmasha ñucara alabajpi , adorajpi , cushcangui tucuira .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Jesús cutipasha paita nica : Anzhuri ñucajmanda , Satanás , quillcashca tian : Camba Señor Diosta adorana mangui , paulara sirvina angui .

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Paita pushaca Jerusalenma , templo huasi ahua pundai paita churaca . Paita nica : Can Diospa Churi asha , allpama saltai .

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Quillcashca tian : Paihua angelgunara mandangami canda cuirangaj , supai apu nica .

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Shinallara , Paiguna maquiunai canda apinaungami camba chaquira rumii ama nijtaringaj .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Rimashca tian , Camba Señor Diosta ama tentanguichu .

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Tucui tentación nishca tucuríjpi , supai apu paimanda rica shu ratogama .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Espíritu ushanahua Jesús Galileama tigraca , paimanda rimashcauna uyarica tucui chi rayara tiaj partiunai . 15 Judioguna tandarina huasiunai Jesús yachachica . Tucui runa paita alabaca .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Jesús Nazaretma shamuca , pai iñashca llactama . Paihua yachaira shu samana punzhai judio tandarina huasii icuca , shayaríca quillcara ricungaj .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Shu quillca paita cushca aca , Diosmanda rimaj Isaías quillcashca ; Jesús quillcara pascasha , casna quillcashcara tupaca :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: Señorba Espíritu ñucahua tian , imasna ñucara talishca ali shimira rimangaj tsuntsuunama ; ñucara cachamuca tormendarij shunguyujgunara alichingaj ; ishcariajgunara rimangaj liuriyachingaj , ñausaunara rimangaj ricungaj ; tormendachishcaunara llushpichingaj ,

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: Señor munashca huatara rimangaj .

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Jesús quillcara ishcasha sirvijma cuca , tiarica . Tucui tandarina huasii tiajguna paita ricunauca .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Paigunara rimangaj callarica : Cuna punzha , nisha , cai Quillcashca Shimi pactarishcami canguna ñaupajpi .

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Tucui ali rimanauca , riparanauca , imasna Jesús ali shungu shimiunara rimashcara . Paiguna ninauca : ¿ Manzhu cai José churi ?

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Canguna ñucara ninguichi chari : Médico , Doctor , canllara aliyairi . Ñucanchi uyashcanchi imasna ashca ali rashcaunara rashcangui Capernaumbi . Shinallara rai caibi , camba quiquin llactai .

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Jesús nica : Mana ima Diosmanda rimaj paihua quiquin llactai chasqui tucunzhu .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , ashca huaccha huarmiuna tianauca Israelbi Elias causaushca punzhaunai , imahoras ahua pacha ishcai tucuca quinsa huata socta quilla tupura , chimanda atun yarcai tiauca tucui llactai .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Astaun mana pimas chigunama cachashcacbu aca Elias , astaun Sarepta nishca llactama , Sidonia partii tiaj , shu chihui tiaj huaccha huarmima .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Maspas , ashca ismushca aicha llagayujguna tianauca Israel llactai , Diosmanda rimaj Elíseo causaushca horas , shinashas chigunamanda mana pihuas alichi tucucachu , astaun shu Siriamanda Naaman nishca runalla .

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Shinajpi caita uyasha ashcara piñarinauca tucui tandarina huasii tiajguna .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Atarisha , Jesusta ichunauca llactamanda canzhama , paita pushanauca urcu pundama , huaicuma shitangaj nisha . Chi urcu ahuai Nazaret llacta tiaca .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Astaumbas Jesús paiguna chaupi shungura pasasha ri pasaca .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Jesús irguca Galileai tiaj Capernaum llactama . Paigunara yachachica samana punzhaunai .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Runauna pai yachachishcara uyasha manzharinauca , ushaihua yachachishcaraigu .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Chihui aj tandarina huasii , shu irus supai apishca runa tiauca . Cai runa shinzhira caparica :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: Saquihuai ñucanchira , nica . ¿ Imara munangui ñucanchihua , Nazaretmanda Jesús ? ¿ Shamushcangui ñucanchira tucuchingaj ? Canda ricsinimi pitangui can . Diospa Santo Churi angui .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Jesús supaira piñaca , Upalla , nisha , llucshi paimanda . Shinajpi supai runara urmachisha paiguna chaupi shungüi , paimanda llucshica , runara mana huajlichisba .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Tucui manzharisha tianauca , paigunapura rimanausha : ¿ Ima shimirai cai ? nisha ninauca . Ushaihua irus supaigunara llucchisha cachan .

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Jesuspa shuti rimashca aca tucui chi partii tiaj llactaunai ,

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Jesús atarisha llucshica tandarina huasimanda , Simomba huasii icuca . Simomba huarmi mama ashca calenturahua siriuca , paita ruganauca huarmira alichingaj .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Jesús huarmira ricusha , calenturara piñaca . Calenturaga chiriaca . Huarmi uctalla atarisha paigunara sirvica .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Indi icujpi , tucui ungushcaunara charijguna ima tono ungüimandas ungushcaunara pushamunauca Jesuspajma . Paiga paihua maquira caran dueño ahuai churasha , paigunara alichica .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Shinallara ashcaunamanda supaiguna caparisha llucshinauca , shina nisha : Can Diospa Churi angui . Astaumbas , Jesús paigunara piñasha lugarda mana cucachu rimangaj , paiguna Jesús Cristo ajta ricsishcamanda .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Ña punzhayajpi Jesús llucshica , shu runa illaj partima rica . Runauna paita mascanauca , paita tupai risha paita arcasha ninauca : Ama richu ñucanchijmanda .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Astaun Jesús paigunara nica : Ñuca shu llactaunama richu ministirin , Dios mandana pacha ali shimira paigunara rimangaj . Chihuajmi cachamushca ani .

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Jesús Galilea partii tiaj tandarina huasiunai yachachicami .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Jesús , Genesaret nishca yacu cocha rayai tiaupi , runauna paihuajma taucarimunauca Diospa shimira uyangaj .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Ishqui canoara ricuca pulaya mayanllai . Aichahuara apijguna canoamanda llucshishca huasha , licaunara maillarinauca .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Jesús shu chiguna canoai icusha , Simomba canoa aca , Simonda mañaca : Ansa caruyachi , nica , pulayamanda . Shina rajpi , Jesús tiarisha runaunara yachachica canoamanda .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Rimashca huasha , Jesús Simonda : Canoara apai , nica , chaupi lamarma , licaunara shitangaj , aichahuara apingaj .

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Simonga cutipasha paita nica : Yachachij , tuta pagarijta licashcanchi , imaras mana apishcanchichu ; shina ajllaira can rimajpi , licara shitasha chari .

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Shina rasha aichahuara apinauca ashca supaira , lica liquirijta .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Chishu canoai tiajgunara cayanauca shamusha yanapangaj . Shamunaucami , ishqui canoara undachinauca ñaca ñaca pambaringama .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Simón Pedro caita ricusha , Jesuspa ñaupajpi cungurisha nica : Anzhuri ñucamanda , Señor . Uchayuj runa mani .

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Paiga manzharica , paihua pariju tiajgunandi , paiguna ashca aichahuara apishcaraigumanda .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Shinallara tucuca Jacobhuas Juanhuas , Zebedeo churiuna , Simomba compañajguna . Jesús Simonda nica : Ama manzhaichu , cuna horasmanda runaunara licaj cuenta tucungaraungui .

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Canoauna allpama llutarijpi , cai runauna tucuira saquisha , Jesusta catinauca .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Jesús shu llactai tiaupi , shu ashca llagayuj runa shamuca . Pai Jesusta ricusha , tuama urmaca paihua ñaupajpi . Jesusta rugaca : Señor , nisha , can munashaga ñucara alichinara ushangui .

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús maquira chutasha paita llangaca : Munanimi , nisha , alichishca angui . Dsas , llaga ungüi paita saquica .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Jesús palta mandaca : Pitas ama rimaichu , nica , astaun ri , sacerdotema ricuchiri , Moisés mandashcara cui canda pichangaj , can aliyashcara ricuchingaj paigunama .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Shinajllaira Jesús mas mas uyarica tucui partii . Ashca runauna shamunauca paita uyangaj , alichi tucungaj paiguna ungüigunamanda .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Astaun , Jesús anzhurica runa illaj partiunama , chihui Diosta mañaca .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Shu punzha Jesús yachachiuca . Fariseos nishcauna , Moisés mandashca shimira yachachijgunas chihui tianauca . Paiguna tucui Galilea llactunamanda shamunaushca aca , Judea partimandas , Jerusalenmandas . Diospa ushai paihua tiauca ungushcaunara alichingaj .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Huaquin runauna shu suchu runara pushamunauca , caitui sirijta . Paita huasii icuchingaj mascanauca , Jesuspa ñaupajpi churangaj .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Ashca runauna taucarimushcamanda , maimandas runara icuchingaj mana tupanaucachu . Chi raigumanda huasi ahuara sicanauca , pascasha runara irguchinauca runauna chaupi shungüi , Jesuspa ñaupajpi .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Jesús chi runauna quirishcara ricusha , suchu runara nica : Can ucha rashcaunara perdonashcangui .

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Shinajpi yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi pifíangaj callarinauca , nisha : ¿ Pitangai cai runa casna irusta rimaj , Diosta camij ? ¿ Pita uchara perdonanara ushangai mana Dios asha ?

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Jesús paiguna iyashcara riparasha , cutipasha nica : ¿ Imara iyanguichiri canguna shungüi ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: ¿ Imara mas rimaihuaj : Can ucharashcara perdonashcangui nina , mana ajpiga , Can atari , puri , ningaj ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Astaun canguna yachangaj imasna ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ushanara charini cai pachai uchara perdonangaj , suchu runara nin : Canda nini , atari , caitura apai , camba huasima ri .

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Chi ratollaira runa paiguna ñaupajpi atarisha , pai sirishca caitura apasha , ri pasaca paihua huasima , Diosta alabasha .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Tucui manzharinauca , Diosta alabanauca . Ashcara manzhanauca : Shu munanaita rashcara ricushcanchi cuna punzha , ninauca .

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Caimanda huasha , Jesús llucshisha , shu impuesto nishca gobierno cullquira tandachij runara ricuca . Paihua shuti Levi aca . Cullquira tandachina huasii tiaca . Jesús paita : Catihuai , nica .

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Levi tucuira saquisha , atarisha , Jesusta catica .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Leviga atun istara rarca paihua huasii . Ashca cullquira tandachijgunandi shu amigounandi paigunahua pariju tianauca micuna mesai .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi Jesús yachachishca runaunara piñanauca : ¿ Imarasha micunguichi cullquira tandachijgunahua uchayujgunahuas ? ninauca .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Jesús cutipasha paigunara nica : Aliuna doctorda mana ministinaunzhu , astaun ungushcauna ministinaun .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ñuca shamucani , mana ali causajgunara cayangaj , astaun uchayujgunara cayangaj arrepentiringaj .

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Paiguna Jesusta ninauca : ¿ Imarasha Juan yachachishca runauna caran rato sasinaun , Diosta mañanaun , shinallara ranaun fariseoguna yachachishca runaunas , astaun can yachachishca runauna micunaun upinaun ?

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Ushanguichichu borai tiau amigouñara sasichingaj , cari tiaushcallaira .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Randi , cari paigunamanda quichuna punzhauna shamunaungami . Chi punzhaunai sasinaungami .

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Jesús shinallara paigunara shu yachachingaj cuentanara cuentaca : Mana pihuas mushuj churanamanda shu pitira pitinzhu rucu churanara remendangaj ; shina rajpiga , mushuj churana liquiringa , maspas mushuj churanamanda piti mana ali ricuringachu rucu churanahua .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Pihuas mushuj vinora mana churanzhu rucu cara puruunai , shina rajpiga mushuj vino puscuyasha purura tugyachin , vino talirin , carauna liquirisha pirdirinaun .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Astaumbas , mushuj vino mushuj cara puruunai churana anga , chasna rajpi vinondi puruunandi duranaungami .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Maspas , pi runas rucu vinora upishca huasha mushujta mana munanga . Rucu vino astaun mas alimi , ñinga .

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Casnami tucuca : Jesús shu tarpushca chagrara pasausha samana punzhai , pai yachachishca runauna trigo papajta aisanauca micungaj , muyura maquii cacusha .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Huaquin fariseoguna paita ninauca : ¿ Imaraigu chiguna mana raihuajta ranaun samana punzhai ?

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Cutipasha Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Manzhu Quillcashcai ricushcanguichi imara rarca David pai yarcachishca horas paihua compañajgunandi ?

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu ricushcanguichi imasna Diospa huasii icusha , ricuchina tandara apisha micuca , paihuas pai compañajgunandi ? Chi tandara micunara mana raihuajchu aca pihuas . Sacerdoteunalla micunara ushanauca .

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , shinallara samana punzhahua dueño maní .

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Shinallara shu samana punzhai Jesús tandarina huasii icusha yachachica . Chihui shu runa tiauca paihua ali maqui chaquirishca aca .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi Jesusta chapanauca , chi runara samana punzhai alichingachu , imara nisha , imaras tupangaj Jesusta culpangaj .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Jesusga paiguna iyarishcara yachaca , shinajllaira chaquirishca maquiyujta nica : Atari , chaupi shungüi shayari . Runa atarisha shayarica .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Cangunara tapuni , ¿ raihuaj chu samana punzhai aliranara manaliranara ? ¿ Raihuajchu causaira huacachina , causaira quichuna ?

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Jesús tucui muyujta tiajgunara ricusha , runara nica : Maquira chutai . Runa shina rarca . Paihua maqui aliyashca aca .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Fariseoguna ashcara piñarinauca , paigunapura rimananauca ima manalira rangajpas Jesushua .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Chi punzhaunai Jesús urcuma rica mañangaj . Tuta pagarijta Diosta mañauca .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Punzhayajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara cayasha , paigunamanda chunga ishquira ajllaca , chigunara shinallara apóstol nishca cachashcauna shutichica .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Caigunami anauca : Simón , paiga Pedro nishca aca , paihua uqui Andrés , Jacobo Juandi , Felipe Bartolomendi ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Mateo Tomasndi , Alfeo churi Jacobo , Zelote nishca Simón ,

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Judas , Jacobo uqui , shinallara Judas Iscariote , Jesusta entregaj runa .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Jesús paigunahua irguca , shu pambai chapasha tiauca , pai yachachishca runaunahua , ashca runaunahua Judeamanda Jerusalenmandas , Tiro Sidon lamar pata partiunamandas . Cai tucui runauna shamunauca Jesusta uyangaj , paiguna ungüigunamanda alichi tucungaj .

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: Shinallara irus supaihua tormendachishcauna shamunauca . Alichi tucunauca .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Tucui runauna Jesusta llangangaj munanauca , ushai paimanda llucshijpi tucui runaunara alichingaj .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesús paihua ñahuira atarichisha , pai yachachishca runaunara ricusha , paigunara rimaca : Cushiuna anguichi canguna pogriuna , nisha . Cangunajmi Dios mandana pacha .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: Cushiuna anguichi cuna horas yarcachijguna , sacsachishca anguichimi . Cushiyujguna anguichi cuna horas huacauguna , asinguichimi .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: Cushiuna anguichi runauna cangunara chijnijpi , cangunara chicanyachijpi paigunamanda , cangunara piñanaupi ñuca , Runa Churi nishcara , llaquishcaraigu .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Cushiyaichi chi punzhai , cushi tucuichi . Cangunara pagana atunmi ahua pachai . Shina ranauca canguna yayauna Diosmanda rimajgunahua .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: Maspas , ¡ Ayailla , charijguna ! canguna cushira cunalla charinguichi .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: ¡ Ayailla sacsashcauna ! Yarcachinguichimi . ¡ Ayailla , cuna horas asijguna ! Llaquiringuichimi , huacanguichimi .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: ¡ Ayailla canguna , runauna cangunamanda ali rimanaupi ! Shina ranauca canguna yayauna llulla rimajgunahua .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: Uyajguna , cangunara nini : Llaquichi cangunahua contrauñara , alira raichi cangunara chijnijgunara .

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: Bendiciaichi cangunara maldiciajgunara , mañaichi cangunamanda llullasha manalira rimajgunamanda .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Pi runas camba mujluspi sajmajpi , chishu mujlusta paita ricuchi . Pi runas camba sacora quichujpi , paita ama mitsaichu camba camisaras .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Maican mañajpi cui . Maican runa cambajta quichujpi , ama cuti mañaichu .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Imasnara munanguichi runauna cangunahua ranauchu , shinallara paigunahua raichi canguna .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: Canguna alirajgunallara llaquijpi ¿ imajta valin ? Shinallara uchayujguna paigunara llaquijgunara llaquinaun .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Canguna alira rajpi alira rajgunamallara , ¿ imajta valin ? Uchayujguna shinallara ranaun .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Canguna imaras mañachijpi , huasha paigunamanda apingaj chapausha , ¿ imajta valin ? shinallara uchayujguna uchayujgunama mañachinaun , shina tupura yapashca cuti apingaj .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: Shinajpi cangunara chijnijgunara llaquichi , alira raichi , mañachichi , imaras mana cuti chapausha ; canguna pagana atun manga . Ahuai tiaj Diospa churiuna anguichi . Paiga ali shungumi mana agrasijgunahua , manaliunahuas .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Cangunaga ali llaquijguna aichi , imasna camba Yaya ali llaquijmi .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: Ama tarípaichichu , mana tarípashca anguichi . Ama causayachichu , mana causayashca anguichi . Perdonaichi , perdonashca anguichi .

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Cuichi , cangunama cui tucunguichimi , ali tupura , nitishcara , undajta . Imasna tupunguichi shinallara tupui tucunguichimi .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Jesús paigunara shu yachachingaj cuentanara cuentaca : ¿ Ushangachu , nica , shu ñausa runa shu ñausara pushangaj ? ¿ Manzhu ishquindi uctui urmanaunga ?

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Yachachishca runaga mana yalinzhu paita yachachijta ; astaun maicans ali yachachishca asha , paita yachachij cuenta tucunga .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: ¿ Imarasha camba uqui ñahuii tiau polvohuara ricungui , camba quiquin ñahuii tiau caspira mana ricusha ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: ¿ Imasnara ningui camba uquira : Uyai , ñuca camba ñahuimanda polvohuara llucchisha , can camba ñahuii tiaj caspira mana ricusha ? ¡ Ishqui shimiyuj ! Ñaupa punda ichui caspira camba quiquin ñahuimanda , chi huasha alimi ricungui polvohuara camba uqui ñahuimanda ichungaj .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Manali yura manali muyura aparin , ali yuraga ali muyura aparin .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Caran yura pai aparishca muyumanda ricsinallami . Higo muyura mana pallanaunzhu quilambu cashamanda , shinallara uvillasta mana apinaunzhu chispumanda .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Ali runa paihua shungüi huacachishca ali iyaimanda alira llucchin , manali runaga paihua shungu manali ajpi manalira llucchin . Shungu yalijta undashcamanda shimi riman .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: ¿ Imarasha ñucara : Señor , señor , nisha , cayahuanguichi , ñuca mandashcara mana rashallara ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Tucui ñucama shamuj runa , ñuca shimira uyaj , ñuca shimira pactachij , cangunara ricuchisha imasna ricurij ajta .

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Pai shu huasira raj runasna : allasha , ucura allaca , huasi istandira shayachica . Yacu undasha huasira nitica ; randi mana ushacachu urmachingaj , huasi rumii shayachishca ajpi .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Astaun , shu runa ñuca shimira uyashallara , mana pactachisha , pai casnami : Shu runa paihua huasira allpallai shayachica . Yacu undajpiga , huasi urmaca . Chi huasi urmasha llambura tucurica .

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Tucuira rimai pasashca huasha paita uyajgunama , Jesús icuca Capernaumbi .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Shu soldaro capitamba sirvij runa huañunalla ungushca aca , capitanga paita yapa llaquica .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Capitán Jesuspa shutira rimashcara uyasha , judiogunamanda rucuunara paihuajma cachaca , paita rugangaj , shamuchu nisha , paita sirvijta alichingaj .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Paiguna Jesuspajma shamusha paita ashcara ruganauca : Cai capitán valinmi , nisha , caita rangaj .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Paiga ñucanchi llactara llaquin , shinallara ñucanchij shu tandarina huasira sicachishca .

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Jesús paigunahua compañasha ri pasaca . Jesusga huasi mayanllai pactamujpi , capitán amigounara cachaca Jesusta rimangaj : Señor , nisha , ama molestarichu , mana valijchu ani can ñuca huasi ucui icungaj .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Chi raigumanda ñucallara mana shamushcanichu canhua rimangaj , mana valijchu ani , nisha . Astaun , rimailla , ñuca sirvij ali tucungami .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Ñuca mandashca runa ani , shinallara ñucahua soldarounara charini mandangaj . Shujta : Ri , nini , pai rinmi . Shujta : Shami , nini , paimi shamun . Ñuca sirvijta : Caita rai , nijpi , ranlla .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Jesusga caita uyasha : Yapa alimi , nica . Voltiarisha Jesús paihua catijgunama nica : Cangunara nini , Israelbi casna quirinara mana tupashcanichu .

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Cachashca runauna huasima tigrasha , chi ñaupa ungushca sirvij runa aliyashcara tupanaucami .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Chi huashalla , Jesús shu Naín nishca llactama rica , paihua pariju pai yachachishca runauna , ashca shu runaunandi .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Llacta pungu mayambi pactaushcai , shu huañushca runara canzhama llucchinauca . Cai runa shujlla churi aca , mamaga huaccha huarmi aca . Paihua pariju ashca runauna compañanauca llactamanda .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Señorga huarmira ricusha llaquirica , paita rimasha : Ama huacaichu , nica .

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Jesús llutarisha , aya cajonda llangaca . Huanduujguna shayarinauca . Jesús ayara : Malta , nica , atari , nini .

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Huañu runa tiarisha , rimangaj callarica . Jesús paita paihua mamama cuca .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Tucui runauna manzharinauca . Diosta alabanauca , casna nisha : Shu atun Diosmanda rimaj llucshishcami ñucanchi chaupi shungüi . Dios paihua runaunara ricushcami .

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Jesuspa shuti uyarica tucui Judea partii , tucui muyujta tiaj partiunandi .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Juan yachachishca runauna tucui cai rashcaunamanda Juanda cuentanauca .

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Juanga ishqui pai yachachishca runaunara cayasha , paigunara Señorbajma cachaca tapungaj : ¿ Canzhu shamuna aj runa angui , mañasha shujtachu chapana anga ?

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Runauna Jesusma shamusha , paita ninauca : Bautisaj Juan ñucanchira cachamuca cambajma tapungaj : ¿ Canzhu shamuna aj runa angui , mañasha shujtachu chapana anga ?

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Chi ratollaira Jesús ashcaunara paiguna ungüimandas nanaigunamandas irus supaigunamandas aHchicami , ashca ñausaunara ricujta rarca .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Paigunara cutipasha nica : Richi , canguna ricushcara uyashcaras Juanda cuentaichi : ñausauna ricunaun , nisha , anga changauna ali purinaun , llagayujguna alichishcami anaun , upa rinriyujguna uyanaun , huañushcauna causachishca anaun , maspas pogriunama evangelio ali shimira rimashcami .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Cushi shunguyujmi maican runa mana nijtarisha ñucahua .

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Juan cachamushca runauna rishca huasha , Jesús runaunama rimangaj callarica Juanmanda : ¿ Imara ricungaj runa illaj partima llucshicanguichi ? ¿ Shu huaira cuyuchishca quihuara ricungajchu ricanguichi ? nica .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Astaumbas , ¿ imara ricungaj llucshicanguichi ? ¿ Shu gusto llachapa churarishca runara ? Gusto vaUj churanahua churarishcauna , charij cuenta causajguna , rey apu atun huasiunai tianaun .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Cutillara cangunara nini : ¿ Imara ricungaj llucshicanguichi ? ¿ Shu Diosmanda rimajta ? Cierto nini , astaun shu rimajmanda yalira .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Cai runamandami quillcashca tian : Ñuca rimaj runa camba ñahui ñaupajpi cachauni . Pai camba nambira camba ñaupajpi alichingami .

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Cangunara nini , huarmimanda pagarishcaunamanda , Bautisaj Juanmanda shu yali rimaj illan . Shinajllaira Dios mandana pachai tucuimanda yali ichilla runas Juanmanda yalimi .

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Tucui runauna paita uyasha , shinallara gobierno cullquira tandachijguna paita uyasha , Dios alimi nisha ninauca , shinallara bautisarinauca Juan rashca bautisanahua .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Astaumbas fariseoguna , ley shimira camachijgunas Diospa shimii paigunamanda rimashcara ichunauca . Juanmanda mana bautisashca anauca .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Señor nica : ¿ Lnahuara cuna causaj runaunara ricuchisha ? ¿ Imasnara anaun ?

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Cai runauna pujllaj huahuaunasnami . Huahuauna pulazai tiarisha caparinaun : Llautaunara cangunajta tucacanchi , astaun canguna mana bailacanguichichu ; cangunajta huacacanchi astaumbas canguna mana huacacanguichichu .

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Bautisaj Juan shamuca , tandara mana micuj , vinoras mana upij , canguna nicanguichi : Supaira charin .

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Randi Runa Churi micujpas upijpas shamuca , cangunaga : Caiga micuisiqui , vinoras upisiqui , nisha nicanguichi , cullquira tandachijguna amigo , uchayujguna amigo .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Randi , yachana ali nishcami tucui paihua churiunamanda .

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Shu fariseo runa Jesusta conviraca paihua pariju micungaj , fariseo huasii icusha mesai tiarica .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Shu uchasapa huarmi tiauca llactai . Chi huarmi , Jesús fariseo huasii micuushcara uyasha , gusto asnaj ambira undachishca alabastro nishca rumi purura apamuca .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Jesuspa huashai shayarisha paihua chaqui rayai huacasha tiauca . Pai huacashca iquihua Jesuspa chaquira ucuchica , paihua acchahua chaquira chaquichica , maspas Jesuspa chaquira muchaca , ambira talica chaquii .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Jesusta conviraj fariseo runa cai tucuira ricusha , paihua shungüi nica : Cai runa Diosmanda rimaj ashaga ricsinmaca ima sami cai huarmi ajtas , cai paita llangaj huarmi uchasapa ajtas .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipasha : Simón , nica : Shu shimira rimauni canda . Simonga : Rimairi , Señor , cutipaca .

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Jesús nica : Shu dibiyachij runa ishqui dibiyujgunara charica , shuj paita pichca patsaj cullquira dibiyaca , shujga pichca chungallara .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Chi ishquiga imaras mana charínaucachu pagangaj , dueñoga íshquindira perdonaca . Rimahuai , cai ishquimanda ¿ maicanda paita masta llaquingai ?

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Simón cutipasha ; Yachin , nica , yali dibiyuj runa mas llaquinma . Jesús paita : Cierto , nica , alimi iyashcangui .

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús huarmima voltiarisha , Simonda rimasha , ¿ cai huarmira ricunguichu ? nica . Ñuca camba huasü icucani . Can yacura mana cuhuacanguichu chaquira maillangaj , astaun cai huarmi paihua iquihua ñuca chaquira maillashcami , paihua acchahua chaquichishcami .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Can ñucara mana muchacanguichu , astaun cai huarmi pai icushca ratomanda pacha ñuca chaquira muchangaj mana saquishcachu .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Can ñuca umai aceitera mana talicanguichu , astaun cai huarmi gusto asnaj ambira ñuca chaquii talicami .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Chi raigumanda canda nini : pai ucharashcauna ashca ajllaira , tucuira perdonashcami , huarmi ashcara llaquihuashcamanda . Astaumbas maicans ansalla perdonashca asha , ansalla llaquin .

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Jesús huarmira : Can ucharashcauna perdonashcami , nica .

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Shinajpi , mesai tiajguna paigunapura rimangaj callarinauca : ¿ Pitangai caiga uchaunara perdonangaj ? nisha .

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Jesús huarmira : Can quirishca canda quishpichishcami . Cushilla ri , nica .

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Ansalla huasha , Jesús puriuca tucui llactaunama , tucui ichilla llactaunamas , Dios mandana pacha evangelio ali shimira rimasha . Paihua chunga ishqui runauna paihua pariju tianauca .

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: Shinallara paihua pariju tianauca huaquin huarmiuna , irus supaigunamanda ungüigunamandas Jesús ñaupa horas alichishcauna , Magdalena nishca Marías , paimanda canzhis supaiguna llucchishcas chihui aca ,

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: shinallara Juana nishca Chuza huarmi , cai Chuza Herodespa mayordomo aca , shinallara Susana , ashca shu huarmiunandi . Caiguna Jesusta yanapanauca paiguna cullquihua .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Ashca runauna caran llactamanda Jesusma shamunauca , Jesús yachachingaj cuentanara cuentasha , nica :

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: Shu tarpuj runa llucshica paihua muyura tarpungaj . Tarpushallara , huaquin muyuuna ñambi rayai urmaca , aitai tucuca , pishcuuna muyura micunauca .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Huaquin muyuuna rumi ahuai urmanauca . Iñasha chaquirica , yacu illajpi .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Huaquin muyuuna casha ucui urmanauca ; cashauna pariju iñasha , itayasha huañuchica .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Shu muyuunaga ali allpai urmanauca . Iñasha , caran muyumanda shu patsaj muyura aparica . Jesús cai shimira cuentasha , caparisha : Uyaj rinriyuj uyachu , nica .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Jesús yachachishca runauna paita tapunauca : ¿ Imara nin cai cuentashca shimi ? nisha .

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cangunama cushcami Dios mandana pacha pacashca shimira intindingaj , astaun shujgunama yachachingaj cuentanahua rimashca aca , ricusha ama ricsingaj , uyasha ama intindingaj .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: Caimi chi yachachingaj cuentana : Tarpushca muyu Diospa shimimi .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Ñambi rayai urmajguna uyanauca , astaumbas uctalla supai apu shamun , shimira quichun paiguna shungumanda , ama quirisha quishpingaj .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Rumi ahuai urmajguna , uyajgunami , cushihua shimira chasquinaun , astaumbas sapi illajguna asha , shu ratolla quirinaun , shu rato huasha tentashcahua anzhurinaun .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Casha ucui urmajguna , uyashallara , cai causana tormendachishcaunahua , charishcaunahua , cai causana gustashcaunahua , itayai tucunaun , mana aparinaun .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Astaun , ali allpai urmajguna , caiguna ali dirichu shunguhua uyashca shimira huacachinaun , aparisha catinaun .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: Pi runas velara apichisha , purui mana tapan , caitu ucui mana churan . Astaun mantacai churan icujguna velara ricungaj .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Tucui ima pacashcaras ricuchishca anga , tucui ima quillpashcaras ricsichishca anga , velama shamungami .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: Shinasha cuiraichi imasna uyanguichi . Charij runama cushca anga ; runa mana charijpiga , pai charinimi nisha iyashcara quichushca anga .

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Jesuspa mama uquiunandi paihuajma shamunauca . Pactanara mana ushanaucachu , ashca runauna taucarimushca raigumanda .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Runauna paita ninauca : Camba mama camba uquiuna canzhai tianaun , canda ricusha ninaun .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Shinajpi cutipasha Jesús paigunara nica : Diospa shimira uyasha pactachijguna , caigunami ñuca mama , ñuca uquiuna .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Shu punzha Jesús canoai icuca pai yachachishca runaunahua . Paigunara nica : Yacu chimbama rishunchi . Shina nijpi , rinaucami .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Paiguna riupi , Jesús puñuriaica . Shu shinzhi huaira atarica yacu cochai . Canoa yacuhua undarisha pambaringarauca .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Jesusma shamusha , paita llicchachinauca : Señor , Señor , nisha , huañuunchi . Jesús lliccharisha huairaras tsajlastas piñaca , saquirinaucami , chunlla tucuca .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Jesús runaunara nica : ¿ Maibirai canguna , Quirinchimi nishca ? Chucchusha manzharinauca , paigunapura rimananauca : ¿ Pitangai cai ? Paiga huairaunara yacuunaras mandan , paiguna casunaun , nisha .

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Gadarenos nishca runauna llactama rinauca , Galilea lamar chimbai tiaj llactama .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Jesús , allpai llutarijpi , paita tupangaj shu supai apishca runa llactamanda shamuca . Unaimanda supai apishca aca . Llatan maca , mana huasii causaca , astaun aya huasiunai .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Cai runaga , Jesusta ricusha , caparisha , paihua ñaupajpi tuama urmaca . Shinzhi shimihua caparisha : Atun Diospa Churi , nica , ¿ imara munangui ñucahua ? Canda rugauni , ama tormendachihuaichu .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Jesús irus supaira mandaca runamanda llucshingaj . Unaimanda supai paita apishca , runa cadena huascahua huatashca aca , shinajpi huascara pitisha supai paita cachaca runa illashca partiunama .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Jesús paita tapuca : ¿ Ima shutira angui ? nisha . Paiga cutipasha : Huaranga anchi , nica , ashca supaiguna paihuajpi icushca asha .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Supaiguna Jesusta ruganauca paigunara ama ucu pachama cachangaj .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Chi mayanllai ashca cuchiuna tiaca , urcui micusha . Supaiguna paita ruganauca , Lugarda cuhuai , nisha , cuchiunai icungaj . Lugarda cuca .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Supaigunaga runamanda llucshisha cuchiunai icunauca . Cuchiuna peñasmanda saltasha , yacui urmasha chucaunaca .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Cuirajgunaga shina tucushcara ricusha miticunauca . Rishaga cuentanauca llactai chi partí mayandas .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Runauna llucshinauca chi tucushcaunara yachangaj . Jesusma shamunauca , supaira ichushca runara tupanauca , churarishcara , ali iyaiyujta , Jesuspa chaquii tiajta . Ricusha manzharinauca .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Ricujguna cuentanauca imasna supai apishca runa quishpichishca aca .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Shinajpi tucui Gadara llacta runauna , tucui muyujta causajgunandi Jesusta ruganauca , Ripaí , nisha , paiguna ashca manzhashca raigumanda . Jesusga canoai icusha tigraca .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Chi supaira ichushca runa Jesusta rugaca paihua pariju tiangaj , astaumbas Jesús paita dispirica , casna rimasha :

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: Tigrai , nica , camba huasima . Cuentai ri imasna Dios canda rashcara . Runa ricami , tucui llacta partii Jesús paihua sumaj rashcara cuentasha .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Jesús tigrajpi , runauna paita cushihua apinauca . Tucui runauna paita chapanauca .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Shinajpi shu Jairo nishca runa , tandarina huasii mandaj apu , shamucami . Jesuspa chaquii tuama urmasha , paita : Shamupai ñuca huasima , nisha rugaca .

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: Shu sapalla ushushihuara charica , chunga ishqui huatayujta , huañusha siriuca . Jesús rijpiga ashca runauna paita nitirimunauca .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Shu ungushca huarmi , paihua yahuar ricurisha mana saquiríca , ña chunga ishqui huatara . Tucui paihua cullquira gastashca doctorgunahua . Pihuas paita alichinara mana ushacachu .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Cal huarmi Jesús huashamanda shamusha , paihua churana pundara llangaca . Cungaimanda paihua ungüi saquiríca .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús rimaca : ¿ Pita ñucara llangahuacai ? nisha . Tucui runa , Mana ñucachu acani , nisha , Pedro paihua compañajgunandi nica : Señor , ashca runauna canda nitirianaun , canda tangarianaun , ¿ Imarasha ningui , ¿ Pita ñucara llangacai ?

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Jesús nica : Pi chari llangahuaca , ñucamanda ushai llucshishcara riparacani .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Huarmi , pai mana pacashcara ricusha , chucchusha Jesuspa ñaupajpi tuama urmai shamuca , tucui runauna ñaupajpi imamanda Jesusta llangashcara nisha cuentaca , shinallara imasnara pai ña aliyashca aca .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Ushushi , can quirishca canda quishpichishcami . Cushihua ri .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Jesús chara rimaullaira tandarina huasi apujmanda shu sirvij runa shamuca , apura rimaca : Camba ushushi ali huañuira huañuca , ama molestaichu Señorda , nica .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Jesús caita uyasha , cutipaca : Ama manzhaichu , nisha , quirilla , huahua aliyangami .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Jesús huasii icusha , mana pitas lugarda cuca paihua pariju icungaj . Pedrora , Jacobora , Juanda , huahua yayaras mamaras lugarda cuca icungaj .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Tucui chihui tiajguna huacanauca , caparinauca huahuamanda . Jesusga paigunara : Ama huacaichichu , nica , huahua mana huañushcachu , puñunllami , nica .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Tiajguna Jesusta asinauca , huahua ali huañushcara yachasha .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Astaumbas Jesús huahuara maquimanda apisha , cayasha nica : Ushushi , atari .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Shinajpi paihua alma tigramuca , chi ratollai huahua shayarica . Jesús : Micunara caraichi , nica .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Yayauna manzharinauca . Jesús paigunara : Pitas ama rimaichichu , nica , cai rashcara .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Jesús pai chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunara tandachisha , paigunara ursaras ushairas cuca tucui supaigunara ichungaj , ungüigunaras alichingaj .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Dios mandana pacha shimira rimangaj paigunara cachaca , shinallara ungushcaunara alichingaj .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Imaras ama apaichichu puringaj , ima taunaras , ima bolsaras , ima tandaras , ima cullquiras , shinallara ishqui churanaras ama apaichichu .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Maican huasiis icusha , chihui tiaichi , chimanda llucshichi .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Maicambas cangunara mana chasquinaupi , canguna chi llactamanda llucshisha , chaquimanda polvora chausichi , paiguna manali rashcara ricuchingaj .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Yachachishca runauna llucshishaga , tucui ichilla llactaunama purinauca , evangelio shimira rimasha , ungushcaunaras alichisha , tucui partiunai .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Herodes atun apu Jesús tucui rashcaunara uyaca . ¿ Imarai ? nica . Huaquinguna ninauca : Juan huañushcamanda causarishcami .

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Shujgunaga : Elias ricurimunmi ; shujgunas : Shu callan horas Diosmanda rimaj causarishcami , ninauca .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Herodes rimaca : Juamba umara pitichicani , ¿ pitangai cai runa casna uyashca ? Paiga Jesusta ricusha nica .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Apóstol nishca Jesús cachashca runauna tigramusha tucui paiguna rashcaunara cuentanauca . Jesusga paigunahua shu runa illashca partima anzhurica , Betsaida nishca llacta rayai .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Ashca runa pai rishcara yachashaga Jesusta catinauca . Jesús paigunara chasquica , Dios mandana pacha shimira paigunara rimaca . Shinallara ungushcaunara alichica .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Ña tutayaupi , paihua chunga ishqui runauna paihuajma shamunauca , paita : Dispiri runaunara , nisha , paiguna llactama micungaj puñungaj rinauchu . Caimi runa illashca parti .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Canguna caraichi runaunara , nica . Cutipanauca : Pichca tandallara ishqui aichahuandi charinchi , ñucanchi mana rijpiga micunara randingaj tucui cai runaunajta .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Chi runauna pichca huaranga tupu anauca . Shinajpi Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Tiachichi pichca chunga pichca chunga caran montombi .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Shina rasha tucui runaunara tiachinauca .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Jesús chi pichca tandara ishqui aichahuandi apisha , ahuama ricusha , bendiciaca . Paquisha pai yachachishca runaunama cuca , runauna ñaupajpi churangaj .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Tucui sajsajta micunauca . Puchujgunara tandachinauca , chunga ishqui suru tasara .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Jesús sapalla tiausha , Diosta mañauca . Pai yachachishca runauna paihua pariju tianauca . Paigunara tapuca , nisha : ¿ Pimi ninaundai ñucara ?

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Cutipasha ninauca : Bautisaj Juan angui , ninaun ; huaquinguna Elíasmi , ninaun ; shujguna shu ñaupa horas Diosmanda rimaj causarimushcami , ninaun .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Jesús nica : Cangunaga , ¿ Pimi nisha nihuanguichi ? Shinajpi Pedro cutipasha nica : Diospa Cristo angui .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Jesusga paigunara mandaca : Ama pitas cuentaichichu , nisha .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Shina nica : Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ashcara tormendaringaj ministirin ; rucuuna , sacerdote apuuna , yachaira yachachijguna ichuhuanaunga , huañuchihuanaunga ; randi , quinsa punzha huasha causarishami .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Shinallara nica tucui runaunama : Shu runa ñucara catisha nijpi , paihua quiquinllara : Mana imaschu ani , nichu ; paihua quiquin cruzta aparichu caran punzha , ñucara catimuchu .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Maican runa paihua causaira huacachisha nisha , causaira pirdingami , maicans paihua causaira pirdisha ñucaraigumanda , paihua causaira quishpichingami .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: ¿ Imajta sirvingai shu runa tucui mundura ganangáj , paulara tularijpi , paulara pirdirijpi ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Maican runas ñucamandas ñuca shimimandas pingarijpi , casna runamanda ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , pingarishami ñuca shamuna horaspi , imahoras shamusha ñuca sumajhua , Yayahua sumajhuas , paihua chuyaj angelguna sumajhuas .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , caibi tiajgunamanda huaquinguna mana huañunaungachu Dios mandana pachara ricungagama .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Casna rimashca huasha , shu pusaj punzha tupu pasashca huasha , Jesús Pedrora Juanda Jacoboras paihua pariju pushaca . Urcuma sicanauca Diosta mañangaj .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Jesús mañajpi , pai mañaushca ratoi , paihua ñahui shu tono tucuca , paihua churana chiujlla ricurica .
