text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Shinajpi ishqui runauna paihua rimanauca : Moisés , Elias anauca .
column6: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
column8: Jesús paita nica : Ama mitsaichichu . Maican runa mana ñucanchihua contra tiausha , pai ñucanchihuami .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Shinajpi ishqui runauna paihua rimanauca : Moisés , Elias anauca .
column6: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
column8: Jesús paita nica : Ama mitsaichichu . Maican runa mana ñucanchihua contra tiausha , pai ñucanchihuami .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Caiguna gusto sumajhua ricurinauca . Jesushua rimanauca pai ringaraushcaras , Jerusalembi tucungaraushcaras .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Pedroga paihua compañajgunandi puñuihua sambayashca anauca ; randi mana puñusha Jesuspa sumajta ricunauca , shinallara chi ishqui runa Jesushua pariju shayajgunara .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Shinajpi , cai ishqui anzhurijpi Jesuspajmanda , Pedro Jesusta : Señor , nica , ¿ manzhu valinma caibi tiangaj ? Quinsa huasihuara rangaichi , cambajta shuj , Moisespajta shuj , Eliaspajta shuj , pai rimashcara mana yachasha .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Pai shina rimaushcai , shu puyu shamuca , paigunara quillpaca . Ashcara manzharinauca , puyui icusha .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Puyu ucumanda shimi uyaríca : Caiga , ñuca llaquishca Churimi , paita uyaichi , nisha .

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Shimi uyarishca huasha , Jesús sapalla saquirica . Paiguna chunlla tucunauca . Chi punzhaunai pitas imaras mana cuentanaucachu paiguna ricushcara .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Cayandi punzha urcumanda irgumushcai , ashca runauna shamunauca paigunara tupangaj .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Chi runa montonmanda shuj caparisha : Yachachij , nica , ricupai ñuca churira , canda rugauni . Ñuca sapalla churimi .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Shu supai paita apin , cungaimanda caparin , paita quihuichin , puscura talichin , ñaca ñaca paita mana saquin .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Can yachachishca runaunara rugacani ichungaj , astaun mana ushanaucachu .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : ¡ Ah , nisha , mana quirij mana uyaj miraiguna ! ¿ Imahorasgama cangunahua compañana ani , cangunara ahuantana ani ? Camba churira pushamui .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Huahua shamujllaira , supai paita allpama . urmachica , paita ashcara quihuichica . Astaun Jesús irus supaira piñaca , huahuara alichica . Jesús huahuara paihua yaya maquii cuca .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Tucui mundu manzharinauca Diospa atun ushaira ricusha .

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: Cai rimashcaunara ali pacha uyaichi : Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , runauna maquii cushca asha .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Paigunaga cai rimashcaunara mana intindinaucachu , maspas paiguna iyaimanda pacashca aca paiguna ama intindingaj . Manzhanaucami paita tapungaj cai shimiunamanda .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna paigunapura tapunanauca paigunamanda maican mas atun tucunga .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Jesús paiguna shungüi iyarishcara riparasha , shu huahuara apisha shayachica paihua rayai .

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Maicans cai huahuara chasquisha ñuca shutira llaquishcaraigumanda , ñucara chasquin . Maicans ñucara chasquisha ñucara cachamujtas chasquin . Cangunamanda maicans mas ichilla , mas manso shunguyuj tucusha , paiga mas atunmi anga .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Shinajpi Juan cutipasha nica : Señor , shu runara ricucanchi , camba shutii supaigunara ichuuca . Paita : Ama raichu , nicanchi , pai mana ñucanchihua catij ashcaraigu .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Tiempo pactarijpi Jesús ahua pachama apishca tucungaj , shinzhi munashcahua Jerusalenma ringaj callarica .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Rimajgunara ñaupara cachaca . Icunauca shu Samaría runauna llactai paihuajta ñaupa puruntungaj .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Astaun paita mana apinaucachu , paihua ñahui Jerusalenma riu ashcaraigu .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Pai yachachishca runauna Jacobo Juandi caita ricusha : Señor , ninauca , ¿ munanguichu ñucanchi ninara ahuapachamanda cachamunara paigunara rupachingaj , Elias rashcasna ?

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús voltiarisha paigunara piñaca : Canguna espíritu samira mana yachanguichu , nisha .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , mana shamucanichu runa almaunara pirdichingaj , astaun paigunara quishpichingaj . Shu llactama rinauca .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Shinajpi paiguna rishallara , ñambii shu runa Jesusta nica : Señor , canda catisha maita can purijpis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Chajauna paiguna puñuna uctura charinaun , pishcuunas paiguna tasinda , astaun ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , maibis mana charinichu umara samachingaj .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Jesús shu runaraga nica : Catihuai . Runa cutipaca : Saquihuai ñaupa punda ñuca yayara pambai ringaj , nisha .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Huañushca samiunara saqui paiguna quiquin huañushcaunara pambangaj . Canga , ri , Dios mandana pacha shimira rimangaj .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Shinajpi shu runa paita nica : Canda catisha , Señor , astaun lugarda cuhuai ñaupa punda ñuca huasii tiaj ailluunara dispiringaj .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesús paita cutipaca : Pi runas allpara allana maquinara apisha paihua maquii , chi huasha huashama ricusha , mana yalinzhu Dios mandana pachai icungaj .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Huashaga Señor shu canzhis chunga runaunara ajllaca . Caigunara ishquipura ishquipura paimanda ñaupara cachaca , tucui pai ringaraushca llactaunama .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Paigunara nica : Pallanaga cierto pacha ashcami , astaun tarabajguna pishinaunmi . Chiraigumanda pallachij Señorda rugaichi tarabajgunara paihua pallanama cachangaj .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Purichi . Ñuca cangunara borregouna cuenta cachauni , pumauna chaupi shungüi .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Ama apaichichu cullqui huacachina cararas , bolsaras , zapato stas . Pitas ama saluraichichu ñambii .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Maican huasira icusha , ñaupa punda rimaichi : Cushi tucuchu cai huasi , nisha .

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Ali shungu runa chihui tiajpi , camba cushi paihuajpi tiangami . Mana shina ajpis cambajma tigrangami .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Chi huasillai tiai , micusha upisha imaras canda cunaupi . Tarabaj runa paita pagashca valinmi . Ama caran huasn pasiaichichu .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Maican llactais icusha , runauna cangunara icuchijpi , imaras cangunama carashcara micuichi .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Chihui tiaj ungushcaunaras alichichi , paigunara nisha : Dios mandana pacha cangunajma mayanllayamushcami .

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Astaumbas maican llactai icusha , runauna cangunara mana munanaupi , chi llacta ñambiunama llucshisha rimaichi :

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Camba llactamanda polvo ñucanchi chaquii llutarishcara chausinchi canguna ñaupajpi . Shinashas yachaichi : Dios mandana pacha cangunajma mayanllayamushcami .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Cangunara nini , Sodoma llacta runauna pishi livachishca anaunga chi punzhai cai llactai tiaj runaunamanda .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: ¡ Ayailla canmanda , Corazín ! ¡ Ayailla canmanda , Betsaida ! Tiro Sidón llactaunai cambajpi munanaita rashcauna rashca ajpiga , ña unai arrepentinaushca anmaca , costal llachapais ushpais tiarisha .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Tiro Sidón llactauna runauna cangunamanda pishi livachishca anaunga taripana punzhai .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Canga , Capernaum , ahuagama ahuayachishca ashcangui , astaun ucu pachagama urayachishca tucunguimi .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: Maicans cangunara uyasha , ñucara uyanmi . Maicans cangunara mana munasha , ñucaras mana munanzhu . Maicans ñucara mana munasha , ñucara cachamujtas mana munanzhu .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Chi cachashca canzhis chunga runauna cushihua tigramunauca : Señor , nisha supaigunas ñucanchira uyanaun camba shutimanda .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Jesús nica : Ñuca Satanasta ricucani ahua pachamanda rayosna urmamujta .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Cangunara ushaira cuni machacuiunara , uputintiunaras aitangaj , tucui chijnijguna ushanaras vencingaj ; imas cangunara mana huajlichingachu .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Shinashas supaiguna cangunara uyashcamanda ama cushiyaichichu , astaun canguna shutira ahua pachai quillcashcamanda , caimanda cushiyaichi .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Chi quiquin ratoi , Jesús cushiyaca paihua almai . Canda alabani , Yaya , nica , can ahua pacha cai pachandi Señormi angui . Umayujgunamanda , yachachishcaunamandas , cai shimiunara pacacangui , astaun llullu huahuaunama ricuchishcangui . Ari , Yaya , shina rasha cushiyacangui .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: Tucui imaras ñuca maquii cushca aca ñuca Yayamanda . Pi runas Churira mana ricsinzhu , Yayalla paita ricsin . Pi runas Yayara mana ricsinzhu , Churilla paita ricsin , shinallara maicandas Churi ajllashcauna paita ricsichingaj .

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunama voltiarisha , paiguna sapalla tiashcai : Cushiunami canguna ricushcaunara ricuj ñahuiuna , nica .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Cangunara nini , ashca Diosmanda rimajguna , ashca rey apuuna canguna ricushcaunara ricungaj munanauca , astaun mana ricunaucachu ; shinallara canguna uyashcara uyangaj munanauca , astaumbas mana uyanaucachu .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Shu ley shimira yachaj runa shayarica Jesusta tentangaj . Pai rimasha : Yachachij , nica , ¿ imara rashai ñuca huiñai huiñai causaira apingaj ?

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Jesús paita nica : ¿ Imara quillcashca tian ley nishca quillcai ? ¿ Imasnara ricungui can ?

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ley shimira yachaj cutipasha nica : Señorga camba Diosta llaquina mangui , tucui shunguhua , tucui almahua , tucui camba ursahua , tucui camba iyaihua . Shinallara camba mayambi causaj runara camba quiquin aicharasna llaquina angui .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Jesús paita : Alimi rimashcangui , nica , caita rasha causanguimi .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Ley shimira yachajga , ali tucusha nisha , Jesusta nica : ¿ Pitangai ñuca mayambi causaj ?

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Shu runa Jerusalenmanda Jérico nishca llactama irguca . Shuhuauna maquiunai urmaca , chiguna pai charishcara quichunauca , paita macasha chugrichinauca . Ñacalla huañushcara saquisha rinauca .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Shu sacerdote runa chi nambira irguca . Chugrishca runara ricusha muyuchisha pasaca .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Shinallara shu Levita nishca sacerdotera sirvij runa mayanlla shamusha , chugrishca runara ricusha , muyuchisha pasaca .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Randi , shu Samaría llactamanda runa nambira pasausha , mayanllayamusha , chugrishca runara ricuca , paita ricusha paihua shungüi llaquirica .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Pactamushaga , chugrishcaunara pilluca , aceitera vinoras talisha chugrishcaunai . Ruñara paihua burroi sicachisha , apasha rica tambo huasima , chihui paita cuiraca .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Cayandi punzha pai ringaraushcai , ishqui cullquira llucchisha , cuiraj runara cuca : Paita ali pacha cuirangui , nisha rimaca . Imaras pishijpi can gastashcamanda , canda pagasha ñuca tigramushcai .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús nica : ¿ Chi quinsa runaunamanda , maican mayambi causaj cuenta tucucachu shuhuauna maquii urmashca runahua ?

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Ley shimira yachaj nica : Paita llaquij runami , yachin , Shinajpi Jesús paita : Ri , nica , shinallara rangui can .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Jesús rishaga , shu ichilla llactai icuca . Shu Marta nishca huarmi paita chasquica paihua huasii .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Cai Marta shu María nishca ñañara charica . María Jesuspa chaquii tiarisha , pai rimashca shimira uyaj aca .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Astaun , Marta yapa turbarij aca paihua ranaunahua , Jesusma shamusha nica : Señor , ¿ Manzhu ricungui imasnara ñuca ñaña ñucara saquín sapalla sirvingaj ? Paita rimai ñucara yanapangaj .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Marta , Marta , nisha , ashca cuiraisiqui angui can , ashca ranaunahua turbarishca angui .

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: Shujlla ministirin . María mas valij partira ajllashcami , paimanda mana quichushca anga .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Jesús shii llactai Diosta mañauca . Mañai pasashca huasha , shu pai yachachishca runa paita : Señor , nica , ñucanchiras yachachihuai mañangaj , imasna Juan shinallara pai yachachishca runaunara yachachica .

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Canguna Diosta mañausha casna rimaichi : Ñucanchi ahua pachai tiaj Yaya , camba shuti ali rimashca achu . Shamuchu can mandana pacha . Can munashca tucuchu imasna ahua pachai shinallara cai pachais .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Cuna punzha ñucanchi caran punzha micuna tandara cuhuapai .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Ñucanchi ucharashcara perdonahuai imasna ñucanchi shinallara perdonanchi ñucanchira manali rajgunara . Ñucanchira ama pushahuaichu tentaciombi , astaun manalimanda llushpichihuapai .

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Shinallara Jesús nica : ¿ Cangunamanda maican runa shu arnigora charisha , paihuajma risha chaupi tuta , paita ninguima : Amigo , quinsa tandara mañachihuai .

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: Shu amigo pactamushcami ñambimanda , ñucaga imaras mana charinichu paita carangaj ;

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: manzhu chishu runa cutipanma : Ama tormendachihuaichu . Pungu ña ishcashcami , huahuauna ña ñucahua sirinaun caitui . Mana ushanichu llucshinara canda cungaj ?

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Cangunara nini , amigo ashcaraigumandalla mana llucshisha , astaun runa paita molestashcamanda llucshingami tucui ministishcara cungaj .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Cangunara nini : Mañaichi , cushcanguichimi . Mascaichi , tarmguichimi . Cayaichi , cangunama pascashca angami .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Tucui mañaj apin . Mascaj tarín . Cayaj runama pascashca anga .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: ¿ Cangunamanda maican yaya , paihua churi paita : Tandara carahuai , nijpi , yaya shu rumira cungachu ? ¿ Aichahuara mañajpi , yaya machacuira cungachu ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: ¿ Lulunda mañajpi , yaya shu uputindira cungachu ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Shinashas , canguna manaliuna asha , ali cuyashcara canguna churiunama cuyanara yachasha , ¿ manzhu mas mas canguna ahua pacha Yaya Santo Espiritura cunga paita mañajgunara ?

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Jesús shu supaira ichuca , upa shimi supai aca . Supai llucshijpi , runa ña rimaca . Runauna manzharinauca .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Huaquingunaga ninauca : Beelzebú nishca supaiguna atun apu ushaihua cai runa supaigunara ichun .

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Shujgunaga , Jesusta tentangaj : Shu ahua pachamanda ricurinara ricuchihuai , ninauca .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Jesusga paiguna iyaira intindisha , paigunara nica : Tucui llacta pai quiquinmanda chaupirisha , tucurishca anga . Shinallara shu huasi pai quiquinmanda chaupirisha tularingami .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Shinallarami , Satanás pai quiquinmanda chaupirisha , ¿ Imasna pai mandana pacha shayaringa ? canguna ñuca Beelzebú ushaihua supaigunara ichuuni nisha .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Ñucaga supaigunara ichusha Beelzebumanda , ¿ canguna churiunaga pimanda supaigunara ichunaun ? Chimanda paiguna cangunara taripanaun .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Astaunga ñuca Diospa rerohua supaigunara ichujpi , ciertomi Dios mandana pacha cangunajma pactamushcami .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: Imahoras shu shinzhi runa paihua huasira ricun , pai charishcauna ali tucunaun .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Astaumbas shu yali shinzhi runa shamusha , paita vencisha , tucui pai munashca esparaunara quichun , apashcaunara chaupin shujgunama .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: Maicambas mana ñucahua tiausha , ñucahua contra tucun . Maicambas mana ñucahua tandachisha , chausinmi .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: Imahoras irus supai shu runamanda llucshin , chaquishca partiunai purin , samanara mascasha , mana tarisha , casnami nin : Ñuca tigrasha ñuca llucshishca huasimallara .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Shamujpis huasira ña sumajlla pichashcara alichishcara tupan .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Shinajpi rin , chishu canzhis supaigunara , paimanda yali irusgunara , pushamun , huasii icusha chihui tiasha causanaun . Chi runa huasha causana ñaupa causanamanda yali mana valij tucun .

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Jesús chi shimiunara rimaushcai , shu huarmi chihui shayaj montonmanda , atarisha caparica : Cushimi canda aparij icsa , nisha ; cushimi canda chuchuchij chuchuuna .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Astaun , cushiunami Diospa shimira uyajguna , pactachijguna .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Runauna paihuajma taucarimujpí , Jesús rimangaj callarica : Cuna horas causaj runauna manaliunami . Ricurinara mascanaun . Astaun shu ricurinara mana ricuchishca anga . Jonasllara ricurinara cuenta ricuchishca anga .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Imasna Jonás Ninive llacta runaunama ricurína aca , shinallarami ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , cuna horas causajgunama shu ricurina cuenta tucushami .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Taripana punzhai , Sur partimanda shamuj reina huarmi apu ataringami cuna horas causaj runaunara taripangaj , paigunara causayachingami . Pai caru partimanda shamuca Salomomba sabiro shimiunara uyangaj . Astaun , shu Salomónmanda yali caibi tiaun .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ninivemanda runauna atarinaungami taripana punzhai cuna horas causaj runaunahua , paigunara causayachingami . Jonás rimashcara uyasha arrepentirinauca . Astaun shu Jonasmanda yali caibi tiaun .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: Mana pihuas shu velara sindichisha tasa ucui churan , astaun ahuai huatan , tucui huasii icujguna velara ricungaj .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Ñahuiga aichamanda vela cuentami . Camba ñahui ali ajpi , camba aicha punzhayachishca angami , astaun camba ñahui manali ajpi , entero aicha llandui tiaunga .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Ricupai camba shungu ucui tiaj vela cuenta ama tuta tucuchu .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Shinasha , tucui camba aicha punzhahua undarishca asha , mana ima partís llandui ashas , tucui punzhayachishca anga , imasna shu vela canda punzhayachin pai aitashcahua .

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Jesús rimai pasashca huasha , shu fariseo runa paita rugasha : Ñucahua pariju micui , nica . Jesús icusha mesai tiarica .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Fariseo runaga paita ricusha manzharica , Jesús mana maillasha micungaraupi .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Señorga paita : Cierto pacha , nica , canguna fariseo runauna vaso huasha partira pulato huasha partiras maillanguichi , astaun canguna shungu ucui ima shuhuanahuas , ima manali iyaigunahuas undarishca anguichi .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Upauna , nica ¿ huasha partira raj manzhu shinallara ucu partira rarca ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Can charishcaunamanda tsuntsuunama cuichi , casna rasha tucui cangunama chuyaj tucungami .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: ¡ Ayailla fariseoguna ! Chunga partiunamanda shu partira Diosta cunguichi canguna mishqui pangamanda ayaj pangamandas , tucui pangaunamandas ; astaumbas ali causanara Diosta llaquinaras cungarishcanguichi . Caigunara rangaj ministirica , chigunaras mana saquisha .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: ¡ Ayailla fariseoguna ! ali tiarinaunara mascanguichi tandarina huasiunai , pulasaunais saluranaras mascanguichi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: ¡ Ayailla yachaira yachachijguna , fariseogunas ! ishqui shimiyujguna ! Mana ricurij pambana uctuuna cuenta anguichi , runauna paiguna ahuai aitasha mana riparanaun .

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Shu ley shimira camachijga cutipasha : Yachachij , nica , casna rimasha can ñucanchira piñaungui .

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Jesús nica : ¡ Ayailla shinallara canguna ley shimira camachijguna ! Runaunara mana aparihuaj cargaunara apachinguichi , astaumbas canguna ichilla rerohua mana llanganguichichu yanapangaj .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: ¡ Ayailla canguna ! Diosmanda rimajguna pambana huasiunara sicachinguichimi , astaun canguna yayauna paigunara huañuchinauca .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Shinasha canguna , ricujguna , Ari nijguna anguichi canguna yayauna rashcaunara . Cierto pacha canguna yayauna Diosmanda rimajgunara huañuchinauca , cangunasga paiguna pambana huasiunara sicachinguichi .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Chi raigumanda Diospa sabiro shimi nica : Paigunama Diosmanda rimajgunara , cachashca runaunaras cachashami . Paigunamanda huaquingunara huañuchinaunga , huaquingunaras tormendachinaunga .

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Chi raigumanda cuna horas causau runauna causayachishca anaunga tucui Diosmanda rimajguna talishca yahuarmanda , mundu callarina horasmanda pacha ,

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: Abelmanda Zacaríasgama , cai Zacarías altarhua templo huasihua chaupi shungüi huañuchishca aca . Cangunara nini , tucui cai talirishca yahuarmanda cuna horas causajguna taripashca anaungami .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: Ayaüla , ley shimira camachijguna ! Yachana pungu llavera quichucanguichi . Canguna mana icucanguichichu , astaun icusha nijgunara arcacanguichimi .

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Jesús cai shimiunara rimausha , yachaira yachachijgunas fariseogunas paita ashcara nitiringaj callarinauca , ashca shimiunara tapusha paita tormendachingaj .

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: Ima shimiis paita urmachingaj mascanauca , paita culpangaj .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Chi punzhaunai ashca huaranga runa tandarinauca , paigunapura aitaríjta . Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara ñaupa punda rimangaj callarica : Cuiraichi , nisha , fariseoguna tandara punguichina polvomanda ; paiguna ishqui shimiyuj anaun .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Ima quillparishcas pascashca anga . Ima pacashcas yachashca anga .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Chiraigumanda can llandui rimashca shimiuna punzhai uyashca anaunga . Can huasi ucui rinrii rimashca shimiuna canzhai caparishca anga huasi pundamanda .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: Astaumbas , ñuca amigouna , cangunara nini : Ama manzhaichichu aichara huañuchijgunara , chi huasha imaras mana ushanaunzhu rangaj .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Randi cangunara yachachisha pitara manzhana angai . Paita manzhaichi canguna causaira quichushca huasha ushaira charin ucu pacha ninai shitangaj . Shinasha cangunara nini : Paita manzhaichi .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu pichca ichilla pishcu ishqui reallla valin catungaj ? Shina ajllaira chi pishcuunamanda Dios mana shujllaras cungarinzhu .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Shinallara camba umai caran aechara yupashcami . Ama manzhaichichu , ashca pishcuunamanda yali valij anguichi .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: Cangunara nini , tucui runa ñucara ricsisha rimajpi runauna ñaupajpi , shinallara ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , paita ricsisha rimasharni Diospa angelguna ñaupajpi .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Astaun maican runa ñucamanda mana rimajpi runauna ñaupajpi , paita shinallara Diospa angelguna ñaupajpi mana rimashcachu anga .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: Maican runa ñuca , Runa Churi nishcara , camijpi , paita perdonashca anga , astaun maican runa Santo Espiritura camijpi , mana perdonashcachu anga .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: Imahoras cangunara tandarina huasiunamas , taripajgunamas , apuunamas pushamunaupi , ama turbarichichu imara cutipashun , imara rimashun , nisha .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Chi horasllai Santo Espíritu cangunara yachachinga imara rimana ashcaras .

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Chigunamanda shu runa paita nica : Yachachij , ñuca uquira rimai ñuca yayamanda apiñara ñucahua chaupichingaj .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Jesusga paita nica : Amigo , ¿ pi ñucara taripajta chaupichijta churacachu cangunajpi ?

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Ricuichi , cuiraichi tucui cullquira yalijta munanamanda . Runa causaibiga yapa ashca charinara mana ministirinzhu .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Shu yachachisha cuentanara paigunara cuentaca : Shu charij runa allpa ashcara cuca pallaushca horaspi .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Dueñoga paihua shungüi iyarica : ¿ Imara rashai ? nisha . Imais ñuca pallashcara huacachingaj mana charinichu .

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Casna rasha , nica , ñuca huacachina huasiunara tulasha , yali atungunara sicachisha , chihui tucui ñuca pallashcaunara ñuca charishcaras huacachisha .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Ñuca almara rimasha : Alma , nisha , ashca charishcara charingui , ashca huatagama durangami . Samai , micui , upi , cushiyai .

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: Dios paita nica : Upa runa , cuna tuta camba almara cayangaj shamunaunga . Can tandachishcaga , ¿ pihuajta tucungai ?

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Shinallarami shu runa tandachijpi paihuajllara , astaumbas Diosta mitsaj .

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica : , Chiraigumanda cangunara nini , Ama turbarichichu canguna causanamanda ¿ imara micuna angai ? nisha , shinallara canguna aichamanda ¿ imara churarina angai ? nisha .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Canguna causai micunamanda yali valin , canguna aicha churanamanda yali valin .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Iyarichi illahuangaunara , mana tarpunaun , mana pallanaun , huacachina huasiunaras mantacaras mana charinaun . Shinashas Dios paigunara caran . ¿ Manzhu canguna pishcuunamanda mas yali valijguna anguichi ?

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: ¿ Pita cangunamanda ashcara turbarisha shu chaupi rigra tupura yaparinara ushanguichu mas atun tucungaj ?

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Shinashas , canguna ima ichilla ranaras mana ushasha , ¿ imarasha turbaringuichichu atun ranaunamanda ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Sisaunara iyarisha ricuichi imasna iñanaun . Mana tarabanaun , mana cauchunaun . Cangunara nini Salomón paihua tucui sumajhua mana churarishcachu aca shu cai sisauna cuenta .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Shinajpi , Dios yanga quihuara casna churachijpi , cuna punzha allpai shayanlla , cayandi punzha ninai shitai tucun , ¿ imasna astaun mas Dios cangunara churachingami , canguna ansalla quirij runauna ajllaira ?

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: Canguna ama turbarichichu , ¿ imara micushun ? ¿ imara upishun ? nisha . Shinallara ama manzharichichu .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Cai tucuiunara mundu runauna mascanaun , astaumbas canguna caigunara ministishcara canguna Yaya yachanmi .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Astaun , Dios mandana pachara mascaichi , cai tucuira cangunara yapashca anga .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: Ama manzhaichichu , ichilla monton runauna . Canguna Yaya paihua mandana pachara cangunama cuyasha nin .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Canguna charishcaunara catuichi , tsuntsuunama cuyaichi . Cangunajta mana ismuj bolsaunara raichi . Mana tucurij valijgunara ahua pachai tandachichi . Chihui shuhuaj mana pactan , taula curus mana micun .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Maibi can charishcauna tiajpi , chihui canguna shungu tianga .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: Chumbillishca tiajuichi , canguna velaunara sindishcara charíchi .

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: Boramanda paihua patrón tigranara chapau runauna cuenta tucuichi ; pai boramanda shamusha cayajpi , pungura dsas pascangaj .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Cushi shunguyujmi chi sirvijguna , patrón shamusha puruntu chapaugunara tupangami . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , paillara chumbillingami , paigunara mesai tiachingami , paigunara sirvingaj shamungami .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Patrón chaupi tuta shamusha , gallo cantashca huashalla shamusha , pai chi sirvijgunara chapaugunara tupanma , cushi shunguyujmi casna rasha sirvijguna .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Caitaga yachaichi , dueño shuhuaj shamungaraushca horasta yachasha , chapanmaca , lugarda mana cunmaca paihua huasira icungaj .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Canguna shinallara puruntushca tiaichi . Canguna mana iyashca horaspi ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , shamushami .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Shinajpi Pedro paita : Señor , nica , ¿ cai yachachingaj cuentashcara ñucanchimallachu cuentangui , manzhu tucui runaunamas ?

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Señor paita nica : ¿ Pitangairi shu ali cierto ali sabiro mayordomo , paihua patrón paita churangami paihua huasi ahuai micuna horaslla chihui tiajgunara carangaj ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Cushi shunguyujmi chi sirvij runa , paihua patrón shamusha paita taringa casna rauta .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , tucui pai charishcara chi sirvijpa maquii churangami cuirangaj .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Astaumbas chi sirvij runa paihua shungüi nijpi : Ñuca patrón unaiyaun shamungaj , shina nisha chishu sirvij runaunaras huarmiunaras callarin livachingaj , maspas pai micungaj upingaj machangaj callarijpi ,

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: shamungami chi sirvijpa patrón pai mana iyaushca punzhai , pai mana yachashca horaspi , paita shinzhira livachingami , mana quirijgunahua pariju paita churangami .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: Chi sirvij runa paihua patrón munashcara intindisha , astaun mana puruntusha , pai munashcara mana pactachisha , ashcara azuti tucungami .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Astaumbas shu sirvij runa mana ricsisha shinasha azutina tupura rajllaira , ansallami azutishca anga . Maican runama ashcara cushca ajpiga , ashcara mañashca anga paimanda . Maicanma ashcara mingashca ajpi , paimanda mas mañashca anga .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: Ninara cai pachai shitangaj shamucani . ¿ Imara mas munasha ña sindichishca ajpi ?

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Shu bautisanahua bautisarina ani . Ashcara tormendarini pactaringagama .

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: ¿ Iyanguichichu ñuca cai pachama shamucani ganas causanaras cungaj ? Mana , nini , astaun piñanaunara cungaj .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Cuna horasmanda , shu huasii pichca runa tiajpi , quinsa shu partimanda ishqui chishu partimanda piñanausha tianaunga .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Yayaga churihua macanaunga , churis yayahua . Mama ushushihua macanaunga , ushushis mamahua . Cari mama cachunhua macanaunga , cachun paihua cari mamahua .

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Jesús shinallara runaunara nica : Canguna shu puyura indi icuna partimanda shamujta ricusha , tamiangaraun , ninguichi . Shina tucun .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Huaira sur nishca quinri partimanda huairajpi , rupaj tucunga , ninguichi . Shina tucun .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: ¡ Ishqui shimiyujguna ! nica , ahua pacharas cai pacharas ricurishcara ricsinara yachanguichi , ¿ Imarashaga mana yachanguichu cai horasta ?

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: ¿ Imaraigu cangunallara ali taripanara mana taripanguichi ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Shinajpi , can apujma riña horas canhua piñarij runahua , paihua alichinara mascai ñambillaira , mana chasna rajpiga , pai canda aisasha pushanga apuma , paiga canda soldaro maquii churanga , soldaroga canda chonda cularbi ishcanga .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Canda nini , chimanda mana llucshinguichu puchucai mediora pagangagama .

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Cai horaspi huaquinguna Jesusta cuentanauca imasna Pilato huaquin Galilea runaunara huañuchisha , paiguna quiquin yahuarda masaca paiguna rashca sacrificio yahuarhua .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipaca : ¿ Iyanguichichu cai Galilea runauna casnara tormendachishca ajpi , tucui Galilea runaunamanda yali uchayujguna aca ? nisha .

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Mana , cangunara nini , astaumbas canguna mana arrepentirijpi , shinallara tucui huañunguichimi .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Shinallara chi chunga pusac runauna imahoras Siloe nishca huasi paiguna ahuai urmasha huañuchijpi , ¿ iyanguichichu chiguna tucui Jerusalembi tiaj runaunamanda yali uchayujmi anauca ? nisha .

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Mana , cangunara nini , astaumbas canguna mana arrepentirijpi shinallarami tucui huañunguichimi .

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Shinallara Jesús cai yachachingaj cuentanara cuentaca . Shu runa shu higo muyu yurara paihua chagrai tarpushcara charica . Dueño shamuca muyura mascangaj , astaun mana aparishca aca .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Cuiraj runara nica : Ña quinsa huata tupura muyura mascashcani cai higo yurai , astaumbas mana tupashcanichu . Cuchui , ¿ imarashara yanga shayanga allpara gastachisha ?

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Shinajpi cuiraj runa cutipasha : Señor , nica , cai huatallara saqui , yura muyujta allasha ali allpara churasha .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Chi huasha ali muyura aparijpi alimi , mana aparijpiga cuchungui .

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Shu samana punzha Jesús tandarina huasii yachachiuca .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Chihui shu huarmi tiauca , shu unguchij supaira charij , chunga pusac huata tupura . Huasha tullu cumuyashca puriuca , mana ansas dirichuyangaj ushacachu .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Jesús paita ricusha cayaca : Huarmi , nica , camba ungüimanda llushpichishca angui .

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Shina nisha , Jesús paihua maquira paihua ahuai churaca . Dsaslla huarmi dirichuyaca . Huarmiga Diosta alabaca .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Tandarina huasi apuga , Jesús samana punzhai huarmira alichishcamanda piñarisha chihuajgunara nica : Socta punzha tian tarabangaj . Chi punzhaunaiga shamichi alichi tucungaj . Ama shamichichu samana punzhai , nica .

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Shinajpi Señor paita cutipasha : Ishqui shimiyuj runa , nica , ¿ manzhu caran dueño cangunamanda paihua huagrara paihua burrora liushpichin huasimanda , yacuma pushangaj , upichingaj samana punzhai ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Astaun cai huarmi , Abrahamba ushushi asha , Satanás huatashca ashca cai chunga pusac huatara , ¿ manzhu paita pascana aca shu samana punzhai ?

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Jesús casna rimajpi , tucui paihua contra rimajguna pingarinauca , astaun tucui runauna cushiyanauca pai tucui munanaita rashcaunamanda .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Jesús nica : ¿ Imahuara ricuchishai Dios mandana pachara ? ¿ Imasnara angairi ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Shu mostaza nishca muyu cuentami . Runa cai muyura apisha , chagrai tarpusha , muyu iñaca , atun yura tucuca , pishcuuna paiguna huasiunara ranauca paihua pallcaunai .

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Cutillara Jesús nica : ¿ Imahuara ricuchishai Dios mandana pachara ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Dios mandana pacha tandara punguichina polvo cuentami , shu huarmi apica , quinsa libra harina polvoi churaca , punguiringama saquica .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Jesús atun llactaunara ichilla llactaunaras pasauca , runaunara yachachisha , Jerusalenma riusha .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Shu runa paita : Señor , ¿ nica , ansalla runauna quishpinaun ?

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Ursarichi , nica , quishqui pungura icungaj . Cangunara nini , ashcauna icungaj mascanaun , astaun mana ushanaungachu .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Huasiyuj dueño atarisha , pungura ishcashca huasha canzhamanda cayangaj callaringuichi , Señor , Señor , pungura pascahuai , nisha . Paiga cutipasha cangunara ñinga : Mana ricsinichu cangunara maimanda chari anguichi .

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Shinajpi rimangaj callaringuichi : Camba ñaupajpi micushcanchi , upishcanchi , can yachachicangui ñucanchi pulazaunai , nisha .

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Paiga rimangami : Cangunara nini , mana yachanichu canguna maimanda chari anguichi . Rijuichi ñucajmanda tucui manalira rajguna .

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: Chihui atun huacais quiñi mucunas tianga , imahoras canguna Abrahandas , Isactas , Jacobdas , tucui Diosmanda rimajgunaras , Dios mandana pachai tiajgunaras ricunguichi , cangunaga canzhama ichushcauna asha .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Shamunaungami indi llucshina partimandas , indi icuna partimandas , norte nishca quinri partimandas , sur nishca quinri partimandas . Mesai tiarinaunga Dios mandana pachai .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Ñaupa ajguna puchucaiguna anaunga , puchucaibi ajguna ñaupa pundai anaunga .

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Chi punzhallaira fañseogunamanda huaquinguna Jesusma shamunauca , paita ninauca : Llucshi , caimanda ri . Herodes canda huañuchisha ninmi .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Jesusga paigunara : Richi , nica , cai sacha allcura rimai richi ; casna rauni , supaigunara ichuni , ungushcaunara alichini cunas cayas , quinsa punzhaiga ñuca ranara tucuchini .

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Astaun ministirin ñuca nambira catingaj , cunas , cayas , minzhas . Mana usharinzhu shu Diosmanda rimaj huañungaj Jerusalenmanda canzhai .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ¡ Jerusalén , Jerusalén , Diosmanda rimajgunara huañuchij , cambajma cachashcaunara rumihua shitaj ! ¡ Masna cuti camba churiunara tandachingaj munacani , imasna atallba paihua huahuaunara rigra ucuma ugllaringaj , astaun mana munacanguichu !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Canguna huasira chunlla saquishcami , maspas ñucara mana ricuhuanguichichu shamuna horas pactamungama imahoras ninguichi : Cushimi Señorba shutii shamuj runa .

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Jesús shu fariseo apu huasii icusha shu samana punzha micungaj , runauna paita chapanauca urmachingaj .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Chihui shu ksa yacuhua punguirishca runa shamuca .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Jesusga ley shimira yachajgunara fariseounaras : ¿ Alichihuajchu , nica , samana punzhai ?

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Paigunaga mana cutipanaucachu . Shinajpi Jesús ungushca runara apisha , paita alichica , paita dispirisha cachaca .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Jesús runaunara nica : ¿ Maican runa cangunamanda paihua burro , paihua huagra uctui urmajpi , manzhu ringai uctalla llucchingaj , samana punzha ajllaira ?

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Mana pihuas paita cutipanara ushacachu .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Jesús ricusha imasnara huaquinguna mesai ñaupa tiarinaunara ajllanauca , shu yachachingaj cuentanara cuentaca mesama convirashcaunara , casna nica :

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: Can borama convirashca ashaga , ama tiarichu ñaupa tiarinai . Shu canmanda yali runa istama convirashca ima tiaunmami .

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: Casna runa shamujpi , candas paitas conviraj dueño shamunga , canda rimanga : Llucshipai , amigo , ñinga , can tiaushcara cui cai runama . Shinajpi can pingarisha puchucai tiarinara apingaj callaringui .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Astaun , can convirashca ashaga , puchucai tiarinai tiarigri . Casna rajpi canda conviraj dueño shamusha , canda ñinga : Amigo , mas ñaupajma tiarígri . Casna rajpi can ahuayachishca angui shu canhua pariju shamujguna ñaupajpi .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Maicambas paillarara ahuayachisha pishiyachishca anga , astaun maicans paulara pishii iyasha ahuayachishca anga .

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Jesús paita convirajta shinallara nica : Can shu istara rasha , ama conviraichu camba aillullara , uquiunara , yayaunara , mayambi causaj charijgunaras . Paiguna canda cutipasha conviranara ushanaunga , pagai tucunguimi .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Astaumbas can istara rasha , tsuntsuunara convirangui , pullu maquiunara , anga changaunaras , ñausaunaras .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Can casna rasha , cushi tucungui . Caiguna canda paganara mana ushanaun , astaun can pagai tucungui ali runauna causarimuna punzhai .

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Shu paihua pariju mesai tiarij runa caita uyasha nica : Cushimi pi runas tandara micuj Dios mandana pachai .

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita nica : Shu runa chishii atun micuna istara rarca , ashca runaunara conviraca .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Micuna horas ña pactajpi , paita sirvijta cachaca convirashcaunara cayangaj , paigunara : Shami , ñingaj , tucui ña puruntushcami , nisha .

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Tucui convirashcaunaga : Mana lugarchu ani ningaj callarinauca . Ñaupa aj runa nica : Shu hacindara randishcani , llucshina mani ricungaj . Canda rugauni perdonahuapai , nisha .

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Shuj nica : Ña randishcani chunga aisaj huagraunara . Riunimi paigunara camangaj . Perdonahuapai , canda rugauni .

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Shujga , Ña casarashcani , nica , chi raigumanda mana ushanichu ringaj .

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: Sirvijga tigramusha , cai tucuira paihua patronda cuentaca . Shinajpi dueño piñarisha paihua sirvijta nica : Uctalla ri , pulasaunama , llacta ñambiunamas . Caima pushamui tsuntsuunara , pullu maquiunara , anga chaquiunara , ñausaunaras .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: Sirvijga : Patrón , nica , can mandashcasnara rashcami . Shinajllaira chara lugar tiaun .

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: Patronga sirvijta nica : Ri , yanga ñambiunama , chagra unamas , chihuajgunara aísasha pushamungaj , ñuca huasi undajta tucungaj .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Cangunara nini , mana pihuas ñaupa convirashcaunamanda ñuca istara gustangachu .

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Ashca runauna Jesusta compañanauca . Jesús paigunama voltiarisha nica :

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Shu runa ñucama shamusha , mana paihua yayara , mamara , huarmira , churiunara , ushushiunara , paihua causanaras chijnisha , paiga ñuca yachachishca runa mana ushanzhu tucungaj .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Shu runa mana paihua quiquin cruzta aparisha , ñucara catishas , mana ushanzhu ñuca yachachishca runa tucungaj .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: ¿ Pita cangunamanda shu huasira rasha nisha , manzhu ñaupa punda tiaringa , cullquira yupangaj ; ¿ Pactangachu , nisha , manzhu pactanga , huasira tucuchingaj ?

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Mana shina rajpi , istandira shayachishca huasha , mana ushanma tucuchingaj . Shinajpi tucui ricujguna asingaj callarinaunga .

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: Casna nisha : Cai runa huasira sícachingaj callarica , astaun mana ushacachu tucuchinara .

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: Shinallara maican rey apu , shu reyhua guerrangaj purisha , ¿ manzhu ñaupara tiaringa iyaringaj , ushashachu imara nisha shu chunga huaranga soldarounahua ishqui chunga huaranga shamuj soldarounahua guerrangaj ?

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Mana ushashaga , chi shu rey chara carui tiajllaira , runaunara cachangami amigopura tucungaj nisha .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Shinajpi cangunamanda maicambas mana tucui pai charishcaunara saquisha , mana ushanzhu shu ñuca yachachishca runa tucungaj .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: Cachi yapa alimi , astaun cachi paihua mishquira pirdijpi , ¿ imahuara cuti paita mishquiyachinga ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Allpajpas basurajpas mana sirvin . Ichuna anga canzhama . Uyaj rinriyuj uyachu .

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Jesusma tucui cullquira tandachijguna , tucui uchayujguna shamunauca , paita uyangaj .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: Fariseoguna yachaira yachachijgunandi paimanda piñarinauca : Cai runa uchayujgunara chasquin , paigunahua micun , nisha .

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Jesús cai yachachingaj cuentanara paigunara cuentaca :

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: ¿ Maican runa cangunamanda shu patsaj borregounara charij , shu borrego chingaríjpi , manzhu chi iscun chunga iscun borregora saquingami runa illashca partii , paiga ringami chingarishcara mascangaj tupangagama ?

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Tarijpiga , paihua rigrai churangami , cushiyasha .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Huasima pactamusha , amigounaras mayambi causajgunaras tandachingami , paigunara : Cushiyaichi ñucahua , chingarishca borregora tarishcanimi , nisha .

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Shinallarami cangunara nini , ahua pachai yalira cushiyanaunga imahoras shu uchayuj runa arrepentirijpi iscun chunga iscun ali runaunamánda arrepentirinara mana ministinaupi .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: Shinallara , ¿ maican huarmi chunga cullquira charisha , shujta chingachisha , manzhu shu vela purura sindichisha , huasira pichanga , ali pacha mascanga paihua cullquira taringagama ?

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Tarishaga , paihua amigaunara mayambi causajgunaras tandachisha , paigunara : Cushiyaichi , ñuca chingachishca cullquira tarishcanimi , ñinga .

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Shinallarami cangunara nini , angelguna ñaupajpi cushi tianmi imahoras shu uchayuj runa arrepentirijpi .

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: Shinallara Jesús nica , Shu runa ishqui churira charica .

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Quipa churi yayara rimaca : Yaya , nisha , ñuca apiña partira camba hacindamanda cuhuai . Yayaga pai charishcaunara chaupichisha churiunama cuca .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Ansa punzhauna huasha , quipa churi tucui pai charishcara tandachisha , shu caru partima rica . Chihui nuspasha causasha , pai charishcara tucuchica .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Tucuira ña yanga gastashca huasha , atun yarcai tiempo shamuca chi partii . Churiga yarcaihua huañungaj callarica .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Ricami shu chi partii causaj runajma , paihua llutarica . Runaga paita cachaca paihua hacindama cuchiunara cuirangaj .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Cuchi micunahua paihua icsara undachisha nica . Shinajllaira mana pihuas paita cuca micunara .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Paiga iyarisha nica : ¿ Masna ñuca yaya huasii tiau tarabajguna ashca micunara charinaun , ñucaga caibi yarcaihua huañuuni ?

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Atarisha , ñuca yayajma rishami , paita nisha : Yayalla , ahua pacha ñaupajpis camba ñaupajpis uchara rashcanimi .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Ña mana valijchu ani camba churi nishca tucungaj , shu cambajpi tarabaj runara cuenta apihuai .

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Atarishaga , paihua yayajma shamuca . Churiga chara carui shamujllaira , yaya paita ricuca , ricusha llaquirica churimanda . Yaya callpasha rica , paita ujllarisha muchaca .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Churi yayara rimasha : Yayalla , nica , ahua pacha ñaupajpi camba ñaupajpis ucharashcani . Ña mana valijchu ani camba churi nishca tucungaj .

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Astaun yaya sirvijgunara nica : Ali churanara llucchichi , churachichi . Sortiasta reroi , zapatostas chaquii churachichi .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Racu huagra huahuara apamichi , huañuchichi , ñucanchi micungaj . Istara rashunchi .

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Caiga ñuca churi huañushca aca , cuna causarishca ; chingarishca aca , cunaga tarishcami . Cushiyangaj callarinauca .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: Paihua ñaupa churi chagrai tiauca . Pai shamusha , huasi mayambi pactamusha , tocaushcaras bailaushcaras uyaca .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Shu sirvijta cayasha tapuca : ¿ Imarai cai uyarina ? nisha .

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Sirvijga paita : Camba uqui tigramushcami , nica . Camba yaya racu huagra huahuara huañuchishcami , pai alilla tigramushcamanda .

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Churiga piñarica , mana munacachu icunara . Yayaga llucshisha paita rugaca icungaj .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Ñaupa churi yayara cutipasha : Riqui , Yaya , nica , ashca huatara canda sirvishcani , tucuibi can mandashcara pactachishcani . Imahoraspas shu chivohuallaras mana cuhuashcangui ñuca cushi tucungaj ñuca amigounahua .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Astaumbas cai camba churi shamujpi , camba hacindara manali causaj huarmiunahua gastashca huasha , can paihuajta racu huagra huahuara huañuchishcangui .

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: Shinajpi yaya paita : Churi , nica , tucui horas can ñucahua tiaungui . Tucui ñuca charishcauna cambajmi .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Shinasha ministirica istara rangaj , cushi tucungaj , cai camba uqui huañushca aca , ña causarishcami ; chingarishca aca , ña cuti tarishcami .

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
