text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Shu charij runa tiaca . Mayordomora charica . Cai mayordomomanda rimashca aca : Pai camba charishcara baratunmí , nisha .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Patrón paita cayasha , nica : ¿ Imarai cai ñuca canmanda uyashca ? Cuentasta raí can mayordomo ashcamanda . Ña mana mas ushangui mayordomo tucungaj .

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: Shinajpi mayordomo paihua shungüi nica : ¿ Imara ranarai , ñuca patrón ñucara mayordomo tiashcamanda quichuhuan ? Allanara mana ushanichu , mañashalla causanara mana ushanichu , pingarichihuanmi , nica .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Ñuca yachani imara ranaras , ñucara mayordomo tiashcamanda llucchijpi cayai tucungaj amigouna huasiunai .

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: Caran paihua patronda dibij runara cayasha , ñaupa shamujta nica : ¿ Masnara dibingui ñuca patronda ?

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Dibiyuj cutipaca : Shu patsac lata micuna aceitera . Mayordomo paita nica : Camba dibi quillcara api , uctalla tiari , pichca chungara quillcai .

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Chí huasha shujta nica : Canga , ¿ masnara dibingui ? Paiga shu patsac quintal trigo muyura , nica . Mayordomo paita : Camba quillcara api , nica , pusac chunga quintalda quillcai .

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: Patronga mana valij mayordomora alabaca pai sabiro rashcamanda . Cai mundui causajguna punzhai causajgunamanda yali sabiro anaun runaunahua .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: Shinallara cangunara nini : Canguna cai uchayuj mundu cullquihua amigounara raichi , shina ajllaira cullqui tucurijpi amigouna cangunara chasquinaunga huiñaigama duraj tianaunai .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: Maican runa ali rajpi ansazhituhuai , shinallara ali rangami ashcai . Maican runa manali rajpi ansazhituhuai , shinallara manali rangami ashcai .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Canguna mana ali rajpi yanga charishcaunahua , ¿ pita cangunara ali cierto valijgunara cunga cuirangaj ?

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Canguna shujpa charishcaunahua mana alira rajpi , ¿ pita canguna quiquimbajta cunga charingaj ?

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: Mana pis ishqui patronda sirvina ushanzhu , shujta chijninga , chishujtaga llaquinga ; shujhua ali tucunga , chishujtaga pishiyachinga . Cangunaga mana ushanguichu Diostas cullquiras sirvingaj .

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: Fariseoguna shinallara cai Jesús rimashca shimiunara uyanauca . Paiguna cullquira llaquijguna asha , paita asinauca .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Canguna pactajta runauna manchi , ninguichi runauna ñaupajpi . Shina ajllaira Dios canguna shungura ricsin . Runapura valijmi nishcara Yaya Dios chijnin .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: Ley camachishca shimi Diosmanda rimajgunandi Bautisaj Juangama duranauca ; chihuasha Dios mandana pachara rimashcami , tucui runaunaga aburinaun icungaj .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: Astaun raihuajmi ahua pachas cai pachas tucuringaj , randi ley shimimanda mana usharinzhu shu pundahuallas apashitangaj .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: Maican runa paihua huarmira ichusha , shujhua casarasha , tacarij runa tucun . Maican runa chi cari ichushca huarmira casarasha , shinallara shujhua tacarij tucun .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: Shu charij runa tiauca , gusto inu puca yuraj churanara churarishca . Caran punzha atun micuna istara rarca .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Shinallara shu Lázaro nishca tsuntsu mañaj runa tiaca . Paihua aicha llagaunahua undashca aca , charij runa pungüi ichushca sirica .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Charij runa mesamanda urmaj puchuunahua paihua icsara undachina munacami . Allcuuna shamunauca paihua llagaunara llacanauca .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Tsuntsu runaga huañuca . Angelguna paita pushanauca Abraham tiashcama . Shinallara charij runa huañuca , pambashca aca .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: Ucu pachaiga , charij runa paihua ñahuira pascasha , Abrahanda ricuca carui , Lazaroras ricuca paihua rigrai .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: Shinajpi caparica : Yaya Abraham , llaquihuapai , nisha . Lazarora cachamupangui ñucama , paihua maqui rero pundara yacuhua ucuchichu ñuca callura chiriyachingaj . Cai ninai yapa tormendariuni .

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Abrahanga paita : Churi , nica , iyari imasna can causaushca horas camba ali charishcaunara charicangui , astaun Lázaro manaliunara . Paiga cuna caibi cushiyashcami , randi can tormendariungui .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Maspas , shu atun huaicu tian canhua ñucanchihua chaupi chaupii . Pasana munajguna caimanda cambajma pasanara mana ushanaun , chimandas caimas mana ushanaun .

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: Runa nica : Yaya canda rugauni Lazarora ñuca yaya huasima cachapangui .

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: Pichca uquiyuj ani . Paigunama cachapangui ama shamunauchu cai tormendarinama .

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: Abraham paita : Moisesta charinaun , Diosmanda rimajgunandi , caigunara uyanauchu , nica .

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: Shinajpi runa : Mana , nica , Yaya Abraham , shuj huañushcaunamanda paigunama rimai rijpi , arrepentirinaunga .

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Astaun Abraham paita : Moisesta mana uyajpi , nica , shinallara mana uyanaungachu shuj huañushcaunamanda atarisha rimajpis .

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunama : Ursamanda uchai nijtanauna shamunaungami , nica . Astaun ¡ lastimalla casnai urmachij runa !

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Manara shu runa shu cai ichilla huahuaunara uchai urmachisha , astaun ali anmaca shu atun cutana rumira paihua cungai huatasha , paita lamarbi shitai tucungaj .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Ricuichi cangunajmandallara . Camba uqui canmanda uchara rajpi , paita rimai . Pai arrepentirijpiga , paita perdonai .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Pai canzhis cuti canmanda uchara rajpi shu punzhai , canzhis cuti cai punzhai tigramujpi , canda nisha : Arrepentirinimi . Paita perdonai .

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Señor cachashca runauna paita ninauca : Ñucanchi quirinara yapahuapai .

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Shinajpi Señor nica : Canguna quirina shu ichilla tarpuna muyu tupu ajpi , canguna cai yurara rimanguichimaca : Aisairi caimanda , nisha , lamarbi tarpuri . Cangunara uyanmaca .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: ¿ Pita cangunamanda shu sirvij runara charisha , allpara huanuyachij , huagrara cuidaj , pai chagramanda tigramujpi , paita ninma : Icui , mesai tiari ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Astaun , ¿ manzhu ñinga : Micunara puruntui , chumbilli , sirvihuai , ñuca micushca upishca huashagama . Chihuasha micungui , upingui can ?

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: ¿ Agrasinga chari paihua sirvijta pai mandashcara rashcaraigu ? Mana , nisha , iyauni .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Shinallara canguna , tucui cangunara mandashcara rashca huasha , nichi : Yanga sirvijguna manchi , ñucanchi rana ministishcallara rashcanchi .

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Jesús Jerusalenma riusha , Samariahua Galileahua chaupira pasauca .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Shu ichilla llactai icusha , paita tupangaj llucshimunauca chunga llagayuj runauna . Carullai shayarinauca .

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: Caparisha ninauca : ¡ Jesús , Yachachij , llaquihuapai ñucanchira !

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Jesús paigunara ricusha : Richi , nica , sacerdoteunama ricuchichi . Paiguna riushcallai alichi tucunauca .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Shinajpi paigunamanda shuj , pai aliyashcara ricusha , tigraca . Shinzhi shimihua caparisha , Diosta alabaca .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Tuama urmaca Jesuspa chaquii , paita agrasisha . Paiga Samaria runa aca .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : ¿ Manzhu chungapura anauca alichishcauna ? ¿ Chishu iscunga , maibirai ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: ¿ Cai carumanda runalla tigramuca Diosta alabangaj ?

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Jesús paita : Atari , nica , ri . Can quirishca canda quishpichishcamí .

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Fariseoguna Jesusta tapunauca : ¿ imahorasta shamunga Dios mandana pacha ? nisha . Jesús cutipasha nica : Dios mandana pacha mana ricuihuajchu shamunga .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Mana rímanaungachu : Caibimi , chihuimi , nisha . Dios mandana pacha canguna chaupii tian .

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Punzhauna shamunaungami imahoras Runa Churi tiashca punzhaunamanda shujta ricusha ninguichimi , astaun mana ricunguichichu .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Runauna cangunara ninaunga : Caibimi , chihuimi , nisha . Ama ringuichichu , ama catinguichichu paigunara .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Imasna rayo shu parti cielomanda chishu partigama limpian , shinallarami tucunga ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , shamuna punzhai .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Chi punzha manara shamujllaira , ministirin ñuca ashcara tormendachishca achu , shinallara cai horas aj runaunamanda ichushca tucuchu .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: Imasna tucuca Noé causana punzhaunai , shinallara tucunga ñuca shamuna punzhaunai .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Runauna micunauca , upinauca , casaranauca , casarachinauca , Noé barcoi icuna punzhagama . Pai icushca huasha , yacu izhu shamuca , tucui paigunara tucuchica .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Shinallara tucuca Lot nishca runa causana punzhaunai . Runauna micunauca , upinauca , randinauca , catunauca , tarpunauca , huasiunara shayachinauca ;

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Lot Sodoma llactamanda llucshina punzhaga , chi quiquin punzhai , cielomanda ninas azufres tamiaca , tucuira tucuchica .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Shinallara tucunga ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , ricurina punzhai .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: Chi punzhai , shu runa huasi pundai tiausha , paihua charishcauna huasi ucui ajpis , ama irguchu apingaj . Shinallara chagrai tiajga ama huashama tigrachu .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Iyarichi Lotpa huarmi .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Tucui runa paihua causaira quishpicningaj mascasha , pirdingami ; tucui runa paihua causaira pirdisha quishpingami .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: Cangunara nini , chi tutai ishquipura shu caitui sirinaunga , shuj apishca anga , shujga saquishca anga .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ishqui huarmi pariju cutarinaunga . Shuj apishca anga , shujga saquishca anga .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ishqui runa chagrai tianaunga . Shuj apishca anga , shujga saquishca anga .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Paigunaga Jesusta cutipasha , paita ninauca : ¿ Maibira , Señor ? Jesús paigunara nica : Maibis aicha sirin , chihuimi angauna tandarimunaunga .

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Shu yachachingaj cuentanara Jesús paigunara cuentaca runauna tucui horas mañanauchu , mana sambayasha .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Casna nica : Shu llactai shu taripaj runa tiauca . Paiga Diosta mana manzhacachu , runaunara mana llaquicachu .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Shinallara chi llactai shu huaccha huarmi tiaca . Paiga taripajma shamuca , paita nica : Ñucara yanapahuapai ñucara chijnij runamanda .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Taripaj runa unaillara uyanara mana munacachu , astaun huasha paihua shungüi nica : Ñuca Diosta mana manzhashallara , runaunaras mana ricushallara ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: cai huaccha huarmi ñucara molestajllaira , paita yanapasha chari . Mana casna rajpi huarmi caran rato shamusha ñucara aburichinga .

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Señor nica : Uyaichi cai manali taripaj rimashcara .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu Dios pai ajllashcaunara yanapanga , paiguna tutandi punzhandi paita caparijpi ? ¿ Unaiyangachu paigunara cutipangaj ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Cangunara nini , Dios uctalla paigunara uyangami . Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , shamushaga , ¿ quirinara tupashachu mundui ?

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Huaquingunara , paiguna ali runa maní iyasha nijgunara , shujgunara chijnijgunara , Jesús shinallara paigunara cai yachachingaj cuentanara cuentaca :

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: Ishqui runa templo huasima rinauca Diosta mañangaj , shujga fariseo runa maca , chishujga gobierno cullquira tandachij .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Fariseo runaga , shayarisha , paihuajllarara mañaca , casna nisha : Dios , canda agrasini ñuca mana shu runauna cuenta tucunichu , shuhuajguna , manaliuna , shujhua tacarijguna , mana cai gobierno cullquira tandachij runa cuentachu ani .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Ishqui cuti caran semanai sasiuni , tucui ñuca ganashcamanda shu chunga partira cuni .

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Gobierno cullquira tandachij runaga carui shayarisha , mana munacachu paihua ñahuira cieloma atarichisha ricungajllas , astaun paihua pichura huactasha , casna nica : Dios llaquihuapai ñucara , uchayuj runa maní .

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Cangunara nini , cai runa paihua huasima perdonashca rica , chishujga mana . Maican runa paillarara ahuayachisha pishiyachishca anga , maicans paillarara pishiyachisha ahuayachishca anga .

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Llullu huahuanara Jesusma pushamunaucaj paigunara llangasha bendiciachingaj . Yachachishca runaunaga ricusha paigunara piñanauca .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesusga paigunara cayasha nica : Ichilla huahuaunara lugarda cuichi ñucama shamungaj , ama arcaichichu paigunara . Paiguna samiunajmi Dios mandana pacha .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , maicambas Dios mandana pachara mana ichilla huahuasna chasquijpi , mana pacha chihui icungachu .

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Shu valij runa Jesusta tapuca : Ali Yachachij , nisha , ¿ imara ranarai ñuca huiñai causaira apingaj ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Jesús paita nica : ¿ Imarasha ñucara , Ali nisha rimahuanguiri ? Pis mana alichu , Diosllami ali .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Yachanguimi mandamientos nishca Dios mandashca shimiunara : Ama shujhua tacarichu , ama huañuchichu , ama shuhuaichu , ama shujgunamanda llullaichu , yayaras mamaras llaquina mangui .

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Paiga : Cai tucuira pactachishcani maltamanda pacha , nica .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Jesús caita uyasha nica : Chara shuj pishinmi : Can tucui charishcara catuiri , tsuntsuunama cui . Valijtas charingui ahua pachai . Shami , catihuai .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Shinajpi pai caita uyasha llaquirica , ashca charij ashcamanda .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Jesusga pai ashca llaquirishcara ricusha nica : Tormendosmi charíjguna Dios mandana pachai icungaj .

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Shu camello nishca tormendariushas pasangallami tupulli uctura , randi shu charij runa astaun yali tormendoshua Dios mandana pachai icungami .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Cai shimira uyajguna ninauca : ¿ Pita quishpina ushangairi ?

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Runaunahua mana raihuajta Dioshua ali raihuajmi .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro nica : Ñucanchiga ñucanchi charishcaunara saquisha canda catishcanchi .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , mana tianzhu shu runas paihua huasira , yayaunara , uquiunara , huarmira , churiunaras saquisha Dios mandana pachamanda ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: Astaun mas ashcara apingami cai horasgunai , shinallara shamuj tiempoi huiñai causaira charingami .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Jesús paihua chunga ishqui runara pushasha , paigunara nica : Jerusalenma sicanchi . Tucui Diosmanda rimajguna quillcashca ñuca , Runa Churi nishcamanda , pactaringami .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Gentilguna maquii entregashca anga , asishca , piñashca , tiucashca anga .

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Paita azutishca huasha huañuchinaunga . Astaun quinsa punzhai causaringami .

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Yachachishca runaunaga imaras mana intindinaucachu cai rimashcamanda . Cai shimi paigunamanda pacashca aca . Mana intindinaucachu Jesús paigunara rimashcara .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Jesús Jericó nishca llacta mayanma shamujpi , shu ñausa runa ñambi rayai tiauca , Cullquira cuhuai , nisha mañasha .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Ñausa runa ashca runaunara uyasha tapuca : ¿ Imara tucun ? nisha .

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Paita cuentanauca : Nazaretmanda Jesusmi pasaun , ninauca .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Shinajpi pai caparisha : Jesús , Davidpa Churi , llaquihuapai , nica .

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ñaupa shamuujguna paita piñanauca : Chunlla , ama caparichu , nisha . Paiga mas shinzhira caparisha : Davidpa Churi , llaquihuapai , nica .

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Shinajpi Jesús shayarisha , runara paihuajma pushamungaj cachaca . Runa shamujpi , Jesús paita tapuca :

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: ¿ Imara munangui ñuca canhua rangaj ? nica . Runaga : Señor , ñuca ricuj tucungaj , nica .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Jesús paita : Ricuj tucui , nica , can quirishca canda quishpichishcami .

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Chi ratollai ricucami . Jesusta catimuca , Diosta alabasha . Tucui runauna caita ricusha Diosta alabanauca .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Jesús Jericó nishca llactara icusha , pasauca . 2 Shu Zaqueo nishca runa tiauca , gobierno cullquira tandachijguna apu maca , charij runa .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Pai Jesusta ricusha nica , astaun mana ushacachu ashca runauna taucarimushcaraigu , pai ichilla runa asha .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Ñaupajma callpasha , shu sicómoro nishca yurara sicaca . Jesús chita pasana maca .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Jesús chima pactasha , ahuama ricusha , runara ricuca , paita nica : Zaqueo , uctalla irgüi . Cuna punzha ministirin ñuca camba huasii pasiangaj .

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Shinajpi uctalla irgumuca , cushihua paita chasquicami .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Caita ricusha , tucui runauna piñanauca , Jesús shu uchayuj runahua tiangaj icushcami , nisha .

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Shinajpi Zaqueo shayarisha , Señorda nica : Señor , shu chaupi ñuca charishcara tusntsuunama cusha , pimandas umachisha ñuca yapajta apishca ajpi , chuscu cuti yapasha cutichisha .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Cunallara quishpina pactamun cai huasima , pais shu Abrahamba churi ajpi .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , shamucani pirdirishcara mascangaj quishpichingajpas .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Runauna cai shimiunara uyajpi , Jesús paigunara shu yachachingaj cuentanara cuentaca , pai ña Jerusalén mayambi tiausha , runaunas Dios mandana pacha ñalla ricurina ajta iyanaujpi .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Jesús nica : Shu valij runa caru llactama rica , chi llacta rey apu tucungaj , chihuasha tigramungaj .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Paiga shu chunga sirvijgunara cayasha , chunga cullquira cuca : Tarabaichi , nisha , ñuca cuti tigranagama .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Paihua llactai tiajgunaga paita chijninauca . Runaunara cachaca pai huashai paita ñingaj : Mana munanchichu can ñucanchi rey apu tucungaj .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Pai tigramushcaiga , rey apu tucushca huasha , cayangaj cachaca chi cullquira cushca sirvijgunara , caran dueño ganashcara yachangaj .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Ñaupa runa shamusha nica : Señor , camba cullqui chunga cullquira mas ganashcami .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Señor paita : Ali sirvij mangui , nica , alimi rashcangui , can ansallai alira rashca ajpi , can chunga llacta ahuai apu tucungui .

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Shujpas shamuca : Señor , nica , camba cullqui pichca cullquira mas ganashcami .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Paita shinallara nica : Cambas pichca llacta ahuai tucungui .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Shujpas shamuca : Señor , nica , Caiga camba cullqui , shu llachapai pillusha huacachisha charícani .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Canda manzhacani , can shu milli runa ajpi , can mana churashcara apij , can mana tarpushcara pallaj ajpi .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Shinajpi señor paita nica : Mana ali sirvij , camba quiquin shimimandallara taripashca angui . Ñuca milli runa ajta yachacangui , ñuca mana churashcara apij , ñuca mana tarpushcara pallaj ajta .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: ¿ Imaraigu ñuca cullquira mana churacangui bancoi mirangaj , ñuca tigramushcai ñuca cullquira mirashcandi apingaj ?

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Chihui ajgunara nica : Paimanda cullquira quichuichi , chunga cullquira charijma cuichi .

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Paigunaga : Señor , ninauca , chunga cullquira charinmi .

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Shinajpi cangunara nini , charijgunama cushca anga , mana charijgunamanda paiguna charishcahuaras quichushca anga .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Maspas ñucara chijnijgunara pushamuichi caima , paigunara huañuchichi ñuca ñaupajpi .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Caita rimashca huasha , Jesús ñaupasha riuca , Jerusalenma sicasha .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Jesús Betfagé Betanias nishca llactauna mayanma pactamusha , Olivos nishca urcuma pactasha , ishqui yachachishca runaunara cachaca .

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: Paigunara nica : Richi chimbai tiaj ichilla llactama , chihui icusha shu malta burro huatashcara tupanguichimi , imahoraspas mana montashca . Pascaichi , apamichi .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Maican runa cangunara : ¿ Imaraigu burrora pascaunguichi ? nijpi , casna rimasha cutipanguichi : Señor paita ministin , nisha .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Cachashcauna rinaucami , rimashcasna tupanauca .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Malta burrora pascajpi , dueñouna ninauca : ¿ Imarasha pascaunguichi malta burrora ?

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Paiguna : Señor ministishcaraigumanda , ninauca .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Jesuspajma apamunauca . Paiguna churanara malta burroi churasha , Jesusta sicachinauca .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Jesús pasaushcai , runauna churanara mandanauca ñambii .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Olivos urcu irguna mayanma pactajpi , tucui yachachishca runauna cushiyasha , Diosta alabangaj callarinauca , shinzhi caparisha tucui pai munanaita rashcara ricushcamanda .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Chasna nisha : ¡ Bendiciashcami Señorba shutii shamuj rey apu ; ahua pachai cushilla tucuchu , sumajpas ahuai tiachu !

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Shinajpi runa montonmanda huaquin fariseoguna Jesusta ninauca : Can yachachishca runaunara piñai .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Jesús cutipasha paigunara nica : Cangunara nini , caiguna mana rimanaupiga rumiuna caparinaunma .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Jesús entero llacta mayanma pactamusha , llactara ricusha huacaca ,

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: nisha : ¡ Canga cai camba punzhallai can cushilla causana nambira ricsinguima ! Astaun cunaga camba ñahuimanda pacashcami .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Punzhauna shamunaunga imahoras canda chijnijguna can muyujta sancaunara churanaunga , canda ishcanaunga , tucui partimanda canda nitimunaunga .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Canda tulanaungami allpama , shinallara camba churiunandi camba ucui . Shu rumillas mana saquinaungachu shu rumi ahuai , Dios cambajma pasiashca punzhara mana ricsishcaraigu .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Jesús templo nishca Diosta alabana huasii icusha , chihui tiaj catujgunaras randijgunaras canzhama ichuca .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Paigunara nica : Quillcashcami tian , Ñuca huasi shu Diosta mañana huasimi , cangunaga shu shuhuajguna uctura rashcanguichi .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Caran punzha templo huasii yachachica , astaun sacerdote apuuna , yachaira yachachijgunandi , runauna apuunandi paita huañuchingaj mascanauca .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Mana ushanaucachu chita ranara , tucui runauna ashca munaihua paita uyashcamanda .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Shu punzha Jesús templo huasii tiausha , runaunara yachachica , evangelio ali shimiras rimaca . Sacerdote apuuna , yachaira yachachijgunandi , rucuunandi paihuajma shamunauca .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Paita rimanauca , casna nisha : Rimahuai , ¿ Ima mandanahua cai rashcaunara raungui ? ¿ Pi mandajpira casna raungui ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Jesús cutipasha paigunara nica : Ñuca cangunara shinallara shu tapunara charini . Cutipahuaichi .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Juamba bautisánaga , ¿ ahua pachamandachu aca , runaunamandachu aca ?

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Shinajpi , paigunapura rimananauca : Ñucanchi , Ahua pachamandami nijpiga , paimi ñinga : ¿ Imarasha mana paita quiricanguichi ? nisha .

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Ñucanchi , Runaunamandami , nijpiga , tucui runauna ñucanchira rumihua shitanaunga ; paiguna ciertomi iyanaun Juan shu Diosmanda rimajmi .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Cutipasha ninauca : Mana yachanchichu maimanda asnearas .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Ñucas cangunara mana rimashachu pi mandajpira ñuca casnaunara rani .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Jesús runaunara cai yachachingaj cuentanara cuentangaj callarica : Shu runa , nisha , shu uvillas chagrara tarpuca , tarabajgunara pagara mañasha mañachica , chasna rasha unaiyangaj rica .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Pallana horas pactarijpi , shu sirvij runara cachaca , tarabajguna uvillas aparishcara paita cungaj . Tarabajgunaga paita macasha , maquillahua illajta paita cuti cachanauca .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Runa cuti shu sirvijta cachaca ; paita shinallara macasha , camisha , maquillahua cachanauca .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Ña quinsa cuti cachasha , runa shu sirvijta cachaca . Paitas chugrichisha canzhama shitanauca .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Shinajpi chagrayuj dueño nica : ¿ Imara rashai ? Ñuca quiquin llaquishca churira cachasha , paita ricusha casunaunga chari .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Tarabajgunaga paita ricusha paigunapura rimasha ninauca : Caimi cai chagrara apiña churi . Shamichi , paita huañuchishunchi , allpaga ñucanchij tucungami .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Churira chagramanda ichunauca , paita huañuchinauca . ¿ Imara rangairi chagrayuj dueñoga paigunara ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Paiga shamungami , cai tarabajgunara huañuchisha tucuchingami , paihua chagrara shujgunama cungami . Fariseoguna paita uyasha ninauca : ¡ Dios ama lugarda cuchu shina tucungaj !

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Jesús paigunara ricusha nica : ¿ Imara nin cai quillcashca : Huasira sicachijguna mana munashca rumiga istandi siqui tucushcami ?

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Tucui cai rumii urmajga paquirishca anga , astaun maican ahuai cai rumi urmamun , paiga polvolla tucungami .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna yachaira yachachijgunandi Jesusta apingaj ninauca chi ratollai , casna rimashca shimiuna paigunamanda rimashca ajta intindinauca ; astaun runaunara manzhanauca .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Jesusta camangaj , urmachingaj nisha , ricujgunara cachanauca , ali runa mani yanga rimasha nijgunara , pandachishca shimira apingaj nisha , paita gobernadorba maquii entregangaj .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Paita tapunauca : Yachachij , nisha , yachanchi imasna can cierto shimira rimaungui , yachachiungui , runa ricurina samira mana riparangui , astaun Diospa nambira cierto pacha yachachingui .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: ¿ Paganachu manzhu pagana impuesto nishca cullquira Cesarma ?

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Jesusga paiguna sabiro iyaira ricsisha , paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha tentahuanguichi ?

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Cullquira ricuchihuai . ¿ Pihuajtai cai ñahui , cai quillcashca ? Paiguna : Cesarbajmi , ninauca .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Shinajpi , Cesarbajta Cesarma cuichi , Diospajta Diosma cuichi .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Shinasha ima panda shimiras tupangaj mana ushanaucachu runauna ñaupajpi , astaun pai sabiro shimihua cutipajpi , manzharisha upallayanauca .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Chihuasha , huaquin Saduceos nishcauna Jesusbajma shamunauca , caiguna causarina illan nijguna asha . Jesusta tapunauca :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Yachachij , nisha , Moisés ñucanchira quillcaca : Shu huarmiyuj runa huañujpi , mana churiyuj asha , paihua uqui chi huarmira apichu churiunara mirachingaj huañu uquijta .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Shinajpi canzhis uquipura tianauca . Ñaupa uqui shu huarmira apica , shinasha churi illaj huañuca .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Shinajpi quipa uqui huarmira apica , paihuas churi illaj huañuca .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Chihuasha paimanda quipa uqui chi huarmira apica , shinallarami tucui chi canzhis uquiuna huarmira apisha churi illajlla huañunauca .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Puchucaibi huarmis huañuca .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Causarina punzhaiga , ¿ maicambajta angái chi huarmi ? Tucui canzhis paita apinauca huarmira rasha .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara cutipaca : Cuna tiempo churiuna casaranaun , shinallara casarangaj cunaun .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Astaun maicanguna chishu tiempoma pactangaj , huañushcaunamanda causaringajpas valijguna nishca asha , mana casaranaun shinallara mana cunaun casarangaj .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Ña mas huañunara mana ushanaun , astaun angelguna cuenta tucunaun , Diospa churiuna anaun , causarishca raigumanda .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Astaumbas , huañushcauna causarinauna ajpi , quiquin Moisés caita yachachica , sindij yura nishca cuentashcai , imahoras pai Señormanda rimasha nin : Abrahamba Dios , Isacpa Dios , Jacobpa Dios .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Diosga , mana huañushcauna Dioschu , astaun causajgunajmi . Paihua ñaupajpi tucui causanaun .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Huaquin yachaira yachachijguna Jesusta cutipasha ninauca : Yachachij , alimi rimashcangui .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Ña Jesusta más tapungaj mana camanaucachu , manzhashcamanda .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara rimaca : ¿ Imasna ajpira ninaun Cristo Davidpa churimi , nisha ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Quiquin David , Salmos nishca quillcai nin : Señor ñuca Señorda nica : Tiari ñuca ali maqui partima ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: canda chijnijgunara camba chaqui ucui churanagama .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: David paita , Señor , nisha , ¿ imasnajpira paihua churimi ningái ?

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Tucui runauna paita uyaushcai , Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: Huacachichi yachaira yachachijgunamanda . Suni churanahua puringaj munanaun , salurashcaunara gustanaun pulasaunai , ñaupa tiarinaunara tandarina huasiunai , shinallara micunaunais .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Paigunaga huaccha huarmi huasiunara tucuchinaun , yangamanda unaira mañashcaunara mañanaun . Caiguna yali causayuj anaunga .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Jesús ricusha , charij runaunara ricuca , paiguna Diosma cuyana cullquira cullqui malai churajgunara .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Shinallara shu tsuntsu huaccha huarmira ricuca , paiga ishqui mediora churaca .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Jesús nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cai tsuntsu huaccha huarmi tucui chishujgunamanda yalira churacami .
column6: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
column8: J Shinallarami canguna cai tucushcaunara ricusha , yachaichi Dios mandana pacha ña mayanllami .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Jesús nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cai tsuntsu huaccha huarmi tucui chishujgunamanda yalira churacami .
column6: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
column8: J Shinallarami canguna cai tucushcaunara ricusha , yachaichi Dios mandana pacha ña mayanllami .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Chishujguna puchuj cullquimanda Diosta cunauca , randi caí huarmi tsuntsu ashallara , pai tucui micuna randina cullquira churacami .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Huaquin runauna templomanda rimanauca , ali ricurij rumiunahua cuyashcaunahuas sumacyachishca ajpi . Jesús paigunara nica :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Cai canguna ricushcaunaraga , cangunara nini , punzhauna shamunaungami imahoras chi rumiuna shuj ahuai shuj ahuai mana saquirinaungachu , tucuira tulashca anga .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Paita tapunauca : Yachachij , nisha , ¿ imahorasta casna tucungairi ? ¿ Ima imara ricuringa cai tucui ñaua tucungaraupi ?

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús nica : Cuiraichi ama umachi tucungaj . Ashcauna ñuca shutii shamunaungami , Ñucaga Cristomi ani , nisha ; shujguna : Tiempo ña mayanllayaunmi , nisha . Shinajllaira ama catinguichi paigunara .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Canguna guerraunamanda revoluciongunamandas uyasha , ama turbarichichu . Caiguna ursamanda ñaupa punda tucunami ; astaun mana uctallachu tucurina horas .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Shu rey apu shu rey apuhua guerrangami , shu gobierno shu gobiernohuas .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Shinzhi allpa cuyunauna tianaunga ; yarcai tiempounas , shinzhi ungüigunas tianaunga huaquin partiunai . Manzhanaita atun ricurinauna ahua pachamanda ricunaushca anga .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Manara casna tucujllaira , runauna cangunara apinaunga , tormendachinaunga , tandarina huasiunama cunaunga , chonda culargunai ishcanaunga , rey apuuna ñaupajpi , gobernadorguna ñaupajpis pushashca anguichimi ñuca shutimanda .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Caiguna cangunama vahnaungami ñucamanda rimangaj .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Canguna shungüi ninguichi : Mana ñaupara iyarishachu imara rimangajpas chi punzhaunai canguna ama causayai tucungaj .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Ñucalla shimiras iyairas cangunara cushami . Shinasha cangunara chijnijguna imaras cutipanara mana ushanaungachu .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Cangunara entreganaungami canguna quiquin yayauna , uquiuna , ailluuna , amigounas . Cangunamanda huaquingunara huañuchinaungami .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Tucui runauna cangunara chijninaungami ñuca shutimanda .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Shinajllaira mana shu acchahuas canguna umamanda chingaringachu .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Canguna ahuantasha chapasha , canguna almara gananguichi .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Canguna Jerusalén llactara soldarounahua muyuchishcara ricusha , yachaichi pai tularina ña pactamushcami .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Shinajpi Judeai tiajguna urcuunama miticunauchu , llactai tiajguna llucshinauchu , canzhai tiajguna ama cuti icunauchu llactai .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Cai punzhaunaga pagana punzhaunami , tucui quillcashcauna pactaringaj .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: ¡ Ayailla icsayujgunas huahuara iñachijgunas chi punzhaunai ! Ashca tormendos tiangami cai pachai , ashca piñarinas cai runauna ahuai .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Cuchillohua chugrishca huañunaunga , paigunara apisha apanaushca anga , tucui llactaunama cachanaushca anga . Gentiles nishcauna Jerusalén llactara aitanaungami , gentilguna mandana tiempouna pactaringagama .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Shinajpi indiis , quillais , estrellasgunais ricurinauna ricurinaunga . Cai pachai runauna ashcami tormendarishca anaungami , lamar uyarishcamanda tsajlasmandas manzharisha .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Runauna dismayarinaunga mundui shamungaraushcaunara manzhashcamanda iyashcamandas . Ahua pachai tiaj ushajguna cuyuchishca anaunga .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Chi horaspi , ñuca , Runa Churi nishcara , ricuhuanaunga , puyui shamujta , ushanahuas ali sumajhuas .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Cai tucui tucunauna callarijpi , shayarichi , umara atarichi , cangunara quishpichina ña mayanllami .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Shinallara Jesús paigunara shu yachachingaj cuentanara cuentaca : Riqui , nica , higo yuraras tucui yuraunaras .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Imahoras yurauna panga llucshingaj callarinaupi , ña yachanguichi rupai tiempo ña mayanllayaun .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cai horas causajguna mana pasangachu cai tucui tucunagama .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ahua pachas cai pachas pasanaungami astaun ñuca shimiuna imahorasgama mana pasanaungachu .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Ricuichi cangunallara , canguna shungu ama llashayangaj yalijta micushcamanda , machashcamandas , cai causana turbarinahua molestarishcamandas , cai punzha ama cungaimanda shamungaj cangunama .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Ticta urmana cuenta cai punzha cungaimanda shamunga tucui cai pachai causajgunama .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Chapaichi , tucui horas mañasha , canguna valijguna nishca tucungaj cai tucui shamuna ajgunara quishpingaj , ñuca , Runa Churi nishca ñaupajpi shayangaj .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Punzhaga , Jesús yachachiuca templo huasii , tutaga Olivos nishca urcuma llucshij aca .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Tutamandaga tucui runauna shamunauca paita uyangaj templo huasii .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Pascua nishca puscu illaj tanda ista mayanllayauca . 2 Sacerdote atun apuuna yachaira yachachijgunandi mascanauca imasna rasha Jesusta huañuchingaj . Astaun runaunara manzhanauca .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Iscariote nishca Judaspa shungüi Satanás ña icuca . Pai Jesuspa chunga ishquimanda shuj maca .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Pai sacerdoteuna apuunama rimai rica , soldarouna capitangunahuas , imasna rasha Jesusta entregana asnearas .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Paiguna cushiyanauca , Cullquira cushunmi , ninauca .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Judas , Pactachishami , nica . Jesusta entregangaj mascaca runa mana riparashcai .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Puscu illaj tanda ista punzha pactamuca , Pascua nishca borregohua sacrificiora rana aca .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Jesús Pedroras Juandas cachaca , paigunara nisha : Richi , alichichi Pascua istara , ñucanchi micungaj .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Paigunaga : ¿ Maibira munangui alichingaj ? ninauca .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Pai nica : Llactai icujpi , llucshingami cangunara tupangaj shu yacu quisara astaj runa . Paita catichi pai icushca huasigama .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Chi huasii dueñora rimaichi : Yachachij canda nin , ¿ Maibirai shu ucu , ñuca chihui Pascua istara micungaj ñuca yachachishca runaunahua ?

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Shinajpi pai cangunara shu atun ahuai aj ucura ña alichishcara ricuchinga . Chihui puruntuichi .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Rinaucami . Jesús rimashcasna tupanauca . Pascua istara puruntunauca .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Horas pactamujpi , Jesús mesai tiarica , pai cachashca runaunandi .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Ashcara munashcani cai Pascua istara cangunahua micungaj manara tormendarijllaira .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Cangunara nini , caita mana mas micushachu , Dios mandana pachai pactarinagama .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Vasora apisha , Diosta agrasica : Apichi , nica cangunapura chaupichichi .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Cangunara nini , uvillas muyumanda mana mas upishachu Dios mandana pacha shamunagama .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Tandara apisha , Diosta agrasica ; tandara paquisha , paigunara cuca , paigunara nisha : Cai tanda ñuca aichami , canguna randimanda cushca . Caita raichi ñucara iyaringaj .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Shinallara micui pasashca huasha , vasora apica , casna nisha : Cai vaso ñuca mushuj pactachina shimimi , ñuca yahuarbi , ñuca yahuar cangunamanda talirin .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Caibi ñucara entregaj maqui ñucahua cai mesai tiaun .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Cierto pacha ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , riunimi , Dios nishcasna . Astaun , ¡ ayailla chi ñucara entregaj runa !

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Shinajpi paigunapura rimanaungaj callarinauca , ¿ pita angai , nisha , ñucanchimanda casna rangarau ?

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Yachachishca runaunapura rimananauca paigunamanda maican astaun atun tucunara .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Jesusga paigunara nica : Llacta rey apuuna runaunara mandanaun ; paigunara mandajgunaga aü rajguna nishcauna .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Astaumbas cangunahua mana chasnachu anga . Cangunahua ñaupa ajga mas malta aj cuenta tucuchu , mandajga sirvij cuenta tucuchu .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Maicanda mas atun , mesai tiarijchu , mesai sirvijchu ? ¿ Manzhu mesai tiarij mas atun ? Astaumbas ñuca cangunahua shu sirvij cuenta ani .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Cangunaga ñucahua tiajgunami ashcanguichi ñuca tormendarishcaunai .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Ñucaga cangunara shu llactara cuni rey apuuna cuenta mandangaj , imasna ñuca Yaya ñucara cuhuashcami ,

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: canguna ñuca mesai , ñuca llactai micungaj upingaj , cangunas tíaríngaj rey apu tiarinaunai , Israelba chunga ishqui ailluunara tarípangaj .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Señorga shinallara nica : Simón , Simón , Satanás canda mañashcami canda shushungaj , trigo muyura shushuna cuenta .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Astaun canmanda rugashcani camba quirina ama pishiyachu . Canga tigramushca huasha , camba uquiunara shinzhiyachingui .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Pedro paita : Señor , nica , ña maní canhua ringaj , mana chonda cularmalla astaun huañuigamas .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Señor paita nica : Pedro , canda nini , gallo manara cantajllaira can quinsa cuti ñucamanda ninguimi : Paita mana ricsinichu .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Ñuca cangunara cullqui huacachina cara illaj , bolsa illaj , zapatos illajpas cachashcai , ¿ imaras ministicanguichichu ? Paiguna : Mana imaras , ninauca .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cunaga nini , cullqui huacachina carayuj carara apai , bolsayuj bolsara apai . Espara illajga churarishcara catui , esparara randingaj .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Cangunara nini , chara ministirin cai ñucamanda quillcashcaga pactarinami .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Jesús llucshisha , paihua yachaira , Olivos nishca urcuma rica , pai yachachishca runaunas catinauca .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Chima pactajpi , Jesús paigunara nica : Mañaichi ama tentai tucungaj .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Jesusga paigunamanda ansahualla anzhurisha , shu rumi shitashca tupui , cungurisha , Diosta mañaca .

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Jesús mañasha nica : Yaya , can munajpiga , ñucamanda cai tormendarina vasora cuenta pasachi . Shinashas , mana ñuca munashcasna astaun can munashcasna rashca achu .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Shu ahua pachamanda ángel ricurimuca paita shinzhiyachingaj .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Jesús nanajta tormendariushaga , mas shinzhira mañaca . Paihua umbi atun yahuar tiúi cuenta aca , allpagama urmaca .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Jesús mañaushcamanda atarisha , pai yachachishca runaunajma shamusha , paigunara puñujgunara tupaca , llaquirishcamanda .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha puñunguichiri ? Atarichi , mañaichi , ama tentai tucungaj .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Jesús chara rimaullaira , ashca runauna shamunauca , paiguna ñaupalla Judas nishca runa , chi chunga ishquimanda shuj , llutarimuca Jesusta muchangaj .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita nica : Judas , ¿ muchanahua , ñuca , Runa Churi nishcara , entregangui ?

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Jesushuajguna imas tucungaraupi riparasha , paita ninauca : Señor , ¿ esparahua chugrichishunzhu ?

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Paigunamanda shuj shu sacerdote atun apura sirvijta chugríchica , paihua ali rinrira pitisha .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipasha nica : Basta ña . Saqui , nica . Rinrira Üangasha alichicami .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Jesús rimaca sacerdote apuunara , templo huasi guarda apuunara , rucuunaras , paita apingaj shamujgunaras : ¿ Imarasha shuhuajma cuenta shamushcanguichi esparaunahua caspiunahua ? nisha .

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Ñuca cangunahua tiashcani caran punzha templo huasii , mana apihuacanguichichu . Astaun cuna canguna horasmi , llandu tuta ushanauna horasmi , nica .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Jesusta apisha , paita pushanauca sacerdote atun apu huasima . Pedroga carulla paita catica .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Huasi chaupi shungüi tiaj patioi , paiguna ninara sindichisha , muyujta tiarinauca , Pedros paigunahua tiarica .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Shu sirvij huarmiga , paita tiarijta ricusha , paimalla ricuca : Caihuas shinallara paihua tiauca , nica .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Paiga , Mana , nisha , cutipaca . Huarmi , nica , paita mana ricsinichu .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Shinajpi paiguna ninauca : Señor , caibi ishqui esparara charinchi . Paiga : Bastami , nica .
column6: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
column8: Shu rato huasha , shujpas shamusha nica : Can shinallara paigunamandami angui . Pedroga chi runara nica : Mana paigunamandachu ani .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Shinajpi paiguna ninauca : Señor , caibi ishqui esparara charinchi . Paiga : Bastami , nica .
column6: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
column8: Shu rato huasha , shujpas shamusha nica : Can shinallara paigunamandami angui . Pedroga chi runara nica : Mana paigunamandachu ani .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Shu hora tupu huasha , shujpas nica : Cierto pacha cai runas paihua pariju tiauca , pai Galileo runami .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Pedro chi runara nica : Mana yachanichu can rimashcara . Chi ratollai , Pedro chara rimaullaira , gallo cantaca .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Shinajpi Señor voltiarisha Pedrora ricuca . Pedroga Señor ñaupa rimashcara iyarica , imasna Jesús nishca aca : Manara gallo cantajllaira can quinsa cuti , Mana ricsinichu , ninguimi .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Pedro canzhama llucshisha , llaquira huacaca .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Jesusta cuiraj runauna paita asinauca , sajmanauca .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Paihua ñahuira huatasha , sajmanauca ñahuii , paita tapusha : Rimai , nisha , ¿ pita canda sajmaca ?

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Ashca shu shimiunahua paita caminauca .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Ña punzhayaupi , rucuuna tandarimunauca , sacerdote apuunahua , yachaira yachachijgunahuas , Jesusta pushamunauca gobiernoi mandajguna tandarinama , paita nisha :

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: ¿ Can Cristochu angui ? Rimahuai ñucanchira . Jesús cutipaca : Ñuca rimajpis , mana quirihuanguichichu .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Shinallara ñuca cangunara tapujpis , mana cutipahuanguichichu , mana cacharihuanguichichu .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Randi , cuna horasmanda pacha ñuca , Runa Churi nishca , tiarishami Diospa ushana ali maqui partima .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Tucui paita ninauca : ¿ Canga Diospa Churichu angui ? Jesús cutipaca : Cangunara shina ninguichiga .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Shinajpi ninauca : ¿ Ima shimirara mas ministina angairí ? Ñucanchillara paihua quiquin shimimanda uyashcanchi .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Shinajpi tucui chi montonguna atarisha Jesusta pushanauca Pilatojma .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Jesusta causayachingaj callarinauca , casna nisha : Cai runara tupashcanchi runaunara huajlichijta . Ama pagaichichu , nisha , gobierno impuesto cullquira Cesar apuma . Ñuca Cristo rey apu mani , nisha .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato paita : ¿ Canzhu Judio rey apu angui ? nisha tapuca . Jesús cutipaca : Canda shina ninguiga .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Pilato sacerdote apuunama runaunamas nica : Ima causaras mana tarinichu cai runai .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Astaun paiguna mas tucunauca , casna nisha : Paiga runaunara turbachin , tucui Judeai yachachisha , Galileamanda cai partigama .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato Galilea shutira uyasha , tapucami : ¿ Cai runa Galileamanda runachu ? nisha .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Jesús Herodes taripana partimanda shamuj ajta uyasha , Pilato paita Herodespajma cachaca . Herodes chi horas Jerusalembi tiauca .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Herodes Jesusta ricusha cushiyaca ; unaimanda Jesusta ricunara munaca . Paiga Jesusmanda ashcara uyaj aca , Jesús ima munanaita rashcaras ricungaj munaca .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Herodes Jesusta ashcara tapuca , astaun Jesús imaras mana cutipacachu .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Sacerdote apuunas yachaira yachachijgunas shinzhira rimasha paita causayachinauca .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Shinajpi Herodes paihua soldarounandi Jesusta pishii urmachinauca , asinauca , paita gusto churanahua churachisha . Cuti paita Pilatojma cachaca .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Chi punzha Pilato Herodes amigopura tucunauca , ñaupaga chijnijpura anauca .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
