text2: Shinajpi Pilato sacerdote apuunara , apuunaras , runaunaras cayaca .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Paigunara nica : Canguna cai runara ñucajma cachamushcanguichi , Runaunara turbachij , nisha . Astaun paita canguna ñaupajpi tapushca huasha , canguna uchachishcara mana tarishcanichu paihuajpi .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Shinallara Herodes mana imaras tarishcachu ; ñuca paita Herodesma cachacani . Cai runa ima huañuchihuajlla ajtas mana rashcachu .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Nuca paita cacharisha , livachishca huasha .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Shu runara cacharina aca caran istai .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Tucui runaunaga , parijulla caparisha ninauca : Cai runara ichui , Barrabasta cachari .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Barrabasga chonda cularbi shitashca aca llactai macanaushcamanda , shu runara huañuchishcamandas .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Cuti Pilato paigunara rimaca , Jesusta cacharishallara nisha .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Astaun , runauna cutillara caparisha : Chacatai , chacatai , ninauca .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Pilato ña quinsa cuti rimaca : ¿ ima manalira rashcachu cai runa ? Mana ima huañuna tupura rashcaras tarishcanichu paihuajpi . Paita livachishca huasha , cacharisha .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Runaunaga shinzhi shimihua caparisha , Jesusta chacatashca achu ninauca . Paiguna shimiuna , sacerdote apuuna shimiunas vencinauca .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato paiguna munashcasna causayachica .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Shinajpi paigunama chonda cularbi ishcashca turbachij huañuchij runara cacharíca . Jesustaga entregaca paiguna munashcasna rangaj .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Jesusta pushasha , shu Cirene nishca llactamanda Simón nishcara apinauca , llacta canzhamanda shamujta . Cruzta paita apachinauca Jesuspa huashalla apamungaj .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Ashca runauna paita catimunauca , huacau huarmiunandi , Jesusta nisha ashcara huacanauca .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Astaun Jesús paigunama voltiarisha nica : Jerusalenmanda ushushiuna , ama ñucamanda huacaichichu , astaun canguna quiquinmanda ; canguna churiunamandas huacaichi .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Punzhauna shamunaungami imahoras ninaunga : Cushimi huahua illajguna , huahuara mana taríj icsauna , mana iñachij chuchuunas .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Chi horas , atun urcuunara rimangaj callarinaunga : Urmaichi ñucanchi ahuai ; ichilla urcuunaras : Quillpahuaichi , ninaunga .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Yura verde ajllaira casna rashaga ¿ imasnara ranaungai chaquishcai ?

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Jesushua pariju ishqui manali raj runaunara pushamunauca , paigunaras huañuchingaj .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Uma Tullu nishca pambama pactamusha , chihui Jesusta chacatanauca ; shinallara chi ishqui manalira raj runaunaras , shujta ali partima , chishujta lluqui partima .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Jesús nica : Yaya , paigunara perdonapai . Paiguna rashcara mana intindinaun . Paigunapura paihua churanara chaupisha , maicanda Uchayuj ajta camasha canauca .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Runauna ricurinauca . Apuunas paita asinauca , nisha : Shujgunara quishpichica ; paülarara quishpichichu , pai Cristo nishca Dios ajllashca ashaga .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Shinallara soldarouna paita asinauca ; llutarisha , ayaj vinora ricuchinauca .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Can Judio rey apu ashaga , canllara quishpi , ninauca .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Paihua uma ahuai quillcashca tiauca griego latín hebreo shimiunahua casna : Caimi Judioguna Rey Apu .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Jesushua pariju huarcushca manali rajgunamanda shuj Jesusta camisha nica : Can Cristo ashaga , canllara quishpi , ñucanchiras quishpichihuai .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Chishujga paita camachisha nica : ¿ Manzhu can Diosta manzhangui , can shinajllaira causayachishca asha ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Ñucanchi cierto pacha alira tormendarinchi , ñucanchi quiquin rashca tupumanda apiunchi . Cai runaga ima manaliras mana rashcachu .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Pai Jesusta nica : Iyarihuapangui can , can mandana pachai shamusha .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita cutipaca : Cierto pacha canda nini , cuna punzhallara ñucahua pariju Paraíso nishca sumaj llactai tiaunguimi .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Doce horasmanda pacha , tun llandu tucuca tucui partii , las tres chishi tupugama .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Indi llanduyaca . Templo nishca Diospa huasii huayushca llachapa lliquirica chaupi chaupii .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús , shinzhira caparisha nica : Yaya , ñuca espiritura camba maquii entregauni . Casna nisha samai pitirica .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Soldaro capitán casna tucushcara ricusha , Diosta alabaca , nisha : Cierto pacha cai runa ali runa aca .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Tucui chihui taucariai runauna , casna tucushcara ricujguna , chita ricushca huasha tigranauca , paiguna pichura huactasha rinauca .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Astaun tucui Jesusta ricsijguna , paita catimuj huarmiunandi , carumandallara cai tucushcaunara ricunauca .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Shu José nishca runa tiaca , Arimateamanda shamuj . Arimatea shu Judea llacta aca . Cai José shu gobiernoi mandaj runa aca , ali runa .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Cai runa shinallara Dios mandana pachara chapauca , mana munacachu chishujguna rimashcaunara , paiguna rashcaunaras .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: José Pilatoma risha , Jesuspa aichara mañaca .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Jesuspa aichara irguchisha , shu mandana llachapahua pilluca ,

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Cayandi punzha pascua ista tucungarauca , samana punzha ñalla punzhayangarauca .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Galileamanda compañaj huarmiuna shinallara catimunauca , pambashca uctura ricunauca , imasna paihua aicha sirishcaras .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Huarmiuna tigrasha , ali asnaj ambiunaras iraunaras alichinauca . Samana punzha samanauca , camachishca shimii rimashcasna .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Samana ñaupa punda punzhai , tutamandallara , huarmiuna pambashca uctuma shamunauca , paiguna alichishca ali gusto asnaj ambiunara apamusha . Paigunahua shu huarmiuna shamunauca .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Rumiga pambashca uctumanda shujma anzhuchishcara tupanauca .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Icusha , Señor Jesuspa aichara mana tupanaucachu .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Paiguna manzharisha shayarishcai , cungaimanda paigunahua pariju ishqui runauna chiujlla ricurij churanayuj shayarinauca .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Huarmiuna manzharisha , allpama cumurijpi , runauna paigunara ninauca : ¿ Imarashara causauta huañushcaunai mascaunguichiri ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Illan caibi , astaun causarishcami . Iyarichi pai cangunara rimashcara chara Galileai tiaushcai .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Casna nisha : Ministirin Runa Churi uchayuj runauna maquiunai entregashca achu , chacatashca achu , quinsa punzhai causarichu .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Shinajpi paiguna iyarinauca pai rimashca shimiunara .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Pambashca uctumanda tigrasha , cai tucuira cuentanauca chunga shujgunama , tucui chishujgunamas .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Chi huarmiuna María Magdalena , Juana , Jacobo mama María anauca , shu huarmiunandi . Paiguna cai tucuira Jesús cachashca runaunama cuentanauca .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Astaumbas , huarmiuna paigunama rimashca shimiuna locouna rimashca cuenta yachica . Mana quirinaucachu paigunara .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Pedro atarisha , callpasha rica pambashca uctuma . Paiga ucuma ricusha , llachapaunallara ricuca . Huasima tigraca , casna tucushcaunamanda manzharisha .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Chi punzhallaira , paigunamanda ishqui shu Emaus nishca ichilla llactama rinauca . Cai Emaus Jerusalenmanda ishqui samai tupu aca .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Paiguna riushcai , tucui chi punzhaunai tucushcaunamanda rimanauca .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Paigunapura cuentanausha rimanaushas riushcai , quiquin Jesús llutarimuca , paigunahua riuca .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Astaun paiguna fíahuiuna arcashca anauca , paita ama ricsingaj .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Imara rimanaunguichi cangunapura , canguna puriushcai ? ¿ Imarasha llaquiringuichiri ?

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Paigunamanda shuj , Cleofas nishca , cutipaca : ¿ Canllachu carumanda purij angui Jerusalembi , chihui cai punzhaunai tucushcaunara mana yachangaj ?

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Ima tucushcaunaga ? Paiguna cutipanauca : Nazaretmanda Jesusmanda . Pai shu Diosmanda rimaj runa aca , yapa ushajmi pai rashcaunahuas pai rímaushca shimiunahuas , Diospa ñaupajpi runauna ñaupajpis ;

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: shinallara imasnara sacerdote apuuna , ñucanchira mandaj apuunas paita entreganauca huañungaj , paita chacatanauca .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Astaun ñucanchi iyacanchi pai Israelda Quishpichij tucuna maca . Ña quinsa punzhami cai tucui tucushca huasha .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Shinajllaira ñucanchijmanda huaquin huarmiuna tuta ucura pambashca uctuma rijguna ñucanchira manzhachinaushca .

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Jesuspa aichara mana tupasha shamunaucami , Angelgunara ricushcanchi , nisha . Angelguna Jesús causaunmi ninauca .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Ñucanchimandas huaquinguna pambashca uctuma rinauca , huarmiuna rimashcasna tarinauca , astaun Jesusta mana ricunaucachu .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Shinajpi paigunara nica : Upauna , puruntu shungu illajguna , Diosmanda rimajguna tucui rimashcaunara quiringaj .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu ministirica Cristo tormendarichu cai tucuira , chi huasha paihua sumaj tiashcai icungaj ?

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Moisesmanda pacha callarisha , tucui Diosmanda rimajguna quillcashcara catisha , tucui Quillcaunamanda paigunara ricuchica paimanda rimashca shimunara .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Paiguna riushca ichilla llactama pactamunauca , Jesusga mas carama riu cuenta tucuca .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Astaun paiguna paita saquichinauca , Ñucanchihua saquiri , nisha , ña chishi tucun , tutayaunmi . Pai icuca paigunahua saquiringaj .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Paiga paigunahua mesai tiarisha tandara apica , bendiciaca , paquica , paigunara cuca .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Shinajpi paiguna ñahuiuna pascai tucunauca , paita ricsinaucami . Astaun , cungaimanda pai chinganea , paigunajmanda illauca .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Paigunapura ninauca : ¿ Manzhu sindica ñucanchi shungu imahoras ñucanchihua rimauca , imahoras Quillcaunara ñucanchijma pascaca ?

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Atarishaga chi horasllaira , Jerusalenma tigranauca . Chunga shuj runaunara tandarishcara tupanauca , compañajgunandi .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Chihuajguna ninauca : Señor cierto pacha causarimushca , Simonma ricurimushca .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Shinajpi paiguna cuentanauca paigunahua ñambii tucushcaunara , imasnara paita ricsinauca tandara paquiushcai .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Paiguna chara chigunamanda rimaullaira , Jesús paiguna chaupi shungüi shayarisha , paigunara nica : Cushiyaichi .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Shinajpi manzharisha , shu ayara ricushcasna iyanauca .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Astaun Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Imarasha turbaringuichi , casna iyaiguna canguna corazombi shamujpi ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Ñuca maquiunara ricuichi , ñuca chaquiunaras . Quiquin ñuca mani . Llangaichi ñucara , ricuichi , shu aya , shu espíritu mana aichayujchu , mana tulluyujchu , canguna ñuca charishcara ricushcasna .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Casna rimasha , paihua maquiunaras chaquiunaras ricuchica paigunara .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Paiguna chara mana quirisha cushiyashcamanda , manzharishas raushcallai , Jesús paigunara nica : ¿ Imaras charinguichichu caibi micungaj ?

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Shinajpi paita shu cusashca yacu aichahua pitira caranauca , ansa sacha mishquihua .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Paiga apica , micuca paiguna ñaupajpi .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Paigunara nica : Caigunami ñuca cangunara rimashca shimiuna , ñuca chara cangunahua tiaushcai . Ministirica pactaringaj tucui ñucamanda quillcashcauna Moisesba ley shimíis , Diosmanda rimashcaunais , Salmos nishca cantanaunais .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Shinajpi , Jesús paiguna iyaira pascaca , Quillcaunara intindingaj .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Paigunara nica : Casnami quillcashca aca , casnami ministirica Cristo tormendarichu huañushcaunamanda causarichu quinsa punzhai ;

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: paihua shutii yachachinauchu arrepentirinaras , ucharashcara perdonanaras tucui llactaunai , Jerusalenmanda callarisha .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Canguna cai tucuira ricujguna anguichi .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Ñuca Yaya cushca shimira canguna ahuai cachamusha . Astaun saquirichi Jerusalén llactallai ahuamanda ushanara cui tucunagama .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Jesús paigunara canzhama pushaca , Betania llactagama . Paihua maquiunara ahuai chutachisha , paigunara bendiciaca .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Paigunara bendiciaushallara , paigunamanda anzhurica , ahua pachama apashca aca .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Paigunaga , Jesusta adorashca huasha , cushihua Jerusalenma tigranauca .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Tucui horas templo nishca Diospa huasii tianauca , Diosta alabasha bendiciashas . Amen .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Callari tiempoi Rimashca Shimi nishca tiaj aca . Cai Rimashca Shimi Dioshua pariju tiaj aca . Cai Rimashca Shimi Dios aca .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Callari tiempoi Dioshua pariju tiaj aca .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Tucui rashcauna pai rashcami aca . Pai illaj mana imas rashcachu aca .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Paihuajpi causai tiaca . Cai causaiga runaunara punzhayachina aca .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Cai punzhayachina llandu tutara punzhayachin , astaun llanduga punzhayachinara mana llanducachu .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Shu Dios cachamushca runa , Juan nishca , tiauca .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Cai Juanga shamuca cai punzhayachinara ricsichingaj , pai rimashcamanda tucui runauna quirinauchu .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Juan mana cai punzhayachinachu aca , astaun cai punzhayachinara ricsichingaj shamucami .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Chi cierto punzhayachina , tucui runaunara punzhayachij , cai pachama shamuuca .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Paiga cai pachai tiaca . Cai pacha pai rashcami aca . Astaun cai pacha paita mana ricsicachu .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Paihuajma shamuca , randi paihuajguna mana paita chasquinaucachu .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Astaumbas tucui paita chasquijgunara ushaira cuca Diospa churiuna tucungaj , maicans paihua shutii quirisha .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Caiguna mana yahuarmanda , mana runa aichamandas , mana runa munaimandas iñachishca anaun . Astaun Diospa munaimandalla iñachishca anaunmi .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Cai Rimashca Shimiga runa tucuca , ñucanchihua pariju causaca . Paihua sumajta ricucanchi , Yaya Diospa sapalla churi sumaj cuenta . Paiga gracia nishca ali iyaihua undashca aca ; ima llullanas iliaca paihua .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Juan paimanda rimasha , caparisha nica : Caimi ñuca rimaushca runa , ñuca huashai shamuj ñucamanda yalimi , nisha , pai ñucamanda ñaupa ashcaraigu .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Pai ashcara charishcamanda tucui ñucanchi apishcanchi , maspas paihua mana tucurihuaj gracia nishca ali iyairas .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Ley camachishca shimi Moisesmanda rimashca aca , randi gracia nishca ali iyai cierto shimis Jesucristomanda shamunauca .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Pihuas imahoras Diosta mana ricushcachu . Paihua sapalla Churilla , Yayahua pariju tiaj , pailla Diosta ricsichicami .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Caitaga Juan rimashcami , imahoras judioguna Jerusalén llactamanda sacerdoteunara Levitas nishcaunandi cachanauca paita tapungaj : ¿ Pitanguiri can ? nisha .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Paiga rimaca , mana umachicachu , astaun ciertora rimaca : Ñucaga mana Cristochu ani , nisha .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Paitaga tapunauca : Shinajpiga , ¿ Imarai ? ¿ Elíaschu angui ? nisha . Paiga : Mana , nica . ¿ Diosmanda rimajehu angui ? ninauca . Paiga cutipaca : Mana .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Paita ninauca : Shinasha ¿ pitanguiri ? Cuentahuai , ñucanchira cachamujgunara cutipangaj . ¿ Imara ningui can quiquinmanda ?

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Juan nica : Ñuca runa illashca partimanda caparij shimi ani : Señorba nambira diríchuyachichi , nisha , Diosmanda rimaj Isaías rimashcasna .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Cai cachamushca runauna íariseogunamanda anauca .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Shinajpi Juanda tapunauca : ¿ Imarasha bautisangui , nisha , can mana Cristo asha , mana Elíaspas , mana Diosmanda rimaj ashas ?

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Juan paigunara cutipasha nica : Ñucaga yacui bautisani ; randi , canguna chaupi shungüi shu canguna mana ricsishca runa tiaun .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Caimi ñuca huashai shamuj . Paiga ñucamanda yalimi . Paihua zapatos huascara pascanallas mana valijchu ani .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Caiguna Betabara nishca llactai tucuca , Jordan yacu chimbara , Juan bautisaushcai .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Cayandi punzha Juan Jesusta paihuajma shamuuta ricuca . Pai Jesusta ricusha : Caiga , nica , Diospa Borrego , cai pacha uchara llushpichij .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Caimi ñuca rimaushca runa : Ñuca huashai shamuj , paiga ñucamanda yalimi , pai ñucamanda ñaupa ashcaraigu , nisha .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Paita mana ricsicanichu ; astaun Israelma paita ricsichingaj , ñuca yacui bautisasha shamucani .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Shinallara Juan nica : Espiritura urpisna ahua pachamanda irgumujta ricucani ; paihua ahuai tiauca .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ñucaga paita mana ricsicanichu ; randi , ñucara yacui bautisangaj cachamuj , paiga ñucara nihuaca : Maicamba ahuai Espíritu urmashcara ricungui , paiga Santo Espirituhua bautisajmi .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Paita ricucani . Ciertora rimashcani : Caimi Diospa Churi , nisha .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Cayandi punzha , Juan cuti chihui tiauca , ishqui pai yachachishca runaunandi .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Juan Jesusta chihui puriuta ricuusha : Caiga Diospa Borregomi , nica .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Chi ishqui yachachishca runauna pai rimashcara uyanauca ; Jesusta catinauca .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Jesús voltiarisha , paita catijgunara ricuca . ¿ Imara mascanguichi ? nica . Paiguna cutipasha ninauca : Rabí , ( caita runa shimii , Yachachij nin ) ¿ maibira causaungui ?

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Jesús : Ricuj shamichi , nica . Paiguna rishaga , pai tiaushcara ricunauca . Las cuatro mayan tucujpi paihua pariju saquirinauca chi punzhai .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Cai ishqui Juan rimashcara uyajguna , Jesusta catimujguna , cai ishquimanda shuj Andrés maca , Simón Pedro uqui .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Paiga paihua uqui Simonda ñaupa punda tupasha , paita nica : Mesías nishcara tupashcanchi ; caita runa shimii Cristo nin .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Andrés paihua uqui Simonda Jesusma pushamuca . Jesús paita ricusha : Can Simón angui , Jonaspa churi , nica , canda Cefas shutichishca angui ; caita Pedro nin .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Cayandi punzha Jesús Galilea partima risha nica . Paiga Felipera tupasha , paita nica : Ñucahua catihaui .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Felipe Betsaida llactamanda runa aca . Shinallara chi llacta Andrés Pedros causaushca llacta aca .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Felipe Natanaelda tupaca ; paita nica : Moisés pai camachishca shimii quillcaushca runara tupashcanchi . Diosmanda rimajguna shinallara paimanda quillcanauca . Paimi Nazaretmanda Jesús , José churi .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Natanael nica : ¿ Nazaretmanda ima alira shamunara ushangachui ? Felipe cutipaca : Ricuj shami , nisha .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Jesús Natanael paima shamushcara ricusha , Natanaelmanda rimasha nica : Cai runa cierto Israel runami , pai mana umachijchu .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Natanael paita nica : ¿ Maimanda ricsihuanguichu ñucara ? Jesús cutipasha : Felipe canda manara cayajllaira , can higo yura ucui shayaushcai , canda ricucani , nica .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Natanael cutipasha rimaca : Rabí , Yachachij , nisha , can Diospa Churi angui , can Israel Rey apu mangui .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Cutipasha , Jesús paita nica : ¿ Ñuca canda higo yura ucui ricucani nishcamanda quiriungui ? Caigunamanda yahunara ricunguimi .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Jesús nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Caimanda huasha ahua pacha pascashcara ricunguichi ; Diospa angelguna Runa Churi ahuai sicasha irgusha rajgunara ricunguichimi .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Quinsa punzha tucunahua , borara ranauca Caná llactai . Caná Galilea partii tiaca . Jesuspa mama chi borai tiauca .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Jesús pai yachachishca runaunandi borama convirashca anauca .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Borai , vino pishijpi , Jesuspa mama paita nica : Vino illan .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Jesús paita nica : ¿ Huarmi , imarasha casna rimahuangui ? Ñuca horas chara mana pactamunzhu .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Paihua mama sirvijgunama nica : Tucui pai ima rimashcaras ranguichi .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Chihui socta atun rumi quisauna tianauca , judioguna armana yachai tono , caran quisa quinsa manga tupu aca .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Quisaunara undachichi yacuhua . Shinajpi undajta undachinauca .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Shinajpi paigunara nica : Llucchichi cuna ; borayuj dueñoma apaichi . Apanaucami .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Cai yacumanda rashca vinora camashca huasha , borayuj dueño maimanda apamushcara mana yachasha , randi yacura llucchij sirvijguna yachanaucami , pai carira cayaca .

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Carira nica : Tucui runa ñaupa punda ali vinora upichin ; pactajta upishca huasha yanga vinora cun ; randi can ali vinora cunagama huacachishcangui .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Cai ñaupa punda munanaita ricurinara Jesús Galileai tiaj Caná llactai rarcami , paihua sumajta ricuchisha . Pai yachachishca runauna paihuajpi quirinauca .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Caimanda huasha Capernaum nishca llactama irgunauca , paihua pariju paihua mama , paihua uquiuna , pai yachachishca runaunandi . Mana ashca punzhauna chihui tianaucachu .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Judioguna Pascua ista mayanllayauca . Jesús Jerusalenma sicaca .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Templo huasii huagrara borregora urpira catujgunara tupaca ; shinallara cullquira turcajguna chihui tiajtas tupaca .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Jesusga huascaunara ahuasha azutinara rarcami . Tucui chigunara templomanda ichuca , borregounandi , huagraunandi . Shinallara turcajguna cullquira allpama talica , paiguna mesaunaras voltiachica .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Urpira catujgunara nica : Llucchichi cai tucuira . Ñuca Yaya huasira ama catuna huasira raichichu .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Shinajpi pai yachachishca runauna ñaupa horas quillcashcara iyarinauca , imasna nin : Camba huasira llaquina tucuchihuanmi .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Judiogunaga paita cutipanauca , nisha : ¿ Ima munanaita ricurinara ricuchihuanguichu cai tucuira rashcamanda ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Cai templora tulaichi , ñucaga quinsa punzhai cuti shayachishami .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Judioguna caita uyasha ninauca : Chuscu chunga socta huatara tarabasha cai templora shayachishca aca , canga ¿ quinsa punzhallaichu shayachingui ?

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Jesusga , templo nisha , paihua quiquin aichamanda rimaca .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Shinasha , pai huañushcaunamanda causarimushcai , pai yachachishca runauna cai rimashcara iyarinauca . Dios quillcashcara quirinaucami , shinallara Jesús rimashca shimira quirinauca .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Jesús Jerusalembi tiausha , Pascua ista punzhaunai , ashca runauna Jesuspa shutii quirinauca , pai munanaita ricurinaunara ricusha .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Jesusga paillara paiguna maquii saquinara mana munacachu , tucui runaunara ricsij asha .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Runaunamanda pihuas rimanara mana ministicachu . Paiga tucui runa shungüi charishcara yachaca .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Shu Nicodemo nishca fariseo runa tiaca ; judioguna atun apu maca .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Nicodemo Jesusma tuta shamuca : Rabí , Yachachij , nica , can Diosmanda shamushca yachachij ajta ricsinchi . Manapihuas can rashcasna munanaita ricurinaunara rangaj ushanma Dios mana paihua tiajpi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesús cutipasha paita nica : Cierto pacha canda nini : Maicambas mana cuti pagarisha , Dios mandana pachara ricunara mana ushangachu .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Nicodemo nica : Runaga ¿ imasna rasha cuti pagaringachu rucu asha ? ¿ Paiga mama icsai cuti icunara ushangachu pagaringaj ?

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Cierto pacha canda nini , maicans yacumandas Espiritumandas mana pagarisha , Dios mandana pachai icunara mana ushangachu .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Aichamanda pagarij aichami ; Espiritumandas pagarij espiritumi .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Ama manzharichu ñuca canda nisha : Cutillara pagarina anguichi .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Huaira maimandas huairamun , pai tulupushcara uyarin . Astaun huaira maimandas shamun , maimas rin , can mana yachanguichu . Shinallarami tucui Espiritumanda pagarishcauna .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Nicodemo paita cutipasha : ¿ Imasna rasha casna tucungai ? nica .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Jesús paita nica : ¿ Can Israel Yachachij Apu ashallarachu , caita mana yachangui ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Cierto pacha , canda nini , ñucanchi yachashcara rimanchi , ñucanchi ricushcaras ricuchinchi ; cangunaga ñucanchi rimashcaunara mana chasquinguichi .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Canguna ñuca cai pachamanda cuentashcaunara mana quirisha , ¿ imasna rashara ñuca ahua pachamanda cuentashcaunara quiringuichi ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Pihuas ahua pachama mana sicacachu , astaun ahua pachamanda irgumujlla ; pai ahua pachai tiaj Runa Churimi .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Imasna Moisés chaquishca allpa partii machacuira atarichica caspi ahuai , shinallara Runa Churi atarichishca anga ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: tucui maicambas paihuajpi quirisha ama chingarichu , astaumbas huiñai causaira charichu .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Casnami Dios cai pachara llaquica , paihua sapalla Churira cuca , maicans paihuajpi quirisha ama chingarichu , astaumbas huiñai causaira charichu .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Diosga paihua Churira mana cachamucachu cai pachara causayachingaj , astaun paimanda cai pachara quishpichingaj .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Maicans paihuajpi quirijga mana causayachishcachu , astaun maicans mana quirijta ña causayachishcami , Diospa sapalla Churi shutii mana quirishcamanda .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Caimi causayana : Punzha cai pachama shamuca , runaunaga punzhamanda yali tutara llaquinauca , paiguna rashcauna manali ashcamanda .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Tucui manalira rajguna punzhara chijninaun , punzhama mana shamunaun , paiguna rashcaunai ama piñai tucungaj .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Alira rajga punzhama shamun pai rashcauna Dios rashcaunami ricuchingaj .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Chi huasha , Jesús pai yachachishca runaunandi Judeá partima shamuca . Paigunahua chihui tiaushcai bautisacami .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Juan shinallara Enon llactai bautisauca , Salim llacta mayambi , ashca yacu chihui tiashcamanda . Shamujguna bautisashca anauca .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Juan chonda cularbi chara mana ishcashcachu aca .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Juan yachachishca runauna judiogunahua rimananauca paiguna aichara maillana yachaimanda rimasha .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Juanma shamunauca : Rabí , Yachachij , nisha , Jordan chimbai canhua tiaushca runa , can rimaushca , shinallara bautisaunmi ; tucui paihuajma shamunaun .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Juan cutipaca : Runa mana imaras apiñara ushanzhu mana paima cushca ajpi ahua pachamanda .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Cangunallara ñuca rimashcara uyajguna anguichi , ñuca rimashcasna : Ñucaga mana Cristochu ani , astaun paimanda ñaupa cachamushca ani , nisha .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Huarmira charijga carimi ; randi cari amigo , paihua pariju shayarij , paihua shimira uyasha , ashcara cushiyan cari shimira uyashcamanda . Shinami ñuca cushi pactarin .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Pai yaparinara mimstirin , ñucaga pishiyanara .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Ahuamanda shamuj tucuimanda yalimi . Cai pachamanda ajga cai pachamandallami , cai pachamanda shimiunaras riman . Ahua pachamanda shamuj tucuimanda yalimi .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Imara ricushas uyashas , caillara riman . Mana pihuasga pai rimashcara chasquinzhu .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Maicans pai rimashcara chasquisha , paiga Dios cierto rimaj ashcara ricuchin .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Dios cachamushca Runa Dios rimashca shimiunara riman . Dios mana tupusha Espiritura cunzhu .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Yaya Churira llaquin ; tucuira paihua maquii entregashcami .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Maicans Churu quirisha huiñai causaira charin . Maicans Churira mana casusha , causaira mana ricungachu , randi Dios piñarishca paihua ahuai tianmi .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Fariseoguna Jesús Juanmanda yali runaunara yachachiun bautisaun nishcara uyanauca .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Randi Jesús mana bautisacachu , astaun pai yachachishca runauna bautisajguna anauca .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Jesusga fariseoguna cai shimira uyashcara yachasha , Judea partimanda llucshisha , cutillara Galilea partima rica .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Ministiricami Samaría partira pasangaj .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús shu Samaría partii tiaj Sicar nishca llactama pactamuca . Cai llacta Jacob paihua churi Josema cushca allpa mayambi tiauca .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Jacobpa yacu bujyu chihui tiaca . Shinajpi Jesús nambira purisha , sambayashca asha , yacu bujyu rayai tiarica . Doce horas tupu aca .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Shu Samariamanda huarmi yacura apingaj shamuca . Jesús paita nica : Yacura upichihuai .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Yachachishca runauna micunara randingaj llactama rinaushca aca .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Samariamanda huarmi Jesusta nica : ¿ Imarasha can judio runa asha ñucara upina yacura mañangui , ñuca Samaría huarmi asha ? Judioguna Samaría runaunahua mana llutarinaun .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Can Dios cuyashcara ricsishaga , canda , Upichihuai nisha rimajtas ricsishaga , can paita mañanguima , paiga causana yacura canda cunma .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Huarmi nica : Señor , imaras mana charingui yacura llucchingaj ; yacu uctu yapa ucumi . ¿ Maimanda cai causana yacura charinguichu ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Ñucanchi Jacob yaya cai yacu uctura cuyahuaca . Cai yacu uctumanda pai upiuca churiunandi animalgunandi . Canga ¿ paimanda valichú angui ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Maicans cai yacura upishaga cutillara upinaichingami .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Randi maicans ñuca cushca yacura upisha , huiñaigama mana cuti upinaichingachu . Ñuca cushca yacuga paihua shungu ucui yacu bujyu cuenta pahuangami huiñai causaira cungaj .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Huarmi paita nica : Señor , cai yacura cuhuai , ñuca ama upinaichingaj , ama caima llucchij shamungaj .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Jesús nica : Carira cayai risha , caima shamichi .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Huarmi cutipasha nica : Cari illaj ani . Jesusga nica : Ciertomi ningui , Cari illaj mani .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Pichca carira charishcangui ; can cuna chariushca mana quiquin carichu . Shina nisha , ciertomi rimashcangui .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Huarmiga : Señor , nica , can Diosmanda rimaj angui , yachin .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Ñucanchi yayauna cai urcui Diosta alabanauca . Randi canguna ninguichi Jerusalenllai Diosta alabanami , nisha .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Huarmi , quirihuai , nisha , horas pactaringami mana cai urcuis , mana Jerusalembis Yayara alabanguichi .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Canguna mana ricsishcara adoranguichi ; randi ñucanchi ricsishcallara adoranchi . Quishpinaga judiogunamanda shamun .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Horas shamun , amallara pactamun , imahoras cierto adorajguna Yayara almai cierto adoranaungami . Shinallara Yaya casna adorajgunara mascanmi paita adorangaj .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Diosga Espiritumi . Paita adorajguna almai cierto adorangaj ministirinmi .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Huarmiga : Ñuca yachanimi , nica , Mesías nishca shamuna angami , pai Cristo nishca shutichishcami . Pai shamujpiga tucuira yachachinga ñucanchira .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Ñuca canhua rimau , Cristo maní .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Chi ratollaira pai yachachishca runauna shamunauca . Jesús cai huarmihua rimaushcamanda manzharinauca , astaun mana pihuas paita tapucachu : ¿ Imara tapungui ? nisha , ¿ imara paihua rimangui ?

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Shinajpi huarmi paihua quisara saquisha , llactama rica ; llactai tiaj runaunara rimaca .

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: Ricuj shamichi , nica , shu runara . Pai ñuca tucui rashcaunara rimahuashcami . ¿ Manzhu cai Cristo angái ?

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Shinajpi llactamanda llucshimusha , runauna Jesusma shamunauca .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Yachachishca runaunaga Jesusta : Yachachij , micui , nisha ruganauca .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Paiga cutipaca : Ñuca shu canguna mana yachashca micunara charini micungaj .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna paigunapura ninauca : ¿ Maicans paihuajta ima micunara apamushca angái ?

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Ñucara cachamuj Dios munashcara rangaj , caitami ñuca micuna , paihua ranaunara pactachingaj .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: ¿ Manzhu ninguichi : Chara chuscu quilla pishin pallanagama ? Cangunara nini : Ñahuira atarichichi , chagraunara ricuichi . Tucui ña chaquirishcami pallangaj .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Pallajga paihua pagara apin , muyuunara huiñai causaihuajta pallan . Shinasha tarpujpas pallajpas pariju cushiyanaun .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Casnamanda cierto rimashcami : Shujmi tarpun , shuj randi pallan .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Canguna mana tarpushcara pallangaj cachamucani . Shujguna tarabanauca , cangunaga paiguna tarabashcamanda valiricanguichi .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Ashca chi llactamanda Samaría runauna Jesuspi quirinauca chi huarmi rimashcamanda , pai nishcamanda : Paiga tucui ñuca rashcaunara cuentahuaca , nisha .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Samaría runauna Jesusma shamushaga , paita ruganauca , Ñucanchihua saquiri , nisha . Jesús ishqui punzha tupura paigunahua saquirica .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Ashca runauna maspas quirinauca , Jesús rimashcamanda .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Paiguna ninauca huarmira : Ña quirinchimi , mana can rimashcamandalla , astaun ñucanchillara paita uyashcanchi . Shinasha pai cierto pacha Cristo nishca , cai pachara Quishpichij ashcara ricsinchi .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Ishqui punzha huasha , Jesús chi llactamanda llucshisha , Galilea partima rica .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Jesusllara nica : Diosmanda rimaj paihua quiquin llactai mana chasqui tucunzhu .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Jesús Galileama shamujpiga , chihui causajguna paita chasquinauca , tucui pai ista punzha rashcaunara ricushcamanda Jerusalembi . Paigunas istama rinaushca aca .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cuti Galileai tiaj Cana nishca llactama shamuca , maibi ñaupa vinora yacumanda rarcami . Capernaum llactai , shu reyhua capitán tiaca ; paihua churi ungushca aca .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Caiga , Jesús Judeamanda Galileama shamushcara uyasha , Jesuspajma rica . Paiga Jesusta ringaj rugaca , churira alichingaj , ña huañungaraupi .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paita nica : Canguna atun ricurinaunara munanaita ranaunaras mana ricusha , mana quiringuichi .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Rey apuhua capitanga Jesusta nica : Señor , ñuca churi manara huañujllaira , uctalla irgusha shamupai .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ri , nisha , camba churi causaun . Runaga Jesús rimashcara quirisha ricami .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Irgushca huasha , sirvijguna paita tupangaj llucshinauca . Paita rimanauca : Camba churi causaunmi , nisha .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Shinajpi capitán tapuca : ¿ Imahorasta aliyangaj callarica ? Caina , la una tupura , calentura chiriyaca , ninauca .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Yaya shinajpi intindica huahua aliyashca horas Jesús rimashca horas chi tupui aca , pai rimaushcai : Camba churi causaunmi , nisha . Paiga , entero huasii tiajgunandi quirinauca .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Caita ishqui cuti Jesús ali munanaita ricurinara rarcami , Jesús Galileama shamujpi .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Chimanda huasha , judioguna ista punzhauna tiajpi , Jesús Jerusalenma sicaca .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Jerusalembi , borregouna pungu mayambi , shu ichilla yacu cocha tiaca . Hebreo shimii cai yacu Betesda nishcami . Pichca rumi istandiyuj pungura chanca .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Cai punguunai ashca ungushcauna sirinauca , ñausa ñahuiyujguna , anga chaquiuna , suchuuna . Tucui caiguna yacu cuyurishcara chapanauca .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Huaquin horas shu ángel yacuma irgumuj aca , yacura cuyuchingaj . Yacu cuyurishca huasha , ñaupa punda yacui icuj runa ima ungüimandas alichishca aca .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Chihui shu runa tiaca , quinsa chunga pusac huatara ungushca .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Jesús paita ricusha , unai tiashcara yachasha , paita nica : ¿ Aliyanara munanguichu ?

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Ungushca runa cutipaca : Señor , nisha , pitas mana charinichu yacu cuyurijpi ñucara yacui satingaj ; ñucalla alimanda shamungama , shuj ñucamanda ñaupara irgun .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Atari , camba puñunara api , puri .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Chi horasllaira cai runa aliyashca aca . Puñunara apisha ricami . Samana punzha aca .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Shinajpi judioguna alichishca runara ninauca : Samana punzhami ; camba puñunara apañara mana ushanguichu .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Runa cutipaca : Ñucara alichij runa rimahuaca , Puñunara apisha , puri , nica .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Shinajpi runara tapunauca : ¿ Pita acai canda casna rimaj : Puñunara apisha puri , nij ?

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Aliyashca runaga pi ashcaras paita alichijta mana yachacachu , Jesús chimanda rishca ajpi .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Huashaga , Jesús cai runara templo huasii tupasha , paita nica : Ña alichishca angui ; uchara ama cuti rangui , ama huasha yalijta ungungaj .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Runa rishaga , judiogunara cuentaca : Jesusmi ñucara alichij aca , nisha .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Chimanda judioguna Jesusta tormendachinauca , paita huañuchingaj nisha mascanauca , caigunara samana punzhai rashcamanda .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Nuca Yaya cunagamas tarabaun , ñucas tarabauni .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Shinajpi chimanda judioguna Jesusta huañuchingaj astaun mas mascanauca samana punzha yachaira mana casushcamanda , shinallara Dios ñuca Yayami nishcamanda , shina nisha paulara Dios tupullara rasha .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipasha nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Churi pai quiquin munaimandalla mana imaras ranara ushan . Yaya rashcara ricusha chillararami ran . Imaras Yaya ran , shinallarami Churi ran .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Yayaga Churira llaquin , tucui pai rashcaunara Churira ricuchin . Caimanda yalijta rashcaunara paita ricuchingami canguna manzharíngaj .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Imasna Yaya huañushcaunara causachin , paigunara causaira cusha , shinallarami Churi pai munashca runaunara causaira cun .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Yaya mana pitas taripanzhu , randi tucui taripana Churima cushcami .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Casna tucun tucui runa Churira ahuayachinauchu , paiguna Yayara ahuayachishca cuenta . Maicans Churira mana ahuayachisha , paita cachamuj Yayaras mana ahuayachinzhu .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maicans ñuca shimira uyasha , ñucara cachamujpi quirishas , paiga huiñai causaira charin ; mana causayuj tucungachu , astaun huañuimanda causaima ña pasashcami .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Horas shamun , amallaras pactarin , imahoras huañushcauna Diospa Churi shimira uyanaungami , uyajgunas causarinaungami .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Imasna Yaya paillaira causaira charin , shinallara Churira cuca paillaira causaira charingaj .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Shinallara taripangaj ushaira paita cuca , pai Runa Churi ashcamanda .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Caimanda ama manzharinguichi . Horas shamungami tucui pambariajguna paihua shimira uyanaungami .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Alira rajguna causangaj causarinaunga ; randi manalira rajguna causayachi tucungaj causarinaungami .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Ñuca munaimandallara mana ima ranara ushanichu . Uyashca tupullara taripani . Ñuca taripashcaga ali tupumi . Ñuca quiquin munaira mana ranichu , astaun ñucara cachamuj Yaya munashcara rauni .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Ñucaga ñucamandallara rimasha , casna rimashca mana ciertochu .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Shujga ñucamanda rimanmi . Pai ñucamanda rimashcara cierto ajta yachani .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Cangunaga Juanma uyajgunara cachacanguichi . Pai cierto shimimanda rimacami .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Ñuca pi runamandas pai rimashcara mana apinichu ; astaun caita rimani canguna quishpichi tucungaj .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Juan sindij velasna punzhayachij aca . Canguna pai punzhayachishcai ansa chi tiempora cushiyasha nicanguichi .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Ñucaga Juan rimashca shimimanda yali valij shimira charinimi . Yaya ñucara cuhuashca ranaunara rangaj , shinallara rauni . Caigunaga Yaya ñucara cachamushcara rimanaun .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Shinallara ñucara cachamuj Yaya ñucamanda riman . Paihua shimira mana imahoras uyashcanguichi . Paihua samiras mana imahoras ricushcanguichi .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Pai rimashca shimira canguna corazombi causajta mana charinguichi . Pai cachamushca Churira mana quiringuichi .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Quillcashcaunara ricuichi . Canguna iyaringuichi chihui huiñai causaira charinguichimi . Chi Quillcashcauna ñucamanda rimanaun .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Ñucama shamunara mana munanguichi causaira charingaj .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Runaunamanda ahuayachishcara mana chasquinichu .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Cangunara ricsini . Canguna shungu ucui Diosta mana llaquinguichi .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Ñucaga ñuca Yaya shutii shamushcani . Cangunaga ñucara mana chasquinguichi . Shujga paihua quiquin shutii shamujpi , canguna paita chasquinguichima .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Cangunaga , ¿ imasna quirinara ushanguichi ? Canguna shujgunamanda ahuayachishcara parijumanda chasquinaunguichi . Astaumbas shu sapalla Diosmanda shamuj ahuayachishcara mana mascanguichi .

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Ama iyaichichu ñuca cangunara causayachisha Yaya ñaupajpi . Shujga cangunara causayachin , canguna quishpichihuangami niushca Moisés .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Canguna Moisesta quirjpiga , ñucaras quiringuichima . Pai ñucamanda quillcacami .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Canguna pai quillcashcara mana quirijpiga , ¿ imasnara ñuca rimashca shimira quiringuichima ?

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Caimanda huasha , Jesús Tiberias nishca Galilea lamar chimbama rica .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Ashca runa paita catimunauca , pai munanaita ricurinaunara ungushcaunahua rashcara ricushcamanda .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Jesús urcui sicasha chihui tiarica pai yachachishca runaunandi .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Judioguna Pascua nishca ista mayallayauca .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Jesús muyujta ricusha , ashca runauna paihuajma shamujgunara ricusha , Felipera rimaca : ¿ Maimanda tandara randishun tucui caiguna micungaj ? nisha .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Cai shimira Jesús rimaca paita camangaj . Paiga imasna rana ashcaras yachacami .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Felipe paita cutipaca : Ishqui patsaj cullqui tupu tanda mana pactangachu caran dueño ansa ansa micungaj .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Shu pai yachachishca runa , Andrés , Simón Pedro uqui , Jesusta rimaca :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: Caibi shu huahua , pai pichca cebadamanda rashca tandara ishqui ichilla yacu aichahuaras charin . ¿ Imarasha pactangairi cai tucuira carangaj ?

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús nica : Runaunara tiachichi . Chi llactai ashca quihua tiaca . Pichca huaranga tupu cariuna tiarinauca .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Jesús tandaunara apisha , Diosta agrasishca huasha , yachachishca runaunama tandara cuca . Yachachishca runauna tiajgunara cunauca . Shinallara ichilla aichahuaras caranma cunauca , paiguna munashca tupura .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Runauna sajsajta micushca huasha , Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara nica : Puchuunara pallaichi , imaras ama ichuringaj .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Shinajpi chunga ishqui tasauna undajta pallanauca , chi pichca cebada tandaunamanda micujguna puchuchishcara .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Chi runauna , Jesús cai munanaita ricurinara rashcara ricusha , ninauca : Cierto pacha caimi Diosmanda rimaj , cai pachama shamuna aj .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Jesusga paiguna shamungaraushcara riparasha , paita apingaj Rey Apura rangaj , cuti pailla urcuma anzhuricami sapalla tiangaj .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Ña tutayaupi , Jesús yachachishca runauna lamarma irgunauca .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Shu canoai icusha , lamar chimba partima rinauca , Capernaum llactama . Ña tutayashcami , Jesús paigunama chara mana shamucachu .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Lamar tsajlas tucuca shinzhi huairashcamanda .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Paiguna canoai shu samai tupura purishca huasha , Jesusta yacu ahuara puriuta ricunauca . Canoa mayanma shamujpi , paiguna manzharinauca .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Ñuca mani . Ama manzhaichichu .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Shinajpi paiguna Jesusta munaihua chasquinauca canoai . Uctalla allpama pactamunauca , paiguna riushca llactama .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Cayandi punzha , chimba partii causajguna shu canoalla tiashcara ricunauca , shinallara Jesús mana rishcara yachachishca runaunahua chi canoai , randi yachachishca runauna paigunalla rinaushca aca .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Shinajllaira shu ichilla canoauna Tiberias llactamanda shamunaushca aca , runauna micushca pamba mayanma shamusha maibi runauna micunauca Jesús Diosta agrasishca huasha .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Runauna Jesús illajta ricusha , shinallara pai yachachishca runaunas illajta , paiguna ichilla canoaunai icusha , Capernaum llactama rinauca , Jesusta mascasha .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Paiguna Jesusta lamar chimbama ajta tupasha , paita ninauca : Yachachij , ¿ imahoras caima pactamucangui ?

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipaca : Cierto pacha nini , canguna ñucara mascahuanguichi , mana munanaita ricushcamanda , astaun tandara sajsajta micushcamanda .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
