text2: Tarabaichi , mana yanga pasanalla micunamanda , astaun huiñai causaigama duraj micunamanda . Cai sami micunara Runa Churi cangunara cunga ; casna rangaj Yaya Dios paita ricuchicami .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Jesusta ninauca : ¿ Imara rashun Dios rashcaunara rangaj ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Caita Dios ranami : canguna pai cachamushca runai quirinauchu .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Shinajpi paiguna ninauca : ¿ Ima munanaita ricurinara ranguichu can , ñucanchi ricusha quiringaj ? ¿ Imara rangui ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Ñucanchi yayauna Maná nishca micunara micunauca chaquishca allpa partii , Quillcai quillcashcasna : Ahua pachamanda tandara paigunama micungaj cucami , nisha .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Chi ahua pachamanda tandara mana Moisés cushcachu aca , astaun ñuca Yaya cangunara ahua pachamanda cierto tandara cunmi .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Ahua pachamanda irgumuj runa , caimi Diosmanda tanda . Paiga cai pachara causaira cun .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Runauna paita ninauca : Señor , tucui horas cai tandara cuhuai .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Ñuca causaira cuj tanda maní . Maicans ñucama shamuj , mana imahoras yarcachingachu . Maicans ñucajpi quirij , huiñaigama mana imahoraspas upinaichingachu .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Astaun cangunara rimashcani , ñucara ricushallara mana quiringuichi .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Yaya tucui ñucama cuhuashca ñucama shamunga . Maicans ñucama shamujta mana callpachishachu .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Ahua pachamanda irgumucani , mana ñuca munaira rangaj , astaun ñucara cachamuj munashcara rangaj .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Caitami ñucara cachamuj Yaya munai : Tucui ñucara cuhuashcamanda ama imaras chingachichu , astaun puchucai punzhai paita causachingaj .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Caitami ñucara cachamujpa munai : Tucui maicambas Churira ricuj , paihuajpi quirij , huiñai causaira charichu ; puchucai punzhai ñuca paita causachisha .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Shinajpi judioguna pinarinauca Jesús rimashcamanda : Ñuca ahua pachamanda shamuj tanda maní , nishcamanda .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Ninauca : ¿ Manzhu cai Jesús José churi ? Paihua yayaras paihua mamaras ricsinchi . Shinasha , ¿ imarasha nin , ahua pachamanda shamucani ?

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Jesús cutipasha paigunara nica : Ama piñaringuichi cangunapura .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Pihuas ñucama mana shamun , ñucara cachamuj Yaya mana paita pushamujpi . Puchucai punzhai ñuca paita causachisha .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Diosmanda rimajguna quillcashcaunai quillcashca tian : Dios tucui runaunara yachachingami . Shinajpi tucui Yayara uyaj , paimanda yachaj , ñucama shamunga .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Pihuas Yayara mana ricushcachu ; Diosmanda shamuj , pailla Yayara ricushcami .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maicans ñucajpi quirisha huiñai causaira charin .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Ñuca causaira cuj tanda maní .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Canguna yayauna chaquishca allpa partii Maná nishca micunara micunauca , micusha huañunauca .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Randi , caimi ahua pachamanda shamuj tanda , maican cai Jandara micusha ama huañuchu .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Ñucaga causaj tanda maní , ahua pachamanda shamuj . Maicans cai tandara micusha huiñaigama causangami . Ñuca cushca tanda ñuca quiquin aichami . Cai aicharaga cai pacha causana randimanda cushami .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Shinajpi judioguna paigunapura rimananauca : ¿ Imarasha cai runa paihua quiquin aichara micungaj cungachu ? nisha .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Jesús nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Runa Churi aichara mana micusha , paihua yahuarda mana upisha , causaira mana charinguichichu cangunajpi .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Maicans ñuca aichara micuj yahuarda upij huiñai causaira charin ; puchucai punzhai ñuca paita causachishami .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Ñuca aicha cierto micunami ; ñuca yahuar cierto upinami .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Ñuca aichara micuj ñuca yahuarda upij ñucajpi tiaun , ñucas paihuajpi .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Imasna causaj Yaya ñucara cachaca , ñucas Yayamanda causaunimi , shinallara maicans ñucara micusha ñucamanda causangami .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Caimi ahua pachamanda irgumuj tanda . Mana canguna yayauna Maná nishcara micusha huañushcasna , astaun cai tandara micuj huiñaigama causangami .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Jesús cai tucuira judioguna tandarina huasii rimaca , pai Capernaum llactai yachachiushcai .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Pai yachachishca runaunamanda ashcauna cai rimashcaunara uyasha : Cai shimi yapa mana chasquihuajchu , ninauca . ¿ Pita caita uyanara ushangairi ?

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Jesús paigunapura caimanda piñarishcara paihua shungüi yachasha , nica : ¿ Cai shimichu cangunara piñachin ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: ¿ Imara ninguichima canguna Runa Churi pai ñaupa tiashcama sicachiushcara ricusha ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Espíritu causaira cun . Aichaga mana imajtas sirvin . Ñuca canguna rimaushca shimiuna espiritumi , causaimi .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Randi cangunamanda huaquinguna mana quiringuichi . Jesusga callarimanda mana quirijgunara ricsicami , shinallara paita huañuchingaj apichingarau runaras ricsicami .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Jesús rimaca : Chiraigumanda nicani : Pis ñucama shamunara mana ushan Yaya mana paita cujpi shamungaj .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Caimanda pacha , pai yachachishca runaunamanda ashcauna tigranauca , paihua pariju purinara saquinauca .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pai chunga ishqui runaunara nica : ¿ Cangunas shinallara saquinara munanguichi ?

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Simón Pedro cutipasha : Señor , nica , ¿ pihuajmara rishunzhu ? Canlla huiñai causaira cuentaj shimiunara rimangui .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Can Cristo nishca causaj Diospa Churi ashcara quirishcanchi , ricsinchimi , nica .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Jesús cutipaca : ¿ Manzhu ñuca cangunara chunga ishquira ajllashcani , shinajllaira cangunamanda shuj supaimi ?

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Judas Iscariote , Simomba churimanda rimaca . Paiga Jesusta apichingarau runa aca . Pai chi chunga ishquimanda shuj aca .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Caimanda huasha , Jesús Galilea partii puriuca . Judea partira purinara mana munacachu , judioguna paita huañuchingaj mascashcamanda .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Judioguna ichilla huasi rana ista mayanllayamuca .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Jesuspa uquiuna paita : Caimanda llucshi , ninauca , Judea partima ri , can yachachishca runauna can rashcaunara ricunauchu .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Maican runas ricsi tucusha nisha mana pacalla raun . Can cai rashcaunara rasha , canllara pajlla pambai ricuchi tucui runaunama .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Paihua uquiuna paihuajpi mana quirinaucachu .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Ñuca punzha chara mana pactamun . Canguna punzhaga tucui horas puruntumi .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Cai pacha runauna cangunara chijninara mana ushanaunzhu . Randi ñucara chijnihuanaun ñuca paigunara rimashcamanda , Canguna rashcauna manalichu , nisha .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Cangunaga istama sicaichi ; ñucaga chara mana rínichu , ñuca punzha chara mana pactarinzhu .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Caita rimashca huasha Galileai saquirica .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Paihua uquiuna rishca huasha , Jesús shinallara istama sicasha rica , mana pajllai astaun pacallai ricami .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Istai judioguna Jesusta mascanauca : Paiga , ¿ maibirairi ? nisha .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Jesusmanda rimananauca ashcara . Huaquinguna : Pai ali runami , nisha ; shujgunaga : Mana , nisha , pai runaunara umachin .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Pihuas pajllai paimanda mana rimacachu , judiogunara manzhashcamanda .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Chaupi istai Jesús templo huasima sicasha yachachicami .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Judioguna manzharinauca : Paiga , ¿ imasnara quillcashcaunara yachan , ninauca , pai mana yachachishca ajllaira ?

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Ñuca yachachiushcara mana ñucajchu , randi ñucara cachamujmandami .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Maicans Diospa munaira pactachinara munashaga , yachachishcamanda yachangami , Diosmandachu shamun , ñucamandallachu rimauni .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Maicans pai quiquinmandallara rimausha , pai quiquin ahuayanara mascan . Astaun maicans paita cachamujpa ahuayanara mascau , paiga cierto rimajmi , paihuajpi ima llullas illan .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu Moisés ley camachishca shimira cangunara cuca , shinajllaira cangunamanda mana pihuas cai camachishcara pactachin ? ¿ Imamanda ñucara huañuchingaj mascaunguichi ?

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Runauna cutipanauca : Supaira charingui , nisha . ¿ Pita canda huañuchisha nin ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipaca : Shu rashcara rarcani ; tucui canguna cai rashcamanda manzharinguichi .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Cierto pacha Moisés cangunara circuncisión nishca aichai ricurij señalda cuca , randi mana paimandallachu aca , astaun rucuunamandami . Shinasha , samana punzhai cai circuncisión nishca camachishcara cariunahua pactachinguichi .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Cariuna circuncisión nishcara chasquijpi samana punzhai , Moisés camachishcara ama paquingaj , ¿ imarasha ñucara piñahuanguichi ñuca shu ungushca runara alichishcamanda samana punzhai ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Ricushcamandalla ama taripaichi , astaun ali cierto taripanara taripaichi .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Shinajpi huaquin Jerusalembi causajguna ninauca : ¿ Manzhu cai runara mascanauca huañuchingaj ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Ricuichi imasna pai pajllai rimaun ; pihuas paita mana imaras nin . ¿ Cai runa quiquin Cristo ashcara cierto pacha intindinaushcachu atun apuuna ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Cai runaga , maimanda pai shamushcara ricsinchi . Cristo shamujpiga , pai shamushcara pihuas mana yachangachu .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús temploi yachachisha , caparisha rimaca : Ñucaras ricsinguichi , nisha , ñuca maimanda shamushcaras shinallara yachanguichi . Ñuca quiquinmandallara mana shamucanichu ; astaun ñucara cachamuj , pai ciertomi . Paitaga mana ricsinguichi canguna .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Ñucaga paita ricsiními . Paimanda ani . Paiga ñucara cachamucami .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Shinajpi Jesusta apingaj camanauca . Shinajllaira mana pihuas paita apica , paihua horas chara mana pactamujpi .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Ashca runauna paihuajpi quirinauca : Cristoga pai shamushcai , ¿ caimanda yalijta munanaita ricurinaunara rangachu ? nisha .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Fariseoguna runauna Jesusmanda casna rimanaushcara uyanauca . Sacerdote apuuna fariseogunandi guardaunara cachanauca Jesusta apingaj .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús nica : Chara ansa tiempora cangunahua tiasha , chihuasha ñucara cachamujma rishami .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Ñucara mascahuanguichimi , randi mana tupahuanguichichu . Maibi ñuca tiaushcama chima shamunara mana ushanguichichu .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Shinajpi judioguna paigunapura ninauca : ¿ Maimara ringai

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Ista puchucai punzhai , atun ista punzha asha , Jesús shayarisha caparica : Maicans upinaichisha ñucama shamuchu , upichu , nica .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Maicans ñucajpi quirij , Diospa Quillcai quillcashcasna , paihuajmanda causana yacuuna llucshimunaungami .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Jesús caita rimasha , paihuajpi quirijguna apingaraushca Espiritumanda rimaca , chara Santo Espíritu mana shamushca ajpi » Jesús chara mana sumacyachishcamanda .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Shinajpi taucarai runaunamanda huaquinguna caita uyasha : Cierto pacha cai runa Diosmanda rimajmi ninauca .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Shujgunaga : Caimi Cristo ninauca . Huaquingunaga : ¿ Cristo Galileamandachu shamunga ? ninauca .

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu Diospa Quillcai quillcashca tian : Cristo David miraigunamanda , Belén llactamanda , David iñashca llactamanda shamungami ? ninauca .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Shinasha , Jesusmanda paigunapura piñanausha rimananauca .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Paigunamanda huaquinguna Jesusta apisha ninauca ; randi pihuas paita mana apicachu .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Guardauna sacerdote apuunama fariseogunamas tigranauca . Apuuna shamujgunara ninauca : ¿ Imarasha paita mana apamucanguichi ?

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Guardauna cutipasha : Mana pi runas pai rimashcasna imahoras rimashcachu , ninauca .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Shinajpi fariseoguna cutipanauca : ¿ Cangunas shinallara umachi tucushcanguichi ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ Huaquinguna apuunamandas faríseogunamandas paihuajpi quirinaushca chari ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Cai yanga runaunaga , ley camachishca shimira mana yachajguna , maldiciashcaunami , ninauca .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Nicodémoga , pai ñaupa Jesusma tutai shamuj , apuunamanda asha , paigunara nica :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: ¿ Ñucanchi ley camachishca shimi shu runara taripanzhu paimanda manara uyasha , pai rashcara manara yachasha ?

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Fariseoguna cutipasha paita ninauca : ¿ Can Galilea runachu angui ? Ricupai , mascapai , Galileamanda ima rimajpas mana imahoraspas ataricachu .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Caran dueño paihua huasima rica .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Jesús Olivos nishca urcuma rica . 2 Cayandi tutamanda templo huasima tigraca . Tucui runauna paima shamunauca . Jesús tiarisha paigunara yachachica .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Shinajpi yachaira yachachijguna fariseogunandi Jesusma shu manali causaj huarmira pushamunauca , shujhua tacariushcai apishca aca . Paita paiguna chaupi shungüi shayachinauca .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Paiguna Jesusta : Yachachij , ninauca , cai huarmira shujhua tacariushcai apishca aca .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Moisés ley camachishca shimii casnaunara rumihua shitasha huañuchinami ñisha mandaca . Canga , ¿ imara ningui ?

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Cai tucuira Jesusta ninauca paita tentasha , paita causayachingaj . Jesusga allpama cumurisha maqui rerohua allpai quillcaca .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Paiguna paita maspas tapusha , Jesús shayarisha nica : Cangunamanda maicans ucha illaj asha ñaupa rumihua shitachu paita .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Jesús cuti cumurisha allpai quillcaca .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Paigunaga , uyashallara , iyaibi pingarisha , shuj shujlla llucshisha rinauca , rucuunamanda maltaunagama . Jesusga sapalla saquirica , chaupi shungüi shayau huarmindi .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Jesús atarisha , huarmi sapalla ajta ricusha , paita nica : Huarmi , ¿ maibirai canda causayachijguna ? ¿ Mana pihuas canda causayachishcachu ?

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Huarmi nica : Mana pihuas , Señor . Shinasha Jesús paita nica : Ñucas canda mana causayachinichu . Rilla , ama mas cuti ucharaichu .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Cuti Jesús paigunara rimaca : Ñucaga cai pacha punzha mani , nisha . Ñucara catimuj runa llandui mana puringachu ; astaun cai causai punzhara charingami .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Shinajpi fariseoguna paita ninauca : Can quiquinmandallara rimaungui . Mana valinzhu can rimashca shimiuna .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ñuca quiquinmandallara rimasha , ñuca rimashcaga valinmi . Ñuca maimanda shamushcara maima rinaras yachanimi . Randi , canguna ñuca shamushcara ñuca rinaras mana yachanguichichu .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Canguna runa tupullara taripanguichi . Ñucaga pitas mana taripanichu .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Ñuca taripajpi , ñuca taripashca ciertomi . Ñuca mana sapallachu ani , astaun ñucas ñucara cachamuj Yayandi .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Canguna ley camachishca shimii quillcashca tian : Ishquipura rimashca ciertomi .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Ñuca quiquinmanda rimani . Ñucara cachamuj Yayas , pai shinallara ñucamanda riman .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Fariseoguna : Camba Yayaga , ¿ maibirai ? ninauca . Jesús cutipaca : Ñucaras , ñuca Yayaras , mana ricsihuanguichichu . Ñucara ricsishaga , shinallara ñuca Yayaras ricsinguichimami .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Cai shimiunara Jesús rimaca cullquira tandachina pistui , pai templo huasii yachachiusha . Pihuas paita mana apicachu , paihua horas manara pactarijpi .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Cutillara Jesús paigunara nica : Riunimi . Canguna mascahuanguichimi , astaun canguna ucharashcai huañunguichimi . Ñuca riusncama shamunara mana ushanguichichu .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Shinajpi judioguna ninauca : ¿ Pai quiquinllara huañuchingachu , pai nisha : Ñuca riusncama shamunara mana ushanguichichu ?

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Uramanda anguichi , ñucaga ahuamanda ani . Canguna cai pachamandami anguichi , ñucaga mana cai pachamandachu ani .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunara nicani : Canguna ucharashcaunai huañunguichimi . Canguna ñuca ajta mana quirijpiga , canguna ucharashcaunai huañunguichimi .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Paita ninauca : Canga , ¿ Pitangui ? Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Ñuca cangunara ñaupa punda cuentashcasna ani .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Cangunara rimangaj taripangajpas ashcara charini . Ñucara cachamuj cierto rimajmi . Ñuca paimanda imara uyashcaras chillara cai pachai rimauni .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Runaunaga mana intindinaucachu pai Yayamanda rimashcara .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Canguna Runa Churira atarichishca huasha , ñuca ajta intindinguichimi . Shinallara intindinguichimi ñucamandallara mana imaras ranichu . Astaun imara Yaya ñucara yachachishcara , chillara rimauni .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Ñucara cachamuj ñucahua pariju tian . Yaya ñuca sapallara mana saquihuashcachu . Ñucaga tucui horas pai munashcasna rani .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Jesús shina rimajpi , ashca runauna paihuajpi quirinauca .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paihuajpi quirij judiogunara nica : Canguna ñuca shimiunai causausha , cierto pacha ñuca yachachishca runauna tucunguichimi .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Cierto shimira yachanguichimi . Cai cierto shimiga cangunara liuriyachingami .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Paiguna Jesusta cutipanauca : Abrahanmanda miraiguna anchi , imahoras pitas mana sirvishcanchichu . ¿ Imarasha ningui , Liuriyachishcauna anguichi ?

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipaca : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , maicans uchara rasha , uchara sirvij tucun .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Sirvijga mana tucui horas huasii saquirinzhu . Randi , churi huiñaigama huasii tiaun .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Shinajpi Churi cangunara liuriyachijpi , cierto pacha liuriyachishcauna tucunguichimi .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Canguna Abrahanmanda miraiguna ajta ricsinimi . Randi , ñucara huañuchingaj mascanguichi , ñuca shimiuna canguna shungüi mana icushcamanda .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Ñuca Yaya ñaupajpi ricushcara rimauni . Cangunas canguna yaya ñaupajpi uyashcaras raunguichi .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Paiguna cutipanauca : Ñucanchi yaya Abrahanmi . Jesusga nica : Canguna Abrahamba churiuna asha , Abraham rashcaunara ranguichimami .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Cunaga ñucara huañuchinara mascanguichi , ñuca Diosmanda uyashcara cierto shimira rimaj . Abraham mana caita rarcachu .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Canguna yaya rashca tupura ranguichi . Shinajpi judioguna paita ninauca : Ñucanchi mana shujhua tacarishcamanda pagarishcachu anchi . Shu yayara charinchi , paiga Diosmi .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Dios canguna yaya ajpi , cierto pacha ñucara llaquinguichima . Diospajmanda liucshishcani , shamushcani . Ñucamandallara mana shamucanichu , astaun pai ñucara cachamuca .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ¿ Imarasha ñuca shimira mana intindinguichichu ? Ñuca rimashcara mana uyashcamanda mana intindinguichichu .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Cangunaga canguna supai apu yayamanda anguichi . Canguna yaya munashcara pactachinara munanguichi . Paiga callarimanda pacha huañuchij aca , cierto shimira mana rimacachu , paihuajpi cierto rimana mana tian . Paiga llullara rimasha , pai quiquinmanda riman . Pai llullajmi , shinallara llullanahua yayami .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Nucaga cierto shimira rimashcamanda , mana quirinhuanguichi ñucara .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ¿ Cangunamanda maican ñucara uchamanda causayachinzhu ? Ñuca cierto shimira rimasha , ¿ imaraigu mana quirihuanguichi ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Maicans Diosmanda aj , Dios rimashcara uyan . Caimanda mana uyahuanguichi , canguna mana Diosmanda ashcaraigu .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Shinajpi judioguna Jesusta cutipanauca : ¿ Manzhu ali rimashcanchi , Can Samaría runa angui , supaiyuj angui ? nisha .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Jesús cutipasha rimaca : Supaira mana charinichu , astaun ñuca Yayara ahuayachiuni . Cangunaga ñucara mana ahuayachinguichichu .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Ñuca quiquin ahuayanara mana mascanichu . Shujga mascan , taripan .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maicans ñuca rimashcara huacachisha , huiñaigama huañuira mana ricungachu .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Shinajpi judioguna paita ninauca : Cuna yachanchi supaira charingui . Abraham huañuca , Diosmanda rimajgunas huañunauca . Canga ningui : Pihuas ñuca shimira pactachisha huiñaigama huañuira mana ricungachu .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Canga , ¿ ñucanchi yaya Abrahanmanda yalichu angui ? Pais huañuca , shinallara Diosmanda rimajgunas . Canga , ¿ pita tucusha ningui ?

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ñucaga ñucamandallara ahuayasha , chi ahuayana mana imajtas valin . Ñuca Yayaga ñucara ahuayachinmi . Paimanda canguna , Ñucanchi Diosmi , ninguichi .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Paitaga mana ricsinguichi , randi ñuca paita ricsinimi . Ñucaga : paita mana ricsinichu nisha , cangunasna llullaj tucuima . Randi , ñuca paita ricsinimi , shinallara pai rimashcara pactachini .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Canguna Abraham yaya ñuca punzhara ricungarausha cushiyaca . Ricucami , ricushaga cushi tucuca .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Shinajpi paiguna : Can manara pichca chunga huatara charingui , ¿ Abrahanda ricushcanguichu ? ninauca .

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Manara Abraham tiajllaira , ñuca maní .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Judioguna caita uyasha rumiunara apinauca paita shitangaj . Randi Jesús pacalla risha templomanda llucshica ; paiguna chaupi shungura pasasha rica .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Yachachishca runauna paita : Yachachij , ninauca : ¿ Pi ucharashcamanda cai runa ñausa pagarimuca , paulara paihua yayaunamanda ?

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Mana pai ucharashcamanda , mana paihua yayauna ucharashcamanda ñausa pagarica . Shina tucuca Dios ranaunara paihuajpi ricuchingaj .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Ministirinmi ñucara cachamujpa ranaunara rangaj punzha ajllaira . Tuta shamujpi mana pihuas ushan tarabanara .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Ñuca cai pachai tiaushca horas , cai pacha punzha ani .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Casna rimasha , Jesús allpai tiucaca , tiucahua turura apiyachica , turura ñausa runa ñahuii llutaca .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Shina rasha Jesús paita : Ri , nica , maillairi Siloé nishca yacui . Cai Siloé shuti runa shimii , Cachashca , nin . Shinajpi runa ricami , maillaca . Ricusha tigramucamí .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Paihua mayambi causajguna pai ñausa ashcara ricsijgunas ninauca : Caiga , ¿ manzhu mañasha tiaj runa ?

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Huaquinguna : Paimi , ninauca . Shujgunaga : Chilla ricurij yachin . Pai quiquinllara : Ñuca mani , nica .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Paita ninauca : Camba ñahui ¿ imasna rasha pascarinauca ?

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Runa cutipasha : Chi Jesús nishca runa turura rasha ñahuii llutaca . Siloema ri maillangaj , nihuaca . Ñucaga ricani , rnaillacani , maillasha ricuj tucucani .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Shinajpi : ¿ Pai maibirai ? ninauca : Runaga : Mana yachanichu , cutipaca .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Fariseogunama cai ñaupa horas ñausa aj runara pushanauca .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Samana punzha maca Jesús turura rasha paihua ñahuiunara pascaca .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Paiguna cuti paita tapunauca : ¿ Imasna rashara ricuj tucucangui ? nisha . Runa paigunara nica : Ñahui ahuai turura llutaca , maillacani , ricuj tucuni .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Shinajpi fariseogunamanda huaquinguna : Cai runa mana Diosmandachu , ninauca , samana punzhara mana huacachin . Shujgunaga : Uchayuj runa , ¿ imasna cai munanaita ricurínaunara rangachu ? Paríjumanda piñanausha rimananauca .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Cutillara ñausa aj runara rimanaun : Canga , ¿ imara ningui paimanda , pai camba ñahuira pascajta ? Runa cutipaca : Paiga Diosmanda rimajmi nini .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Judioguna pai ñausa ashcara ricuj tucushcaras mana quirinaucachu . Shinasha ñahuira pascashca runa yayaunara cayanauca .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Paigunara tapunauca : ¿ Caichu canguna churi , ñausa pagarij nishca ? ¿ Ima rasha cuna ricun ?

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Yayauna cutipasha : Cai ñucanchi churi asnearas yachanchi , pai ñausa pagarishcaras yachanchi , ninauca .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Imarasha cuna ricuj tucushca , caita mana yachanchichu . Pi paihua ñahuira pascashcaras mana yachanchichu . Paiga iyaiyuj runami , paita tapuichi , paulara rimangami .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Casna ninauca yayauna judiogunara manzhashcamanda . Judioguna ña rimanauca maicans Jesús Mesías nishcami nisha nij , pai tandarina huasimanda ichui tucunmami .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Chiraigumanda yayauna : Iyaiyujmi , paita tapuichi , ninauca .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Shinajpi ñausa aj runara cüti cay anauca ; paita rimasha : Diosta alabairi , nisha , chi runa uchayuj ajta yachanchi , ninauca .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Shinajpi ñausa aj runa cutipaca : Uchayuj ashcara imasnaras mana yachanichu ; caita yachani : Ñuca ñausa ashcara , cuna ricuuni .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Fariseoguna cutillara runara ninauca : ¿ Imara rarca canda ? ¿ Imasna rashara camba ñahuira pascaca ?

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Runaga paigunara cutipasha : Ña cangunara rimashcani , nica . Uyanara mana munacanguichi . ¿ Imarasha cuti uyanara munanguichi ? ¿ Cangunas shinallara pai yachachishca runauna tucunara munanguichi ?

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Paita caminauca , nisha : Canmi pai yachachishca runa angui ; astaun ñucanchi Moisés yachachishca runauna manchi .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Dios Moisesta rimashcara yachanchi ; randi cai runa maimanda pai asnearas mana yachanchichu .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Runaga cutipaca : Cierto pacha caita manzhanaitami , canguna pai ajta mana yachanguichi , shina ajllaira ñuca ñahuira pascahuacami .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Dios uchayujgunara mana uyanzhu , caita yachanchi ; randi maicans Diosta manzhasha , paihua munaira rashas , Dios paita uyanmi .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Callarimanda mana uyarishcachu aca shu runa pagarishcamanda ñausa ajta , ñahuira pascai tucungaj .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Cai runa mana Diosmanda asha , mana imaras ranara ushanma .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Paita cutipasha ninauca : Can uchallai pagarimucangui , ¿ shinashas ñucanchira yachachihuangui ? Shinajpi , paita canzhama ichunauca .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Jesús paita ichushcara uyasha , paita tarisha rimaca : ¿ Diospa Churu quiringuichu ? nisha .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Runa cutipaca : ¿ Paiga pitangairi , Señor , ñuca paihuajpi quiringaj ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Jesús nica : Paita ricushcangui ; canhua rimau ñuca mani .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Pai nica : Señor , quirinimi . Casna nisha Jesusta adoraca .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Jesús nica : Ñuca taripangaj cai pachama shamucani , mana ricujguna ricunauchu , ricujgunas ñausa tucunauchu .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Fariseogunamanda huaquinguna paihua pariju tiajguna cai shimira uyasha ninauca : ¿ Ñucanchis shinallara ñausachu anchi ?

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Jesús nica : Canguna ñausa ashaga ucha illajguna anguichima ; randi cuna : Ricunchimi , nisha , caimanda canguna ucha saquirin .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Jesús nica : Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maican runa borrego cularbi icusha , mana pungura pasasha , astaun shu partii quinzhara sicasha , casna runa shuhuajmi .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Maican runa pungullara icusha , pai borregora cierto cuirajmi .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Pungura cuiraj runa paihuajta pascan ; borregouna paihua shimira uyanaun . Paiga borregounara shutii cayan , paigunara llucchin .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Tucui paihua quiquin borregounara llucchisha , ñaupasha rin . Borregouna paita catinaun , paihua shimira ricsishcamanda .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Randi , borregouna shu mana ricsishca runara mana catinaungachu , astaun paimanda miticunaunga , shujguna shimira mana ricsishcamanda .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Cai yachachingaj cuentanara Jesús paigunara cuentacami . Pai rimashcara mana intindinaucachu .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Shinasha Jesús cuti rimaca : Cierto pacha cangunara nini , Ñuca borregouna pungu mani .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Tucui ñucamanda ñaupa shamujguna shuhuajgunas shuhuasha huañichijgunas anaun . Borregounaga paigunara mana uyanaucachu .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Ñuca pungu mani . Maican ñucahua icusha quishpi tucungami ; icunga , llucshinga , micuna quihuara taringami .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Shuhuaj apingajlla , huañuchingajlla , huajlichingajlla shamun . Randi ñuca shamucani borregouna causaira charinauchuj causaira charishaga talirijta charinauchu .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Ñuca borregora ali cuiraj ani . Ali cuirajga paihua causaira cun borregouna randimanda .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Randi , cuirangaj pagashca runa , pai mana quiquin cuiraj asha , borregouna mana paihua quiquimbaj ajpi , shu puma shamushcara ricusha miticun , borregounara saquín . Shinasha puma borregounara apijpi , llambu chausirin .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Pai miticusha rin , pagashca runa ashcamanda ; borregounara mana llaquin , mana cuiran .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Ñuca borregora ali cuiraj ani ; borreogunara ricsini ; ñuca borregouna ñucara ricsihuanaun , imasna Yaya ñucara rícsishcasna , shinallara ñucas Yayara ricsishcasna .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Borregouna randimanda ñuca causaira cuni .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Shinallara shu borregounara charini , mana cai cularbi tiajguna . Chigunaras pushamunara ministini . Paigunas ñuca shimira uyanaungami . Shu montonlla anaunga , shu cuirajlla tiangami .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Chiraigumanda Yaya llaquihuanmi , ñuca causaira cushcamanda , cuti causaira apingaj .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Ñuca causairaga pihuas ñucamanda mana quichun , ñucallara cuni . Cungaj ushaira charinimi , cuti apiñaras ushanimi . Cai mandashca shimira Yayamanda apicani .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Cutillara judiogunapura Jesús rimashcamanda piñanausha rimananauca .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Paigunamanda ashcauna ninauca : Supaira charin , nuspa tucushca , ¿ Imaraigu paita uyanguichi ?

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Shujgunaga : Cai shimiuna mana supaiyujmandachu , ninauca . ¿ Supaiga ñausa runa ñahuira pascanara ushanzhu ?

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Jerusalembi , templo huasira Diosma cushcara iyarina ista pactamuca . Tamia horas aca .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Jesús templo huasii puriuca , Salomomba pungüi .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Judioguna pai muyujta tandarisha , paita rimanauca : ¿ Imahorasgama ñucanchi shungura turbachingui ? nisha . Can Cristo ashaga , pajllai rimahuai .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Rimashcani , astaun canguna mana quiricanguichi . Ñuca Yaya shutii rashcauna ñucamanda rimanaun .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Cangunaga mana quiringuichi , mana ñuca borregounamanda asha , ñuca cangunara rimashcasna .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Ñuca borregouna ñuca shimira uyanaun . Paigunara ricsinimi , shinallara paiguna ñucara catimunaun .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Paigunara huiñai causaira cuni ; huiñaigama mana huañunaungachu . Ñuca maquimanda pihuas paigunara mana quichungachu .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Ñuca Yaya paigunara cuhuaca . Yayaga tucuimanda yalimi . Ñuca Yaya maquimanda paigunara pihuas mana quichungachu .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Ñucahua Yayahua shujlla manchi .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Shinajpi judioguna rumiunara cuti apinauca paita shitangaj .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Jesús paigunara cutipaca : Ashca ali rashcaunara cangunara ricuchishcani ñuca Yayamanda . ¿ Maicanmanda ñucara rumihua shitasha ninguichi ?

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Judioguna cutipanauca : Mana ima alira rashcamandas rumihua shitanchi , astaun can Diosta camishcamanda , can runa ashallara Dios tucusha nishcamanda , ninauca .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Jesús cutipaca : ¿ Manzhu canguna ley shimii quillcashca tian , Nicani diosguna anguichi ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Diospa shimira chasquijgunara ' diosguna ' shutichishcajpiga , shinashas Diospa shimi mana paquirinallachu ,

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: ¿ Yaya Dios chicanyachishca runara , cai pachama cachamushcara : Camishcangui , ninguichi , pai Diospa Churi ani nishcamanda ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Ñucaga Yayamanda rashcaunara mana rajpiga , ama quirihuaichichu .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Randi , ñuca casna rashcaunara rajpi , ñucara mana quirisha , rashcaunara quirichi , canguna ricsinauchu , quirinauchu Yaya ñucajpi tiashcara ñucas paihuajpi tiashcaras .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Cuti paita apingaj iyarinauca . Jesusga paiguna maquimanda quishpicami .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Jesús Jordan yacu chimbama rica , Juan ñaupa bautisaushcai . Chihui tiauca .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Ashca runauna paihuajma shamunauca . Paiguna ninauca : Cierto pacha Juan ima munanaita ricurinaras mana rarcachu , astaun tucui pai cai runamanda rimashcauna pactarinauca .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Ashca runauna chihui Jesuspi quirinauca .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Chi horas shu Betania llactamanda runa , paihua shuti Lázaro , ungushca aca . Cai llactai María paihua ñaña Martandi causaushca aca .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Cai María , ungushca Lázaro pañi , Señorda gusto asnaj ambihua armachij aca , Señorba chaquiras paihua acchahua chaquichica .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Paniuna Jesusma shimira cachanauca : Señor , nisha , can llaquishca runa ungushcami .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Jesús caita uyasha : Cai ungüi mana huañuchinachu , nica , astaun Diosta ahuayachingaj , Diospa Churi caimanda ahuayachishca tucungaj .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Jesús Martaras paihua ñañaras Lazaroras llaquicami .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Jesús Lázaro ungushcara uyasha , pai tiashcai ishqui punzha mas saquiricami .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Shinajpi , caimanda huasha , Jesús pai yachachishca runaunara : Acuíchi , nica , cutillara Judea partima .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Yachachishca runaunaga : Yachachij , ninauca , sar punzhalla judioguna canda rumihua shitanara munanauca . ¿ Cuti riunguichu chima .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : ¿ Manzhu caran punzha chunga ishqui horasta charin ? Maicans punzhara purisha mana nijtangachu , cai pacha punzhara ricusha .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Randi , maicans tuta purisha nijtangami , punzha paihuajpi illashcamanda .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Caita rimashca huasha , Jesús nica : Ñucanchi llaquishca Lázaro amigo puñunmi . Puñushcamanda paita llicchachingaj riunimi .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna : Señor , ninauca , pai puñujpi ahyangami .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Randi , Jesús casna rimasha , Lázaro huañushcara rimacami .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús pajllai , Lázaro huañushcami , nica .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Cangunamanda cushiyauni ñuca chihui illashcamanda , canguna quiringaj . Acuichi paihuajma .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Shinajpi Tomás , Chapa Huahua nishca , chishu yachachishca runaunama nica : Acuichi ñucanchis , paihua pariju huañungaj .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Shinasha Jesús shamuca . Huañushca Lazarora ña chuscu punzha pambashcara tupaca .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betania Jerusalén mayambi tiaca , shu samai purina tupui .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Ashca judioguna Martama Mariamas shamunaushca aca paigunara cushiyachingaj , Lázaro huañushcamanda .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Shinajpi Marta Jesús shamushcara uyasha , paita tupangaj llucshica . Mariaga huasii tiauca .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Marta Jesusta nica : Señor , can caibi tiaushca ajpiga ñuca turi mana huañunmachu aca .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Shinallara cuna ricsinimi imaras can Diosta mañajpi , Dios canda cungami .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Jesús : Camba turi causaringami , nica .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Marta : Yachanimi , nica , puchucai punzha causarinai pa . causaringami .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Ñucaga causarina mani , causais ani . Maicans ñucajpi quirisha , huañushca ashallara , causaringami .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Tucui causajgunaga ñucajpi quirisha huiñaigama mana huañunaungachu . ¿ Caita quiringuichu can ?

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Marta cutipaca : Shinai , Señor , nisha , can Cristo nishca Diospa Churi ajta , cai pachama shamujta , quirishcani .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Marta casna rimasha pacalla rica paihua ñaña Manara cayangaj . Paita nica : Yachachij caibimi , canda cayaun .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Maríaga caita uyasha , uctalla shayarisha paihuajma shamuca .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Jesús chara llactai mana icushcachu aca , astaun Marta paita tupashca pambai chapauca .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Shinajpi Maríahua pariju huasii tiaj judioguna , paita cushiyachij shamujguna , pai ucta atarishcara llucshishcaras ricusha , paita catinauca : Aya huasima huacangaj riunmi , nisha .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Maríaga , Jesús tiashcama shamusha , paita ricusha , paihua chaquii tuama urmasha , paita nica : Señor , can caibi tiaushca ajpi , ñuca turi mana huañunmachu aca .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Shinajpi Jesús María huacashcara shinallara paihua pariju shamuj judioguna huacashcaras ricusha , paihua shungüi yapa llaquirisha turbarica .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Jesús nica : Paita ¿ maibi pambacanguichi ? Señor , ninaun , ricuj shami .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Jesús huacacami .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Shinajpi judioguna ninauca : Ricuichi imasna Jesús paita llaquicami .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Paigunamanda huaquinguna ninauca : Cai ñausa ñahuira pascaj ¿ manzhu ushanmaca cai runara huañuimanda quishpichingaj ?

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Jesús cuti paihua shungüi llaquirisha , aya huasima shamuca . Peñas uctu aca . Shu rumi uctu pungu ahuai siriuca .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Jesús : Rumira anzhuchichi , nica . Martaga , huañu Lázaro pañi , nica : Señor , asnangami ; ña chuscu punzha pambashcami .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Jesusga : ¿ Manzhu canda nicani , can quirishallara , Dios sumaj munanaita rashcara ricunguimi ?

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Shinajpi huañushca runa siriushcamanda rumira anzhuchinauca . Jesús ahuama ricusha : Yaya , nica , can ñucara uyashcara agrasini .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Can tucui horas ñucara uyashcara yachacani . Randi cai ashca muyujta shayajgunamanda casna nicani , paiguna can ñucara cachamushcara quirinauchu .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Caita rimashca huasha , Jesús shinzhira caparisha : Lázaro , nica , pajllama llucshi .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Huañushca runaga llucshicami . Maquindi chaquindi llachapahua huatashca , ñahuis llachapahua pÜlushca aca . Jesús nica : Huatashcara pascaichi , saquichi richu .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Shinajpi Mariajma shamuj judiogunamanda ashcauna Jesús rashcara ricusha , paihuajpi quirinauca .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Randi , huaquinguna faríseogunama rinauca Jesús rashcara paigunara cuentangaj .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Shinajpi sacerdote apuuna fariseogunandi pariju tandarimusha ninauca : ¿ Imara rashun ? Cai runa munanaita ricurinaunara ashcara raun .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Ñucanchi paita casnalla saquijpi , tucui runauna paihuajpi quirinaungami . Romanosguna shamunaunga ñucanchi santo llactaras ailluunaras tulangaj .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Caifas , apuunamanda shuj , chi huatai sacerdoteuna atun apu asha , paigunara nica : Mana imaras yachanguichi ;

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: shinallara mana iyanguichi imasnara ali tucunga shu runa ñucanchi entero aillu randimanda huañungaj , tucui runauna ama chingaringaj .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Caitaga mana pai quiquinmandalla rimaca , astaun pai chi huatai sacerdote atun apu asha , Diosmanda rimasha , Jesús entero aillu randimanda huañunami anga , nica .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Shinallara mana chi llacta aillumandalla huañuchu , astaun tucui Diospa chausirishca churiunara shujllai tandachingaj .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Shinasha , chi punzhamanda , paigunapura Jesusta huañuchingaj iyanaucami .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús judiogunahua ña mana pajllai puricachu . Paiga runa illashca partí rayapura shu Efraín nishca llactama rica . Chihui pai yachachishca runaunahua saquirica .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Judioguna Pascua ista mayanllayauca . Chi llactamanda ashcauna Jerusalenma sicanauca Pascua ista manara pactamujllaira maular ingaj .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Jesusta mascanauca . Templo huasii huaquinguna shujgunara tapunauca : ¿ Jesús istama shamungachui ? ¿ Imasnara iyanguichiri ?

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna fariseogunandi mandanauca : Maicans Jesús tiashcara yachasha rimanauchu , Jesusta apingaj , nisha .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Pascua istamanda socta punzha ñaupa , Jesús Betaniama shamuca , huañuj Lázaro llactama , pai huañushcaunamanda causachishca .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Chihui Jesuspajta shu istara ranauca , tuta . Marta yanapaca . Lázaroga Jesushua pariju mesai tiaríca .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Shinajpi María shu libra tupu gusto asnaj ambira apamuca ; ashca valij aca . Chi ambihua Jesuspa chaquira armachica , shinallara paihua acchahua chaquira chaquichica . Ambi gusto asnaihua entero huasi undarica .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Judas Iscariote , Simomba churi , shu Jesús yachachishca runa , paita entregangarau , rimaca :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: Cai ambi quinsa patsaj cullqui tupu valin , nica . ¿ Imarasha mana catushca aca tsuntsuunama cungaj ?

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Casna rimaca , mana tsuntsuunara llaquishcamanda , astaun yachachishca runauna cullqui bolsara charisha , shuhuaj asha , chimanda cullquira apij aca .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús : Saqui , nica ; ñuca pambarina punzahgama caita huacachishcami .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Tsuntsuuna tucui horas tianaunga , randi ñuca mana tucui horas cangunahua tiashachu .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Shinajpi judiogunamanda ashcauna Jesús chihui tiashcara uyanauca . Jesusmandalla mana shamunaucachu , astaun Lazarora ricungaj shamunaucami , pai huañushcamanda causarishcara ricungaj .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Sacerdote apuuna paigunapura rimananauca Lazarora huañuchingaj nisha .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Pai causarishcaraigumanda ashca judioguna anzhurinauca , Jesuspi quirinauca .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Cayandi punzha , ashca runauna istama shamujguna , Jesús Jerusalenma shamungaraushcara uyasha ,

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: ramos pangaunara apisha , paita tupangaj llucshinauca . Caparinauca : ¡ Alabashca angui ! nisha , ¡ Señor Diospa shutii shamuj , Israel Rey Apu , bendiciashca achu !

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Jesús shu malta burrora tupasha , paihua ahuai tiaríca , cai Quillcashcasna :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: Ama manzhaichu Siomba ushushi : Caiga , camba Rey Apu malta burro ahuai tiarisha shamun .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Ñaupa punda cai tucuira mana ali intindinaucachu pai yachachishca runauna . Astaun Jesusta sumacyachishca huasha , cai tucuira paimanda quillcashca ajta iyarinauca , shinallara quillcashcasna runauna paita cai tucuira ranauca .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Jesushua pariju tiajguna Lazarora aya huasimanda cayaushcai , huañushcamanda causarishcais , pai rashcara cuentanauca .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Chimandas runauna paita tupangaj shamunauca , Jesús chi munanaita ricurinara uyashcamanda .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Astaun fariseoguna paigunapura ninauca : ¡ Ricupaichi imasnara mana imaras ushanguichi . Entero mundu paita catinaun !

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Istama Diosta alabangaj shamujgunahua huaquin griego runauna tianauca .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Caiguna Felipema shamunauca . Cai Felipe Galilea partii tiaj Betsaida nishca llactamanda aca . Paiguna Felipera ruganauca : Señor , nisha , Jesusta ricunara munanchi .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Felipe caita Andresta cuentaca . Shinajpi Andrés Felipendi Jesusta cuentanauca .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús cutipasha : Runa Churira sumacyachina horas pactamun , nica .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Trigo muyu allpai urmasha , mana huañusha sapalla saquirin . Randi , huañushaga , ashcara aparin .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Maicans paihua causaira llaquisha , causaira pirdingami . Randi , maicans cai pachai paihua causaira chijnisha , huiñaigama paihua causaira huacachingami .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Maicans ñucara sirvisha , catihuachu . Maibi ñuca tiaupi chillaira ñucara sirvij tiangami . Maican runa ñucara sirvisha , ñuca Yaya paita ahuayachingami .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Cunallara ñuca alma turbarinmi . ¿ Imara nishairi ? ¿ Yaya , cai horasmanda quishpichihuai , nishachu ? Astaun , caita pactachingaj cai horasma shamucani .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Yaya , nica , camba shutira ahuayachingui . Shinajpi ahua pachamanda shu shimi uyarica , nisha : Ahuayachishcani , cutillara ahuayachishami .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Chihui tiaj ashca runauna , shimira uyajguna : Rayuca , ninauca . Huaquingunaga : Shu ángel paita rimashcami , ninauca .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Jesús cutipasha : Cai shimi mana ñucajta , astaun cangunajta uyaricami , nica .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Cuna cai pacha taripanami . Cunallara cai pacha atun apu ichui tucungami .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Ñucaga allpamanda atarichishca ajpi , tucui runaunara ñucajma aisashami .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Jesús casna rimasha pai huañuna samillara intindichicami .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Runaunaga paita cutipanauca : Ley shimimanda uyashcanchi Cristo huiñaigama tiangami , nisha . ¿ Imarasha ningui can Runa Churi atarinara ministinmi ? ¿ Pitai cai Runa Churi ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Unaillara punzha cangunahua tiangami . Purichi punzha tiaullaira , tuta cangunara ama cungaimanda apichu . Tutai purij maima ríushcaras mana yachanzhu .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Imahoras punzhara charisha , punzhara quirichi , canguna punzhamanda churiuna tucungaj .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Shinashas , Jesús runauna ñaupajpi ashca munanaita ricurinaunara rajllaíra , mana paita quirinaucachu ;

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Diosmanda rimaj Isaías rimashca pactaringaj imasna nin : Señor , ¿ pita ñucanchi rimashcara quirishcachu ? ¿ Pima Diospa ushanara ricuchishcachu ?

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Chi raigumanda quirinara mana ushanaucachu , imasna Isaías shu partii nica :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Paiguna ñahuiunara ñausayachica , shunguras shinzhiyachica ; ñahuihua ama ricunauchu , shunguhuas ama intindinauchu , ama ñucama voltiarinauchu , ñuca paigunara alichingaj .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Cai shimiunara Isaías rimaca , pai Diospa sumajta ricusha , Diosmanda rimashas .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Shinasha , apuunamanda ashcauna Jesuspi quirinauca ; astaun fariseogunara manzhashcamanda paiguna quirishcara mana rimanaucachu , tandarina huasimanda ama ichui tucungaj .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Paiguna Dios alabashcamanda runauna alabashcara yali llaquinauca .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Jesús caparisha nica : Maicans ñucajpi quirisha , mana ñucajllaira quirinzhu , astaun ñucara cachamujpis quirinmi .
