text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Maicans ñucara ricusha , shinallara ñucara cachamujtas ricun .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Ñucaga punzhayachij cai pachama shamushcani , tucui ñucajpi quirijguna ama tuta llandui tianauchu .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Maicans ñuca shimira uyajpi , mana pactachijpi , mana ñuca paita taripanichu . Cai pachara taripangaj mana shamucanichu , astaun cai pachara quishpichingaj .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Maicans ñucaras , _ñuca shimiras mana chasquisha , paita taripangaj charin . Ñuca rimashca shimi paita taripangami puchucai punzhai .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Ñuca ñucamandallara mana rimacanichu ; astaun ñucara cachamuj Yaya , paiga mandahuaca imara rimanaras .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Yachanimi Dios camachishca shimi huiñai causaimi . Ñuca imara rimashas , Yaya ñucama rimashcasna rimauni .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Pascua ista manara pactamujllaira , Jesús paihua horas ña pactamushcara ricsisha , cai pachamanda Yayajma ringaj , paihua cai pachai causajgunara llaquisha , puchucaigama paigunara llaquicami .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Tuta micunara micuushcai , supai apu Simomba churi Judas Iscariote shungüi iyachica Jesusta entregangaj .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Jesús yachaca paihua Yaya tucuira paihua maquii churashcara , shinallara pai Diosmanda shamushcara , Diospajma rinaras yachaca .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Jesús micuna mesamanda atarisha , churanara anzhuchisha , chaquichina llachapara apisha chumbillica .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Shinajpi , shu batiai yacura talisha , pai yachachishca runauna chaquira maillangaj callarica , pai chumbülishca llachapahua chaquiunara chaquichica .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Jesús Simón Pedroma shamujpi , Pedro nica : Señor , ¿ canzhu ñuca chaquira maillangui ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Jesús paita cutipasha : Ñuca raushcara mana intindinguichu cuna , nica , astaun huasha intindinguimi .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Pedroga : Mana imahoras chaquira maillahuangui ñucajta , nica . Jesusga : Nuca canda mana maülajpiga , mana imaras charinguichu ñucahua , nica .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Simón Pedro cutipasha : Señor , nica , mana chaquillara , astaun maquindis umandis maillahuai .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Jesús maican runa paita entregangaraushcara yachaca , chi raigumanda nica : Mana tucui pichashcachu .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Shinajpi , chaquiunara maillashca huasha , Jesús paihua churanara churarisha , cuti mesai tiarica . Jesús paigunara tapuca : ¿ Yachanguichi ñuca cangunahua rashcara ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Canguna ñucara : Yachachij , Señor , nisha nihuanguichi . Shina nisha alimi rimanguichi . Shinami ani .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Ñucaga Señor , Yachachij asha , canguna chaquira mailiashcani ; shinallara cangunas shujguna chaquira maillana anguichi .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Ñuca shu ricuchinara cangunara ricuchishcani , ñuca rashcasna canguna shinallara ranguichi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Sirvijga paihua patronmanda mana yalinzhu ; shinallara cachashca runa paita cachajmanda mana yalinzhu .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Canguna cai camachishcaunara yachasha pactachishas , cushi shunguyuj anguichi .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Ñuca mana tucuimanda rimanichu . Ñuca ajllashca runaunara ricsinimi . Astaun , Diospa Quillca pactaringaj ; Ñucahua pariju tandara micuj paihua chaquira atarichica ñucahua contra rasha .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Cunamanda pacha , manara pactarijllaira , cangunara rimashcani . Shina asha pactarishca horasllaira ñuca maican ajtas quiringuichi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maicans ñuca cachashca runara chasquisha , ñucaras chasquin . Maicans ñucara chasquisha ñucara cachamujtas chasquin .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Caita rimashca huasha , Jesús paihua shungüi yapa llaquirica . Cierto pacha cangunara nini , cangunamanda shuj ñucara entregangami , nica .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Shinajpi yachachishca runauna parijumanda ricunanausha , paigunapura tapunauca : ¿ Pitangai Jesús casna rimaushca ? nisha .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Shu Jesús yachachishca runa , pai llaquishca , Jesuspa rayai quimirisha siriuca .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Simón Pedro , maquihua ricuchisha paita nica : Tapui , ¿ pitairi pai casna rimaushca runa ?

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Paiga , Jesuspa pichu rayai quimirisha sirij : Señor , ¿ pitairi ? nica .

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Jesús cutipasha : Ñuca ucuchishca tandara cushca runami , nica . Jesusga tandara ucuchisha , Simomba churi Judas Iscariotema cuca .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Judas ucushca tandara apishca huasha , Satanás supai apu paihua shungüi icuca . Shinajpi Jesús paita nica : Can rangaraushcara uctalla rai .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Jesús imamanda caita rimashcara mesai tiajguna mana intindinaucachu .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Huaquinguna iyanauca Judas cullqui bolsara charishcamanda , Jesús paita nica : Ñucanchi istai ministishcara randingui ; mana shinasha imaras tsuntsuunama cuyangaj rimaca .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Ucushca tandara apishca huasha , Judas llucshica . Tuta aca .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Pai llucshishca huasha , Jesús : Cuna Runa Churi sumacyachishcami , nica . Shinallara , Dios paihua Churu sumacyachishcami .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Diosga Churimanda sumacyachishca asha , shinallara Dios pai quiquinllai Churira sumacyachingami , cunallara paita sumacyachingami .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Churihuauna , chara ansa cangunahua pariju tiausha . Mascahuanguichi , randi imasnara judiogunara nicani : Ñuca riusncama canguna shamunara mana ushanguichichu . Shinallara cangunaras cuna nini .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Mushuj mandashca shimira cangunara rimauni : Parijumanda llaquinaunguichi . Ñuca cangunara llaquishcasna , shinallara parijumanda llaquinaunguichi .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Caimanda tucui runauna canguna ñuca yachachishca runauna ajgunara ricsinaungami , canguna parijumanda llaquinausha .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Simón Pedro Jesusta nica : Señor , ¿ maimara ringui ? Jesús cutipaca : Ñuca riusncama cuna mana ushangui catinara , astaun huashaga catihuanguimi .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Pedroga : ¿ imamanda canda amallara catinara mana ushashachu ? nica . Can randimanda ñuca causaira cushami .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : ¿ Camba causaira ñuca randimanda cunguichu ? Cierto pacha canda nini : Gallo manara cantajllaira , can quinsa cuti , Paita mana ricsinichu , ninguimi .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Canguna shungu ama turbaríchu . Diospi quiringuichi , ñucajpis quirichi .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Ñuca Yaya llactai ashca huasi tian . Mana shina ajpiga , cangunara rimaimacani . Ñuca canguna tianara alichingaj ríunimi .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Rishaga , tianaunara alichisha , cuti shamushami cangunara ñucajma pushangaj , ñuca tiaushcai canguna shinallara chihui tiangaj .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Ñuca riushcara yachanguichi , shinallara nambiras .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Tomás paita nica : Señor , can riushcara mana yachanchi , ¿ imasna rashara nambira ricsina angai ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Ñuca ñambi ani , cierto shimi ani , causáis ani . Mana pihuas Yayama shamun , mana ñucahua shamusha .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Ñucara ricsisha , Yayaras ricsmguichima . Cunamanda paita ricsinguichi , paita ricushcanguichi .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Felipe paita nica : Señor , Yayara ricuchihuapai , chilla basta .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Jesús paita nica : ¿ Ashca punzhaunara cangunahua pariju tiashcani , can ñucara mana ricsihuashcangui , Felipe ? Maicans ñucara ricusha Yayaras ricushcami . ¿ Imasnajpira shina ningui : Yayara ricuchihuapai ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: ¿ Ñucaga ñuca Yayajpi tiashcara , Yaya ñucajpis tiashcara manzhu quiringui ? Ñuca cangunara rimashca shimiunara mana ñucamandallachu rimani , astaun ñucajpi causaj Yaya , paimi tucui ranaunara raun .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Ñucara quirihuaichi ñuca Yayajpi tiashcara , Yayas ñucajpis tiashcara ; manashaga quiquin rashcaunamanda quirihaunguichi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Maicans ñucajpi quirisha , ñuca rashca samiunara shinallara rangami ; caigunamanda yalijtas rangami , ñuca Yayajma rinamanda .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Canguna tucui imaras ñuca shutii Yayara mañajpi , cai tucuira rashallami , Yaya Churimanda sumacyachishca angaj .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Canguna imaras ñuca shutii mañajpi , rashallami .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: Canguna ñucara llaquishaga , ñuca mandashca shimiunara pactachichi .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Ñuca Yayara rugasha , pai cangunara shu Yanapajta cachamungami huiñaigama cangunahua pariju tiangaj .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Cai Yanapaj cierto shimira rimaj Espiritumi . Cai pacha runauna paita chasquinara mana ushanaun , paita mana ricusha , mana ricsishas . Cangunaga paita ricsinguichi . Paiga cangunahua pariju tiaun , canguna shungu ucui tiangami .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Cangunaraga mana huaccha huahuaunara saquishachu . Cangunama shamushami .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Unaillara cai pacha runauna ñucara mana ricunaungachu . Astaun canguna ricuhuanguichimi . Ñuca causashcaraigu cangunas causaunguichimi .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Chi punzhai ñuca Yayajpi tiashcara yachanguichi , cangunas ñucajpi , ñucas cangunajpi .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Maicans ñuca mandashca shimiunara charisha , pactachishas paimi ñucara liaquij . Ñucara llaquijta , ñuca Yaya paita llaquingami , ñucas paita llaquisha , ñucallara paima ricuchishami .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Judas , mana Iscariote , Jesusta nica : Señor , ¿ Imarasha ñucanchillara ricuchingui , mana tucui cai pacha runaunaras ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Jesús paita cutipasha nica : Maicans ñucara llaquij , ñuca mandashca shimira pactachingami . Yayas paita llaquingami . Paihuajma shamushun , paihua causashun .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Maicans ñucara mana llaquij , ñuca shimira mana pactachinzhu . Canguna uyashca shimi mana ñucamandallarachu shamun , astaun ñucara cachamuj Yaya rimashcami .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: Ñucas cangunahua pariju tiashallara cai shimiunara rimashcani .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Yaya ñuca shutii cachamushca Yanapajga , Santo Espíritu ashaga , cangunara tucui imaras yachachingami ; shinallara tucui ñuca rimashcaunara cangunara iyarichingami .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Cushi shungura cangunara saquinimi ; ñucamanda cushi shungura cangunara cuni . Mana cai pacha cushcasna cunichu . Canguna shungu ama turbarichu shinallara ama manzharichu .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Uyashcangui imasnara cangunara nicani : Riunimi , shinallara tigramunimi . Canguna ñucara llaquisha , cierto pacha cushiyanguichima , Yayajma riunimi nishcamanda , Yaya ñucamanda yali ashcaraigu .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Cuna , manara tucujllaira cangunara cuentashcani , imahoras casna tucujpi canguna quiringuichima .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Cunamanda mana ashcara cangunara rimashachu . Cai pacha atun apu shamun ; paiga ñucajpi imaras mana charin .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Astaun cai pacha runauna Yayara ñuca llaquishcaras , Yaya ñucara mandashcaras ricsinauchu , shinallarami rauni . Atarichi , caimanda acuichi , nica .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: Jesús nica : Ñuca cierto uvillas yura ani , ñuca Yayaga yurara cuirajmi .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Tucui pallca ñucamanda muyura mana aparijta pitinaunga ; muyura aparijgunara pichanaunga astaun mas aparingaj .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Ñuca rimashca shimimanda canguna ña pichashca anguichi .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Ñucajpi tiaichi , ñucas cangunajpi . Imasnara pallca paulara mana aparingachu mana yurai tiajpi , shinallara canguna mana aparinguichichu mana ñucajpi tiajpi .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: Ñuca uvillas yura ani , canguna pallcauna anguichi . Pihuas ñucajpi tiausha , ñucas paihuajpi , paiga ashca muyura aparingami . Ñucamanda anzhurishca asha , mana ima ranaras ushanguichichu .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Maicans mana ñucajpi tiausha , mana valij pallca cuenta ichui tucunga , chaquiringaj . Ichushca pallcaunara tandachinaunga , ninai shitasha rupachinaunga .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Canguna ñucajpi tiausha , ñuca shimiuna cangunajpi tiausha , imaras munasha mañaichi , cangunajta rashca anga .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Canguna ashca muyura aparijpi , ñuca Yaya sumacyachishca angami . Shinashas , canguna ñuca quiquin yachachishca runauna tucunguichimi .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Imasna Yaya ñucara llaquihuaca , shinallara ñuca cangunara llaquishcani . Ñuca llaquiushcai tiaichi .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Canguna ñuca mandashca shimiunara pactachijpi , ñuca llaquiushcai tiaunguichimi , imasna ñuca Yaya mandashca shimiunara pactachishcani , shinallara pai llaquiushcais tiauni .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Cai shimiunara cangunama rimashcani ñuca cushi cangunajpi tiachu , canguna cushi undajta angaj .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Caimi ñuca mandashca shimi : Canguna parijumanda llaquinuichi , ñuca cangunara llaquishcasna .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Pi runas cai llaquinamanda yalira mana charinzhu , shu runa paihua causaira paihua amigouna randimanda cusha .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Canguna ñuca amigouna anguichi ñuca mandashcara rasha .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Cunaga , cangunara sirvijguna nisha mana rimashachu . Sirvijga paihua patrón rashcara mana yachanzhu . Astaun cangunara amigouna nisha rimashcani . Ñuca Yayamanda uyashcara , tucuira cangunara cuentashcani .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Canguna ñucara mana ajllahuashcanguichi , astaun ñuca cangunara ajllacani . Cangunara cachashcani aparisha ringaj , canguna aparishca saquirichu , canguna imaras Yayara mañajpi ñuca shutii cangunara cungami .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Caita cangunara mandani : Llaquinaunguichi parijumanda .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: Cai pacha runauna cangunara chijnisha , caita yachaichi , paiguna shinallara ñucara chijninauca cangunamanda ñaupara .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Canguna cai pachamanda asha , cai pacha runauna paiguna quiquimbajta llaquinaunma ; astaun canguna mana cai pachamanda ashaga , chijni tucushcanguichi , ñuca cangunara cai pachamanda ajllashcaraigu .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Ñuca cangunara rimashca shimira iyaringuichi . Shu sirvij paihua patronmanda mana yalinzhu . Runauna ñucara torméndachihuanauca ; shinallara cangunara tormendachinaungami . Paiguna ñuca rimashca shimira pactachisha , shinallara canguna rimashcara pactachinaungami .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Astaumbas , cai tucuira cangunara ranaunga ñuca shutimanda , Jiucara cachamujta mana ricsishcamanda .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Ñuca mana shamushcajpiga , paigunama mana rimashcajpis , uchara mana charinaunmaca . Cuna paiguna rimanara mana ushanaun , Mana yachanchichu , nisha , paiguna ucharashcamanda .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Maicans ñucara chijnisha shinallara ñuca Yayaras chijnin .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Ñuca paiguna chaupi shungüi shujguna mana rashca tono ranaunara mana rashca ajpiga , paiguna uchara mana charinaunmaca . Cunaga ñucaras Yayaras ricunaushcami , chijninaushcami .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Cai casna tucushcami paiguna ley shimii quillcashca pactaringaj : Yangamanda ñucara chijnihuanauca , nisha .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: Astaun Yayajmanda ñuca cachamushca Yanapaj , pai Yayajmanda llucshimuj , cierto rimaj Espíritu aj , pai shamushaga ñucamanda rimangamí .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Cangunas shinallara ñucamanda rimanguichi , canguna callarimanda ñucahua pariju causashcamanda .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: Cai tucuira cangunara rimashcani , canguna ama manzharingaj .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Tandarina huasiunamanda cangunara ichunaungami . Punzha shamunga imahoras maican runas cangunara huañuchisha , Diosta sirviunimi nisha iyangami .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Caita ranaungami Yayaras ñucaras mana ricsishcamanda .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Cai shimiunara cangunara rimashcani , horas pactamujpi , ñuca casna rimashcaunara iyarinauchu .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Cuna ñucara cachamujma riunimi . Cangunamanda pihuas mana tapuhuangui : ¿ Maima riungui ? nisha .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Astaun ñuca casna rimashcamanda , canguna shungüi ashcara llaquiringuichi .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Cierto shimira rimauni : Ñuca ringaj ministirinmi , nisha . Ñuca mana rijpiga , Yanapaj cangunajma mana shamungachu . Ñuca risha , paita cachamushami .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Yanapaj shamusha , tucui runaunara ucharas , ali causanaras , taripanaras ricsichingami .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Uchamanda rimangami , runauna ñucajpi mana quirishcamanda .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Ali causanamanda rimangami , ñuca Yayajma riushcamanda ; ñucara mana mas ricunguichichu .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Taripanamandas rimangami , cai pacha atun apu ña taripashcamanda .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: Chara ashcara charini cangunara cuentangaj , astaun cunaliara uyanara mana ushanguichichu .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Imahoras cai cierto shimira rimaj Espíritu shamusha , pai cangunara tucui cierto rimashcara yachachingami . Pai quiquinmandallara mana rimangachu , astaun pai tucui uyashcara cuentangami , ima huasha horas shamunaras rimangami .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Pai ñucara sumacyachingami ; ñucajmanda ajgunara cangunara rimangami .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ñuca Yaya tucui charishca ñucajmi ; chimanda nicani : Espíritu ñucajmanda apisha , cangunara yachachingami .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Unaillara mana ricuhuanguichichu , cuti unaillai ricuhuanguichimi ; ñuca Yayajma rishcamanda .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Shinajpi pai yachachishca runaunamanda huaquinguna ninauca : ¿ Imara nin , Unaillara ñucara mana ricuhuanguichichu , cuti unaillai ricuhuanguichimi ; shinallara Yayajma riunimi ?

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Paiguna ninauca : ¿ Imara nin cai Unaillai nishca ? Pai rimashcara mana intindinchichu .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Jesusga paiguna tapusha nishcara ricsisha , paigunara nica : ¿ Cangunapura tapunguichi cai ñuca rimashcara , Unaillara mana ricuhuanguichichu , cuti unaillai , ricuhuanguichimi nisha ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Huacangaraunguichi , llaquiringaraunguichi ; astaun cai pacha runauna cushiyanaungami . Shinasha canguna llaqui tucujpi , canguna llaquirishca cushi tucungami .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Imahoras shu huarmi pagarichisha nanachinmi , paihua horas pactamushcamanda . Huahua pagarishca huasha , huarmi paihua nanaira ña cungarin , shu runa cai pachai pagarishcara cushiyashcamanda .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Shinallara canguna cierto pacha llaquiringuichimi . Shinasha ñuca cangunara cuti ricusha , canguna shungu cushiyangami . Canguna cushiyashcara pihuas mana quichungachu .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Chi punzhai imaras mana tapuhuanguichi . Cierto pacha cangunara nini : Tucui imaras Yayara mañajpi ñuca shutii , pai cungami .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Cuna horasgama imaras mana mañashcanguichi ñuca shutii . Mañaichi , cui tucunguichimi , canguna cushi pactaringaj .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: Cai tucuira yachachingaj cuentanaunahua cangunara rimashcani . Horas shamunga ñuca mana yachachingaj cuentanaunahua rimashachu , astaun pajllallai Yayamanda rimasha .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Chi punzhai ñuca shutii mañanguichi . Mana ninichu ñuca Yayara cangunamanda rugasha ;

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Yaya paulara cangunara llaquin , canguna llaquihuashcamanda , ñuca Diosmanda llucshishcara quiríshcamandas .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Yayajmanda llucshicani , cai pachama shamucani . Cutillara cai pachara saquisha , Yayajma riunimi .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Pai yachachishca runauna ninauca : Cuna pajllai rimaungui , mana ima pacashca shimira rimaungui .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Cuna intindinchi can tucui imaras yachangui ; pihuas canda imaras tapungaj mana ministingui . Caimanda can Diosmanda llucshishcara quirinchimi .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Jesús cutipaca : ¿ Cunarachu quiringuichi ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Horas shamun , ña pactamun , nica , canguna chausiringuichimi , caran dueño paihua partima , ñucara sapalla saquihuanguichi . Astaun ñuca mana sapallachu ani , Yaya ñucahua pariju tiaunmi .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Cai tucuira cangunara rimashcani canguna ñucajpi cushira charínguichima . Cai pachai tormendosta charinguichimi , astaun quirichi , ñuca cai pachara vencishcanimi .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Jesús cai tucuira rimaca . Ahuama ricusha , nica : Yaya , horas pactamun . Camba Churira sumacyachingui , camba Churi shinallara canda sumacyachichu .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Can paita ushaira cushcangui tucui runauna ahuai , tucui can paita cushca runaunama huiñai causaira cungaj .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Caimi huiñai causai , canda sapalla cierto Dios ajta , can cachamushca Jesucristoras ricsinauchu .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Ñuca cai pachai canda sumacyachishcani . Can ñuca rangaj cushcara pactachishcanimi .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Cuna , Yaya , ñucara sumacyachihuangui canhua pariju , ñuca ñaupa horas canhua pariju charishca sumajhua , cai pachara manara rashca ajllaira .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Can cai pachamanda cuhuashca runaunama camba shutira ricuchishcani . Cai runauna cambajguna anauca , paigunara cuhuashcangui . Paiguna camba shimira pactachinauca .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Cuna paiguna ricsinaushcami imasna tucui can ñucara cushcauna cambajmanda shamunaushcami .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Can ñucara rimashca shimiunara paigunara rimashcani . Paiguna cai shimiunara chasquinaushcami . Cierto pacha ñuca canmanda llucshishcara yachanaun , shinallara can ñucara cachamushcara quirinaushcami .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Paigunamanda rugauni . Cai pacha runaunamanda mana rugaunichu , astaun can ñucara cushca runaunamanda rugauni . Paiguna cambajguna anaun .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Tucui ñucaj cambajmi , shinallara cambaj ñucajmi . Paigunamanda sumacyachishca ani .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Cunamanda cai pachai mana tiaunichu ; caiguna cai pachai tianaunmi . Ñucaga cambajma shamuni . Sumaj Yaya , caigunara , can ñucama cushca runaunara , huacachipai camba shutii , paiguna shujlla anauchu ñucanchisna .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Cai pachai ñuca paigunahua pariju tiaushcai , camba shutii paigunara huacachicani . Can ñucama cushca runaunara huacachishcani , paigunamanda pihuas mana pirdiricachu ; randi pirdirina aj runa , paula pirdirica , Quillcashca pactaringaj .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Cunaga cambajma shamuni . Caita cai pachai rimauni , paiguna ñuca cushira pactajta charinauchu paiguna shungüi .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Can rimashca shimira paigunara rimashcani . Caí pacha runauna paigunara chijninaucami , paiguna mana cai pachamanda ashcaraigu , imasna ñucas shinallara mana cai pachamandachu ani .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Can paigunara cai pachamanda llucchingaj mana ruganichu , astaun can paigunara manalimanda huacachichu .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Paiguna mana cai pachamandachu anaun , imasna ñucas mana cai pachamandachu ani .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Paigunara chicanyachi camba cierto shimii . Can rimashca shimi ciertomi .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Imasna ñucara cai pachama cachamucangui , shinallara ñuca paigunara cai pachama cachamushcani .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Paigunara llaquishcamanda ñuca ñucallara mundumanda chicanyachiuni , paiguna shinallara cierto shimii chicanyachishca anauchu .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: Mana caigunamandallachu mañauni , astaun shinallara paiguna rimashcamanda ñucajpi quiringaraujgunamandas ,

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: paigunapura shujlla anauchu , imasna can Yaya ñucajpi , ñucas cambajpis , shinallara paigunas ñucanchijpis shujlla anauchu , cai pacha runauna can ñucara cachamushcara quirinauchu .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Nuca can cuhuashca sumajta paigunama cushcani , paigunapura shujlla anauchu , ñucanchi imasna shujlla ashcasna ;

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: ñuca paigunajpis , can ñucajpis , paiguna ali pacha shujlla anauchu ; cai pacha runauna can ñucara cachamushcara yachanauchu , shinallara can paigunara llaquishcara ricsinauchu , imasna can ñucara llaquishcasna .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: Yaya , can cuhuashca runauna ñuca munani maibi ñuca tiashcais paigunas ñucahua pariju tianauchu , can ñucara cushca sumajta ricungaj . Can cai pachara manara rajllaira ñucara llaquihuashcangui .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Ali Yaya , cai pacha runauna canda mana ricsinaushcachu , astaun ñuca canda ricsishcani . Caigunas can ñucara cachamushcara ricsinaushcami .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Shinallara ñuca camba shutira paigunama ricsichishcani , charajpas ricsichisha , can ñucara llaquishca sami llaquina paigunajpi tiachu , ñucas paigunajpi tiachu .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Jesús cai tucuira rimashca huasha , pai yachachishca runaunahua pariju llucshica , Cedro nishca yacu chimbama , shu sisa pambama . Chihui icuca pai yachachishca runaunahua .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Judaspas , Jesusta entregaj runa , cai sisa pambara ricsica . Ashca cuti Jesús pai yachachishca runaunandi chihui tandarijguna aca .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Judas , shu monton soldarounara apisha , sacerdote apuunamanda fariseogunamandas cachashca guardaunandi , chi pambama rinauca , velaunahua nina huanguunahuas esparaunahuas .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Jesusga tucui ima tucungaraushcaras yachasha , ñaupasha rica : Pita mascaunguichi , nica .

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Nazaretmanda Jesusta mascaunchi , ninauca . Jesusga : Ñuca mani , nica . Paigunahua , Judas , Jesusta entregaj runa , chillaira tiauca .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Jesús paigunara , Ñuca mani , nijpi , runauna huashama tigrasha allpama urmanauca .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Cuti Jesús : ¿ Pita mascaunguichi ? tapuca . Paiguna , Nazaretmanda Jesusta , ninauca .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Jesús cutipasha nica : Ña nicani , Ñuca mani . Canguna ñucara mascasha , caigunara ringaj saquichi , nica .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Casna tucuca pai rimashca shimi pactaringaj : Can ñucara cushca runaunamanda pitas mana pirdishcani , nisha .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Shinajpi Simón Pedro , esparara charisha , llucchica , sacerdote atun apura sirvijta chugríchica , paihua ali rinri carara pitisha . Cai sirvij Maleo nishca shutiyuj aca .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Shinajpi Jesús Pedrora nica : Esparara carai sati . ¿ Ñuca Yaya cushca tormendarina vasora manzhu upisha ?

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Shinajpi soldaro monton paiguna capitandi judioguna cachashcaunandi Jesusta apinauca , huascahua paita huatanauca .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Ñaupa punda Jesusta Anas nishcama pushanauca , pai Caifas nishca huarmi yaya asha , Caifas chi huatai sacerdoteuna atun apu aca .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Chi Caifas judiogunama rimaj aca : Shu runa tucui runauna randimanda huañuna ministirin , nisha .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Simón Pedro , shu yachachishca runandi Jesusta catinauca . Chishu yachachishca runa sacerdote atun apu ricsishca aca . Pai Jesushua pariju sacerdote atun apu huasi pungüi icuca .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Astaun Pedro pungu pajllama tiauca . Shinasha chi yachachishca runa , sacerdote atun apu ricsishca asha , pungüi ricuj huarmira rimaca , Pedrora ucuma icuchica .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Shinajpi pungura cuiraj huarmi Pedrora nica : ¿ Manzhu can cai runa yachachishca runaunamanda angui ? Pedro cutipasha : Mana , nica .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Sirvijguna guardaunandi shayarisha ninara tandachinauca . Chiri tucushcamanda cunurianauca . Paigunahua pariju Pedro shayarica cunungaj .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Sacerdote atun apu Jesusta tapuca pai yachachishca runaunamanda , pai camachishcaras .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Jesús paita : Ñucaga pajllai runaunara rimashcani , nica . Tucui horas tandarina huasii yachachishcani , templo huasüs , tucui judioguna tandarinaunais yachachishcani . Pacalla imaras mana rimashcanichu .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: ¿ Imarasha tapuhuangui ñucara ? Uyajgunara tapui imara paigunara rimashcani . Paiguna ñuca rimashcara yachanaun .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Jesús casna rimajpi , shu chihui tiaj guarda Jesusta sajmaca , nisha : ¿ Shinachu sacerdote atun apura cutipangui ?

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ima manaliras rimashca ajpi , manalira ricuchihuai . Mana shinasha , ¿ imamanda sajmahuangui ?

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Shinajpi Anas huatashca Jesusta Caifas sacerdote atun apujma cachaca .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro shayarisha cunuuca . Paita ninauca : ¿ Manzhu can pai yachachishca runaunamanda angui ? Pedroga , Mana , nica .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Sacerdote atun apura sirvijgunamanda shuj , rinri chugrichishca runa aillu , paita nica : ¿ Manzhu canda ricucani sisa pambai , Jesushua pariju ?

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Cuti Pedro : Paita mana ricsinichu , nica . Chi ratollaira gallo cantaca .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Tutamanda Jesusta Caifaspajmanda taripana huasima pushanauca . Paigunaga taripana huasii mana icunaucachu , shujgunahua ama llutarisha huajliringaj , shina rasha Pascua istara micunara ushangaj .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Shinajpi Pilato canzhama llucshimuca , paigunama . ¿ Imamanda causayachinguichi cai runara ? nica .

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Cutipasha , ninauca : Cai runa mana causayuj ajpi , cambajma mana pushamunchimachu aca .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Shinajpi Pilato paigunara nica : Cangunalla paita pushaichi , canguna yachaira paita taripaichi . Judioguna paita : Ñucanchiga pitas mana huañuchinara ushanchichu , ninauca .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Caita ninauca Jesús rimashca shimi pactaringaj , imahoras pai ima sami huañuihua huañunara rimaca .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Shinasha Pilato cuti taripana huasii icuca . Jesusta cayasha tapuca : ¿ Can judioguna rey apuchu angui ? nisha .

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Jesús paita cutipaca : Caitaga , ¿ camba quiquin iyaimanda rimanguichu , mañasha ^ shujgunachu ñucamanda rimanauca ?

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Pilato cutipaca : ¿ Ñucaga judiochu ani ? Camba llactapurauna sacerdote apuunandi canda ñucama entreganaushca . ¿ Imara rashcangui ?

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ñuca mandana pacha mana cai pachamandachu . Cai pachamanda ajpiga , ñucara sirvijguna macananaunmami , ñuca judiogunama ama cui tucungaj . Astaun ñuca mandana pacha mana caimandachu .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato paita nica : ¿ Shinasha can rey apuchu angui ? Jesús cutipaca : Can rey apu angui nisha nihuangui . Chiraigumanda pagaricani ; chiraigumanda cai pachama shamucani , cierto shimira rimangaj . Tucui cierto shimira chasquij ñuca shimira uyanmi .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Pilato paita : ¿ Cierto shimiga , imarai ? nica . Caita rimashca huasha , Pilato cuti judiogunama llucshisha , paigunara : Ima causaras paihuajpi mana tupanichu , nica .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Canguna yachaira charinguichi , Pascua istai ñuca cangunama shu runara cacharingaj . Shinasha , ¿ ñuca cai judioguna Rey Apura cacharingaj munanguichi ?

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Shinajpi tucui pariju caparinauca : Caitaga mana , nisha , astaun Barrabasta munanchi . Barrabasga shuhuaj runa aca .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato Jesusta apisha , paita azutica . 2 Soldarounaga casha llaitura ahuanauca , Jesuspa umai churachinauca . Paita puca llachapahua churachinauca .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: ¡ Alabashcangui , ninauca , judioguna Rey Apu ! Shina nisha paita sajmanauca .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato cuti canzhama llucshisha , judiogunara nica : Ricuichi , paita llucchimuni canguna y achangaj , ñuca mana ima causaras tupanichu paihuajpi .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Jesús canzhama llucshica , casha llaitu paihua umai , puca llachapahua churarishca . Pilato paigunara nica : ¡ Ricuichi cai runara !

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Sacerdote apuuna guardaunandi Jesusta ricusha caparinauca : Chacatai , chacatai , nisha . Pilátoga paigunara nica : Cangunalla paita pushaichi , chacataichi . Ñucaga ima causaras paihuajpi mana tupanichu .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Judioguna cutipanauca : Ley shimira charinchi ; ñucanchi ley shimimanda pai huañuna anga , Diospa Churi ani , nishcamanda .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Pilato caita uyasha maspas manzharicami .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Cuti taripana huasii icusha , Pilato Jesusta : ¿ Maimandara angui can ? nisha tapuca . Jesús mana imaras cutipaca .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Shinajpi Pilato paita : ¿ Imarasha mana cutipahuangui ? nica . ¿ Manzhu yachangui canda chacatangaj ushaira charini , shinallara canda cacharinaras ushaira charini ?

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Jesús cutipaca : Ñucahua mana ima ushairas charinguima , mana ahua pachamanda cushcajpi . Chimanda ñucara canda cuj runa yali uchayujmi .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Caimanda Pilato Jesusta cacharingaj iyarica . Judiogunaga astaun caparisha : Can cai runara cacharisha , mana Cesarba amigochu angui , ninauca . Maicans paillara rey apu tucusha Cesarda chijnin .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato cai shimira uyasha , Jesusta canzhama pushaca . Taripanai tiarica , Rumi Pata nishca pistui ; caita hebreo shimii Gabata nishcami .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Pascua ista aiichina punzha aca , doce horas chaupi punzha mayan . Shinajpi Pilato nica : ¡ Ricuichi canguna Rey Apura !

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Paiguna caparisha : ¡ Llucchi , llucchi , paita chacatai ! ninauca . Pilatoga : ¿ Canguna Rey Apura chacatashachu ? nica . Shinajpi sacerdote apuuna : Cesarlla ñucanchi rey apumi , shujpas illanmi , ninauca .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Shinasha Pilato Jesusta paigunama entregaca chacatangaj . Paiguna Jesusta apisha pushanaucami .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Jesús paihua cruzta aparisha ricami , Uma Tullu nishca pambama , caita hebreo shimii , Gólgota nishcami .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Chihui Jesusta chacatanauca . Paindi ishquiras , ali maquima shujta , llaquima shujta , Jesús paiguna chaupi shungüi .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Pilato shu quillcara quillcaca , cruz ahuai churacami . Shinami quillcashca aca : Nazaretmanda Jesús , judioguna Rey Apu .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Ashca judioguna cai quillcashcara ricunauca ; Jesús chacatashca pamba entero llacta mayambi ashcamanda . Chi quillcashca hebreo , griego , latin shimiunai quillcashca aca .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Judioguna sacerdote apuuna Pilatora ninauca : Judioguna Rey Apu ama quillcangui , randi : Judioguna Rey Apu mani , nica ; shinara quillcai .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Shinajpi Pilato cutipaca : Ñuca ña quillcashcaga quillcashcami .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Soldarouna Jesusta chacatashca huasha , paihua churanaunara apisha chuscu partii chaupinauca , caran soldaro shu partira charingaj . Paihua ucu churarina sirana illaj aca , ahuamanda shujllai ahuashca aca .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Paigunapura ninauca : Ama lliquishunchi caita . Astaun ajllashunchi pihuajchu anga ; maican Uchayuj asha apachu . Shina rasha , quillcashcara pactachinauca , cai : Paigunapura ñuca churanara chaupinauca , ñuca llachapamanda maican lichayujta ajllanauca , nisha . Soldarouna shina ranauca .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Jesuspa cruz rayai , paihua mama , paihua mama ñaña , Cleofaspa huarmi Marías , María Magdalenas chihui pariju tianauca .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Jesús paihua mamara ricusha , pai llaquishca yachachishca runaras chihui tiajtas ricusha , Jesús paihua mamara nica : Huarmi , riqui camba churira .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Chi huasha Jesús cai yachachishca runara nica : Riqui camba mamara . Chimanda pacha cai yachachishca runa Jesuspa mamara paihua quiquin huasima pushaca .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Chimanda huasha , Jesús tucuira ña pactarishcara yachasha , Quillcara pactachingaj : Upinai , nica .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Chihui shu ayac vinohua undachishca vaso tiaca . Shinajpi shu pútusta tsungachinauca vinohua ; caspi pundai huatasha , Jesuspa shimii llutanauca .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Jesús vinora upishca huasha : Ña pactarishcami , nica . Shina nisha , umara uraima lapusha , espiritura entregacami .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Shinajpi judioguna Pascua alkhina punzha asha , samana punzhai huañushcauna cruzpi ama saquirinauchu , chi samana punzha atun ista punzha asha , Pilatora mañanauca paiguna changa tulluunara paquinauchu , paigunara cruzmanda anzhuchinauchu .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Soldarouna shamujpi , changaunara paquinauca shu runara chishu runaras , Jesushua pariju chacatashcaunara .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Shinajpi Jesusma shamusha , pai ña huañushcara ricusha , paihua changara mana paquinaucachu .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Astaumbas shu soldaro Jesusta costillaspi tucsica lanzahua . Chimanda yahuarndi yacundi llucshinauca .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Chita ricuj runa riman . Pai rimashca shimi ciertomi . Pai rimashca shimi cierto ashcara paimi yachan , canguna shinallara quirinauchu .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Cai tucuira rashca aca Quillcashca pactaringaj , shina nisha : Paimanda ima tulluras mana paquishcachu anga .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Shinallara shu Quillcashcai : Paiguna tucshishca runara ricunaungami , nin .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Chimanda huasha , Arimatea llactamanda José , pai Jesús yachachishca runa asha , astaun pacallami judiogunara manzhashcaraigu , Pilatora mañaca : Lugarda cuhuai , nisha , Jesuspa aichara cruzmanda llucchingaj . Pilato lugarda cucami . Shinajpi José shamuca , Jesuspa aichara llucchicami .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Shinallara shamuca Nicodemo , pai ñaupa Jesusma tutai shamuj , mirrahua , aloehua masashca gusto asnaj ambira apamusha , patsac libra tupura .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Jesuspa aichara apinauca , llachapahua pillunauca gusto asnajgunahua , judioguna pambana yachaira .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Jesús chacatashca pamba mayambi shu sisa pamba tiaca . Sisa pambai shu mushuj pambana uctu tiaca , chihui pitas chara mana pambashcachu aca .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Pascua alichina punzha ashcamanda , chi pambana uctu mayanlla ajpi , chillai Jesusta chingachinauca .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Semana callarina punzhai , tuta ucura , chara llandu ashcai , María Magdalena Jesús pambashcama shamuca . Rumi anzhuchishcara ricuca .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Shinajpi María callpasha rica Simón Pedroma , chishu yachachishca runamas , pai Jesús llaquishcara . Paigunara nica : Pambashcamanda Señorda apanaushca . Illanmi . Maibi churashcaras mana yachanchichu .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Pedro , chishu yachachishca runandi llucshisha , pambashcama rinauca .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Cai ishqui runa pariju callpanauca . Chishujga Pedromanda yali uctalla callpaca , ñaupalla pambashcama pactaca .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Cumurisha ricungaj llachapaunara sirijta ricuca . Shinashas mana icucachu .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Huasha , Simón Pedro paita catisha pactamuca ; pambashca uctui icusha siriu llachapaunara ricuca .

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Shinallara umai pillushca llachapara ricuca , mana chishu llachapaunahua pariju , astaun shujpi pillushca aca .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Shinajpi chishu yachachishca runa , chi ñaupa pactamuj pambashcama , país shinallara icuca . Ricusha quiricami .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Paiguna Quülcashcai quillcashcara Jesús huañushcaunamanda causarínara chara mana intindinaucachu .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Yachachishca runauna paiguna huasima tigranauca .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Astaun María pambashca canzhai huacasha tiauca ; huacashallara pambashcara ricungaj cumurica .

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: Ishqui angelda ricuca , yurajta churarishcaunara . Shuj umama , shujtas chaquima Jesús sirishcai tianauca .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Angelguna paita : Huarmi , ninauca , ¿ imamanda huacaunguiri ? Maríaga : Ñuca Señorda apashcamanda , nica . Maibi paita churashcaras mana yachanichu .

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Shina rimasha , María huashama voltiarisha , Jesús chihui shayauta ricuca . Paita Jesús ajtara mana ricsicachu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Jesús paita : Huarmi , nica , ¿ imarasha huacaunguirí ? ¿ Pita mascaunguiri ? Maríaga , sisa pambara cuirajmi iyasha , nica : Señor , can paita apashca ajpiga , maibi churashcangui cuentahuai . Ñuca paita apasha .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Jesusga : ¡ María ! nica . Paiga voltiarisha ricusha : ¡ Raboni ! nica . Caimi , Yachachij , nin .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Jesús paita nica : Ama llangahuaichu . Chara Yayajma mana sicashcanichu . Ñuca uquiunama ri ; paigunara rimairi : Ñuca Yayajma , canguna Yayajmas , ñuca Diosma , canguna Diosmas sicauni , nica .

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: María Magdalena rica yachachishca runaunama cuentangaj imasna Señorda ricushcaras , pai rimashcaras .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Chi quiquin punzha , ña chishiyaupi , semana callarina punzha asha , yachachishca runauna tandarinauca . Paiguna tandariushcai pungu ishcashca aca , judiogunara manzhashcamanda . Jesús shamusha , paiguna chaupi shungüi shayarisha , paigunara : Cushiyaichi , nica .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Caita rimashca huasha , Jesús paihua maquira paihua costillastas ricuchica . Yachachishca runauna Señorda ricusha cushiyanaucami .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús paigunara nica : Cushiyaichi . Yaya ñucara cachashcasna , shinallara cangunara cachauni .

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Casna rimashca huasha , Jesús paiguna ahuara samaca , nisha : Santo Espiritura apichi .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Maicanma ucharashcaunara llushpichisha , llushpichishca anaunmi . Maicanmas ucharashcaunara saquichisha , saquichishca anaunmi .

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Tomasga , chunga ishquimanda shuj , Chapa Huahua nishca , Jesús shamushcai illacami .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Chishu yachachishca runauna paita ninauca : Señorda ricushcanchi . Tomás cutipaca : Paihua maquii clavashca uctuunara mana ricusha , ñuca rerora clavo uctuunai mana satisha , ñuca maquiras costillaspi mana satisha , mana quirishachu .

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Pusac punzha huasha , cutillara yachachishca runauna ucui tianauca , Tomás paigunahua tiauca . Jesús icuca , pungu ishcashca asha . Paiguna chaupi shungüi shayarisha : Cushiyaichi , nica .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús Tomasta : Rerora apami , nica , ñuca maquiunara riqui , nica . Caima maquira chutachi , costillaspi sari . Ama mana quirij tucui , astaun quirij tucui .

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Tomás cutipaca : Ñuca Señor , ñuca Dios , nisha .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Jesús paita : Can , Tomás , ricushcamandalla quirishcangui . Astaun mana ricusha quirijguna bendiciashca anaungami .

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Jesús shinallara ashca munanaita ricurinaunara rarcami pai yachachishca runauna ñaupajpi , chiguna cai quillcai mana quillcashcachu tian .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Caigunara quillcashcami Cristo Diospa Churi ashcara quiringaj , canguna quirisha causaira charingaj paihua shutii .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Chimanda huasha , Jesús cuti pai yachachishca runaunama ricurimuca Tiberias nishca lamar patai . Cai samii ricurica .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Simón Pedro , Chapa Huahua nishca Tomás , Galileai Canámanda Natanael , Zebedeo churiuna , shu ishqui Jesús yachachishca runaunandi pariju tianauca .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Simón paigunara nica : Licangaj riuni . Chishujguna : Canhua catimunchi , ninauca . Risha , canoai icunauca . Tuta pagarijta imaras mana apinaucachu .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Punzhayaushcai , Jesús pulayai shayarica . Yachachishca runaunaga pai Jesús ajta mana ricsinaucachu .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Jesús : Churihuauna , nica , ¿ imahuaras micunara charinguichi ? illan , ninauca .

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Paigunara nica : Licara ali maqui partima shitai , tupanguichimi . Shinajpi licara shitasha , ashca aichahua apirica . Licara mana imasna rashas llucchihuaj aca , ashca aichahua tiashcamanda .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Shinajpi chi Jesús llaquishca yachachishca runa Pedrora nica : Señormi . Simón Pedro , Señor ajta uyasha , churanara churarisha chumbillica , llatan ashcamanda ; chasna rasha yacuma pahuaca .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Chishu yachachishca runauna canoandi shamunauca , licara aisasha , paiguna yacu patamanda mana yapa carui anauca , patsaj metro tupullai .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Allpama pactamujpiga , ninara apichishcara , nina ahuai aichahua churashcaras ricunauca , tandandi .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Cuna apishca aichahuamanda apamichi .

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Simón Pedro sicaca , licara pulayama aisamusha . Atun aichahuahua undashca aca , shu patsaj pichca chunga quinsa ashca . Shina tupu ashas , lica mana lliquiricachu .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Jesús paigunara : Micuj shamichi , nica . Pihuas paita tapunara mana ushanaucachu : Canga ¿ pitangui ? nisha , pai Señor ashcara riparasha .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Shinajpi Jesús shamujpi , tandara apisha paigunara cuca , shinallara aichahuaras .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Caita ña quinsa cuti Jesús pai yachachishca runaunama ricurimuca pai causarishca huasha .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Micushca huasha , Jesús Simón Pedrora nica : Simón , Jonaspa churi , ¿ caigunamanda yali ashcara llaquihuanguichu ? Pedro cutipaca : Ari , nisha , can yachangui , Señor , ñuca canda llaquinimi . Jesús paita : Ñuca borrego huahuaunara carangui , nica .

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ishqui cuti Jesús paita : Simón , Jonaspa churi , ¿ ashcara llaquihuanguichu ? nica . Ari , nica , can yachangui , Señor , ñuca canda llaquinimi . Jesús paita : Ñuca borregounara carangui , nica .

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Jesús quinsa cuti tapusha : Simón , Jonaspa churi , nica , ¿ llaquihuanguichu can ? Pedroga , Jesús quinsa cuti tapushcai : Llaquihuanguichu , nishcamanda llaquiricami . Cutipaca : Señor , nisha , tucuira yachangui ; ñuca canda llaquishcara yachangui . Jesús paita : Ñuca borregounara carangui , nica .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Cierto pacha canda nini : Malta ashcai , canlla churaricangui ; maima munashcamas purij acangui . Randi , can rucu tucushcai , maquiunara chutachingui , shujga canda churachingami , can mana munashcama canda pushanaungami .

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Caita nica Jesús , Pedro imahuara huañungarauca , Diosta sumacyachingaj . Shina rimasha , Catihuai , nica .

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Pedro voltiarisha , Jesús llaquishca yachachishca runara catimujta ricuca . Caiga Jesuspa rayai quimirisha sirij aca tuta micushcai , Jesusta tapusha : Señor , ¿ pimi canda huañuchingaj entregangachu ? nisha .

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Pedro paita ricusha Jesusta nica : Señor , ¿ cai runaga imara ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Jesús : Ñuca cuti tigramungagama pai tiauchu munasha , ¿ canda imara ? nica . Canga , catihuai .

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
