text2: Shinasha uquiunapura cai shimi mirarica , cai yachachishca runa mana huañunachu , nisha . Astaun Jesús mana nicachu : Mana huañunachu , randi shina nicami : Cai runa ñuca cuti tigramungagama tiauchu ñuca munasha , ¿ canda imara ?

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Caimi cai tucuira rimaj yachachishca runa . Cai tucuira quillcacami . Pai rimashcauna cierto ajta yachanchi . 25 Shinallara Jesús rashcauna shujguna ashcara tianaun ; caranda chican chican quillcajpiga , entero cai pacha mana pactanmachu aca quillcashca librounara charingaj yachin . Amen .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Ñuca ñaupa quillcashcai canda rimashcani , Teófilo , imasnara Jesús tucui imaunaras rangaj camachingaj callarica ,

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: Santo Espíritu camachishca shimiunara pai ajllashca cachashca runaunama rimasha , Jesús ahua pachama cayai tucungama .

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: Pai huañushca huasha , Jesús causarisha paigunama cierto ricurimuca chuscu chunga punzha tupura . Shina rashaga , Dios mandana pacha shimira paigunama rimaca .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Jesús paigunahua pariju tiausha , paigunara mandaca : Jerusalenmanda ama ringuichichu , nisha , Yaya cusha nishcara chapaichi , ñucamanda uyashcara .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Juanga cierto pacha yacuhua bautisaca . Astaumbas cai punzhaunamanda huashalla canguna Santo Espirítui bautisarmguichimi .

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Shinajpi tandarimujguna tapunauca : Señor , nisha , ¿ Cai horasgunai Israelba gobiernora cuti ataringuichichu ?

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Jesús paigunara nica : Tiempounara mana canguna yachana , astaun Yaya paihua quiquin ushaibi churaca .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Astaumbas , ushaira apinguichimi Santo Espíritu canguna ahuai shamushcai . Ñucamanda rimajguna anguichi Jerusalembi , tucui Judeáis , Samaríais , cai pacha puchucai pundagamas .

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Cai shimiunara rimashca huasha , paiguna ricujllaira , Jesús ahuama rica ; shu puyu ñahuimanda paita quillpacami .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Paiguna ñahui ahuama ricusha , Jesús riupi , ishqui runa yuraj churana churarishca paigunahua pariju shayanauca .

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: Chi runauna ninauca : Galilea runauna , ¿ ima rasha ahuama ricunguichiri ? Cai quiquin Jesús cuti shamunga ; canguna pai riushcai ricushcasna shinallara shamungami .

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Shinajpi , Olivos nishca urcumanda Jerusalenma tigramunauca . Caimi chaupi samai purina tupu .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Llactai icusha , ahua patama sicanauca . Chihui causanauca Pedro , Jacobo , Juan , Andrés , Felipe , Tomás , Bartolomé , Mateo , Alfeo churi Jacobo , Simón Zelotes nishca , Jacobo uqui Judasndi .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Paiguna tucui pariju tianauca , shu iyaillahua Diosta mañasha , rugasha , huarmiunandi , Jesuspa mama Mariandi , paihua uquiunandi .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Chi punzhaunai uquiuna chaupi shungüi Pedro ataríca . Tandarijguna patsaj ishqui chunga tupu anauca .

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: Shina nisha rimaca : Runauna , uquiuna , shina tucuna ministiricami , David shimimanda Santo Espíritu ñaupa rimashca shimiuna pactaringaj , imasnara Judas Jesusta apijgunara yanapaca .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Pai ñucanchihua yupashca aca , ñucanchihuas Diosta sirvij aca .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Cai Judas shu pambara randicami , pai irus rashcamanda pagashca cullquihua ; huarcurishaga , icsa tujyasha , chunzhulli taliricami .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Jerusalembi tiajgunara cai tucuira yacharicami . Shinasha , chi pambara shutichinauca paiguna quiquin shimü : Aquéldama . Cai runa shimii : Yahuar pamba , nin .

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Salmos nishca quillcai quillcashca tian : Pai causana huasi chunllayachu , pihuas ama chihui causachu . Shinallara : Shuj paihua ranara rachu .

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: Ministirinmi cai ñucanchihua pariju tiaj runaunamanda shujta ajllangaj , Señor Jesús causarishcara ricusha rimaj tucungaj ñucanchihua pariju ,

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: shu ñucanchihua pariju tiaj runa tucui Señor Jesús ñucanchihua purishca punzhaunai , Juan paita bautisashcamanda pai ahuama rinagama .

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Ishquira ricuchinauca : shuj , José Barsabas nishca , paihua shu shuti Justo ; shujpas , Matías nishca .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Diosta mañasha rimanaucami : Canmi , Señor , tucui shungura ricsij angui . Cai ishquimanda maicanda ajllangui , ricuchi ,

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: pai canda sirvingaj , can cachamushca tucungaj , imasna Judas ucha rashcamanda mana valijpi , ucu pachama ringaj urmaca .

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Cai ishquimanda maicanda Dios ajllanga camanauca . Matías ajllashca aca . Chimanda huasha , pai chunga shuj Jesucristo cachashca runaunahua yupashca aca .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Pentecostés nishca punzha pactaricami . Paiguna tucui shu iyaillahua pariju tandarishca anauca .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Cungaimanda , ahua pachamanda shu shinzhi huaira cuenta uyanímica ; paiguna tiaushca entero huasira undarimuca .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Paigunama nina cuenta calluuna ricurimunauca , caran runa ahuai tiarisha .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Tucui paiguna Santo Espirituhua undashca anauca . Shu shimiunai rimai callarinauca , Santo Espíritu rimachishcasna .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Chi horasgunai , cai pacha tucui partimanda Diosta llaquij judioguna Jerusalembi tianauca .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Casna uyarimujpiga , tucui tandarimunauca . Manzharinauca , caran dueño paihua quiquin shimii rimashcara uyasha .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Paigunaga mana intindinauca , manzharinauca , nisha : ¿ Manzhu tucui cai rimajguna Galilea runauna ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: ¿ Imasna rasha paiguna rimashcara uyaunchi caran dueño paihua quiquin pagarishca shimii ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Cai tucui llactaunamanda shamujguna uyanauca : Partía , Media , Elam , Mesopotamia , Judea , Capadocia , Ponto , Asia nishca llactaunamanda .

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Shinallara Frigiamanda , Pamfiliamanda , Egiptomanda , Africamanda , Cirene huasha partimanda , Romamanda pasiajgunandi , judioguna ashas paiguna yachaira catimujguna ashas , uyanauca .

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: Shinallara Cretamanda , Arabiamanda shamujgunas uyanauca . Tucui paiguna : Ñucanchi quiquin shimii Dios munanaita rashcaunara uyanchi , ninauca .

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Mana yachai tucusha , manzharishca anauca , paigunapura rimanausha : ¿ Casna imarai ? nisha .

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Shujguna randi burlasha asinauca : Caiguna machashca anaun , nisha .

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Shinajpi Pedro shayarisha , paihua pariju chunga shuj runaunandi paigunara rimasha nica : Judio runauna , tucui Jerusalembi causajgunas , caita uyaichi , ñuca shimira yachaichi .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Caigunaga mana machashcachu anaun , canguna iyashcasna ; chara tutamandallami , las nueve tupu .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: Caitaga Diosmanda rimaj Joel rimasha nica :

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: Puchucai punzhaunai shina tucungami , Dios nin : Ñuca Santo Espiritura talishami tucuiguna ahuai . Canguna churiuna , canguna ushushiuna ñucamanda rimanaungami ; canguna maltauna nuspaibi ricunaungami ; canguna rucuunaga nuspaigunai nuspanaungami .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: Cierto pacha chi punzhaunai ñucara sirvij cariuna huarmiuna ahuai ñuca Espiritura talishami . Paiguna ñucamanda rimanaungami .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Ahua pachaiga munanaita ricuchishami ; cai pachais uñaras mana ricuihuaj ricuringami , yahuar , nina , cushni .

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Indi llanduyangami , quilla yahuar cuenta tucungami , manara Diospa atun punzha , tucui pajllai ricushca punzha , shamungami .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Maicans Diospa shutii mañasha quishpichishca anga .

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: Israel runauna , ñuca rimashcara uyaichi . Dios Nazaretmanda Jesusta munashcara ricuchica ashca munanaita rashcaunahua ricurinaunahuas canguna chaupi shungüi , Jesuspa maquihua rasha , canguna yachashcasna .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Canguna cai Jesusta , Dios munashcahua , Dios ñaupamanda yachashcahua cushca , apisha huañuchicanguichi , uchayuj maquiunahua paita chacatasha .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Paitaga Dios atarichicami ; huañuna nanaiunamanda cacharicami ; huañuna mana ushacachu paita are angaj .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: David Jesusmanda rimaca : Señorda tucui horas ñuca ñaupajpi ricucani ; pai ñuca ali maqui partima tiausha , mana turbarishachu .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Chiraigumanda ñuca corazón cushiyacami ; ñuca shimi cushiyaca ; shinallara ñuca aichas chapausha samangami .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Chiraigumanda , ñuca almara ucu pachai mana saquinguichu ; shinallara camba Santo Churi ismungaj mana lugarda cunguichu .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Causana ñambiunara ricsichihuacangui . Camba ñahuira ricusha ñuca shungüi cushihua undachingui .

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: Runauna , uquiuna , cierto pacha cangunara pajlla pambai rimanara ushanchi Rucu Davidmanda . Paiga huañucami , pambashca aca . Paita pambashca caibimi ; ñucanchihua tiaun cuna punzhagama .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Cai Davidga Diosmanda rimaj aca . Pai yachaca imasna Dios paihua quiquin shutillai rimasha cierto rimaca : Camba miraigunamanda , aichamanda rimasha , Cristora atarichisha camba rey apu tiarinai tiaringaj , nisha .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Ñaupa horasmanda ricusha , Cristo causarinara rimacami , paihua alma ucu pachai mana saquiricachu ; paihua aicha mana ismucachu .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: Cai Jesusta Dios causachicami . Ñucanchi caita ricujguna anchi .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Shinashaga Jesús , Diospa ali maquima ahuayachishca asha , Yaya Dios Santo Espiritura cusha nishca shimira apishca asha , cai canguna ricushcara uyashcaras cachamucami , talicami .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: David randi ahua pachama mana sicacachu . Shinashas pai riman : Señor ñuca Señorda nica , Ñuca ali maquima tiari ,

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: ñuca canda chijnijgunara camba chaqui ucui churanagama .

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: Tucui Israel runauna cierto pacha yachanguichi , cai chacatashca Jesusta Dios Señormi Cristomi rarca .

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Shinajpi caita uyashaga , uyajguna shungüi nanarisha , Pedroras chishu cachashca runaunaras rimanauca : Runauna , uquiuna , nisha , ¿ Imara rashun ?

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Pedro paigunara nica : Canguna uchamanda arrepentirichi . Shina rasha , caran dueño bautisarichi Jesucristo shutii , canguna ucharashcara perdonaringaj . Santo Espiritura apinguichimi .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Cai rimashcaraga cangunara cushcami , shinallara canguna churiunaras , maibi carui tiajgunaras , maicans ñucanchi Señor Dios cayashcaunara cushcami cai rimashcara .

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Ashca shimiunahua rimasha paigunara camachica , nisha : Quishpichishca aichi cai manali miraigunamanda .

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Shinarasha , pai rimashca shimiunara chasquijguna bautisarinauca . Chi punzhai paigunahua quinsa huaranga runa tupu yaparinauca .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Quirijguna cachashca runauna yachachishcaunai catinauca , paigunapura parijumanda llaquinausha , tandara paquinais , Diosta mañanáis .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Tucui runa manzhanaucami . Jesús cachashca runauna munanaita rashcaunara ashcara ricuchinauca .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Tucui quirijguna pariju tianaucami ; paiguna charishcaunara pariju charínauca .

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Paiguna allpaunara , paiguna charishcaunaras catusha , caranma cunauca , caran runa ministishca tupura .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Shina rasha , tucui parijulla caran punzha templo nishca Diospa huasii tianaucami . Paiguna huasiunai tandara paquisha , cushi shunguhua chuyaj shunguhuas pariju micunauca .

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: Caran punzha Diosta alabasha , tucui runaunahua ali shunguhua tianaucami . Señor caran punzha quirijgunama quishpichina ajgunara llutachica .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Pedro Juandi templo huasima sicanauca , Diosta mañana horas , las tres tupu chishira .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Chihui shu runa tiaca , mama icsamanda pacha anga chaqui pagarishca . Paita Diospa huasi Sumac nishca pungüi caran punzha aparimusha churanauca . Diospa huasima shamujgunamanda cullquira mañasha tiaca .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Cai runa Pedrora Juandas Diospa huasi icuuta ricusha : Cullquira cuyahuapai , nica .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Pedro Juandi paita ali pacha ricusha rimaca : Ñucanchira riqui .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Shinajpi paigunara ricuca : Imaras cuhuangami ranaun iyasha chapauca .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Pedro rimaca : Cullquiras curiras imaras mana charinichu , randi ñuca charishcara canda cuni . Nazaretmanda Jesucristo shutii canda nini : Atari , puri .

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Pedro paihua ali maquimanda apisha paita atachicami . Chi ratollaira paihua chaquiuna chaqui mucuunandi shinzhi tucunauca .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Chi runa pahuasha shayarica , purica . Paigunandi Diospa huasii icuca , ali purisha , saltasha , Diosta alabasha .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Tucui runauna pai purishcara , pai Diosta alabashcaras ricunauca .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Tucui runa paita Diospa huasi Sumac nishca pungüi tiarij cullquira mañaj ajta ricsinauca . Tucui runauna ashcara manzharinauca cai runara alichishcamanda .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Alichishca anga chaqui runa Pedroras Juandas apilla charicami . Tucui runauna manzharisha paigunama tandarinaucami , Salomón nishca pungüi .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Pedro caita ricusha , runaunama cutipaca : Israel runauna , ¿ imamanda cai rashcara manzharinguichi ? ¿ Imamanda ñucanchira yapa ricunguichi , ñucanchi ushaihuachu caita rashcanchi , ñucanchi shungu ali ashcamandachu cai runara purichishcanchi ?

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Abrahamba , Isacpa , Jacobpa Dios , ñucanchi yayauna Dios , paihua Churi Jesusta sumacyachicami ; randi canguna paita entregacanguichi . Paita mana ricsinchichu , nicanguichi Pilato ñaupajpi , chi Pilato paita cacharisha nijpi .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Canguna Santo Ajta , Ali Ajta , Mana ricsinchichu , nicanguichi , astaumbas shu runara huañuchijta cacharingaj mañacanguichi .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Shinallara canguna Causaira Cujta huañuchicanguichi . Astaumbas Dios paita huañushcaunamanda causachicamL Caitaga ñucanchi cierto ricujguna anchi .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Jesuspa shutii quirishcamanda , cai canguna ricushca canguna ricsishca runara cai shuti shinzhiyachicami . Paihua Dios cushca quirina paita sumajta alichicami tucui canguna ñaupajpi .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: Cunaga , uquiuna , ñuca yachani canguna mana yachashcamanda shina rashcanguichimi , shinallara canguna apuunas .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Shinashas Dios tucui paimanda rimajguna ñaupa rimashcara pactachishcami , imasna paihua Cristo tormendarina aca .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Shinajpi canguna ucharashcara arrepentirichi , Diosma tigraichi , canguna uchaunara pichai tucungaj . Shina rajpiga Diospa ñaupajmanda ali ganas punzhauna shamunaungami ;

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: cangunama Jesucristora cachamungami , ñaupamanda cangunama rimashca cuenta .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Shinajllaira cierto ministirinmi pai ahua pachai tiangaj tucuira alichina punzhagama , imasna Dios paimanda chuyaj rimajguna shimimanda rimacami callari horasmanda ,

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: imasna Moisés yayaunara rimaca : Canguna Señor Dios canguna uquiunamanda shu ñucasna Diospa shimira rimajta cachamungami . Pai tucui rimashcara uyanguichi .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Maican almaga chi Rimajta mana uyajpi , runaunamanda ichui tucungami .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: Shinallara tucui Diosmanda rimajguna , Samuelmanda , paimanda huasha shamujgunandi , maícanguna rimashas , cai punzhaunara rimanaushcami .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Canguna chi ñaupa rimajgunamanda churiuna anguichi . Canguna shinallara Dios ñucanchi yayaunara pactachina shimii rimashca runauna anguichi , Dios Abrahanma nisha : Canmanda miramuj churiunai tucui cai pacha ailluuna bendiciashca anaungami .

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Dios paihua Churira ataríchisha , paita cangunama ñaupa cachamuca , cangunara bendiciangaj , caran dueño pai ucharashcaunara saquisha voltiaringaj .

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Pedrondi Juandi runaunama rimaushcai , sacerdoteuna Diospa huasira cuiraj guardauna capitandi , saduceogunandi paigunama shamunauca .

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: Paiguna runaunara yachachishcamanda , Jesús huañushcaunamanda causarishcara rimashcamandas , caiguna piñarisha shamunauca .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Paigunara apisha , chonda cularbi ishcanauca cayandi punzhagama , ña chishi ajpi .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Cai shimira uyajgunamanda ashcauna quirinauca , quirij carípura shu pichca huaranga tupu anauca .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Casna tucucami : cayandi punzha judio apuuna rucuunandi yachaira yachachijgunandi Jerusalembi tandarinauca .

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Shinallara Anas nishca sacerdote atun apu , Caifas , Juan , Pedrondi Juandi gobierno ñaupajpi Alejandro nishcaunandi , tucui sacerdote atun apuuna ailluunandi tandarinauca .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Paiguna chaupi shungüi Pedroras Juandas shayachisha tapunaucami : ¿ Ima ushaihua , pihua shutü , caita rashcanguichi ? nisha .

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Shinajpi Pedro , Santo Espirituhua undashca asha paigunara rimacami : Runaunara mandaj apuuna , Israel rucuuna :

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: Cuna punzha canguna shu runara alichishcara tapunguichi , imasna rashara paita alichishca aca .

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: Yachaichi tucui canguna , tucui Israel runaunandi : Nazaretmanda Jesucristo shutii cai runara canguna ñaupajpi alichi tucushcami . Cai canguna chacatashca Jesús , Dios paita huañushcaunamanda causarishca , paihua shutü cai runa alichishcami .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Cai Jesusga canguna huasira sicachiujguna mana munashca ichushca rumimi ; cai rumiga huasi istandi rumi tucushcami .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Shujpajpi quishpina illan . Cai pachai shu shutiras runaunama mana cushcachu aca ñucanchi quishpichi tucungaj .

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Apuuna , Pedro Juandi mana manzhashcara ricusha , paiguna quillcara mana yachajguna ajta , yanga runa cuenta ajtas ricsinauca . Astaun Jesushua tiashca runauna ajta ricsinauca .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Chi alichishca runara paigunahua pariju tiauta ricushaga , mana imaras rimanara ushanauca .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Paigunara taripaushca ucumanda canzhama llucshingaj mandanauca , apuuna paigunapuralla cuentananauca .

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: Ninauca : ¿ Imara rana angairi cai runaunahua ? Cierto pacha shu munanaita rashcara ranaushca , tucui Jerusalembi tiajguna yachanaushcami . Mana pacaihuajchu .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Shinarashaga maican runaunamas ama astaun cuentanauchu , paigunara camachishun : Cunamanda , cai shutii ama pimas rimaichi , nisha .

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Paigunara cayasha camachinauca : Ima samiras Jesuspa shutii ama rimaichi , ama yachachichi , ninauca .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Shinajpi Pedrondi Juandi cutipasha paigunara ninauca : Canguna iyaichi , ¿ Diospa ñaupajpi alichu anga , cangunarachu uyashun Diosmanda ñaupara ?

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Ñucanchi ricushcaras , ñucanchi uyashcaras rimanara saquingaj mana ushanchichu .

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Apuuna paigunara camachisha cachanaucami , imasna rashas mana livachihuaj tucujpi , runaunara manzhashcamanda . Tucui runauna paiguna rashcamanda Diosta alabanaucami .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Alichishca runa chuscu chunga yali huatayuj aca .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Pedrondi Juandi lugaryashca huasha paigunajma shamunauca ; sacerdote apuuna rucuunandi paigunara rimashcara cuentanauca .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Paiguna cuentashcara uyashaga , tucui pariju Diosta rimanauca , nisha : Tucuira mandaj Señor , ahua pachara , cai pacharas , lamardas , tucui imaras chihui causajgunandi raj Dios mangui ;

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: Can , canda sirvij Davidpa shimihua rimacangui , nisha : ¿ Imarasha runauna piñarisha caparinauca , yanga iyaigunara iyarinauca ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Cai pacha rey apuuna , chishu apuunandi shujllai tandarinauca , Señorhua paihua Cristohuas contra tucusha .

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: Cierto pacha cai llactai can ajllashca santo Churi Jesusta chijnisha , Herodes , Poncio Pilato , gentilgunandi Israel runaunandi tucui tandarimunauca ,

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: tucui imaras can ñaupa pundamanda camba maquihua camba iyaibis munashcara pactachingaj .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Ricupai , Señor , paiguna chijnisha rimashcara . Cunaga canda sirvijgunama ama manzhasha camba shimira rimangaj cuhuapai .

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: Camba maquira cachamui runaunara alichingaj , ima munanaita ricurinaras rangaj , camba santo Churi Jesuspa shutii .

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Diosta mañashca huasha , paiguna tiashca huasi chucchurica . Tucui paigunara Santo Espirituhua undashca anauca . Mana manzhasha Diospa shimira rimanauca .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Quirij runauna , ashca ashas , shu corazonlla shu almalla tucunauca . Paiguna charishcunamanda mana pihuas : Caita ñucajmi nisha rimajguna aca . Astaun tucui pariju charijguna aca .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Cachashca runauna Señor Jesús causarishcara ashca ushaihua rimanauca . Ashca gracia nishca ali iyaihua undashca anauca .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Paigunapuraiga mana pihuas ministij tiacachu . Maican allpaunara huasiunaras charijguna catunauca , cullquira apisha apamunauca .

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: Chi cullquira cachashca runaunama cunauca , caranma paiguna ministishca tupura cushca aca .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Shinajpi José nishca , cachashca runaunamanda Bernabé shutichishca , runa shimii caita Cushiyachij nin , pai Levi aillumanda , shu Chipre nishca islamanda runa ,

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: shu pai charishca allpara catucami ; cullquira cachashca runaunama cucami .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Shu Ananías nishca runaga , paihua Safira nishca huarmindi , shu allpara catunauca .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Paiga paihua huarmindi apishca cullquira pishiyachinauca ; shu chaupillara apamusha , cachashca runaunama cunauca .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Pedroga nica : Ananías , ¿ imamanda Satanás nishca Supai Apu camba corazonda llullahua undachishca , Santo Espirituma llullangaj , camba allpamanda apishca cullquimanda pishira cungaj ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: ¿ Allpara huacachisha , manzhu cambaj aca ? Catushca ashaga , ¿ manzhu can yacbacangui ? ¿ Imamanda caita camba corazombi iyacangui ? Mana runaunamalla llullashcangui , astaun Diosma .

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Shinajpi Ananías cai shimira uyasha urmasha huañucami . Shina tucujpiga , tucui uyajguna ashcara manzharinauca .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Shinajpi , maltauna atarisha paita pillunauca , llucshisha pambai rinaucami .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Quinsa horas pasashca huasha , paihua huarmi shamuca , cai tucushcaunara mana yachasha .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro rimaca : Rimahuai , nisha , ¿ Canguna allpara chi tupuichu catucanguichi ? Huarmiga , Shinai nica , chi tupui .

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Pedro paita rimaca : ¿ Imamanda cuentanaushcanguichi Diospa Espiritura umangaj ? Camba carira pambajguna pungüi tianaun . Canda shinallara llucchinaungami .

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Chi ratollaira Pedro chaquii huarmi huañusha urmacami .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Cachashca runauna paiguna maquimanda ashca munanaita ricurinaunaras rashcaunaras ranauca runauna ñaupajpi . Paiguna tucui shu iyaillahua Salomomba pungüi pariju tianauca .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Shujgunamanda mana pihuas llutarinara ushacachu manzhashcamanda . Runaunaga paigunara ashcara alabanauca .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Señorbi quirijguna ashcarami yaparinauca , ashca cariunas huarmiunas .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Shina rasha ungushcaunara ñambiunai churanauca . Caituunai huanduunai churanauca , Pedro pasausha paihua llandu huaquinguna ahuara llandusha pasangaj .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Mayan llactaunamanda Jerusalenma ashca runauna shamunauca , ungushcaunara pushamusha , irus supaihua tormendarishcaunandi . Chiguna tucui alichishca anauca .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Sacerdoteuna atun apu atarisha , paihua pariju tiajgunandi , saduceo montonmanda asha , piñarishca anauca .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Cachashca runaunara apisha , chonda cularbi ishcanauca .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Astaumbas , Diospa ángel chonda cular pungura tuta pascasha , paigunara llucchisha , rimacami :

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: Richi , nisha . Diospa huasii icusha , runaunara cai tucui alma causana shimiunara yachachichi .

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Caita uyasha , tutamanda Diospa huasü icunauca , chihui yachachinauca . Shinallara sacerdoteuna atun apu paihua pariju tiajgunandi gobiernoi mandaj apuunara tandachinauca , Israel rucuunandi . Chonda cularma cachanauca cachashca runaunara pushangaj .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Guardauna chonda cularma pactai risha , mana tarisha , tigrasha cuentanauca .

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: Riman aucami : Cierto pacha chonda cular pungu ali ishcariaita tupacanchi . Pungüi soldarouna shayanaushca aca . Astaumbas pungura pascasha pitas mana tupacanchichu .

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Sacerdoteuna atun apu , Diospa huasi guardauna capitandi , sacerdote apuunandi caita uyasha , mana yachai tucunaucachu imaira pasanaushca anga .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Shu runa shamusha nica : Canguna chonda cularbi ishcashca runauna Diospa huasii yachachisha tianaun .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Shinajpi capitán risha guardaunandi paigunara alimandalla pushamunauca , runaunara manzhasha rumihua shitai tucunamanda .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Paigunara pushamusha , mandaj apuuna tandarinai icuchinauca . Sacerdoteuna atun apu paigunara tapucami :

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: ¿ Manzhu shinzhira rimacanchi , cai shutii ama yachachingaj ? nisha . Cunaga , canguna yachachishcah . ua tucui Jerusalenda undachishcanguichi . Canguna , cai runa huañushcamanda , ñucanchi ahuai causara churasha ninguichi .

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Pedro , cachashca runaunandi cutipanauca : Runaunamanda ñaupa , Diosta uyana ministirin .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Ñucanchi yayauna Dios Jesusta atarichicami , canguna paita yurai huarcusha huañuchishcara .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Dios pai ali maquihua cai Jesusta ahuayachica Señor Quishpichij tucungaj , Israel runauna paiguna ucha rashcaunara arrepentirinauchu , uchaunara perdonai tucungaj .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Ñucanchi cai tucuira Jesuspa cierto ricujguna anchi , Santo Espíritu shinallara ricujmi . Caí Santo Espiritura Dios tucui pai rimashca shimiunara pactachijgunama cushcami

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Apuuna caita uyasha , ashcara piñarinauca , paigunara huañuchingaj munanauca .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Shinajpi mandaj apuuna tandarishca montonmanda , shu Gamaliel nishca fariseo runa , ley shimira yachachij , ataricami . Pai tucui runaunamanda yapa llaquishca aca . Paiga : Cai runaunara shu rato canzhama llucchichi , nica .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Gamaliel apuunara rimaca : Israel runauna , canguna ricuichi imara ranara iyanguichi cai runaunara .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Cai punzhaunamanda ñaupa , shu Teudas nishca runa ataricami , Atun mani , nisha . Paihuajma shu chuscu patsaj tupu runa llutarinauca . Paiga huañuchi tucuca , tucui paita catijguna sayanauca , paigunamanda imas illaca .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Paimanda huasha , Galileamanda Judas shinallara ataricami , runaunara yupana punzhai . Paihua pariju ashca runauna shinallara llutarinauca . Pai shinallara huañuca , paihua pariju ajguna shinallara sayanauca .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Cuna cangunara nini : Cai runaunara saquichi , paigunamanda anzhurichi . Paiguna camachishca shimiuna , paiguna rashcauna runamandalla asha , chingarinaungami .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Manashaga , Diosmanda ajpiga mana chingachina ushanguichi , astaun canguna Dioshua contrauna tucunguichimi .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Gamaliel rimashcara uyanaucami . Cachashca runaunara cayasha , azutishca huasha , Jesuspa shutii ama rimangaj mandanauca . Chi huasha paigunara lugaryachinauca .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Paiguna mandaj apuuna tandarinamanda llucshinauca . Jesucristo shutimanda chijni tucusha tormendarishas cushiyanauca .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Tucui punzhauna , Diospa huasii tucui huasiunais Jesucristo shutira rimanara camachmaras mana saquinaucachu .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Chi punzhaunai quirijguna ashca yaparinauca . Paigunamanda griego shimira rimajguna hebreo shimira rimajgunahua piñarinauca : Ñucanchi huaccha huarmiunara caran punzha micuna caranara cungarinaushcami , nisha .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Shinarasha chunga ishqui cachashca runauna tucui quirijgunara cayasha tandachinauca : Ñucanchi Diospa shimira saquina mesaunara sirvingaj mana valinzhu , ninauca .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Shinajpi , uquiuna , cangunamanda canzhis runara , ali rimashcaunara , Santo Espirituhua ali iyaihua undashcaunara mascaichi . Paigunara cai tarabanai churashun .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Ñucanchiga Diosta mañasha paihua shimira yachachisha causashun .

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Tucui tandarimujguna ali munaihua uyanauca . Cai runaunara ajllanauca : Esteban , shu ali quirij Santo Espirituhua undashca runara , Felipe , Prócoro , Nicanor , Timón , Parmenas nishcaunara , Antioquíamanda Nicolasndi .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Cachashca runauna ñaupajpi cai runaunara pushamunauca . Cachashca runauna shamujguna uma ahuai maquiunara churasha , Diosta mañanauca .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Diospa shimi mirarisha rica . Jerusalembi quirijguna ashcara yaparinauca . Shinallara sacerdoteunamanda ashcauna quirinauca .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Astaumbas Esteban , Diospa gracia nishca ali iyaihua ushanahuas undashca asha , runauna ñaupajpi ima munanaita ranaras gusto ricurinaras rarcami .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Shinajpi , Libertinos , Cireneos , Alejandrinos nishca judioguna tandarina huasimanda huaquinguna atarimunauca , huaquin Ciliciamandaunandi , huaquin Asiamandaunandi . Caiguna Estébanhua rimananaucami .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Astaumbas paihua sabiro iyairas Espiritaras mana ushanaucachu vencinara .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Shinasha cai runauna shujgunara paganauca llullasha rimangaj : Ñucanchi paita irus shimiunara rimashcara uyashcanchi , Moisestas Diostas camisha , ninauca .

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Paiguna tucui runaunara , rucuunara , yachaira yachachijgunaras turbachinauca . Estébanda tupasha paita apinauca . Paita mandaj apuuna tandarinama pushanauca .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Llullasha rimaj runaunara chima pushamunauca : Cai runa cai santo llactaras , ley camachishca shimiras irusta rimangaj mana saquín , ninauca .

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Casna rimashcara uyashcanchi : Cai Nazaretmanda Jesús cai llactara tulangami , Moisés cushca yachaira turcangami , nin .

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Shinajpi tucui mandaj apuuna tandarishcai , Estébanda ricuusha , paihua ñahuira angelba ñahuisna ricunaucami .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Shinajpi sacerdoteuna atun apu nica : ¿ Caiga ciertochu ? 2 Esteban cutipaca : Runauna , uquiuna , yayaunas , uyaichi : Sumaj ahua pacha Dios ñucanchi yaya Abrahanma ricurimuca pai Mesopotamia nishca llactai causaushca horaspi , manara Harán nishca llactama rishcai .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Dios paita rimaca : Camba llactamanda camba aillumanda llucshi . Ñuca canda ricuchingaraushca llactama shami , nisha .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Shinajpi Caldeos nishcauna llactamanda llucshicami , Harán nishca llactai causaca . Paihua yaya huañujpi , chimanda llucshisha Abrahan cai llactama , canguna cuna horas causaushca llactama shamuca .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Chihuis ansallas allpara mana cucachu , paihua chaqui aitana tupuhuallas . Astaumbas Dios : Cai allpara cushami , nica , canma camba churiunamas , Abrahan chara churi illaj ajllaira .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Dios casnami rimaca : Camba miraiguna mushuj shamujguna tucunaungami , shujpa llactai . Chihuimi sirvichinaungami , tormendachinaungami , chuscu patsaj huata tupugama .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Paiguna sirvishca llactara ñuca taripashami , Dios rimaca . Cai huashaga , paiguna llucshimusha sirvihuanaungami cai quiquin llactai .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Dios Abrahanda circuncisión nishca pactachina shimira cuca . Shina rasha , Abrahan paihua churi Isacta tupasha , pusac punzhai cai circuncisión mandashcara pactachicami , shinallara Isac Jacobdas , Jacob paihua chunga ishqui churiunaras .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: Chi churiunaga Josera chijnisha , paita Egipto llactama catunaucami . Astaumbas Dios paihua tiaucami .

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: Diosga tucui llaquiunamanda Josera llushpichica . Egipto llacta rey apu Faraomba ñaupajpi paita ali shungura ali iyairas cucami . Faraonga paita Egipto llactai apura churacami , shinallara Faraomba huasii José apu tucuca .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: Chi horasgunai ashca yarcai tucuca , tucui Egipto llactai , Canaan nishca llactais ; ashca llaqui tucuca . Ñucanchi yayauna micunara mana tarinaucachu .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Jacob , Egiptoi trigo muyu tiashcara uyasha , ñucanchi yayaunara ñaupa punda cachaca .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Huasha , paiguna ishqui cuti rishcai , José paillara paihua uquiunama ricsichica . Faraón José aillura yachacami .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: José paihua yaya Jacobda tucui paihua aülundi pushangaj cachaca . Canzhis chunga pichca tupu runauna shamunauca .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Shina rasha Jacob Egiptoma shamuca . Chihui pai ñucanchi yayaunandi huañunaucami .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Chigunara Siquem nishca llactama apanauca . Chihui Abrahan randishca pambana uctui pambanauca . Chi pambana uctura Siquem llactai Hamor churiunamanda Abrahan cullquihua randica .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: Dios Abrahanma rimashca punzha mayanllayaupi , Israel runauna Egiptoi ashcara mirasha yaparinauca .

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Chi huasha , shu rey apu randi tiauca Egipto llactai , Josera mana ricsij .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Pai ñucanchi yayaunara umachisha tormendachica . Shina rasha cari huahuaunara huañuchinauca , paiguna ama miranauchu .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Chi punzhaunai Moisés pagarica . Pai Dios munashca aca . Quinsa quilla tupura paihua yaya huasii iñachisha charica .

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Cai Moisés huañuna tucujpi , Faraomba ushushi apasha , quiquin churi cuenta paita iñachica .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Moisés Egipto runauna tucui yachanara yachachishca aca ; paihua rimaihua pai rashcaunahua yapa ushaj aca .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: Moisés chuscu chunga huatayuj tucusha , paihua uquiunara , Israel churiunara ricuj shamunara munaca .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Shu Egipto runa shu Israel runara livachishcara ricusha , Moisés paita quishpichica , Egipto runara chugrichisha cutipacami .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Moisés paihua uquiuna intindinaungami nisha iyaca , imasnara Dios paihua maquihua quishpichinma . Astaumbas mana shina iyanaucachu .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Cayandi punzhai ishqui Israel runauna piñanauca . Moisés shamusha , arcasha rimaca : Runauna , uquipura anguichi , nica , ¿ imamanda parijumanda piñanaunguichi ?

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Piñanau runaunamanda manali rajga Moisesta tangasha cutipacami : ¿ Maican canda ñucanchi ahuai mandajtas taripajtas churaca ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: ¿ Can caina Egipto runara huañuchishcasna ñucaras huañuchinara munanguichu ?

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Cai shimira uyasha , Moisés miticusha , carumanda shamuj runa cuenta Madián nishca llactai causaca . Chihui ishqui churira tupaca .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: Chuscu chunga huata pactarishcai , shu ángel paihua ñaupajpi ricurimuca , Sinaí urcu chaquishca allpa partii , ninahua sindij yurai .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Shinajpi Moisés pai ricushcara ricusha manzharica . Astaun ali jicungaj mayanllayasha , Diospa shimi paima uyarica .

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: Ñuca camba yayauna Dios ani , Abrahamba Dios , Isacpa Dios , Jacobpa Dios mani , nisha . Moisés chucchusha , ricunara mana munacachu manzhashcamanda .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Moisesma rimaca : Camba zapatosta llucchi ; can shayashca pamba santo allpami .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Cierto pacha ñuca Egipto llactai tiaj runauna llaquirishcaunara huacashcaras uyashcani . Paigunara liuriyachingaj irgumushcani . Cuna , shami , Egiptoma canda cachasha , nica .

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: Cai ñaupa mana munashca Moisesta , ¿ maican canda taripaj apura churacachu ? paita nishca asha , cai Moisesta Dios paita mandaj quishpichijta rasha , sindij yurai ricurij ángel rimasha cachacami .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: Cai Moisés Israel runaunara llucchicami . Munanaita rashcaunaras gusto ricurinaunaras ricuchica Egipto llactai , Puca nishca lamarbi , chaquishca allpa partiis , chuscu chunga huata tupura .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: Caí Moisés Israel churiunara rimaca : Shu ñucasna Diosmanda rimajta canguna Señor Dios atarichmgami canguna uquíunamanda . Paita uyanguichi .

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: Cai Moisés chaquishca allpa partii tandarishca Israel runaunahua , Sinaí urcui rimaj angelhua , ñucanchi yayaunahua tiaucami . Pai causaira cuj shimiunara ñucanchima rimangaj cui_tucuca .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: Ñucanchi yayauna paita uyanara mana munanauca . Mana casunaucachu , paiguna shungüi Egipto llactama tigranara iyanauca .

text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Paiguna Aaronma rimanauca : Diosgunara rasha cuhuai , nisha , ñucanchira pushangaj . Cai ñucanchira Egiptomanda llucchimuj Moisesta ima chari tucushca mana yachanchichu .

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Shinajpi shu malta huagrara ranauca . Cai runa rashca yanga diosma sacrificiora ricuchinauca . Paiguna quiquin maquihua rashcaunai cushiyanauca .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: Paigunamanda Dios anzhuricami ; paigunara saquica estrellasgunara adorangaj ; imasna Diosmanda rimajguna quillcashcai tiaun : ¿ Sacrificiounarachu huañuchishca animalgunarachu chi chaquishca allpa partü ricuchihuacanguichi chuscu chunga huata tupura , Israel runauna ?

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Randi Moloj nishca yanga diosta alabana carpa huasira apacanguichi , canguna Remfan nishca yanga diospa estrellastas , canguna maquihua rashcaunara , chigunara adorangaj . Chi raigumanda ñuca cangunara Babilonia llacta huashama cachashami .

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: Ñucanchi yayauna tabernáculo nishca Dios paigunahua pariju tiajta ricuchingaj carpa huasira charínauca chaquishca allpa partii , Dios Moisesta mandashca cuenta , pai ricushca samillara rangaj , nisha .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Ñucanchi yayauna chi huasira apasha , Josué gentügunamanda apishca allpai icuchica . Dios chi gentilgunara ichuca ñucanchi yayauna ñaupajmanda , David causaushca punzhaunagama .

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Cai David Diospa ñaupajpi llaquishcara tupaca ; Jacobpa Diospajta shu huasira sicanchingaj munaca .

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: Randi Salomón Diospajta shu huasira sicachica .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: Astaumbas ahua pachai tiau Dios mana maquihua rashca huasiunai causaunzhu , Diosmanda rimaj rimashcasna :

text: Heaven is my throne , and earth is my footstool : what house will ye build me ? saith the Lord : or what is the place of my rest ?
text2: Ahua pacha ñuca tiarina , cai pacha ñuca chaqui aitarina . ¿ Ima huasira rahuanguichi ? ¿ Maibirai ñuca samana ? Señor nin .

text: Hath not my hand made all these things ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu ñuca maqui cai tucuiunara rarca ? nin .

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: ¡ Shinzhi shunguyujguna , mana casuj rinriyujguna ! Santo Espiritura tucui horas mana uyanguichi . Canguna yayaunasna tucushcanguichi .

text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted ? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One ; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers :
text2: ¿ Maican Diosmanda rimajgunaras canguna yayauna manzhu caticachanauca ? Ali Aj shamungaraushcara rimajgunara huañuchinauca . Maspas canguna cai quiquin Ali Ajta entregacanguichi , huañuchicanguichi .

text: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels , and have not kept it .
text2: Canguna Diospa ley shimira angelgunamanda apicanguichi , shinajllaira mana huacachicanguichi .

text: When they heard these things , they were cut to the heart , and they gnashed on him with their teeth .
text2: Runauna Esteban casna rimashcara uyasha , paiguna shunguunai piñarinauca , paimanda quiru mucunauca .

text: But he , being full of the Holy Ghost , looked up stedfastly into heaven , and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing on the right hand of God ,
text2: Estébanga Santo Espirituhua undashca asha , ahua pachama ricusha Diospa sumajta ricuca , Jesustas Diospa ali maqui partima shayauta ricucami .

text: And said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God .
text2: Pai rimaca : Ahua pacha pascariaita ricuni , shinallara Runa Churira Diospa ali maquima tiauta ricuni .

text: Then they cried out with a loud voice , and stopped their ears , and ran upon him with one accord ,
text2: Shinajpi paita uyajguna shinzhira caparisha , rinrira tapanauca ; paigunapura pariju callpasha paita nitimunauca .

text: And cast him out of the city , and stoned him : and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man ' s feet , whose name was Saul .
text2: llactamanda paita llucchisha , rumihua shitanauca . Ricujguna paihua churanara shu Saulo nishca malta runa chaquima churanauca .

text: And they stoned Stephen , calling upon God , and saying , Lord Jesus , receive my spirit .
text2: Estébanda rumihua shitanauca . Paiga cayasha nica : Señor Jesús , ñuca almara apipai .

text: And he kneeled down , and cried with a loud voice , Lord , lay not this sin to their charge . And when he had said this , he fell asleep .
text2: Paiga cungurisha shinzira caparica : Señor , nisha , caigunara ama causayachipanguichu cai uchara . Shina rimasha huañusha puñucami .

text: And Saul was consenting unto his death . And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem ; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria , except the apostles .
text2: Saulo Esteban huañunara munaca . Chi punzhaunai Jerusalembi tiaj quirijgunara ashcara tormendachisha caticachanauca . Tucui Judea partima Galilea partimas sayanauca . Jesucristo cachashca runaunalla saquirinauca .

text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial , and made great lamentation over him .
text2: Ali shunguyuj runauna Estébanda pambangaj apanauca . Paimanda asneara huacanauca .

text: As for Saul , he made havock of the church , entering into every house , and haling men and women committed them to prison .
text2: Sauloga iglesiara tormendachica . Caran huasiunai icusha cariunara huarmiunaras aisasha chonda cularbi ishcachica .

text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word .
text2: Chausirij runaunaga tucui partira Diospa evangelio shimira rimasha rinauca .

text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria , and preached Christ unto them .
text2: Shinajpi Felipe Samaria llactama risha , Cristo shutira camachica .

text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake , hearing and seeing the miracles which he did .
text2: Tucui runauna shu iyaillahua Felipe rimashcaunara uyanauca , pai munanaita rashcaunara uyashas ricushas .

text: For unclean spirits , crying with loud voice , came out of many that were possessed with them : and many taken with palsies , and that were lame , were healed .
text2: Ashca runaunamanda irus supaiguna caparisha llucshinauca . Ashca suchuuna anga chaquiuna alichishca anauca .

text: And there was great joy in that city .
text2: Shinasha ashca cushihua anauca chi llactai .

text: But there was a certain man , called Simon , which beforetime in the same city used sorcery , and bewitched the people of Samaria , giving out that himself was some great one :
text2: Shu Simón nishca runa tiauca Samaria llactai . Paiga ñaupa horas tsalamanga aca . Pai chi llactai tiaj runaunara umachisha causauca , paula : Atun mani nisha .

text: To whom they all gave heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , This man is the great power of God .
text2: Paita tucui runauna munaihua uyanauca ; ichillaunamanda atungunagama ninauca : Cai runa Diospa atun ushaira charinmi .

text: And to him they had regard , because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries .
text2: Paita uyanauca , unaimanda paihua yachaimanda rashcaunahua paigunara umachisha charishcamanda .

text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God , and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
text2: Felipe Dios mandana pacha evangelio ali shimiras Jesucristo shutiras rimajpi , runauna quirisha bautisarinauca , cariunandi huarmiunandi .

text: Then Simon himself believed also : and when he was baptized , he continued with Philip , and wondered , beholding the miracles and signs which were done .
text2: Chi Simombas quirisha bautisarica , Felipema llutarica . Munanaita rashcaunara ricusha manzharica .

text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God , they sent unto them Peter and John :
text2: Jerusalembi tiau cachashca runauna Samaria llactai tiajguna Diospa shimira chasquishcara uyasha , Pedroras Juandas cachanauca .

text: Who , when they were come down , prayed for them , that they might receive the Holy Ghost :
text2: Caiguna shamusha , Diosta mañanauca quirijguna Santo Espiritura apingaj .

text: ( For as yet he was fallen upon none of them : only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
text2: Santo Espíritu chara pihuajpis mana irgumushcachu aca ; Jesuspa shutii bautisashca anauca . Chillami aca .

text: Then laid they their hands on them , and they received the Holy Ghost .
text2: Shinajpi , cachashca runauna maquira paiguna ahuai churajpi , quirijguna Santo Espiritura apinauca .

text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles ' hands the Holy Ghost was given , he offered them money ,
text2: Simón imasna cachashca runauna maquira churashcahua Santo Espíritu cushcara ricusha , paigunama cullquira ricuchica .

text: Saying , Give me also this power , that on whomsoever I lay hands , he may receive the Holy Ghost .
text2: Cai ushaira ñucamas cuhuaichi , nica , ñucas maicandas paihua ahuai maquira churasha shinallara Santo Espiritura apingaj .

text: But Peter said unto him , Thy money perish with thee , because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro rimaca : Camba cullqui canhua pariju chingarichu , Diospa ushaira cullquihua randinara iyashcamanda .

text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter : for thy heart is not right in the sight of God .
text2: Canga cai raushcai mana imaras charinguichu . Camba corazón Diospa ñaupajpi mana alichu .

text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness , and pray God , if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee .
text2: Arrepentiri cai can manali rashcara . Diosta rugai , pai perdonanga chari camba corazombi iyashcara .

text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness , and in the bond of iniquity .
text2: Camba shungu ayajmi , can manalihua huatashca ajta ricuni .

text: Then answered Simon , and said , Pray ye to the Lord for me , that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me .
text2: Shinajpi Simón cutipasha nica : Canguna ñucamanda Señorma rugapaichi , canguna rimashcasna ama ñucama shamungaj .

text: And they , when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord , returned to Jerusalem , and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans .
text2: Cachashca runauna Diospa shimira rimashca huasha , Jerusalenma tigranauca . Ashca Samaria runa llactaunai Diospa evangelio ali shimira rimanauca .

text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip , saying , Arise , and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza , which is desert .
text2: Shu Diospa ángel Felipera rimaca , Atari , nisha , sur nishca quinri partima ri , Jerusalenmanda Gaza llactama riña nambira . Chihui runa illaj parti .

text: And he arose and went : and , behold , a man of Ethiopia , an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians , who had the charge of all her treasure , and had come to Jerusalem for to worship ,
text2: Shinajpi Felipe atarisha rica . Chihuimi shu Etiopía llacta runa , Candace nishca Etiopía huarmi rey apu atun mandaj

text: Was returning , and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet .
text2: Paihua caballo aisashca carroi tiarisha tigramuuca . Isaías Diosmanda rimaj quillcashca quillcai ricuuca .

text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip , Go near , and join thyself to this chariot .
text2: Diospa Espíritu Felipera nica : Ri , nisha , carroma Ilutan .

text: And Philip ran thither to him , and heard him read the prophet Esaias , and said , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
text2: Felipe pactai risha , chi runa Isaías quillcai ricushcara uyasha tapuca : ¿ Can ricushcara intindinguichu ?

text: And he said , How can I , except some man should guide me ? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him .
text2: ¿ Imasnara ushasha maicambas mana yachachihuajpi ? nica . Felipera rugaca sicangaj , paihua pariju tiaringaj .

text: The place of the scripture which he read was this , He was led as a sheep to the slaughter ; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer , so opened he not his mouth :
text2: Pai ricushca Quillca casna nica : Borrego cuenta huañuchinama pushanauca ; borregora rutujpa ñaupajpi upa cuenta , casnami paihua shimira mana pascaca .

text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away : and who shall declare his generation ? for his life is taken from the earth .
text2: Pai pishi tucushcai mana uyai tucuca . ¿ Maican paimanda alira rimanga ? Cai pachamanda paihua causaira anzhuchishca aca .

text: And the eunuch answered Philip , and said , I pray thee , of whom speaketh the prophet this ? of himself , or of some other man ?
text2: Etiopiamanda runa Felipera tapuca : Canda rugauni , cuentahuapai : ¿ Rimajga pimanda riman ? ¿ Pai quiquimandachu , shujmandachu riman ?

text: Then Philip opened his mouth , and began at the same scripture , and preached unto him Jesus .
text2: Shinajpi Felipe cai quillcamanda Jesuspa evangelio ali shimira rimai callarica .

text: And as they went on their way , they came unto a certain water : and the eunuch said , See , here is water ; what doth hinder me to be baptized ?
text2: Nambira riushcai shu yacuma pactanauca . Etiopía runa Mea : Caibimi yacu . ¿ Imara arcan ñuca bautisaringaj ?

text: And Philip said , If thou believest with all thine heart , thou mayest . And he answered and said , I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God .
text2: Felipe paita nica : Can tucui shunguhua Jesucristoi quirijpi ushanguimi . Etiopía runa cutipasha nica : Jesucristo Diospa Churi ashcara quirinimi .

text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still : and they went down both into the water , both Philip and the eunuch ; and he baptized him .
text2: Paihua carrora shayachingaj mandaca . Felipe Etiopía runandi yacuma irgunauca , Felipe paita bautisaca .

text: And when they were come up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip , that the eunuch saw him no more : and he went on his way rejoicing .
text2: Paiguna yacumanda sicamusha , Diospa Espíritu cungaimanda Felipera pushacami . Etiopía runa paita mana cuti ricucachu . Paiga paihua nambira cushiyasha ricami .
