text: But Philip was found at Azotus : and passing through he preached in all the cities , till he came to Caesarea .
text2: Randi Felipe Azoto nishca llactai tiauca . Ri pasausha , Diospa evangelio ali shimira rimaca tucui llactaunai , Cesárea llactama pactanagama .

text: And Saul , yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord , went unto the high priest ,
text2: Saulo chara Señorbi quirijgunara chijnisha , huañuchisha nisha , sacedoteuna atun apuma shamuca .

text: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues , that if he found any of this way , whether they were men or women , he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem .
text2: Quillcaunara mañaca Damasco llactai tiaj judioguna tandariña huasiunai icungaj . Chihui icusha cai Ñambi nishcara catijgunara mascasha nica , cari ashas huarmi ashas , paigunara apisha Jerusalenma pushangaj .

text: And as he journeyed , he came near Damascus : and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven :
text2: Saulo , nambira riushcai , Damasco llactama pactana mayambi , cungaimanda ahua pachamanda paihua muyujta punzhajlla ricurica .

text: And he fell to the earth , and heard a voice saying unto him , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Allpai urmasha , shu shimi rimauta uyaca : Saulo , Saulo , nisha , ¿ imamanda tormendachihuangui ?

text: And he said , Who art thou , Lord ? And the Lord said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest : it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Saulo nica : ¿ Pitangui , Señor ? Uyashca shimi cutipaca : Ñuca can tormendachiushca Jesús mani . Can tucsina pundai nijtasha canllara chugringui .

text: And he trembling and astonished said , Lord , what wilt thou have me to do ? And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the city , and it shall be told thee what thou must do .
text2: Manzharisha , chucchusha , Saulo nica : Señor , ¿ imara munangui ñuca rangaj ? Señor nica : Atari , llactama icui . Chihuimi imara ranara canda rimanaunga .

text: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless , hearing a voice , but seeing no man .
text2: Saulohua riu runauna manzharisha shayanauca , rimashca shimira uyasha , mana pitas ricusha .

text: And Saul arose from the earth ; and when his eyes were opened , he saw no man : but they led him by the hand , and brought him into Damascus .
text2: Shinajpi Saulo allpamanda atarisha , ñahuira pascasha mana imaras ricucachu . Shina rasha maquimanda apisha , paita pushanauca ; Damasco llactama icuchinauca .

text: And he was three days without sight , and neither did eat nor drink .
text2: Chihui quinsa punzhara mana ricusha mana micusha mana upisha tiauca .

text: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and to him said the Lord in a vision , Ananias . And he said , Behold , I am here , Lord .
text2: Shu quirij runa Damascoi tiauca , paihua shuti Ananías . Nuspaibi Señor paita rimaca : Ananías , nica . Pai cutipaca : Caibi mani , Señor .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the street which is called Straight , and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul , of Tarsus : for , behold , he prayeth ,
text2: Señor paita rimaca : Atari , ri , Dirichu nishca ñambima . Chihui , Judaspa huasii , shu Tarso llactamanda runara mascai , paihua shuti Saulo . Pai Diosta mañaun .

text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in , and putting his hand on him , that he might receive his sight .
text2: Cai Saulo shu Ananías nishca runara nuspaibi ricushcami . Cai Ananías icumusha , maquira paihua ahuai churaca ñahuira pascangaj .

text: Then Ananias answered , Lord , I have heard by many of this man , how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem :
text2: Shinajpi Ananías cutipaca : Señor , cai Saulomanda ashca runaunamanda uyashcani : Jerusalembi causau canda quirijgunara ashca llaquira rashcami .

text: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name .
text2: Astaumbas , caibi sacerdote apuunamanda mandashcara charinmi tucui camba shutii mañajgunara apingaj .

text: But the Lord said unto him , Go thy way : for he is a chosen vessel unto me , to bear my name before the Gentiles , and kings , and the children of Israel :
text2: Señor paita nica : Ri , cai Saulo shu ñuca ajllashca runami . Paimi ñuca shutira gentilgunama , rey apuunama , Israel churiunamas rimangami .

text: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name ' s sake .
text2: Ñuca paita , ricuchisha imasna pai tomendarína anga ñuca shutimanda .

text: And Ananias went his way , and entered into the house ; and putting his hands on him said , Brother Saul , the Lord , even Jesus , that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest , hath sent me , that thou mightest receive thy sight , and be filled with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Shinajpi , Ananías rica , huasima icusha , paihua maquira Saulo ahuai churaca . Saulo uqui , nica , can shamushca ñambii ricurimuj Señor Jesús ñucara cachamushcami camba ñahuira pascangaj , camba corazombi Santo Espirituhua undashca angaj .

text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales : and he received sight forthwith , and arose , and was baptized .
text2: Chi ratollaira , paihua ñahuimanda puyuyashca cara cuenta urmajpi alimi ricuca . Atarisha bautisaricami .

text: And when he had received meat , he was strengthened . Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus .
text2: Saulo , micushca huasha , ursara apica .

text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues , that he is the Son of God .
text2: Chi horasmanda Saulo judioguna tandarina huasiunai Cristo shutira camachica , pai Diospa Churimi nisha .

text: But all that heard him were amazed , and said ; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem , and came hither for that intent , that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests ?
text2: Tucui paita uyajguna manzharisha rimanauca : ¿ Manzhu cai Saulo Jerusalembi Jesuspa shutira rimajgunara tucuchiuca ? ¿ Manzhu chihuaj caimas shamuca quiríjgunara apisha pushangaj sacerdote apuunama ?

text: But Saul increased the more in strength , and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus , proving that this is very Christ .
text2: Astaumbas Saulo , Diospa shimii astaun yachaihuaj tucuca . Damascoi causaj judioguna pandarishcara ricuchica , Cierto pacha cai Jesús Cristomi , nisha .

text: And after that many days were fulfilled , the Jews took counsel to kill him :
text2: Ashca punzha pasashca huasha , judioguna pariju rimanausha Saulora huañuchingaj iyarinauca .

text: But their laying await was known of Saul . And they watched the gates day and night to kill him .
text2: Paiguna iyaushcara Saulo riparacami . Judioguna punzhandi tutandi punguunai chapanauca paita huañuchingaj .

text: Then the disciples took him by night , and let him down by the wall in a basket .
text2: Shinajpi quirijguna Saulora apisha , tuta horas , shu tasai llacta quinzhamanda paita irguchinauca .

text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem , he assayed to join himself to the disciples : but they were all afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
text2: Jerusalenma pactamusha Saulo quirijgunahua llutarinara munaca randi tucui paita manzhanauca , pai quirij ashcara mana iyasha .

text: But Barnabas took him , and brought him to the apostles , and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way , and that he had spoken to him , and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus .
text2: Shinajpi Bernabé Saulora apisha , cachashca runaunama pushaca . Paigunara cuentaca imasnara Saulo ñambii Señorda

text: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem .
text2: Saulo Jerusalembi tiaj quirijgunahua icusha llucshisha tiauca .

text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus , and disputed against the Grecians : but they went about to slay him .
text2: Mana ansas manzhasha , Saulo Señorba shutii rimaca . Griegounahua rimaca ; chigunaga paita huañuchinara munanauca .

text: Which when the brethren knew , they brought him down to Caesarea , and sent him forth to Tarsus .
text2: Uquiuna caita riparasha , Cesárea llactagama Saulora compañasha , paita Tarso llactama cachanauca .

text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria , and were edified ; and walking in the fear of the Lord , and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost , were multiplied .
text2: Iglesiauna ganaslla tucucami , Judea , Galilea , Samaría nishca partiunai . Iñasha rinauca , Señorda manzhaushcai causausha , Santo Espirituhua shinzhiyachishca anauca .

text: And it came to pass , as Peter passed throughout all quarters , he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda .
text2: Pedro caran partima purisha Lida nishca llactai causaj quirijgunama shamuca .

text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , which had kept his bed eight years , and was sick of the palsy .
text2: Chihuimi shu Eneas nishca runara tupaca ; ña pusac huatara caitui siríuca . Suchu aca , mana puríj .

text: And Peter said unto him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ maketh thee whole : arise , and make thy bed . And he arose immediately .
text2: Pedro paita nica : Eneas , Jesucristo canda alichinmi . Atari , camba puñunara pillui . Chi ratollaira ataricami .

text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him , and turned to the Lord .
text2: Paita tucui Lida Saronas llactaunai causajguna ricunauca . Paiguna Señorbi quirinauca .

text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , which by interpretation is called Dorcas : this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did .
text2: Jope nishca llactai shu quirij huarmi tiauca , paihua shuti Tabita , shu shimiiga Dorcas nin . Cai huarmi alira raj aca , tsuntsuunama cuyaj aca .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that she was sick , and died : whom when they had washed , they laid her in an upper chamber .
text2: Chi punzhaunai ungusha , Dorcas huañucami . Paita armachishca huasha , shu ucui churanauca .

text: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa , and the disciples had heard that Peter was there , they sent unto him two men , desiring him that he would not delay to come to them .
text2: Lidaga Jope llacta mayambi aca . Quirijguna Pedro chihui ajta uyasha , ishqui runara cachanauca : Ñucanchhna uctalla shamupai , nisha rugasha .

text: Then Peter arose and went with them . When he was come , they brought him into the upper chamber : and all the widows stood by him weeping , and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made , while she was with them .
text2: Pedro atarisha paigunahua pariju rica . Pai pactai ríjpiga , chi ucuma pushanauca . Huañushca huarmi muyujta huaccha huarmiuna pai sirashca bataunaras churanaunaras huacasha ricuchinauca , Dorcas paigunahua pariju tiaushcai rashcaunara .

text: But Peter put them all forth , and kneeled down , and prayed ; and turning him to the body said , Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes : and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro tucuira canzhama cachasha , cungurisha Diosta mañaca . Ayama tigrasha paita rimaca : Tabita , atari , nisha . Paiga ñahuira pascaca , Pedrora ricusha atarisha tiarica .

text: And he gave her his hand , and lifted her up , and when he had called the saints and widows , presented her alive .
text2: Pedro paita maquimanda apisha atarichicami . Shinajpi quirijgunara huaccha huarmiunandi cayasha paita causarishcara ricuchicami .

text: And it was known throughout all Joppa ; and many believed in the Lord .
text2: Cai rashca tucui Jope llactai uyarica . Ashca runauna Señorbi quirinauca .

text: And it came to pass , that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner .
text2: Casna rashaga Pedro unaira tiauca Jope llactai . Shu Simón nishca runa huasii tiaj aca . Simón aicha caraunara chaquichij aca .

text: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a centurion of the band called the Italian band ,
text2: Cesárea llactai shu runa tiauca , paihua shuti Cornelio . Pai Italiano nishca soldaro montonmanda capitán aca .

text: A devout man , and one that feared God with all his house , which gave much alms to the people , and prayed to God alway .
text2: Cai runa Diosta llaquij , Diosta manzhaj aca . Paindi tucui paihua huasii tiajgunandi ashcara cuyaj aca . Tucui horas Diosta mañaca .

text: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him , and saying unto him , Cornelius .
text2: Cai Cornelio , las tres chishi tupura , nuspaibi shu Diospa angelda pajlla pambai ricuca . Cai ángel paihuajma icusha rimaca : Cornelio , nisha .

text: And when he looked on him , he was afraid , and said , What is it , Lord ? And he said unto him , Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God .
text2: Pai angelda ricusha , manzharisha tapuca : ¿ Imarai , Señor ? Angelga cutipaca : Can Diosta mañashcauna , can cuyashcauna Diospajma pactamunaushcami pai iyaringaj .

text: And now send men to Joppa , and call for one Simon , whose surname is Peter :
text2: Cuna , runaunara cachai Jope nishca llactama shu Simón nishca runara pushamungaj , paihua shu shuti Pedromi .

text: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner , whose house is by the sea side : he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do .
text2: Cai runa shu Simón nishca huasii tiaun . Cai Simón aicha caraunara chaquichij , paihua huasi lamar patai tian . Cai Pedro can ministishcara rangaj canda rimangami .

text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed , he called two of his household servants , and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually ;
text2: Paihua rimaj ángel rishca huasha , Cornelio ishqui paihua sirvijgunara , shu paita yanapaj Diosta llaquij soldarondi cayaca .

text: And when he had declared all these things unto them , he sent them to Joppa .
text2: Paigunara tucui pai ricushcara cuentashca huasha , Jopema cachaca .

text: On the morrow , as they went on their journey , and drew nigh unto the city , Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour :
text2: Cayandi punzha , paiguna nambira riusha , llactama pactana mayambi , Pedro ahua patama Diosta mañangaj sicaca , doce mayan tupura .

text: And he became very hungry , and would have eaten : but while they made ready , he fell into a trance ,
text2: Pedro ashcara yarcachicami , micusha nicamL Micunara alichingama , cungaimanda nuspasha ricucami .

text: And saw heaven opened , and a certain vessel descending unto him , as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners , and let down to the earth :
text2: Ahua pacha pascarishcara ricucami . Chimanda shu atun llachapa cuenta ricurij , chuscundi pundamanda huatashca irgumujta ricuca .

text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Chihuimi tucui cai allpai purij chuscu chaquiyuj aichauna , allpara llucajgunas , ahuara huamburij pishcuunas tianauca .

text: And there came a voice to him , Rise , Peter ; kill , and eat .
text2: Shu shimi uyarica : Pedro , nisha , atari . Huañuchisha micui .

text: But Peter said , Not so , Lord ; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro nica : Mana , Señor , ñuca imahoraspas ima sami yanga aichara ima irustas mana micushcanichu .

text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Chi uyarimuj shimi cutillara rimaca : Dios pichashcara ama yangami nichu .

text: This was done thrice : and the vessel was received up again into heaven .
text2: Cai samillara quinsa cuti ricurica . Chi huasha llachapa ahua pachamallara apai tucuca .

text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean , behold , the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon ' s house , and stood before the gate ,
text2: Pedro mana yachai tucusha tiaushcai , ima samira angairi cai ricushcara nisha iyariuca . Chi ratollai , Cornelio cachamushca runauna pactamunauca . Paiguna Simomba huasira tapusha , punguma llutarimunauca .

text: And called , and asked whether Simon , which was surnamed Peter , were lodged there .
text2: Cayasha tapunauca : ¿ Shu Simón , paihua shu shuti Pedro , caibichu tiaun ? nisha .

text: While Peter thought on the vision , the Spirit said unto him , Behold , three men seek thee .
text2: Pedro pai ricushcara chara iyariusha , Diospa Espíritu paita rimaca : Quinsa runa canda mascanaun , nisha .

text: Arise therefore , and get thee down , and go with them , doubting nothing : for I have sent them .
text2: Atari . Ama ansas manzhasha irgiii . Paigunahua ri . Ñuca paigunara cachamucani .

text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius ; and said , Behold , I am he whom ye seek : what is the cause wherefore ye are come ?
text2: Shinajpi Pedro irgusha Cornelio cachamushca runaunama nica : Ñuca canguna mascaushca runa ani . ¿ Imamanda shamushcanguichi ?

text: And they said , Cornelius the centurion , a just man , and one that feareth God , and of good report among all the nation of the Jews , was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house , and to hear words of thee .
text2: Shamujguna rimanauca : Cornelio nishca , shu capitán , ali shunguyuj , Diosta manzhaj , tucui judioguna aillui ali rimashca , paima shu santo ángel rimaca canda pushamungaj paihua huasima , can rimashca shimiunara uyangaj .

text: Then called he them in , and lodged them . And on the morrow Peter went away with them , and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him .
text2: Shinajpi runaunara ucuma icuchisha , Pedro paigunara chihui puñuchica . Cayandi punzha Pedro atarisha paigunahua rica . Huaquin Jopemanda uquiunas pariju catinauca .

text: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius waited for them , and had called together his kinsmen and near friends .
text2: Cayandi punzha , Cesárea llactai icunauca . Cornelio paigunara chapaucami , paihua ailluunandi , pai llaquishca amigounandi .

text: And as Peter was coming in , Cornelius met him , and fell down at his feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Pedro icujpi , Cornelio llucshimusha paita tupaca . Tuama urmasha paita adoraca .

text: But Peter took him up , saying , Stand up ; I myself also am a man .
text2: Pedro paita atarichisha nica : Atari , ñucas runallarami ani .

text: And as he talked with him , he went in , and found many that were come together .
text2: Paihua cuentanausha , ucuma icusha , ashca runara tandarishcara tupaca .

text: And he said unto them , Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company , or come unto one of another nation ; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
text2: Pedro paigunara rimaca : Canguna yachanguichi imasna judioguna shu llactamanda runaunahua mana llutarinachu . Astaumbas Dios ricuchihuashcami , nisha : Maican runaras ama , Yanga , irus , nisha rimanguichu .

text: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying , as soon as I was sent for : I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me ?
text2: Chiraigumanda can cayashcara uyasha , mana manzhasha shamushcani . Shinajpi tapuuni , ¿ Imaraigumanda cayahuacangui ?

text: And Cornelius said , Four days ago I was fasting until this hour ; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and , behold , a man stood before me in bright clothing ,
text2: Cornelio cutipaca : Ña chuscu punzha , cai tupu horaspi , yarcaibi , ñuca huasii mañaucani las tres tupui . Cungaimanda shu runa chiujlla ricurij churarishca ñuca ñaupajpi shayarica .

text: And said , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God .
text2: Pai nica : Cornelio , can mañashcara uyashcami . Can cuyashcaunara Diospa ñaupajpi iyarishcami .

text: Send therefore to Joppa , and call hither Simon , whose surname is Peter ; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side : who , when he cometh , shall speak unto thee .
text2: Jope llactama cachai . Chimanda shu Simón nishcara pushai rinauchu . Paihua shu shuti Pedro . Pai caraunara chaquichij Simomba huasii tiaun . Chi huasi lamar patai . Cai Pedro shamusha canda rimangami .

text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee ; and thou hast well done that thou art come . Now therefore are we all here present before God , to hear all things that are commanded thee of God .
text2: Shinajpi chi ratollai canma cachacani . Canga alira shamushcangui . Cunaga tucui caibi manchi , Diospa ñaupajpi , tucui Dios canma mandashca shimiunara uyangaj .

text: Then Peter opened his mouth , and said , Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons :
text2: Pedro rimasha : Cierto pacha ricsini , nica , Diospa ñaupajpi tucui runauna chi tupulla anchi .

text: But in every nation he that feareth him , and worketh righteousness , is accepted with him .
text2: Dios maican llacta runaras , paita manzhajta , alira rauta , llaquin .

text: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel , preaching peace by Jesus Christ : ( he is Lord of all : )
text2: Dios Israel churiunama shu shimira cachaca , cushi shungura cuj evangelio ali shimira Jesucristomanda rimasha , cai Jesús tucuihuaj Señormi .

text: That word , I say , ye know , which was published throughout all Judaea , and began from Galilee , after the baptism which John preached ;
text2: Yachanguichi tucui Judea partii rimashcara , Galileamanda callarisha , Juan camachishca bautisarina huasha ,

text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power : who went about doing good , and healing all that were oppressed of the devil ; for God was with him .
text2: Dios Nazaretmanda Jesuspa ahuai Santo Espirituras ushairas talicami . Pai alira rasha purica , tucui supaüiua tormendachishcaunara alichica , Dios paihua tiashcamanda .

text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews , and in Jerusalem ; whom they slew and hanged on a tree :
text2: Ñucanchi cierto ricujguna anchi cai tucui Jesús rashcaunara Judea llactaunai Jerusalembis . Paitaga huañuchinauca , caspii clavasha .

text: Him God raised up the third day , and shewed him openly ;
text2: Paita quinsa punzhai Dios atarichicami . Paulara ricuchica .

text: Not to all the people , but unto witnesses chosen before of God , even to us , who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead .
text2: Mana tucui runaunama ricurica . Randi , Dios ñaupamanda ajllashca cierto ricujgunama , ñucanchima paihua pariju micujguna upijguna , pai huañushcaunamanda causarishca huasha .

text: And he commanded us to preach unto the people , and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead .
text2: Ñucanchira runaunara camachingaj mandacami cierto rimangajpas imasna Dios paita churashcami causajgunaras huañushcaunaras Taripaj tucungaj .

text: To him give all the prophets witness , that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins .
text2: Cai Jesusmanda tucui Diosmanda rimajguna rimanaun , imasna tucui paihuajpi quirijguna uchaunara perdonai tucunaunga paihua shutii .

text: While Peter yet spake these words , the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word .
text2: Pedro chara rimaullaira , Santo Espíritu tucui uyajguna ahuai shamucami .

text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished , as many as came with Peter , because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Circuncisionda raj quirijguna , Pedrohua pariju shamujguna , manzharinauca imasna gentilguna ahuai Santo Espíritu táurica .

text: For they heard them speak with tongues , and magnify God . Then answered Peter ,
text2: Paigunara shu tono shimiunai rimajta uyanauca , shinallara Diosta ahuayachinauca .

text: Can any man forbid water , that these should not be baptized , which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we ?
text2: Shinajpi Pedro cutipasha rimaca : ¿ Maicambas ushanzhu yacura mitsanara cai Santo Espiritura charijgunara ama bautisaringaj ñucanchisna ?

text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord . Then prayed they him to tarry certain days .
text2: Paigunara bautisaringaj mandaca Señor Jesuspa shutii . Shinajpi Pedrora unailla paigunahua tiangaj ruganauca .

text: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God .
text2: Cachashca runauna Judea partii tiau uquiunandi gentilguna Diospa shimira chasquíshcara uyanauca .

text: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem , they that were of the circumcision contended with him ,
text2: Pedro Jerusalenma sicajpi , circuncisionda rajguna paita piñanauca .

text: Saying , Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised , and didst eat with them .
text2: ¿ Imamanda circuncisionda mana rajguna huasii icucangui , paigunahua micucangui ? ninauca .

text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning , and expounded it by order unto them , saying ,
text2: Shinajpi Pedro cuentangaj callarica tucui paihua pasashcara .

text: I was in the city of Joppa praying : and in a trance I saw a vision , A certain vessel descend , as it had been a great sheet , let down from heaven by four corners ; and it came even to me :
text2: Ñuca Jope llactai tiaushcai , Diosta mañasha , nuspashcara cuenta ricucani . Shu atun llachapara cuenta ahua pachamanda ñuca tiashcama chuscundi pundamanda irguchishca aca , nica .

text: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes , I considered , and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Llachapara ricuusha , chihuimi cai pachai purij chuscu chaquiyuj aichaunara , milli aichaunandi , allpara llucajgunandi , ahuara huamburij pishcuunandi ricucani , nica .

text: And I heard a voice saying unto me , Arise , Peter ; slay and eat .
text2: Shu shimi rimashcara uyacani . Nihuaca : Atari , Pedro . Huañuchisha miqui .

text: But I said , Not so , Lord : for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth .
text2: Mana , nicani , Señor , mana ima yanga irus aichara amulishcanichu .

text: But the voice answered me again from heaven , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Shinajpi chi shimi ahua pachamanda cutipahuacami : Dios pichashcara ama : Yangami , nichu .

text: And this was done three times : and all were drawn up again into heaven .
text2: Cai sami quinsa cuti ricurica . Chi huasha tucui ahua pachama apai tucuca .

text: And , behold , immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was , sent from Caesarea unto me .
text2: Cungaimanda quinsa runa ñuca tiaushca huasima shamunauca , Cesareamanda ñucama cachamushcauna .

text: And the spirit bade me go with them , nothing doubting . Moreover these six brethren accompanied me , and we entered into the man ' s house :
text2: Espíritu rimahuaca : Ama manzhasha chigunahua ri . Cai socta uquiuna ñucahua catinauca . Shu runa huasii icucanchi .

text: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house , which stood and said unto him , Send men to Joppa , and call for Simon , whose surname is Peter ;
text2: Chi runa ñucanchira cuentaca : Shu angelda ñuca huasii ricucani . Shayarisha nihuaca : Jope llactama cachai . Pushai rinauchu shu Simonda , paihua shu shuti Pedro .

text: Who shall tell thee words , whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved .
text2: Paiga canda camba huasii tiajgunandi almara quishpichina shimiunara rimangami , mea .

text: And as I began to speak , the Holy Ghost fell on them , as on us at the beginning .
text2: Ñuca rimai callarishcai , Santo Espíritu paiguna ahuai shamucami , callari horas ñucanchihua tucushcasna .

text: Then remembered I the word of the Lord , how that he said , John indeed baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Shinajpi Señor rimashcara iyaricani : Cierto pacha Juan yacuhua bautisaca , astaumbas canguna Santo Espirituhua bautisai tucunguichimi .

text: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us , who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ ; what was I , that I could withstand God ?
text2: Shina rasha Dios paigunara Santo Espiritura cusha ñucanchi Jesucristoi quirijgunama cushcasna , ñucaga imara ani Diosta arcangaj .

text: When they heard these things , they held their peace , and glorified God , saying , Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life .
text2: Shinajpi cai shimiunara uyasha chunllayanaucami . Diosta alabanauca , nisha : Gentilgunamas Dios arrepentirinara cushcami causanauchu .

text: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice , and Cyprus , and Antioch , preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only .
text2: Chi Esteban tormendarij horas , chausirij runauna Fenicia , Chipre , Antioquía nishca llactaunagama purinauca . Judiogunamalla Diospa shimira rimanauca . 20 Paigunamanda huaquin Chipremandauna , Cirenemandaunandi Antioquía llactama shamusha , gríegounama Señor Jesusmanda rimaj evangelio ali shimira rimanauca .

text: And the hand of the Lord was with them : and a great number believed , and turned unto the Lord .
text2: Dios paigunara yanapaca . Ashcauna quirinauca , Señorbajma voltiarinauca .

text: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem : and they sent forth Barnabas , that he should go as far as Antioch .
text2: Paiguna rashca Jerusalembi tiaj iglesiama uyarica . Shinasha Bernabera Antioquíama cachanauca .

text: Who , when he came , and had seen the grace of God , was glad , and exhorted them all , that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord .
text2: Bernabé pactai rishaga , Dios yanapashcara ricusha , cushiyacami . Tucui runaunara camachica paiguna quirishcara ama saquisha Señorda catinauchu .

text: For he was a good man , and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith : and much people was added unto the Lord .
text2: Bernabega ali runa aca , ali quirij , Santo Espirituhua undashca . Ashca runauna Señorbajma tandarimunauca .

text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus , for to seek Saul :
text2: Chimanda huasha , Bernabé Tarso nishca llactama rica , Saulora mascangaj . Paita tupasha , Antioquíama pushamuca .

text: And when he had found him , he brought him unto Antioch . And it came to pass , that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church , and taught much people . And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch .
text2: Shu huata tupura iglesiahua tandarisha tianauca . Ashca runaunara yachachinauca . Chihui , Antioquía llactai , quirijgunara Cristiano nisha ñaupa punda shutichinauca .

text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch .
text2: Chi punzhaunai , Diosmanda rimajguna Jerusalenmanda Antioquíama shamunauca .

text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .
text2: Paigunamanda shuj , Agabo nishca ataricami . Diospa Espiritumanda rimasha intindichicami imasna ashca yarcai cai pachai shamungarauca . Cai yarcai Claudio nishca atun apu tiaushca horaspi shamuca .

text: Then the disciples , every man according to his ability , determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea :
text2: Shinajpi quirijguna caran shuj pai ushashca tupura Judeai tiau uquiunama yanapasha cachangaj iyanauca .

text: Which also they did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul .
text2: Caita shinallara ranauca . Paiguna yanapashcara Bernabé Saulo maquiunai cusha , quirij rucuunama cachanauca .

text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church .
text2: Chi horasllaira , Herodes rey apu quirijgunara tormendachingaj callarica .

text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword .
text2: Juamba uqui Jacobora esparahua huañuchica .

text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews , he proceeded further to take Peter also . ( Then were the days of unleavened bread . )
text2: Caita judioguna munanauta ricusha , Herodes Pedroras apicami . Puscu illaj tanda ista punzhauna aca .

text: And when he had apprehended him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him ; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people .
text2: Paita apishaga , chonda cularbi ishcacami . Chunga socta soldaroma cushca aca ricungaj . Pascua ista pasashca huasha runauna ñaupajpi llucchinara munaca .

text: Peter therefore was kept in prison : but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him .
text2: Shina rasha Pedrora chonda cularbi ishcariaica . Randi quirijguna mana saquisha Diosta mañanauca Pedromanda .

text: And when Herod would have brought him forth , the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains : and the keepers before the door kept the prison .
text2: Herodes paita llucchisha nisha iyaushcai , chi tutai Pedro puñuriaica ishqui soldaro chaupi shungüi ; ishqui cadena huascahua huatashca aca . Chonda cularda cuiraj soldarouna pungu ñaupajpi ricunauca .

text: And , behold , the angel of the Lord came upon him , and a light shined in the prison : and he smote Peter on the side , and raised him up , saying , Arise up quickly . And his chains fell off from his hands .
text2: Cungaimanda shu Señormanda ángel ricurímuca . Chonda cularbi punzhajlla tucuca . Angel Pedrora tangasha llicchachica : Uctalla atari , nisha . Cadena huascauna paihua maquimanda urmanauca .

text: And the angel said unto him , Gird thyself , and bind on thy sandals . And so he did . And he saith unto him , Cast thy garment about thee , and follow me .
text2: Angel rimaca : Chumbilli , nisha , zapatosta huatai . Camba churanara churarisha catihua . Shinami rarca .

text: And he went out , and followed him ; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel ; but thought he saw a vision .
text2: Pedro llucshisha angelda catica . Caitaga mana cierto chari iyacami ángel rashcara . Astaumbas nuspashcara nuspaunimi nisha iyaca .

text: When they were past the first and the second ward , they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city ; which opened to them of his own accord : and they went out , and passed on through one street ; and forthwith the angel departed from him .
text2: Ucuma ricuj soldarounara canzhama ricujgunaras pasanauca . Llactama pasaj iru pungu paiguna pasangaj pai munaimandallara pascarica . Llucshishaga , shu nambira pasanauca . Chi ratollai ángel paimanda anzhurica .

text: And when Peter was come to himself , he said , Now I know of a surety , that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod , and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews .
text2: Shinajpi Pedro ali iyaihua iyarisha nica : Cuna intindinimi , cierto pacha Dios paihua angelda cachamusha ñucara quishpichihuaca Herodes maquimanda , tucui ñucara chapau judiogunamandas .

text: And when he had considered the thing , he came to the house of Mary the mother of John , whose surname was Mark ; where many were gathered together praying .
text2: Caita riparasha , Pedro Juamba mama María huasima pactamuca . Cai Juanga shu shuti Marcosmi . Chihui ashcauna tandarisha pariju tianauca Diosta mañasha .

text: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate , a damsel came to hearken , named Rhoda .
text2: Pedro pajlla pungüi cayajpi , shu sirvij huarmi ricungaj llucshica , paihua shuti Rode .

text: And when she knew Peter ' s voice , she opened not the gate for gladness , but ran in , and told how Peter stood before the gate .
text2: Paiga Pedro shimira ricsisha , cushiyashcamanda pungura mana pascacachu . Astaunga ucuma callpaca rimai ringaj : Pedro caibimi , pungüi shayaun , nisha .

text: And they said unto her , Thou art mad . But she constantly affirmed that it was even so . Then said they , It is his angel .
text2: Paiguna rimanauca : Can nusparisha rimaungui . Huarmiga : Ciertomi nini , nica . Paiguna randi : Paihua aya anga , ninauca .

text: But Peter continued knocking : and when they had opened the door , and saw him , they were astonished .
text2: Astaumbas Pedro maspas cayauca . Paiguna , pungura pascajpi , paita ricusha manzharinauca .

text: But he , beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace , declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison . And he said , Go shew these things unto James , and to the brethren . And he departed , and went into another place .
text2: Pedro randi , chunllayangaj maquihua ricuchisha , paigunara rimaca imasnara Dios paita chonda cular ucumanda llucchica .

text: Now as soon as it was day , there was no small stir among the soldiers , what was become of Peter .
text2: Ña puzhayajpi soldarouna ashcara nusparinauca : Pedro ¿ imara tucushcangairi ? nisha .

text: And when Herod had sought for him , and found him not , he examined the keepers , and commanded that they should be put to death . And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea , and there abode .
text2: Herodes Pedrora mascasha mana tupacachu . Cuirajgunara taripasha huañuchingaj cachacami . Chimanda huasha Herodes Judeamanda Cesárea llactama rica , chihui saquiricami .

text: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon : but they came with one accord to him , and , having made Blastus the king ' s chamberlain their friend , desired peace ; because their country was nourished by the king ' s country .
text2: Herodes Tiro llactamandaunahua Sidón llactamandaunahuas piñarishca aca . Shinajllaira pariju paihuajma shamunauca . Paita sirvij Blasto nishcahua valirisha , aliyanara munanauca . Paiguna llacta Herodes allpaunamanda micunara apica .

text: And upon a set day Herod , arrayed in royal apparel , sat upon his throne , and made an oration unto them .
text2: Herodes , pai rimashca punzhai , rey apu churanara churarisha , paihua rey apu tiarinai tiarisha , paigunara camachica .

text: And the people gave a shout , saying , It is the voice of a god , and not of a man .
text2: Runauna caparinauca : ¡ Dios riman , mana runa ! nisha .

text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him , because he gave not God the glory : and he was eaten of worms , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Chi ratollai , Diospa ángel paita susirichicami , mana Diosta alabashcaraigumanda . Chi ratollaira curuuna paita micujpi , Herodes huañuca .

text: But the word of God grew and multiplied .
text2: Astaumbas Diospa shimiunara quirijguna yaparisha mirarínauca .

text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem , when they had fulfilled their ministry , and took with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Bernabé Saulondi Jerusalenmanda tigramunauca , paiguna mingashcara pactachisha . Paigunahua Juan Marcos nishcara pushamunauca .

text: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers ; as Barnabas , and Simeon that was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch , and Saul .
text2: Antioquía llactai tiaj iglesiai Diosmanda rimajguna yachachijgunas tianauca : Bernabé , Simón Niger nishca , Cirenemanda Lucio , Herodes apuhua pariju iñaj Manaén , Saulondi .

text: As they ministered to the Lord , and fasted , the Holy Ghost said , Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them .
text2: Paiguna Diosta sirvisha sasisha Diosta mañanauca . Santo Espíritu paigunara rimaca : Bernabéra Sauloras chicanyachichi ñuca munashcara rangaj , nica , chihuaj paigunara cayashcani .

text: And when they had fasted and prayed , and laid their hands on them , they sent them away .
text2: Shinajpi sasisha , Diosta mañashca huasha , paiguna ahuai maquira churasha , cachanauca .

text: So they , being sent forth by the Holy Ghost , departed unto Seleucia ; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus .
text2: Paiguna , Santo Espíritu cachashcauna , Seleucia nishca llactama rinauca . Chimanda lamarda chimbasha , Chipre islama shamunauca .

text: And when they were at Salamis , they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews : and they had also John to their minister .
text2: Salamina nishca llactama pactamusha , Diospa shimira rimanauca judioguna tandarina huasü . Juambas yanapasha compañauca .

text: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos , they found a certain sorcerer , a false prophet , a Jew , whose name was Bar - jesus :
text2: Entero islara pasai risha Pafos llactagama , shu sagra runara tupanauca . Pai llulla shimira rimaj judio aca , paihua shuti Barjesús nishca .

text: Which was with the deputy of the country , Sergius Paulus , a prudent man ; who called for Barnabas and Saul , and desired to hear the word of God .
text2: Pai Sergio Paulo nishca atun apuhua tiauca . Cai Sergio Paulo ali iyaiyuj aca . Bernabera Sauloras cayaca , Diospa shimira uyanara munaca .

text: But Elymas the sorcerer ( for so is his name by interpretation ) withstood them , seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith .
text2: Cai Elimas nishca sagra runa , ( paihua shuti runa shimü , sagra nin ) , paigunara arcaca , apura pai quirinamanda anzhuchisha nisha .

text: Then Saul , ( who also is called Paul , ) filled with the Holy Ghost , set his eyes on him ,
text2: Shinajpi Saulo , caiga Pablomi , Santo Espíritu paita undasha , Elimas nishcara ricusha rimaca :

text: And said , O full of all subtilty and all mischief , thou child of the devil , thou enemy of all righteousness , wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
text2: Ima tucui umanahua manali ranahuas undashca angui ; supaimanda churi , ali ranara chijnisiqui , nisha . ¿ Señorba ali nambira huajlichingaj mana saquinguichu ?

text: And now , behold , the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , not seeing the sun for a season . And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness ; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand .
text2: Cunami Diospa maqui canda susiríchin . Ñausa tucungaraungui , indira unaigama mana ricungui . Shinajpi paihua ñahui llanduyasha tuta tucucami . Muyujta purisha maicandas mascaca maquimanda aisasha pushangaj .

text: Then the deputy , when he saw what was done , believed , being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord .
text2: Apu casna tucushcara ricusha quiricami , Señormanda yachachishcara manzharisha .

text: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos , they came to Perga in Pamphylia : and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem .
text2: Pablo paihua pariju ajgunandi Pafosmanda llucshinauca . Pamfilia partii tiaj Perga nishca llactama pactai rinauca . Juanga paigunamanda anzhurísha , Jerusalenma tigraca .

text: But when they departed from Perga , they came to Antioch in Pisidia , and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and sat down .
text2: Paiguna Pergamanda pasasha , Pisidia partii tiaj Antioquía nishca llactama shamunauca . Samana punzhai judioguna tandarina huasii icusha tiarinauca .

text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them , saying , Ye men and brethren , if ye have any word of exhortation for the people , say on .
text2: Ley shimira Diosmanda rimajguna shimiunaras ricushca huasha , tandarij judioguna apuuna paigunara rimanauca , nisha : Runauna , uquiuna , ima camachina shimiunaras charisha runaunara yachachingaj , rimaichi .

text: Then Paul stood up , and beckoning with his hand said , Men of Israel , and ye that fear God , give audience .
text2: Shinajpi Pablo atarisha , maquihua chunlla tucungaj ricuchisha , nica : Runauna , Israelguna , Diosta manzhajgunas , uyaichi :

text: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers , and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt , and with an high arm brought he them out of it .
text2: Cai Israel runauna Dios ñucanchi yayaunara ajllaca , paigunara ahuayachica . Paiguna Egipto llactai shu partimanda shamujguna ajpi , shinzhi maquihua paigunara chimanda llucchicami .

text: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness .
text2: Chuscu chunga huata tupura chaquishca allpa partii paiguna causanara ahuantaca .

text: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan , he divided their land to them by lot .
text2: Canzhis llactaunara tuiasha , Canaan nishca partii , chi runauna allpara paigunama cucami .

text: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years , until Samuel the prophet .
text2: Chimanda huasha , chuscu patsaj pichca chunga huata tupura , Diosmanda rimaj Samuel nishca shamunagama , taripajgunara cuca .

text: And afterward they desired a king : and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis , a man of the tribe of Benjamin , by the space of forty years .
text2: Shinajpi , rey apura cuhuai nisha mañanauca . Dios paigunara Cisba churi Saúl nishcara cuca . Pai Benjamín aillu runa aca . Chuscu chunga huatagama rey apu aca .

text: And when he had removed him , he raised up unto them David to be their king ; to whom also he gave testimony , and said , I have found David the son of Jesse , a man after mine own heart , which shall fulfil all my will .
text2: Dios paita anzhuchisha , Davidta rey apura churacami . Paimanda alira rimaca : Isai churi Davidta tupashcani , paihua shungu ñuca munashcasna , nica . Pai tucui ñuca munashcara rangami .

text: Of this man ' s seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour , Jesus :
text2: Cai David miraigunamanda , Dios pai cushca shimira pactachingaj , Jesusta atarichicami , Israelba quishpichij tucungaj .

text: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel .
text2: Jesús manara shamujllaira , Juan tucui Israel runaunama : Arrepentirisha bautisarichi , nisha camachica .

text: And as John fulfilled his course , he said , Whom think ye that I am ? I am not he . But , behold , there cometh one after me , whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose .
text2: Juan pai camachinara pactachisha casna nica : ¿ Pimi nishara iyahuanguichi ? Mana paichu ani . Astaumbas ñuca huashai shuj shamun , paihua zapatosta pascangajllas mana valijchu ani .

text: Men and brethren , children of the stock of Abraham , and whosoever among you feareth God , to you is the word of this salvation sent .
text2: Runauna , uquiuna , Abraham miraigunamanda churiuna , cangunahua tiaj Diosta manzhajgunas , cangunama cai quishpina shimira cachamushcami .

text: For they that dwell at Jerusalem , and their rulers , because they knew him not , nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day , they have fulfilled them in condemning him .
text2: Jerusalembi causajguna , paiguna apuunandi , cai Jesusta mana ricsinaucachu . Shinallara ñaupa horas Diosmanda rimajguna quillcashca shimiunara caran samana punzha ricushas , mana ricsinaucachu . Shinasha Jesusta causayachisha , paiguna cai shimiunara pactachinauca .

text: And though they found no cause of death in him , yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain .
text2: Mana imaras paihuajpi tupasha huañunara , shinajllaira Piiatora mañanauca paita huañuchingaj .

text: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him , they took him down from the tree , and laid him in a sepulchre .
text2: Tucui paimanda quillcashcaunara pactachishca huasha , cruzmanda anzhuchisha , pambana uctui churanauca .

text: But God raised him from the dead :
text2: Astaumbas Dios paita huañushcaunamanda atarichicami .

text: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem , who are his witnesses unto the people .
text2: Cai Jesús Galileamanda Jerusalenma paihua pariju shamujgunama ricurimuca ashca punzhauna . Cuna caiguna cierto ricujguna tucunaushcami tucui runaunama .

text: And we declare unto you glad tidings , how that the promise which was made unto the fathers ,
text2: Ñucanchi shinallara evangelio ali shimira cangunama cuentanchi ñucanchi yayaunama cushca shimi rimashcasna .

text: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children , in that he hath raised up Jesus again ; as it is also written in the second psalm , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee .
text2: Cai shimira Dios pactachishcami paiguna churiunamas , ñucanchimas , Jesusta causachisha . Shinami Salmos nishca cantana quillcai quillcashca tian : Ñuca churi angui , nisha , cuna punzha canda tupashcani .

text: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead , now no more to return to corruption , he said on this wise , I will give you the sure mercies of David .
text2: Imasna huañushcaunamanda atarichicami , ama imahoras ismungaj , casna nica : Davidma cusha nishca ali bendiciashcaunara cushca anguichi .

text: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm , Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Chiraigumanda shu cantanais nin : Lugarda mana cunguichu camba Santo Churi ismungaj .

text: For David , after he had served his own generation by the will of God , fell on sleep , and was laid unto his fathers , and saw corruption :
text2: Cierto pacha David paihua pariju causajgunara Dios munashca tupura sirvishca huasha huañuca ; paihua yayaunandi pambashca aca , ismuca .

text: But he , whom God raised again , saw no corruption .
text2: Randi Dios causachishca Santo Churi mana ismucachu .

text: Be it known unto you therefore , men and brethren , that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Runauna , uquiuna , yachaichi : Jesús raigumanda uchara perdonanara cangunama rimashcami .

text: And by him all that believe are justified from all things , from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses .
text2: Moisés ley nishca mandashca shimii tucui imaras mana alichihuaj asha , Jesuspi maicans quiríjta alichishca anga .

text: Beware therefore , lest that come upon you , which is spoken of in the prophets ;
text2: Ricuichi , Diosmanda rimajguna rimashca cangunama ama shamungaj , nisha :

text: Behold , ye despisers , and wonder , and perish : for I work a work in your days , a work which ye shall in no wise believe , though a man declare it unto you .
text2: Ricuichi , pishiyachijguna , manzharichi , huañuichi . Canguna causaushcai shu ranara rauni , maican rimajpis mana quiringuichima .

text: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue , the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath .
text2: Paiguna judioguna tandarina huasimanda llucshijpi , gentilguna ruganauca shamuj samana punzhai cai shimiunara cuti rimanguíchi , nisha .

text: Now when the congregation was broken up , many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas : who , speaking to them , persuaded them to continue in the grace of God .
text2: Tandarimuj runaunara cachashca huasha , ashca judioguna paiguna yachaira ali catimujgunandi Pablora Bernaberas catinauca . Paigunama shamujgunara camachinauca Diospa gracia ali iyaibi quirisha tianauchu .

text: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God .
text2: Shu samana punzha pactamujpiga , ñacalla entero llacta Diospa shimira uyangaj tandarimunauca .

text: But when the Jews saw the multitudes , they were filled with envy , and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul , contradicting and blaspheming .
text2: Judioguna , ashca runauna tandarishcara ricusha , mana munasha piñarinauca . Pablo rimashcara arcanauca , Mana ciertochu , nisha , shinallara paita caminauca .

text: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold , and said , It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you : but seeing ye put it from you , and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life , lo , we turn to the Gentiles .
text2: Shinajpi Pablo Bernabendi mana manzhasha rimanauca : Cierto ministiricami , nisha , Diospa shimira ñaupa cangunama rimangaj ; astaumbas canguna mana munasha ichucanguichi ; huiñai causaira apingaj mana valijchu anchi nisha iyacanguichi . Chiraigumanda gentílgunama rinchi .

text: For so hath the Lord commanded us , saying , I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles , that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth .
text2: Chasnami Dios ñucanchira mandaca nisha : Gentilgunahuaj canda vela cuenta rashcanimi runaunara quishpichingaj cai pachai puchucai pundagama .

text: And when the Gentiles heard this , they were glad , and glorified the word of the Lord : and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed .
text2: Gentilguna caita uyasha cushiyanauca , Diospa shimira alabanauca . Tucui ahua pachama riña ajguna quirinauca .

text: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region .
text2: Diospa shimi tucui chi parti llactaunai uyarica .

text: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women , and the chief men of the city , and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas , and expelled them out of their coasts .
text2: Judioguna ali huarmiunara charij huarmiunandi llacta apuunandi camachinauca Pablora Bernaberas tormendachingajt Paigunara chi llactamanda ichunauca .

text: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them , and came unto Iconium .
text2: Paiguna chaquii llutarij allpara chaquimanda paigunama chausisha , Iconio nishca llactama rinauca .

text: And the disciples were filled with joy , and with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Quirijgunaga cushihua Santo Espirituhuas undashca anauca .

text: And it came to pass in Iconium , that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews , and so spake , that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed .
text2: Iconio llactai , Pablo Bernabendi judioguna tandarina huasii pariju icunauca . Casnami rimanauca ashca judioguna ashca griegounas quirinauca .

text: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles , and made their minds evil affected against the brethren .
text2: Astaun , mana quirij judioguna gentilgunara turbachinauca uquiunara tormendachingaj .

text: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord , which gave testimony unto the word of his grace , and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands .
text2: Shinajpis chi llactai unaira tianauca , mana manzhasha rimasha , Señorbi quirinai samausha . Señor paiguna rimashca ali shimiunara cierto ajta ricuchisha , paiguna maquihua gusto ricurinaunaras munanaita rashcaunaras rarcami .

text: But the multitude of the city was divided : and part held with the Jews , and part with the apostles .
text2: Chi llactai tiaj runauna ishqui montombi chaupirinauca , shu parti judiogunahua , shu parti cachashca runaunahua .

text: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles , and also of the Jews with their rulers , to use them despitefully , and to stone them ,
text2: Judioguna gentilgunandi paiguna apuunahua pariju paigunara camingaj , rumihua shitangaj shamunauca .

text: They were ware of it , and fled unto Lystra and Derbe , cities of Lycaonia , and unto the region that lieth round about :
text2: Paiguna riparasha miticunauca Listra Derbe nishca Licaonia parti llactaunama . Chi mayan llactaunais purinauca .

text: And there they preached the gospel .
text2: Chihui evangelio ali shimira camachinauca .

text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra , impotent in his feet , being a cripple from his mother ' s womb , who never had walked :
text2: Shu Listra llactamanda runa paihua mama icsamanda pacha anga chaqui llucshij tiauca ; imahoraspas mana puricachu .

text: The same heard Paul speak : who stedfastly beholding him , and perceiving that he had faith to be healed ,
text2: Cai runa Pablo rimashcara uyaca . Pablo paita ricusha , pai aliyangaj quirinara ricusha ,

text: Said with a loud voice , Stand upright on thy feet . And he leaped and walked .
text2: shinzhira rimaca : Dirichulla atari camba chaquii . Runa saltasha purica .

text: And when the people saw what Paul had done , they lifted up their voices , saying in the speech of Lycaonia , The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men .
text2: Shinajpi runauna Pablo rashcara ricusha , Licaonia shimihua caparinauca : Runasna ricurij diosguna ñucanchima irgumunaushcami , nisha .

text: And they called Barnabas , Jupiter ; and Paul , Mercurius , because he was the chief speaker .
text2: Bernabera Júpiter nishca shutichinauca . Pablora , shimira yapa rimaj ajpi , Mercurio nishca shutichinauca .

text: Then the priest of Jupiter , which was before their city , brought oxen and garlands unto the gates , and would have done sacrifice with the people .
text2: Jupiterba sacerdote , paihua diosta alabana huasi llacta ñaupajpi tiajpi , punguuna ñaupajma huagraunara sisaunaras apamuca sacrificiora rangaj , paindi runaunandi .

text: Which when the apostles , Barnabas and Paul , heard of , they rent their clothes , and ran in among the people , crying out ,
text2: Cachashca runauna Bernabé Pablondi caita uyasha , paiguna churanara lliquisha , runa monton chaupi shunguma caparisha callpanauca :

text: And saying , Sirs , why do ye these things ? We also are men of like passions with you , and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God , which made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all things that are therein :
text2: Runauna , nisha , ¿ imamanda casna ranguichi ? Nucanchis runallara anchi canguna cuentallara . Cangunara rimanchi cai mana valij samiunaras saquingaj , causaj Diosta quirinauchu . Pai ahua pachara cai pacharas lamarda paigunajpi tucui tiajgunandi rarca .

text: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways .
text2: Pai ñaupa horasgunai tucui runaunara saquishcami paiguna quiquin ñambiunai purrngaj .

text: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness , in that he did good , and gave us rain from heaven , and fruitful seasons , filling our hearts with food and gladness .
text2: Shina rasha Dios paulara shimi illajta mana saquicachu , alira rasha , tamiaunara ahuamanda cachamusha , muyuuna aparina horasgunara cusha , ñucanchira carasha , ñucanchi corazonda cushiyachisha .

text: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people , that they had not done sacrifice unto them .
text2: Cai shimiunara rimasha , ansalla uyachinauca runauna paigunama sacrificiora ama rangaj .

text: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium , who persuaded the people , and , having stoned Paul , drew him out of the city , supposing he had been dead .
text2: Shinajpi judioguna Antioquiamandas Iconiomandas shamunauca , runaunara uyachinauca . Pablora rumihua shitasha , llacta ucumanda pajllama aisasha ichunauca , huañushcami nisha iyasha .

text: Howbeit , as the disciples stood round about him , he rose up , and came into the city : and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe .
text2: Astaun quirijguna paihua muyujta shayanauca . Pai atarisha llactai icuca . Cayandi punzha Bernabehua llucshisha , Derbe llactama rica .

text: And when they had preached the gospel to that city , and had taught many , they returned again to Lystra , and to Iconium , and Antioch ,
text2: Chi llactai evangelio ali shimira rimanauca . Ashca runauna quirijpi , paigunara yachachinauca . Chimanda Listra , Iconio , Antioquía llactaunama tigranauca .

text: Confirming the souls of the disciples , and exhorting them to continue in the faith , and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Quirijgunara cariyachinauca paiguna almai . Camachisha ninauca : Canguna quirinaí ama sambayanguichi . Ashca tormendarinah . ua mimstirin ñucanchi Dios mandana pachai icungaj .

text: And when they had ordained them elders in every church , and had prayed with fasting , they commended them to the Lord , on whom they believed .
text2: Caran iglesiai ricuj rucuunara ajllanauca . Sasisha Diosta mañanauca , paigunara paiguna quirishca Señorba maquii saquisha .

text: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia , they came to Pamphylia .
text2: Pisidia partira pasasha , Pamfilia partima shamunauca .

text: And when they had preached the word in Perga , they went down into Attalia :
text2: Perga nishca llactai , Diospa shimira rimashca huasha , Atalia nishca llactama uraira rinauca .

text: And thence sailed to Antioch , from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled .
text2: Chimanda lamarda chimbanauca Antioquíama . Chi llactamanda ñaupa punda Diospa gracia ali iyaibi saquishca anauca . Cunaga , paiguna rashcaunara tucuchishca huasha tigramunauca .

text: And when they were come , and had gathered the church together , they rehearsed all that God had done with them , and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles .
text2: Paiguna pactai risha , quirijgunara tandachisha , cuentanauca ima atun ranaunara Dios paigunahua rarca , imasnara gentUgunama quiringaj pungura pascashca aca .

text: And there they abode long time with the disciples .
text2: Chihui unaira saquirinauca quirijgunahua .

text: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren , and said , Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses , ye cannot be saved .
text2: Shinajpi huaquin Judeamanda shamujguna uquiunara yachachinauca , nisha : Canguna circuncisionda mana rasha Moisés cushcasna , quishpinara mana ushanguichichu .

text: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them , they determined that Paul and Barnabas , and certain other of them , should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question .
text2: Pablo Bernabendi shamujgunahua piñanausha rimananauca . Shinajpi Pablo Bernabendi huaquin quirijgunandi Jerusalenma rinara iyarinauca , chihui tiaj cachashca runaunahua ricuj rucuunahuas cai rimashcara cuentangaj .

text: And being brought on their way by the church , they passed through Phenice and Samaria , declaring the conversion of the Gentiles : and they caused great joy unto all the brethren .
text2: Paiguna iglesiamanda quirijguna compañai tucusha , Fenecia Samaria llactaunara pasanauca , gentilguna quirishcara cuentasha . Tucui uquiuna cushiyanauca .

text: And when they were come to Jerusalem , they were received of the church , and of the apostles and elders , and they declared all things that God had done with them .
text2: Jerusalenma pactajpi , quirijguna cachashca runaunas ricuj rucuunas paigunara apinauca . Dios tucui paigunahua rashcaunara cuentanauca .

text: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees which believed , saying , That it was needful to circumcise them , and to command them to keep the law of Moses .
text2: Huaquin quirij fariseoguna rimasha atarinauca , Circuncisionda rana anga , nisha . Shinallara Moisés ley nishca mandashca shimiunara pactachina anga .

text: And the apostles and elders came together for to consider of this matter .
text2: Cachashca runauna ricuj rucuunandi tandarinauca cai shimira yachangaj .

text: And when there had been much disputing , Peter rose up , and said unto them , Men and brethren , ye know how that a good while ago God made choice among us , that the Gentiles by my mouth should hear the word of the gospel , and believe .
text2: Unai cuentanaushca huasha , Pedro atarisha paigunara rimaca : Runauna , uquiuna , nisha , canguna ali yachanguichi imasnara unai Dios ñucara ajllaca gentilguna ñuca shimimanda Diospa evangelio ali shimira uyanauchu , quirinauchu .

text: And God , which knoweth the hearts , bare them witness , giving them the Holy Ghost , even as he did unto us ;
text2: Corazongunara ricuj Dios , paiguna quirishcara ricsisha , Santo Espiritura paigunama cuca , ñucanchima cushcasna .

text: And put no difference between us and them , purifying their hearts by faith .
text2: Ñucanchimanda gentilgunara mana chicanyachicachu , quirishcamanda paiguna shungura pichasha .

text: Now therefore why tempt ye God , to put a yoke upon the neck of the disciples , which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear ?
text2: Cunaga ¿ imamanda Diosta tentanguichi , quirijgunara tormendosta apachisha , ñucanchi yayauna ñucanchindi mana ushashcara apachisha nisha ?

text: But we believe that through the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ we shall be saved , even as they .
text2: Astaumbas Señor Jesuspa gracia ali iyaimanda , ñucanchi paigunasna quishpishun .

text: Then all the multitude kept silence , and gave audience to Barnabas and Paul , declaring what miracles and wonders God had wrought among the Gentiles by them .
text2: Shinajpi tucui tandarijguna chunllayasha uyanauca . Bernabé Pablondi cuentanauca imasna gentilguna llactaunai Dios paiguna maquimanda gusto ricurinaunaras munanaita rashcaunaras rarca .

text: And after they had held their peace , James answered , saying , Men and brethren , hearken unto me :
text2: Paiguna rimai pasajpi , Jacobo cutipaca , nisha : Runauna , uquiuna , uyahuaichi .

text: Simeon hath declared how God at the first did visit the Gentiles , to take out of them a people for his name .
text2: Simón cuentaca imasna Dios gentilgunara ñaupa bendiciaca , paigunamanda runaunara ajllasha paihua shutira alabangaj .

text: And to this agree the words of the prophets ; as it is written ,
text2: Casnami rimanauca Diosmanda rimajguna , paiguna quillcashcasna :

text: After this I will return , and will build again the tabernacle of David , which is fallen down ; and I will build again the ruins thereof , and I will set it up :
text2: Caigunamanda huasha ñuca tigramusha ; Davidpa huasira urmashca ajta cuti shayachisha . Tularishcaunara alichishami ; cutillara sicachishami ,

text: That the residue of men might seek after the Lord , and all the Gentiles , upon whom my name is called , saith the Lord , who doeth all these things .
text2: tucui puchuj runauna Diosta mascanauchu ; tucui gentilgunandi , maicambas ñuca shutihua shutichishcauna .

text: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world .
text2: Casnami Señor nin ; cai tucuira yachachishcami callari horasmanda pacha .

text: Wherefore my sentence is , that we trouble not them , which from among the Gentiles are turned to God :
text2: Chiraigumanda casna iyauni , gentilgunamanda Diosta quirijgunara ama turbachingaj .

text: But that we write unto them , that they abstain from pollutions of idols , and from fornication , and from things strangled , and from blood .
text2: Astaumbas quillcashunchi : Idolo nishca runa rashca diosgunamanda anzhurinauchu , shujhua tacarinamandas ; shinallara yahuaryuj aicharas , yahuardas ama micunauchu .

text: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him , being read in the synagogues every sabbath day .
text2: Ñaupa horasmanda , Moisés pai camachishca shimira rimajgunara caran llactai charin judioguna tandarina huasiunai , chihui caran samana punzha pai rimashcara ricusha rimanaun .

text: Then pleased it the apostles and elders , with the whole church , to send chosen men of their own company to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas ; namely , Judas surnamed Barsabas , and Silas , chief men among the brethren :
text2: Shinajpi cachashca runauna , ricuj rucuuna , tucui tandarishca quirijgunandi alimi ninauca paigunamanda huaquin runaunara ajllangaj , Pablohua Bernabehuas Antioquíama cachangaj . Judas Barsabás nishcara Silas nishcandi ajllanauca , uquiunamanda atunguna asha .

text: And they wrote letters by them after this manner ; The apostles and elders and brethren send greeting unto the brethren which are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia :
text2: Casna nisha quillcashun , paigunahua cachangaj : Señor cachashca runauna , ricuj rucuunandi , uquiunandi , gentilgunamanda uquiunara saluranchi , Antioquía , Siria , Cilicia nishca partiunai tiajgunara .

text: Forasmuch as we have heard , that certain which went out from us have troubled you with words , subverting your souls , saying , Ye must be circumcised , and keep the law : to whom we gave no such commandment :
text2: Uyashcanchi imasna huaquin ñucanchimanda llucshijguna cangunara tormendachinaushca , canguna almara llaquichisha : Circuncisionda rana anguichi , nisha , ley shimira huacachingajpas . Ñucanchi casna rimajgunara mana cachacanchichu .

text: It seemed good unto us , being assembled with one accord , to send chosen men unto you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul ,
text2: Ñucanchi tucui shu iyarishcallai pactasha , iyaríshcanchi runaunara ajllangaj cangunama cachangaj , ñucanchi llaquishca Bernabehuas Pablohuas compañangaj .

text: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Cai runauna paiguna causaira churanaushcami Señor Jesucristo shutira llaquishcamanda .

text: We have sent therefore Judas and Silas , who shall also tell you the same things by mouth .
text2: Shinajpi Judastas Silastas cachanchi , paiguna shimimanda cai shimiunara rimasha cangunara uyachinaungami .

text: For it seemed good to the Holy Ghost , and to us , to lay upon you no greater burden than these necessary things ;
text2: Alimi yachin Santo Espirituma ñucanchimas cangunara ama mas mandangaj . Cai mandashcaunallara ministirin :

text: That ye abstain from meats offered to idols , and from blood , and from things strangled , and from fornication : from which if ye keep yourselves , ye shall do well . Fare ye well .
text2: Runa rashca diosgunama sacrificioi ricuchishca aichara ama micuichi . Yahuardas , yahuaryuj aicharas ama micuichi . Shujhua tacarinaras saquinguichi . Caigunara pactachisha , alimi anguichi . Ali pasanguichi .

text: So when they were dismissed , they came to Antioch : and when they had gathered the multitude together , they delivered the epistle :
text2: Shinajpi paiguna cacharishca asha , Antioquíama rinauca . Tucui quirijgunara tandachisha quillcara cunauca .

text: Which when they had read , they rejoiced for the consolation .
text2: Paiguna caita ricusha cushiyanauca , quillcashcamanda .

text: And Judas and Silas , being prophets also themselves , exhorted the brethren with many words , and confirmed them .
text2: Judas Silasndi shinallara Diosmanda rimajguna asha , uquiunara cariyachinauca , shinzhiyachinauca , ashca shimiunara rimasha .

text: And after they had tarried there a space , they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles .
text2: Chihui unai tiashca huasha , uquiunamanda cushihua dispirisha paigunara cachajgunama tigranauca .

text: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still .
text2: Astaun Süas chihui saquirinara alimi iyarica .

text: Paul also and Barnabas continued in Antioch , teaching and preaching the word of the Lord , with many others also .
text2: Pablo Bernabehua Antioquía llactai tianauca , Señorba shimira yachachisha . Shujgunandi evangelio ali shimira camachinauca .

text: And some days after Paul said unto Barnabas , Let us go again and visit our brethren in every city where we have preached the word of the Lord , and see how they do .
text2: Ansa punzha pasashca huasha , Pablo Bernabera nica : Acu , ricui rishun uquiunara tucui ñucanchi Diospa shimira camachisha pasamushca llactaunai , paiguna imasna ashcara yachangaj .

text: And Barnabas determined to take with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Juanda , paiguna Marcos nishcara , Bernabé paihua pariju pushanara munaca .

text: But Paul thought not good to take him with them , who departed from them from Pamphylia , and went not with them to the work .
text2: Astaun Pablo Marcosda paihua pushanara mana munacachu , Marcos paigunamanda Pamfilia llactai anzhurishcamanda , Diosta sirvinama mana catishcamanda .

text: And the contention was so sharp between them , that they departed asunder one from the other : and so Barnabas took Mark , and sailed unto Cyprus ;
text2: Paigunapura mana ali tucusha , paigunapuramanda anzhurinauca . Bernabé Marcosda pushasha , Chipre islama chimbaca .

text: And Paul chose Silas , and departed , being recommended by the brethren unto the grace of God .
text2: Pablo Silasta ajllasha llucshisha rica , uquiuna paita Señorba gracia ali iyaibi saquisha .

text: And he went through Syria and Cilicia , confirming the churches .
text2: Siria Cilicia partiunai purinauca iglesiaunara cariyachisha .

text: Then came he to Derbe and Lystra : and , behold , a certain disciple was there , named Timotheus , the son of a certain woman , which was a Jewess , and believed ; but his father was a Greek :
text2: Chimanda huasha , Derbe Listra llactaunama pactamunauca . Chihui shu Timoteo nishca quirij runa tiauca , paihua mama quirij judio huarmi , paihua yaya griego nishca runami .

text: Which was well reported of by the brethren that were at Lystra and Iconium .
text2: Cai Timoteomanda Listra Iconio llactaunai tiaj uquiuna alira rimanauca .

text: Him would Paul have to go forth with him ; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters : for they knew all that his father was a Greek .
text2: Caita Pablo munaca paihua pariju ringaj . Chi partii tiaj judioguna ama tormendachinauchu , paita circuncisionda rarca . Paihua yaya griego ajta tucui runauna yachanauca .

text: And as they went through the cities , they delivered them the decrees for to keep , that were ordained of the apostles and elders which were at Jerusalem .
text2: Llactaunara pasausha mandashcaunara huacachingaj rimanauca , imasna cachashca runauna rucuunandi Jerusalembi rimashcara .

text: And so were the churches established in the faith , and increased in number daily .
text2: Shinasha iglesiauna cariyachishca anauca paiguna quiriushcai . Caran punzha yaparinauca .

text: Now when they had gone throughout Phrygia and the region of Galatia , and were forbidden of the Holy Ghost to preach the word in Asia ,
text2: Frigia nishca , Galacia nishca partiunara pasasha , Santo Espíritu : Ama rimaichi Asia nishca partii , nisha rimaca .

text: After they were come to Mysia , they assayed to go into Bithynia : but the Spirit suffered them not .
text2: Misia nishca partima pactamujpi , Bitinia nishca partima risha iyarinauca , astaumbas Espíritu mana lugarda cucachu .

text: And they passing by Mysia came down to Troas .
text2: Misia nishca partira pasasha , Troas nishca llactama irgunauca .

text: And a vision appeared to Paul in the night ; There stood a man of Macedonia , and prayed him , saying , Come over into Macedonia , and help us .
text2: Pablo tuta nuspaibi casna ricuca : shu Macedonia partimanda runa paihua ñaupajpi shayarisha paita nica : Macedoniama shami , yanapahuai , nisha ñucanchira rugaca .

text: And after he had seen the vision , immediately we endeavored to go into Macedonia , assuredly gathering that the Lord had called us for to preach the gospel unto them .
text2: Tuta nuspaibi ricushca huasha , chi ratollaira Macedoniama rinara iyaricanchi . Cierto pacha Dios cayanmi nisha iyacanchí , chihui evangelio ali shimira yachachingaj .

text: Therefore loosing from Troas , we came with a straight course to Samothracia , and the next day to Neapolis ;
text2: Troasmanda risha , pitijta shamucanchi Samotracia nishca islama . Cayandi punzha Neápolis llactama pactamucanchi .

text: And from thence to Philippi , which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia , and a colony : and we were in that city abiding certain days .
text2: Chimanda Filipos llactama shamucanchi , Macedonia parti gobierno llacta aca . Chi Filipos shu colonia nishca llacta aca . Chi llactaiga unailla tiacanchi .

text: And on the sabbath we went out of the city by a river side , where prayer was wont to be made ; and we sat down , and spake unto the women which resorted thither .
text2: Shu samana punzhai llacta pungumanda llucshisha , yacu mayambi Diosta mañana pambama ricanchi . Tiarisha chihui tandarimuj huarmiunara rimacanchi .

text: And a certain woman named Lydia , a seller of purple , of the city of Thyatira , which worshipped God , heard us : whose heart the Lord opened , that she attended unto the things which were spoken of Paul .
text2: Shinajpi shu Lidia nishca huarmi , Tiatira llactamanda puca llachapara catuj , Diosta adoraj asha , uyauca . Dios paihua shungura pascaca , Pablo rimashcara ali intindingaj .

text: And when she was baptized , and her household , she besought us , saying , If ye have judged me to be faithful to the Lord , come into my house , and abide there . And she constrained us .
text2: Pai bautisarishca huasha paihua aillundi , ñucanchira rugaca , casna nisha : Canguna ñucara Señorbi ali quirijmi nisha iyasha , ñuca huasii icuichi , samaichi . Ñucanchira ashcara rugacami tiangaj .

text: And it came to pass , as we went to prayer , a certain damsel possessed with a spirit of divination met us , which brought her masters much gain by soothsaying :
text2: Ñucanchi Diosta mañangaj riushcai , shu malta huarmi tupaj shamuca , shu supai apishca yachaj huarmi . Paihua patrongunama ashcara ganachica pai rimashcaunamanda .

text: The same followed Paul and us , and cried , saying , These men are the servants of the most high God , which shew unto us the way of salvation .
text2: Cai huarmi Pabloras ñucanchiras caticami , caparisha : Cai runauna ahua pacha Diosta sirvijgunami , nica , quishpina nambira yachachinaun .

text: And this did she many days . But Paul , being grieved , turned and said to the spirit , I command thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her . And he came out the same hour .
text2: Shina rarca ashca punzhagama . Astaun Pablo , mana munasha , voltiarisha , supaira rimaca : Jesucristo shutii canda nini , llucshi cai huarmimanda . Chi ratollai llucshica .

text: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone , they caught Paul and Silas , and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers ,
text2: Paihua patrongunaga ganachij supai llucshishcara ricusha , Pabloras Silasdas apinauca , pulasama apuuna ñaupajma pushanauca .

text: And brought them to the magistrates , saying , These men , being Jews , do exceedingly trouble our city ,
text2: Patronguna cai runaunara apuunama ricuchinauca : Cai runauna judioguna ashallara entero llactara nuspachinaun , ninauca .

text: And teach customs , which are not lawful for us to receive , neither to observe , being Romans .
text2: Paiguna yachachishcara mana uyanachu mana ranachu , ñucanchiga Romano nishca runauna asha .

text: And the multitude rose up together against them : and the magistrates rent off their clothes , and commanded to beat them .
text2: Llactai tiaj runauna gun tandarinauca . Apuuna paiguna churanara lliquinauca . Pablounara caspiunahua livachingaj mandanauca .

text: And when they had laid many stripes upon them , they cast them into prison , charging the jailor to keep them safely :
text2: Paigunara ashcara livachishca huasha chonda cularbi ishcanauca , chonda cularda cuiraj ali ricuchu nisha .

text: Who , having received such a charge , thrust them into the inner prison , and made their feet fast in the stocks .
text2: Pai cai mandashcara uyasha , paigunara huasha tapa ucuma ishcaca . Paiguna chaquiunara sepoi apichica .

text: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed , and sang praises unto God : and the prisoners heard them .
text2: Chaupi tutai Pablo Silasndi Diosta mañanauca shinallara cantanauca . Paigunahua pariju ishcashca runaunas uyanaucami .

text: And suddenly there was a great earthquake , so that the foundations of the prison were shaken : and immediately all the doors were opened , and every one ' s bands were loosed .
