text2: Cristo huañushca ashaga , uchamanda huañuca shu cutilla , astaun pai cuna causaushca causana Diospajta causaun .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Shinallara canguna cierto pacha ucharangaj huañushca mani nisha iyaichi , astaun Diospajta causajguna , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristoi .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Ucharana ama mandachu canguna huañunalla aichai , pai manali munashcaunara uyangaj .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Shinallara canguna aicha partiunara uchara rangaj ama cuichichu ; astaun cangunallara Diosma cuichi , huañushcaunamanda causajguna cuenta , canguna aicha partiunara shinallara Diosma cuichi aliranara rangaj .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Uchaga cangunara mana mandangachu , canguna mana ley shimi mandashcai tiaunguichichu , astaumbas gracia nishca yangamanda llaquishcai .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Shinajpi , ¿ imarai ? ¿ Uchara rashunzhu ñucanchi mana ley ucui tiausha , astaun gracia nishcai ? Mana pacha .

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu yachanguichi imasna punas canguna aichara cunguichi paita uyangaj , paihua sirvijguna tucunguichi , canguna paita uyasha , uchara sirvijguna asha huañungaj , casujguna asha aliuna tucungaj ?

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Shinashas Diosta agrasinchi imasna canguna ñaupa horas uchara sirvijguna acanguichi , cunaga shungumanda cai yachana samira uyashcanguichi , cai yachanama entregashca acanguichi catingaj .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Canguna uchamanda llushpichishca asha , ali ranara sirvijguna tucushcanguichimi .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Runasna rimauni , canguna aicha irqui sami ashcaraigu . Imasna ñaupa canguna aichara cucanguichi irus ranara manali ranaras sirvisha irus tucungaj , shinallara cuna canguna aichara cuichi ali ranara sirvingaj , canguna chuyaj tucungaj .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Shinajpi canguna ucharanara sirvina horaspi , ali ranamanda liuriuna acanguichi .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: ¿ Imara pallacanguichi chi tupui causashcamanda , canguna chigunamanda cuna pingarisha ? Casna ranauna huañuibi tucurinaun .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Cuna horasga , ucharanamanda llushpichishca asha , Diosta sirvijguna tucusha , canguna chuyajguna tucunguichi , puchucaibi huiñai causaira charinguichi .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Uchamanda pagana huañuimi , randi Dios yangamanda cuyashcaga huiñai causaimi , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristoi .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Manzhu yachanguichi , uquiuna , imasna ley camachishca shimi runara mandan tucui pai causana punzhaunai ? Ley shimira yachajgunama quillcauni .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Cariyuj huarmiga carira uyana anga pai causaushca horaspi , ley mandashcamanda . Astaumbas cari huañujpi , huarmi llushpirishca anga cari mandanamanda .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Shinasha , cari causaupi , huarmi shu carihua llutarijpi , shujhua tacarij nishca anga , astaumbas cari huañujpi , huarmi chi leymanda llushpirishcami , mana shujhua tacarij anga shu carihua llutarijpi .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Shinallara canguna , ñuca uquiuna , huañushca anguichi ley ñaupajpi , Cristo aichai huañushcaraigu , canguna shujpa tucungaj , huañushcaunamanda atarijpa , ñucanchi Diospajta aparishca muyura cuenta apar ingaj .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Ñucanchi aichai causaushcai , leymanda ucha munai ñucanchi aichai tarabasha , huañuira apachica .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Cunaga , leymanda llushpichishca anchi , ñucanchira mandaj

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Shinajpi , ¿ imara nishun ? ¿ leyga uchachu ? Mana pacha . Astaumbas ley illajpi ñuca uchara mana yachaimacani . Shinallara shujpajta munanara mana yachaimacani ley mana nishca ajpi : Ama shujpajta munaichu .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Uchaga , leymanda valirisha , tucui shujpajta munanaras icuchica ñuca shungüi . Ley illajpiga , ucha huañushcami .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Shinashas , ñuca ñaupa horas leyra mana riparasha causaucani , astaumbas ley camachishca shimi shamujpi , ucha causarica , ñuca huañucani .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Shinajpi caita taricani : Camachishca shimi causaira cungaj iyashca asha , ñucara huañuchica .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Uchaga , camachishcaunamanda valirisha , ñucara umaca , camachishcaunamandas ñucara huañuchica .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Shinajpi ley shimi cierto pacha chuyajmi , shinallara camachishca shimi chuyajmi , alimi , valijmi .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: ¿ Leyga , ali ashallara huañuna tucucachu ñucahua ? Mana pacha . Astaun uchaga , pai irus ajta ricuchingaj , ley ali ashallara ñucajta huañunara rarca . Chasna maca camachishcaunamanda ucha irus tupu yapajta irus ajta ricuchica .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Yachanchi imasna ley espirituma riman , ñucaga aichalla mani , ucha ranama catushca .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Ñuca rashcara mana intindinichu , ñuca munashcaraga mana raunichu ; astaun ñuca chijnishcara , chita rauni .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Ñucaga ñuca mana munashcara rausha ley ali ashcara ricsini .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Shinajpi , mana ñucachu chita rauni , astaun ñuca aichai tiaj ^ ucha chita raun .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Ñuca yachani imasna ñucajpi , ñuca aichai , ali rana mana tianzhu . Ñuca ali rana munaira charini , astaumbas alira rangaj mana pactanichu .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Ñucaga , ñuca munashca alira mana raunichu , astaun ñuca mana munashca manalira , chillara rauni .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Ñucaga , ñuca mana munashcara rasha , mana ñucachu rauni , astaumbas ñuca aichai tiaj ucha , chita raunmi .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Shinajpi , ñuca alira rasha nisha , cai ley shimira tupauni : Manalirana ñucajpi tian .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Ñuca shungu ucui , Diospa ley shimii cushiyauni .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Shinajpi , shu ley shimira ricuni ñuca aicha partiunai , caiga ñuca iyaibi tiaj ley shimihua macanun , ñucara apisha nin , ñuca aicha partiunai tiaj ucharana leyra rangaj .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: ¡ Pogri runami ani ! ¿ Pita ñucara cai huañuna aichamanda llushpichihuangachu ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Diosta agrasini , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristomanda . Shina tucunmi : ñuca iyaibi Diospa leyra sirvini , astaumbas ñuca aichai ucharana leyra sirvini .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Cunaga , Cristo Jesuspi tiajguna ima causaras mana charinaunzhu , mana aicha munaira catisha astaun Espiritura .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Espíritu mandashca ley , Cristo Jesuspi causaira cusha , ñucara llushpichihuaca ucharana leymandas huañuna leymandas .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Ley shimi mana ushashcara , irqui tucujpi aicha mana valishcamanda , Dios chita rarca , paihua Churira cachasha uchayuj aicha samii , ucha raigumanda . Shina rasha Dios uchara causayachica aichai .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Dios chita rarca , ñucanchi Espíritu munashcai purijguna asha , mana aicha munashcai , ñucanchi ley shimii alira camachishcara pactachingaj .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Aicha munaira catijguna aicha munaira iyanaun , randi Espíritu munaira catijguna Espíritu munaira iyanaun .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Aicha munaira iyana huañuimi , randi Espíritu munaira iyana causaimi , cushi shungumi .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Aicha munaira iyana Diosta chijnin , Dios camachishca shimira mana uyan , mana ushan .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Shinasha aicha munaibi causajguna Diosta cushiyachinara mana ushanaun .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Cangunaga mana aicha munaibi causaunguichichu , astaumbas Espíritu munaibi , Diospa Espíritu canguna ucui causaupi . Maicans Cristo Espiritura mana charisha , mana paihuajmandachu .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Astaun Cristo cangunajpi tiaupi , aicha cierto pacha huañushcami ucharaigu , randi espíritu causaun ali ashcaraigu .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Jesusta huañushcaunamanda causachij Espíritu canguna ucui causausha , Cristo Jesusta huañushcaunamanda causachij Dios shinallara canguna huañunalla aichara causachingami paihua Espiritumanda , pai canguna ucui tiaupi .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Shinajpi , uquiuna , mana dibiyujchu anchi aichama , aicha munaibi causangaj .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Canguna aicha munaibi causausha huañunguichimi , astaumbas Espiritumanda aicha ranaunara huañuchisha , causaunguichimi .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Tucui Diospa Espíritu pushashcauna , caigunami Diospa churiuna anaun .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Canguna esclavo cuenta sirvina iyaira mana apicanguichi cuti manzhaihua tiangaj , astaun churi cuenta apiña iyaira , Abba , Yaya , nisha caparingaj .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Quiquin Espiritullara ñucanchi espiritui riman imasna ñucanchi Diospa churiuna manchi .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Ñucanchi churiuna ashaga , shinallara herederos nishca apijguna anchi , Diosmanda cushcara apijguna ; Cristohua pariju apijguna anchi , ñucanchi paihua pariju tormendachishca ajpi , paihua pariju sumacyachishca angaj .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Caita cierto pacha yachani : ñucanchi cuna horas tormendarishca mana imaschu , astaun ñucanchi huasha horas ricurij sumacyachishca ashcami valin .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Munai munaihua tucui Dios rashcauna Diospa churiuna ricurimunara chapanaun .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Tucui Dios rashcaunaga mana valij tucunauca , mana paiguna munaimanda astaun casna raj Diospa munaimanda , pai chapanahua shina rasha .

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Tucui Dios rashcaunara shinallara ismunamanda llushpichishca anaunga ama chita sirvingaj , Diospa churiuna gusto sumaj Hurí tucushcai icungaj .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Yachanchi imasna shu huarmi huahuahua nanachijpi , shinallara tucui Dios rashcauna pariju nanachinaun cunagama .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Mana chigunalla , astaun ñucanchis , Espiritura charijguna , ñaupa punda aparishca cuenta , shinallara shungu ucui , huacanchi ; Dios ñucanchira churiunasna apingaraushcara chapaunchi , caimi ñucanchi aichara cuti randina .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Chapausha quishpichi tucucanchi , astaun ima ricurijtas mana chapanallachu . ¿ Ricuríjtaga imarasha chapana ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Randi , ñucanchi mana ricurijta chapausha , ahuantasha chapaunchimi .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Shinallara Espíritu ñucanchi irqui ajta yanapaun , imasna ñucanchi ministishcara mañangaj mana ali yachanchichu , astaun quiquin Espíritu ñucanchimanda mañaun , mana rimaihuaj shimihua rugasha .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Astaumbas , shungura ricuj Dios Espíritu munashcara yachan . Espirituga quirijgunamanda mañaun , Dios munashcasna .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Yachanchi imasna Diosta llaquijgunama tucui pariju yanaparín ali tucungaj , pai munashcamanda cayashcaunama .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Pai ñaupamanda ricsishca runaunara ajllaca , paihua Churisna ricurijguna tucungaj , Churiga ashca uquiunamanda ñaupa punda pagarij tucungaj .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Ajllashcaunara shinallara cayaca , cayashcaunara alichica , alíchishcaunara shinallara sumacyachica .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: ¿ Caimandaga , imara nishun ? Dios ñucanchihua tiajpi ¿ pita ñucanchihua contra tucungai ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Dios paihua quiquin Churira mana mitsacachu , astaun paita cuca tucui ñucanchi randimanda , ¿ manzhu paihua pariju tucuira ñucanchima cuyangai ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: ¿ Pita píos ajllashcaunara causayachingachu ? Diosga alichijmi .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: ¿ Pita ñucanchira causayachingachu ? Cristo huañushca , causarishca , maspas Diospa ali maquii tiaun , paiga shinallara ñucanchimanda mañaun .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: ¿ Pita ñucanchira anzhuchingai Cristo llaquishcamanda ? ¿ Tormendarina , huacana , yarcai , llatan tucuna , huañuna , sauli — caiguna anzhuchihuanaungachu ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Imasna quillcashca tian : Camba raigumanda tucui punzha huañuchishca manchi . Huañuchina borregounasna iyashca manchi .

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Astaun cai tucuibi yalijta vencijguna manchi , ñucanchira llaquij Cristo raigumanda .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Chi raigumanda , cierto yachani imasna huañuna , causana , angelguna , atunguna , ushajguna , cuna horas tiajguna , huasha horas shamujgunas ,

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: ahuai tiaj , ucui tiajpas , ima causajpas , mana ñucanchira anzhuchinara ushanzhu Diospa llaquinamanda , caí llaquinaga Cristo Jesús ñucanchi Señorbimi .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Cierto shimira rimauni Cristoi , mana llullanichu . Ñuca iyai casnami riman Santo Espiritui .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Asneara llaquiriuni , nanashalla catihuan ñuca shungüi .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Ñuca uquiunara llaquishcamanda , paiguna aichai ñuca aillu asha , ñucallara munaimacani maldiciashca angaj , Cristomanda anzhurí tucungaj .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Israélguna anaun , paigunamandami churisna apiña , sumaj tucuna , Dioshua pactachishca shimi , camachishca shimira cushcas , alabanas , Dios cushca shimiunas .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Paigunajmi yayauna , paigunamandami Cristo shamuca , paihua aichai . Cristoga quiquin Diosmi , tucui ahuara tiaj , huiñai huiñaigama bendiciashca . Amen .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Mana ciertochu Diospa shimi mana valij tucushca . Mana tucui Israelmanda mirajguna quiquin Israel runaunachu .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Shinallara Abrahanmanda miraiguna ashas , mana tucui Abrahamba churiunachu ; astaumbas nin : Isacmanda pagarijgunaga quiquin miraigunami nishca anga .

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Caita nisha nin : Aichamanda churiuna mana Diospa quiquin churiunachu , astaun cushca shimimanda churiuna caigunami quiquin miraiguna .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Cushca shimi casnami nin : Paihua tiempoi shamushami , Sara shu churira charingami .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Maspas : Rebeca shinallara shu carumanda ishqui huahuara tupaca , ñucanchi yaya Isacmanda .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Shinajpi , huahuauna manara pagarijllaira , manara ima aliras manaliras rajllairas , Dios munashca pai ajllashcasna tucuchu , mana rashcaunamanda astaun Dios cayashcamanda ,

text: It was said unto her , The elder shall serve the younger .
text2: rimashca aca : Ñaupa punda churi quipara sirvingami , nisha .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Imasna quillcashca tian : Jacobda llaquicani , Esáuraga chijnicani .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Shinashas , ¿ imara nishun ? ¿ Dios mana alichu ? Mana pacha .

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Astaumbas Dios Moisesta nin : Maicandas llaquisha , llaquishami ; maicandas yanapasha , yanapashami .

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Chi raigumanda , mana munajmandachu , mana camajmandachu , astaumbas Dios llaquishcamandami .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Quillcashcai Faraonma nin : Cai quiquin raigumanda canda sicachishcani , canmanda ñuca ushaira ricuchingaj , ñuca shuti rimai tucuchu entero mundui .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Shinashas , Dios maicanda llaquisha nisha llaquin , maicandas shungura shinzhiyachisha nisha shinzhiyachin .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Rimahuanguimi : Shinasha , ¿ imaraigu piñarinzhu ? ¿ Pi paihua munaira arcanzhu ?

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Astaumbas can , runa , ¿ Pitangui can Diosta cutipangaj ? Allpa mangaga paita llutajta ningachu : ¿ Imaraigu ñucara casna llutahuashcangui ?

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu llutaj huarmi ushaira charin mangallpamanda shu inu mangara llutangaj , mañasha shu yanga mangara ?

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: ¿ Imarai , Dios pai piñashcara ricuchisha nijpi , pai ushanara yachachisha nijpis , unaira chapasha piñana ajgunara ahuantaca , tucuchingaj puruntushcaunara ,

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: shinallara paihua sumajta ashca valij tupura yachachisha nisha , pai llaquishcaunama ricuchica , ñaupa horasmanda puruntushcaunama , paigunara sumacyachingaj ?

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Ñucanchi chiguna manchi , pai cayashcauna , mana judiogunamandallachu , astaumbas gentilgunamandas .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Imasna shinallara Oseaspa quillcai nin : Mana ñuca runauna ajgunara , ñuca runaunami nishami ; mana llaquishcaunaras llaquishcaunami , nishami .

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Shinallara maibi rimashca aca : Canguna mana ñuca runauna anguichichu , nijpi , chihui nishca anga : Causaj Diospa churiunami .

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Shinallara Isaías , Israelgunamanda caparisha nin : Israel churiuna lamar tiyu cuenta yupashca asha , shinajllaira puchujgunalla quishpichi tucunaungami ;

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Señorga pai causayachishcara mundui pactachingami alira rashas , uctalla rashas .

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Shinallara imasna Isaías ñaupara nica : Ejercitounamanda Señor ñucanchijta shu miraira mana saquishcajpiga , Sodoma cuenta tucunchi maca , Gomorra cuenta ricurimunchimaca .

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Shinajpi , ¿ imara nishun ? Gentilguna ali causanara mana catijguna asha , ali tucunama pactamunaushca , caimi quirinamanda ali tucuna .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Astaumbas , Israel ali tucuna ley shimira catijguna asha , mana pactamunauca chi ali tucuna leyra .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: ¿ Imaraigumanda ? Paiguna catimunauca mana quirinahua astaun ley shimimanda ranaunahua . Chi raigumanda , nijtana rumii nijtasha cuenta urmanauca .

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Imasna quillcashca tian : Caiga Sión llactai shu nijtana rumira churauni , shu urmachina rumiras . Maicans paihuajpi quirisha mana pingaringachu .

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Uquiuna , cierto pacha ñuca shungüi munasha , Diosta mañauni Israelmanda , paiguna quishpingaj .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Ñuca paigunamanda nini , Diosta ashcara llaquinaunmi , astaun mana yachanahua .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Paigunaga Dios cushca ali tucunara mana ricsisha , paiguna quiquin rashca ali tucunara catisha nisha , Diosmanda ali tucunara mana uyanaucachu .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Cristo ley shimira tucuchishcami , tucui paita quirij runa ali tucuchu .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Moisés leymanda ali tucunara cuentan , casna nisha : Caigunara raj runa paigunamanda causanga .

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Astaun quirinamanda ali tucuna casnami nisha nin : Ama nichu camba shungüi : ¿ Pi ahuama sicangachu ? ( Caimi nin , Cristora irguchingaj ) ;

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: shinallara , ¿ Pi ucuma irgungachu ? ( Caimi nin , Cristora huañushcaunamanda sicachingaj . )

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: Astaun , ¿ imara nin ? Rimashca shimi camba mayanllaimi ,

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Casnami nin : Camba shimihua rimausha , Jesús Señormi , nisha , shinallara camba shungüi Dios Cristora huañushcaunamanda causachishcara quirisha , quishpichishca angui .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Corazonhua runa quirin ali tucungaj , shinallara shimihua riman , quirinimi nisha , quishpi tucungaj .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Quillcashcai shinami nin : Pi runas paihuajpi quirisha mana pingaringachu .

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Mana chican chicanzhu judiogunahua grieogunahua . Tucuihua Señor ali shungumi tucui paita cayajgunahua .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Tucui Señorba shutira cayaj quishpichishca anga .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: ¿ Imarasha shu mana quirishca Diosta cayanaungachu ? ¿ Imarasha shu mana uyashca quishpichijta quirinaungachu ? ¿ Imarasha uyanaungachu , shu rimaj runa illajpi ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: ¿ Imarasha rímanaungachu mana cachashca ajpi ? Imasna quillcashca tian : ¡ Ima sumajtairi cushi shimira rimajguna chaquiuna , shinallara evangelio shimira rimajguna chaquiunas .

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Shinashas , mana tucui uyanaucachu evangeliora . Isaías nin : Señor , ¿ pita ñucanchi rimashcara quirishcachu ?

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Shinajpi , quirina uyanamandami shamun , shinallara uyanas Diospa shimimandami shamun .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Maspas nini : ¿ Manzhu uyanaushca ? Cierto pacha . Astaun : Paiguna shimi entero mundui pasashcami . Paiguna rimashcaunas mundu puchucai pundagama pasanaushcami . ^

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Shinallara nini : ¿ Israélguna manzhu yachanauca ? Ñaupa punda Moisés nin : Cangunara piñachisha shu yanga runaunahuas , iyai illaj runaunahuas cangunara piñachisha .

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Maspas , Isaías , pajlla pambai rimasha nin : Mana mascahuajguna ñucara tupahuanauca . Ñucara ricuchihuacani ñucara mana tapujgunama .

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Astaumbas , Israelmanda rimausha : Entero punzha maquira pascacani mana uyaj mana munaj runaunama , nin .

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Shinajpi nini : ¿ Diosga paihua runaunara ichushcachu ? Mana pacha . Ñucas Israel runa mani , Abrahamba miraimanda , Benjaminba aülumanda .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Dios pai ñaupa horas ricsishca runaunara mana ichushcachu . ¿ Manzhu uyangui imara nin Quillcashcai , Eliasmanda rimasha , imasna Elias Israelmanda piñasha Dioshua riman :

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: Señor , nisha , canmanda rimajgunara huañuchinaushca , camba altares nishcaunara tulanaushca ; ñuca sapalla tiauni , maspas ñucara mascahuanaun huañuchingaj ?

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Astaun , Dios cutipasha , ¿ imara nin ? Ñucajta canzhis huaranga runaunara huacachishcani , nica , cunguri mucuhua mana cungurijgunara Baalba ñaupajpi .

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Shinallarami cai punzhaunais , puchujguna tianaun , Diospa gracia nishca ajllashcamanda .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Caiga graciamanda asha , mana ranamandachu . Mana shina ajpis , gracia ña mana graciachu . Shinallara ranaunamanda asha , caiga mana graciachu . Mana shina ajpis , rana ña mana ranachu .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: ¿ Imara ? Israel paiguna mascashcara mana pactanaucachu , randi ajllashcaunaga pactanaucami . Shujgunaga shinzhiyashca tucunauca .

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Imasna quillcashca tian : Dios paigunara shu upa shungura cuca , mana ricuj ñahuiunara , mana uyaj rinriunaras , cuna punzhagama .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Davidga nin : Paiguna micuna mesa tujlla cuenta tucuchu , ticta cuenta , shu nijtana , shu cuti pagana .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Paiguna ñahuiuna llanduyaríchu ama ricungaj ; paiguna huasha tullu cumurichu huiñaigama .

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Ñuca nini : Urmangajchu nijtanauca ? Mana pacha . Astaumbas paiguna nijtashcamanda , quishpichina gentilgunama shamuca , Israélguna ricusha tigramunauchu .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Israélguna ucharashca mundura charijyachijpi , shinallara paiguna anzhurina gentilgunara charijyachijpi , ¿ manzhu paiguna tigramuna tucuira mas mas charijyachinga ?

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Cangunara rimauni , gentilguna . Imasna ñuca gentilgunama Dios cachashca runa mani , ñuca tarabanara ahuayachiuni ,

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: imara raushas ñuca ailluunara iyarichingaj , paigunamanda huaquinguna quishpichi tucungaj .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Paiguna Diosmanda anzhurinaga mundura mayanllayachijpi , Dioshua cuti amigo tucujpi , ¿ imara angái paiguna cuti chasquina ? ¿ Manzhu huañushcaunamanda causarina anga ?

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Ñaupa pucuj muyu chicanyachishca ajpi , shinallarami tucui muyuunas chicanyachishca anaunga . Sapi chicanyachishca ajpi , shinallarami pallcauna chicanyachishca anaunga .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Huaquin pallcauna paquirishca ajpi , can shu sachamanda yanga olivo nishca pallca asha , canga paquirishcauna randi yurai satishca ajpi , can olivo yuramanda paihua sapiras , paihua causana yacuras apiusha ,

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: ama burlaichu pallcaunara . Burlasha ama cungaringui can , imasna can pallcalla asha mana sapira shayachingui , astaun sapi canda shayachiun .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Can ningui chari : pallcauna paquirinaushca aca ñuca yurai sati tucungaj .

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Alimi . Paiguna mana quirishcaraigu paquinaushca aca , astaun can camba quirinamanda shayaringui . Ama mas tucuichu , astaun manzhai .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Dios quiquin pallcaunara mana perdonasha , shinallara canda mana perdonangachu .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Ricupai Diospa ali shungura , paihua shinzhi shunguras : Dios shinzhi aca urmajgunahua , astaun canhua ali shungu aca , canga paihua ali shungüi tiaupi . Mana ajpi , cambas shinallara pitishca angui .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Paigunasga , paiguna mana quiriushcai mana saquirijpi , shinallarami sati tucunaunga yurai . Dios yapa ushajmi paigunara cuti satingaj .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Canga sachamanda yanga olivo yuramanda pitishca ajpi , astaun Dios mana cushca samii ali quiquin olivo yurai satishca acangui , ¿ manzhu maspas caiguna , quiquin olivomanda pallcauna ajpi , cutillara paiguna quiquin olivo yurai sati tucunaunga ?

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Canguna , uquiuna , cai pacashca shimira yachaichi , nisha munani , canguna ama mas tucuisiqui tucungaj ; huaquin Israelgunahua shungu shinzhiyashcami , gentilguna pactajta bendiciai tucunagama .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Shinajpi tucui Israel quishpichi tucungami , imasna quillcashcasna : Sionmanda Llushpichij shamunga ; Jacobmanda ucharanara quichungami .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Caimi ñuca pactachina shimi paigunahua , ñuca paiguna uchara quichuna punzhai .

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Shinasha , evangeliomanda rimajpi , judioguna chijnishcauna tucunaushca canguna raigumanda , astaun Dios ajllashcamanda rimajpi , llaquishcauna anaun , yayauna llaquishca raigumanda .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Dios cushca cuyanaunas pai cayashcas mana turcaihuajchu .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Imasna canguna ñaupa horas Diosta mana uyajguna acanguichi , astaumbas cuna Dios llaquishcara pactashcanguichi Israélguna mana uyashcaraigu ,

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: shinallara cuna caiguna mana uyajguna anaushcami , paiguna cangunara llaquishcasna shinallara llaqui tucunauchu .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Diosga tucui runaunara mana uyajgunami nica , tucui paigunara llaquisha bendiciangaj .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: ¡ Ima ashca valij tupurai Diospa iyais , paihua yachanas ! ¡ Mana tupuihuajchu paihua taripanauna , mana ricuihuajchu paihua ñambiuna !

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: ¿ Señorba iyaira pi yachacachu ? ¿ Pi paita camachijchu aca ?

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: ¿ Pita imaras paima ñaupara cuca , huasha pagai tucungaj ?

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Paihuajmi , paihuajtas , paimandas tucui imas tian . Paiga alabashca achu huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Shinashas , uquiuna , Dios cangunara llaquishca raigumanda , cangunara rugauni , canguna cuerpo nishca aichara Diosta cuyaichi , shu causaj sacrificio cuenta , chuyajlla , Dioshua chasquihuajllami . Caimi canguna Diosta iyaihua alabana .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Cai mundu causana samiraga ama catiringuichi . Randi turcarichi , canguna iyaira mushujyachishcamanda , Diospa ali sumaj chasquihuajlla munaira yachangaj .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Ñucaga nini , Dios ñucara cushca gracia nishca aü iyaimanda , caran cangunahua tiaj dueñoma nini , pai quiquinmanda ama yapajta iyarichu , atun mani nisha , astaun ali tupulla iyarichi Dios caran dueñora cushca quirina tupui .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Imasnara shu cuerpoi ashca partiuna tian , shinashas mana tucui partiuna shina ranara charinaun ,

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: shinallara ñucanchi ashca aicha partipura asha , shu aichalla , shu cuerpolla anchi Cristoi , caran dueño chi shujgunahua aicha partiuna cuenta asha .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Shinajpi , caran dueño shu tono shu tono cuyashcara charinchi , ñucanchira cushca graciamanda ; Diosmanda rimana ajpi quirina tupui achu ;

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: sirvina ajpis , sirvichu ; yachachijga yachachichu ;

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: camachijga , camachichu ; cuyajga , ali shungumanda cuyachu ; mandajga , ricushalla mandachu ; alira rajga , cushi shungumanda rachu .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Canguna llaquina , cierto llaquina achu ; manali ranara chijnichi , ali ranara catichi .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Parijumanda llaquinuichi , uquipura cuenta ; caran dueño shujgunara ahuayachisha .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Canguna ranaunai ama quillasha raichi ; sindij almahua Señorda sirvisha .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Cushihua chapasha , tormendarinais ahuantasha , mana saquisha mañasha .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Quirijguna ministishcaunara yanapaichi , shamujgunara pasiachisha .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Cangunara molestajgunara alira rimasha bendiciaichi . Bendiciaichi , ama maldiciaichichu .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Cushiunahua cushiyaichi ; huacajgunahua huacaichi .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Shu shunguyujlla aichi cangunapura , ama mas tucujguna aichi , astaun progriunahua compañaichi . Ama yachaj tucuichichu canguna quiquin iyaibi .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Pitas manalira manalihua ama pagaichichu . Aliranara ricuchichi tucui runauna ñaupajpi .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Ranalla ajpi , canguna ushanagama , cushihua causaichi tucui runaunahua .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Cangunamanda ama cutipaichu , ñuca llaquishcauna , astaumbas lugarda cuichi Dios piñangaj . Quillcashca tian : Cutipana ñucajmi , ñuca randi pagasha , Señor nin .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Shinashas , canda chijnij yarcaihua huañujpi , paita carangui ; upinaichijpis upichingui ; shina rasha paita pingachinguima .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Manalihua ama vencí tucuichu , randi manalira alihua venci .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Caran runa gobiernora uyachu ; pi gobiernos mana tian Dios mana munajpi ; gobiernounaraga Dios churashcami .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Maicambas gobiernora arcasha , Dios mandashcara arcan ; arcajgunaga causayanara apinaun paigunajta .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Taripajgunaga ali rajgunara mana manzhachingaj tianaun , astaun manali rajgunara . ¿ Gobiernora mana manzhasha ningui ? Alira rai , gobierno canda alabangami .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Paiga Diosta sirvijmi , canda yanapangaj . Astaun , can manalira rasha , manzhai ; mana yangamandachu esparara apaun . Gobierno Diosta . sirvijmi , paimanda pagajmi , manali rajta livachingaj .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Chi raigumanda gobiernora uyangaj ministirinmi , mana livanamandalla manzhasha , astaun ali rana iyaimanda .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Shinallara gobiernoma paganara pagaichi . Paiguna Diosta sirvijgunami , cai quiquinllara rangaj .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Dibiyashcara pagaichi tucuiunama ; gobierno cullqui ajpi cullquira , pagana ajpi paganara , manzhana ajpi manzhanara , ahuayachina ajpis ahuayachinara .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Pitas ama imaras dibiyaichichu , astaun parijumanda llaquinaungaj . Maicans paihua mayambi causajta llaquisha , ley shimira pactachishcami .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Shinajpi : Ama shujhua tacaríchu , ama huañuchinguichu , ama shuhuanguichu , shujmanda ama llullanguichu , ama yapajta munanguichu . Shu camachishca shimi tiashas , cai shimii icun : Can cuentallara camba mayambi causajta llaquina mangui .

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Llaquinaga paihua mayambi causajta mana huajlichinzhu . Shinajpi , ley shirnira pactachijga llaquinmi .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Horasta ricsinguichi , ña puñunamanda lliccharina horasmi . Ñucanchi quíshpina ña mas mayanllayamushcami ñucanchi ñaupa quírishca horasmanda .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Tuta pasashcami , ña punzhayaun . Llandu tuta ranaunara ichushunchi , punzha iru churarinara churarishunchi .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Punzhai cuenta purishunchi , ali shunguhua , ama yapajta micusha , ama machasha , ama shujhua tacarisha , ama nuspasha causausha , ama macananausha , ama chijnishas .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: Astaun quiquin Jesucristora churaríchi , shu churarina cuenta ; aichara ama casuichi paihua munaira rangaj .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Ansalla quirij runara chasquichi , astaun mana pai iyashcaunara taripangaj .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Huaquin runa tucuira micunami nin ; shujga , ansalla quirij asha , pangaunallara micun .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Micuj runaga ama asichu mana micujta . Shinallara mana micuj runa ama taripachu micujta . Dios paita chasquishcami .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: ¿ Pitangui can , shujpa sirvijta taripangaj ? Paihua quiquin patronba ñaupajpi shayarin , urman . Shayaringami , Señorga ushajmi paita shayachingaj .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Shu runa shu punzha shu punzha chicanyachin , shujga tucui punzha shinallarami , nin . Caran dueño paihua quiquin iyaira ali pacha yachachu .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Maican runas punzhara chicanyachisha , shina raun Diospa ñaupajpi ; punzhara mana ricuj runas Diospa ñaupajpi punzhara mana ricun . Shinallara aichara micuj runa Diospa ñaupajpi micun , Diosta agrasisha ; mana micuj runa Diospa ñaupajpi mana micun , shinallara Diosta agrasin .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Pi runas causausha , mana paihuajtachu causaun ; pi runas huañusha , mana paihuajtachu huañun .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Causaushas , Diospa ñaupajpi causaunchi ; huañushas , Diospa ñaupajpi huañunchi . Causaushas , huañushas , Señorbajguna anchi .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Chi raigumanda Cristo huañuca , atarica , causarica , pai Señor tucungaj huañushcaunamanda , shinallara causajgunamandas .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Shinajpi can , ¿ imarasha camba uquira taripangui ? Canga shinallara ¿ imarasha camba uquira asiungui ? Tucui ñucanchi Cristo taripana ñaupajpi shayarina anchi .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Quillcashcami tian : Causauni ñuca , Señor nin , ñuca ñaupajpi tucui cunguri mucu cunguringami , tucui callu Diosta ricsingami .

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Shinajpi caran dueño pai quiquinmanda Diosta cuentangami .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Ama parijumanda taripashunchi , astaun ricuichi nijtachinaras urmachinaras ama churangaj camba uqui ñaupajpi .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Suca yachani , ñuca quirini Señor Jesuspi , imasnara mana imas iruschu pai quiquinmanda , randi pi runas imas irusmi iyajpi , paihuajmi irus tucunga .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Astaumbas can camba uquira llaquichisha micunamanda , ña mana llaquishcahua puriunguichu . Ama huajlichichu camba uquira camba micunamanda , imasna Cristo paimanda huañucami .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Can ali ranaga ama manali rimai tucuchu .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Dios mandana pacha mana micunachu , mana upinachu , astaun ali causana , ganas shungu , cushi shungus , Santo Espiritui .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Maican runa cai samiunai Cristora sirvisha Diosta cushiyachin , runaunahuas alimi nishca anga .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Shinajpi imaras ganas shungura cusha , imaras parijumanda shinzhiyachisha , caigunara catishunchi .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Diospa tarabanara ama huajlichichu micunamanda . Tucui micuna micunallami , astaumbas mana valinzhu shujgunara nijtachishca urmachingaj micunahua .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: Alimi aichara mana micungaj , vinoras mana upingaj , imaras mana rangaj , camba uquira ama urmachingaj , ama piñaringaj , ama irquiyangaj .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: Canga , ¿ quirinara charinguichu ? Charilla canllara Diospa ñaupajpi . Cushimi maican runas mana paulara causayachij pai alimi nishcamanda .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Maican runas micunamanda ima chari nisha micuj causayachishcami , mana quirisha micushcamanda . Tucuira mana quirinahua rashcaga uchami .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: C 1 Shinajpi , ñucanchi shinzhiuna asha , irquiuna api ajta yanapana anchi , mana ñucanchillarara cushiyasha .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Ñucanchimanda caran dueño paihua mayambi causajta cushiyachichu , alira rashcai , paita shinzhiyachingaj .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Quiquin Cristo mana paillarara cushiyachica ; astaun quillcashcasna : Canda camijguna camishcauna ñuca ahuai urmanauca .

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Ñaupa horas quillcashcauna ñucanchira yachachingaj quillcanaushca aca ñucanchi chapanara charingaj , Quillcashcauna ñucanchira yanapasha ahuantangaj cariyangajpas .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Ahuantaj , cushiyachij Dios cangunara cuchu cangunapura shu iyaillara charingaj Cristo Jesusmanda ,

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: canguna shu iyaillahua , shu shimillahua Diosta sumacyachingaj , paimi ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo Yaya .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Chi raigumanda parijumanda chasquinuichi , imasna Cristo ñucanchira chasquica , Diosta sumacyachingaj .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Cangunara nini , Cristo Jesús judiogunara sirvij tucuca Dios cierto ajta ricuchingaj , Dios yayaunama shimi cushcauna ali ajta ricuchingaj .

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Shinallara gentilguna Diosta sumacyachinauchu pai llaquishcaraigumanda , imasna quillcashcasna : Chi raigumanda camba shutira rimasha gentilguna chaupi shungüi , camba shutira cantashami .

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: Cutillara nin : Cushiyaichi , gentilguna , canguna runaunahua .

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: Cutillara : Señorda alabaichi , tucui gentilguna . Paita ahuayachichi , tucui runauna .

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Cutillara , Isaías nin : Isaihua sapi tiangami , pai ataringami gentilgunara mandangaj ; gentilguna paihuajpi chapanaunga .

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Cunaga chapanara cuj Dios cangunara undachichu tucui cushihua , tucui ganas shunguhuas , canguna quirinai , canguna undanauchu ali chapanahua , Santo Espíritu cushca ushanahuas .

text: And I myself also am persuaded of you , my brethren , that ye also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
text2: Nuca cangunara ali yachani , ñuca uquiuna , imasna canguna ali shunguhuas tucui yachanahuas undashca anguichi . Shinajllaira parijumanda camachinara ushanguichi .

text: Nevertheless , brethren , I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort , as putting you in mind , because of the grace that is given to me of God ,
text2: Shinajpi , uquiuna , cangunara quillcashcani , pajlla pambai rimasha , cangunara iyachingaj Dios ñucama cushca graciamanda ;

text: That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles , ministering the gospel of God , that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable , being sanctified by the Holy Ghost .
text2: ñuca Jesucristora sirvij tucungaj gentilgunama , Diospa evangeliora camachisha , gentilguna shu ali sacrificio cuenta tucungaj , Santo Espirituhua chuyayachishca , chasquinalla tucungaj .

text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God .
text2: Shinajpi imaras charinimi Cristo Jesuspi cushiyangaj , ñuca Diospajta sirvishcai .

text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me , to make the Gentiles obedient , by word and deed ,
text2: Rimanara mana munanichu shujguna rashcaunara , astaumbas rimasha imaras Cristo ñucamanda rashcara gentilguna uyangaj , shimiunahuas , rashcaunahuas , munanaita ranaunahuas , atun ushanahuas , Diospa Espíritu yanapashcamanda .

text: Through mighty signs and wonders , by the power of the Spirit of God ; so that from Jerusalem , and round about unto Illyricum , I have fully preached the gospel of Christ .
text2: Shinajpi Jerusalenmanda , muyujta siríj llactaunais , Ilírico nishca partigama , tucui partiunara undachishcani Cristo evangelio shimihua .

text: Yea , so have I strived to preach the gospel , not where Christ was named , lest I should build upon another man ' s foundation :
text2: Shinarasha tarabacani evangelio shimira yachachingaj , mana Cristo shutira ñaupa horas uyashca llactaunai , shu runa rashca ahuai ama shayachingaj ,

text: But as it is written , To whom he was not spoken of , they shall see : and they that have not heard shall understand .
text2: Astaun , imasna quillcashca tian : Paimanda mana rimashcauna ricunaungami , paimanda mana imahoraspas uyajguna intindinaungami .

text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you .
text2: Chi raigumanda ashca cuti arcashca acani cangunajma shamungaj .

text: But now having no more place in these parts , and having a great desire these many years to come unto you ;
text2: Randi cuna mana mas lugar tiajpi cai partiunai , shinallara ña ashca huataunai cangunajma shamusha nisha iyarishcani ,

text: Whensoever I take my journey into Spain , I will come to you : for I trust to see you in my journey , and to be brought on my way thitherward by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
text2: ñuca España llactama riusha , cangunajma shamusha . Pasausha , cangunara ricusha nini , shinallara munani cangunahua ñambii cachai tucungaj , ñuca cangunahua pasiashca huasha .

text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints .
text2: Cunaga llucshiuni Jerusalenma ringaj , chihuaj quirijgunara sirvingaj .

text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem .
text2: Macedonia Acaya partiunai tiajguna munanauca shu cuyanara cachangaj Jerusalembi tiaj ministiu quirijgunama .

text: It hath pleased them verily ; and their debtors they are . For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things , their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things .
text2: Casna munanauca , maspas dibiyujguna anaun . Imasna gentilguna chigunamanda alma bendiciongunara apinaushca , ministirinmi paigunama aicha bendiciongunara cachangaj .

text: When therefore I have performed this , and have sealed to them this fruit , I will come by you into Spain .
text2: Shinasha , caita raí pasashca huasha , cai cuyashcara entregashca huasha , cangunajpi pasiasha España partima ringaj .

text: And I am sure that , when I come unto you , I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ñuca yachani imasna cangunajma pactamusha , ashca bendicionhua shamusha Cristo evangelio shimimanda .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , for the Lord Jesus Christ ' s sake , and for the love of the Spirit , that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me ;
text2: Cangunara rugauni , uquiuna Señor Jesucristomanda , Santo Espíritu llaquishcamandas , ñucara yanapanguichi , ñucamanda Diosta mañasha ,

text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judaea ; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints ;
text2: ñuca llushpirichu Judeai tiaj mana quirijgunamanda , shinallara Jerusalembi tiaj quirijguna ñuca sirvishcamanda cuyashcara chasquinauchu ;

text: That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God , and may with you be refreshed .
text2: ñuca cushihua cangunajma pactamuchu Dios munashcamanda , ñuca cangunahua pariju samangaj .

text: Now the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Cushi shungura cuj Dios tucui cangunahua tiachu . Amen .

text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister , which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea :
text2: Ricuichi , nini , ñucanchi pañi , Febe nishcara , pai Cencreaspi tiaj iglesiara sirvijmi .

text: That ye receive her in the Lord , as becometh saints , and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you : for she hath been a succourer of many , and of myself also .
text2: Paita chasquichi Señorba shutii , quirijpurasna , paita imara cangunamanda ministishcais yanapaichi . Paiga ashcaunara yanapajmi , ñucaras .

text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus :
text2: Priscilandi Aquilandi saluraichi , ñucahua pariju tarabajguna Cristo Jesusta sirvinai .

text: Who have for my life laid down their own necks : unto whom not only I give thanks , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
text2: Paiguna causaira churanauca ñucara quishpichingaj ; paigunara agrasinchi maña ñucalla , astaun tucui gentilguna iglesiaunandi .

text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house . Salute my wellbeloved Epaenetus , who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ .
text2: Shinallara paiguna huasii tiaj iglesiara saluraichi . Ñuca llaquishca Epeneto nishcara saluraichi , pai Acayamanda ñaupa punda Cristoi quirijmi .

text: Greet Mary , who bestowed much labour on us .
text2: Saluraichi Mariara , paiga ashcara tarabashcami cangunamanda .

text: Salute Andronicus and Junia , my kinsmen , and my fellowprisoners , who are of note among the apostles , who also were in Christ before me .
text2: Andrónico Junias nishcaunara saluraichi , ñuca quiquin ailluna , ñucahua pariju chonda cularbi compañajguna , cachashca runauna llaquishcauna , shinallara ñucamanda ñaupara Cristoi quirijguna .

text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord .
text2: Amplias nishcara saluraichi , ñuca Señorbi llaquishca amigo .

text: Salute Urbane , our helper in Christ , and Stachys my beloved .
text2: Saluraichi Urbano nishcara , pai ñucanchira yanapaj Cristo Jesusta sirvinai , shinallara ñuca llaquishca Estaquis nishcara .

text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ . Salute them which are of Aristobulus ' household .
text2: Apeles nishcara saluraichi , Cristora sirvishcai alimi nishca runa . Saluraichi Aristóbulo huasü tiajgunara .

text: Salute Herodion my kinsman . Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus , which are in the Lord .
text2: Ñuca aillu Herodión nishcara saluraichi , Narciso huasii tiajgunaras , Señorbi ajgunara .

text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in the Lord . Salute the beloved Persis , which laboured much in the Lord .
text2: Trifena Trifosa nishcaunara saluraichi , Señorda sirvisha tarabajgunara . Saluraichi llaquishca Pérsida nishcara , Señorbi ashcara tarabaj huanriimi .

text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord , and his mother and mine .
text2: Saluraichi Rufo nishcara , Señor ajllashca runara , shinallara paihua mamara , paiga ñuca mama cuentami .

text: Salute Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brethren which are with them .
text2: Asíncríto , Flegonte , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes nishcaunara saluraichi , paigunahua pariju tiaj uquiunandi .

text: Salute Philologus , and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints which are with them .
text2: Saluraichi Filólogo , Julia nishcaunara , Nereo nishcaras paihua panindi , shinallara Olimpas nishcara , tucui paigunahua pariju tiaj quirijgunandi .

text: Salute one another with an holy kiss . The churches of Christ salute you .
text2: Parijumanda saluranuichi shu chuyaj muchanahua . Tucui Cristo iglesiauna cangunara saluranaun .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned ; and avoid them .
text2: Cangunara rugauni , uquiuna , tucui quirijgunara chaupichijgunara ricsichi , tucui urmachijgunaras , canguna uyashca ali yachanara huajlichijgunaras . Paigunamanda anzhurichi .

text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ , but their own belly ; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple .
text2: Casnauna mana ñucanchi Señor Jesucristora sirvinaunzhu , astaun paiguna quiquin icsara , mishqui uyarij shimiunahua , yanga alabana shimiunahuas yachai illajgunara umachinaun .

text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men . I am glad therefore on your behalf : but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good , and simple concerning evil .
text2: Canguna casuna tupu tucuigunama uyarishcami ; chi raigumanda cangunamanda cushiyauni . Maspas ñuca munani canguna ali ranai iyaiyuj tucungaj , astaun manali ranai yachai illajguna .

text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Cushira cuj Dios uctalla Satanasta aitanga canguna chaqui ucui . Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai cangunahua tiachu .

text: Timotheus my workfellow , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my kinsmen , salute you .
text2: Ñucara yanapaj Timoteo , ñuca ailluuna Lucio , Jasón , Sosípater nishcauna cangunara saluranaun .

text: I Tertius , who wrote this epistle , salute you in the Lord .
text2: Ñuca Tercio , cai quillcara quillcaj , cangunara salurauni Señorbi .

text: Gaius mine host , and of the whole church , saluteth you . Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you , and Quartus a brother .
text2: Gayo nishca , ñucara charij , shinallara iglesiara charij paihua huasii , cangunara saluraun . Erasto nishca , tesorero nishca llacta cullquira cuiraj runa , cangunara saluraun , shinallara ñucanchi uqui Cuarto nishca .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca tucui cangunahua achu . Amen .

text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel , and the preaching of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery , which was kept secret since the world began ,
text2: Dios cangunara shinzhiyachinara ushan , imasna nin ñuca evangelioi , shinallara Señor Jesucristo camachishcais , imasna Dios pai pacashca shimira ricuchin , huiñaünanda pacashcara .

text: But now is made manifest , and by the scriptures of the prophets , according to the commandment of the everlasting God , made known to all nations for the obedience of faith :
text2: Astaun , cuna horas ricuchishcami , shinallara Diosmanda rimajguna Quillcashcaunai ricurin , imasna huiñai tiaj Dios

text: To God only wise , be glory through Jesus Christ for ever . Amen .
text2: Sapalla yachaj Diosta ahuayachishca achu Jesucristomanda huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: Paul , called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God , and Sosthenes our brother ,
text2: Pablo , Diospa munaimanda cayashca Jesucristo cachashca runa tucungaj , ñucanchi uqui Sostenesndi ,

text: Unto the church of God which is at Corinth , to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus , called to be saints , with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord , both theirs and ours :
text2: Corinto llactai tiaj Diospa iglesiama quilícanchi , Cristo Jesuspi chicanyachishcaunama , chuyajguna tucungaj cayashcauna , shinallara tucui Señor Jesucristo shutii mañajgunaras , maibi tiaushas , quilícanchi . Paiga paiguna Señormi , shinallara ñucanchijpas .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gracia nishca ali iyairas cushi shunguras charichi ñucanchi Yaya Diosmanda , Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: I thank my God always on your behalf , for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ ;
text2: Tucui horas , Pagarachu nisha , ñuca Diosta agrasiuni canguna raigumanda , shinallara cangunama cushca Diospa gracia nishca ali iyaimandas Cristo Jesuspi ;

text: That in every thing ye are enriched by him , in all utterance , and in all knowledge ;
text2: imasna canguna Cristoi pactajta bendiciai tucushcanguichi tucui shimiunais , tucui intindinais ;

text: Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you :
text2: imasna Cristomanda cuentashca shimi ali cierto ajta ricuchishcara cangunama .

text: So that ye come behind in no gift ; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Shina ajllaira canguna ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo ricurimunara chapausha , mana imas Dios cuyashca pishinzhu cangunahua .

text: Who shall also confirm you unto the end , that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Paiga canguna quirishcai cangunara shinzhiyachingami puchucai punzhagama , canguna causa illaj tucungaj ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo shamuna punzha pactamujpi .

text: God is faithful , by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Dios cierto quirihuajllami . Paiga cangunara cayaca paihua Churi ñucanchi Señor Jesucristohua pariju compañasha causangaj .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye all speak the same thing , and that there be no divisions among you ; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment .
text2: Cangunara rugauni , uquiuna , Señor Jesucristo shutira llaquishcamanda , canguna tucui shina tonoi rimanguichi , ama chican montombi chaupirisha , astaun tucui parijulla shu iyaiyujlla tucusha , shu iyarinallahuas , shu ricunallahuas .

text: For it hath been declared unto me of you , my brethren , by them which are of the house of Chloe , that there are contentions among you .
text2: Cloeguna cuentahuanauca imasna cangunapura piñanaunguichi , ñuca uquiuna .

text: Now this I say , that every one of you saith , I am of Paul ; and I of Apollos ; and I of Cephas ; and I of Christ .
text2: Casna rimasha nini : Cangunamanda shu runa nin : Ñuca Pablo runami ani ; shujga , Apolospaj , shujga Cefaspaj , shujga Cristohuajmi ani , nisha .

text: Is Christ divided ? was Paul crucified for you ? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul ?
text2: ¿ Cristoga chaupirishca chari ? ¿ Pablo canguna randimanda chacatashcachu aca ? ¿ Pablo shutii bautisaricanguichiri ?

text: I thank God that I baptized none of you , but Crispus and Gaius ;
text2: Diosta agrasini imasna cangunamanda mana pitas bautisacani , randi Crispollara Gayollaras ,

text: Lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name .
text2: ama pihuas rimachu : Pablo shutii bautisaricani , nisha .

text: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas : besides , I know not whether I baptized any other .
text2: Maspas Estéfanaspa aillura bautisacani . Chishujgunamanda mana pitas bautisacani yachin . Mana iyai tianzhu .

text: For Christ sent me not to baptize , but to preach the gospel : not with wisdom of words , lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect .
text2: Ñucaraga Cristo mana cachahuacachu bautisangaj , astaun evangelio ali shimira camachingaj . Mana rimacanichu yachashca shimihua , Cristo cruzta ama yanga rashca tucuchu .

text: For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness ; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God .
text2: Chi cruzta cuentaj shimiga yanga shimimi nisha iyanaun chingariujguna , randi ñucanchima , quishpichiscauna asha , cai shimi Diospa ushaimi iyanchi .

text: For it is written , I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent .
text2: Quillcashcami tian : Yachajguna yachashcara huajlichishami , iyaiyujguna iyaira ichushami .

text: Where is the wise ? where is the scribe ? where is the disputer of this world ? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world ?
text2: ¿ Maibirairi yachaj ? ¿ Maibirairi ley shimira yachachij ? ¿ Maibirairi cuna horas rimaisiqui runa ? ¿ Manzhu Dios cai pacha yachanara yanga shimira cuenta rashca ?

text: For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God , it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe .
text2: Dios pai yachashcamanda cushcasna , mundu paita mana tupacachu paihua quiquin yachanamanda . Astaun Dios cucami quirijgunara quishpichingaj yanga nishca shimira camachishcamanda .

text: For the Jews require a sign , and the Greeks seek after wisdom :
