text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: ¿ Imara rashai ? Espirituhua rimasha , shinallara iyaihuas ; espirituhua cantasha , shinallara iyaihuas .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Can espirítullai Diosta bendiciajpi , shu mana intindij runa can rimashcara uyashas mana intindishas , ¿ ima rashara chi Amen nishcara ningairi can agrasishcai , can rimashcara mana intindisha ?

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Canga ali pacha agrasiungui , shina ajllaira chi runa mana intindisha , mana shinzhiyachi tucun .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Diosta agrasini imasna ñuca tucui cangunamanda yali shu tono shimiunahua rimauni .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Iglesiaiga mas munani pichca shimiunara rimangaj intindinahua , shujgunara yachachingaj ; randi shu chunga huaranga shimira mana ricsishca shimii rimashca mana ansas valinzhu .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Uquiuna , ama huahuauna cuenta iyanguichichu , astaunga uchara ranaunai huahuauna cuenta aichi ; randi iyarinaiga rucuuna cuenta tucuichi .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Ley mandashca shimii quillcashca tian : shu tono shimiunahuas , shu tono rimaj shimi caramandas cai runaunama urimashami , shina ajpis mana uyahuanaungachu , Señor nin .

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Shinajpi , shu tono shimiuna shu ricuchina cuenta tucun mana quirijgunama , astaun Diosmanda cushca shimiuna quirijgunama shu ricuchina cuenta tucunaun .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Entero iglesiaga shujpi tandarijpi , tucui runauna mana ricsishca shimiunahua rimanaupi , mana intindij runauna , mana quirij runaunas icusha , ¿ manzhu iyai illaj locounami , nisha rimanaungai ?

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: Randi tucui quirijguna Diosmanda rimanaupi , shu mana quirij , shu mana intindij runa icusha , uyasha , tucui runauna rimashcamanda paihua uchara riparanga , taripai tucunga .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Paihua shungüi pacashcaga ricuringami . Shina tucujpi tuama urmasha , Diosta adorangami , cierto Dios caibi tiaunmi cangunahua , nisha .

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Shinajpi , ¿ imarai , uquiuna ? Canguna tandarijpi , caran dueño shu cantanara , shu yachachina shimira , shu Diosmanda shimira , shu mana ricsishca shimira , shu shimira chimbachishcara charin . Tucuira raichi shujgunara shinzhiyachingaj .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Mana ricsishca shimiunara rimanaupi , ishquilla quinsalla rimanauchu , shuj shujlla rimasha ; shujga chimbachichu rimashca shimiunara .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: Shu chimbachij runa illajpiga , chunlla saquirichu iglesiai . Shungu ucullai paularas Diostas rimachu .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Shinallara Diosmanda rimajguna , ishquilla quinsalla rimanauchu , shujguna paiguna rimashcara camanauchu .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Camba rayai tiau runama shu shimira cushcara charijpi , ñaupa rimaj randi saquichu .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Tucuiga Diosmanda rimanara ushanguichimi , shuj shujlla rimasha , tucui yachanauchu , tucui cariyashca anauchu .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Diosmanda rimajguna espirituuna Diosmanda rimajgunara uyanaun .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Dios mana mulujta rajchu , randi sumajta raj Diosmi .

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: Imasna tucui iglesiaunai , canguna huarmiuna chunlla tianauchu tandarishcaunai . Paigunara lugarda mana cushcachu rimangaj , astaun mandashcara uyanauchu , ley mandashca shimi mandashcasna .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Huarmiuna imaras yachasha nisha , cariunara tapunauchu huasii . Shu huarmi tandarishcai rimajpi pinganaitami .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: ¿ Imarairi ? ¿ Cangunamandachu llucshica Diospa shimi ? ¿ Cangunamallachu pactamuca ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Maicambas , Diosmanda rimajmi ani , Espirituyujmi ani nisha , paiga ñuca quillcashcara Señor mandashcauna ajta ricsichu .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Maicans caita mana ricsijpi , paihuas ama ricsi tucuchu .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Shinajpi , uquiuna , Diosmanda rimangaj mascaichi ; shinallara runauna shu tono shimiunara rimangaj ama arcaichichu .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Tucui ranaunara ali ricuihuajlla raichi , caran shuj paihua tornoi .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Uquiuna , cangunara cuentasha nini ñuca cangunara camachishca evangelio ali shimira . Cai shimira uyacanguichi , shinallara catiunguichi .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Cai shimi cangunara quishpichinmi , canguna ñuca camachishca shimira ali huacachijpi , mana yanga quirishca ajpi .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Ñaupa punda ñuca quiquin uyashcara cangunara yachachicani : Imasna Cristo ñucanchi uchamanda huañuca , Quillcai quillcashcasna .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Pambashca aca , quinsa punzhai causarímuca , Quillcai quillcashcasna .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Cefasma ricurimuca , huasha chunga ishqui yachachishca runaunamas .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Chimanda huasha , pichca patsac yali runaunama ricurimuca . Chigunamanda ashcauna cunagama causanaunmi , huaquingunalla ña huañusha puñunaun .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Chimanda huasha , Jacoboma ricurimuca , huashaga tucui cachashca runaunama .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Tucuimanda puchucaibi , ñucamas ricurimuca , shu cungaimanda llucshij huahuama cuenta .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Ñucaga cachashca runaunamanda pishi mani , mana valinichu cachashca runa ni tucungaj , ñuca Diospa iglesiara tormendachij ashcamanda .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Shinajllaira Diospa gracia nishcamanda ñuca casna tucushcani . Paihua gracia ñucama mana yangachu ricuchishca aca . Astaun ñuca tucui chishu cachashca runaunamanda yali shinzhira tarabacani . Shinajllaira mana ñucachu acani astaun ñucajpi tiaj Diospa gracia nishca .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Shina ajpi , ñuca ashas , paiguna ashas , shinami camachicanchi , shinallara quiricanguichi .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Shina ajpi Cristo huañushcaunamanda causarishcami nisha camachijpi , ¿ imasna ajpira cangunamanda huaquinguna ninaun , huañuimanda ima causarinas illanmi ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Huañuimanda causarina illajpiga , Cristos mana causarinmachu aca .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Cristo mana causarishca ajpiga , yangami anmaca ñucanchi camachishca shimi , yangamanda quirishcanguichí .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Ñucanchi Diosmanda yanga llullasha rimajguna anchi . Ñucanchi Dios Cristora causachica nicanchi , astaun mana shinachu aca , huañushcauna cierto pacha mana causarijpi .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Huañushcauna mana causarijpi , Cristos mana causarishcachu .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Cristo mana causarishca ajpi , yangamanda quirishcanguichi , chara canguna uchallai causaunguichi .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Shinallara Cristoi huañusha puñujgunas chingarinaushcami .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Cai causaillai ñucanchi Cristoi quirisha chapaushaga , tucuigunamanda yali llaquinaitauna manchi .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Randi , cierto pacha Cristo huañuimanda causarishcami , puñushcaunamanda ñaupa punda causarij tucushca .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Imasna shu runamanda huañui shamuca , shinallara shu runamanda huañuimanda causarinas shamucami .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Imasna Adanmanda tucui huañunaun , shinallara Cristomanda tucui causarinaungami .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Caran dueñoga paihua horaspi causaringa , Cristo ñaupa punda causarij , chimanda huasha Cristoi ajguna pai shamushcai .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Chimanda huasha , tucurina horas pactamunga . Cristo pai mandana pachara entregangami Yaya Diosma , tucui mandanaras , tucui gobiernoras , tucui ushanaras tulashca huasha .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Mmistirinmi Churi mandangaj tucui paita chijnijgunara paihua chaqui ucui churangagama .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Puchucai chijnij tulai tucungaj huañuimi anga .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Dios tucuira paihua chaqui ucui mandasha churaca . Randi shina nijpis , tucuimi pai mandashcallai churashcami nisha , intindinchi imasna mandaj dueño paihua chaqui ucui mana churashcachu aca .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Shinajpi , tucuira Churi mandashcallai churashca huasha , quiquin Churiga shinallarami tucuira mandaj Diosmanda mandashcami anga . Casna tucujpi , Dios tucuira mandaj sapalla Dios tucungami .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Causarina illajpi , ¿ ima rasha huañushcauna randimanda bautisarinaun huaquinguna , huañushcauna mana cierto causarijpi ? ¿ Ima rashara huañushcaunamanda bautisarinaunri ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: ¿ Imara rasha caran horas ñaca huañunallai causaunchi ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Ciertomi nini , uquiuna , imasna cangunamanda ahuayauni ñucanchi Señor Jesucristoi , caran punzha huañuchingaraushca cuenta causauni .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Ñucaga runaunasna rimasha , Efeso llactai milli animalgunahua macanaushca ajpi , ¿ imajta valinmairi ñucara ? Huañushcauna mana causarinaujpiga micushunchi , upishunchi , cayandi punzha huañushunmi .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Ama pandaichichu . Manali runaunahua compañausha , ali causanara huajlichin .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Ripararos purisha ama uchara raichichu . Huaquinguna Diosta mana ricsinaunzhu . Caita nini cangunara pingachingaj .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Maicambas tapunga : ¿ Imasna rashara huañushcauna causarinaungai ? nisha , ¿ Ima sami aichayujta shamunaungai ?

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Iyai illaj mangui . Can tarpushca muyu mana ñaupa huañushaga , mana iñanzhu .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Mana tarpunguichu llucshina tonora . Astaun llushti muyura tarpungui , trigo muyu ajpis , shu muyu ajpis .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Diosga pai quiquin ajllashca tonora cunmi , caran tono muyuma paihua quiquin tono aparijta cun .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Tucui aichaga mana shu tonollachu . Runauna shu tono , sacha aicha shu tono , yacu aichahua shu tono , pishcuuna shu tono aichayujgunami .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Cieloi tiajgunas shu tono ricurij , allpai tiajgunas shu tono ricurij . Randi cieloi tiajguna sumaj ricurina shujmi , allpai tiajguna sumaj ricurinaga shujmi .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Indi sumaj ricurina shujmi , quilla sumaj ricurina shujmi , estrellas sumaj ricurina shujmi . Shu estrellas shu estrellasmanda chican tono ricurijmi .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Shinallarami huañushcauna causarina . Ismushca aichara tarpushcami , causarishaga mana ismuihuajchu .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Pinganai tarpushcami , randi sumajlla causarin . Sambayanai tarpushcaga , ushaihua causarin .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Tarpushcami runa aicha , causarinmi espíritu sami aicha . Tianmi runa aicha ; tiami espíritu sami aicha .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Quillcashca tian : Adán nishca ñaupa punda runa causaj alma tucuca , puchucai Adanga causaira cuj Espíritu tucuca .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Espirituga mana ñaupachu , astaun aicha ñaupa shamuj aca ¿ chimanda huasha espiritumi .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Ñaupa punda runa allpamandami , allpa polvomanda rashca , huasha tucuj runaga Señor asha , cielomandami .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Imasna allpa polvomanda runa , shinallarami allpamanda runauna . Imasna cielomanda ajga , shinallarami cielomanda ajguna .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Imasna ñucanchi allpamanda runa tonoi ricurij ashcanchi , shinallara cielomanda aj tonoi ricurij tucushun .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Caitaga cangunara nini , uquiuna : aichas yahuarbas Dios mandana pachara apiñara mana ushanaunzhu . Shinallara ismuihuaj mana ismuihuajtas apiñara mana ushanzhu .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Shu pacashca shimira cangunara cuentauni : Mana tucui puñushunzhu , astaun tucui turcai tucushun ,

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: shu ratollai , shu ñahui pin rashcallai , puchucai cormetara cormetaushcai . Cormetara cormetashca anga , huañushcauna mana ismuihuajlla causarinaunga , ñucanchisga turcai tucushun .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Ministirinmi cai ismuihuaj mana ismuihuajta churaringaj , ministirinmi cai huañuihuaj mana huañuihuajta churaringaj .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Cai ismuihuaj mana ismuihuajta churarijpi , huañuihuaj mana huañuihuajtas churarijpis , chi horaspi quillcashca shimi pactaringa : Vencina ña , huañuira ganashcami , nisha .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Huañui , ¿ maitiri can tucsina ? Ucu pacha , ¿ maitiri can vencina ?

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Huañuihua tucsina uchami , ucha ushaiga ley mandashca shimimi .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Pagarachu nisha , Diosta agrasinchi ; pai ñucanchira vencichinmi , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristomanda .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Shina ajpi , ñuca llaquishca uquiuna , shinzhi shayarichi , ama cuyunguichichu , tucui horas Diospa tarabanai yaparisha ringuichi , caita yachasha , canguna Señorbi tarabashcauna mana yangachu .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Quirijgunama cuyana cullquira tandachinamanda rimasha nini . Ñuca Galacia llactai tiaj iglesiaunara mandashcasnallara ranami anguichi cangunas .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Caran semana ñaupa punda punzhai , caran dueño pai munashca tupu cullquira chicanyachisha huacachinami , pai ushashca tupura . Shina rasha mana ñuca shamushcaira tandachina anga cuyashca cullquira .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ñuca pactamushaga , canguna quillcai rimaushca runaunara Jerusalenma cachasha canguna cuyashcara apangaj .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Ñucas ringaj ministirijpi , paigunas ñucahua compañasha rinaunga .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Macedonia partima pasanami ani , Macedonia llactara pasashca huasha cangunajma shamusha .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Cangunahua saquirisha chari , tamia horaspas pasasha chari , ñuca chihuasha maima rijpis canguna ñucara pushahuanguichi .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Ñuca cuna dsas pasaushcai cangunara ricungaj mana munanichu . Astaun unaira saquirinara munani cangunahua , Dios munajpi .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Efeso llactai saquirishami Pentecostés istagama .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Shu atun pungu cuenta pascarishcami ñucaj , ñuca tarabangaj . Shinajllaira ashca arcajguna tianaun .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Timoteo shamujpiga , paita ali chasquipanguichi , pai cungailla cangunahua tiangaj . Pai Diospa tarabanara alimi raun , ñuca cuenta .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Chimanda ama pihuas paita pishiyachichu , astaun paita sumajlla pushanguichi paihua ñambii , uctalla ñucajma pacta mungaj . Paita chapaunimi chishu uquiunahua .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Ñucanchi uqui Apolosta mañacani chishu uquiunahua pariju cangunajma shamungaj . Astaun mana ansas muna cachu ringaj cuna . Huasha risha , nicami , ñuca ushashca horaspi .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Ripararos tiaichi . Shinzhi shayarichi canguna quirinai . Shinzhi runauna cuenta raichi . Shinzhiyaichi .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Tucui imaras rashaga , llaquinahua raichi .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ña yachanguichi , uquiuna , imasna Estéfanasguna ñaupa punda quirijguna anauca Acaya partii . Paigunallara cunauca quirijgunara yanapangaj .

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: Cangunara nini , cai samiunara uyaichi , shinallara tucui pariju yanapajgunaras , tarabajgunaras .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Estéfanas , Fortunatos , Acaicos nishcauna shamushcamanda yapa cushiyani . Canguna illashcai ñucara cushiyachihuanauca .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Paiguna ñuca espiritura cangunajtas cushiyachinauca . Shina rajgunara llaquina anguichi .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Asia partii tiaj iglesiauna cangunara saluranaun . Aquila Priscilandi , paiguna huasii tandarij iglesiandi cangunara saluranaun ashcara , Señorba shutii .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Tucui uquiuna saluranaun cangunara . Cangunapura parijumanda chuyaj muchanahua saluraichi .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Ñuca Pablo , ñuca quiquin maquihua cai saluranara cangunama quillcauni .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Maicambas Señorda mana llaquisha maldiciashca achu . Ñucanchi Señor shamunmi .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai cangunahua tiachu .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Ñuca Cristo Jesuspi llaquishcahua tucui cangunara dispirini Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Pablo , Jesucristo cachashca runa , Dios munashcamanda , ñucanchi uqui Timoteondi , Corinto llactai tiaj Diospa iglesiama quillcauni , shinallara tucui Acaya partii tiaj chicanyachishca runaunamas .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gracia nishca ali iyairas cushi shunguras charichi ñucanchi Yaya Diosmanda Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Bendiciashca achu Dios , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo Yaya . Paiga llaquij Yaya , cushiyachij Diosmi .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Paiga tucui tormendariushcai ñucanchira cushiyachin . Chimanda shinallara imais tormendarijgunaras cushiyachinara ushanchi , Dios ñucanchira cushiyachishcahua .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Imasnara Cristo tormendarinaunara ashcara apiunchi , shinallarami quiquin Cristomanda ashca cushiyuj tucunchi .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Ñucanchi tormendari tucujpi , ñucanchi cushiyachishca tucujpis , shinami tucun cangunara cushiyachingaj quishpichingajpas ; casna tucun canguna ñucanchi tormendarina samira shinallara tormendari tucujpi .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Alimi iyaunchi cangunamanda . Yachanchi imasna ñucanchihua tormendarishcanguichi , shinallara ñucanchihua cushi tucunguichimi .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Uquiuna , canguna yachangaj munanchi ñucanchi tormendarishcara Asia partii . Chihui huañunalla tormendaricanchi , ñucanchi ahuantanara yali , chimanda huañushun nisha iyaricanchi .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Ñucanchi quiquin shungu ucui huañungaraunchi nisha iyaricanchi , ama quiringaj ñucanchi quiquinllai , astaun huañushcaunara causachij Diosllai quiringaj .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Paiga ñucanchira llushpichica , cunas llushpichin , shinallara chapaunchi pai chara ñucanchira llushpichingami casna atun huañuimanda .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Canguna Diosta mañasha ñucanchira yanapaichi , ashca runauna Diosta agrasinauchu ñucanchira yanapashcamanda , ashca runauna mañashcamanda cuyashcara agrasisha .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Caimanda Diosta agrasinchi , shinallara ñucanchi iyai shina riman , imasnara mundu ñaupajpi maspas canguna ñaupajpis , chuya shunguhua ali iyaihuas causashcanchi , mana mundu yachaihua astaun Diospa gracia nishca ali iyaihua .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Ricunalla intindinalla ajgunara cangunama quillcaunchi . Canguna puchucaigama ali intindingaj munani .

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Canguna ña ansalla intindinguichi imasna Señor Jesuspa punzhai canguna ñucanchimanda ahuayanguichi ; ñucanchi shinallara ahuayashun cangunamanda .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Casna iyasha , ñuca munacani cangunajma ñaupa punda shamungaj , canguna ishqui cuti bendiciai tucungaj , ñuca tigrajpi cuti cangunajpi pasiangaj .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Shina rasha cangunara ricusha nicani , ñuca Macedonia partima pasaushcai , shinallara chimanda tigramushcais cuti cangunajma shamungaj , canguna ñucara Judea partima cachangaj .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Ñucaga casnajrasha nijpiga , ¿ yangamanda ishqui shimiyujchu tucucani ? Ñuca rasha nishcara , ¿ yanga aicha munaibi rimacani , ñuca yangamanda : Ari , Mana , nisha , umachingaj ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Mana pacha . Imasna Dios ali quirihuajmi , ñucanchi cangunara mana rimanchichu , Ari , nisha , Mana , nisha .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Astaun ñucanchi cangunama rimashca Diospa Churi Jesucristo — ñucas , Silvanos , Timoteos rimashca — pai mana Ari nishca , Mana nishca acachu , astaun Diospi rimasha , Ari nishcami aca .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Tucui Dios cusha nishca shimiuna quiquin Diospi , Ari , ciertomi , nishcami anaun , astaun ñucanchimanda , Amen nishcami Diosta ahuayachingaj .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Diosga ñucanchiras cangunaras Cristoi shinzhiyachin , shinallara ñucanchira chicanyachica .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Pai shinallara Espiritura ñucanchima cuca , shu sello nishca cuenta , huasha shamuj bendiciongunara ricuchina cuenta .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Ñucaga Diosta cayauni ñuca almara ricuj tucungaj , imasna cangunara llaquishcamanda mana ñaupa shamucanichu Corinto llactama .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Ñucanchiga canguna quirinara mana mandanchichu , astaun yanapaunchimi canguna cushi yaparingaj . Canguna quirinai ali shayaringuichi .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Ñuca iyacani ama cuti shamungaj cangunajma llaquirishcahua .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Ñuca cangunara llaquichishaga , ¿ pita ñucara cushiyachinga ? Ñuca llaquichishca runami anga .

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Caita cangunama quillcashcani , ñuca cangunajma shamusha nisha ama llaquiringaj cangunamanda , imahoras cushi tucuna macani , caita iyasha imasna ñuca cushiyauni , cangunas shinallara cushiyanguichi .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Ashca tormendarishcahua , ashca shungu nanashcahuas , shinallara ashca huacashcahuas , ñaupa punda quillcacani cangunama . Shina quillcashaga , mana munacanichu cangunara llaquichingaj , astaun canguna ñuca ashca llaquishcara yachangaj .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Pi runas ñucara llaquichishca ajpi , mana ñucallara astaun tucui cangunaras llaquichishcami .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Ña basta chi runama paita piñashca , ashca runauna rashca ajpi .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Shinashas , cuna canguna paita perdonana anguichi , shinallara paita cushiyachina , pai yapa ashca llaquirishcahua ama vencí tucungaj .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Chimanda cangunara rugauni paita ña llaquishcara ali ricuchicbi .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Shinallara cangunara quillcacani canguna tucuibi ñucara casujguna ashcara camangaj .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Shinajpi canguna perdonashca runara ñucas shinallara perdonauni . Ñuca imaras charishaga perdonangaj cangunara llaquishcamanda ña perdonashcani Cristo ñaupajpi .

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: Casna nini Satanás supai apu imaras ama ganangaj ñucanchimanda . Pai ima rana tonoras ña yachanchi .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Ñuca Troas llactama pactamusha Cristo evangelio ali shimira rimangaj , pajlla pambai ushacani , Señorbi .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Shina ajllaira cungailla samangaj mana ushacanichu espiritui , ñuca uqui Titora mana tupashcamanda . Shinajpi dispirisha , Macedonia partima ringaj llucshicani .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Diosta agrasini imasna maita rishas pai ñucanchira vencijguna cuenta pushan Cristo Jesuspi , ñucanchimanda tucui partiunai Cristora ricuchingaj , shu gusto mishqui asnaj cuenta .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Cierto pacha Diospa ñaupajpi ñucanchi shu Cristomanda ali gusto mishqui asnaj cuenta manchi quishpiugunai , chingariugunais .

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Chingariugunai , huañuna asnaj cuenta anchi paiguna huañungaj . Randi quishpiugunai causana asnaj cuenta anchi causangaj . ¿ Pita pactajta angai caihua ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Ñucanchi mana ashca runauna cuentachu anchi Diospa shimira huajlichisha catusha , astaun ñucanchi ali shungumanda , quiquin Diosmanda , quiquin Diospa ñaupajpis rimaunchi , Cristo shutii .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: ¿ Cutillara callarinchichu ñucanchimanda ali rimangaj canguna ñaupajpi ? ¿ Cuti ministinchichu ali rimana quillcaunara cangunahua , shujguna cuenta ? ¿ Cangunamanda ali rimashcara ministinchichu ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Cangunaga ñucanchi quillcauna cuenta anguichi , ñucanchi shungüi quillcashca , tucui runauna ricsishca , tucui runauna ricushca .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Ricurin imasna canguna shu Cristomanda quiilca cuenta anguichi , ñucanchi maquihua quillcashca , mana tintahua astaun causaj Diospa Espirituhua ; mana rumi palaunai quillcashcachu aca , astaun runa shungu palaunai .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Casna quirinara charinchi Diospa ñaupajpi Cristoraigumanda .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Ñucanchimandalla mana valinchichu imaras iyaringaj , astaun ñucanchi valishcaga Diosmandami shamun .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Dios shinallara ñucanchira valichica shu mushuj pactachina shimira camachijguna tucungaj . Cai shimi mana quillcamandallachu aca , astaun Diospa Espiritumandami . Quillca huañuchin . Espirituga causaira cun .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Chi huañunami nij shimi , rumi palai quillcashca asha , sumajhua shamuca , imasna Israel churiuna ricunara mana ushanaucachu Moisespa ñahuira , paihua ñahui chiujlla punzhashcamanda . Cai sumajga pasarij aca .

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu Espíritu camachishca shimi mas ali sumajhua angai ?

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Causayachina shimiga sumajhua shamujpi , astaun mas ali sumajhua almara alichina shimi shamungami .

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Cai mas ali sumajta ricurijpiga , ñaupa horas sumaj ña pishimi ricurin .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Ima huañunalla asha sumajhua ricurijpi , unaira durajga astaun mas ali sumajhua ricuringa .

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Casna chapanara charisha , pajlla pambai rimauni ,

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: mana Moisés cuenta , pai shu llachapahua paihua ñahuira quillpaca , Israel churiuna paihua sumaj pasaushcara ama riparangaj .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Astaumbas paiguna shungura shinzhiyachinauca . Cuna punzhagama pacha , imahoras rucu pactachina shimira uyajpi , chi quillpana llachapa cuenta paiguna shungüi sirin . Cristoi chi quillpana llachapa cuenta anzhurin .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Cuna punzhagama pacha , Moisés quillcashcara ricushca ajpi , chi quillpana llachapa cuenta paiguna shungüi churashcami tian .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Astaun paiguna Señorbi quirisha , chi quillpana llachapa cuenta anzhuchishcami .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Señorga Espiritumi . Maibi Señorba Espíritu tiajpi , chihuimi lugar tucim .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Tucui ñucanchiga pascashca ñahuihua espejoi cuenta Señorba sumajta ricunchi . Chimanda paihua quiquin ricuri ñama turcarinchi , shu tono sumajmanda shu tono sumajgama . Caiga Señorba Espiritumandami .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Dios llaquishcamanda , ñucanchi cai camachishcai paita sirvisha , mana desmayarinchi .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Randi tucui pacashcaras , tucui pinganaitas saquishcanchi , mana sabiro cuenta tucusha , mana Diospa shimira istuyachisha . Astaun cierto shimira pajlla pambai rimasha , tucui runauna iyaima ñucanchira ricuchishun Diospa ñaupajpi .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Ñucanchi rimaushca evangelio ali shimira pacashca ajpi , chingariugunahua pacashcami .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Caigunahua , cai mundu diosga mana quirijguna iyaira ñausayachishcami , sumajyachishca Cristo evangelio ali shimi paiguna shungura ama punzhayachingaj . Cai Cristoga Diospa quiquin ricurinami .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Mana ñucanchi quiquin shutira rimaunchichu astaun Jesucristo shutira , pai Señor ajpi . Ñucanchiga cangunara sirvijguna anchi Jesusta llaquishcamanda .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Punzha llandumanda punzhayachi nisha mandaj Dios ñucanchi shungüi punzhayachica , ñucanchi iyaira punzhayachingaj Diospa sumajta yachashcahua , Jesucristo ñahuii ricurij .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Cai valij punzhayashcara allpa mangaunai charinchi , paihua ali valij ushai Diosmandalla achu , mana ñucanchimanda .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Tucuibi tormendarinchi , shina ajllaira mana huacanchichu ; molestarinchi astaun mana turbarinchichu .

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: Tormendachishcami anchi , astaun Dios mana saquinzhu ñucanchira . Urmachishca manchi shina ajllaira mana tucurinchichu .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Maima rishas ñucanchi aichai Jesús huañushcara apaunchi , Jesuspa causai shinallara ricurichu ñucanchi aichai .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Ñucanchi causaujguna ashas , tucui horas huañuima entregashca manchi Jesusta llaquishcamanda . Jesuspa causai ricurichu ñucanchi huañunalla aichai .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Shinajllaira ñucanchi aichai huañuna tarabaun , astaun cangunajpiga causai tarabaun .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Chi quirina espiritura charisha , imasna quillcashca aca : Quiricani , chimanda rimacani , nisha , ñucanchi shinallara quirinchi , chimanda rimanchi .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Caita yachanchi imasna Señor Jesusta sicachij Dios shinallara ñucanchira sicachingami Jesushua pariju , ñucanchira cangunahua pariju ricuchingami paihua ñaupajpi .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Cai tucuira tormendarinchi cangunara llaquishcamanda , Diospa gracia nishca ashca runamanda yaparisha , paiguna agrasishcauna ashcara yaparinauchu Diosta ahuayachingaj .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Casna ajpi mana desmayarinchi . Astaun ñucanchi ricurij aicha gastarisha rishallara , ñucanchi ucui tiaj runa caran punzha mushujyasha rin .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Cai uctalla pasaj ichilla tormendarinaga ñucanchijpi shu yali valij huiñai duraj sumajta iñachinmi .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Ricurijgunara mana ricunchichu , astaun mana ricurijgunara . Ricurijguna mana duranaunzhu , randi mana ricurijguna huiñaigama duranaunmi .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Ñucanchi cai pachai causasha tiana huasi tularijpi , Diosmanda shu huasira charinchi , mana maquihua rashcara , shu huiñaigama duraj huasira , ahua pachai .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Ñucanchi tiaushca huasii huacaunchi , ñucanchi ahua pachamanda huasira churarisha nijpi .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Shina rasha churarishca asha mana llatanlla tucushun .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Ñucanchi cai huasii tiajguna , iyaibi nanajpi tormendarinchi . Mana munanchichu llatanlla tucungaj , astaun churarishca , ñucanchi huañunalla aicha causaibi chingaringaj .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Cai quiquimbajta Dios ñucanchira rarcami . Paiga Espiritura cuca huasha shamuj bendiciongunara ricuchina cuenta .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Shinajpi quirisha causaunchi tucui horas , caita ricsisha imasna ñucanchi cai aicha huasii causausha , Señorbajmanda illaunchi .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: Quirisha purinchi , mana ñahuihua ricushalla .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Quiríshaga cushi tucunchi . Yali munanchi aichamanda llucshingaj Señorhua pariju tiangaj paihua huasii .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Shinajllaira huasii tíaushas mana tiaushas , mascanchi paita cushiyachingaj .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Ministirinmi tucui ñucanchi Cristo taripana ñaupajpi shayaringaj . Caran dueño paihua aichai rashca tupura cui tucungami ali ashas manali ashas .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Diosta manzhashaga runaunara rimaunchi . Diospa ñaupajpiga ricui tucunchi ima sami ashas , shinallara canguna iyaibi ricsi tucunara munanchi .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Mana cuti ñucanchira ahuayachinchi canguna ñaupajpi , astaun cangunama lugarda cunchi ali rimangaj ñucanchimanda , canguna runaunama imaras cutipanara charingaj ima horas paiguna canzhai ricurij tonollara ali rimausha , shungu ucui tiaj tonora mana ricunaun .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Ñucanchi loco sami tucusha , shina tucunchi Dioshua ; ñucanchi iyaiyuj tucusha , shina tucunchi cangunahua .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Cristo llaquinaga ñucanchira mandan , casna iyasha : Shu runa tucui randimanda huañushca ajpi , shinajpi tucui huañunauca .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Maspas , pai tucui randimanda huañuca , causajguna ama mas paiguna quiquimbajta causangaj , astaun paiguna randimanda huañujtas causarij tas causanauchu .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Shina ajpis , cuna horasmanda pacha , mana pitas ricsinchichu aichai . Ñucanchi quiquin Cristora ricsishca ashaga paihua aichri , ña mana shina tonollaira ricsinchichu paita .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Shinajllaira maican runas Cristoi tiajpi ña mushuj runa tucushcami . Rucu causana tono ña pasashcami . Tucui mushujlla rashcami .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Cai tucui Diosmandami shamun . Paiga Cristomanda ñucanchira alichica amigouna tucungaj paihua , maspas cai alichina shimira ñucanchima cuca camachingaj .

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Cai shimi casna nin : Dios Cristoi tiauca mundura alichisha amigo tucungaj paihua , runauna ucharashcara mana iyarisha runaunahua . Ñucanchimas cai amigo tucuna shimira cuca camachingaj .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Shinajllaira Cristo partimanda cachashcauna manchi . Diosga ñucanchimanda mañasha cayaun . Cristo shutii cangunara rugaunchi : Dioshua alichichi amigo tucungaj , nisha .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Cristo uchara mana rarcachu . Randi Dios paima cuca ucha tucungaj ñucanchi raigumanda , ñucanchi paimanda Diospa ali tono tucungaj .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Shinajpi , ñucanchi cangunahua yanapajpura cuenta asha , cangunara ruganchi Diospa gracia nishca ali iyaira ama yangamanda apingaj .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Dios casnami nin : Chasquina horaspi canda uyashcani . Quishpina punzhai canda yanapashcani . Shinajpi , cunallarami chasquina horas , cunallarami quishpina punzha .

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Mana pitas mana imais urmachishunchi , ñucanchi Diosta sirvina ama cami tucungaj .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Astaun tucuibi ñucanchi Diosta sirvijguna ajta ricuchinchi ashca chapanahua , tormendarinaunais , ministishcaunais , 11aquirishcaunais ,

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: azutishcaunais , chonda culargunais , runauna caparishcaunais , tarabashcaunais , chapaushcaunais , yarcaigunais ,

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: chuyaj shungüis , yachanais , ahuantanais , ali shungüis , Santo Espirituis , ali llaquinais ,

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: cierto shimiis , Diospa ushanais , ali causana yanapashcahuas ali maqui partiis lluqui partiis ;

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: ahuayachishcamanda mana ahuayachishcamandas ; manali rimashcamanda ali rimashcamandas ; umachijguna cuenta shinajllaira ali ciertouna ajpis ;

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: mana ricushcauna cuenta shinajllaira ali ricushcauna ajpi ; huañujguna cuenta astaun causajguna ajpi ; livachishcauna cuenta astaun mana huañushcauna ajpis ;

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: llaquirijguna cuenta shinajllaira cushiuna ; tsuntsuuna cuenta shinajllaira ashca runaunara charíjyachijguna ; mana imaras charíjguna cuenta shinajllaira tucuira charijpi .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Cangunahua pajlla pambai rimashcanchi , Corintiosguna ; ñucanchi shungu atun tucushcami .

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Ñucanchi shungu mana quishqui tucushcachu cangunahua , astaun canguna quiquin shungu quishqui tucushcami .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Cangunaga , shinallara rangaj shungura pascaichi , nini ; churiunahua cuenta rimauni .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Mana quirijgunahua ama llutarichichu . ¿ Imasna ali causana manali causanahua pariju puringairi ? ¿ Punzhaga imasna puringairi tutahua ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: ¿ Imasna Cristo Satanashua pariju puringairi ? ¿ Imasna shu quirij runa shu mana quirij runahua llutaringairi ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: ¿ Ima rashara runa rashca yanga diosguna quiquin Diospa alabana huasii tianaungai ? Cangunaga causaj Diospa tiana huasi anguichi ; imasna Dios nica : Paigunahua causasha , purishas ; ñucaga paiguna Dios tucusha , paigunas ñuca runauna tucunaunga .

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Chiraigumanda , llucshichi paiguna chaupi shungumanda , paigunamanda anzhurichi , Señor nin . Irusta ama llangaichichu , ñucaga cangunara chasquishami , Señor nin .

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: Ñucaga Yaya tucusha cangunahua , cangunaga churiuna ushushiuna tucunguichimi ñucahua , tucuira Ushaj Señor nin .

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Shinajpi , llaquishcauna , ñucanchi casna ali valij cushca shimiunara charisha , pichashunchi ñucanchira ima aicha ismunamandas , ima alma ismunamandas , ñucanchi chuyaj causanara alichisha Diosta manzhashcahua .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Chasquihuapai ñucanchira . Mana pitas llaquichishcanchichu , mana pitas huajlichishcanchichu , mana pitas umachishcanchichu .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Caita mana ninichu cangunara causayachingaj . Ña nicani cangunara , canguna ñucanchi shungüi tiaunguichimi parijulla huañungaj , parijulla causangaj .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Pajlla pambai cangunahua rimauni . Ashcara ahuayauni cangunamanda ; cushihua undariuni ; ñucanchi tucui tormendariushcai yapajta cushiyauni .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Ñucanchi Macedonia partima shamushca horas pacha , mana ansas samacanchi aichai . Astaun tucuibi tormendariucanchi , canzhai macanaunara charisha , ucui manzhashcaunaras .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Astaunga mansounara cushiyachij Dios ñucanchira cushiyachihuaca Tito shamushcamanda ;

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: mana pai shamushcamandalla , astaun pai quiquin cushiyashcamanda cushiyacani cangunamanda . Cuentahuaca canguna ali llaquihuashcara , canguna huacashcara , canguna ñucamanda cuirangaj iyashcara ; shinajpi ñuca astaun mas cushiyacani .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Ñuca quillca cangunara llaquichishca ajpi , chimanda mana sintinichu , shina ajllaira quillcana horasllaira ansa llaquiricani . Ñuca ricuni imasna chi quillca shu ratogamalla cangunara llaquichicami .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Cunaga cushiyauni , mana canguna llaquimanda , astaun canguna arrepentirinagama llaquirishcamanda . Diospa ñaupajpi llaquiricanguichi , shinajpi mana imaras pirdishcanguichi ñucanchi rashcamanda .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Diospa ñaupajpi llaquirínaga arrepentirinara cun , almara quishpichingaj . Cai arrepentirinaga mana llaquirinallachu . Mundu llaquirina tonoga huañunara cun .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Cangunaga Diospa ñaupajpi llaquiricanguichi . Shina rasha cuiraisiqui tucucanguichi ; alichingaj munacanguichi ; piñaricanguichi uchamanda ; manzharicanguichi . Canguna shinzhira llaquihuacanguichi , shinzhira munacanguichi uchara raj runara livachingaj . Tucuibi cangunara alichishcanguichi cai uchamanda .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Shinajpi uchara raj runamandas uchara apijmandas mana quillcacanichu , astaun canguna ñucanchi cangunara llaquishcara yachangaj Diospa ñaupajpi .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Caimandaga ñucanchi cangunahua pariju cushiyashcancbi . Maspas cushiyanchi Tito cushiyashcamanda , paihua espíritu tucui cangunamanda cariyashcaraigu .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Ima ali shimira ñuca Titora cuentashcara cangunamanda mana pingarícanichu ; astaun imasna tucui ñucanchi cangunama rimashca shimi cierto aca , shinallara ñucanchi Titoma cangunamanda ali cuentashca ali cierto tucucami .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Paiga cangunara astaun mas llaquinmi , pai tucui canguna uyashcara iyarisha imasna canguna paita manzhashcahua chasquicanguichi .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Canguna tucuibi ali ranara rajguna ajta yachasha , ñuca yapa cushiyani .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Shinallara , uquiuna , cangunara cuentaunchi imasna Dios paihua gracia nishca ali iyaira cushcami Macedonia iglesiaunama .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Paiguna atun tormendarinaunahua ashcara camai tucusha , paiguna ashca cushimanda , yapa tsuntsu ashallara , yaparinauca cuyaisiqui shungumanda ashcara cungaj .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Ñuca nini : Cushihua paiguna ushashcagama yalijta cuyanaushcami .

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: Lugarda cuhuai , nisha , ashcara mañahuanauca cai sirvinara rangaj , quirijgunara yanapangaj .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Mana ñucanchi iyashcasna cuyanauca , astaun ñaupa punda paigunallarara Señorma cuyanauca , chihuasha ñucanchimas , Dios munashcasna .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Shinajllaira , Titora rimaunchi imasna pai caita rangaj callarica , shinallara cangunahua cai llaquishcamanda ali ranara tucuchichu .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Shinajpi imasna tucuibi canguna yaparinguichi quirinais , rimanais , yachanais , tucui cuiranais , ñucanchira llaquiushcais , shinallara cai llaquishcamanda ali ranais yaparinguichi .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Ñuca casna nisha , mana mandanichu , astaun canguna llaquina tupu cierto ashcara camasha nini , canguna shujguna yanapashcara yachasha .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca llaquishcara ña yachanguichi , imasna pai charij ashallara , cangunara llaquishcamanda pogri tucucami , pai pogri ashcamanda canguna charij tucungaj .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Casna nini ñuca : Caita ali valin canguna rangaj . Alimi callaricanguichi ñaupa huatai , canguna rashcara ali munaihua rasha .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Cunaga pactachichi cai ali ranara . Imasna ali munaihua callaricanguichi , shinallara cai ranara ali munaihua tucuchichi canguna charishca tupugama .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Ali munaira charisha cuyangaj , Dios caran dueño charishca tupura chasquin , mana pai mana charishca tupura .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Caita mana rimaunichu shujguna yapajta ; charingaj imahoras canguna illaj tucusha ,

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: astaun cuna horas ministishca ali tupura charingaj . Cuna canguna yalijta charishca tupu paiguna ministishcara y anapanga . Huasha horasga paiguna yalijta charishca tupu canguna ministishcara yanapangami , tucui chi tupullara charingaj ,

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: imasna quillcashcasna : Ashca micunara tandachij runa mana yalijta charicachu , shinallara ansahuallara tandachij runa mana pishicachu .

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Diosta agrasini imasna pai Tito shungüi churaca cangunara cuirangaj ñucanchi rashcasna .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Titoga ali shunguhua ñucanchi mañashcara uyaca , maspas paihua quiquin munaihua llucshica cangunajma ringaj .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Paihua pariju shu uquira cachacani , cai uqui evangelio ali shimira camachishcamanda tucui iglesiaunai yapa alabai tucun .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Maspas , cai uquira tucui iglesiauna ajllashcami ñucanchira compañangaj ñucanchi purishcaunai , quirijguna cuyashcara apangaj . Cai cuyashcara tandachiunchi quiquin Señorda ahuayachingaj , shinallara ñucanchi ali munaira ricuchingaj .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Casna rasha raunchi , ama pihuas culpayachihuanauchu cai ñucanchi apishca atun cuyashcamanda .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Tucuira ali tonoi rasha ninchi , mana Señorba ñaupajllai , astaun shinallara runauna ñaupajpis .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Paigunahua shu uquira cachaunchi . Cai uqui ali rana iyaira ashca cuti , ashca ranaunais ricushcanchi . Cunas pai astaun mas yanapasha nin , cangunara llaquishcamanda .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Titoga ñucahua compañajmi , ñucara yanapajmi cangunamanda . Chishu uquiunaga iglesiaunamanda rimajgunami , Cristora ahuayachijgunas .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Iglesiauna ñaupajpi canguna paigunara llaquishcara ricuchichi , shinallara ñucanchi cangunamanda ali rimashcaunara valij ajtas ricuchichi .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Quirijgunama cuyashcamanda mana ministinichu cangunara quillcangaj . 2 Canguna ali munaira yachani , caimandas ali rimauni Macedonia partii tiajgunama , Acayauna ña puruntushcami nisha ñaupa huatamanda pacha . Canguna llaquinaga shujgunara yanapashcami shina rangaj .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Shinajllaira , cal uquiunara cachashcani ñucanchi cangunamanda rimashca ali shimiuna ama yanga tucungaj , canguna ñuca cuentashcasna ali puruntushca angaj .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Mana shina tucujpi , huaquin Macedonia runauna ñucahua pariju shamusha , cangunara mana puruntushcara tupashas , ñucanchi pingarinchimaca , cangunas shinallara , ñucanchi shimi mana cierto ajta tupasha .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Chiraigumanda ministirinmi nisha iyacani , cai uquiuna ñucamanda ñaupara cangunajma cachangaj . Paiguna canguna ñaupa cusha nishca cuyashcara alichinaunga , puruntu tucungaj , canguna cuyashca ali munaimanda cuenta ricuringaj , mana shu ñucanchi mandashcamanda cuenta .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Caita nini : Tarpuj runa ansalla muyura tarpusha , ansallara pallangami ; ashca muyura tarpushaga , ashcara pallangami .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Caran dueño paihua shungumanda munashcasna cuyachu , mana llaquirisha , mana mandashcasnas . Dios cushihua cujta llaquinmi .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Diosga ushajmi tucui gracia ali iyaira yapachingaj cangunajpi , tucuibi pactajta charisha yaparinguichi ima ali ranaras rangaj .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Imasna quillcashcasna nin : Dios chaupichisha , tsuntsuunama cuca . Paihua ali shungu huiñaigama duranga .

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Muyura tarpujma cuj Dios , tandara micujma cuj Dios carangami , mirachingami canguna tarpushcara , shinallara canguna ali rashcamanda aparishcaunara mirachingami .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Shina tucusha , tucuibi charij tucunguichi shujgunama cuyangaj . Casna rajpi ñucanchimanda Dios agrasishca angami .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Casna rashaga , quirijguna ministishcaunara cuyai tucunaungami , shinallara ashcauna Diosta agrasinaungami .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Casna yanapashcamanda Diosta ahuayachinaun canguna quirmchimi nishca Cristo evangelio ali shimira uyashcamanda , shinallara canguna atun cuyashcamanda paigunajpas tucuihuajpas .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Shinallara paiguna Diosta mañasha cangunamanda , paiguna cangunara llaquinaungami Diospa gracia ali iyai yaparishcamanda canguna shungüi .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Diosta agrasinchi paihua mana rimaihuaj atun cuyashcamanda .

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Ñuca , Pablo , cangunara rugauni , Cristo manso shungumandas , paihua llaquij shungumandas , ñuca manso shunguyuj asha canguna ñaupajpi , astaun shinzhi shunguyuj asha carui tiaushas ,

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: cangunara rugauni ñuca cangunahua tiajpi ama ministirichu ñuca shinzhi tucungaj . Huaquinguna ninaun : Pablo aicha munaibi purisha causaun . Caigunahua shinzhi tucuna mani .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Ñucanchi aichallai purisha , mana aichai tiashcasna macanaunchichu .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Ñucanchi macanaunaga mana aichamandachu , astaun Dios yanapashcahua ushaiyujmi ima shinzhiunaras tulangaj .

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: Yanga iyaigunaras , tucui ahuayashca shunguunaras tulanchi , Diosta yachanara arcajguna asha . Tucui iyaira mandanchi Cristora uyaj tucungaj .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Canguna ali casujguna tucujpi , puruntu manchi mana casujgunara livachingaj .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Tucuira ricunguichi pai cierto ricurishcasna . Pi runas , Cristojmi ani , nisha iyasha , pai shinallara iyachu imasna pai cierto Cristoj ajpi , ñucanchis shinallara Cristojgunami anchi .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Ñucaga ñucanchi ushaira ansa yapajta rimaushallara , mana pingarishachu chimanda . Cai ushaira Dios cuhuacami , cangunara shayachingaj , mana cangunara tulangaj .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Quillcaunahua cangunara manzhachisha ricuringaj mana munanichu .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Runauna ninaun : Cierto pacha paihua quillcauna shinzhimi ; astaun ñucanchi ñaupajpi tiausha cai runa irqui sami ricurin , paihua shimi yanga mana uyaihuaj .

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Casna rimaj runa riparachu imasna ñucanchi quillcashcai ricurij sami , ñucanchi illaushcai , chi tonollarami tucushun cangunahua pariju tiaushcais .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Huaquingunaga paigunallara alabajguna asha , mana muñanchichu casnaunahua pariju shayarisha camangaj . Paigunapura tupunaun , paigunapuralla shayarinaun camangaj . Casna rana mana valinzhu .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Ñucanchiga ñucanchi quiquinllara mana yapajta ahuayashun , astaun Dios cushca tupunahua tupusha , imasna pai lugarda cuhuaca , ñucanchi cangunajma pactangaj .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Dios cushca tupura mana pasacanchichu cangunajma shamusha . Ñucanchiga ñaupa punda pactajguna acanchi , Cristo evangelio ali shimira cangunajma apamusha .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Ñucanchillara mana yapajta ahuayanchichu shujguna rashcaunamanda , astaun imasna canguna quirina yaparisha rin , chapaunchi ñucanchi tarabana cangunajpi talirijta atunyachishca achu , ñucanchi ushashcagama .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Munanchi canguna huashai tiaj partiunama evangelio shimira rimangaj . Shina rashallara shuj runa tarabashcai mana icushun ahuayangaj pai ñaupa horas rashcaunamanda .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Pi runas ahuayasha , Señorbi ahuayachu .

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Mana ali rimashcachu shu runa pai quiquinllara alabarisha , astaunga Dios alabashca runa valinmi .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Uyahuai shu ratolla ñuca yanga rimashcara . Ahuantapaichi ñucara .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Ñucaga cangunara llaquishcani Dios llaquishcahua . Cangunara casarachishcani Cristohua , shu sapalla carihua , cangunara shu chuyaj huanra huarmira cuenta Cristoma cungaj .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Astaun , manzhani imasna machacui sabiro asha Evara umachica , shinallara canguna iyai Cristoi ali quirishcamanda anzhuchi tucungaj .
