text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Shu runa shamujpi , shu tono Jesusta camachijpi , mana ñucanchi camachishcasna , ali ahuantanguichimi . Shinallara canguna shu tono espiritura chasquisha , mana canguna ñaupa apishca Espíritu ajpi , shu tono evangelio shimira uyasha , mana canguna ñaupa uyashca evangelio shimi ajpi , ali ahuantanguichimi .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Iyauni mana imais pishiyashcani chishu atun cachashca runaunamanda .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Ñuca rimana mana valij ajpis , mana shinachu ñuca yachana . Tucuibis tucuimandas caita cangunara ricuchishcanchi .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: ¿ Ñucaga ñucallara pishiyachisha cangunara ahuayachingaj , ucharachu rarcani , ñuca Diospa evangelio ali shimira yangamanda camachijpi ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Shu iglesiaunamanda cullquira apicani , paganara chasquisha cangunara sirvingaj .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Ñuca cangunahua tiaushcai ministiucani , shinajllaira pimandas mana mañacanichu , cullquira cuyahuai , nisha . Ñuca ima ministishcaras Macedoniamanda shamuj uquiuna cuyahuanauca . Tucuibi ricucani , shinallara ricusha , mana imais canguna cullquira gastangaj ñucaraigumanda .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Imasna Cristo cierto shimi ñucahua tiashcasna , ama pihuas ñuca ahuayachishcara arcachu Acaya partiunai .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: ¿ Imaraigu ? nini . ¿ Cangunara mana llaquishcamandachu ? Dios alimi yachan .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Ñucaga imasna cuna horas rashcasna rashallami , lugarda ama cungaj yanga camachijgunama , paiguna ama rimangaj : Quiquin Pablo cuenta raunchi , nisha .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Cai runauna , llulla cachashca runauna , llulla tarabajguna anaun , Cristo cierto cachashca runauna cuenta ricurisha nisha .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Caitaga mana manzharihuajchu . Quiquin Satanasllara punzhajlla ricurij ángel cuenta tucusha ricurimun .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Shinajllaira , mana manzharihuajchu paita sirvijguna shinallara alira raj sirvijguna cuenta ricurimunaun . Puchucaibi paiguna rashca tupui pagai tucunaungami .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Cutillara nini : Pis ñuca loco ajta ama iyapaichu . Shina iyajpi , shu loco runara cuenta lugarda cuhuapai ñucara ansallara ahuayachingaj .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Ñuca rimangaraushcaraga , mana Señormandachu rímani , astaun ansalla loco cuenta ñucallara ahuayachisha .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Ashca runauna paiguna aichai rashcaunamanda ahuayachinaun . Ñucas shinallara rasha .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Cangunaga cushihua upa runaunara ahuantanguichi , canguna umayujguna ashallara .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Ahuantanguichi shu runa cangunara sirvichijpi , shu runa cangunara micujpi , shu runa canguna charíshcara shuhuajpi , shu runa paulara ahuayachijpi , shu runa cangunara sajmajpi , paita ahuantanguichi .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Ñucanchiga chi tupullara rangaj irqui macanchi . Casna nisha pingarini . Shujgunaga imais ahuayachisha — loco cuenta rimauni — ñuca shina rashcaunais ñucallara ahuayachiuni .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Paigunaga , ¿ hebreos anaunzhui ? Ñucas shinallara . ¿ Israel runauna anaunzhui ? Ñucas shinallara . ¿ Abrahanmanda miraiguna anaunzhui ? Ñucas shinallara .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: ¿ Cristora sirvijguna anaunzhui ? Loco cuenta rimauni . Ñuca astaun mas paita sirvij ani . Tarabashcaunai , ñuca yali ani ; azutishcaunai , mana yupaihuaj ; chonda cularbi íshcashcaunai , ñuca astaun mas ; huañunallaunai , ñuca ashca cuti .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Judiogunamanda , pichca cuti azutishca ashcani , quinsa chunga iscun azutira apisha .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Quinsa cuti caspihua huactashca acani , shu cuti rumihua shitashca , quinsa cuti ñuca barco pambarishca lamarbi , shu punzha shu tuta pagarijta atun lamarbi tiaushcani .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Ñambiunai ashca cuti , yacuunamanda huañunalla ashcai , shuhuajgunamanda huañunalla ashcai , ñuca llactamanda ajgunamanda huañunalla ashcai , gentilgunamanda huañunalla ashcai , atun llactai huañunalla ashcai , tiu pambai huañunalla ashcai , lamarbi huañunalla ashcai , llulla uquiunamanda huañunalla ashcai tiashcani .

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Tarabashcai , sambayashcai , ashca tutaunai mana puñushcai , yarcaibi , upinaibis , ashca cuti mana micushcais , chiri ashcai , llatan ashcai tiashcani .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Maspas , tucui chigunamanda yali , caran punzha tormendarishcani , tucui iglesiaunamanda iyarisha turbarisha .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: ¿ Pita ungun ? ñucas shinallara unguni pamua . ¿ Pita urmachishca ? ñucas paihua llaquirini .

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Ministirijpi ñuca ahuayachingaj , ñuca samba ashcamanda ahuayachisha .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Diosga , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo Yaya huiñaigama bendiciashca achu . Paiga ali pacha yachan imasna ñuca mana llullanichu .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Damasco llactai , Aretas nishca rey apu llactai gobernador , paiguna llactara ishcaca ñucara apingaj .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Shinajllaira , rumi quinzhai aj ventanamanda atun tasai huarcusha irguchihuanauca , shina rasha paihua maquimanda quishpicani .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Cierto pacha mana valinzhu ñucara ahuayachingaj . Astaun nuspashcai cuenta ricushcaunara , Señormanda ricuchishcaunaras cuentasha nini .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Shu Cristoi quirij runara ricsinimi , aichai tiashca mana aichai tiashca ima chari , mana yachanichu , Dioslla yachan ; chunga chuscu huata pasashca tupura , ahua pachama apai tucuca .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Chi runara ricsinimi , aichai tiaj mana tiaj mana yachanichu , Dioslla yachan .

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Paiga Paraíso nishca Dios tiashcama apai tucuca . Chihui mana rimaihuaj gusto shimiunara uyacami , mana lugarda cushcachu aca casna shimiunara rimangaj .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Casna runamanda , ñuca ari ahuayachishami , randi ñuca quiquinmandaga mana imais ahuayachishachu , astaun ñuca samba sami tucushcai ahuayachishami .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Ñucaga ñucara ahuayachisha nishallara , mana upa sami tucuimacani , cierto shimira rimaimacani . Shina ajllaira mana rimanichu , pi runas ñucamanda pai ricushca yali pai uyashca yali ama yapajta iyarichu ñucamanda .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Ñuca ricushcauna yapa ali sumaj ashcamanda , ñuca ama mas tucuisiqui tucungaj , shu casha cuenta tormendarinara cushca acani aichai , shu Satanasmanda rimaj ñucara tormendachingaj , ñuca ama yapajta ahuayangaj .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Caimandaga quinsa cuti Diosta mañacani : Llushpichihuapai , nisha .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Paiga ñucara nica : Basta ñuca gracia ali iyai cambaj . Ñuca ushai pactarinmi samba ashcai . Shina ajllaira munaihua cushi tucuni ñuca samba ashcai , Cristo ushai ñucajpi tiangaj .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Chimanda , Cristora llaquishcaraigumanda samba ashcaunai cushiyauni , camishcaunais , jninistishcaunais , tormendachishcaunais , llaquirishcaunais . Ñuca samba ashcai , chi horasllaira shinzhi mani .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Upa macani , ñucallara ahuayachisha . Canguna rimashcamanda chita rarcani , randi canguna ñucara alabanami acanguichi . Mana imais pishi ashcanichu chi atun cachashca runaunamanda . Shina ajllaira mana imaschu ani .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Cachashca runa ricuchinauna ricurimunauca canguna chaupi shungüi ñuca rashcaunai , ashca chapanahua ashca munanaita ricurinaunahuas rashcaunahuas .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Cangunaga , ¿ imai shu iglesiaunamanda pishiyashcanguichichu ? ¿ Manzhu caibi , ñuca mana carga cuenta cangunahua tucucanichu ? Perdonahuapaichi caita .

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Ña quinsa cuti puruntushca ani cangunajma shamungaj . Cunas , mana carga cuenta tucushachu cangunahua . Cangunajta mana mascaunichu astaun canguna quiquingunallara . Churiuna mana tandachinachu yayaunara yanapangaj , astaun yayauna huahuaunara yanapangaj tandachina anaun .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Ali munaihua ñucajta gastachisha , maspas ñucallara illajta gastai tucusha canguna almara yanapangaj , ñuca cangunara astaun mas llaquisha , cangunaga ñucara pishi llaquishas .

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Caita ricsishaga , ñuca mana carga cuenta acani cangunahua , shinajllaira umayuj asha , cangunara apicani ñuca umayuj ashcamanda .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: ¿ Shu ñuca cangunama cachashca runahua cangunara umachishcani chari ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Titora rugacani ringaj , shu uquira cachacani paihua pariju . ¿ Tito cangunara umachica chari ? ¿ Manzhu paihuas ñucas shina espirituhua shina aitaushcai purishcanchichu ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: ¿ Charajchu iyaunguichi ñucanchi canguna ñaupajpi perdonahuai nisha rimaunchi ? Mana . Diospa ñaupajpi rimashcanchi Cristoi . Tucuira rimashcanchi , llaquishca uquiuna , cangunara shinzhiyachingaj .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Ñucaga manzhauni , cangunajma pactamujpi , cangunara mana ñuca munashcasna tupasha chari , ñucas mana canguna iyashcasnas . Tupasha chari caigunara : macanaunara , chijninaunara , piñanaunara , partiunara , manali shimiunara , mas tucuisiqui shunguunara , tormendosgunara .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Manzhauni imasna ñuca tigrajpi cangunajma , Dios ñucara pishiyachichu canguna ñaupajpi , huacasha chari ñaupa horas ucharajgunamanda , ashcauna mana arrepentirishcaraigu pai

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Ña quinsa cuti cangunajma shamunimi . Tucuira ishqui quinsapura ricujgunamanda rimashca anga , alichishca anga .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Ñaupa rimacani , cuna cutillara nini , cangunahua tiashcasna , cuna cuti illausha , ñaupa ucha rajgunama tucui chishujgunamas quillcauni , ñuca cuti shamushaga mana yangamanda perdonashachu .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Yachasha ninguichi : ¿ Cristo ñucajpi rimanzhu manzhu riman ? nisha . Paiga mana samba sami cangunahua , astaun ushaj tucun cangunajpi .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Cristo cierto pacha pai samba ashcai chacatashca aca , cunaga pai causaun Diospa ushaimanda . Shinallara ñucanchi paihua pariju samba sami anchi , shina ajllaira paihua pariju causashunmi Diospa ushaimanda , cangunara sirvingaj .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Cangunallara ricuichi , quirij ashas mana quirij ashas , cangunallara camaichí . ¿ Manzhu ricsinguichi imasna Jesucristo cangunajpi tiaun ? Mana shina asha , ichushcauna anguichi .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Canguna yachangaj munanchi imasna ñucanchi mana ichushcaunachu anchi .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Diosta mañanchi cangunamanda , canguna ama ima manaliras ranauchu ; mana ñucanchi ali tucungaj astaun canguna alira rangaj , ñucanchi ichushcaunalla cuenta ricurisha .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Quiquin cierto shimira arcangaj mana ima ranaras ushanchichu , randi paita yanapangaj .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Chiraigumanda cushi tucunchi ñucanchi samba sami asha , canguna shinzhi ashas . Maspas mañanchi cangunamanda canguna aliyashca tucungaj .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Chiraigumanda quillcauni manara shamujllaira , ama piñasha rimangaj ñuca shamushcai . Casna rimana ushaira Señor cuhuaca , cangunara shayachingaj , mana cangunara tulangaj .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Uquiuna cushiyaichi , ali tucuichi , cariyaichi . Chi tupullara iyaichi . Cushi shunguhua tiaichi . Cushi shungura cuj Dios , llaquij Dios asha , cangunahua tiangami .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Cangunapura parijumanda saluraichi chuyaj muchashcahua .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Tucui quirijguna cangunara saluranaun .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: Señor Jesucristo gracia ali iyai , Dios llaquishca , Santo Espíritu compañanas tucui cangunahua tiachu . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Pablo , apóstol nishca Dios cachashca runa , mana runaunamandachu , mana runa cachashca , astaun Jesucristo cachashca , shinallara Dios Yaya cachashca , Jesucristora huañushcaunamanda causachij ,

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: tucui ñucahua tiaj uquiunandi , Galacia nishca partii tiaj iglesiaunara saluranchi .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Gracia nishca ali iyaira , cushi shunguras charichi Dios Yayamanda , Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Paiga pai quiquinllarara cuca ñucanchi uchamanda , ñucanchira cai manali tiempomanda cacharingaj , ñucanchi Dios Yaya munashcasna .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Paiga sumacyachishca achu huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Manzharisha tiauni imasnara canguna uctalla anzhurishcanguichi canguna cayaj runamanda . Pai cangunara cayaca Cristo gracia nishca yangamanda llaquishcaraigumanda , astaumbas shu tono evangelio shimira catishcanguichi .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Shinashas , shu evangelio shimis illan , astaumbas huaquinguna cangunara turbachinaun , Cristo evangeliora turcasha nisha .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Maspas ñucanchis , shu ahuapachamanda angelbas , shu tono evangeliora rimajpi , mana ñucanchi rimashca samira , pai maldiciashca achu .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Imasnara ñaupa rimacanchi , shinallara cuti nini : Maican runas shu tono evangeliora cangunara rimajpi , mana canguna ñaupa apishca sami ajpi , pai maldiciashca achu .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: ¿ Cunaga runauna llaquishcarachu mascauni ? ¿ Manzhu Dios llaquishcara mascauni ? ¿ Runaunara cushiyachingaj mascaunichu ? Ñuca chara runaunara cushiyachisha , mana Cristora sirvijchu aima .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Shinasha canguna yachangaj munani , uquiuna , ñuca rimaushca evangelio shimi mana runamandachu .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ñuca cai shimira mana apicanichu , mana yachacanichu runaunamanda , astaun Jesucristo ñucama ricuchihuaca .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Ñuca ñaupa horas causashca tupura ña uyashcanguichi , ñuca judio yachaira catishca horas , imasna Diospa iglesiara ashcara tormendachicani , tulacani .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Ñucaga judioguna yachaibi ashca ñuca tiempoi causajgunara yalicani ñuca llactai . Ashca munaihua ñuca yayauna yachaigunara llaquicani .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Randi , Dios munashca horaspi , ñuca mama icsamanda pacha ñucara chicanyachisha , cayahuacami pai llaquishcamanda ,

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: paihua Churira ñucajpi ricuchingaj , ñuca paihua shutira yachachingaj gentilgunama , aichahuas yahuarhuas mana chi ratollai rimacanichu .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Shinallara Jerusalenma mana ricanichu ñucamanda ñaupa aj cachashca runaunajma , astaun Arabia partima ricaní , chi huasha cuti tigracani Damasco llactama .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Shinajpi , quinsa huata huasha , Jerusalenma ricani Pedrohua rimangaj , paihua pariju chunga pichca punzhara tiaucani .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Jacobo , Señorba uquiras , ricucani , maspas shu cachashca runaunara mana ricucanichu .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Cai ñuca cangunama quiilcashcai , Diospa ñaupajpi mana ansas llullanichu .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Chimanda huasha , Siria Cilicia partiunama ricani .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Cristoi tiaj iglesiauna , Judea partii tiajguna , ñucara chara mana ricsihuanaucachu ñahuipura .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Chi rimashcallara uyanauca : Ñucanchira ñaupa horas tormendachij runaga , pai ñaupa horas chijnishca quirinara cuna camachiun .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Ñucamanda Diosta ahuayachinauca .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Chunga chuscu huata huasha , cutillara Jerusalenma ricani Bernabehua , Titoras ñucahua pariju pushasha .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Dios ñucara ricuchishcaraigu chima sicacani . Sapallai atun ricurijgunahua ñuca gentilgunama rimashca evangelio shimira cuentacani , alichu manzhu ali nisha tapungaj .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Astaun , ñucahua pariju tiaj Tito , griego ashallara , circuncisionda rangaj mana mandai tucucachu .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Huaquin llulla uquiuna pacalla pacalla icunauca , ñucanchi Jesucristoi charishca liuri causanara ricungaj , ñucanchira cutillara sirvijta rangaj .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Caigunara mana shu horashuallas uyacanchichu casungaj , evangelio cierto shimi cangunahua saquiringaj .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Randi atun ricurijguna , ( paiguna ñaupa horas imasna asnearas mana imas tucuhuanzhu , Dios runaunara mana chicanyachisha ricunzhu ) , cai atunguna ñucama mana ima mushuj shimiras cuentahuanaucachu .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Randiga , paiguna ricunauca imasna ñucama cushca aca evangeliora rimangaj circuncisión nishcara mana rajgunama , shinallara Pedrora circuncisión nishcara rajgunama cushca aca rimangaj .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Ushaira cuj Dios Pedrora cachaca circuncisionda apijgunama , shinallara ñucamas ushaira cuca gentilgunama yachachisha ringaj .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Shinajpi Jacobo , Cefas , Juandi , iglesia istandi cuenta iyashcauna , ñucama cushca gracia nishcara ricusha , ali maquira cuhuanauca yanapangaj ñucamas Bernabemas , ñucanchi gentilgunama ringaj , paigunaga circuncisionda apijgunama ringaj .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Ñucanchi tsuntsuunara iyaringaj , caillarara rugahuanauca . Shinallara caita munaihua rangaj camacani .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Pedroga Antioquía llactama shamujpi , paita ñahui pambai piñacani , pai causayuj ajpi .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Jacobomanda huaquinguna manara shamujllaira , Pedro gentilgunahua micuj aca ; astaumbas paiguna shamushca huasha , chican micuj aca , circuncisionda catijgunara manzhashcamanda .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Chishu judiogunas paihua pariju shina ranauca , shinallara Bernabé paiguna manali raushcai catica .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Ñuca imasna paiguna evangelio shimii mana dirichu purishcara ricusha , Pedrora rimacani tucui runa ñaupajpi : Can , judio ashallara , gentilguna cuenta causausha , mana judio cuenta , ¿ imaraigu gentilgunara camachingui judioguna yachaira catingaj ?

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Ñucanchi judioguna miraimanda anchi mana uchasapa gentilgunamanda .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Yachanchi imasnara shu runa Dioshua ali tucun , mana ley shimira rashcaunamanda , astaun Jesucristoi quirishcamanda . Ñucanchis shinallara Jesucristoi quirishcanchi ali tucungaj Cristoi quirishcamanda , mana ley shimi rashcaunamanda , imasna ley shimi rashcaunamanda mana pihuas ali tucungachu .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Shinallara , ñucanchi Dioshua alichishcauna tucusha nijpi Cristoi , shina ashallara chara uchara raunchi , ¿ caimandachu Cristo uchara rachij tucun ? Mana pacha .

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Ñuca ñaupa horas tulashcaunara cutillara sicachishaga , uchara raj tucuni .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Shinajpi ley raigumanda ñuca chi leyhuajta huañushcani , Diospa ñaupajllai causangaj .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Cristohua pariju chacatashca mani , ña mana causaunichu ñuca , astaumbas Cristo ñucajpi causaun . Ñuca cai aichai cuna causaushca causaiga Diospa Churu quirishcai causauni . Pai ñucara llaquica , pai quiquinllarara cuca ñuca randimanda .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Diospa gracia nishca yangamanda llaquishcara mana ichunichu . Ali causanaga ley shimimanda shamujpi , Cristo yangamanda huañuca .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: ¡ Upa Gálatasguna ! ¿ Pita cangunara umachicachu cierto shimira ama uyangaj ? Canguna ñahui pambai , canguna chaupi shungüi Jesucristo chacatashcara pajlla pambai ricuchishca aca .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Caillara cangunamanda yachasha nini : ¿ Ley shimi ranaunamandachu Espiritura chasquicanguichi ? ¿ Manzhu uyasha quirishcamanda chasquicanguichi ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: ¿ Casna upauna anguichi ? ¿ Espirituhua callarishallara , cunaga aichamandachu ali tucushun nisha iyanguichi ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: ¿ Yangamandachu chi tucuira tormendarishcanguichi ? Yangamanda chari aca .

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Espiritura cangunama cuj Diosga , canguna chaupi shungüi munanaita Rajga , ¿ pai cai tucuira rarca ley shimi ranaunamandachu ? ¿ Manzhu uyasha quirishcamanda aca ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Shinallarami Abraham Diosta quirica , Dioshua alichishcami nishca aca .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Caita yachaichi , quirijgunaga Abrahamba churiunami .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Quillcashcaunai ñaupa ricurica imasnara Dios gentilgunara alichinma paiguna quirishcamanda . Ñaupa horasmanda caita rimasha , ali shimira Abrahamda cuentaca , shina nisha : Canmanda tucui ailluuna bendiciai tucunaungami .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Shinajpi , quirijguna quirij Abrahamhua pariju bendiciai tucunaushcami .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Tucui ley shimii rashcaunai quimirijguna maldiciashcaunami . Quillcashcami tian : Maican runas tucui ley shimü quillcashca ranaunaras mana rasha causausha maldiciashcami .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Imasnara ley shimiunamanda mana pihuas Diospa ñaupajpi ali tucun casnami quillcashca tian : Ali runa pai quirishcamandami causanga .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Ley shimiga mana quirinamandachu , astaumbas : Chita raj runa chimandami causanga , nin .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Cristoga ñucanchira randica ley shimi maldiciashcamanda , ñucanchimanda pai maldiciai tucuca . Quillcashca tian : Maldiciashcami tucui runa yurai huarcushca huañuj .

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Cristo Jesús maldiciai tucuca Abrahamba bendición gentilgunama pactachu , ñucanchi quirishcamanda cusha nishca Espiritura apingaj .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Uquiuna , runa tonoi rimauni . Shu pactachina shimi , runamanda ashas , ña ali nishca ashas , pi runas mana tucuchin , pi runas mana yapan .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Dios cushca shimiunara Abrahanma cushcaca , paihua miraimas . Mana ninzhu paihua miraigunama , ashcaunama cushca cuenta , astaumbas shujmalla : Camba miraima , nisha . Cai miraiga Cristomi .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Caitami nini : Chi ñaupa cushca pactachina shimira ñaupa horas Dios alimi nica . Shinajpi ley shimiga , chusca patsac quinsa chunga huata huasha shamujpi , ñaupa shamuj cushca shimira mana tucuchinzhu chi shimira huajlichingaj .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Herencia nishca yayamanda saquishcaga ley shimimanda shamujpi , ña mana cushca shimimandachu . Astaumbas Dios Abrahanma cusha saquica , shimira cushcamanda .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Shinajpi , ¿ Imajta sirvin cai ley shimi ? Manali rashcaunamanda cushca aca , ñaupa horas cushca shimi rimashca mirai shamunagama , paihuajma shimi cushcaraigu . Chi shimiga angelgunamanda cushca aca , shu alichij runahua .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Alichij runaga mana ministirinzhu shu runallahua ; Diosga shujllami .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Shinajpi , ¿ ley shimihua Dios cushca shimiunahua contrachu ? Mana pacha . Ley shimi causachina ushajpi , cierto pacha ali causana ley shimimanda shamunmaca .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Quillcashca shimiga tucuira ucha ucui ishcaca , Jesucristoi quirishcamanda cushca shimira quirijgunama cushca achu .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Quirina horas manara pactamujllaira , huacachishca acanchi ley shimi ucui , ishcashca cuenta acanchi quirinara ricuchinagama .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Shinasha , ley shimi ñucanchira cuiraj maca , ñucanchira Cristoma pushangaj , ñucanchi Cristo Jesuspi quirishalla ali tucungaj .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Quirina horas pactamujpiga , cuirajta ña mana ministinchichu .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Canguna tucui Diospa churiuna anguichi Cristo Jesuspi quirishcamanda .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Tucui canguna Cristoi bautisashcauna Cristora churarishcanguichi .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ña judio illan , griego illan ; shinallara sirvijpas liuri runas illan ; shinallara caris huarmis illan . Tucui canguna shujlla anguichi Cristo Jesuspi .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Shinallara , canguna Cristojguna asha , cierto pacha Abrahamba miraiguna anguichi , maspas shimi cushcamanda herencia nishcara apijguna anguichi .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Caitami nini : Herencia nishca yayamanda cushcara apij huahua asha , mana imais sirvij runamanda shu tono ricurinzhu , pai tucuimanda dueño ashallara .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Paiga cuirajguna yachachijguna maquiunai causaun , yaya rimashca horas pactamunagama .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Shinallarami ñucanchis huahua horaspi cai mundu yachaira sirvijguna macanchi .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Astaumbas tiempouna pactaríjpi , Dios paihua Churira cachamuca , huarmimanda pagarishca , ley shimi ucui pagarishca ,

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: ñucanchira , ley shimi ucui tiajgunara randingaj , ñucanchi churiuna tucungaj .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Cangunaga , churiuna asha , Dios paihua Churi Espiritura cachamuca canguna shüngui : Abba , Yaya , nisha caparin .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Shinasha , ña mana sirvijchu angui , astaumbas churi tucushcangui . Maspas , churi asha Diosmanda herencia nishca Yayamanda cushcara apij tucungui Cristoi .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Cierto pacha ñaupa horas , Diosta mana ricsisha , yanga llulla disogunara sirvicanguichi .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Cunaga Diosta ña ricsisha , astaun ali , Diosmanda ricsishca asha , ¿ imarasha cutillara cai mana valij mundu yachaima tigrasha ninguichi chita cutillara sirvingaj .

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Huaquin punzhaunara , quillaunaras , tiempounaras , huataunaras huacachinguichi .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Cangunamanda manzhauni , cangunara yangamanda chari yachachishcani .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Uquiuna , cangunara rugauni , ñucasna aichi , imasna ñuca cangunasna tucucani . Ñucajta ima manaliras mana rashcanguichichu .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Canguna iyaringuichimi imasna ñuca aichai tiaj ungüimanda , ñaupa punda cangunama evangelio shimira rimacani .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Ñuca ungüimanda , aichai ricurimushcamanda , ñucara mana piñahuacanguichichu , mana ichuhuacanguichichu . Astaumbas ñucara chasquihuacanguichimi shu Diospa angelda cuenta , quiquin Cristo Jesusta cuenta .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Canguna chi horas charishca ali shunguga , ¿ cuna maibirai ? Cangunara nini , usharijpi canguna quiquin ñahui muyura llucchinguichimaca ñucama cungaj .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Cierto shimira cangunara rimashcamanda , ¿ ñucaraga chijninguichichu ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Chi runaunaga cangunara mascanaun , mana ali shungumanda , astaumbas cangunara ñucanchimanda anzhuchingaj , canguna paigunajma llutaringaj .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Alimi valin alira mascangaj tucui horaspi , mana ñuca cangunahua tiaushca horasllai .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Ñuca churihuauna , cangunamanda cutillara nanahuanmi huahuara pagarichina nanaigunahua cuenta , Cristo canguna ucui iñangagama .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Cunallara cangunahua tiangaj munaimacani , ñuca rimanara turcangaj . Cangunamanda turbariuni .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Canguna , ley camachishca shimira catisha nijguna , rimahuaichi : ¿ Manzhu uyashcanguichi chi ley shimi rimashcara ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Quillcashca tian imasna Abraham ishqui churiyuj maca , shujga sirvij huarmimanda , chishujga liuri huarmimanda .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Sirvij huarmimanda huahua aichamandami pagarimuca , astaumbas liuri huarmimanda huahuaga Dios shimira cushcamanda pagarimuca .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Caiga shu pacashca shimimi . Cai ishqui huarmi ishqui pactachina shimiunara iyarichin . Shujga cierto pacha Sinai urcumanda cushca aca , huahuaunara sirvingajlla pagarichij , caimi Agar nishca huarmi aca .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Cai Agar Sinai nishca urcura iyarichin , Arabia nishca partii ; shinallara cuna tiaj Jerusalenda ricuchin . Paiga paihua huahuaunandi sirvijguna tucunaushcami .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Astaumbas , ahuamanda Jerusalén liurimi , paimi tucui ñucanchi mama cuenta .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Quillcashca tian : Cushiyai , huahuara mana ricuj , mana pagar ichij . Cushihua capari huahuamanda nanai illaj huarmi . Ichushca huarmi mas huahuaunara charin cariyujmanda yali .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Cunaga , uquiuna , ñucanchi Isac cuenta , shimi cushcamanda churiuna manchi .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Shinashas , imasna ñaupa horaspi aichamanda pagarishca runa Espiritumanda pagarishca runara tormendachica , shinallarami tucun cuna horaspas .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: ¿ Quillcashcaga imara ninzhu ? Shinami nin : Sirvij huarmira paihua churindi ichui , sirvij huarmimanda churi ama herencia nishcara apingaj liuri huarmimanda churihua pariju .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Shinasha , uquiuna , ñucanchi mana sirvij huarmimanda churiunachu anchi , astaun liuri huarmimanda anchi .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Shinzhi tucuichi canguna liuri tucushcai , imasnara Cristo ñucanchira liuriyachihuaca . Ama voltiarichichu cutillara sirvijguna tucungaj .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Caita , ñuca , Pablo , cangunara nini : canguna circuncisión nishcara rajpi , Cristo cangunajma imajpas mana valinzhu .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Cutillara nini : Maican runas circuncisión ranara rausha , ña entero ley shimira pactachina anga .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Cristomanda anzhurishcanguichi , canguna ley ranaunamanda ali tucusha nijguna . Gracia nishca ali iyaimanda urmashcanguichi .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Ñucanchiga Diospa Espiritumanda pai cushca ali tucunara chapaunchimi , ñucanchi quirishcamanda .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Cristo Jesuspi quirijpi , circuncisionda ranas mana ranas imajpas mana valinzhu , astaumbas valinmi ñucanchi llaquij shungumanda quirina .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Ñaupa horas alimi purijguna acanguichi , ¿ pita cangunara turbachica cierto shimira mana pactachingaj ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Casna iyaiga mana cangunara cayaj Diosmandachu shamun .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Ansalla punguichina polvo entero masashcara punguichin .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Cangunamanda chapauni Señorbi , canguna shu tonoi ama iyaringaj . Astaun , cangunara turbachij runa taripai tucungami , maican ashas .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Ñucaga , uquiuna , circuncisionda rana shimira chara camachijllaira , ¿ imaraigu chara ñucara tormendachihuanaun ? Casna ajpi cruzmanda tormendarina ña tucurishca .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Cangunara turbachijguna paigunallara pitinauchu .

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Cangunaga , uquiuna , liuriuna tucungaj cayashca anguichi . Shinashas , liuriuna ajpi , canguna liuri tucushcara ama huajlichinguichichu ucha aicha munaira sirvingaj , astaumbas cangunapura parijumanda sirvinguichimi llaquinaushcamanda .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Entero ley camachishca shimi cai shimii pactachishca tian : Camba mayambi tiajta can cuentallara llaquina mangui .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Cangunapura parijumanda caninaushas micunaushas , ricupaichi cangunapura ama tucuringuichichu .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Shinajpi nini : Espiritui purichi , ucha aicha munashcara ama ranguichichu .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Aichaga Espirituhua , Espíritu aichahua macananaun . Caiguna chijnijpura tucunaun , can munashcara ama rangaj .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Cangunaga Espíritu pushashca asha , ley shimira mana uyanachu .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Aicha rashcaunaga pajllai ricurimunaun , caigunami : shujpa huarmira apiña , shujhua tacarina , irus iyai , aicha munashcara rana ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: runa rashca diosta alabana , sagranauna , chijninauna , pinanausha causana , tumbanauna , piñarinauna , macanauna , piñanauna , llulla quirinauna ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: shujguna charishcamanda chijninauna , huañuchinauna , machanauna , yali micuna upina istauna , casna ranaunandi . Cangunara nini : casnara rajguna Dios mandana pachara mana apinaungachu .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Astaumbas , Espíritu iñachishcaunaga caigunami : Llaquina , cushiyana , ganaslla causana , ali chapana iyai , alirana iyai , ali shungu , quirina ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: Manso shungu , aicha munaira arcanas . Caigunahua ima ley shimis mana tianzhu .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Cristojgunaga aichara chacatanaushcami , pai llaquishcaunandi , pai munashcaunandis .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Ñucanchi Espiritui causausha , shinallara Espiritui purishunchi .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Ama alabarishunchi , parijumanda ama piñanausha , parijumanda ama chijninausha .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Uquiuna , shu runa uchai urmajpi , canguna Espirituhua undachishcauna cai runara alichichi manso shunguhua , canllara iyarisha cambas ama shinallara tentai tucungaj .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Cangunaga shujguna cargara aparichi , shina rasha Cristo camachishcara pactachichi .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Maican runas valij mani nisha iyasha , mana imas ashallara , pai quiquinllara umachin .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Shinasha , caran dueño pai quiquin rashcara ricuchu , pai quiquin rashcamanda alabai tucungaj , astaun mana shujpajmanda .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Caran dueño paihua quiquin aparinara aparichu .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Diospa shimira yachachishca runa ima aliras cuyachu paita yachachij runama .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Cangunallara ama umachichichu , Dios mana burlaihuajchu . Imaras shu runa tarpusha , chi samillarara pallangami .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Pi runas paihua quiquin aicha munashcara tarpusha , aichamanda ismura pallangami . Astaumbas maicambas Espíritu munashcara tarpusha , paiga Espiritumanda huiñai causaira pallangami .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Ama sambayashunchi alira rangaj . Ñucanchi mana sambayasha , pactarishca punzhai pallashunmi .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Shinajpi , lugar tiajpi , alira rashunchi tucuiunahua , maspas quirijgunahuas .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Ricupaichi ima atun letrahua cangunama quillcauni ñuca quiquin maquihua .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Aichai ali ricurishun nijguna cangunara circuncisionda rangaj mandanaun , paigunalla ama tormendari tucungaj Jesuspa cruz raigumanda .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Circuncisionda rangaj nijgunallara ley camachishca shimira mana pactachinaun . Astaumbas cangunara circuncisionda rangaj munanaun canguna aichamanda alabai tucungaj .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Ñucajpi ama lugar tiachu ñucallara alabaringaj , astaumbas ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo cruzpi cushiyasha , paimanda mundu ñucajma chacatashca aca , ñucas munduma .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Cristo Jesuspiga , circuncisionda ranas mana ranas imajpas mana valinzhu , astaumbas mushuj causanami valin .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Tucui cai camachishcai purijguna cushiras llaquinaras charinauchu , shinallara Diospa Israel .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Cunamanda ñaupajma pihuas ama molestahuachu . Ñuca aichai Señor Jesuspa sefíalgunara charini .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Uquiuna , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai canguna espirituhua tiachu . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Pablo , Jesucristo cachashca runa Dios munashcamanda , Efesoi tiaj quirijgunama quillcashca , Cristo Jesuspi ali cierto quirijgunama :

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ñucanchi Yaya Diosmanda , Señor Jesucristomandas , gracia nishca ali iyaira , cushi shunguras charichi .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Dios , Señor Jesucristo Yaya , alabashca achu . Pai tucui almai bendiciongunahua ñucanchira bendiciashcami Cristoi ahua pacha partiunai .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Cai pachara manara rashca horasllaira , Dios ñucanchira ajllaca Cristoi , ñucanchi paihua ñaupajpi chuyajlla ima iruspas illaj tucungaj .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Dios ñucanchira llaquisha , ñaupa horasmanda pacha ñucanchira chicanyachica paihua quiquin churiuna tucungaj Jesucristomanda , pai ali munashcasna ,

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: paihua sumaj gracia nishca ali iyai alabai tucungaj , pai llaquishca Churu ñucanchira chasquingaj .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Jesucristoi randishcauna manchi paihua yahuar talishcamanda , ñucanchi ucharashcauna perdonashca ajpi , paihua yapa valij gracia nishca ali iyai tupura .

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: Dios cai gracia nishcara yapajta cuhuaca tucui yachanais , tucui intindinais .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Paihua ñaupa horas pacashca munaira cuna yachachihuashcami , paihua ali munaimanda , pai quiquinllara casna munasha ,

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: tiempouna pactarijpi tucuira Cristoi tandachingaj , ahua pachai tiajgunandis , cai pachai tiajgunandis .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Paihuajilai , shinallara , herencia nishca apiñara charicanchi , ñaupa horasmanda pai ajllashcauna ashcaraigu , pai iyarishcasna .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Dios casna rarca , ñucanchimanda Diospa sumajta alabai tucungaj , ñucanchi ñaupa punda Cristoi chapajguna asha .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Canguna shinallara Diospa cierto shimira , canguna almara quishpichina evangelio shimira uyajpi , Cristoi quirishca ajpi , Dios cusha nishca Santo Espirituhua shu sellohua cuenta , cangunara paihuaj ajta ricuchishcami .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Caí Espirítuga ñucanchima ñaupamanda cushcami , ñucanchi huasha bendiciai tucungaraushcara cierto ajta ricuchingaj , Dios ñucanchira randishca pactaringagama , Diospa sumajta alabai tucungaj .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Chiraigumanda ñucas , canguna Señor Jesuspi quirishcara uyasha , canguna tucui quirijgunara llaquishcaras uyasha ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: ñuca cangunamanda Diosta agrasingaj mana saquinichu , cangunara iyarisha ñuca mañashcaunai .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Ñuca mañani , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristoj Dios , atun sumaj Yaya , cangunara shu ali intindinara , ali yachana iyairas cuchu , paita ricsinai ,

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: canguna iyaimanda ñahuiuna punzhayachishca anauchu , canguna yachangaj imara chapaunguichi pai cayashcai , shinallara ima gusto sumaj herencia nishca apiñara Cristo charin quirijgunai .

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Mañauni canguna Diospa atun ushaira yachangaj ñucanchira yanapangaj , imasna paihua shinzhi ushaihua rashcasna .

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: Dios cai atun ushaira ricuchica imahoras pai Cristora huañushcaunamanda causachica , paita paihua ali maqui partima tiáchica ahua pachai .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Chihui , tucui gobierno ahuais , tucui apu , tucui ushana , tucui mandana ahuais , tucui rimashca shuti ahuais ahuayachishca aca cuna horaspis , huasha shamuna horaspis .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Shinasha , Dios tucuira Cristo chaqui ucui churashcami . Shinallara paita uma cuenta churashcami tucui ahuai , iglesiama .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Iglesiaga paihua aichami . Cristo tucuira tucuibi undachin shinallara paihua aichai undajta causaun .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Canguna ucharanais manali rashcaunais huañushca horaspi , Dios cangunara causaira cucami .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Ñaupa horas canguna chi ucha raushcai causacanguichi , cai mundu causashcasna , huairai mandaj supai apu causana tupui . Cai supai cunallara tarabaun mana casuj runauna shungüi .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Shinallara ñaupa horas tucui ñucanchi caigunahua causacanchi ñucanchi aicha munashcaunai , aicha munairas iyai munairas rasha . Ñucanchi quiquin rashcaunamanda Dios piñarishcai tiaucanchi tucui chishu runauna cuenta .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Shinasha , Dios yapa llaquij asha , pai ñucanchira ashcara llaquishcamanda ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: ñucanchi chara ucharanai huañushca ajpi , pai ñucanchira causaira cuca Cristohua pariju . Paihua gracia nishca llaquishcamanda quishpichishca anguichi .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Cristohua pariju pai ñucanchira causachica , shinallara ñucanchira ahuai tiachica Cristo Jesushua pariju ,

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: huasha tiempounai paihua gracia nishca ashca valishcara ricuchingaj , pai ñucanchira llaquishcamanda Cristo Jesuspi .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Gracia nishca yanga llaquishcamanda quishpichishca anguichi , canguna quirishcamanda . Caiga mana cangunamandachu , astaumbas Dios cushcami .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Cai quishpinaga mana ranaunamandachu , pihuas pai quiquinllara ama alabarichu .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Ñucanchiga Dios rashcauna manchi , Cristo Jesuspi iñachishcauna , alira rangaj . Cai ali ranaunara Dios ñaupamanda alichica ñucanchi caigunara rasha causangaj .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Chimanda iyarichi imasna ñaupa horas canguna gentilguna ajpi aichai , circuncisionda mana rajguna nishca acanguichi circuncisionda rajgunamanda , paiguna aichai maquihua rajgunamanda .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Chi horasgunai , Cristo illaj macanguichi , Israel aillumanda chicanyachishca , Dios cushca pactachina shimiuna illaj , ima chapanas illaj , Diospas illaj cai pachai .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Astaumbas Cristo Jesuspi , canguna ñaupa horas carui tiajguna , cuna horasga mayanllayachishca acanguichi , Cristo yahuar raigumanda .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Paiga ñucanchi cushimi . Ishqui runa montonmanda , shujllara rarca , chicanyana quinzhara cuenta tulasha .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Cristo Jesús , paihua aichai chi piñanaunara tucuchicami , ley camachishca shimii rimashcaunandi paihua ranaunandi . Pai quiquimbi ishqui montonmanda shuj mushuj runallara rarca , cushira rasha .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Cruzpa raigumanda Cristo ishqui runa montonguna Dioshua amigopura rarca shu aichallai , paihua cruzpi piñanaunara huañuchisha .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Pai shamuca cushi shimira rimangaj canguna carui tiajgunama , chishu mayanllai tiajgunamas .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Jesucristomanda ñucanchi ishquindi monton shu Espiritumandalla Yaya ñaupajpi icunchi .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Shinasha cuna canguna mana carumandaunachu anguichi , mana pasiajgunas , astaun quirijgunahua pariju causajguna anguichi , Diospa aillui tiajguna .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Dios cachashca runauna ahuai , Diosmanda rimajguna ahuais shayachishca acanguichi , rumi istandi siquiga quiquin Jesucristomi .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Entero huasi Jesuspi ali rashca asha , iñasha rin shu chuyaj templo huasi cuenta tucungaj Señorbi .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Paihuajpi canguna shinallara pariju shayachishca anguichi shu huasira rangaj , Dios chihui causangaj Espiritui .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Chiraigumanda , ñuca , Pablo , canguna gentilgunamanda chonda cularbi Cristo Jesuspa ishcashca runa mani .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Canguna uyashcanguichi chari imasna Dios ñucara ajllacami paihua gracia nishca llaquishcara cangunara yachachingaj .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Pai ricuchishcamanda cai pacashca shimira ñucama rimashca aca , imasna ñaupa ansallara quillcacani .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Chi quillcara ricusha , ricsinara ushanguichi imasna Cristo pacashca shimira intindiuni .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Cai pacashca shimi , ñaupa horasgunai runa churiunama mana ricuchishcachu aca , astaumbas cuna horas Espiritumanda chuyaj cachashca runaunama Diosmanda rimajgunamas ricuchishcami ,

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: imasna gentilguna judiogunahua pariju Dios cushca shimira chasquijgunami , shinallara Cristo aichamanda partiunami , maspas Dios cushca shimira apijgunami Cristo Jesuspi , evangelio shimimanda .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Cai shimira yachachij tucucani , Diospa gracia nishcara ñucama cushcamanda , paihua ushai rashcasna .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Ñuca tucui quirijgunamanda pishi ajllaira , cai gracia nishca valijta ñucama cushca aca gentilgunama evangelio shimira rimangaj , Cristoi tiaj mana tupuihuaj valijgunara .

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Shinallara ñucama cushca aca tucui runaunara ricuchingaj imasna Dios pacashca shimi pactarinmaca . Unai tiempounamanda tucuira raj Diospi pacashcami aca .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Dios casnami rarca , paihua atun yachashcara iglesiamanda cuna yachachingaj ahua pachai tiaj mandajgunamas , ushajgunamas ,

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: imasna pai huiñaimanda iyashcasna ñucanchi Señor Jesucristoi rangaj .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Paihuajpi huacachishca manchi , maspas Diospa ñaupajpi icumunara charinchi mana manzhasha , Cristoi quirishca raigumanda .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Chiraigumanda cangunara rugauni ama llaquiringaj ñuca tormendarinaunamanda cangunaraigu . Randi , caiguna canguna ahuayachinami .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Caimandami Señor Jesucristo Yaya ñaupajpi cungurini .

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Paimanda tucui aillu ahua pachais cai pachais shutichishcami .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Diosta mañauni imasna pai ali sumacyachishcasna , paihua ushanahua cangunara shmzhiyachingaj canguna shungu ucui , paihua Espiritumanda .

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: Shinallara mañauni Cristo canguna shungu ucui causachu canguna quirishcamanda , canguna ali shinzhi shayachishca asha llaquishcai ,

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: tucui quirijgunahua ali intindingaj imasna Cristo llaquishca anzhu ashcara , suni ashcaras , ucu ashcaras , ahua ashcaras ,

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: maspas Cristo llaquishcara yachangaj , tucui yachanaras pasajta , shinallara canguna shungu quiquin Dioshua tali tali undajta angaj .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Dios ushajmi tucuira ñucanchi mañashcamanda intindishcamandas yalijta rangaj , imasna ñucanchi ucui paihua ushai taraban .

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: Paiga sumacyachishca achu iglesiai Cristo Jesuspi tucui tiempounai huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Ñucaga , Señorda sirvishcamanda chonda cularbi ishcashca runa , cangunara rugauni canguna cayashcasna alira puringaj .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Manso shunguhua , ali shunguhuas , ali chapanahuas , parijumanda ahuantanuichi llaquishcahua .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Ali ricuichi shujlla tucungaj Espiritui , cushi shunguhua parijupura asha .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Shu aicha tian , shu Espíritu , imasna shu chapanallahua cayai tucucanguichi .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Shu Señor tian , shu quirina , shu bautisana .

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Shu Dios tian , tucuihua Yaya . Paiga tucui ahuai tucuihuajtas , tucuibis .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Shinashas caran dueño ñucanchima gracia nishcara cushca aca , imasna Cristo cushcasna .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Chiraigumanda rimashca tian : Ahuama sicasha , ishcashca runaunara paihua pariju pushaca ; runaunama cushcaunara cucami .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Cai sicashca nishcaga , ¿ manzhu nin pai caí pacha ucumanda mas huashama ñaupa irguca ?

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Cai irgujga shinallarami ahuama sicaca tucui ahua pachauna ahuai , tucuira undachingaj .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Paillara cuca : Huaquingunara apóstoles nishca Dios cachashca runauna tucungaj , shujgunara Diosmanda rimajguna , shujgunara evangelio ali shimira rimajguna , shujgunaraga ricujgunas yachachijgunas ,

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: quirijgunara alichingaj Diosta sirvinauchu , shinallara Cristo cuerpo nishca aichara shinzhiyachingaj ;

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: tucui ñucanchi shujllai pactanagama , quirinais , Diospa Churira ricsinais , caran dueño ali shunguyuj runa pactanagama , pactajta runa tucungaj , Cristohua undachishca ;

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: ñucanchi ama istu istu purij huahuaunasna angaj , ama manali yachachina huaira cuenta pai munashcama apai tucungaj , ama umachij runauna umachishcahua pandarina shimihuas umachi tucungaj .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Astaumbas , cierto shimira llaquinahua catisha , tucuibi Cristoi iñashunchi , paimi ñucanchi uma .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Paimanda , entero aicha ali tandachishca , ali pigarishca asha , tucui paihua mucuuna parijumanda yanapanaun , caran parti paihua tonoi rasha , iñasha ringaj llaquinai .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Shinajpi caitami nini , Señorbi rimauni shinallara munani , canguna cunallara ama purínguichi shu gentilguna cuenta , paiguna manali iyashcaunai .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Paiguna intindinai llanduyashca anaun , Diospa causanamanda anzhurishca , paiguna yachai illaj ashcamanda , paiguna shungu shinzhiyashcamanda .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Paigunara sintina illajguna asha , pingai illajlla causangaj entreganauca , ima irus ranaras munaihua rangaj .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Astaumbas canguna caí samira rangaj mana yachacanguichichu Cristomanda ,

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: ciertora pacha paita uyashca asha , paimanda yachachishca asha , imasna cierto shimi Jesuspi tian .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Rucu runa ñaupa causana samira saquichi , umachina munashcaunahua huajlichishcami .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Shinallara mushujyachishca aichi canguna alma iyaibi .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Dios samiilai rashca mushuj runara churachichi ali shunguhua , ciertora rimaj chuyaj shunguhuas .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Chi raigumanda , llulla shimira saquisha , caran dueño paihua mayambi causajhua cierto shimira rimachu . Parijumanda shu aichamanda partiuna manchi .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Canguna piñarishca horas uchara ama raichichu . Canguna piñaríshcara alichichi indi manara icujllaira .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Supai apura lugarda ama cuichichu cangunara tentangaj .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Ñaupa horas shuhuajga ama mas shuhuachu , astaumbas alira tarabasha , paihua quiquin maquihua tarabachu , chimanda charingaj ministijgunama cungaj .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Canguna shimimanda ama ima manali shimis llucshichu astaumbas ali yanapana shimiuna , uyajgunara cariyachingaj .
