text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Diospa Santo Espiritura ama llaquichichichu . Paimanda canguna Diospaj ajta ricuchishca acanguichi randina punzhagama .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Cangunamanda tucui ayaj iyaira , piñarinara , piñanara , caparinaunara , milli shimiunara anzhuchichi , shinallara tucui manaliras .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Randi cangunapura , parijumanda ali shungupura tucuichi , llaquisiquiuna , parijumanda perdonanausha , imasna Dios cangunara perdonaca Cristoi .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Diosta catirijguna aichi , llaquishca huahuaunasna .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Llaquinai purichi , imasna Cristo ñucanchira llaquica , shinallara ñucanchimanda pai quiquinllara entregaca , cuyashca cuenta , Diospa ñaupajpi shu gusto asnaj sacrificiora cuenta .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Randiga , shujhua tacarina , tucui irusta rana , cullquira yapajta llaquina , ama rimashcallas uyarichu cangunapura , canguna chuyaj shunguuna asha .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Shinallara ima irus shimis , ima upa cuenta rimanas , ima yanga burlanas mana rimaihuajchu . Mana valinaun . Astaumbas Diosta agrasisha rimaichi .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Caita cierto pacha yachaichi : Mana ima shujhua tacarij runa , mana ima irus shungu runa , mana ima cullquira yapajta llaquij runa ( caimi runa rashca diosta alabana cuenta ) imaras charingachu Cristohua Dios mandana pachai .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Pihuas cangunara ama umachichu , yanga shimira rimasha . Cai quiquin ucharashcaunamanda Dios mana casujgunahua piñarin .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Casna rajgunahua ama llutarichichu .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Ñaupa horas llandui tiaucanguichi , astaun cunaga punzhai tiaunguichimi Señorbi . Punzhamanda churiunasna purichi .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Punzhai purishcamanda aparishcauna caigunami : llaquij shungu , ali shungu , ciertora rimaj shungu .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Imaras Dios munashcara yachangaj mascaichi .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Ucha llandui mana valij rashcaunara ama raichichu . Astaumbas casna rajgunara piñaichi .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Paiguna pacallai rashcaunara pinganaitami rimangaj .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Tucui rashcauna punzhai churashca ricurinaun . Punzha tucuira ricuchin .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Chiraigumanda rimashca tian : Llicchari , puñuj runa . Huañushcaunamanda atari . Cristo canda punzhayachingami .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Shinasha , ricuichi imasna purishcaras , ricushallara puringaj , ama upauna cuenta astaun iyaiyuj cuenta ,

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: tiempora mana pirdisha , punzhauna manali ashcamanda .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Chimanda ama upa cuenta tucuichichu , astaumbas imaras Dios munashcaras intindinguichi .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Vinohua ama machaichichu , paihuajpi nusparína tian ; astaun Espirituhua undashca aichi ,

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: cangunapura rimanausha salmos nishca cantanaunahua , alma cantanaunahua shungumanda cantasha , Diosta alabasha canguna shungüi .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Tucui horas Yaya Diosta agrasichi tucuimanda , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo shutii .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Parijumanda casuichi , Diosta manzhashcai .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Huarmiuna paiguna quiquin cariunara uyanauchu , Señorda uyashca cuenta .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Cariga paihua huarmi umami , imasna Cristo iglesia umami ; iglesia paihua aichami , Cristoga iglesiara Quishpichijmi .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Imasna iglesia Cristora uyan , shinallara huarmiuna tucuibi paiguna cariunara uyanauchu .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Cariuna , canguna huarmiunara llaquichi , imasna Cristo iglesiara llaquica , iglesia randimanda paulara cuca ,

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: iglesiara chuyayachingaj , pai Quillcashca Shimihua paita maillaca , chuya yacuhua maillashca cuenta ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: iglesiara sumajlla pai quiquinmallara cungaj , ima iruspas illaj , ima sipus illaj , ima manali illajpas , chuya achu , ima tinirishcas illaj .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Shinallara cariuna paiguna huarmiunara llaquinami , paiguna quiquin aicharasna . Maican runa paihua huarmira llaquisha , pai quiquinllarara llaquinmi .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Mana imahoraspas pi runas paihua quiquin aichara chijnicachu , astaumbas carán , cuiran , imasna Cristo iglesiara cuiranmi .

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: Ñucanchi paihua aichamanda partiuna manchi , paihua aichamanda , paihua tulluunamandas .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Caimanda , shu runa paihua yayaras paihua mamaras saquinga , paihua huarmihua llutaringami . Paiguna ishqui shu aichalla tucunaungami .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Cai pacashca shimi valijmi . Caita rimauni Cristoras iglesiaras iyasha .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Maspas , cangunamanda caran dueño paihua quiquin huarmira llaquichu , pai quiquinllara llaquishcasna . Huarmiga paihua carira uyachu .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Huahuauna , yayaunara uyaichi , Señorda llaquij huahuaunasna . Caimi ali .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Yayaras mamaras llaquina mangui . Caimi ñaupa camachishca shimi shu cusha nishca shimihua rimashca , casna nisha :

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: Can caita rasha ali tucungui , unaira causaunguimi cai pachai .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Yayauna , canguna huahuaunara ama piñachichichu , astaumbas paigunara ali iñachichi cangunara casungaj , Señorba shimira yachachisha .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Sirvijguna , canguna cai pachai tiaj patrongunara uyaichi , manzhashcahua , ali shunguhua , Cristora sirvina cuenta ,

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: mana ricushcallai tarabasha , runaunara cushiyachingaj munajgunasna , astaun Cristora sirvijguna cuenta , shungumanda Diospa munaira rasha ;

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: ali munaihua sirvisha , Señorda sirvina cuenta , mana runaunara ,

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: caita yachasha , runa ima alira rashas caillara cuti chasquinga Diosmanda , sirvij ashas , liuri ashas .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Canguna , patronguna , shinallara raichi paigunahua , piñanara saquisha . Caita ricsichi , paiguna Señor canguna Señorbas ahua pachai tian . Paiga sirvijgunamanda patrongunamanda mana chicanyachinzhu .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Cuna , ñuca uquiuna , Señorbi shinzhiyaichi , paihua ushana ursahua .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Tucui Diospa iru churanaunara cuenta churarichi , canguna shinzhi tucungaj , supai apumanda tucui alma apiña tictitara vencingaj

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Ñucanchi macanaunaga mana aichahuachu mana yahuarhuachu , astaumbas atungunahua , shinzhiunahuas , llandu tuta mundu apuunahuas , ahua huairai tiau milli supaigunahuas .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Chiraigumanda Diospa iru churana cuenta enterora apichi , manali punzhai canguna shayarinara ushangaj , tucui chigunara vencishca huasha canguna shinzhira shayaringaj .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Shinasha shinzhira shayarichi , cierto shimihua chumbillishca , ali causanahua churarishca , pichura quillpana palahua cuenta .

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Canguna chaquii , zapatos cuenta , evangelio cushi shimira churarichi .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Maspas , Diosta quirina , lorerara cuenta apaichi , manali supai shitashca tucui nina balistaunara cuenta arcangaj .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Shinallara , alma quishpichina , iru gorrara cuenta apaichi , shinallara Espíritu espararas , caimi Diospa shimi .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Tucui horas mañaichi tucui mañanahuas tucui ruganahuas Espiritui , canguna mañashcara chapausha mana sambayasha , tucui quirijgunamanda rugasha .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Shinallara ñucamandas mañaichi , ñuca shimira pascanai , rimanara ñucama cui tucungaj evangelio pacashca shimira manzhai illaj yachachingaj .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Ñuca Dios cachashca rimaj ani ; cadena huascahua huatashca ani evangelio shimimanda . Mañaichi ñucamanda , ñuca mana manzhasha , imasna rimana ashcaras Cristomanda rimangaj .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Canguna ñucamanda yachangaj , ñuca rashcaunaras , llaquishca uqui Tíquico , tucuira cangunara cuentanga . Pai Diosta ali sirvijmi .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Paita cangunama cachashcani , canguna imasna ñucanchihua tucushcara yachangaj , pai canguna shungura cariyachingaj .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Uquiuna cushi shungura charinauchu , quirij shungura , llaquij shunguras , Dios Yayamanda , Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Tucui cierto shungumanda Señor Jesucristora llaquijguna gracia nishca ali iyaira charinauchu . Amen .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Pablo , Timoteo , Jesucristora sirvijguna , tucui Filipospi tiaj Cristo Jesuspi quirijgunama , ricujgunandi yanapajgunandi , quillcaunchi .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Dios Yayamanda , Señor Jesucristomandas , gracia nishca ali iyaira cushi shunguras charichi .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Tucui horas cangunara iyarisha , Diosta agrasini , 4 caran cuti cushihua Diosta mañasha cangunamanda ,

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: imasna ñaupa punzhamanda cuna horasgama parijumanda ñucara yanapashcanguichi evangelio shimira rimaushcai .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Caita ali yachani : Canguna shungüi ali rangaj callarij Dios , tucui pai rashcara pactachingami Jesucristo shamuna punzhagama .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Ñuca cangunamanda cai samira iyarisha , alira rauni . Ñuca shungüi tucui cangunara llaquisha charini . Ñuca chonda cularbi ishcarishcaunai , ñuca evangelio shimira rimashcaunais , tucui canguna ñucahua pariju compañahuashcanguichi Diospa gracia nishca ali iyaibi .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Yaya Dios yachan imasna ñuca cangunara munasha llaquiuni , Jesucristo llaquina tupui .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Diosta rugauni canguna llaquina mas mas yaparichu , ali yachanahuas , ali intidinahuas .

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Canguna tucui ima ali ashcaras munangaj , canguna ali shunguyuj , causa illaj tucunauchu , Cristo shamuna punzhagama .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Shinallara rugauni canguna ali ranahua talirijta aparisha tianauchu Jesucristomanda , Diosta alabangaj , paita ahuayachingaj .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Uquiuna , munani canguna yachangaj imasna ñucahua pasashcauna ali tucunaushcami evangelio ali shimira yanapangaj .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Shinallara ñuca Cristomanda ishcarishcauna yachashca tucunaushcami tucui gobernadorhua huasii , tucui chishujgunamas .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Astaun , ñaca tucui uquiuna ñuca ishcarishcara yachasha cariyanaushcami , chimanda shinzhi tucunaun mana manzhasha , Diospa shimira mas mas rimangaj .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Huaquingunaga chijnisha , ñucara tormendachingaj Cristo shutira rimanaun , shujgunaga ali munaimanda .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Huaquinguna Cristo shimira rimanaun piñashcamanda , mana ali shungumanda , ñuca tormendariushcara mas yapashun nisha ;

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: shujgunaga llaquishcamanda , ñuca evangelio shimira rimashcamanda ishcai tucushcara yachasha .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Shinajpi ¿ imarai ? Shinajllaira tucuibi , umachisha nijpis cierto ajpis , Cristo shutira rimashcami . Caimanda cushiyauni , maspas cushiyashami .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ñuca yachani , canguna mañashcamanda , Jesucristo Espíritu yanapashcamandas , cachari tucusha .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Ñuca munani , shinallara chapauni mana imais pingari tucungaj , astaumbas ñuca ali cariyasha , cunallara tucui horas cuenta , ñuca causashas huañushas , yapa ashcara munani Cristo ahuayachishca achu ñuca aichai .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Ñuca causanaga Cristomi , huañunaga gananami .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Ñuca cai aichai causangaj valijpi Diosta sirvingaj , mana yachanichu maicanda ajllangaj .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Cai ishquimanda maicanda chari munani . Riña munani Cristohua pariju tiangaj . Caimi imamandas yali valin .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Randi , ñuca aichai saquirina mas ministirinmi canguna raigumanda .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Yachani cangunahua saquirishami , tucui cangunahua chara tiasha , canguna ñaupasha ringaj , canguna quirishcai cushiyangaj ,

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: canguna Cristo Jesusta mas alabangaj ñucaraigumanda , ñuca cangunahua cuti tiashcamanda .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Cristo evangelio valishca tonora causaichi , ñuca cangunara ricungaj shamushas , ñuca illashas , cangunamanda uyasha nini imasna canguna shinzhira shayaunguichi shu almallahua shu iyaillahuas , evangelio quirinamanda pariju macanausha .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Cangunara arcajgunara ama imais manzhaichichu . Caita paigunama paiguna tularingaraushcara rimanga , astaun cangunama canguna quishpichingaraushcara rimangami . Caiga Diosmandami .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Cangunara cushcami , Cristora llaquishcamanda mana paihuajpi quiringajlla , astaumbas shinallara tormendaringajpas .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Shina tormendarinara charinguichi , imasna ñucajpi ricucanguichi , maspas cuna ñucajpi tiashcara uyanguichi .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Ima cariyanas tiajpi Cristoi , ima cushiyanas tiajpi llaquina shungüi , ima compañanas Espirituhua , ima llaquinas , ima llaquishacahua ricunas ,

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: ñuca cushira undachichi , cangunapura chi tonollara iyarisha , chi tonollara llaquinausha , shu iyaillahua , parijulla chi tonollara iyarisha .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Piñanaunamandas , ima mas tucunamandas imaras ama raichichu , astaun manso shungumanda ; caran dueño shujgunara paimanda yali ajta iyaichi .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Caran dueño ama paihua quiquimbajllara ricuchu , astaumbas shinallara shujgunajtas ricuchu .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Cangunajpis tiachu cai Cristo Jesús iyashca sami .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Paiga Dios sami ashallara , Diospa quiquin tupui tucungaj mana yapajta munacachu ,

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: astaun , pai imas illaj tucuca , sirvij cuenta tucusha , runa samillai rashca aca .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Runa tonoi ricurimusha , pai quiquinllara mas mas mansoyarica huañunagama casusha , cruzpi huañuca .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Chiraigumanda , Dios paita yalijta ahuayachica . Tucui shutimanda yali atun shutira paita cuca .

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Jesuspa shutii tucui cungurinauchu , ahua pachais , cai pachais , cai pacha ucuis .

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: Shinallara , tucui shimi rimachu , Jesucristo atun Señormi nisha , Yaya Diosta alabangaj .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Shinasha , llaquishcauna , canguna tucui horas ñucara casusha , mana ñuca cangunahua tiaushcallai , astaun cuna mas mas ñuca illaushcais , canguna alma quishpinamanda manzhasha tarabaichi .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Dios canguna shungüi munaira cun , ranaras cun , paihua munaira pactachingaj .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Tucuira raichi , mana rimarisha , mana piñarisha .

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: Canguna causa illajguna aichai , ali shunguuna , Diospa churiuna , iruspas illajguna , manali istu miraiguna chaupi shungüi ; paiguna chaupii velaunasna punzhayachinguichi cai pachai .

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: Causana shimira ricuchichi , ñuca cangunamanda cushiyangaj Cristo shamuna punzhai , ñuca ama yangamanda causashca achu , ama yangamanda tarabashca achu .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Ñucaga talishca ashas , imasna aceite yacu shu sacrificio ahuai talishcasna , canguna Jesusta quirina sacrificio ahuais , canguna sirvishca ahuais , cushi mani ; ñuca cushiyauni tucui cangunahua .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Shinallara canguna cushiyaichi ñucahua pariju .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Shinasha , Señor Jesús yanapajpi , Timoteroa uctalla cangunama cachasha nini , ñuca canguna ali ashcara uyasha cariyangaj .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Shu paisna iyaiyujta mana charinichu , shungumanda cangunara llaquijta .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Tucui runauna paiguna quiquimbajllara mascanaun , astaumbas Cristo Jesuspajta mana mascanaunzhu .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Canguna Timoteo rashcaunara yachanguichimi imasna pai , quiquin churi cuenta paihua yayara sirvisha , ñucara sirvishcami evangelio shimira rimaushcai .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Chiraigumanda , imahoras ñucahua imasna tucungaraushcara ricusha , paita cangunama cachasha nini .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Shinallara Diospi quirini imasna ñucas uctalla cangunajma shamusha .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Epafrodito nishcara cangunama cachañara ministicani . Paimi ñuca uqui , ñucara yanapaj , ñucahua compañaj , soldaropura cuenta . Paimi cangunamanda rimaj , canguna cachamushca ñucara yanapaj ñuca ministishcaunai .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Paiga tucui cangunara ashcara ricusha nica . Maspas ashcara turbarica canguna pai ungushcara uyashcaraigu .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Cierto pacha pai huañunalla unguca , astaumbas Dios paita llaquisha ricuca , mana paulara astaun ñucaras , ñuca ama yapajta llaquiringaj .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Chimanda paita mas uctalla cangunama cachauni , canguna paita cuti ricusha cushiyangaj , ñucas pishi llaquiyuj tucungaj .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Paita Señorbi cushihua chasquichi . Cai samiunara ashcara llaquisha apinguichi .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Paimi Cristora sirvinamanda ñaca ñaca huañuca , paihua causaira cusha , canguna ñucara yanapahuashcara ñucajma pactachingaj .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Puchucaibi uquiuna , Señorbi cushiyaichi . Caita cangunama cuti quillcangaj mana amirinichu . Cangunaj valinmi .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Allcu nishcaunamanda huacachichi . Manali rajgunamanda huacachichi . Aichara pitijgunamanda huacachichi .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Ñucanchiga , espirituhua Diosta sirvijguna , cierto circuncisión nishcauna manchi , ñucanchi Cristo Jesuspi cushiyajguna , aicha rashcaunai mana ansas iyarijguna .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Shinashas , ñuca aichai rashcaunamanda cushiyangaj charinimi . Shu runa aichamanda cushiyangaj iyarijpi , ñucas masta charini :

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Ñucaga , pusac punzhai circuncisionda rai tucucani , Israel atun aillumanda , Benjamín montonmanda , quiquin hebreo runa , camachishca shimii fariseo nishca macani .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Ñuca ñaupa quirishca tonoi shinzhi acani , iglesiara tormendachij acani . Ñuca ali rana tupui , ley camachishca shimi ñaupajpi causa illaj acani .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Astaun , ñuca ñaupa horas valishcaunara chingarishcauna cuenta iyashcani Cristora llaquishcamanda .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Cierto pacha tucuira chingarishcauna cuenta iyauni , Cristo Jesús ñuca Señorda yachangaj tucuira yalijta valishcamanda . Paita llaquishcamanda tucuira pirdishcani , basurara cuenta iyauni , Cristora ganangaj .

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: Cristo Jesuspi tarishca tucunai , mana ñuca quiquin ali causanara charijpi , ley camachishca shimira pactachishcamanda , astaumbas Cristoi quirishcamanda , Dios cushca ali causanara charisha .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Ñuca paita yachasha nini , pai causarimuna ushairas . Pai tormendarishcaunai paihua pariju tiasha nini , pai huañunai paisna tucungaj ,

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: imais usharijpi ñuca huañushcaunamanda causarinama pactangaj .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Caigama chara mana pactashcanichu , chara mana ali tupu tucushcanichu nisha iyauni . Astaumbas ñaupajmallara riuni , imamandas Cristo Jesús ñucara pactaca , ñucas chigamallara pactangaj .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Uquiuna , ñucallara chigama pactangaj chara mani , nisha iyauni . Astaumbas shujllara rauni : ñaupa horas rashcaunara cierto pacha cungarisha , ñaupajpi tiajgunara pactangaj riunimi .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ganashcamanda paganara apingaj ñaupasha riunimi . Cai pagana Dios ahua pachama cayanami Cristo Jesuspi .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Shinasha tucui ñucanchi shunguyujguna shuj iyaiyujlla tucushunchi . Huaquinguna shu samillara iyajpi , Dios caitas cangunara ricuchingami .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Tucuibi , maigamas intindisha pactamushcanchi , shinallara catishunchi , shuj iyaillahua iyarisha .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Uquiuna , ñucara catirichi . Shinallara tucui cai samira causajgunara ricuichi , ñucanchi rashca samii catijgunara .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Ashca runaunamandaga ñuca cangunara ashca cuti cuentashcani , cutillara huacasha cuentauni , paiguna Cristo cruzta chijnijguna tucunaushcami .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Puchucaibi casnauna llambura tulashca anaunga ucu pachai , paiguna dios paiguna quiquin icsa , paiguna pingarishcai cushiyanaun , paiguna iyaibi cai pachamandaunallara iyarinaun .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Ñucanchiga ahua pacha runauna manchi . Chimanda ñucanchi Quishpichij Señor Jesucristora chapaunchi .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Pai ñucanchi mana valij aichara turcangami , paihua sumaj aicha cuenta tucungaj , paihua ushaihua rasha , imasna pai tucuira vencinara ushanmi .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Shinasha , ñuca uquiuna , llaquishcauna , munashcauna , ñuca cushi , ñuca llaitu , Señorbi ali shayarichi , llaquishcauna .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Evodia Sintiqui nishcaunaras mañauni shina iyaillahua tucunauchu Señorbi .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Shinallara canda rugauni , ñucara ali compañaj uqui , yanapai cai huarmiunara . Paiguna ñucahua pariju tarabanauca evangelio shimira rimangaj , Clemente nishcahuas , shujgunahuas , paiguna tucui ñucara yanapajguna anauca . Paiguna shutiuna causana quillcai quillcashca tianaun .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Señorbi cushiyaichi tucui horas . Cutillara cangunara nini : Cushiyaichi .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Canguna ali shungura tucui runauna yachanauchu . Señorga mayanllaimi .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Imais ama turbarichichu , astaun tucuibi mañashcahuas rugashcahuas agrasishcahuas Diosta mañaichi .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Shinasha , Diospa cushi , tucui intíndinara pasaj , canguna shunguras canguna iyairas huacachingami Cristo Jesuspi .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Puchucaibi , uquiuna , tucui cierto ajta , tucui ali ajta , tucui ali gusto ajta , tucui chuyaj ajta , tucui llaquinallara tucui ali rimashcara , ima ali sumaj ajtas , ima alabanalla ajtas , cai samiunai iyaichi .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Imara ñucamanda yachashcanguichi , apishcanguichi , uyashcanguichi , ricushcanguichi , caigunara raichi . Cushira cuj Dios cangunahua tiangami .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Diospi ashcara cushiyacani imasna puchucaibi canguna ñucara cuti cuirahuashcanguichi . Cierto pacha ñucamanda iyarishcanguichi , astaun imasna ranaras mana yachacanguichi ñucara yanapangaj .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Caita mana ninichu ñuca ministishcamanda . Ñucaga ña yachashcani ima charishcahuas cushi tucungaj .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Cullqui illaj causanara yachani , shinallara charinara yachani . Tucuibis tucuimandas ña yachani , sajsana , yarcana , ashcara charina , imaras ministinas , ña yachashcani .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Tucuira ushani ñucara shinzhiyachij Cristoi .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Shinajllaira alimi rashcanguichi ñucama cachamusha ñucara yanapangaj ñuca tormendariushcai .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Cangunas shinallara yachanguichi , Filipos runauna , evangelio shimira camachingaj callariushcai , ñuca Macedonia llactamanda riushcai , mana maican iglesias ñucara yanapacachu cuyanais chasquinais , astaun cangunalla shina rarcanguichi .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Tesalónica nishca llactais , ñuca ministishcaunai huaquin cuti cachacanguichi .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Ñucaga cuyanara mana mascanichu , astaumbas canguna rashcauna canguna cuentai yaparingaj munani .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Shinashas , tucuira charini , taliríjta . Epafroditomanda canguna cuyashcara pactajta apishcani , gusto asnajta , chasquinalla sacrificiora , Dios munashcasna .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Ñuca Dios canguna tucui ministishcara cungami , pai sumaj tiashcai charishca ashca vaUj tupura Cristo Jesuspi .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Dios , ñucanchi Yaya , ahuayachishca achu huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Tucui Cristo Jesuspi quirijgunara saluraichi . Ñucahua pariju tiaj uquiuna cangunara saluranaun .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Tucui quirijguna cangunara saluranaun , maspas Cesarba huasimanda ajguna .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai tucui cangunahua tiachu . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Pablo , Jesucristo apóstol nishca cachashca runa , Dios munashcamanda , Timoteo nishca uquindi ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: chuyaj shinzhi quirij uquíunama quilícanchi , Cristoi quirijguna , Colosas llactai tiajguna : Gracia nishca ali iyaira cushi shunguras charíchi , ñucanchi Dios Yayamanda , Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Diosta , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo Yayara , agrasinchi , tucui horas cangunamanda Diosta mañasha .

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: Canguna Cristo Jesuspi quirishcara uyashcanchi , shinallara canguna tucui quirijgunara llaquishcaras ,

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: cangunajta ahua pachai huacachishca ali chapanaraigumanda . Caimanda uyashcanguichi evangelio cierto shimii .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Cai evangelio shimi cangunajma pactamuca imasna tucui mundui shamushcami . Aparisha rin , iñasha rin cangunajpi , canguna uyashca punzhamanda , imahoras cierto pacha uyacanguichi , shinallara yachacanguichi Diospa gracia nishca ali iyaira .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Caita Epafras nishca runamanda uyacanguichi . Paiga ñucanchi llaquishca ñucahua pariju sirvij runa , Cristora ali sirvij cangunara yanapangaj .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Paiga cangunajpi tiaj Espíritu cushca llaquinara cuentahuashcami .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Chiraigumanda , ñucanchi uyashca punzhamanda , cangunamanda Diosta mañanara mana saquinchichu . Canguna Dios munashcara pactajta yachangaj mañanchi , tucui yachanahua , tucui almai intindinahuas .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Shinallara mañanchi canguna Señor valishca tupui puringaj , paita tucuibi cushiyachisha , tucui ali ranaunara aparisha , Diosta ricsiushcai iñasha .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Canguna tucui ursahua shinzhiyachishca tucungaj mañanchi , paihua gusto sumaj ushana tupui , ahuantaisiqui shungura , chapaisiqui iyairas charingaj .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Cushihua Yayara agrasinchi imasna pai ñucanchira alichica quirijguna Yayamanda apiñara ahua pacha punzhai apingaj .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Paiga ñucanchira llandu ushaimanda liushpichica . Ñucanchira paihua llaquishca Churi mandana pachama pasachicami .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Churu randishca manchi , paihua yahuarda pagashcamanda , ucharashcaras ña perdonashcami .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Paiga mana ricuihuaj Dios ricurinami , tucui causajgunamanda ñaupa pagarij .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Tucui paihuajllai rashca aca , ahua pachai tiajguna cai pachai tiajgunas , ricurijguna mana ricurijgunas ; rey apu tiarinauna asha , mandajguna asha , atun apuuna asha , ushajguna ashas . Tucui paimanda paihuajta rashca aca .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Pai tucui imamandas ñaupami , tucuiguna paimandami anaun .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Iglesiaga paihua aichami , paiga aichamanda umami . Paiga tucuimanda callarinami , huañushcaunamanda ñaupa pagarij , pailla tucuimanda ñaupa punda aj tucungaj ;

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: imasna Yayara cushiyachica Cristoi entero Dios causasha tiangaj ;

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: shinallara paimanda tucui Dioshua amigopura tucungaj , cai pachais ahua pachais tiajgunandi , cushira rasha paihua cruzpi talishca yahuarmanda .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Shinallara cangunas ñaupa horas manali rashcaunamanda carui tiajguna ajpi , chijnijguna ajpis canguna iyaibi , cuna Dios cangunara amigora rashcami

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Cristo aichai , pai huañushcamanda , canguna chuyajguna , ima tinishca illajgunas , mana causayujgunas tucungaj paihua ñaupajpi .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Caita rangami canguna ali shayaríjpi , ali shinzhiyajguna tucujpi canguna quiriushcai , canguna uyashca evangelio shimimanda mana anzhurijpi . Cai shimira camachishcami tucui ahua pacha urai causajgunama . Cai shimira rimangaj ñuca , Pablo , sirvij runa tucucani .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Cuna horasga ñuca canguna raigumanda tormendariushcai cushiyani . Shinajpi Cristo tormendarishcaunamanda paihua aicha nishca iglesiaraigu , ñuca quiquin aichai pishishcara ña pactachiuni .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Caimanda sirvij tucushcani , Dios ñucara cushcasna cangunahua , ñuca Diospa shimira pactajta rimangaj .

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Cai pacashca shimi callarimanda tucui tiempounamandas pacashca aca ; cuna horasga pascarishcami paita quirijgunama .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Cai pacashca shimi valishca tupuras , paihua sumaj tupuras gentilgunama Dios quirijgunara ricuchisha nica . Cai pacashca shimi nin : Cristo cangunajpimi tian , canguna sumaj tucungaj chapanami .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Cai Cristo shutira rimanchi , tucui runara camachisha , tucui yachaihua yachachisha , tucui runara Cristo Jesuspi sumajlla alichishcara ricuchingaj .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Caimanda shinallara tarabauni , Cristo cushca ushaihua macanausha , cai ushai ñuca shungüi shinzhira tarabaun .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Ñuca munani canguna yachangaj imasna cangunamanda mañasha ashcara tormendarishcani , shinallara Laodicea nishca llactai tiajgunamandas , shinallara tucui ñucara mana ricujgunamandas .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Paiguna shunguuna cariyashca anauchu , parijumanda llaquinausha , ali intindina valishca tupura pactanagama , Dios Yaya pacashca shimira yachangaj , caimi Cristo .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Cristojpiga tucui intindina , tucui yachana valishcauna pacashcami tianaun .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Caita cangunara nini , pi runas cangunara ama umachingaj uyanalla shimiunahua .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Ñuca aichai cangunahua mana tiaupis , shinashas espiritui cangunahua pariju tiaunimi . Canguna ali tucushcara cushihua ricuni , shinallara canguna Cristoi shinzhi quirishcaras .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Shinashas , imasna canguna Señor Jesucristora chasquishcanguichi , shinallara paihuajpi puríchi .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Canguna sapiuna cuenta paihuajpi tianauchu , canguna pai ahuai shayachishca anauchu , canguna quiriushcai shinzhi yachishca , imasna cangunara yachachishcasna , Diosta talirijta agrasisha .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Ricuichi pihuas cangunara ama umachichu yachana shimiunahua , yanga umana shimiunahuas , runa yachaimanda , mundu iyarina samillai , mana Cristo rimashca samillai .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Cristoi entero Dios runa aichai causan .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Cangunas Cristoi pactajta anguichi . Paiga tucui atun apu , tucui ushajguna umami .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Shinallara canguna Cristoi circuncisionda rai tucushcanguichi , mana maquihua rashcara , astaun canguna ucha raisiqui aichara ichusha Cristo circuncisionda raushcai .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Paihua pariju pambashca acanguichi canguna bautisarishcai , shinallara chihui paihua pariju causarimucanguichi , Diospa ushaibi quirisha , imasna pai Cristora huañushcaunamanda atarichica .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Cangunaga , huañushcauna ajpi , canguna ucharashcamanda , aichai circuncisionda mana apishcamandas , Dios cangunama causaira cuca Cristohua pariju , tucui canguna ucharashcaunara perdonasha .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Ley shimimanda ñucanchira causayachij quillcara , ñucanchira culpayachijta , borracami , ñucanchi chaupimanda quichusha , cruzpi clavacami .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Casna rasha supai atun apuunaras ushajgunaras vencica , paigunara pajlla pambai pingachica , pai quiquimbi paigunara vencica cruzpi .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Chi raigumanda pihuas cangunara ama taripachu micunamandas , upinamandas , ista punzhaunamandas , mushuj quillamandas , sahuaro punzhaunamandas .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Cai tucuigunaga huasha shamujguna almami . Astaumbas almara llucchijga Cristomi .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Ama lugarda cuichichu pihuas cangunamanda canguna ganashcara quichungaj , manso shungura charini nisha , angelgunara alabasha , paiguna mana ricushcai satirisha , yangamanda umai punguirisha paiguna ucha aicha iyaibi .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Casnauna Cristora mana charinaun Uma cuenta . Paimandaga entero aicha carashca asha , tucui tullu mucuuna anguhua pigarishca asha , iñasha rin Dios cushca iñanahua .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Canguna Cristohua pariju huañushca ashaga mundu yachanamanda , ¿ imarashara mundui causajguna cuenta mundu camachishcaunara uyanguichichui :

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: casna samiunara : ama apichu , ama gustaichu , ama liangaichu ?

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Caigunami runauna camachishcauna , yachachishcaunas . Tucui caiguna paiguna raushcallai pasanaun .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Casna ranauna cierto pacha sabiro cuenta yachin , runa yanga alabanai , yanga manso shungüi , aichara livachinai . Astaumbas , casna ranauna imajpas mana sirvinaun ucha aicha munaira vencingaj .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Cangunaga , Cristohua pariju causarishca asha , ahuai tiajgunara mascaichi , maibi Cristo Diospa ali maqui partii tiarishcami .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Ahuai tiajgunara ricuichi , mana cai pachai tiajgunara .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Huañushcanguichi , canguna causaiga Cristohua pariju Diospajpi pac ashcami .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Imahoras Cristo , canguna causai , ricurimujpi , chi horasllaira cangunas paihua pariju ricuringuichimi paihua sumajpi .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Shinajpi , cangunajpi tiaj mundu munaira huañuchichi : shujhua tacarinara , irus iyaira , ucha aicha munaira , manalirana munaira , cullquira yapajta munanaras , caimi runa rashca diosta alabana cuenta .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Casna ranaunamanda , Diospa piñarina shamun mana casujgunama .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Canguna casna rashcaunai ñaupa horas puricanguichi , imasna chigunai causacanguichi .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Cuna horasga , canguna tucui casna ranaunara saquichi : piñarina , piñana , manali shungu , Diosta camina , irus shimiuna canguna shimimanda .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Ama llullanuichi cangunapura , canguna rucu causaira ichushca raigumanda pai rashcaunahua .

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Astaumbas mushuj causaira churarichi . Caimi mushuj yasha rin , canguna pactajta yachanagama , paita iñachij Cristo tonoi .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Cai mushuj causaibi , illan ima griegos ima judíos , ima circuncisionda ranas mana ranas , ima aucas ima carumanda shamujpas , ima sirvijpas ima liuri runas . Astaumbas , Cristo tucuimi tucuigunais .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Shinajpi , canguna Dios ajllashcauna asha , chuyajguna , llaquishcauna , llullu shungura churarichi , shinallara ali shunguras , manso shunguras , ahuantaísiqui shunguras .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Parijumanda ahuantanuichL Parijumanda perdonanuichi maican runa shujta piñajpi . Imasnara Cristo cangunara perdonashcasna , shinallara perdonanuichi cangunapura .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Cai tucui ahuai , llaquij shungura churarichi , tucui alira pactachingaj .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Diospa cushi mandachu canguna shungu ucui . Chi cushimallara cayashca acanguichi shu aichallai . Shinallara Diosta agrasichi .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Cristo shimi canguna shungüi undajta tiachu . Cangunapura yachachichi , camachichi tucui yachanahua , salmos nishcaunahua , alma cantanaunahua , gracia nishca ali iyaihua Señorda cantasha canguna shungüi .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Imara rashas , rimana ajpi , rana ajpis , tucuira raichi Señor Jesuspa shutü , paimanda Dios Yayara agrasisha .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Huarmiuna , canguna cariunara casuichi , imasnara Señorbi quirijgunahua ali tucun .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Cariuna , canguna huarmiunara llaquichi . Paigunahua ama milli tucuichichu .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Churiuna , canguna yayaunara uyaichi tucuibi . Casna rasha Señorda cushiyachinguichi .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Yayauna , canguna churiunara ama yapajta piñachinguichichu , paigunara ama llaquichingaj .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Sirvijguna , canguna cai pachai aj patrongunara tucuibi uyaichi , mana paiguna ricushcallai tarabasha runaunara cushiyachingaj munajgunasna , astaumbas ali shungumanda , Diosta manzhasha .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Tucui imara rashas , shungumanda raichi , Diospajta cuenta mana runajta .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Caita yachaichi , Señormanda pagai tucunguichimi , herencia nishca Dios cushcahua , canguna Cristo Señorda sirvishcamanda .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Astaumbas , manali raj runa pai manali rashcallarara cuti apingami , Dios runaunara mana chicanyachinzhu .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Patronguna , ali tupura raichi canguna tarabaj runaunahua , caita ricsisha , cangunas ahua pachai Patronda charinguichimi .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Ama sambayasha mañaichi , canguna mañashcara chapausha , Diosta agrasishcahua .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Shinallara chi horasllai ñucanchimanda mañaichi , Señor ñucanchima lugarda cuchu Cristo pacashca shimira rimangaj . Caimanda chonda cularbi ishcai tucuni .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Shinallara ñucamanda mañaichi ñuca pajlla pambai rimangaj ñuca ministishcasna .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Yachanahua purichi mana quirijguna ñaupajpi , punzhaunara mana pirdisha .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Canguna rimashca shimiuna ali iyaihua rimashca achu tucui horas , cachihua mishquiyachishca cuenta , canguna caran dueñora imasna cutipana ashcaras yachangaj .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Ñuca tucui rashcaunara Tíquico cangunara cuentangami . Paiga llaquishca uquimi , ali sirvij , ñucahua pariju ali yanapaj Señorda sirvishcai .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Caimanda paita cangunajma cachacaní , canguna imasna ashcaras yachangaj , canguna shungura cariyachingaj .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Paihua pariju Onésimo nishcara cachacaní , paimi llaquishca ali uqui , cangunajmandallara . Tucui caibi ima tucushcaras cangunama rimanaunga .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Aristarco nishcaga , ñucahua pariju chonda cularbi ishcarij , cangunara saluraun . Shinallara Marcos , Bernabehua panimanda churi , cangunara saluraun . Paimanda camachishcara uyacanguichi . Pai cangunajma shamujpi paita chasquichi .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Shinallara Justo nishca Jesús cangunara saluraun . Caigunalla circuncisionda rana montonmanda ñucara yanapanaun Dios mandana pacha shimira rimangaj . Ñucara cushiyachihuanaushcami .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Cangunamanda aj Epafras , Cristora sirvij runa , cangunara saluraun . Tucui horas pai mañashcaunai cangunamanda rugaun , canguna shinzhiuna tucungaj , aliuna , Dios tucui munashcara ali pactachijguna .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Paimanda caita nini : Paimi cangunara ashcara llaquin , shinallara Laodícea , Hierápolis nishca llactaunai tiajgunaras .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Lucas , llaquishca doctor , cangunara saluraun , shinallara Demás nishca .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Laodiceai tiaj uquiunara saluraichi , shinallara Nimias nishcara , paihua huasü tiaj iglesiaras .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Cai quillcara cangunajpi ricushca huasha , ricuchinguichi Laodicea iglesiai . Shinallara Laodiceama cachashca quillcara ricuichi cangunas .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Arquipo nishcara rimaichi : Riqui , nisha , can Señormanda apishca sirvinara pactachi .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Ñuca , Pablo , quiquin maquihua quillcasha cangunara salurauni . Ñuca huatariashcara iyarichi . Gracia nishca ali iyai cangunahua tiachu . Amen .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Pablo , Silvano , Timoteo nishcaunandi , tesalónicauna iglesiama quilícanchi , Yaya Diospi Señor Jesucristoi tiaj iglesiama . Gracia nishca ali iyairas cushi shunguras charichi , ñucanchi Dios Yayamanda , Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Tucui cangunamanda , tucui horas , Diosta agrasinchi , ñucanchi Diosta mañashcaunai , cangunara iyarisha .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Mana saquisha , Dios Yaya ñaupajpi iyariunchi canguna quirishcamanda rashcara , canguna llaquishcamanda tarabashcaras , shinallara canguna chapaisiqui shunguras , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristoi .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Ricsinchi , Diosmanda llaquishca uquiuna , imasna Dios ajllashcaunami anguichi .

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Ñucanchi rimaushca evangelio shimi mana shimi caramandallachu cangunama shamuca , astaumbas ushanahua , Santo Espirituhuas , cierto shimihuas . Canguna ali yachanguichi ima samis acanchi canguna chaupi shungüi , cangunara llaquishcamanda .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Canguna ñucanchira catirijguna tucucanguichi , Señordas catirijguna ; ashca tormendoshua Diospa shimira chasquicanguichi , Santo Espíritu cushca cushihua .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Shinajpi tucui Macedonia Acaya partiunai tiaj quirijgunama , casna ranami nisha ricucbijguna tucushcanguichi .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Cangunamanda Diospa shimi Macedonia Acaya partiunama pasashcami , maspas tucui llactaunai canguna Diosta quirishcara yachanaushcami . Chi raigumanda ñucanchi rimangaj mana ansas ministirinzhu .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Paiguna ñucanchimanda cuentanaun imasna canguna ñucanchira apicanguichi , imasna canguna runa rashca diosgunamanda voltiaricanguichi , cierto causaj Diosta sirvingaj ,

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: shinallara , paihua huañushcaunamanda causachishca Churi Jesusta ahuapachamanda chapangaj ; paiga , huasha shamuj piñarinamanda llushpichijmi .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Uquiuna , cangunallara yachanguichi imasna ñucanchi cangunajma shamushca mana yangachu aca .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Ñucanchi ñaupa horas tormendarishca asha , Filipos llactais camishca ashas , canguna yachanguichi , astaun Diospi shinzhi tucucanchi , paihua evangelio shimira cangunama rimangaj , ashca arcashcaunai .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Ñucanchi camachishca mana pandarishcahua , mana irus shimihuas , mana umachinahuas rimashcachu aca .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Astaun , imasna Dios ñucanchira : Ari nisha , ñucanchima cuca evangelio shimira rimangaj , shinallara rimaunchi ; mana runara cushiyachijgunasna astaun Diosta cushiyachingaj . Paiga ñucanchi corazonda camaun .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Imahoraspas runaunara mana yanga alabacanchichu , imasnara canguna ali yachanguichi ; shinallara mana yapajta munaisiquiuna acanchi . Dios caita ricujmi .

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Runaunamandas , cangunamandas , shujgunamandas , alabashcara mana mascacanchichu . Shinashas , munajpi cangunamanda yanapanara mascana ushacanchi , Cristomanda cachashca runauna asha .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Astaun , cangunahua ali shunguuna macanchi , iñachij mamasna , paihua quiquin churiunara llaquishcahua cuiraj cuenta .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Cangunara yapa llaquinchi . Cangunama entreganara munanchimaca mana Diospa evangelio shimillara , astaumbas ñucanchi quiquin causairas . Ashcara cangunara llaquishcanchi .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Canguna ña iyaringuichi , uquiuna , ñucanchi tarabashcara , ñucanchi sambayashcaras , imasna tutandi punzhandi tarabacanchi , ama tormendos tucungaj cangunahua . Shina rasha Diospa evangeliora rimacanchi .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Canguna ricujguna anguichi , shinallara Dios ricun , imasna ñucanchi chuyaj shunguhua , ali shunguhuas , causa illajpas causacanchi cangunahua , quirijguna .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Shinallara yachanguichi imasnara cangunara camachicanchi cushiyachicanchi caran dueñora , shu yaya paihua churiunara cuenta .

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: Cangunara camachicanchi Dios munashca tupui puringaj . Pai cangunara cayaca paihua sumaj mandana pachama .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Caimanda shinallara mana saquishallara Diosta agrasinchi , imasna canguna ñucanchimanda uyasha , Diospa shimira chasquicanguichi . Mana runamanda shimisna astaumbas Diosmanda shimisna chasquicanguichi , imasna cierto ashcara . Cai shimi tarabaun canguna quirijguna shungüi .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Uquiuna , canguna Judea partii tiaj Cristo Jesuspi tiaj Diospa iglesiaunara catirijguna ashcanguichi . Cangunaga shina samii tormendarishcanguichi canguna quiquin llactai tiajgunamanda , imasna chiguna judiogunamanda .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: Cai judioguna Señor Jesusta huañuchinauca , paiguna quiquin Diosmanda rimajgunandi . Ñucanchiras ichunauca . Diosta mana cushiyachinaun , tucui runaunaras molestanaun .

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Chiguna ñucanchira mitsanauca gentilgunama rimangaj , paiguna ama quishpinauchu nisha . Shina rasha paiguna ucharana tupura undachinaun . Shinasha piñarina paigunajma yalijta shamuca .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Shinajpi , uquiuna , unaira canguna ñahuimanda anzhurishca asha astaumbas mana shungumanda , mas mas camashun ashca munaihua canguna ñahuira ricungaj .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Chi raigumanda cangunajma ringaj nicanchi , ñuca , Pablo cierto pacha huaquin cuti risha nicani , astaumbas Satanás arcahuacami .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: ¿ Imarai ñucanchi chapana , ñucanchi cushi , ñucanchi llaitu , ñuca alabaringaj ? ¿ Manzhu canguna casna anguichi ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo ñaupajpi , pai shamushcai ?

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Canguna ñucanchi ahuayana , ñucanchi cushi manguichi .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Chiraigumanda ñucanchi mas mas chapanara mana ushasha , Atenas llactai ñuca sapalla saquiringaj iyaricanchi .

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: Timoteora , ñucanchi uqui , Diosta sirvij , ñucanchihua yanapaj Cristo evangelio rimanai , paita cachacanchi cangunara shinzhiyachingaj , yachachingajpas canguna quiriushcai .

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: Pis ama turbarichu cai tormendarinaunamanda . Imasna cangunallara yachanguichi , casnaunai ahuantangaj tiaunchi .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Chara cangunahua tiaushallara , ñaupamanda cangunara nicanchi imasna tormendarina macanchi , imasna cuna cangunahua pasashcasna ña yachanguichi .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Chi raigumanda mas chapanara mana ushasha , cachashcani canguna quirinara yachangaj , tentaj supaiga cangunara tentashca chari , ñucanchi tarabashca yanga tucushca chari .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Shinajpi Timoteo cangunamanda ñucanchima tigramusha , canguna quirinara canguna Maquinaras cuentaca . Shinallara cuentaca imasna canguna tucui horas ñucanchira iyaringuichi , ñucanchira ricusha nisha imasna ñucanchi cangunara ricushun ninchi .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Caimanda , uquiuna , ñucanchi tucui ministishcai , ñucanchi tormendarishcais , cariyachishca acanchi cangunamanda , canguna quirishcamandas .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Cuna causaunchimi , canguna Señorbi shinzhi tianaupi .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Chi raigumanda ¿ imasna rashara Diosta agrasishun cangunamanda , canguna ñucanchira cushiyachishcamandas ñucanchi Diospa ñaupajpi ,

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: tutandi punzhandi ashcara Diosta mañanchi , ñucanchi canguna ñahuira ricungaj , canguna quirina pishishcara pactachingaj ?

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Shinashas , quiquin Dios ñucanchi Yaya , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristondi ñucanchi nambira pascachu cangunajma shamungaj .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Señor canguna llaquinara iñachichu , ashcara yapachichu , cangunapura shinallara tucuigunahua , imasna ñucanchi cangunaras llaquinchi ,

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: canguna shungu shinzhiyachishca achu , chuyajlla , causa illajlla , ñucanchi Yaya Diospa ñaupajpi , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo shamunai tucui paihua chuyaj ajgunahua .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Cunaga , uquiuna , cangunara ruganchi , shinallara camachinchi Señor Jesuspi , imasna ñucanchimanda yachashcanguichi ima tonora purinara Diosta cushiyachingaj , casna rasha yaparisha richi .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ña yachanguichi ima camachishcaunara cangunama rimacanchi Señor Jesusmanda .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Dios munashca casnami : canguna chuyaj shunguyuj tucunauchu , shujhua tacarinamanda anzhurinauchu .

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Caran dueño paihua quiquin huarmira charichu , chuyaj causanahua , ali shunguhua ;

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: mana ucha aicha munaihua , Diosta mana ricsij gentilguna cuenta .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Pihuas imais ama huajlichichu , ama umachichu paihua uquira . Señorga tucui cai samiunara cutipajmi , ñucanchi cangunara ña rimashcasna , ña camachishcasna .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Dios ñucanchira mana cayacachu irusta rasha causangaj , astaumbas chuyajlla causangaj .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Shinajpi , maican runa cai shimira mana uyasha , mana runarachu mana uyan astaumbas Diosta mana uyanzhu . Paiga paihua Santo Espiritura ñucanchima cuca .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Uquipura cuenta llaquinaunamanda mana mmistirinzhu ñuca cangunama quillcangaj . Cangunallara Diosmanda yachashcanguichi parijumanda llaquinaungaj .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Shinallara ranguichi tucui uquiunahua , tucui Macedonia partii tiajgunahua . Shinashas , uquiuna , cangunara rugaunchi caita mas ashcara yapachingaj .
