text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Ganas tianara mascaichi , canguna tarabanaunara ali pacha raichi , maquihua tarabasha , imasnara cangunara mandashcanchi ;

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: canguna ali sami puringaj canzhai tiajguna ñaupajpi , shinallara canguna mana imaras ministingaj .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Maspas , uquiuna , huañuibi puñujgunamanda canguna yachangaj munanchi , canguna ama llaquiringaj chapana illajguna cuenta .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Ñucanchi Jesús huañushcaras causarishcaras quirijpi , shinallara Dios tucui Jesuspi puñujgunara paihua pariju pushamungami .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Caita cangunara ninchi Dios rimashcamanda : Ñucanchi , causajguna , Señor shamuna horasgama tiajguna , puñujgunara mana ñaupashunzhu .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Quiquin Señor ahua pachamanda irgumungami , mandasha caparinahua , atun ángel shimihua , Diospa cormetahua . Ñaupa punda Cristoi huañushcauna atarinaungami .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Chimanda huasha ñucanchi , causajguna , saquirijguna , paigunahua pariju apishca tucushun puyui , Señorda huairai tupangaj . Casnami huiñai huiñaigama Señorhua pariju tiashun .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Chi raigumanda cai shimiunahua cangunapura cariyanuichi .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Tiempounamanda horasgunamanda , uquiuna , mana ministinguichichu ñuca cangunama quillcangaj .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Alimi yachanguichi imasnara Señorba punzha shamunga tutai shuhuaj runa cuenta .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Imahoras runauna ninaunga : Cushi manchi , alimi causaunchi , nisha , chi horasllaira cungaimanda paiguna tulai tucunaunga , icsayuj huarmi nanachishcasna . Mana ansas quishpinaungachu .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Cangunaga , uquiuna , mana llandu tutai tiaunguichichu , chi punzha shuhuaj cuenta canguna dsas api tucungaj .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Tucui canguna punzhamanda churiuna anguichi ; mana tuta churiuna , mana llandumandachu anchi .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Chi raigumanda , ama puñushunchi shujguna cuenta , astaumbas chapashunchi , limpiuuna ashunchi .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Puñujguna tutai puñunaun . Machajguna tutai machanaun .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Ñucanchiga , punzhamanda asha , limpiuuna ashunchi , quirinaras , llaquij shunguras churarisha pichura quillpana cuenta , shinallara quishpingaj chapanara churarisha shu iru gorrara cuenta .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ñucanchi piñanara tupangaj Dios mana munacachu , astaumbas quishpinama pactangaj , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristomanda .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Paiga ñucanchi randimanda huañuca , ñucanchi ricuj ajpis puñuj ajpis paihua pariju causangaj .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Chi raigumanda , cangunapura cariyanuichi , shinzhiyaichi , imasna canguna rashcasna .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Shinallara cangunara ruganchi , uquiuna , canguna chaupi shungüi tarabajgunara ricsichi , cangunara Señorbi pushajgunaras , cangunara camachijgunaras .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Paigunara ashcara llaquina anguichi paiguna rashcamanda . Cangunapura cushi shungura charichi .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Shinallara cangunara ruganchi , uquiuna , quillajgunara camachichi , huacaisiquiunara cushiyachichi , irquiunara shinzhiyachichi , tucuigunara ahuantaichi .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Ricuichi pihuas ama manalira manalihua cutipachu , astaun tucui horas ali ranara catichi shuj shujgunahuas , tucuigunahuas .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Tucui horas cushiyaichi .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Mana saquisha mañaichi .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Tucuimanda agrasichi , casnami Diospa munai tucui cangunahua Cristo Jesuspi .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Espiritura ama chunllayachichichu .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Diosmanda rimashcaunara ama pishiyachichichu .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Tucuira camasha ricuichi , aliraga huacachichi .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Tucui ima manali samimandas anzhurichi .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Cushira cuj Diosllara cangunara tucuibi chuyayachichu , camba espiritura , camba almara , camba aicharas causa illajlla huacachishca achu ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo shamunagama .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Cangunara cayajta quirihuajllami ; shinallara cai tucuira pactachingami .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Uquiuna , ñucanchimanda mañaichi .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Tucui uquiunara chuyaj muchanahua saluraichi .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Señorba shutii cangunara mandani tucui chuyaj uquiuna caijmiUcara ricunauchu .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai cangunahua achu . Amen .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Pablo , Silvano , Timoteo nishcaunandi , tesalónicauna iglesiama quilícanchi , ñucanchi Yaya Diospi Señor Jesucristoi tiaj iglesiama .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gracia nishca ali iyairas cushi shunguras charichi , Dios ñucanchi Yayamanda , Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Tucui horas Diosta agrasina manchi cangunamanda , uquiuna . Casna rana valinmi , imasna canguna quirina iñasha rin , shinallara tucui canguna shujgunara llaquishca yaparisha rin .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Ñucanchillara alabarinchi Diospa iglesiaunai cangunamanda , canguna chapaisiqui shungumandas , canguna tormendarishcaunai quirishcamandas , canguna turbarishcaunai ahuantashcamandas .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Caimi Diospa ali taripanara ricuchin , canguna ali valijguna iyashca anauchu Dios mandana pachai icungaj . Caimandami tormendachishca anguichi .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Dioshua alimi cangunara tormendachijgunara tormendachinahua pagangaj .

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: Canguna , tormendachishcauna ajpis , Dios cangunara samachinga ñucanchihua pariju , imahoras Señor Jesús ahua pachamanda ricurimunga paihua ushaj angelgunahua .

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Nina sindishcahua shamunaunga , Diosta mana ricsijgunaras , shinallara ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo evangelio shimira mana casujgunaras pagangaj .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Caiguna livachishca anaunga , huiñai huiñaigama chingarishca anaunga , Señorba ñaupajmanda , paihua gusto sumaj ushanamandas ,

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: pai shamuna horaspi paihua chuyajguna paita ahuayachingaj , tucui quirijguna paihua sumajta gustasha alabangaj chi punzhai , imasna canguna ñucanchi shimira quirijguna ashcanguichi .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Chiraigumanda , tucui horas cangunamanda mañanchi , ñucanchi Dios cangunara valijgunami iyachu pai cayashcamanda , shinallara Dios canguna tucui alirana munairas , tucui quirinamanda ranaras , paihua ushanahua pactachichu .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mañanchi ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo shutira ahuayachishca achu cangunajpi , cangunas paihuajpis , ñucanchi Dios ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai yanapashcamanda .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Shinajpis , cangunara rugauni , uquiuna , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo shamunamanda ñucanchi paihuajma tandarinamandas rimajpi ,

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: ama uctalla anzhurichi canguna iyashca tonomanda . Ama turbarichi ima espiritumandas , ima shimimandas , ima quillcamandas ñucanchimanda nishca ajpis , Señorba punzha ña caibimi tiaun , nisha .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Pihuas imais cangunara ama umachichu . Cai punzha mana shamungachu manara shamujllaira Diosmanda voltiarina , manara ricurimujllaira Ucha Runa , Ucupachamanda Churi nishca .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Paiga tucui Diosmi nishcaras arcasha , tulasha ñinga ; tucui alabashcara tulasha ñinga ; pai templo nishca Diospa huasii tiaringami , Dios mani , nisha , paillara quiquin Dios cuenta ricuchisha .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu iyaringuichi imasna ñuca chara cangunahua tiaushallara caita cangunara cuentacani ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Cunaga paita arcajta yachanguichi , paihua quiquin horaspi ricurimungaj .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Cunallara manali rana ushai pacalla tarabaun . Astaun cuna horas shu paita arcaj tian , arcaj chaupimanda anzhurinagama .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Chimanda huasha manali raj runa ricurimungami , paitaga Señor paihua shimimanda samaihua huañuchingami , paita tucuchingami pai shamuna limpiashcahua .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Cai manali raj runa Satanás rashcahua shamungami , shinzhi ushanahua , atun ricurinahua , munanaita llullasha rashcaunahuas .

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: Tucui umacbinahua manalira ranga chingarijgunahua , paiguna cierto shimira llaquinara mana munanauca quishpichi tucungaj .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Chi raigumanda , Dios paigunara shu umachij ushaira cachanga , llulla shimira quiringaj ,

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: tucui cierto shimira mana quirijgunara , tucui manali ranara munajgunaras causayuj tucungaj .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Ñucanchi tucui horas Diosta agrasina manchi cangunamanda , Señor llaquishca uquiuna , Dios callari horasmanda cangunara ajllashcaraigu quishpichingaj , Espíritu chicanyachishcamanda , cierto shimira quirishcamandas .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Caigama Dios cangunara cayaca ñucanchi rimashca evangeho shimii , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo ali sumaj tupui pactangaj .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Shinasha , uquiuna , shinzhira shayarichi , canguna uyashca yachashcara huacachichi , uyashca shimimanda ajpi , ñucanchi quillcamanda ajpis .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Ñucanchi quiquin Señor Jesucristo , Dios ñucanchi Yaya , ñucanchira llaquij asha , ñucanchira huiñaigama cariyachij asha , ñucanchira paihua gracia ali iyaimanda ali chapanara cuca ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: paiga canguna shungura cariyachichu , cangunara shinzhiyachichu tucui ali rimanais , tucui ranais .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Cunaga , uquiuna , ñucanchimanda mañaichi , Señorba shimi tucui partima uctalla pasachu , ahuayachishca achu , imasna cangunahua tucushcasna ;

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Mañaichi ñucanchira manali shunguyujgunamandas manali rajgunamandas llushpiringaj ; mana tucui runauna quirinara charinaunzhu .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Señorga quirihuajllami , cangunara shinzhiyachingami , ima manalimandas huacachingami .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Cangunamanda Diospi quirinchi imasna ñucanchi cangunara mandashcara raunguichi , shinallara rangaraunguichi .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Señorga canguna shungura pushachu Diospa llaquinais , Cristora alimanda chapanais .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Cangunara mandanchi , uquiuna , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo shutii , tucui manali purij uquimanda anzhurichi , paiguna ñucanchimanda uyashca shimira mana catijguna ajpi .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Cangunallara yachanguichi imasnara ñucanchira catirina manguichi , ñucanchiga manalihua mana puricanchichu cangunahua .

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: Ñucanchiga pimandas yanga cuyashca tandara mana micushcanchichu , astaun tutandi punzhandi ashcara tarabasha sambayasha tiaucanchi , cangunamanda ama pitas yanga gastachingaj .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Ushacanchi canguna yanapashcara apingaj , astaun shina rarcanchi ñucanchi ali ricuchijguna tucungaj , canguna ñucanchira catiringaj .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Ñucanchi chara cangunahua tiausha caita camachicanchi : Runa mana tarabasha nijpi , shinallara ama micuchu , nisha .

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Uyashcanchimi imasna cangunamanda huaquinguna mana ali purisha , mana imais tarabanaun , astaumbas shujpajpi inquitashalla causanaun .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Casna rajgunara mandanchi shinallara camachinchi Señor Jesucristo shutii ganashua tarabasha paiguna quiquin tandara micunauchu .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Cangunaga , uquiuna , ama sambayanguichichu alira rangaj .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Maican runas ñucanchi quillcashca shimira mana casusha nijpi , caita paima ricuchichi , paihuaga ama llutarichichu , paita pingachingaj .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Shinashas , paita ama chijnishca cuenta charichichu , astaumbas uquirasna paita camachichi .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Quiquin cushira cuj Señor , tucui horas tucuibi cushira cuchu cangunama . Señorga tucui cangunahua tiachu .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Cai saluranaraga ñuca , Pablo , quiquin maquihua quillcashcani . Caimi ñuca ricuchina tucui ñuca quillcashcaunai , casna quillcauni .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai tucui cangunahua achu . Amen

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Ñuca , Pablo , apóstol nishca Jesucristo cachashca runa , ñucanchi Quishpichij Dios mandashcamanda , shinallara ñucanchi chapaushca Señor Jesucristomandas ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Timoteoma , ñucanchi quirishcai ñuca cierto churima quillcauni : Gracia nishca ali iyairas , llaquij shunguras , cushi shunguras chari , ñucanchi Yaya Diosmanda , Cristo Jesús ñucanchi Señormandas .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Ñuca Macedonia llactama riushcai , canda rugacani , Efeso llactai saquiripai , nisha , huaquin chihui ajgunara camachingaj shu chican yachaira ama yachachinauchu ;

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: yanga cuentanaunaras , unaimanda miramuj shutiunaras ama uyanauchu . Casna samiuna macanuchinaun , Diospa yachaira quiringaj mana yachachinaunzhu shungura shinzhiyachingaj . Shina rangaj canda cuna mandauni .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Caita mandauni cangunapura llaquinaungaj , chuyaj shungumanda , ali rana iyaimandas , cierto quirinamandas .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Huaquinguna caigunamanda anzhurisha yanga rimanaunama rinaushcami .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Ley shimira yachachijguna tucusha nisha , paiguna nishcaras , paiguna shinzhi rimashcaras mana intindinaunzhu .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Ñucanchi yachanchi imasna ley shimi alimi , maican runas cai shimira ali apijpi ;

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: caita ricsisha imasna ley shimira alira rajgunama mana cushcachu aca , randi manalira rajgunama , mana casujgunama , mana quirijgunama , uchayujgunama , burlajgunama , runara huañuchijgunamas ,

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: shujhua tacarijgunama , caripura tacarijgunama , runara shuhuajgunama , llullajgunamas , Diospa shutihua rimasha llullajgunamas , shinallara pi ali yachachina shimira mana uyajmas .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Cai yachachina bendiciashca Diospa evangelio ali shimimandami . Cai ali shimi ñucama mingashca aca .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Cristo Jesusta , ñucanchi Señorda agrasini , ñucara shinzhiyachij ursara cuhuaca , ali quirijmi angui ñucara rimashcamanda , paita sirvijta rahuaca .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Ñaupa horas , ñuca paimanda irusta rimaj acani , paita tormendachicani , burlacani . Randi llaquishcahua apishca acani , mana yachashcamanda rashcaraigu , ñuca mana quiriushcai .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ñucanchi Señorba gracia nishca ali iyai yali tucuca ñucahua ali quirinahuas llaquinahuas Cristo Jesuspi .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Cai shimi ciertomi , tucui runauna quiringaj valin , imasna Cristo Jesús cai pachama shamuca uchayujgunara quishpichingaj . Ñucaga tucuimanda yali uchayujmi ani .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Shinajllaira , ñucara llaquishcahua apishca acani , ñuca yali uchayuj asha , Jesucristo paihua ali chapanara ñucajpi ricuchingaj tucui paibi quiringaraujgunama paiguna huiñai causaira apingaj .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Chiraigumanda , huiñaigama causaj Rey Apuma , mana ricuihuaj sapalla yachaj Diosma , ahuayanas , sumaj ricurinas achu , huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Cai mandashca shimira canda mingauni , ñuca churi Timoteo , canmanda ñaupa rimashca shimiunasna . Chi shimiunara casusha , ali macanaunara macanaungui ,

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: ali quirinaras , ali rana iyairas huacachisha . Huaquingunaga caigunara ichusha , paiguna quirishcara huajlichinaushca .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Casnami ranauca Himeneo Alejandro nishcauna . Paigunara Satanasma entregacani , ama irusta rimangaj yachanauchu , nisha .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Ñaupa punda caita munani : tucuiguna ruganauchu , mañanauchu , agrasinauchu , tucui runaunamanda ;

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: rey apuunamandas , tucui mandajgunamandas , ñucanchi ganashua ahila causangaj , Diosta iyarisha , ali shunguhuas .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Ñucanchira Quishpichij Dios ricujpi , cai sami causai alimi , munanaitami .

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Pai munanmi tucui runauna quishpinauchu , nisha , cierto shimira yachanama shamunauchu .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Shu sapalla Dios tian . Dioshua runahua chaupi shungüi shu alichij tian . Paiga Jesucristo , runa .

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: Pai quiquinllara cuca , tucuira cuti randingaj . Chita pai ricuchina horaspi ricuchishca aca .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Chimanda ñuca camachijpas cachashca runas raí tucucani . Cristo shutü ciertora rimani , mana llullanichu . Shinallara Gentil nishcaunara yachachij tucucani , quirinahuas , cierto shimihuas .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Shinajpi munani cariuna mañanauchu tucui partiunai , chuyaj maquira ahuama aisasha , mana piñarisha , mana macanausha .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Shinallara huarmiuna ali tupu churarinauchu , ali quillparisha , mana yapajta ricurijta paiñashcahua , mana curihua , mana perla nishcaunahua , mana yapajta valij churanahuas ,

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: astaun , ali ranaunahua churarinauchu , quirinimi nij huarmiuna rana tupui .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Huarmiuna chunlla tiasha yachanauchu , ali casusha .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Huarmiunara lugarda mana cunichu yachachingaj , cariunara mandangajpas , astaumbas chunlla tianami .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Adán ñaupa punda rashcami aca , chi huasha Eva .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Adán mana umachishcachu aca , randi huarmi umachishca asha , uchayuj tucuca .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Astaun huarmi quishpichishca anga huahuaunara pagarichisha , pai quirisha , llaquishcahua chuyajlla causasha , ali chuyaj shunguhua .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Cai shimi ciertomi . Maicans ricuj tucusha nisha , ali ranara muñan .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Ministirinmi shu ricuj runa mana causayuj anami , shu huarmiyujlla , ali iyaira charij iyaiyuj , ali ñahuiyuj , ali pasiachij , ali yachachij ,

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: mana machaisiqui , mana macaisiqui , manali rashcamanda ganashcara mana apisha nij , randi ali shungu , mana shinzhira rimaj , mana cullquira llaquij ,

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: paihua quiquin huasii tiajgunara ali mandaj , churiunara ali casujta raj ali shunguhua .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Shu runa paihua quiquin huasii tiajgunara mana ali mandasha , ¿ imasna rasha cuirangairi Diospa iglesiara ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Ricuj runaga ama mushuj quirij achu ; mushuj ajpiga mas tucusha ñinga , Supaira causayachishcai urmangami .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Shinallara ministirinmi shujguna paimanda ali runami nisha iyanauchu , pai ama cami tucungaj , ama supaihua tugllai urmangaj .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Iglesiara yanapajguna shinallara ali shunguyujguna anauchu , mana ishqui shimiyujguna , mana machaisiquiuna , manali rashcamanda ganashcara mana apisha nijguna .

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Quirinamanda pacashca shimira chuyaj iyaihua huacachinauchu .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Shinallara ñaupa punda camashca anauchu . Caimanda huasha causa illaj asha , iglesiara sirvijguna tucunauchu .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Huarmiunas shinallara ali shunguyujguna anauchu , mana camijguna , ali ñahuiyujguna , tucuibi pactachijguna .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Iglesiara yanapajguna shu huarmiyujlla anauchu , paiguna huahuaunara paiguna huasii tiajgunaras ali mandajguna .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Iglesiara yanapajguna ali sirvijpi , ali rimai tucunaun . Shinallara mas shinzhi tucunaun Cristo Jesusta quirinai .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Caita canda quillcauni , shinajllaira chapauni , uctalla shamusha nisha canda ricungaj .

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: Randi , ñuca unaiyasha , caita quillcauni can yachangaj imasna rasha causanami angui Diospa huasii , causaj Diospa iglesiai , cai iglesia huasi cierto shimi istandi cuentami , cierto shimira shayachijmi .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Cierto pacha , yapa atunmi ñucanchi quirinamanda pacashca shimi . Dios aichai ricuchishca aca . Alimi nishca aca Espiritui . Angelguna paita ricunauca . Paihua shutira yachachishca aca gentiles nishca runaunama . Quirishca aca cai pachai . Ahuai sumaj ricurinai apishca aca .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Espirituga pajlla pambai riman imasna puchucai punzhaunai huaquinguna ali quirinara saquinaunga , umachij espírituunaras supai yachachishcaunaras uyasha .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Llullaj runaunaga huashai rimasha umachinaungami , paiguna iyai tujlu tujlu rishca cuenta asha .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Paiguna , Ama casaraichichu , ninaunga . Huaquin micunauñara ama micuichichu , ninaunga ; astaun Dios cai micunaunara cuca quirijgunas cierto shimira yachajgunas micunauchu agrasishcahua .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Tucui Dios iñachishcaga alimi , mana ichunachu . Pagarachu nisha agrasishacahua apisha micunami .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Shina rasha apijpi , chuyayachishcami Diospa shimihua , Diosta mañanahuas .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Canga uquiunara casna yachachijpi , Cristo Jesusta ali sirvij tucungui , quirina shimiunahua carashca cuenta , can catishca ali yachachinahuas .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Mundu yanga cuentanaunaras , rucu apamauna yanga cuentanaunaras ama uyaichu . Randi can quiquinllara shinzhiyari , Diosta mas mas llaquisha catingaj .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Aichara shinzhiyachina ansalla valin , randi Diosta llaquisha causana tucuihuaj valin , cuna causaibi , huasha shamuna causaibis , cushca shimi rimashcasna .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Cai shimi ciertomi , tucui runauna quiringaj valinmi .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Chiraigumanda tarabanchi , tormendarinchi . Causaj Diosta chapaunchi . Pai tucui runara Quishpichijmi , astaun mas quirijgunaras .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Caita mandai , yachachi .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Pihuas ama burlachu can malta ashcara . Astaun can quirijgunara ricuchingui imasna amanaras , imasna causanaras , imasna llaquinaras , quirinaras , chuyaj iyanaras .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Ñuca shamunagama , runauna ñaupajpi Diospa shimira ricunai catingui , shinallara camachinais , yachachinais .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Canma cuyashcara ama cungarichu , canma cushca aca Diosmanda shimiuna rimashcahua , anciano nishca rucuuna maquira can ahuai paltashcai .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Caigunara raí , casna rasha catingui , tucui runauna can ñaupajma riushcara ricunauchu .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Canllarara cuirai , shinallara can yachachinara . Caita rasha cati . Casna rasha candas canda uyajgunaras quishpichinguimi .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Rucu apayara ama shinzhira piñangui astaumbas yayara cuenta paita camachingui , shinallara maltaunara uquiunara cuenta .

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: Rucu apamaunaras , mamara cuenta rimasha camachingui , malta huarmiunaras panira cuenta , ali chuyaj shunguhua .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Huaccha huarmiunara llaqui , cierto huacchauna ajpi .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Ima huaccha huarmis churiyuj ajpi , churi huahuayuj ajpis , cai churiuna yachanauchu paiguna quiquin yayaunara cuirangaj , paiguna iñachishcara cutipangaj . Caimi Dios ali munashca .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Maican huarmis cierto huaccha huarmi asha , sapalla tucusha , Diosta chapaun tutandi punzhandi , Diosta mañasha , Diosta rugasha causaun .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Astaun maican huarmis aicha munashcasna causasha , shina causashallara huañushcami .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Cai shimiunara camachi , paiguna ama causayuj tucungaj .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Shu runa paihua aillura mana carasha , maspas paihua quiquin huasii tiajgunaras , pai quirishcara huajlichishcami , shu mana quirijtas yali tucun .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Huaccha huarmi shutiuna quillca pangai casnaunallara quillcangui : Socta chunga huata yali ajgunallara churai , shuj cariyujllara .

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Paiga ali rimashca achu pai alirashcamanda , churiunara iñachij , pasiachij , quirijguna chaquira maillaj , tormendarishcaunara yanapaj , tucuira aliraj .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Astaun , malta huaccha huarmiunara quillcai ama churaichu . Imahoraspas paiguna aicha munaira sintisha , Cristora mana casunaun , cuti casarasha ninaun .

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: Shina rasha causaiyuj tucunaun , paiguna ñaupa quirishcara saquishcamanda .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Maspas , quülauna tucunaun , tucui huasiunai pasiasha ; mana quillaunalla astaun maspas rimaisiquiuna , inquitajguna , mana rimaihuajta rimajgunas tucunaun .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Chiraigumanda ñuca munani malta huaccha huarmiuna casaranauchu , churiunara iñachinauchu , paiguna huasira cuiranauchu , maican chijnijtas ama lugarda cusha irusta rimangaj .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Huaquingunaga ña Satanasta catiushcamanda anzhurínaushcami .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Maican quirij runas quirij huarmis huaccha huarmiunara charisha , paigunara cuiranauchu , iglesia ama pagangaj paigunamanda , iglesia cierto huaccha huarmiunajta ali tupu cullquira charingaj .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Anciano nishca rucuuna ali mandajguna ajpi , ali iyashca anauchu , maspas paiguna camachijguna yachachijguna ajpis .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Quillcai quillcashca tian : Tarabaj huagra shimira ama tapaichu , shinallara nin : Tarabaj runa paihua gananara apingaj valinmi .

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Shu anciano nishca rucu runara ama causayachinauchu , mana ishqui quinsa ricujgunara charijpi .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Ucharaisiquiunaraga piñangui tucuiguna ñaupajpi , chishujguna manzharinauchu .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Canda nini Diospa ñaupajpi , Señor Jesuspa ñaupajpis , pai ajllashca angelguna ñaupajpis , cai shimiunara huacachi , ama huaquingunallara llaquisha shujgunara chijnisha .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Ama uctalla maquiunara ima runa ahuais paltaichu , shinallara shujpa ucharashcara ama apinguichu . Canllara chuyaj shunguhua huacachi .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Canga ama yacullara upichu , astaun ansa vinora upi camba icsa huajlishcamanda , can caran rato ungushcamandas .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Huaquin runauna ucharashcauna ñaupajmanda ricurinaun , paiguna taripanama manara shamujllaira , huaquinguna ucharashcara huashalla tarinaun .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Shinallarami ali rashcauna ricurinaun , shujgunaga mana ricurijpi , mana ushanaunzhu pacanara .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Tucui esclavos nishca sirvijguna paiguna patrongunara ali llaquinauchu , Diospa shutiras paimanda yachachinaras ama piñai tucungaj .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Maicanguna quirij patrongunara charisha , ama paigunara pishiyachinauchu uqui ashcamanda , randi paigunara astaun ali sirvinauchu quirijguna ashcaraigu , maspas paiguna ali sirvishcara apijguna quirijguna asha , llaquishcauna ashas . Caita yachachi , shinallara camachi .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Pi runas shu tonora yachachijpi , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo ali shimiunara ali causana yachachinaras mana chasquijpi ,

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: casna runa mas tucuisiqui tucushca , imaras mana yachanzhu , rimanuisiqui tucushca . Caimanda chijninauna , macanaunas , manali rimanaunas , manali iyaigunas llucshinaun .

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: Irus iyaiyuj runauna , cierto shimi illajguna asha , upa shimiunahua macananaun , ali causaimanda shu gananara apisha iyanaun . Casnaunamanda anzhurí .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Astaumbas ali causana cushi shunguhua ajpi ali gananami .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Imaras mana apamushcanchichu cai pachama , cierto pacha mana imaras llucchinara ushashunzhu .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Shina ajpi , churanaras micunaras charisha , cushi tucushunchi caigunahua .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Randi , charij tucusha niuguna tentaciombi urmanaun , tugllais ; shinallara ima upa huajlichij munashcaunais urmanaun . Caiguna runaunara tucuchinaun , chingachinaun .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Cullquira llaquina mana valin , shu angu cuenta tucun imamanda tucui manaliuna iñanaun . Huaquinguna cullquira yapajta munasha , quirina ñambimanda anzhurinaushca , ashca nanaihua tormendachi tucunaushcami .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Canga , Diospa runa , chi samiunamanda miticui . Astaun , aliranara , Diosta llaquij shungura , ali quirinara , llaquinara , ahuantanara , manso shunguras cati .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Ali quirina macanaunara macanui , huiñai causaira api . Caihuaj cayashca acangui , can ashca ricujguna ñaupajpi can quirishcara ali rimasha ricuchicangui .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Tucuira causachij Diospa ñaupajpi canda mandauni , shinallara Jesucristo ñaupajpis , pai Poncio Pilato ñaupajpi rimasha ali shimira cuca ,

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: canda mandauni cai camachishca shimira huacachingui , nisha , huajli illaj , causa illaj , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo ricurinagama .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Caitaga bendiciashca sapalla mandaj Dios ricuchingami paihua punzhai . Paiga rey apuunamanda Rey Apumi , señorgunamanda Señormi ,

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: paiga sapalla huañui illajmi , mana ricuihuaj mana pactaihuaj punzhai causaj Diosmi . Paitaga pi runas mana ricushcachu , mana ushanzhu ricunara . Paihuajmi ali shutis , huiñaigama duraj mandanas . Amen .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Cai tiempoi causaj charijgunama rimai , ama mas tucuisiqui anauchu , ama paiguna charishcaunai chapanauchu , mana quirihuajlla ashcamanda . Astaun , paiguna causaj Diospi quirisha chapanauchu . Diosga ñucanchira tucuira pactajta cunmi ñucanchi gustangaj .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Paiguna alira ranauchu , charij tucunauchu ali ranaunahua , cuyaisiquiuna , cuyaj shunguyujguna tucunauchu ;

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Casna ali ranaunara tandachisha , huasha shamuj causai istandi rumira cuenta charinaunga , paiguna huiñai causaira apinauchu .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: Timoteo , cambajpi mingashcara huacachi . Yanga upa shimiunara ama uyaichu , llulla rimashca ciencia nishca yachai rimashcaunaras .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Huaquingunaga cai yachai nishcara uyasha , quirina ñambimanda anzhurinaushcami . Gracia nishca ali iyai canhua achu . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Ñuca , Pablo , apóstol nishca Jesucristo cachashca runa , Dios munashcamanda , imasnara pai causanara cusha nishcasna Cristo Jesuspi .

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Ñuca llaquishca churi Timoteoma quülcauni . Gracia nishca ali iyairas , llaquij shunguras cushi shunguras chari , Yaya Diosmanda , Cristo Jesús ñucanchi Señormandas .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Diosta agrasini , paita sumaj iyaihua sirvini ñuca yayaunamanda pacha . Mana saquisha canmanda iyariuni , Diosta mañausha tutandi punzhandi ;

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: camba ñahui iquira talishcara iyarisha , ashcara munani canda ricungaj , ñuca ashcara cushiyangaj .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Can shunguhua quirinara iyariuni . Shinallara quirinauca camba Loida rucu mama , camba Eunice mamas . Maspas , cierto mani can shinallara quiriungui .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Chimanda canda nini , cambajpi tiaj Dios cuyashcara causachingui ninara huairachishca cuenta ; chi cuyashca ñuca maquira camba ahuai churashcamanda aca .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Dios ñucanchima mana cuhuacachu manzhai iyaira , randi ushana iyaira , llaquina iyaira , aicha munaira arcana iyairas .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Ama pingarichu ñucanchi Señormanda rimangaj , shinallara ñucamandas , ñuca paihua ishcashca runa asha . Randi , evangelio ali shimimanda ñucahua pariju tormendarinara apingui , Diospa ushaira cushcasna .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Pai ñucanchira quishpichihuaca , sumaj cayanahua cayasha , mana ñucanchi rashcauna raigumanda , astaun pai quiquin munashcamanda , shinallara Cristo Jesuspi cushca gracia nishca ali iyaimandas , tiempouna manara callarishcaira cushca ,

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: shinallara cunas ricuchishcami ñucanchira Quishpichij Cristo Jesús ricurímushcai . Pai huañuira vencica , causairas mana huañuihuaj causairas punzhajlla ricuchica evangelio ali shimii .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Cai evangelio ali shimira camachijpas , cachashca runas , Gentil nishcaunara yachachijpas ñuca churai tucucani .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Chiraigumanda casna tormendarini ; randi mana pingarinichu , ñuca maicanda quirishcaras yachani , pai cierto pacha ñuca mingashcara ushanmi huacachinara , chi punzhagama .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ñucamanda uyashca ali shimi tonora catingui , Cristo Jesuspi tiaj quirinais , llaquinais .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Canda mingashca ali shimira huacachi ñucanchijpi causaj Santo Espíritu yanapashcahua .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Ña yachangui imasna tucui Asiai tiajguna ichuhuanauca , Figelo Hermógenes nishcauna rashcasna .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Onesíforo nishcaunara Señor llaquipachu . Pai ashca cuti cariyachihuaca . Ñuca iru huascaunamanda mana pingaricachu .

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: Maspas , Roma llactai tiaushcai llaquishcahua mascahuaca ñucara , tupahuacami .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Señor paita cupachu llaquinara tupangaj Señormanda chi punzhai . Alimi yachangui imasna Efeso llactai ashcara yanapahuaca ñucanchira .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Canga , ñuca churi , Cristo Jesuspi tiaj gracia nishca ali iyaibi shinzhiyari .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Can ñucamanda ashca ricujguna ñaupajpi uyashcara , ali quirij runaunama pasachingui , paiguna ushajguna asha shujgunara yachachingaj .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Canga tormendarinaunara ahuantangui Cristo Jesuspa ali soldaro cuenta .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: Pi runas , soldaro asha , mana inquitanzhu causana ranaunai , paita soldaro tucungaj apijta cushiyachingaj .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Maicambas pujllanaunai macanausha , mana ali macanaupi , llaitura mana apinzhu .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Tarabaj runaga iñashca muyuunara apingaj ñaupara tarabana anga .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Ñuca rimashcara uyai . Señor tucuira canda intindichingami .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Jesucristora iyari , Davidmanda mirashca , huañuimanda causarishca , ñuca evangelio ali shimii rimashcasna .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Chi ali shimimanda tormendariuni , huatashcami ani causayuj runasna , randi Diospa shimi mana huatashcachu .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Ajllashca runaunara llaquishcamanda tucuira ahuantani , paigunas quishpinara charinauchu nisha . Chi quishpichina Cristo Jesuspi tiaun huiñaigama duraj sumajhua .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Cai shimi ciertomi . Ñucanchi paihua pariju huañushca ajpi , shinallara paihua pariju causashun .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Ñucanchi tormendarijpis , shinallara paihua pariju rey apuuna tucushun . Ñucanchi , Paita mana ricsinichu , nijpi , paiga shinallara ñucanchima : Mana ricsinichu , ningami .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Ñucanchi mana quirihuajlla ajpi , paiga ali quirihuajllami . Paihua quiquin quirihuaj tonora saquinara mana ushanzhu .

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Caita iyachingui paigunara . Diospa ñaupajpi camachingui ama shimiunamanda macan anauchu . Chita mana ansas valinzhu , astaun uyajgunara huajlichin .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Diospa ñaupajpi canllara ricuchingui shu alimi nishca runa cuenta , shu pingarina illaj tarabaj runa cuenta , cierto shimira ali camachij .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Yanga shimiunara ama uyaichu . Chita uyajguna Diosmanda mas mas anzhurinaunga .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Paiguna shimi ismushca aicha cuenta micurisha rin . Himeneo Fileto nishcauna cai samiunami .

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Paiguna cierto shimimanda pandarinaushca , causarina ña pasashcami nisha . Shina nisha huaquinguna quirinara huajlichinaun .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Randi , Dios churashca urcun siqui cuenta shimi shinzhimi , casnami nin : Señor paihua quiquimbajgunara ricsin ; shinallara : Tucui Cristo shutira rimasha rugaj uchamanda anzhurichu .

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Atun huasii , mana curillahua cullquillahua rashca puruuna tianaunzhu , astaun caspi batías , allpa mangas tianaun , huaquinguna valijguna , huaquingunaga yanga apinaunami .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Shinajpi maican runa paulara ima manalimandas pichajpi , valij puru cuenta tucunga , chicanyachishca , Señorhuaj valijmi anga , ima ali ranaras rangaj puruntushca .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Shina ajpi maltauna ucha munashcaunamanda miticui ; ali dirichu ranaunara , quirinaras , llaquinaras cushi shunguras cati , Señorda chuyaj shunguhua rugajgunandi .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Iyai illaj upa rimanaunara ama uyaichu , macanauna shimiunara llucchinaun .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Señorda sirvij ama piñaisiqui tucuchu , astaun llaquisiqui tucui runaunahua , ali yachachij , ahuantaj achu ,

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: paita piñajgunara manso shunguhua camachisha , Dios munajpi arrepentirinaunga chari cierto shimira yachangaj .

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: Shinarajpi supai tugllamanda liushpirinaunga , api tucushca asha , pai munashcara rangaj .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Shinallara caita yachangui : puchucai punzhaunai tormendosguna shamunaungami .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Runauna paiguna quiquinllara llaquij tucunaunga , cullquira llaquijgunas , mas tucuisiquiunas , valijmi ani nijgunas , irusta rimajgunas , yayaunara mana casujgunas , mana agrasijgunas , manaliunas ,

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: llaquina illajgunas , mana mañaihuajgunas , camijgunas , mana ahuantajgunas , milliunas , aliranara chijnijgunas ,

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: amigounara entregajgunas , mana iyaihua rajgunas , pai quiquinllara llaquijgunas , aicha munashcaunara Diosmanda yali llaquijgunas .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Ali causai ricurinara charinaun , randi paihua ushaira mana ricsinaunzhu . Casna runaunahua ama llutarichu .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Caigunamanda huaquinguna huasii icusha , mana iyaiyuj huarmiunara apinaun . Cai huarmiuna yapa uchayujgunami , ima aicha munaihuas apashcaunami .

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Paiguna tucui horas yachasha rinaun , astaumbas cierto shimira yachanama mana imahoraspas pactanara ushanaunzhu .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Imasna Janes Jambres nishcauna Moisesta arcanauca , shinallara cai runauna cierto shimira arcanaun . Casna runauna iyaibi huajlishcaunami , quirinamanda ichushcauna .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Paiguna mana mas ñaupajma rinaungachu . Tucui riparanaunga imasna paiguna mana ali iyaiyujguna ashcara , chi ishqui runaunasna .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Canga ñuca yachachishcara catishcanguimi , ñuca causashcaras , iyashcaras , quirinaras , chapaisiqui shunguras , llaquinaras , ahuantashcaras ,

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: ñuca molestai tucushcaras , ñuca tormendarishcaras , imasna ñuca Antioquía , Iconio , Listra nishca llactaunai tiaushcai tucushcaras yachangui , imasna yapa tormendachihuanauca . Randi tucuimanda Señor quishpichihuaca .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Shinallara tucui Cristo Jesuspi ali causasha nijguna tormendachi tucunaungami .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Astaun manali runaunas umachijgunas mas manalii rinaunga , umachisha , shinallara umachi tucushas .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Canga , can yachashcara , can cierto ajta ricsishcaras cati , canda camachijta ricsisha .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Shinallara yachangui imasna can ichilla huahua horasmanda pacha Diospa Santo Quillcashcaunara ricsishcangui . Cai shimiuna canda alma quishpichina yachanara cunaun Cristo Jesuspi quirijpi .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Tucui Dios Quillcashca Diosmanda rimashcami . Valinmi yachachingaj , camachingaj , alichingaj , ali causanara yachachingaj ,

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: Diospa runa ali tucungaj , pactajta alichishca tucui ali ranara rangaj .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Canda nini Diospa ñaupajpi , Señor Jesucristo ñaupajpis , pai causajgunaras huañushcaunaras taripaj asha , pai ricurimushcai , pai mandana pachais :

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: shimira camachi , nisha , shinzhira rimai , horas ajpis mana ajpis , intindichi , camachi , yachachi , tucui chapanahua , ali yachanahuas .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Horas shamun runauna ali yachachinara mana uyanaungachu . Randi , paiguna rinri shicshisha cuenta , paiguna quiquin aicha munashcasna yachachijgunara tandachinaunga .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Shinallara cierto shimiunara uyangaj rinrira tapanaunga , yanga cuentanaunama voltiarinaunga .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Canga , tucuibi ali ñahuihua tiai , tormendosta ahuantai , evangelio ali shimira rimai , canma cushca sirvinara pactachi .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Ñuca ñallami sacrificiora rai tucungarauni . Ñuca llucshina horas ña pactariunmi .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Ali macanaunara macanaushcanimi ; callpanara tucuchishcani ; quirinara huacachishcani .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Cunamanda ñucajta ali causana llaitura huacachishcami . Chi llaitura ali taripaj Señor chi punzhai cuhuangami ñucama ; mana ñucamallachu astaun shinallara tucui pai shamunara llaquijgunamas .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Ñucara ricungaj uctalla shamungui .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: Demás , cai pachara llaquisha , ñucara saquihuaca , Tesalónica llactama rica . Crescente Galacia partima rica , Tito Dalmacia partimas .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Lucaslla ñucahua tiaun . Marcosta apisha pushamui , pai valijmi ñucara yanapangaj .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Tíquico nishcara Efeso llactama cachacani .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Can shamusha , ñuca Troas llactai Carpo huasii mingashca ponchora apamui , shinallara ñuca quillcaunaras , maspas carai quillcashca pangaunaras .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Alejandro , paila irura tarabaj runa , yapa manalira rahuaca . Señorga paita cutichichu pai shina rashcamanda .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Cambas cuirai ama paihua llutaringaj ; pai ñucanchi shimiunara ashcara arcashcami .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Ñucara ñaupa punda taripaushcai , mana pihuas ñucahua tiauca . Tucui ichuhuanauca . Ama causayuj tucunauchu chimanda .

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Randi Señorga ñucahua pariju tiauca , ursara cuhuaca paihua shimira ali rimangaj , tucui gentilguna uyangaj . Shina ajpi león puma shimimanda quishpi tucucani .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Señor quishpichihuangami tucui manalimanda ; paihua ahua pachai tiaj rey apu mandanama pactanagama ñucara huacachingami . Paihuajmi ali sumaj achu , huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Priscaras , Aquilaras , Onesíforounaras , salurai .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Erasto Corinto llactai saquirica . Trófimo nishcara ungushca ajpi saquicani Mileto llactai .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Tamia horas manara pactamujllaira shamungui . Eubulo canda saluran , shinallara Pudente , Lino , Claudia , tucui uquiunas canda saluranaun .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Señor Jesucristo camba espirituhua tiachu . Gracia nishca ali iyai cangunahua tiachu . Amen .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Ñuca , Pablo , Diosta sirvij , Jesucristo apóstol nishca cachashca runa , imasna Dios ajllashca runauna quirishcasna cierto shimira yachashcasna ali causanai ,

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: huiñai huiñai causaira chapasha tiauni , imasna mana llullaj Dios paihua shimira cuca tiempouna manara callarishcaira .

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Dios pai munashca tiempoi paihua shimira ricuchica ñucama mingashca camachishcamanda , imasna ñucanchira Quishpichij Dios ñucara mandaca .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Titoma quillcauni , ñuca quiquin churima ñucanchi pariju quiriushcai , gracia nishca ali iyaira , llaquij shungura , cushi shunguras Dios Yayamanda , ñucanchira Quishpichij Señor Jesucristomandas chari .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Canda Creta nishca islai saquicani ima pishishcaras alichingaj , caran llactai ancianos nishca rucuunara churangajpas , ñuca canda mandashcasna .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Anciano runaga causa illaj achu , shuj huarmiyujlla , paihua churiuna quirijguna , mana irus causajguna , ali casujguna .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Ministirinmi ricuj runa causa illaj achu , Diosta sirvij asha . Casna runa mana mas tucuisiqui achu , mana piñarisiqui , mana machaisiqui , manali rashcaunamanda ganashcaunara mana apisha nij .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Astaun pai pasiachísiqui achu , aliranara llaquij , ali ñahuiyuj , ali shungu , chuyajila causaj , paillara ucha munaira arcarij .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Casna runa cierto shimira huacachij achu imasnara ñaupa punda yachachishcasna , shinallara ali yachanara camachij achu manali rimajgunara cutipangaj .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Chara ashca mana uyajguna tian , yanga rimajguna , umachijguna , maspas caiguna circuncisionda rana yachachijgunahua tianaun .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Casnauna shimira tapangaj ministinaun . Entero ailluunara molestanaun , mana valij shimiunara yachachisha yangamanda cullquira ganangaj .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Paigunamanda shuj , paiguna quiquin rimaj asha , nica : Creta runauna , tucui horas llullaisiquiuna , manali animalguna , quillaisiqui icsara sajsachijguna .

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Cai shimi ciertomi . Chiraigumanda shinzhira piñangui paigunara , paiguna ali quirijguna tucunauchu ;

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: paiguna ama uyanauchu judioguna yanga cuentashcaunara , cierto shimimanda anzhurishca runauna mandashcaunaras ama casunauchu .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Chuyaj shungu runaunaj tucui chuyajmi . Irus iyaiyujgunajga mana quirijgunajpas , mana imas chuyachu . Paiguna iyarina iyaigamas irusyashcami .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Diosta ricsinchimi nisha , astaun paiguna rashcaunahua : Illanmi Dios , ninaun , paiguna manaliuna , mana casujguna asha , mana valijguna ima aliranaras rangaj .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Canga ali cierto yachanara rimangui .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Casna ningui : Rucu apayauna ali ñahuiyujguna anauchu , iyaiyujguna , ali quirinara quirijguna , llaquinahua , chapaisiqui shunguhuas .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Rucu apamaunas ali ñahuihua causanauchu , mana irusta rimajguna shujgunamanda , mana machaisiquiuna , aliranara yachachijgunas ,

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: malta huarmiunara yachachijguna quiquin cariras churiunaras llaquingaj ,

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: caiguna ali iyaiyujguna tucungaj , chuyajila causajguna , quiquin huasira cuirajguna , ali shunguuna , carira casujguna . Shina rajpi Diospa shimi mana cami tucungachu .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Shinallara maltaunara camachi iyaiyujguna tucungaj .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Cambas tucui ali ranaunai ricuchij tucungui ; can yachachijpi , chuyaj shunguhua ali ñahuihuas ricuchi .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Shinallara ali shimihuas , mana piñaihuaj shimihuas yachachij casna rajpi chijnij runa pingaringami , mana ima manaliras rimanara ushangachu cangunamanda .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Sirvijgunara camachi paiguna patrongunara ali uyangaj , tucuibi paigunara cushiyachisha , ama cutipaisiquiuna asha ;

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: mana shuhuasha , astaun tucuibi ali pactachij ajta ricuchisha , shinarashaga tucuibi ñucanchira Quishpichij Diospa yachachinara ali sumacyachinaungami .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Diospa gracia nishca ali iyai ricurimushcami tucui runauna quishpichi tucungaj ,

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: ñucanchira yachachisha imasnara yanga causairas , cai pacha ucha munairas saquisha , caí tiempoi iyaihua alihua Diosta manzhashcahua causashunchi .

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: Cushi chapanara chapaunchi , ñucanchi atun Dios Quishpichij Jesucristo ashca sumaj ricurinara chapaunchimi .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Paiga paillarara cuca ñucanchi randimanda , ñucanchira randingaj tucui manalimanda , paihuajllarara shu runa montonda chuyayachingaj , ali ranara raisiquiuna .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Caita rimai , camachi , yachachi tucui mandanahua . Pihuas canda ama pishiyachichu .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Paigunara iyarichi mandajgunara apuunaras casungaj , uyaisiquiuna tucungaj , puruntuuna ima ali ranaras rangaj .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Pitas ama llullasha huajlichinauchu , ama macanuisiquiuna tucunauchu , randi llaquisiquiuna , manso shunguyujguna anauchu tucui runaunahua .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Ñucanchisga ñaupa horas iyai illajguna acanchi , mana casujguna , chingarishcauna , aicha ucha munairas ima gustashcaras sirvijguna acanchi , manali rana munaibis chijninais causausha , chijnihuajguna , parijumanda chijninaushas .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Astaun ñucanchira Quishpichij Diospa ali shungu ricurimujpi , pai runaunara llaquishcas ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: quishpichihuaca , mana ñucanchi alirashcaunamandachu , astaun pai llaquishcamanda , ñucanchi quishpichishcai maillashcamandas , shinallara Santo Espiritui mushujyachishcamandas .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Diosga Santo Espiritura ñucanchijpi pactajta talica ñucanchira Quishpichij Señor Jesucristomanda ,

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: ñucanchiga paihua gracia ali iyaimanda alichishca , Diosmanda herederos nishca apijguna tucushcanchi , imasna huiñai huiñai causaira chapashcasna .
