text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Caiga cierto shimimi . Cai shimiunara shinzhira yachachi , Diospi quirijguna ali ranaunai tianauchu . Caigunaga aliunami valijgunami runaunaj .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Upa sami tapunaunara , unaimanda miramuj shutiunaras , macanauna shimiunaras , ley shimimanda tapunaunaras saqui . Caiguna mana valinaun , mana sirvinaun .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Chaupichij runara ichui , shu cuti ishqui cuti camachishca huasha ,

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: caita yachasha , casna runa manalima ña tigrashcami , uchara raun , pai quiquin ucharashcamanda causayachishcami .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Imahoras ñuca Artemas nishcara Tíquico nishcara cambajma cachajpi , uctalla shami ñucajma Nicópolis llactama . Chihui tamia tiempora pasangaj iyaunimi .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Zenas nishca abogado runara , Apolos nishcaras yanapai paiguna ñambii , ama imais paigunaj pishi tucungaj .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Ñucanchijguna shinallara yachanauchu ali ranaunara rangaj , ministijgunara yanapangaj , paiguna ama aparishcauna illaj tucunauchu .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Tucui ñucahua tiajguna canda saluranaun . Quirijpuramanda ñucanchira llaquijgunara salurai . Gracia ali iyai tucui cangunahua achu . Amen .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Pablo , Jesucristora llaquishcamanda chonda cularbi ishcarij , Timoteo uquis , llaquishca Füemonda saluranchi , ñucanchira yanapaj amigo .

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: Llaquishca Apia paniras saluranchi , Arquiporas , pai ñucanchihua pariju tarabaj , shinallara camba huasii tiaj iglesiaras .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gracia nishca ali iyairas cushi shunguras charichi ñucanchi Dios Yayamandas , Señor Jesucristomandas .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Ñuca Diosta agrasini , tucui horas canda iyarisha ñuca mañaushcaunai .

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: Camba llaquij shungura , can shinzhi quirinaras Señor Jesusma tucui quirijgunamas uyashcanimi .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Diosta mañauni imasna can ñucanchihua pariju quirisha , astaun ali intindinguima tucui ñucanchi apishca bendiciongunara Cristo Jesusmanda .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Can llaquishcamanda ashca cushira charinchi , cariyashca manchi , uqui , imasna can quirijguna shunguunara cariyachishcangui .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Caimanda lugarda charishallara Cristoi canda mandangaj ima rana ashcaras ,

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: shinashas llaquishcamanda , canda rugauni , imasna ñuca rucu Pablo ashas , maspas Jesucristomanda chonda cularbi ishcaríj ;

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: ñuca churi Onesimomanda canda rugauni , ñuca ishcariashcai paihua yaya tucucani Cristoi .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Paiga ñaupa horas canma mana valijchu aca , astaun cuna horas canmas ñucamas valijmi .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Paitaga cuti cambajma cachauni . Canga paita ñucara cuenta apingui .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Paita arcasha nicani ñucahua pariju , can randimanda ñucara sirvingaj ñuca evangeliomanda ishcariushcai .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Shinashas , imara rangajpas mana munacanichu manara canda tapusha , camba yanapana ama ursamanda achu , astaun can munashcamanda .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Caimanda chari , pai canmanda anzhurishca aca unaiílara , can paita huiñaigama charingaj ;

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: cuna mana sirvijchu , astaun sirvijmanda yali , llaquishca uquimi , cierto pacha ñucama , astaun maspas canma imasna aichais shinallara Señorbis .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Shinasha can ñucara camba compañajsna iyasha , paita ñucarasna apingui .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Paiga imais canda huajlichishca ajpi , canda dibijpis , chita churai ñuca cuentai .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Ñuca , Pablo , quiquin maquihua canda quillcashcani , canda pagashami . Shinashas , mana ninichu imasna shinallara can quiquinllara ñucama dibihuangui .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Ari , uqui , yanapahuapai ñucara Señorbi . Ñuca shungura cushiyachihuapai Cristoi .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Ñuca canda quillcashcani , can casushcara yachasha , caitas yachasha : Can ñuca rimashcara yalijta pactachingui .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Shinallara ñucajta shu tiana ucura alichingui . Canguna mañaushcaunamanda ñuca cachari tucungaj chapauni .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Canda saluran Epafras , ñucahua pariju chonda cularbi tiaj , Cristo Jesusmanda .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Shinallara Marcos , Aristarco , Demás , Lucas , ñucara yanapajguna , canda saluranaun .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo gracia nishca ali iyai camba espirituhua tiachu . Amen .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Callari horas , Dios ashca cuti ashca tonoi yayaunama rimajgunahua rimaca .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Cai puchucai punzhaunaiga Dios ñucanchira rimashca Churimanda . Dios paita tucuira apijta churaca , Churis shinallara tucuira rarca .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Churiga Diospa sumajhua limpiashcami , Diospa quiquin tono ricurijmi . Churi tucuira huacachiun paihua ushaj shimihua . Pai ñucanchi ucharashcara pichaca , pai quiquin rashcamanda . Chihuasha sumaj Diospa ali maqui partii tiarica ahua pachai .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Angelgunamanda yali rashca aca , imasna paihua shuti paiguna shutira yalin .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: ¿ Diosga maican angeldara imahoraspas nicachu : Ñuca churimi angui , cuna punzha canda iñachicani ; shinallara , Ñuca paihua Yaya tucusha , pai ñucaj Churi tucunga ?

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Cutillara , imahoras ñaupa pagarishca Churira munduma icuchisha , nin : Tucui Diospa angelguna paita adoranauchu .

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Cierto pacha angelgunamanda nin : Paihua angelgunara espirituunara ranmi , paita sirvijgunara sindij ninara cuenta ranmi .

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Randi , Churimanda nin : Camba tiarina , O Dios , huiñai huiñaigama duran , camba gobierno varaga alirana varami .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Ali ranara llaquishcangui , manali ranara chijnishcangui . Chiraigumanda camba Dios aceitera camba umai talishcami , ali cushi shungu aceitehua , canda compañaj gunamanda yalira .

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Shinallara , Canga , Señor , callari horaspi mundura rarcangui , ahua pacharas camba maquihua rashcami .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Paiguna tucurinaunga , astaun can tiaunguirni . Chiguna tucui rucuyanaunga shu mauca llachapa cuenta ;

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: churana cuenta can paigunara lapungui , turcarinaungami . Astaun canga mana turcaringuichu , camba huatauna mana tucurinaungachu .

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Maican angelgunamara Dios imahoraspas nicachu : Ñuca ali maqui partii tiarí ñuca canda chijnijgunara camba chaqui ucui churanagama ?

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Angelgunaga , ¿ manzhu paiguna tucui sirvij espirituuna , quishpichina ajgunara yanapangaj cachamushcauna ?

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Chiraigumanda ministirinmi ñucanchi uyashcaunara astaun ali casungaj , ñucanchi paigunamanda ama caruyangaj .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Angelguna rimashca shimiuna cierto ajpis , tucui ucharana tucui mana casunas paihua quiquin paganara apijpis ,

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: ¿ Imasna rashara quishpishun , ñucanchi casna valij quishpina shimira mana ali uyajpi ? Cai quishpina shimira ñaupa punda Señor rimashca aca , chi huasha paita uyajguna ñucanchima rimanauca .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Dios paigunahua pariju rimaca , sumaj ricurinaunara munanaita rashcaunaras ricuchisha , Santo Espiritura cushcaunara cusha pai munashcasna .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Shamuj munduraga mana angelguna maquiunai churacachu , ñucanchi cuna rimaushca mundura .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Shinasha shu runa shu quillcai casna nisha rimaca : ¿ Imarai runaga , can paita iyaringaj , runa churis can paihuajma pasiangaj ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Paita angelgunamanda ansalla pishi rarcangui , paita ali sumajhua ali rimashca shutihua llaitura churachicangui , camba maquihua rashcauna ahuai paita churacangui .

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: Tucuira paihua chaqui ucui churacangui . Imasna tucuira paihua chaqui ucui churashca aca , imas mana quishpicachu . Shinajllaira tucuira chihui churashcara chara mana ricunchichu .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Astaun Jesusta angelgunamanda ansa pishi rashcara ricunchi , Dios yangamanda llaquishcaraigu pai tucui runauna randimanda huañuira gustangaj , paita ña ricunchi ali sumajhua ali rimashca shutihuas llaitushca cuenta pai huañuibi tormendarishcamanda .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Diosga , tucui paihuaj ajpi , tucui paimanda ajpi , ashca churiunara ahuai tiaj sumajma pushasha nisha , paiguna almara Quishpichijta tormendarinaunahua pactachingaj munaca .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Chicanyachijga chicanyachishcaunandi shu Diosmandallami anaun , chiraigumanda mana pingarinzhu , Uquiuna , nisha , paigunara rimangaj ,

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: casna nisha : Ñuca uquiunara camba shutira rimasha , tandarishca chaupi shungüi canda alabashami .

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Cutillara nin : Paita quirisha samashami . Shu cuti nin : Ñucas , Dios ñucama cushca churiunandi .

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Shinajpi imasna churiuna aichahua yahuarhua rashcauna ajpi , Jesuspas shinallara aicharas yahuardas apica , pai huañushaga huañuchina ushaira charij supai apura tucuchingaj ,

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: shinallara casna rasha huañuira manzhajgunara llushpichica , paiguna entero causana horas manzhashcaraigumanda sirvij tucushcaunara .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Cierto pacha Jesús angelgunara mana yanapacachu , astaun Abrahamba miraigunara yanapacami .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Chiraigumanda tucuibi paihua uquiuna cuenta tucuna maca , shu ali llaquij aü sirvij sacerdote atun apu tucungaj tucui Dios ranaunai , runauna ucharashcaunara pagangaj .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Jesusga tentai tucusha camashca asha , shinallara tenrashcaunara yanapanara ushan .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Chiraigumanda , chicanyachishca uquiuna , ahua pachamanda cayashcauna , Cristo Jesusta iyarichi , pai ñucanchi quirinai Apóstol nishca Dios ajllashcami , shinallara ñucanchi sacerdote atun apumi .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Paiga paita cayaj Diosta ali uyaj maca imasna Moisespas ali uyaj aca tucui Diospa huasii .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Imasna huasira raj huasimanda yali valin , shinallara Jesús Moisesmanda yali valin .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Tucui huasi shu runa rashcami , astaun tucuira rajga Diosmi .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Cierto pacha Moisés ali pactachij aca Diospa huasii , shu sirvij cuenta , huasha horas rimangaraushcara ricuchingaj ;

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Cristoga , quiquin Churi cuenta , ali pactachij aca Diospa huasii . Ñucanchiga chi huasimi anchi ñucanchi quirinaras , ñucanchi chapanai ahuayanaras puchucaigama shinzhira huacachisha .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Chiraigumanda , Santo Espíritu nishcasna : Canguna cuna punzha paihua shimira uyasha ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: canguna shungura ama shinzhiyachichi , imasnara tucuca Diosta piñachina horas , tentana punzhai , runa illashca partii ,

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: imahoras canguna yayauna ñucara tentahuanauca , ñucara camahuanauca , chuscu chunga huatara ñuca rashcaunara ricunauca .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Chimanda chi miraigunahua piñaricani . Tucui horas paiguna shungüi pandana nambira purisha chingarinaun , nicani , ñuca ñambiunara mana ricsinaushcachu .

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Chiraigumanda piñarisha , ñuca shutii rimasha nicani : Mana icunaungachu ñuca samanai .

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Ricuichi uquiuna , cangunahua ima manali mana quirij shungu ama tiangaj , causaj Diosmanda anzhuringaj .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Astaun cangunapura caran punzha rimanuichi , chara cuna punzha nisha niushcai , pihuas cangunamanda ama shinzhi shunguyuj tucuchu , ucha umachishcamanda .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Ñucanchi Cristohua pacta apijgunami anchi , callari horas quirinara shinzhira huacachisha puchucai horasgama ,

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: casna niushca horasllaira : Cunallara paihua shimira uyasha , shungura ama shinzhiyachichi , imasna ranauca ñucara piñachina punzhai .

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: ¿ Maicangunara anaucairi uyajguna ashallara , Diosta piñachijguna ? ¿ Manzhu tucui Egiptomanda Moiseshua pariju llucshijguna anauca ?

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: ¿ Maicangunahuara chuscu chunga huata tupura piñarica ? ¿ Manzhu ucharajgunahua aca , paiguna aichauna runa illaj partii urmajguna ?

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: ¿ Maicangunamara Dios paihua shutii rimaca , ñuca samanai mana icunaunga , nisha ? ¿ Manzhu mana uyajgunama acai ?

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Ricunchi imasnara paiguna mana quirishcamanda mana ushanaucachu icunara .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Manzhangaichi Dios cushca shimi chara tiaullaira paihua samanai icungaj , cangunamanda shuj mana pactashcajma cuenta .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Ñucanchimas imasna paigunamas ali shimira rimashca aca . Astaun paigunama shimira uyana mana valicachu , uyajguna mana quirinahua uyajpi .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ñucanchiga quirijguna asha samanai icunchi , randi Dios mana quirijgunamanda nica : Chiraigumanda piñarisha , ñuca quiquin shutii rimacani , mana icunaungachu ñuca samanai , nisha . Shinajllaira Dios rashcauna mundu callarishcamanda pacha rashcaunami anauca .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Huaquin Quillcai , canzhis punzhamanda rimasha , casnami nin : Dios pai tucui rashcaunamanda samacami canzhis punzhai .

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Cutillara chi Quillcai nin : Mana icunaungachu ñuca samanai .

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Chiraigumanda , huaquinguna samanai icungaj chara pishijpi , maspas ali shimira ñaupa rimashca runauna mana icunaucachu Diosta mana casushcaraigumanda ,

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: cutillara , ashca huatauna huasha , Dios shu punzhara cuca , David shimimanda rimasha : Cuna punzha , nica : canguna ñuca shimira uyasha , ama shinzhiyachichi canguna shunguunara .

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Josuéga paigunara samanara cushca ajpiga , Dios mana rimanmaca shu samana punzhamanda .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Chimanda Diospa runaunaj shu samana chara tiaun .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Paihua samanai icuj shinallara pai rashcaunamanda samacami , imasna Dios pai rashcaunamanda samashcasna .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Mascashunchi chi samanai icungaj , ama pihuas chiguna mana casushca samii urmangaj .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Diospa shimiga causajmi , ushajmi , tucui ishqui iluyuj esparamanda yali . Ushan almara espiritumanda , tullu mucuunara tullu ñuctumandas chicanyachingaj . Shungu iyairas munairas ricsin .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Mana ima rashcas tian mana Diospa ñaupajpi ricurij , astaun tucui llatanlla pascashcalla ricurin paihua ñahuii . Paihuami tucuira alichina anchi .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Chiraigumanda shu atun sacerdote apura charisha , ahua pachara pasajta , Diospa Churi Jesús ajta , ñucanchi quirina shimira huacachishunchi .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Shu ñucanchi tormendarishcara mana sintij sacerdote atun apura mana charinchichu , paiga ñucanchisna tucuibi tentashca aca , astaun ucha illaj .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Mayanllayamushunchi ñucanchira llaquij Diospa tiarinama , mana ansas manzhasha , pai llaquishcara tupangaj , paihua gracia nishca ali iyaira taringaj , ministishca horaspi yanapai tucungaj .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Tucui sacerdote atun apu , runaunamanda ajllashca asha , Dios mandashcaunai runaunara yanapangaj churashcami , cuyashcaunaras sacrificiounaras uchamanda ricuchingaj ;

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: pai chapaisiqui tucungaj mana intindijgunahuas pandajgunahuas , imasna paihuas irquimi .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Chiraigumanda , pai sacrificiounara ricuchinami anga , pai quiquin ucharashcamandas shinallara runaunajmandas .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Pi runas cai valij ranara mana pai quiquinmanda apinzhu , astaumbas Dios cayashcalla , Aaronda cayashcasna .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Shinallara quiquin Cristo mana paillarara ahuayachica sacerdote atun apu tucungaj , astaun Dios caita rarca , casna nisha : Can ñuca Churimi angui , cuna punzha canda tupashcanimi .

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Imasna shinallara nin shu Quillcai : Huiñaigama sacerdote tucushcangui Melquisedec nishca layamanda .

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Maspas , Cristo pai runa aichai causaushca punzhaunai , mañashcahua , rugashcahuas , caparisha , iquira talisha , paita huañuimanda llushpichij Diosma mañaca , pai manso shunguhua manzhashcamanda uyashca aca .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Churi ashallara , uyanara yachacami pai tormendarishcamanda ;

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: pai sumacyachishca asha , huiñaigama Quishpichij tucuca , tucui paita uyajgunama ;

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Dios paita shu Melquisedec layamanda sacerdote atun apura shutichica .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Caimanda ashcara charinchi rimangaj , tormendoshua intindichinami , canguna upa rinriyuj tucushcamanda .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Canguna ña yachachij tucuna ajguna ashallara , unai tiempo yachashca huasha chara ministinguichi cutillara Diospa shimimanda ñaupa aj yachanaunara yachangaj . Cuti lechera ministiujguna tucushcanguichi ali shinzhi aichara micujguna tucunarandimanda .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Tucui lechera upijga , ali causana shimira rimangaj chara mana yachanzhu , chara huahua ashcamanda .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Shinzhi micunaga shunguyujgunajmi , ashcara rashcaunamanda ña yachaiyujguna tucunaushca , aliras manaliras ricsingaj .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Chiraigumanda Cristomanda yachangaj ñaupa yachachishcaunara pasasha , ñaupajma rishunchi tucuira pactachingaj ; mana cutillara urcun siquira cuenta churasha : Huañushca rashcaunamanda arrepentinara , Diosta quirinara ,

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: bautisanamanda yachanaunara , maquira paltanara , huañushcauna causarinara , huiñaigama taripanaras .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Caillara rashun , Dios cierto pacha lugarda cujpi .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Runauna , shu cuti shungüi punzhayachishcauna , ahua pachamanda cuyashcara gustajguna , Santo Espiritura apijguna ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: shinallara Diospa ali shimira gustajguna , shamuna tiempouna ushanaunara gustajguna ashas ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: shinashas cuti urmanaupi , mana raihuajchu cutillara paigunara mushujllai arrepentichingaj , paiguna quiquin maquiunahua cutillara Diospa Churira chacatanaun , paita pajlla pambai pingachisha .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Allpa caran ratoi urmamuj taimara upiusha , ali quihuara iñachisha tarabaj runauna micungaj , Diospa bendicionda charin .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: Randi allpa cashaunaras chiniunaras iñachijpiga , ichunallami , maldicianallami , puchucaibi rupachinami anga .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Randi cangunamanda , llaquishcauna , astaun alira iyaunchi , alma quishpichina iyaira , ñucanchi casna rimaushallara .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Diosga mana cungarinzhu canguna rashcara , canguna llaquishcamanda rashcaunaras , paihua shutira ahuayachingaj , quirijgunara sirvishca asha , charajpas sirviusha .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Munanchi cangunamanda caran dueño shina ali cuiraj shungura charingaj puchucaigama , canguna chapaushca iyaira pactajta gustangaj ,

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: canguna ama quillaisiquiuna tucungaj , astaun imasna huaquin runauna paiguna quirishcamanda chapaushcamanda cushca shimiunara apinaun , canguna shinallara catirichL

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Dios Abrahanma shimira cushca horaspi , yali ali shuti illajpi , paihua quiquin shutii shimira cuca ,

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: casna nisha : Cierto pacha canda ashcara bendiciashami , ashcara mirachishami .

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Paiga alimanda chapasha , Dios cusha nishcara apica .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Cierto pacha runauna shu paigunamanda yali shutii shimira cunaun , maspas imara Diospa shutii rimashcahua alichishca ajpi ña mana turcaihuajchu .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Shinajpi Dios cushca shimira apijgunama pai rimashca mana turcaihuaj ajta astaun ali ricuchisha nisha , paihua quiquin shutii shimira cuca ;

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: shinasha ishqui mana turcaihuaj shimiunara charinchi , caigunai Dios mana ushan llullanara , ñucanchi ashca cushira charingaj , ñucanchima cushca chapanai quimirijguna asha .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Cai ali chapanara charinchi , shu almara huatana cuenta . Chiga huayurij llachapa ucugama icunmi .

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Chihui , ñaupara rij cuenta , Jesús ñucanchimanda icuca , pai ña shu Melquisedec layamanda sacerdote atun apura rashca asha huiñai huiñaigama .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Cai Melquisedec , Salem nishca llacta rey apu , ahuai tiaj Diospa sacerdote , Abrahamda chasquingaj llucshica , pai rey apuunara vencisha tigramushcai , maspas paita bendiciaca .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: Paimallara Abraham tucuimanda shu chunga partira cuca . Paihua shuti ñaupa punda , Ali causana Rey Apu , nin , shinallara Salem llacta Rey Apu , caita , Cushi shungu Rey Apu , nin .

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Paihua yaya , paihua mama , paihua aillu mana quillcashcachu tian , shinallara mana quillcashcachu paihua causana callarinas , paihua causana tucurinas . Astaun , Diospa Churi samii rashca asha , sacerdote cuenta huiñaigama duranmi .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Iyarichi cai runa valij tupura , quiquin Abraham paita shu chunga partira cuca pai guerrai apishcamanda .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Cierto pacha Levi churiunamanda sacerdote tucujguna runaunamanda chi chunga partira apingaj mandashcaunami , ley shimi rimashcasna ; caimi nin paiguna quiquin uquiunamanda apingaj , caigunas Abrahamba aichamanda llucshijguna ajllaira .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Chi Melquisedecga , mana paiguna aillui cuentashca ashallara , Abrahanmanda chi chunga partira apica , maspas pai Dios cushca shimira charij runara bendiciacami .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Cierto pacha , quipa runara ñaupa aj runa bendicianmi .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Caibi cierto pacha huañunalla runauna chi chunga partira apinaun , astaun chihui shu causaunmi nishca runa apinmi .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Casna rimasha nijpi , quiquin Levi , huasha horas chunga partira apij , Abrahambi chi chunga partira pagaca ,

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: Pai chara Abrahamba aicha ucui tiauca Melquisedec paita tupangaj llucshiushcai .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Shinajpi , sumaj causana Levi sacerdoteunamanda ajpi , paigunamanda runauna ley shimira apinauca , ¿ imaraigumanda shu sacerdote Melquisedec layamanda cuti ataringaj ministirinma , mana Aaron montonmanda cayashca asha ?

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Sacerdote monton turcashca ajpi , ursamanda ley camachishca shimiras shinallara turcangaj ministirinma .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Casna rimashca Señorga shu aillumanda llucshin , chi aillumandaga pihuas mana sirvishcachu altarbi .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Ricsinallami ñucanchi Señor Judá nishca aillumanda shamuca . Moisesga cai aillumanda imaras mana rimacachu runauna sacerdoteuna tucungaj .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Cai mas ricsihuajilami tucun Melquisedec cuenta shu tono sacerdote cuti atarijpi .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: Paiga sacerdote tucuca , mana shu runa aillu miraigunamanda mandashca shimimanda , astaun shu mana tulaihuaj causana ushaimanda sacerdote tucuca .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Paimanda rimashca tian : Can huiñaigama sacerdotemi angui Melquisedec layamanda .

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Casna ajpi ñaupa horas mandashca shimi chingachishcami , irqui ashcaraigu , mana sirvij ashcamanda .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Ley shimiga imaras mana alichicachu , astaun leyra chingachishca huasha shu yali valij chapanara cushcami aca , chimanda Diosma mayanllayamunchi .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Caitaga Diospa shutii rimashcahua rashcami aca .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: Chishu runauna cierto pacha Diospa shutii rimashca illaj ashallara sacerdoteuna tucunauca , randi caiga Diospa shutii rimashcahua , caita rimaj casna nisha : Señorga , paihua quiquin shutii rimaca , mana arrepentiringachu : Canmi huiñaigama sacerdote tucungui Melquisedec layamanda .

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Chiraigumanda shu yali valij pactachina shimira Jesús valichij tucushcami .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Chishu sacerdoteuna ashcaunami anauca , huañunamanda mana ushanaucachu catinara .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: Jesusga huiñaigama duraj asha , shu mana turcaihuaj sacerdote tonora charin .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Chiraigumanda Jesús paimanda Diosbajma shamujgunara shinallara puchucaigama quishpichinara ushanmi , pai huiñaigama causausha paigunamanda Diosta mañangaj .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Casna tono sacerdote atun apu ñucanchij valica : chuyaj , ucha illaj , ima iruspas illaj , ucharajgunamanda anzhurishca , ahua pachaunamanda yali ahuayachishca .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Paiga mana ministinzhu caran punzhai , chishu sacerdote atun apuuna rashca cuenta , ñaupa punda paiguna quiquin ucharashcaunamanda sacrificiora rangaj , chihuasha runaunajmanda . Cai sacerdotega casna rarca shu cutillara huiñaigama , pai quiquinllarara cusha sacrificioi .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Ley shimiga irqui sami runaunara churaun sacerdote atun apuuna tucungaj , astaun ley shimi huashai shamuj Diospa

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Ñucanchi rimashcaunamanda caimi yali valij parti : Casna sacerdote atun apura charinchi , pai ahua pachai tiaj ali sumaj Diospa tiarina ali maqui partii ña tiarishcami .

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: Paiga Diospa huasii sirvijmi , chi cierto tabernáculo nishca huasii , mana runa shayachishca astaim Señor shayachishcami .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Tucui sacerdote atun apu churashcami cuyashcaunara sacrificiounaras ricuchingaj . Chiraigumanda ministirinmi pai shinallara imaras charichu ricuchingaj .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Paiga cai pachallai tiaushca asha , mana sacerdote tucunmachu aca , shu sacerdoteuna ña tianaupi ley shimii nishcasna sacrificiounara ricuchingaj .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Chigunaga ahua pachai tiajguna ricurijllara almallaras sirvinaun , imasna Dios Moisesta rimaca tabernáculo nishca huasira shayachingaraushcai : Riqui , nisha , tucuira rai canda urcui ricuchishcasna ricurijta .

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Cunaga Cristo yali sirvinara charin , imasna pai shu yali valij pactachina shimira alichij tucushcami ; cai pactachina shimi yali cushca shimiunahua rashcami .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Chi ñaupa pactachina shimi mana pishishca ajpiga , cierto pacha mana mascashca anmaca mushujta .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Dios paigunahua piñarisha nica : Punzhauna shamunaungami , Señor nin , imahoras shu mushuj pactachina shimira alichishami Israelba huasihua Judá huasihuas .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: Cai mushuj pactachina shimi mana paiguna yayaunahua ñaupa horas pactachina shimi cuenta tucungachu , ñuca paiguna maquimanda apishca punzhai , paigunara Egipto llactamanda llucchingaj . Paiguna chi pactachina shimira mana huacachinauca , ñucas paigunara saquicani , Señor nin .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Chiraigumanda , caimi mushuj pactachina shimi , Israel huasihua alichisha , chi punzhauna huashai , Señor nin . Ñuca mandashca shimiunara paiguna iyaibi churashami , paiguna shungüis quülcashami . Ñuca paigunaj Dios tucushami , paigunas ñucaj aillu tucunaungami .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Pihuas paihua rayai causaj runara mana yachachingachu , pihuas paihua uquira mana yachachingachu : Señorda ricsi , nisha . Tucui runauna ñucara ricsihuanaungami , ichilla huahuamanda rucu runagama paigunamanda .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Perdonaisiqui tucushami paiguna manali rashcaunahua , paiguna ucharashcaunaras mana cuti iyarishachu .

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Mushuj pactachina shimimanda , Dios mushuj nishaga , ñaupa aj pactachina shimi ña rucu tucushcami . Rucu tucushcaga maucayasha ña chingarinallami .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Cierto pacha ñaupa pactachina shimi Diosta alabana camachishcara charicami , shinallara shu cai pachai tiaj Diosta alabana huasiras .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Tabernáculo nishca Diospa huasi casnami aca : Ñaupa partii , Santo Lugar nishcai , velara apiña , mesandi , ricuchina tandandi tianauca .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Quipa huayurij llachapa huashai , Santísimo Lugar nishca tiauca .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Chihui curihua rashca incienso nishcara rupachina puru tiauca , shinallara curihua quillpashca arca nishca pactachina shimi santo cajón . Cai arca nishca cajombi , maná nishcara huacachina curi puru , Aaromba iñaj caspi vara , shinallara pactachina shimi rumi palaunas tianauca .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Arca ahuai ishqui sumaj querubín nishcauna shayanauca , uchamanda pagana lugar nishca arca tapa ahuai . Caigunamanda cuna mana ashcara rimana usharinzhu .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Cai tucuiuna casna churashca ajpi , ñaupa parti ucui tucui punzhauna sacerdoteuna icunaun alabana ranaunara rangaj .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Randi huasha parti ucui sacerdote atun apulla icun shu cuti caran huatai , shina ashallara yahuar illajga mana icunzhu . Cai yahuarda ricuchinmi , pai quiquinmanda , runauna mana yachasha ucharashcaunamandas .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Santo Espíritu caimanda yachachin imasna Santísimo Lugar nishca ucu partima chara mana icuihuajchu aca ñaupa tabernáculo chara shayaullaira .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Cai tabernáculo shu cuna horasgama ricuchina cuentami , chihui cuyashcaunara sacrificiounaras ricuchinaunmi , shinajllaira caiguna shina raj runara alichinara mana ushanaunzhu paihua alirana iyaibi .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: Caigunaga micunaunalla , upinaunalla , huaquin armanaunalla , aicha rangaj mandashca ranaunalla anaun , mushuj tono rana horas pactamunagama churashcaunami .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Astaumbas Cristo ña shamushcami , shamuj bendiciongunara cuj sacerdote atun apu . Paihua tabernáculo nishca huasi yali valij , yali sirvij , mana runa maquihua rashca , mana cai mundumandachu aca .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: Pai shu artilla huiñaigama Santísimo Lugarbi icuca , mana cari chivo yahuarhua , mana huagra huahua yahuarhuas , astaun paihua quiquin yahuarhua icuca , shina rasha almaunara huiñai huiñaigama randica .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Huagra yahuar , cari chivo yahuar , malta huarmi huagra ushpas , irus runauna ahuai chausishca asha chicanyachisha aichara pichangaj ,

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: ¿ imasna mas Cristo yahuar yali pactanga canguna iyaira pichangaj huañushca ranaunamanda , canguna causaj Diosta sirvingaj ? Cristoga huiñai duraj Espiritumanda paulara ucha illajlla Diosma ricuchica .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Shinajpi chimanda , Cristo shu mushuj pactachina shimira alichij tucun , pai huañushca ajpi ñaupa pactachina shimimanda ucharashcaunara perdonangaj , cayashca runauna cushca shimii rimashca huiñai causaira apinauchu .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Testamento nishca pactachina quillca tiajpi , dueño huañuna anga chi quillca valij tucuncaj .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: Testamento quillcaga dueño huañushca huasha valinmi , astaun mana valinzhu dueño chara causaullaira .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Chiraigumanda ñaupa pactachina shimis mana yahuar illaj cushcachu aca .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Moisesga tucui mandashca shimiunara tucui runaunama rimashca huasha , huagra yahuarda cari chivo yahuardas apisha , yacuhua , puca illmahua , chausina pangaunahuas , quiquin quillcara shinallara tucui runaunaras chausica ,

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: casna nisha : Caiga Dios cangunama mandashca pactachina shimi alichina yahuarmi .

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Maspas , Moisés tabernáculo huasiras tucui sirvina vasounaras shinallarami yahuarhua chausica .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Ley shimii ñaca tucuira yahuarhua pichashcami . Yahuar mana talirijpi , uchara mana perdonashcachu .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Ministiricami ahua pachai tiaj ricuchijgunara casna sacrificiounahua pichai tucungaj , astaun quiquin ahua pachai tiajgunaga yali valij sacrificiounara ministinauca .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Cristoga mana icucachu maquihua rashca Diosta alabana huasii , chiga cierto aj huasimanda ricuchijlla aca , astaumbas quiquin ahua pachai icuca , paulara ñucanchimanda Diospa ñaupajpi cuna ricuchingaj .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: Maspas , mana ashca cuti paulara cungaj icucachu , imasna caran huatai sacerdote atun apu Santísimo Lugarbi icun shujpa yahuarhua .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: Mana shina ajpi ministirinmaca Cristo ashca cuti tormendarina , mundu callarinamanda pacha ; astaun cunaga tiempouna pactariushcai , paillarara shu cutilla cuca huiñaigama , pai quiquinllarara sacrificiora cuenta cungaj uchara quichungaj .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Imasna runaunama cushcami shu cutilla huañungaj , chihuasha taripai tucungaj ,

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: shinallarami Cristo shu cutilla cushca aca ashcauna ucharashcaunamanda . Chihuasha cutillara ricuringami , mana ucharaigumanda , astaun paita chapaugunara quishpichingaj .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Ley mandashca shimiga shamuj bendicionguna almallara charin , astaun paiguna quiquin ricurinara mana charinzhu . Chiraigumanda cai ley shimi caran huatai cuti rashca sacrificiounahua shamujgunara mana imahoraspas alichinara ushanzhu .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Mana shina ajpiga cai sacrificiounara cungaj ña tucurinmaca , casna rasha alabajguna shu cuti pichashca asha , ucha iyaira ña mana charinaunmaca .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Randi cai sacrificiounaiga , caran huata ucharashcaunara cuti iyarinaun ,

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: cari huagra cari chivo yahuarga ucharashcaunara quichunara mana ushashcaraigumanda .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Chiraigumanda pai mundui icusha , nin : Sacrificioras cuyashcaras mana munacangui , randi aichara ñucajta alichishcangui .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Rupachishca sacrificiouna , uchamanda pagashcaunas canda mana cushiyachinauca .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Shinajpi nicani : Ñuca shamunimi , O Dios , camba munaira rangaj , imasna quillcai ñucamanda quillcashcasna .

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Ñaupa nisha : Sacrificioras , cuyashcaras , rupachishcaunaras , uchamanda pagashcaunaras mana munacangui , canda mana cushiyachinauca , cai tucuira ley shimi mandashcasna cushca ajpi ,

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: shinallara huasha nica : Shamunimi , O Dios , camba munaira rangaj ; pai ñaupa ajta anzhuchin , puchucai ajta icuchingaj .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Cai munaibiga , ñucanchi chicanyachishca manchi , Jesucristo aicha shu cutilla cushcaraigu huiñai huiñaigama .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Cierto pacha tucui sacerdote caran punzha sirvisha , ashca cuti shina sacrificiounara rasha tiaunmi . Casna sacrificiounaga imahoraspas mana ushanaun ucharashcaunara quichungaj .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: Randi Cristo shu sacrificiollara ucharashcaunamanda , shu cutilla huiñai huiñaigama rashca huasha , ña tiarishcami Diospa ali maqui partima .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Chimanda ñaupajma chapaun Dios tucui paita chijnijgunara paihua chaqui ucui churanagama .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Paiga shu sacrificiollahua chicanyachishcaunara huiñaigama alichicami .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Caillarara Santo Espíritu ñucanchira ricuchin , casna nisha :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: Caimi ñuca pactachina shimi paigunahua , chi punzhauna pasashca huasha , Señor nin : Ñuca ley shimiunara paiguna shungüi churasha , paiguna iyaibi quillcasha .

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Chita rimashca huasha nin : Paiguna ucharashcaunara , paiguna manali rashcaunaras imahoraspas mana cuti iyaríshachu .

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Shinajpi caigunara ña perdonashca ajpi , uchamanda mas sacrificio mana tianzhu .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Shinajllaira uquiuna , lugarda charinchi Santísimo Lugarbi icungaj Jesucristo yahuarmanda ,

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: mushuj causaj ñambillara , pai ñucanchijta pascashca , huayurij llachapara pasasha , caimi paihua aicha .

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: Shinallara ñucanchi shu atun sacerdote Diospa huasi ahuai charisha ,

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: mayanllayamushunchi , ali shunguhua , ali shinzhi quirinahua , shungumanda manali iyaira pichashca , aichara ali chuya yacuhua maillashca .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Ñucanchi chapana shimira shinzhira huacachishun , mana cuyurisha , shimira cuj Diosta quirihuaj ashcamanda .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Ñucanchipura parijumanda iyarishunchi , mas mas llaquinaungaj alirangajpas yanapanausha ;

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: ñucanchi tandarimunara mana saquisha , huaquinguna rashcasna , astaun animarisha rimanausha , shinallara mas mas casna rasha canguna Cristo shamuna punzha mayanllayashcara ricusha .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Ñucanchiga quiquin munaimanda uchara rasha cierto shimira uyashca huasha , sacrificio ña mana tianzhu uchamanda ,

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: astaun taripanas rupachina ninas Dioshua piñaríjgunara manzhanaita chapanaunmi nillpungaj .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Moisés cushca ley shimira paquij runas , ishqui quinsa ricujguna rimanaupi , ursamanda huañunami .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu yali livachihuaj anga maican runa , Diospa Churira aitaj , pactachina shimira valichij yahuarda , paita pichaj yahuarda , irusmi nisha rimaj , gracia nishca ali iyaira cuj Espiritura camij ?

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Casna nisha rimaj Señorda ricsinchi : Cutipana ñucajmi , ñucallara pagashami , Señor nin . Cuti : Señor paihua runaunara taripangami , nin .

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: ¡ Manzhanaitami causaj Diospa maquiunai urmangaj !

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Iyarichi ñaupa punzhaunara , imahoras intindichishca huasha ashca macanaunahua tormendaricanguichi .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: Cierto pacha runauna cangunara manali rimashcaunara tormendachishcaunaras ricunauca , maspas shina tucujgunahua pariju compañajguna tucucanguichi .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Shinallara chonda cularbi ishcashcaunahua llaquiricanguichi , canguna charishcaunara quichushcaras cushiyasha ahuantacanguichi , caita yachasha : Ahua pachai yali valij yali duraj cuyashcara charinguichimi .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Ama pirdichichu canguna quirina iyaira , cai quirina valij gananara charin .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Chapaisiqui shungura ministinguichi , Diospa munaira pactachishca huasha , pai cushca shimira apingaj .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Unaillai , shamuna aj shamungami , mana unaiyangachu .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: Ali runa pai quirishcamanda causangami . Paiga manzharisha voltiarijpiga , ñuca alma paihuajpi mana cushiyangachu .

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Randi , ñucanchi mana huashama voltiajgunachu anchi , almara pirdingaj ; astaun quirijgunami anchi , almara quishpichingaj .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Quirinaga ima chapashcaras cierto apinimi nisha iyanami ; mana ricurijtas cierto pacha apingarauni , nisha iyanami .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Paiguna quirinamanda , callari tiempoi causajguna ali rimai tucunauca .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Ñucanchi quirinamanda , tucui estrellasgunara Dios rimashcamanda rashca ajta intindinchi . Shinajpi ricurijguna mana ricurijgunamanda rashcara quirinchi .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Abel , pai quirinamanda shu sacrificiora Diosma cuca , Caimbajmanda yalira . Caimanda pai ali runa nishca aca , Dios Abel cushcaunara ricsisha . Paiga huañushca ashallara , pai quirishcamanda charajmi rimaun .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Enoc , pai quirishcamanda ahuama apai tucuca , huañunara ama gustangaj . Mana tuparicachu , Dios paita apashcaraigu . Paita manara apai tucujllaira , Diosta cushiyachishcami paimanda rimashca aca .

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: Quirina illajpiga , mana ushaihuajchu Diosta cushiyachingaj . Ministirinmi Diospajma shamuj runa Dios ajta quiringaj , shinallara Dios paita mascajgunara pagajmi .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Noé quirisha , Dios paita chara mana ricurijgunamanda rimajpi , manzhasha shu barco nishcara alichicami , paihua aillura quishpichingaj . Pai casna quirinamanda , Noé mundura causayachica , shina rasha pai quirishcamanda ali causanara apij tucuca .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Abraham quirisha , pai cayashca asha , casucami , Dios paita cungaraushca allpama ringaj . Maita rinaras mana yachasha llucshicami .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Pai quirisha , carumanda shamuj cuenta , Dios cusha nishca allpai causaca , shujpa allpaisna . Carpa huasiunai causaca Jacobhuas Isachuas , paihua pariju cushca shimira apijguna asha .

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: Rumi ahuai sicachishca llactara chapauca , Dios iyarishca , Dios shayachishca llactara .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Sara shinallara , pai quirishcamanda , huahuara mana tupaj ashallara , ursara apica huahuara tupangaj , huahuara pagarichica , yapa rucu ashallara . Sara quirica , imasna shimira cuj Dios pai cushca shimira pactachijmi , nisha .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: Chiraigumanda , shu ñaca huañuj runamanda ashca miraiguna llucshimunauca , ahua pachai tiaj estrellasguna cuenta , lamar patai tiaj tiyu cuentas .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: Quirishallara tucui cai runauna huañunaucami , cushca shimira chara mana apishallara . Shinajllaira carumandalla ricunauca , quirinauca , saluranauca , caita nisha : Carumandauna , yanga purijgunallas cai pachai anchi .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Casna rimajgunaga pajlla pambai ricuchinaun imasna shu allpara mase anaunmi .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Paigunaga paiguna llucshishca llactara iyariushca ashaga , cierto pacha lugarda charinauca tigrangaj .

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: Astaun , paiguna shu yali llactara munanauca , shu ahua pachai tiajta . Chiraigumanda Dios mana pingarinzhu paiguna Dios nishca tucungaj . Paigunajta shu llactara alichishcami .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Abraham quirishcaraigumanda , paita camashca horaspi , Isacta cuca sacrificiora rangaj . Cushca shimira apijga paihua sapalla churira cuca .

text: Of whom it was said , That in Isaac shall thy seed be called :
text2: Paita nishca aca : Isacmanda camba miraiguna rimashca anga , nisha .

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: Diosga ushajmi huañushcaunamanda atarichingaj , nisha iyasha , chimanda paihua iyaibi cuti paihua churira chasquicami .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Isac quirisha , Jacobdas Esauras bendiciacami , huasha shamungaraugunara ricusha .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Jacob quirisha , pai huañuna horas pactarijpi , Josehua caran churiunara bendiciaca , paihua tauna pundai quimirisha , Diosta adoraca .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: José quirisha , pai huañuna horas pactarijpi , Israelba churiuna Egiptomanda llucshinara rimaca , paihua tulluunara cachañara mandasha rimaca .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Quirishcamanda , Moisés pagarimushcai , paihua yayauna paita pacanauca quinsa quilla tupura , paita shu gusto sumaj huahua ashcara ricusha . Rey apu mandashcara mana manzhanaucacbu .

text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Moisés quirishaga , ña rucu runa tucusha , pai Faraomba ushushi churi nisha rimashcara mana munacachu .

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: Uchamanda mana duraj gustanaunai causangaj mana munacachu , randi Diospa runaunahua pariju tormendachi tucungaj yali munacami .

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: Egipto llacta valishcaunamanda yali , Cristohua pariju chijni tucunara munaca . Paganara ricuucami .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Moisés quirishaga Egipto llactara saquicami , rey apu piñarishcara mana manzhasha . Mana ricuihuaj Diosta ricushcasna shinzhi tucuca .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Pai quirishaga , Pascua istara rarca , yahuarda chausinaras , ñaupa llucshij churira huañuchij ángel paigunara ama liangangaj .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Quirishcamanda , Israel runauna Puca Lamarda chimbanauca chaquishca allpai cuenta . Egipto runaunaga casna ranara camasha , yacui chucasha huañunauca .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Paiguna quirishcamanda , Jericó llacta quinzhauna urmanauca , runauna canzhis punzhara llacta muyujta purishca huasha .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: Rahab nishca , shujhua tacarij huarmi , quirisha mana huañucachu mana casujgunahua pariju , ricusha purij runaunara ali shunguhua chasquishcaraigu .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: ¿ Imara mas nishachu ? Lugar illan rimangaj Gedeón , Barac , Sansón , Jefté , David nishcaunamanda , shinallara Samuelmanda , Diosmanda rimajgunamandas .

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: Caiguna quirishcamanda , llactaunara vencinauca , aliranara ranauca , cushca shimiunara apinauca , león pumauna shimira ishcanauca ,

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: huaquinguna atun ninara huañuchinauca , espara quirumanda quishpinauca , irqui ashcamanda ursara apinauca , guerraunai shinzhi tucunauca , carumanda shamuj soldarounara callpachinauca .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Huarmiuna paiguna huañushcaunara causarishcamanda apinauca . Shujgunaga tormendachishca anauca , quishpinara mana munasha , yali valij causarinara apingaj .

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: Shujguna burlashca anauca , azutishca anauca , maspas iru huashcahua huatai tucunauca , chonda cularbi ishcai tucunauca .

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: Rumihua shitashca , serruchohua partishca , nanachishca , esparahua huañuchishca anauca . Maitas purinauca , borrego carahua chivo carahuas churarishca , tsuntsuuna , turbarishcauna , tormendachishcauna anauca .

text: ( Of whom the world was not worthy : ) they wandered in deserts , and in mountains , and in dens and caves of the earth .
text2: Cai samiunamanda mundu mana valijchu aca , runa illashca partiunai urcuunais yanga purinauca , allpa uctunai , rumi uctuunais causasha .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Tucui caiguna , paiguna quirishcamanda ali rimai tucushca ashallara , shimi cushcara mana apinaucachu ;

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: Dios ñucanchijta yali valijta cusha nisha , ñucanchi chara illajllaira paiguna ama sumajyachi tucungaj .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Chimanda ñucanchis casna atun monton ricujgunara charisha ñucanchi muyujta , tucui llashajtas , ñucanchira arcaj ucharas saquishunchi , ahuantasha ñucanchi callpanai callpashunchi .

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: Jesusta ricushun , pai ñucanchi quirinara iñachij , ñucanchi quirinara pactachij . Paiga paihua ñaupajpi tiaj cushira ricusha , cruzpi tormendarica , pingarinara pishiyachica , chihuasha Diospa tiarina ali maqui partii tiaricami .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Paita iyarichi , imasna uchayuj runauna ashca chijnishcahua tormendarica , canguna alma ama sambayasha desmayangaj .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Cangunaga chara yahuarda talinagama mana ahuantashcanguichichu uchahua macanausha .

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: Cungarishcanguichimi caí camachina shimira , cangunara churiunasna rimashcara : Ñuca churi , nisha , ama pishi valichingui Señor piñashcara , ama desmayaichu imahoras pai canda piñasha rimajpi .

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: Señorga pai llaquishca runara livachin , tucui pai chasquishca churira azutin .

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Cangunaga Dios livachishcara ahuantajpi , Dios cangunara churiuna cuenta apin . ¿ Maican churirara yaya mana livachin ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Cangunara mana livachisha saquijpl tucui churiunara livachishcasna , shinajpi yanga huachashca huahuauna anguichi , mana cierto churiuna .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Maspas , ñucanchi cai pachai tiaj yayaunara charicanchi , paiguna ñucanchira Hvachihuanauca , ñucanchi paigunara manzhacanchi . ¿ Imarashara mana espirituuna Yayara mas mas uyashun , uyasha causashun ?

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Chiguna cierto pacha ansa punzhaunara Uvachihuanauca paiguna munashcasna , astaun cai Yayaga ñucanchira Uvachihuanmi ñucanchi ali tucungaj , ñucanchi paisna chuya shunguyuj tucungaj .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Ciertomi mana ima livachinas chi ratollaira cushiyachin , astaun llaquirichin . Shinajllaira huasha , ganas ali causanara cungami uyajgunama .

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Shinajpi urmashca maquiunara atarichichi , irqui cunguri mucuunara shinzhiyachichi .

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
