text2: Dirichu ñambiunara raichi canguna chaquiuna puringaj , anga chaqui purij ñambimanda ama anzhurichu , astaun aliyashca achu .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Cushi shungura charichi tucui runaunahua , chuyaj shunguras . Cai illajga pi runas Señorda mana ricungachu .

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: Ali ricuichi maicans Diospa gracia ali iyaimanda ama anzhuringaj , ima ayaj shungus iñajpis cangunara arcangaj , ashcaunara chimanda huajlichingaj .

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: Ali cuiraichi shu tacarij runa ama tiangaj cangunahua , shu manalirajpas , Esaú cuenta , pai shu micunamandalla paihua ñaupa aj churi dirichura catuca .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: Canguna ña yachanguichi imasna pai huasha horas bendicionda apisha nisha rashallara , mana munashcachu aca , pai arrepentiringaj mana lugar tiacachu , pai huacasha mascajpis .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Ninahua rupaj llanganalla urcuma mana pactamushcanguichichu , shinallara landu tu tamas , rayounamas mana shamushcanguichichu .

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: Cormeta uyarishcamas , rimaj shimimas mana shamushcanguichichu , chi shimi casna manzhanaita ajpi uyajguna ama cuti uyarichu , nisha mañanauca .

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: Shimi mandashcara mana ushanaucachu ahuantangaj : Ima huagra ashas urcuma pactajpi , rumihua shitai tucuchu , lanzahua tucsishca achu , nisha .

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: Urcura ricuna manzhanaita ajpi , Moisés nica : Chucchusha manzhaunimi .

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: Astaumbas Sión nishca urcuma shamushcanguichi , causaj Diospa llactama , ahua pacha Jerusalén nishcama , ashca huaranga angelguna montonmas .

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: Shamushcanguichi ahua pachai quillcashca ñaupa llucshij churiuna tandarinama , shinallara tucuira taripaj Diosma , ali runauna espirituunama , ña alichishcauna .

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: Shamushcanguichi Jesusma , mushuj pactachina shimira Alichijma , paihua chausishca yahuarmas , Abelbajmanda yalira rimaj .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Ricuichi rimajta ama ichungaj . Cai pachai camachijta mana casujguna mana quishpijpiga , maspas mana quishpishunzhu ñucanchi , ahua pachamanda rimajta mana casusha .

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: Paihua shimi chi ñaupa horas cai pachara cuyuchica , randi cuna shimira cushcami nisha : Cutillara ñuca cuyuchishami mana cai pachallara , astaumbas ahua pacharas .

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: Cai shimi , Cutillara , nisha , tucui cuyurijgunara anzhuchinara riman , rashcauna cuenta , mana cuyurinaunalla saquirinauchu .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Shinajllaira ñucanchi shu mana cuyurihuaj mandana pachara chasquisha , Diosta agrasishunchi , chimanda Diosta sirvishunchi , paita cushiyachisha ali llaquij ali manzhaj shunguhua .

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: Ñucanchi Diosga shu rupachij nina cuentami .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Uquipurasna llaquinausha tiaichi . 2 Pasiajgunara cuirangaj ama cungaringuichi . Huaquinguna pasiajgunara chasquisha , mana yachashallara , angelgunara chasquinaucami .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Chonda cularbi ishcariajgunara iyarichi , canguna paigunahua pariju ishcarishca cuenta ; shinallara tormendachishcaunaras iyarichi , cangunas aichai tiajguna asha .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Tucui cangunahua , casarana ali apishca achu , caitus uchalina illaj . Shujhua tacarijgunaras , shujpa huarmira apijgunaras Dios taripangami .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Ama cullquira llaquichichu ; canguna cuna horas charishcaunahua cushi tucuichi . Dios casna nica : Canda mana cungarishachu , mana saquishachu .

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Shinajpi cushi shunguhua rimanara ushanchi : Señor ñucara yanapaj mi . Mana manzhashachu runa ñucara imara rasha nijpis .

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Cangunara cuirajgunara ama cungarichichu , Diospa shimira cangunara rimajguna ajpi . Paiguna causana tupura iyarichi , paiguna quirinara catirichi .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: Jesucristo shinallarami , cainas , cunas , huiñaigamas .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Ama apai tucuichichu ima yanga mana iyaihuaj yachachishcaunahua . Valinmi gracia nishca ali iyaihua shungura shinzhiy achingaj , mana aichara car ana camachishcaunahuas , chigunaga mana imahoraspas yanapanauca paigunara catijgunara .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Ñucanchi shu altar nishca sacrificio mesara charinchi , tabernáculo huasii sirvijgunaga chimanda mana ushanaun micunara .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Sacerdote atun apu sacrificiora rasha , huagrauna yahuarda Diosta alabana huasii icuchisha ucharashcaraigumanda , sacrificio aichara llactamanda canzhai rupachishcami .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Shinallara Jesús runaunara chicanyachingaj paihua quiquin yahuarhua , pungumanda canzhai tormendarica .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Llucshingaichi paihuajma , llactamanda canzhama , paita chijnishcara apasha .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Caibiga shu durana llactara mana charinchichu , astaun huasha shamujta mascaunchi .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Shinasha , tucui horas paimanda alabana sacrificiora Diosta cushunchi , ñucanchi shimihua paihua shutira rimasha .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Ali ranaras yanapanaunaras ama cungarichichu . Casna sacrificiounahua Dios cushiyanmi .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Cangunara cuirajgunara uyaichi , paigunara casuichi . Paiguna ricusha cuiranaun canguna almaunara , imasna paiguna cangunamanda Diosta rimana anaunga . Caita cushihua ranara munanaun , mana piñarinahua , caiga cangunama mana valinzhu .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Ñucanchimanda mañaichi . Ñucanchi ali rana iyaira charinchimi nisha iyaunchi , tucuibi alirasha causangaj munasha .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Maspas cangunara rugauni , ñucamanda mañaichi , nisha , ñuca uctalla cangunajma cuti shamungaj .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Cushi shungura cuj Dios , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristora huañushcaunamanda causachij , borregounara atun Cuiraj huiñaigama duraj pactachina shimi yahuarmanda ,

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: cangunara alichichu tucui ali ranaunai pai munashcara rangaj , pai ali munashca tupura cangunajpi rausha Jesucristomanda , paiga ali sumaj tucuchu huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Cangunara rugauni , uquiuna , cai camachishca shimira uyaichi , ansahuallara cangunama quillcashcani .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Yachaichi , ñucanchi uqui Timoteo ña llushpirishcami . Pai uctalla shamujpi , pariju shamushun cangunara ricungaj .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Tucui cangunara cuirajgunara saluraichi , tucui quirijgunandi . Italia llactamanda ajguna cangunara saluranaun .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Gracia nishca ali iyai tucui cangunahua tiachu . Amen .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Ñuca , Santiago , Diosta Señor Jesucristoras sirvij asha , judioguna chunga ishqui ailluuna chausirishcaunama salurasha quillcauni .

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Ñuca uquiuna , canguna caran tono camanai urmajpi , cushimi ani nisha iyanguichi .

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: Caita yachasha imasna canguna quirinara camashca asha , ali ahuantana iyaira cungami .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Shinallara lugarda cunguichi cai ali ahuantana iyai pactarichu , canguna pactajta ali iyaiyuj tucungaj imaras mana pishisha .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Cangunamanda maicambas ali iyaira pishisha , Diosta mañachu . Dios tucuigunama pactajta cunmi , mana mitsasha . Paima cushca anga .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: Astaun , ali quirinahua mañai , mana ima quirinais pishisha . Maican runas mana ali quirisha , lamar atun tsajlas cuenta tucun , huaira caran partima apashca .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Casna runa ama iyachu imaras Diosmanda apingaj .

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: Ishqui iyaiyuj runa tucui pai rashcaunai yapa turcarisiqui .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: Mana charij uqui cushiyachu pai ahuayashcai .

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: Charij uquiga cushiyachu pai ichillayashcai . Pai quihua sisa cuenta pasangami .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Imasna indi llucshimujpi rupai tucujpi , quihua chaquirin , paihua sisa urman , paihua sumaj ricurina chingarin , shinallarami charij runa huañuringamí pai tucui rashcaunai .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Cushimi tentacionda ahuantaj runa . Camanara vencishca huasha , causana llaitura apinga . Cai llaitura Dios paita 11aquijgunama cusha nishcami .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Imahoras shu runa tentai tucusha , ama nichu Diosmanda tentashca mani , nisha . Dios mana ushanzhu manalihua tentai tucungaj , maspas pai mana pitas tentanzhu .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: Astaun shu runa tentai tucujpi , paihua quiquin ucha munaimanda aisai tucunmi , umachishca tucunmi .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Shinajpi ucha munai , huahuara tupashca huasha , uchara pagarichin . Uchaga pactarijpi huañuira pagarichin .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Ñuca llaquishca uquiuna , ama umachichichu .

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Tucui ali cuyana , tucui ali sumaj cuyashca ahuamanda irgumun estellasgunara raj Yayamanda . Paihuajpi turcarinas , llanduyanas illan .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Paiga paihua quiquin munaimanda ñucanchira pagarichica paihua cierto shimimanda , ñucanchi pai tucui iñachishcaunamanda ñaupa punda pucujguna cuenta tucungaj .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Caimanda , ñuca llaquishca uquiuna , tucui runa puruntu achu uyangaj , randi rimangaj piñaringajpas unaiyaj achu .

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: Runa piñarinaga Diospa ali ranara mana ranzhu .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Chiraigumanda tucui irus ranaunaras yaparij manali ranaunaras ichusha , canguna iyaibi tarpushca shimira apinguichi manso shunguhua . Caimi canguna almara quishpichinara ushan .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Uyashca shimira pactachijguna tucuichi , ama uyajgunalla , cangunallara umachisha .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Maicambas cai shimira uyashallara , mana raushas , shu espejoi ricuj runa cuenta tucun , paihua quiquin ñahuira ricusha .

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: Paulara ricun , randi rishca huasha uctalla imasna ashcaras cungarin .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: Astaun maicambas liuriyachina ali ley shimii ricusha , catisha , mana cungarisha uyaj ajpi , astaun alira raj , casna runaga cushi tucungami pai tucui rashcaunai .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Maican runas cangunamanda , Diosta quirij ani nisha iyasha , shinajllaira paihua callura mana arcajpi , paulara umachiun , pai Diosta quirina mana valinzhu .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Dios Yaya ñaupajpi ali cierto quirina , mana imas huajlishcahua , caimi : huaccha huahuaunajpi huaccha huarmiunajpis pasiai rinami paiguna llaquiriushcai , shinallara dueñora mundumanda ima huajlinamandas huacachingaj .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Ñuca uquiuna , canguna ñucanchi sumaj Señor Jesucristoi quiriushcai , charij gunahua mana charíjgunahua ama chican tonora raichichu .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Shu charij runa ali curi sortiashua , ali valij churanaras churarij , canguna tandarinama icujpi , shinallara shu irus tsuntsu churanara churarij runa icujpi ,

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: canguna valij churarijta cushihua ricusha , paita nijpi : Tiaripai cai ali tiarinai , randi tsuntsu churarijta : Chillai shayari , mana shinashaga , ñuca chaqui paltana banco rayai tiari , nijpi ,

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu casna rasha , cangunapura runaunara chicanyachinguichi ? Shinallara ¿ manzhu manali iyaihua taripajguna tucushcanguichi ?

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Uyaichi , ñuca llaquishca uquiuna , ¿ manzhu Dios cai pachai tiaj mana charijgunara ajllaca , paiguna quirinahua charij tucungaj , ahua pachara apijguna tucungaj , Dios paita llaquijgunama cusha nishcara ?

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: Cangunaga tsuntsu runara pingachishcanguichi . Charijgunaga , ¿ manzhu caiguna cangunara tormendachijguna ? ¿ manzhu caiguna cangunara apuuna ñaupajma aisachijguna ?

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu caiguna cangunara cushca ali valij shutira irusta camisha rimanaun ?

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: Canguna cierto pacha yapa valij mandashca shimira pactachisha , Quillcai quillcashcasna : Shu runara llaquina mangui can quiquinllara llaquishcasna , nisha ; alimi raungui .

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: Astaun runaunara chicanyachisha , uchara raunguichi , ley shimimanda causayujguna tucunguichi , ley shimira paquijgunasna .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Maicans tucui ley shimira pactachij asha , randi shu mandashcallara mana pactachisha , pai tucui cai shimiunamanda causayuj tucun .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Chi ama shujgunahua tacaringuichi nisha nij shinallara ama huañuchinguichu nisha nij aca . Shinajpi can mana shujgunahua tacariushallara randi shujta huañuchisha , can ley shimira paquij tucushcangui .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Liuriyachina ley shimimanda taripanauna asha , casna nisha rimaichi , casna raichi .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Maicans llaquina illaj taripasha , paihuas llaquina illaj taripai tucunga . Llaquina taripanara vencin .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Ñuca uquiuna , shu runa quirinara charinimi nisha nij , shinajllaira ali ranaunara mana rajpi , ¿ imajta valin ? ¿ chi sami quirina paita quishpichinara ushanzhuiri ?

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Shu uqui shu pañi llushti ajpi , caran punzha micunara ministijpis ,

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: cangunamanda shuj paita : Cushihua ri , rupajyai , amijta micui nijpi , shinajllaira ima aicha ministishcaras mana cujpi , ¿ imajta valin ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Shinallarami quirina sapalla asha , ali ranauna illajpi , paulara huañushcami .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: Shu runa ñinga : Can quirinara charingui , ñucaga ali ranaunara charinimi , nisha . Shina rimajpi , camba alirana illaj quirinara ricuchihuai , randi ñuca ali rashcaunamanda ñuca quirinara canda ricuchisha .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Can Dios shujlla ashcara quiringui . Alira quiringuimi , supaiunas shinallara quirinaun , chucchunaun .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: ¿ Yachasha ningui , upa runa , imasna cai sami quirina ali ranauna illajpi huañushcami ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Ñucanchi yaya Abrahamga , ¿ manzhu ali rashcaunamanda ali tucuca , paihua churi Isacta ricuchijpi altar nishca sacrificio rana rumi ahuai ?

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: ¿ Manzhu ricungui imasna paihua quirina ali rashcaunahua pariju tiauca , shinallara ali rashcaunamanda paihua quirina pactajta tucuca ?

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Shinallara Quillcai quillcashca pactarica , casna nisha : Abraham Diosta quirica , shinamanda pai ali tucuca shinallara Diospa amigo nishca aca .

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Shinajpi ricunguichi imasna shu runa ali rashcaunahua ali tucun , mana quirinamandalla .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Shinallara , ¿ manzhu Rahab nishca tacarisiqui huarmi pai ali rashcaunamanda ali tucuca , imahoras ricuj runaunara apica , shu nambira cachaca ?

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Imasna runa aicha alma illajpi huañushcami , shinallara quirinas ali ranauna illajpi huañushcami .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Ñuca uquiuna , cangunamanda ama ashca yachachijguna tucunguichichu . Yachanguichi imasna ñucanchi yachachijguna mas causayachishca tucushun .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Tucui ñucanchi caran cuti pandanchi . Maicans shimihua mana pandajpi , pactajta runa anga , shinallara tucui paihua aichara mandanara ushan .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Caballo shimii ñucanchi irura amulichinchi pai ñucanchira casungaj , shina rasha paihua entero aichara mandanchi .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Atun barcounara iyarichi . Atun ashallara , shinzhi huairahua apai tucushas , shu ichilla cahuinallahua muyuchishcami , pushaj dueño maima rinara munajpis .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Shinallara , runa callu ichilla aichahuami , randi atun sami rimanara riman . Iyarichi imasna ansalla nina ashca atun sachara sindichin .

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: Runa callu shu nina cuentami , ashca manali rimaisiqui . Calluga ñucanchi aichai tiausha , entero aichara irushua tinichin . Nina cuenta , callu tucui causaira sindichin , paulara ucupachamanda sindichishcami .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Tucui sami aichara , pishcuras , machacuiras , lamarbi tiau aichahuaras uyuhuaihuajmi , shinallara runauna paigunara uyuhuashcami .

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: Randi , mana pihuas callura uyuhuanara ushan . Calluga manali asha , mana arcaihuajchu , huañuchina ambihua undashcami .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Ñucanchi calluhua Dios Yayara alabanchi , shinallara calluhua Diospa samii rashca runaunara manalira rimanchi .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Chi shimi caramandallara ali shimiuna manali shimiunas llucshinaun . Ñuca uquiuna , casnaga mana valinzhu .

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: ¿ Yacu bujyu shu uctumandalla mishqui yacus ayaj yacus pahuamunzhu ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Ñuca uquiuna , ¿ higo muyu yurai aceituna nishca muyu aparinara ushanzhu ? Shinallara , ¿ uvillas yurai higo muyu aparinara ushanzhu ? Mana pacha . Shinallara shu yacu bujyumanda , ayaj yacu mishqui yacus mana llucshinara ushanaunzhu .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: ¿ Cangunamanda pita ali iyaiyuj , pita intindij anga ? Pai ali causashcamanda paihua ali ranaunara ricuchichu , ali manso shunguhua .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: Canguna shungüi piñana iyaira chijnina iyairas charijpi , ama atun mani nisha iyaichichu , shinallara ama llullaichichu cierto shimimanda .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Chi sami yachana mana ahuamandachu irgumushca , astaun cai pachamandas , aichamandas , supaimandas .

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Maibis piñana iyais chijnina iyais tiajpi , chihui turbarina tiaunmi , shinallara caran tono manali ranauna .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: Randi ahuamanda yachana ñaupa punda chuyajmi , chihuasha cushi shungura cun , shinallara llaquisiqui , ali perdonaisiqui , ali rashcaunahuas undachin , mana ishqui iyaihua rana , mana ishqui shimiyuj .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Ganas causanara mascajguna ganashua tarpunaun , ali dirichu causana aparishcara pallangaj .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: ¿ Cangunapura maimandara shamunaun guerrauna , macanauna ? ¿ Manzhu shamunaun canguna irus munashcaunamanda , canguna aicha ucui macanaupi ?

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Yapajta munanguichi , shina ajllaira mana charinguichichu . Huañuchinguichi , chijnishcahua smdinguichi , shinajllaira mana pactanguichichu canguna munashcaunara . Macanaunguichi , guerrara raunguichi , shinajllaira canguna munashcaunara mana charinguichichu , mana mañashcaraigumanda .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Mañanguichi , shinajllaira mana apinguichichu manali mañashcamanda , canguna irus munashcallai yanga gastangaj .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: ¡ Shujhua tacarij almauna ! Manzhu yachanguichi mundura llaquina Diosta chijninami . Maicans mundura llaquij tucusha , Diosta chijnij tucun .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: ¿ Iyanguichi yangamandachu riman Diospa Shimi : Dios ñucanchi ucui causangaj cushca Espíritu ñucanchira ashcara muñan , nisha ?

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: Paiga mas gracia nishca ali iyaira cun . Chiraigumanda Diospa Shimi nin : Dios mas tucuisiquiunara arcan , astaun manso shunguyujgunama gracia nishca ali iyaira cun .

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Shinajpi Diosta uyaichi . Supai apu ñaupajpi shinzhira shayarichi , shina rajpi cangunamanda miticungami .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: Diospajma mayanllayamuichi , shina rajpi pai cangunama mayanllayamungami . Uchayujguna , maquira maillaichi ; canguna , ishqui iyaiyujguna , shungura sumacyachichi .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Tormendarichi , llaquirichi , huacaichi . Canguna asina huacana tucuchu , shinallara canguna cushi llaqui tucuchu .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Canguna ichillayaichi Diospa ñaupajpi . Shina rajpi pai cangunara ahuayachinga .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Uquiuna , cangunapura ama piñanaichichu . Maicans uquira piñajpi , taripajpis , ley shimiras piñan , taripan . Ley shimira taripashaga , mana ley shimira rajchu angui , astaumbas taripaj tucungui .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Shujllami ley shimira cuj . Paillami quishpichij , shinallara chingachij . ¿ Canga pitangui shujta taripangaj ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: ¡ Uyaichi ! casna rimajguna : Cuna punzha asha , caya punzha ashas , chi llactama rishun , chihui shu huata tucushun , catushas randishas , cullquira ganashunmi , nisha ;

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: randi caya tucunara mana yachanguichi . ¿ Canguna causanaga ima cuentara angairi ? Cierto pacha canguna causanaga shu puyu cuentami , shu ratolla ricurisha chihuasha chingarin .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Cai randimanda , casna rimana anguichi : Dios munajpi causashun , imaras rashun , nisha .

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Cunaga , canguna mas tucuisiqui iyaibi ahuayanguichi . Tucui cai sami ahuayana manalichu .

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Alira rana yachaj mana alira rajpi uchami .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Cuna uyaichi , charijguna . Huacasha caparichi , huasha shamuna llaquiunamanda .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Canguna charishcauna ismushcaunami , canguna churanauñara taula curu micushcarrii .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Canguna curis cullquis huacarishcami . Cai huacarishca cangunara causayachinga , shinallara nina cuenta canguna aichara micungami . Puchucai punzhaunajta canguna valijgunara tandachicanguichi .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Canguna allpaunamanda pallajgunama mana pagashca cullqui huacasha cayaun , umachisha canguna mana paigunama pagashca cullqui . Shinallara pallajguna huacashcauna mandaj Diospa rinrima pactashcami .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Cangunaga cai pachai munanaita causashcanguichi , aicha munaira rasha . Canguna shungura racuyachishcanguichi , aichara huañuchina punzhaisna .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Ali runara causayachisha huañuchishcanguichi . Paiga cangunara mana arcachin .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Chiraigumanda uquiuna , alilla chapanguichi Señor shamunagama . Ricuichi imasna tarpuj runa chapaun allpamanda llucshij valij muyuunara , ñaupa punda shamuj tamiara puchucai tamiara alimanda chapausha .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Canguna shinallara alimanda chapaichi . Canguna shungura ursayachichi . Señor shamuna punzha mayanllayaunmi .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Uquiuna , parijumanda ama piñanaunguichi , canguna ama causayachi tucungaj . Taripajga pungüimi shayaun .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Ñuca uquiuna , Señorba shutii rimajgunara iyaringuichi , shu tormendarina shu chapana ricuchina cuenta .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Tormendarijgunaga cushimi anaun ninchi . Uyashcanguichi imasna Job nishca alimanda chapashcara , shinallara ricushcanguichi Señor rashcauna tucurishcara , imasna Señor yapa llaquij shunguyuj , sintij shunguyuj ashcara .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Ñuca uquiuna , tucuimanda yali nini : Ama Diospa shutihua rimaichichu , ama ahua pacha , ama cai pacha , ama ima shu shutihuas . Astaun casna rimaichi , canguna Ari nishca , Ari achu , shinallara canguna Mana nishca , Mana achu , canguna ama taripanai urmangaj .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: ¿ Cangunamanda shu runa tormendarinzhu ? Mañachu . ¿ Shujga cushiyanzhu ? Alabasha cantachu .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: ¿ Cangunamanda shu runa ungushcachu ? Iglesia rucuunara cayachu , paimanda mañangaj , aceitera talingaj paihua ahuai Señorba shutii .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Quirishcahua mañajpi , ungushca runara quishpichishca anga . Señor paita atarichinga . Pai ucharashcajpiga , pai ucharashcara perdonashca anga .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Shinajpi canguna ucharashcaunara parijumanda rimanguichi . Shinallara cangunapura parijumanda mañanuichi , canguna aliyai tucungaj . Ali runa shungumanda pacha mañashcaga ashca ranara ushanga .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: Eliasga , ñucanchisna sintij runa ashallara , shungumanda pacha mañaca , ama tamiachu , nisha . Shina mañajpi quinsa huata socta quillara mana tamiacachu allpai .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Cutillara mañajpi tamiamuca , shinallara allpa micuna muyura cuca .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Uquiuna , cangunamanda maicambas cierto shimimanda anzhuríshca ajpi , shinajllaira shu runa paita tigrachijpi ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: caita yachaichi : Pihuas ucharajta paihua pandarishca ñambimanda cutillara tigrachisha , shu almara quishpichinga huañuimanda , shinallara ashca uchara quillpangami .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: Ñuca , Pedro , Jesucristo cachashca runa , carui chausirishca runaunama quillcauni , Ponto , Galacia , Capadocia , Bitinia nishca llactaunai chausirishcaunama .

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: Dios Yaya cangunara ajllashcami , pai ñaupa horasmanda yachashcaraigu . Espiritui chicanyachishca anguichi , paita uyangaj , Jesucristo yahuarhua chausi tucungaj . Gracia nishca ali iyais cushi causanas cangunajma mirarinauchu .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Dios , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo Yaya , bendiciashca achu . Paiga paihua llaquij shungumanda ñucanchira shu causaj chapanahua cuti pagarichihuaca , Jesucristo huañushcaunamanda causarishcaraigu ,

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: Diosmanda shu mana ismuihuaj herencia nishca cuyashcara apingaj , mana huajlinallachu , mana panga cuenta chaquirinallachu , cangunajta huacachishcami ahua pachai .

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: Canguna Diospa ushanahua huacachishca anguichi quirishcamanda , alma quishpinama pactangaj , ña alichishcami puchucai punzhai ricuri tucungaj .

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: Caimanda canguna cushiyanguichi , astaun cuna ratoi ansa horasgamas ministirijpi , tormendarina anguichi huaquin camanaunai .

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: Canguna quirina curimanda yali valin , ismuihuaj curi cuenta ninai camashca ajpi . Camashcai ali tucujpi canguna quirina alabashca , sumacyachishca , ahuayachishca anga Jesucristo ricurimuna punzhai .

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: Paita mana ricushallara llaquinguichi ; manaraj ricujllaira quirisha , ima sumaj mana rimaihuaj cushihua cushiyanguichi .

text: Receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
text2: Casnami , canguna quirina pactarin , caimi canguna almaunara quishpichina .

text: Of which salvation the prophets have inquired and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
text2: Cai quishpinamanda Diosmanda rimajguna tapunauca , ali mascasha mascanauca . Cangunama shamuj gracia nishca ali iyaira rimanauca .

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: Paiguna tapunauca pi runaras , ima horastas paigunajpi tiau Cristo Espíritu rimauca , pai Cristo tormendaringaraushcara ñaupara rimasha , shinallara huashai shamuj sumacyachingaraushcaras .

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: Paigunama ricuchishca aca imasna mana paigunajta astaumbas ñucanchijta cai bendiciongunara rimanauca . Cai shimiuna cangunama ña shamunaushcami , evangelio shimira rimajgunamanda , ahua pachamanda cachamushca Santo Espíritu yanapashcahua . Cai shimiunara quiquin angelguna yachanara munaunaun .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Chiraigumanda canguna iyaira chumbillishca cuenta charichi , ali iyanahua tiaichi , pactajta chapaichi chi cangunama shamuna gracia nishca ali iyaibi , Jesucristo ricurimuna horaspi .

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Ali uyaisiqui churiuna cuenta chapaichi , canguna yachai illaj horas munashcaunara mana catisha .

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: Astaun , imasna cangunara cayaj Dios chuyajmi , shinallara cangunas chuyaj tucuichi canguna tucui causana tonoi .

text: Because it is written , Be ye holy ; for I am holy .
text2: Quillcashca tian : Chuyaj aichi , ñuca chuyaj ashcaraigu .

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Imasna Dios caran dueñora taripan pai quiquin rashca tupullai , pi runas mana quishpisha , shinajpi canguna paita : Yaya , nisha , cayasha , manzhashalla causaichi canguna tucui cai pachai purina punzhaunai .

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: Caita yachaichi : Canguna yayaunamanda apishca yanga sami causana tupumanda randishca acanguichi , mana ismuihuaj paganahua , curihua cuenta , cullquihua cuenta ,

text: But with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot :
text2: astaumbas , Cristo valij yahuarhua randishca acanguichi , pai ima iruspas illaj huajlishca illaj borrego cuenta .

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: Manara mundu callarijllaira paimi cushca aca , astaun puchucai punzhaunai ricurimuca , Dios cangunara llaquishcaraigu .

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: Cai Cristomanda canguna Diospi quiringuichi . Dios paita causachica huañushcaunamanda , paita sumacyachica , canguna quirina canguna chapanas Diospi tiangaj .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Canguna almara chuyayachishca ajpi cierto shimira uyashcaraigu , Espiritumanda , uquipurasna cierto llaquisha , parijumanda ashcara llaquinuichi chuyaj shunguhua .

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: Canguna cutillara pagarishca anguichi , mana ismuihuaj causanahua , astaumbas ali caüsanahua , Diospa shimimanda . Paihua shimi causan , duranmi huiñai huiñaigama .

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: Imasna quillcashca tian : Tucui aicha quihua cuentami . Tucui runa sumajga quihua sisa cuentami . Quihua chaquirin , paihua sisa urman ;

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: Astaumbas Diospa shimi huiñai huiñaigama duran . Chi shimiga evangeliomanda cangunama rimashcami .

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Tucui manali shunguras , tucui umachinaras , tucui ishqui shimiyuj rimashcaras , chijnina ras , manali shimiras saquisha ,

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: Mushuj pagarishca huahuauna cuenta alma chuchura munaichi , mana imahuas masarishca , canguna caimanda iñangaj quishpinagama .

text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious .
text2: Canguna gustashcanguichi chari imasna Señor ali shungumi .

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Paihuajma mayanllayamusha , shu causaj rumima cuenta , paita cierto pacha runauna ichushca aca , astaun Dios ajllashcami , ashca valijmi .

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: Canguna shinallara , causaj rumiunasna , shu espiritui iyashca huasira cuenta shayachishca aichi , shinallara shu chuyaj sacerdote monton tucungaj , espiritui iyashca sacrificiounara rangaj , Dios munashcasna , Jesucristoi .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Chi raigumanda , Diospa Quillcai quillcashca tian : Caiga , Sión nishca llactai shu istandi siqui rumira churauni , ajllashcami , valijmi , maicans paihuajpi quirisha mana pingaringachu .

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Cangunajmi cai valij tupu , canguna quirijguna asha . Astaumbas , mana quirijgunama : Sicachijguna mana munashca rumiga , caillarami istandi siqui rumi tucushca .

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: Shinallara : Shu nijtana rumi , shu arcana rumi tucushcami . Paiguna Diospa shimii nijtasha urmanaun , mana uyajguna asha . Chigamalla cushca anauca .

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: Astaumbas , canguna ajllashca miraiguna anguichi , rey apu sacerdoteuna montombas , chuyaj runaunas , Dios randishca runaunas , canguna Dios valishcaunara ricuchingaj , pai cangunara ucha llandumanda paihua sumaj punzhama cayacami .

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: Canguna ñaupa horas mana Diospa runauna acanguichi , cunaga Diospa runauna tucushcanguichimi . Ñaupa horas Diospa llaquinara mana tupacanguichi , astaumbas cuna horas tupashcanguichimi .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Liaquishcauna , cangunara rugauni , carumanda shamujgunasna , caruma purijgunasna , ucha aicha munaimanda anzhuríchi , cai ucha aicha munai almahua guerran .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: Canguna causana samira chuyajila charíchi gentilguna ñaupajpi . Shinashas , imais paiguna cangunamanda piñarinaun manali rajgunasna , Diosta alabanauchu taripana punzhai , canguna ali rashcaunara ricusha .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Tucui gobierno camachishcara uyaichi , Diosta llaquishcamanda , rey apuras uyasha , pai tucuimanda yali mandaj ajpi ,

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: shinallara , gobernadores nishcaunara uyaichi , paiguna reymanda cachashcauna ajpi , manali rajgunara livachingaj , ali rajgunaras alabangaj .

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: Caimi Dios munashca : Canguna alira rasha , manali runa mana yachasha yanga rimashcara chunllayachingaj .

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: Liuriuna asha , canguna liuri ashcara ama charinguichichu manali ranara umachisha rangaj , astaumbas Diosta sirvijgunasna aichi .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Tucui runaunara ahuayachichi . Uquiunara llaquichi . Diosta manzhaichi . Rey apura ahuayachichi .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Sirvijguna , manzhashallara canguna patrongunara uyaichi ; mana ali shunguyujgunallaras llaquijgunallaras , astaun shinallara mana ahuantaihuajgunaras .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: Caimi ali rimaihuaj , shu runa Diospa ñaupajpi alirana iyaimanda yangamanda tormendarishca asha .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: ¿ Imai alabai tucunguichi canguna ucharashcamanda livachishcara ahuantangaj ? Astaumbas , canguna alira rashcamanda tormendachishcara ahuantajpi , caimi Diospa ñaupajpi alimi nishca .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Caimanda cayashca acanguichi . Shinallara Cristo ñucanchimanda tormendachishca aca , ñucanchima shu ricuchinara saquica , canguna pai aitaushca chaquii catingaj .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: Paiga ima ucharas mana rarcachu , paihua shimii ima umachinas illacami .

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: Paiga maldiciashca asha , mana cutipacachu maldicionhua , tormendachishca ashas mana piñacachu ; astaumbas paillarara ali taripajpa maquii churacami .

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: Cristo , pai quiquinllara ñucanchi ucha rashcaunara paihua aichai aparica yurai , ñucanchi uchara rangaj huañushca ashallara ali ranai causangaj . Pai chugrishcamanda alichishca acanguichi .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: Canguna chingarishca borregouna cuenta acanguichi , astaumbas cuna canguna almara Cuirajma , canguna almara Ricujmas tigramushcanguichi .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Huarmiuna , canguna cariunara uyana anguichi . Shinashas shimira mana quirij cariuna gananaushca anga , shimira mana uyashas , paiguna huarmiuna ali causashcara ricusha .

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: Cariuna canguna chuyaj causanaras canguna manzhashcaras ricusha quirinaungami .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Canguna sumacyachishcaga , ama canzhamallara achu , aecha quindiyachishcahuas , curihuas , valij churarinaunahuas ,

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: astaumbas canguna sumacyachishcaga ucuma achu , shungüi , ali cushi llaquij almamanda , mana ismuihuaj sumajhua . Caimi ashcara valin Diospa ñaupajpi .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Shinallara chi tonoi , callari horas aj Diospi chapau chuyaj huarmiuna sumacyachinauca , cariunara uyasha ;

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: imasnara Sara Abrahamda uyaca , paita : Señor , nisha . Paihua ushushiuna tucunguichimi , alira rasha , imaras mana manzhasha .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Cariuna , canguna shinallara , intindinahua canguna huarmiunahua causaichi , huarmira llaquisha pai pishi ursayuj ashcamanda , paiguna cangunahua pariju causana cushira apiñauchu , canguna mañashcauna ama arcaringaj .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Puchucaibi , canguna tucui shu iyaiyujlla tucuichi , sintijpura , uquiunasna llaquinaupura , llaquij shunguyujguna , manso shunguyjguna .

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: Manaliraga ama cutipaichi mana alihua , maldiciondas maldicionhua , astaumbas bendicionhua randipaichi . Caita ricsichi , cayashca anguichimi bendicionda apingaj .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: Chi raigumanda : Causanara llaquisha nisha rau , ali punzhaunara ricusha nij , paihua callura manalimanda arcachu , paihua shimi cara umachisha ama rimachu .

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: Manalimanda anzhurichu , alira rachu , cushi causaira mascasha catichu .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Señorba ñahui aliunara ricun . Paihua rinriuna paiguna mañashcaunara uyanaun . Astaunga , Señorba ñahui manalira rajgunara mana ali ricunzhu .

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: ¿ Pita cangunara huajlichinga , canguna ali ranara catijpi ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Astaun , imais tormendachishca asha aliranamanda , cushiyaichi . Chi raigumanda paigunara ama manzhaichichu , ama turbarichichu .

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: Canguna shungüi Cristora quiquin Señor cuenta ahuayachichi , chicanyachichi , tucui horas puruntushca asha ali shunguhua manso shunguhuas cutipangaj , tucui cangunara tapujgunara : ¿ Imai quirishara chapaunguichiri ? nisha .

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: Ali rana iyaira charíchi , imais runauna cangunamanda rimasha manali rajgunasna , paiguna pingachishca anauchu , canguna Cristoi ali causashca tonora camishcamanda .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Dios casna munajpi , yali valin aliranamanda tormendachi tucungaj , astaun manali ranamanda mana valinzhu .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Shinallarami Cristo , shu cutilla tormendachishca aca uchamanda , alira rajga manalira rajgunamanda , ñucanchira Diospajma pushangaj . Paiga cierto pacha , aichai huañuca , astaumbas espiritui causachishca aca .

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: Cristo paihua espiritui rimai rica ishcarishca espirituunama .

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: Chi espírituuna callari horas mana uyajguna aca , imasna Dios shu cutilla cbapauca Noé causaushca punzhaunai , imahoras arca nishca atun barcora alichiuca . Chihui ansalla runauna yacui quishpichishca anauca , paiguna pusacpura anauca .

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: Cunaga , bautisana , chi rimaushca yacu cuenta , cangunara quishpichin , mana ucha aicha irusta pichasha , astaun ali rana iyai rimashca Diospa ñaupajpi ; cai quishpichina Jesucristo causarishcaraigumandami .

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: Paiga Diospa ali maquii tiaun , ahua pachama sicashca raigu . Chihui angelguna , mandajgunas , ushajgunas paita uyanaun .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Imasna Cristo paihua aichai tormendachishca aca , shinallara canguna casna iyaihua puruntuichi ; shu runa aichai tormendachishca asha ña ucharanara saquishcami ,

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: paihua aichai causana puchuj punzhauna ama runauna ucha munaibi causachu , astaumbas Diospa munaira rasha .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Ña basta ñucanchi ñaupa horas Gentilguna munaira rasha causana tiempo , imahoras puriucanchi irus iyaibi , ucha aicha munaibis , machanaunais , istai yalijta micunais , chijnihuaj runa rashca diosgunara alabaushcais .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Casna rajgunahua mana intindihuajchu imarasha canguna mana paigunahua pariju catinguichichu yapajta irusta rangaj , chimanda cangunara caminaun .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: Chiguna cuentasta ranaungami taripaj Diospa ñaupajpi . Paiga puruntumi causajgunandi huañushcaunandi taripangaj .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Chi raigumanda evangelio shimi huañushcaunama rimashca aca , paiguna aichai taripai tucungaj runara taripashcasna , astaun espiritui causanauchu Dios causashcasna .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Tucuiga ñalla tucuringaraun . Chiraigu ali causaichi , mañasha chapaichi .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Maspas , shinzhira llaquinuichi . Llaquij shungu ashca uchara quillpangami .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Cangunapura carumanda shamujgunara icuchichi canguna huasiunai , mana mitsasha .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Caran dueño imara Diosmanda cushcara charisha , shujgunara sirvi , ima tonos Diosmanda gracia nishcara ali ricuchijguna tucungaj .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Pi runas rimasha , Dios rimashcasna rimachu . Pi runas shujgunara sirvisha nijpi , Dios cushca ursahua sirvichu . Tucuibi Dios ahuayachishca achu Jesucristomanda . Paihuajmi sumacyachinas , tucui mandanas , huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Llaquishcauna , ama manzharinguichichu cangunahua shamushca shinzhi camashcara , ninahua camashcasna , shu mana iyaihua tucushca cuenta ;

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: astaumbas , cushiyaichi , canguna Cristora tormendachishcara apijguna asha . Shina rasha pai sumaj ricurimushcai , canguna ashcara cushiyanguichimi .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Canguna camishca asha Cristo shutimanda , cushimi anguichi . Diospa sumaj Espíritu canguna ahuai tiarin . Cierto pacha chigunamanda Cristo camishcami , astaun cangunamanda pai ahuayachishcami .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Shinashas cangunamanda ama shujpas tormendarichu huañuchijsna , shuhuajsna , manali rajsna , shujpajpi inquitajsna .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: Astaunga maican runa tormendachishca asha Cristiano nishca ashcamanda , ama pingarichu , astaumbas Diosta ahuayachichu caimanda .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Taripana horas ña callarimunmi Diospa huasii . Ñaupara ñucanchihua callarijpi , ¿ imasnara angai Diospa evangeliora mana uyajgunahua ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Ali runaga tormendoshua quishpijpi , ¿ imara tucungairi Diosta mana ricsij runahua , uchasapa runahuas ?

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Chi raigumanda , Dios munashcaraigumanda tormendarijguna ali ranahua paiguna almara paigunara raj Diosma entreganauchu . Paiga ali quirihuajllami .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Cangunahua tiaj ricuj rucuunara rugauni , ñucas shinallara paigunahua pariju ricuj runa asha , ñuca Cristora tormendachishcaunara ricuj asha , maspas huasha ricurimuj sumacyachishcara apij ashas :

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: cangunahua tiaj Diospa borregounara caraichi , ali cuirasha , mana ursahua astaumbas ali munaimanda , mana cullquira ganangaj , astaumbas ali iyaimanda .

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: Ama dueñouna cuenta canguna cuiraushca borreogunara mandaichichu , astaun borregounama ricuchinauna cuenta .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Imahoras borreogunara atun Cuiraj ricurimujpi , canguna huiñai durana sumaj llaitura apinguichimi .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Shinallara , maltauna , ricuj rucuunara uyaichi . Tucui parijumanda uyanuichi . Manso shunguhua churarichi . Diosga mas tucui siqui shunguunara arcan , astaun mansounama gracia nishca ali iyaira cun .

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Shinashas , mansoyachichi Diospa maqui ucui , pai cangunara ahuayachingaj pai munashca horaspi ;

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: canguna tucui turbarishcara pai ahuai churajpi , paiga cangunara cuiranmi .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Chuyajila causaichi , chapaichi ; cangunara chijnij diablo nishca supai apu , piñaj león puma cuenta muyujta puriun , pitas mascasha nillpungaj .

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: Paihua ñaupajpi shinzhira shayarichi , shinzhira quirisha , caita yachasha , canguna tormendarishcasna , canguna uquiuna entero mundui tormendarinaushcami .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Tucui gracia nishca ali iyaira cuj Diosga , Jesucristoi ñucanchira paihua huiñai duraj sumac tiashcama cayahuashcami . Canguna unaillara tormendarishca huasha , paillarami cangunara alichinga , shinzhiyachinga , shayachinga .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Paima sumacyachinaras rey apu mandanaras cushca achu huiñai huiñaigama . Amen .

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: Silvano maquii cachasha , cangunara ansahuallara quillcashcani . Paimi ali uqui ajta iyauni . Quillcacani cangunara camachingaj , cangunara cuentangaj imasna caimi Diospa cierto gracia nishca ali iyai . Caillai shayaunguichi .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Babiloniai tiaj iglesia , cangunahua pariju ajllashcami , cangunara saluraun , shinallara ñuca churi Marcos .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Parijumanda saluraichi llaquisha muchanahua . Tucui canguna Jesucristoi tiajguna , cushi shungu cangunahua tiachu . Amen .

text: Simon Peter , a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ , to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ :
text2: Simón Pedro , Jesucristora sirvij , apóstol nishca pai cachashca runa , quirijgunama quillcauni . Canguna ñucanchihua pariju shina tupu valij quirinara charinguichimi , Jesucristo ñucanchi Dios ñucanchira Quishpichij ali ashcamanda .

text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God , and of Jesus our Lord ,
text2: Gracia nishca ali iyai cushi causanas cangunama mirarinauchu , Diostas ñucanchi Señor Jesucristoras ricsiushcai .

text: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness , through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue :
text2: Tucui ministishcaunara Diosta llaquisha causangaj , Dios paihua ushanamanda ñucanchima cushcami , ñucanchira cayajta ricsishcamanda , pai sumaj ali valij ashcamandas .

text: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises : that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
text2: Caigunamanda ashca valij atun shimi cushcaunara charinchi . Cai shimiunamanda Diospa causanara apijguna anchi , ñucanchi cai mundui tiaj ucha munai ismunamanda miticujguna asha .

text: And beside this , giving all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; and to virtue knowledge ;
text2: Caimanda , ali iyaihua , canguna quirinama ali shungura yapaichi , canguna ali shunguma yachanara yapaichi .

text: And to knowledge temperance ; and to temperance patience ; and to patience godliness ;
text2: Yachanama chuyaj causanara yapaichi , chuyaj causanama shu chapaisiqui shungura , chapaisiqui shunguma sumaj causanara ,

text: And to godliness brotherly kindness ; and to brotherly kindness charity .
text2: sumaj causanama uquisna llaquinaunara yapaichi , uquisna llaquinaunama llaquinaras .

text: For if these things be in you , and abound , they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Canguna caigunara yalijta charisha lugarda mana charinguichichu quillangaj , mana aparishca cuenta tucungaj , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristora ricsishcai .

text: But he that lacketh these things is blind , and cannot see afar off , and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins .
text2: Astaumbas , caigunara mana charijga ñausami , mayanllai ricujmi , pai ñaupa horas ucharashcamanda pichashcara cungarishcami .

text: Wherefore the rather , brethren , give diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never fall :
text2: Chi raigumanda , uquiuna , canguna cayashcara canguna ajllashcaras mas ciertora rangaj mascaichi . Casna rasha , imahoraspas mana urmanguichichu .

text: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
text2: Shinajllaira cangunama cushca anga ñucanchira Quishpichij Jesucristo huiñaigama duraj mandana pachai lugarlla icungaj .

text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things , though ye know them , and be established in the present truth .
text2: Shinajpi , cai yachachishcaunara cangunara iyachingaj mana saquishachu , canguna ña yachajllaira , canguna charishca cierto shimira shinzhi quirijguna ajpi .

text: Yea , I think it meet , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
text2: Alimi yachin ñuca chara cai aichai tiausha , camachishca shimiunahua cangunara llicchachingaj :

text: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle , even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me .
text2: caita yachasha , uctalla cai ñuca aichara saquina mani , imasna ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo rimashcasna .

text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance .
text2: Shinallara , ñuca mascasha imasna rasha cangunara yanapangaj , canguna tucui horas cai yachachishcaunara iyaringaj ñuca huañushca huasha .

text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables , when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
text2: Ñucanchiga , ñucanchi Señor Jesucristo ushana tupuras pai shamushcaras cangunara yachachisha , mana runauna iyashca yanga cuentanaunara rimashcanchichu , astaun imasna paihua sumaj ahuayachishcara ñucanchi quiquin ñahuihua ricushcasna .

text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory , when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Paiga Dios Yayamanda ahuayachishca , sumacyachishca ajpi , shu shimi ahua pacha gusto sumajmanda uyarica : Caimi ñuca llaquishca Churi , nisha , paihuajpi cushiyauni .

text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard , when we were with him in the holy mount .
text2: Ñucanchi cai ahua pachamanda rimashca shimira uyacanchi , paihua pariju tiaushcai , santo urcui .

text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed , as unto a light that shineth in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the day star arise in your hearts :
text2: Shinallara shu ali cierto shimira charinchi , Diosmanda rimashcara . Valinmi chita uyangaj , shu velara llandu ucui sindichishcasna punzhayangagama , tutamanda ricurimuj estrellas canguna shungüi sicamungagama .

text: Knowing this first , that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation .
text2: Ñaupa punda caita yachaichi , Quillcashcamanda ima Diosmanda rimashcaras pi runas paihua quiquin iyaillahua yachachinara mana ushanzhu .

text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man : but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Mana imahoras Diosmanda rimashca shimi runa munaimandallachu shamuca , astaun Diospa chuyaj runauna rimanauca Santo Espíritu yachachishcasna .

text: But there were false prophets also among the people , even as there shall be false teachers among you , who privily shall bring in damnable heresies , even denying the Lord that bought them , and bring upon themselves swift destruction .
text2: Imasna llulla shimira rimajguna runauna chaupi shungüi llucshinauca , shinallara llulla yachachijguna canguna chaupi shungüi tianaungami . Paiguna huajlichij llulla shimira pacalla rimanaungami , paigunara randij Señorda , Mana ricsinichu , nisha ; chiraigumanda paigunallara cungaimanda tucurinaunga .

text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways ; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of .
text2: Ashcauna paiguna irus manali causana samira catinaunga . Paigunamanda cierto nambira camishca anga .

text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not , and their damnation slumbereth not .
text2: Paiguna cullquira munaisiqui shunguhua cangunara catunaunga umachina shimiunahua . Paiguna causayachina unaimanda asha mana unaiyangachu , paigunara tucuchina cierto shamungami .

text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned , but cast them down to hell , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be reserved unto judgment ;
text2: Imasna Dios uchara raj angelgunara mana perdonacachu , astaumbas ucu pacha ucuma cachaca , llandu tutai huascahua huatasha , paigunara huacachica taripanagama chapangaj ;

text: And spared not the old world , but saved Noah the eighth person , a preacher of righteousness , bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly ;
text2: imasna rucu mundura mana perdonacachu , astaumbas Noera huacachica , pai ali causanara camachij runa ajpi , chishu canzhisgunahua pariju , Dios yacu izhura apamuca manali munduma ;

text: And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly ;
text2: imasna Sodoma Gomorra nishca llactaunara causayachica , paigunara tulaca , ushpa tucungagama , shina rasha Dios paigunara ricuchina cuenta cuca , tucui Diosta mana manzhajguna mana llaquijgunas ricungaj ;

text: And delivered just Lot , vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked :
text2: imasna Dios ali causaj Lot nishcara quishpichica , pai yapa molestarica manali runauna irus causashcaraigu ;

text: ( For that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds ; )
text2: ( Cai ali runa manali runauna chaupi shungüi causasha , paiguna manali rashcaunara ricushas , uyashas , paihua ali almara tucui punzha llaquichica . )

text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations , and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished :
text2: shinallarami Señor yachan paita llaquijgunara tentanamanda llushpichingaj , manaliunaras huacachingajpas taripana punzhai tormendachingaj ;

text: But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness , and despise government . Presumptuous are they , selfwilled , they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities .
text2: maspas , ucha aichara catijgunara , ucha aicha munaibi purijgunara , irus iyaibi purijgunaras huacacrüngami tormendachingaj . Caiguna apuunara chijnijguna , manzhai illajguna , mas tucui siquiuna , atun ushajgunara camingaj mana manzhanaun .

text: Whereas angels , which are greater in power and might , bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord .
text2: Quiquin angelgunaga , yali shinzhi asha , yali ushaj ashas , Señorba ñaupajpi caigunara mana camisha causayachinaunzhu .

text: But these , as natural brute beasts , made to be taken and destroyed , speak evil of the things that they understand not ; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption ;
